Dostupen distributiv Tails 4.11   Vypusk spetsializirovannogo distributiva Tails 4.11 (The Amnesic Incognito Live System), osnovannogo na paketnoi baze Debian i prednaznachennogo dlia obespecheniia anonimnogo vykhoda v set'. Anonimnyi vykhod v Tails obespechivaetsia sistemoi Tor. Vse soedineniia, krome trafika cherez set' Tor, po umolchaniiu blokiruiutsia paketnym fil'trom. Dlia khraneniia pol'zovatel'skikh dannykh v rezhime sokhraneniia dannykh mezhdu zapuskami primeniaetsia shifrovanie. Dlia zagruzki podgotovlen iso-obraz, sposobnyi rabotat' v Live-rezhime, razmerom 1 Gb.   V novom vypuske Tails iadro Linux obnovleno do versii 5.7.11, zadeistvovany novye vypuski Tor Browser 10, Thunderbird 68.12 i python3-trezor 0.11.6. Ubrana funktsiia vkliucheniia Wi-Fi Hotspot v setevom konfiguratore, kotoraia ne rabotaet v Tails.   Dobavlena vozmozhnost' sokhraneniia v postoiannoe khranilishche parametrov iazyka, klaviatury i dopolnitel'nykh nastroek, ustanovlennykh cherez interfeis privetstviia vkhoda v sistemu (Welcome Screen). Dannye nastroiki budut ispol'zovany v posleduiushchikh seansakh posle aktivatsii postoiannogo khranilishcha (Persistent Storage) v Welcome Screen.
Github: https://github.com/RalphMao/Docker-for-Researcher

Sformirovan znachitel'nyi reliz spetsializirovannogo brauzera Tor Browser 10, v kotorom osushchestvlion perekhod na ESR-vetku Firefox 78.  Brauzer sosredotochen na obespechenii anonimnosti, bezopasnosti i privatnosti, ves' trafik perenapravliaetsia tol'ko cherez set' Tor. Obratit'sia napriamuiu cherez shtatnoe setevoe soedinenie tekushchei sistemy nevozmozhno, chto ne pozvoliaet otsledit' real'nyi IP pol'zovatelia (v sluchae vzloma brauzera, atakuiushchie mogut poluchit' dostup k sistemnym parametram seti, poetomu dlia polnogo blokirovaniia vozmozhnykh utechek sleduet ispol'zovat' takie produkty, kak Whonix). Sborki Tor Browser podgotovleny dlia Linux, Windows i macOS.

Obiazannosti: - dorabotka, podderzhka i refaktoring sushchestvuiushchikh proektov;- razrabotka veb resursov pod proekty zakazchika ( ankety, stranitsy zavedeniia zaiavok s nashei storony na storonu zakazchika , vyvod dannykh statistiki, lichnye kabinety i t. d. );- neobkhodimo budet pisat' SQL zaprosy na formirovanie otchetnosti dlia zakazchika. Trebovaniia: Stek: js, typescript, Python3+/PHP, SQLFront-end:- js - bazovyi

GRAT2 is a Command and Control (C2) tool written in python3 and the client in .NET 4.0. The main idea came from Georgios Koumettou who initiated the project.Why we developed GRAT2 ?We are aware that there are numerous C2 tools out there but, we developed this tool due to curiosity of how C2 and other evasion techniques work. That's all!    Current Features:Evasion Techniques:    Sandbox (Check whether the machine is in the domain, if not exit).  Patch Event Tracing for Windows (ETW) Logging.  Patch Antimalware Scan Interface (AMSI).  caretrun - Execute command via cmd.exe in a caret format (^i^p^c^o^n^f^i^g) using explorer.exe as Parent PID (Evade some AV/EDRs).    Communication:    Encoded HTTP Communication using XOR and base64.  Proxy Aware.    Modules:    uac - Attempt to bypass UAC using silent disk clean-up with Parent PID Spoofing technique.  maketoken - Remove the current token and create a new one using the given credentials (Domain or Local).  revtoself - Remove the current token... #antimalware #grat2 #python3 #spoofing #uac #windows

Nebol'shoi anons utility Pentest Collaboration Framework, kotoruiu vylozhil v otkrytyi dostup na etoi nedele!   Naiti mozhno na gitlab: https://gitlab.com/invuls/pentest-projects/pcf  Kratko: portativnaia, krossplatformennaia (python3.8) utilita, pozvoliaiushchaia razvernut' veb-server na kotorom vy mozhete khranit', izmeniat' i peredavat' informatsiiu, poluchennuiu v protsesse pentesta ili analiza zashchishchennosti. Budet polezna kak pri solo-testirovanii, tak i v komande (naprimer, chtoby 100 raz ne skannirovat' vsem uchastnikam komandy odnu i tu zhe podset').  Osnovnaia prichina sozdaniia - nyne sushchestvuiushchie analogi libo platnye, libo ustarevshie i ne poddaiutsia normal'noi dorabotke. Na prikreplennom skrinshote vy mozhete uvidet' sravnenie s nimi.  Na dannyi moment est' integratsiia s takimi utilitami, kak: nmap, masscan, nessus, acunetix i nikto. Takzhe v proektakh mozhno sozdavat' chaty, sokhraniat' faily, sozdavat' uiazvimosti (vmeste s PoC), vesti zametki v khode testirovaniia, sokhraniat' naidennye uchetnye dannye i sozdavat' HTTP-sniffery(esli u vas neskol'ko proektov, to pod kazhdyi mozhno sozdat' neskol'ko snifferov chtoby ne putat'sia ot kakogo proekta prishla informatsiia).   V razrabotke: 1. generatsiia otcheta po pol'zovatel'skomu shablonu 2. bystraia proverka dobavlennykh kheshei po topu 10k populiarnykh parolei 3. API dlia napisaniia pol'zovatel'skikh skriptov ... 100. Dobavlenie drugikh tipov proektov, takikh, kak issledovanie ustroistva ili revers-inzhiniring PO.  P.S. Esli est' predlozheniia o fichakh/bagakh, to mozhno v ls.

Sbor informatsii profilia instagram  Rassmotrim utilitu, sposobnuiu sobirat' informatsiiu pol'zovatelei Instagram, kotoraia rabotaet na Termux.  Rassmatrivaemaia utilita sobiraet takie dannye, kak: datu registratsii, nalichie biznes-akkaunta profilia, kolichestvo soobshchenii, kategoriiu akkaunta, a tak zhe podkliuchen li akkaunt k Facebook.  1. Ustanavlivaem Termux   (https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.termux&hl=ru)2. Propisyvaem kazhduiu komandu otdel'no:  3. Neobkhodimo obnovit' i skachat' pakety. Kazhduiu komandu vypolniaem otdel'no pkg update pkg upgrade pkg install git pkg install python 4. Kloniruem repozitorii git clone https://github.com/th3unkn0n/osi.ig.git  5. Perekhodim v direktoriiu cd osi.ig 6. Vydaem prava chmod +x install.sh  7. Proizvodim zapusk ./install.sh 8. Zapuskaem i vydaem nuzhnuiu informatsiiu utilite python3 main.py -u username akkaunta  Posle vvedeniia poslednei komandy skript vam vydast informatsiiu ob akkaunte.

Na dannom skrine prodemonstrirovana moia proga na Python3.7.2, pozvoliaiushchaia sozdat' novyi Enum, prevoskhodiashchii chislennost' v 3 raza togo, chto byl v ne moiom Roblox API. Abusing Kerberos Resource-Based Constrained DelegationTL;DRThis repo is about a practical attack against Kerberos Resource-Based  Constrained Delegation in a Windows Active Directory Domain.The difference from other common implementations is that we are  launching the attack from outside of the Windows Domain, not from  a domain joined (usually Windows) computer.The attack is implemented using only Python3  Impacket  (and its dependencies). Tested on Arch  with up-to-date Impacket (0.9.21 as of writing).The AttackIn summary, without any deep details, the attack targets  a domain computer, exactly service principals related to the  target domain computer.What we need here as prerequisites:a domain account with write access to the target computer (exactly write access to the msDS-AllowedToActOnBehalfOfOtherIdentity property of the target computer domain object)permission to create new computer accounts (this is usually default, see MachineAccountQuota)LDAP (389/tcp) and SAMR (445/tcp) (or LDAPS (636/tcp)) access to the DC... #activedirectory #impacket #powersploit #python #rbcd-attack #takeover #up-to-date #windows

Primer sozdaniia prostogo kal'kuliatora na python3! Neobkhodimo:   1) python 3.8  2) PyCharm  3) pyinstaller // Dlia kompiliatsii programmy v exe fail  Kod: while True:   text = str(input("Vvedite vyrazhenie: "))  first = str()   seckond = str()   plus = bool(False)   minus = bool(False)   raz = bool(False)   umn = bool(False)   X = bool(False)   result = str()       for i in text:   if(i == "+"):   plus = True   minus = False   raz = False   umn = False   X = True   elif(i == "-"):   minus = True   plus = False   raz = False   umn = False   X = True   elif(i == "/"):   raz = True   minus = False   plus = False   umn = False   X = True   elif(i == "*"):   umn = True   raz = False   minus = False   plus = False   X = True   elif(X == False and i != "+" and i !="-" and i != "/" and i != "*"):   first = first + str(i)   elif (X == True and i != "+" and i != "-" and i != "/" and i != "*"):   seckond = seckond + str(i)     if(plus == True):   result = first + "+" + seckond + "=" + str(int(first) + int(seckond))   elif(minus == True):   result = first + "-" + seckond + "=" + str(int(first) - int(seckond))   elif(raz == True):   result = first + "/" + seckond + "=" + str(int(first) / int(seckond))   elif(umn == True):   result = first + "*" + seckond + "=" + str(int(first) * int(seckond))     print(result + "\n")

Vladimir sprashivaet: <<Kakie covety i pozhelaniia v izuchenii iazyka Python3 mozhete predlozhit'?>> #python  Dobryi den'!  Khochu obratit'sia k Vam vot s kakoi pros'boi: ia reshil izuchit' azy programmirovaniia i mne posovetovali srazu iazyk Python3, tak, kak on schitaetsia ne takim slozhnym, kak vse ostal'nye. Khochu Vas udivit', chto ia pensioner, mne 64 goda(Vy navernoe posmeiotes', chto ia v takom vozraste na takoe reshilsia), no mne eto interesno. Ia sam pereustanavlival Windows, a seichas snios ego i postavil Linux Mint, i ochen' udivilsia i obradovalsia tomu, chto namnogo luchshe i proshche i ne sozdaiot prakticheski nikakikh problem. Ia zashiol na Vash sait http://amp.gs/XvXE  gde est' besplatnye uroki etogo iazyka. Ia nachal s  pervogo uroka, no tam  privodiat primery, odin iz kotorykh test na znanie Pithon, dlia menia eto kak to ne sovsem poniatno i ia nemnogo zapanikoval. No potom skachal po  ssylke knigu s Telegram Kori Al'tkhoffa "Sam sebe programmist" i mne stalo potikhon'ku prikhodit' ponimanie, ia tut zhe stal deistvovat' po knige, pisat' primery i vsio srazu stalo poluchat'sia. Ia kak by s bol'shim udovol'stviem nachal obuchenie, chitaiu, konspektiruiu, srazu zhe pishu primery. Vobshchem vsio idiot prekrasno. No vot khotelos' by uslyshat'  sovet ili pozhelanie. Ia ne znaiu, za kakoe vremia ia vyuchu etot iazyk, no mne khotelos' by uznat' v kakuiu sferu potom opredeliat'sia. Avtor knigi i pishet, chto posle okonchaniia uchioby bol'shinstvo i ne znaet chego khochet. Ia ponimaiu, chto vsio budet nachinat'sia s prostykh programm, skoree vsego v protsesse uchioby uzhe nado budet chto to probovat' nachinat' sozdavat'. Chto Vy posovetuete mne? V kakuiu sferu luchshe vsego probovat' opredeliat'sia. Uznav Vashe mnenie, ia prosto budu sobirat' informatsiiu i parallel'no s obucheniem budu tak skazat' planirovat' vperiod. Vot kak to tak.  Otvetit' na vopros: http://amp.gs/XvXg

V Python, kak i v bol'shinstve sovremennykh iazykov programmirovaniia, funktsiia - eto osnovnoi metod abstragirovaniia i inkapsuliatsii. Vy, buduchi razrabotchikom, veroiatno, napisali uzhe sotni funktsii. No funktsii funktsiiam - rozn'. Prichem, esli pisat' <<plokhie>> funktsii, eto nemedlenno skazhetsia na udobochitaemosti i podderzhke vashego koda. Itak, chto zhe takoe <<plokhaia>> funktsiia, a eshche vazhnee - kak sdelat' iz nee <<khoroshuiu>>?

A Fuzzer For OpenRedirect Issues.Key Features :Takes a url or list of urls and fuzzes them for Open redirect issuesYou can specify your own payloads in 'payloads.txt'Shows Location header history (if any)Fast (as it is Asynchronous)umm thats it , nothing much  !Usage :Note : Use Python 3.7+ !$ git clone https://github.com/devanshbatham/OpenRedireX$ cd OpenRedireX$ python3 -m venv env$ source env/bin/activateNote : The "FUZZ" is important and the url must be in double qoutes ! $ python3.7 openredirex.py -u "https://vulnerable.com/?url=FUZZ" -p payloads.txt --keyword FUZZFor single URL :$ python3.7 openredirex.py -u "https://vulnerable.com/?url=FUZZ" -p payloads.txt --keyword FUZZFor List of URLs :$ python3.7 openredirex.py -l urls.txt -p payloads.txt --keyword FUZZExample :Credits :Thanks mate @NullPxl #fuzzer #openredirect #openredirect #openredirectfuzzer #openredirectscanner #openredirex #python #python3

Script that allows the easy creation of OpenVPN endpoints in any AWS region.  To create a VPN endpoint is done with a single command takes ~3 minutes. It will create the proper security groups. It spins up a tagged ec2  instance  and configures OpenVPN software. Once instance is configured an OpenVPN configuration file is downloaded and ready to use. There is also functionality to see which instances are running in which region and ability to terminate the instance when done. Additional functionality includes specifying instance type, generate ssh keypairs, specify custom ami,  change login user and more to come.Use CaseCreate on demand OpenVPN Endpoints in AWS that can easily be destroyed after done  only pay for what you use.DependenciesCreate a virtualenv:mkvirtualenv -p python3 env/source env/bin/activate  Install dependencies by running pip install -r requirements.txt  Ensure that you have an AWS .credentials file by running:vi ~/.aws/credentialsThen type in the following and add your keys (remove parenthesis):[default]aws_access_key_id = (your_access_key_here)aws_secret_access_key = (your_secret_key_here)Install OpenVPN client (if needed)InstallationEnsure dependencies are all..

hardcodes is a utility for searching strings hardcoded by developers in programs. It uses a modular tokenizer that can handle comments, any number of backslashes & nearly any syntax you throw at it.Yes, it is designed to process any syntax and following languages are officially supported:ada, applescript, c, c#, c++, coldfusion, golang, haskell, html, java, javascript,jsp, lua, pascal, perl, php, powershell, python, ruby, scala, sql, swift, xmlInstallationwith pippip3 install hardcodesor build from sourcegit clone https://github.com/s0md3v/hardcodes && cd hardcodes && python3 setup.py installFor DevelopersThe sample program below demonstrates usage of hardcodes libraryfrom hardcodes import searchstring = "console.log('hello there')"result = search(string, lang="common", comments="parse")print(result)Output: ['hello there']The arguments lang and comments are optional. Their use is explained below in the user documentation section.For Userscli.py provides a grep-like command line interface to hardcodes library... #commandline #hardcodes #python3

Senior SQL/PostgreSQL razrabotchik v Quantbox (quantbox.ru) / ot 150 000 do 200 000 rub.  Na rabotaiushchii v prodakshen bolee 2-kh let proekt Position Keeping trebuetsia starshii SQL-razrabotchik dlia dal'neishego samostoiatel'nogo razvitiia i podderzhki proekta pri pomoshchi 1,5 programmistov, sposobnykh zakryt' zadachi po Javascript, Python, C i prostomu SQL.    Proekt predstavliaet soboi sistemu dlia ucheta birzhevykh sdelok, predstavliaiushchii informatsiiu v vide razlichnykh reportov.   Tekhnologicheskii sostav proekta:   - Baza PostgreSQL napisana v osnovnom na plpgsql.  - Bekend proekta napisan na Python3 (tornado, asyncio), S, plpgsql.  - Frontend proekta napisan na Javascript s ispol'zovaniem tekhnologii Backbone, Marionette, React, Angular2.   Trebovaniia k kandidatu:   - Glubokoe ponimanie i intensivnyi opyt primeneniia SQL, zhelatel'no postgresql;  - Opyt ispol'zovaniia i razrabotki v proekte stored procedure, zhelatel'no na plpgsql;  - Ponimanie printsipov OOP, asinkhronnogo programmirovaniia, REST, AJAX;  - Opyt napisaniia programm na Python;  - Opyt raboty v Linux;  - Ispol'zovanie sistem kontrolia versii (git, SVN).   Dopolnitel'nym preimushchestvom budet:   - Opyt raboty v finansovykh organizatsiiakh;  - Znaniia v oblasti birzhevoi torgovli ili zainteresovannost' dannoi temoi;  - Opyt raboty s ocherediami soobshchenii (rabbitmq, Kafka);  - Opyt avtomaticheskogo testirovaniia koda (pytest, Selenium).   Usloviia raboty:   - Udalennaia rabota;  - Grafik: podderzhka proekta osushchestvliaetsia po budniam s 10:00 do 19:00 po Moskve, otguly/otprosy po dogovorennosti;  - Zarplata: 150 000-200 000 rublei na ruki (obsuzhdaetsia na sobesedovanii);  - Oformlenie po TK RF.   Sobesedovanie prokhodit v 2 etapa:  1. Internet-sozvon: Skype ili Zoom (dlia gruppovoi besedy);  2. V ofise kompanii pri uspeshnom prokhozhdenii pervogo etapa.  Otkliknut'sia: Pavlova Anna Andreevna  +7 (916) 9833749, Predpochtitel'nyi sposob sviazi - elektronnaia pochta.  annap@quantbox.ru

!! Senior Python razrabotchik Qiwi stiraet granitsy i vykhodit na novye gorizonty ;) Poetomu my ishchem opytnogo Python razrabotchika dlia razvitiia nashego mezhdunarodnogo proekta - Platezhnoi sistemy na territorii Evropy.  Nash tekhnologicheskii stek i ispol'zuemye instrumenty: python3, flask, postgresql, elasticsearch, github, teamcity, google cloud. Vam predstoit:  Uluchshat' i adaptirovat' proekt pod zadachi mezhdunarodnogo razvitiia v chasti trebovanii biznesa, otkazoustoichivosti, masshtabiruemosti i t.d.; Razrabatyvat' slozhnye sistemy vzaimodeistviia s vneshnimi partnerami; Prinimat' resheniia po arkhitekture proekta i vyboru tekhnologii dlia realizatsii postavlennykh zadach; Uluchshat' i podderzhivat' tekhnologicheskuiu infrastrukturu proekta v Google Cloud.  My ozhidaem:  Opyt promyshlennoi razrabotki na Python 2 ili 3, znanie ekosistemy iazyka, pythonic code; Khoroshee znanie obshchikh voprosov programmirovaniia: patterny proektirovaniia, struktury dannykh, klassicheskie algoritmy; Ponimanie printsipa raboty reliatsionnykh subd, opyt otladki uzkikh mest, ponimanie indeksov\tranzaktsii\acid; Opyt raboty s sistemami orkestratsii konteinerov i mikroservisnymi arkhitekturami; Budet zdorovo, esli vy rabotali s kakim-nibud' oblachnym servis provaiderom (gcp, aws, azure, etc.); Budet pliusom opyt raboty s frontend-tekhnologiiami: js, typescript, css3, html5.  My predlagaem:  Oformlenie po tk rf, "beluiu" konkurentosposobnuiu zarabotnuiu platu, rasshirennyi sotsial'nyi paket; Unikal'nuiu atmosferu dlia produktivnoi raboty i razvivaiushchuiu sredu, gde mozhno naiti edinomyshlennikov i nauchit'sia novomu; Komandu ekspertov, vozmozhnost' samorealizatsii, slozhnye i interesnye zadachi dlia tekh, kto liubit nastoiashchie vyzovy v rabote; Razvitie - glavnyi i postoiannyi trend qiwi. My reguliarno provodim vnutrennee i vneshnee obuchenie dlia prokachki professional'nykh navykov; dms dlia nashikh sotrudnikov: v nego vkhodit bol'shoi perechen' meditsinskikh uslug, vkliuchaia stomatologiiu. Zdorov'e - eto vazhno! Zaniatiia angliiskim iazykom v gruppakh ili individual'no onlain; Gibkii grafik: glavnoe - rezul'tat, a ne vremia, provedennoe za monitorom; Zabotu o vnutrennem dzene i reguliarnye uroki meditatsii i iogi priamo v ofise! Mozhno otvlech'sia ot del kak v obedennyi pereryv, tak i posle raboty; Bol'shuiu vyborku knig dlia samorazvitiia, raboty i prosto dlia chteniia. a eshche - knizhnyi klub, chtoby provodit' vremia s pol'zoi; Uiutnyi i sovremennyi ofis, chtoby kazhdyi chelovek chuvstvoval sebia v qiwi, kak doma; Besplatnuiu krytuiu parkovku dlia avtomobilei i velosipedov; Premii po rezul'tatam raboty; Begovoi klub, skvosh, voleibol, Gonku Geroev i eshche mnozhestvo sportivnykh uvlechenii, gde ty smozhesh' naiti sebe zaniatie po dushe.   Sviazat'sia mozhno po ssylke: https://msk-jobs.ru/msk/senior_python_razrabotchik-adv4334227.html  #rabota_Moskva #rabota_v_Moskve #rabota_MSK #Senior_Pythonrazrabotchik

Kak zashchitit'sia ot zarazhennykh PDF i dokumentov?    Vchera my poznakomilis' so sposobami vnedreniia virusa v dokument. Segodnia pogovorim o <<protivoiadii>>.    Delo v tom, chto kachestvenno spriatannyi takim obrazom mal'var' nel'zia obnaruzhit' antivirusom do momenta otkrytiia doka, chto maksimal'no uslozhniaet zashchitu.    Konkretno Dangerzone konvertiruet neblagonadezhnye PDF, Microsoft Office i izobrazheniia v bezopasnye PDF faily, posredstvom propuska cherez dve pesochnitsy.    Ustanovka    Dangerzone imeet kak Windows versiiu , tak i na Mac i Linux .    Pod Ubuntu pridetsia ustanovit' nekotorye pakety komandoi    sudo apt install -y python-all dh-python python3-stdeb docker.io python3 python3-pyqt5 python3-appdirs python3-click python3-xdg python3-requests    Ispol'zovanie    Pri otkrytii programmy nuzhno budet vybrat' zarazhennyi fail. Posle chego poiavitsia okno s nastroikami nazvaniia ochishchennogo faila, reader'a i iazyka konvertiruemogo dokumenta.    Nastroiv vse pod sebia, nazhimaem na "Convert to Safe File". Gotovo, bezopasnyi fail sozdan i dostupen dlia prosmotra.

Novaia utilita!!! Utilita VKTOOL Sluzhit dlia spama v kommentarii i na otkrytye stenki VKTOOL  USTANOVKA:  Termux  pkg install git -y  pkg install python3  git clone https://github.com/kotik06/VKTOOL  pip3 install vk_api  pip3 install vk  pip3 install colorama   Linux  apt install git -y  apt install python3  git clone https://github.com/kotik06/VKTOOL  pip3 install vk_api  pip3 install vk  pip3 install colorama   Zapusk cd VKTOOL && python3 n.py Vvodim token (Kate)  Vybiraem kuda v pablik ili v profil' Id profilia /gruppy: chisla posle wall do _ Id posta : chisla posle _  tested : Kali Linux  Parrot OS Ubuntu 20 Termux  !!!Akhtung!!! Proveriaite validnost' vashego tokena. Ne zabyvaite o kapche  Obnovleniia cd VKTOOL  git pull

Vam po dushe OpenBH, komu-to OpenPli, mne OpenATV.Komande poslednego imidzha stuknula v bashku mysl' zakhotelos' napisat' novuiu sborku 6.5 na Python3. Da khrena dva! Gliuk na gliuke i gliukom pogoniaiut. Kogda bol'shinstvo liudei delaet fotografiiu, im prosto nuzhno nazhat' knopku spuska na fotokamere ili telefone, i gotovoe k prosmotru izobrazhenie, obychno v izvestnom formate JPEG, pochti mgnovenno poiavitsia na ekrane. Odnako dlia nekotorykh sluchaev trebuetsia bol'she kontrolia nad polucheniem etogo samogo JPEG. K primeru, vam mozhet zakhotet'sia uvelichit' ili umen'shit' aktivnost' funktsii udaleniia shuma, ili vam mozhet pokazat'sia, chto tsveta poluchilis' ne sovsem verno.

DDoS saita s pomoshch'iu Termux  I tak pristupim!   Shag 1 Ustanovka ulit Chtoby ustanovit' nuzhnye nam   ulity my ustanovil programmu, kotoraia avtomaticheski ikh ustanavlivaet, razumeetsia ne vse a te kotorye my vyberem. Opisana ulity nazyvaetsia temnym nazvaniem DarkFly Dlia eio ustanovki nam potrebuetsia Priamye ruki Nemnogo serogo veshchestva Android ustroistvo s ustanovlennym i nastroennym Termux. Vnimatel'no chitat' i vypolniat' kak delaiu ia) Shag 2 Dlia nachala propisyvaem privychnye nam komandy : apt update apt upgrade Oni ustanavlivaiut i obnovliaiut tekushchie pakety. Eto ochen' vazhnyi shag Sleduiushchim deistviem budet ustanovka osnovnykh iazykov na kotorom rabotaet Termux. Eto python i python2. Obiazatel'no vo vremia ustanovki so vsem soglashaemsia, a to nichego ne poluchit'sia! apt install python2 Sleduiushchim deistviem nuzhno razreshit' ustanovku dop paketov. Esli vy eto uzhe delali to delat' eto ne obiazatel'no. Rekomenduiu vam pochitat' pro osnovnye komandy, ustanavlivaiushchie vazhnye dop. ulity dlia bolee udobnogo ispol'zovaniia! apt install git apt install php Dalee my ustanavlivaem sami pakety DarkFly git clone https://github.com/Ranginang67/DarkFly-Tool Otkryvaem papku s ustanovlennoi ulitoi. cd DarkFly-Tool Predostavliaet vse razresheniia chmod +x install.py python2 install.py DarkFly  Sleduiushchii raz vam ne pridetsia vypolniat' eti deistviia! Mozhete prosto vvodit' DarkFly i vse! Shag 3 Ustanovka ulit Chtoby ustanovit' kakuiu libo ulitu nuzhno : V pisat' v vybore punkta tsifru 1.  Vvodim nomer 16  Tak my ustanavlivaet prosteishii DDOS .S ego pomoshch'iu my smozhem polozhit' kakoi libo sait. Shag 4 Proverka ulity. Ia ne poluchaiu vas k kakim libo deistviiam i pishu etot material tol'ko v oznakomitel'nykh tseliakh. Ia ne nesu otvetstvennost' za sovershennye vami deistviia! Dlia nachala nam nuzhno vyiti iz DarkFly. I vvesti  apt update  i perezapustit' Termux  Dalee vvesti ls cd hammer python hammer.py  Vot chto dolzhno poluchit'sia! Vybiraem sait dlia DDOS, kopiruem IP adresa etogo saita i vvodim : python3 hammer.py [-s] [-p] [-t)   -s : server ip   -p : port default 80   -t : turbo default 135 Naprimer: Python3 hammer.py -s aipi saita -p 80 -t 135  I zhdem kogda saitu nastanet pi#D@  Obnovliaiu sait cherez nekotoroe vremia vyskochit oshibka.  #Termux#Vzlom#Hack

Segodnia povestvuiu vam, chto takoe Termux i  zachem on nuzhen.  VNIMATEL'NO ChITAEM NE LENIMSIa Snachala chto zhe takoe Android: Android eto pesochnitsa operatsionnoi sistemy Linux (ona idiot na komp)  Termux, eto sviazuiushchaia chast' mezhdu Linux i Android napriamuiu  Na Linux idut ogromnoe kolichestvo khakerskikh programm, i dazhe est' takaia operatsionnaia sistema kak  Kali Linux Ona spetsial'no prednaznachena dlia "testirovaniia na proniknovenie" nu ili prosto vzlom, a v slenge ego nazyvaiut Pentest Kak vy poniali, imenno dlia pentesta prednaznachen termux Esli vy dumaete, chto vse eti komandy v Termux-e kakie to nepostizhnye prostomu narodu <simvaly tsyfurki karochi khatskery> net, eto opredelionnye komandy, kotorye vypolniaiut kakuiu to rol' DLIa NAChALA Vkliuchim Termux-u dostup k pamiati, shchas vy sami poimiote zachem  Stat'ia kak vkliuchit' dostup k pamiati v termux https://te.legra.ph/Allow-phone-memory-for-Termux-06-03  Esli vy sdelali eto, prodolzhim  Davaite zaidiom s vami failovyi menedzher/provodnik v vashem telefone Chto takoe put': Predstav'te U nas est' papka pod nazvaniem  durak I v nei papka  debil Put' k papke formiruetsia tak: /durak/debil/ Takzhe v papke debil sozdadim eshchio 2 govnoed  mudak Dopustim my khotim popast' v papku mudak Dopisyvaem k puti: /durak/debil/mudak/ Esli my khotim popast' v papku govnoed put' budet takim /durak/debil/govnoed/ Nadeius' poniatno ob'iasnil Dopustim v nashei papke budet eshchio kakoi nibud' fail Naprimer u menia budet  porno.mp4 Nu ili liuboi drugoi Chtoby propisat' put' do faila, my pishem put'papok/fail (bez slesha "/" na kontse)  /durak/debil/govnoed/porno.mp4  Glavnyi put' kotoryi nam pokazyvaet provodnik eto  /storage/emulated/0/  V dannoi papke nakhoditsia po umolchaniiu provodnik  Do etikh papok, nakhodiatsia sistemnye papki/faily i obychnomu iuzeru, da i voobshche liubomu ne nado tuda zakhodit' My poniali, kak rabotaiut puti Glavnye papki: Zagruzki: /storage/emulated/0/Download/ Dokumenty: /storage/emulated/0/Documents/ Foto i drugie media /storage/emulated/0/DCIM/ Ia nadeius' vy ulovili sut'  Zaidiom v Termux  Termux imeet svoiu papku /data/data/com.termux/files/home/ Tol'ko s pomoshch'iu provodnika tuda ne popast' Papki v Termux polsvechivaiutsia sinim tsvetom, a faily belym.   Glavnye komandy  Pokazat' spisok failov/papok v dannoi direktorii (papke)  ls  Zaiti v papku: cd nazvaniepapki Sozdat' papku: mkdir nazvaniepapki Udalit' papku rmdir nazvaniepapki Udalit' fail rm fail Zaiti v papku v obratnuiu storonu (a tochnee vyiti iz toi, v kotoroi vy nakhodites' v tu papku, v kotoraia soderzhit papku v kotoroi vy nakhodites')  cd ..  Ustanovit' modul'  apt install modul' pkg install modul' pip install modul' Ustanovit' proekt, s github.com  git clone ssylkanagitkhab Skopirovat' fail "iz" "v"  cp put'dofailakotoryikopiruiut put'dopapkikudaskopirovat' Skopirovat' papku cp -r put'dopapkikotoryikopiruiut put'dopapkikudaskopirovat' (kogda v kontse faila posle tochki, naprimer u foto rasshirenie .png ili .jpg ili .mp4) Dolzhny byt' moduli python, python2 i python3 Ustanovit' ikh mozhno pri pomoshchi instruktsii po ustanovke obychnogo modulia (vyshe raspisal)  python fail.py Ili python2 fail.py Ili python3 fail.py Otkryt' fail s rasshireniem .sh bash fail.sh Ia schitaiu eto osnovnymi komandami v Termux  Nadeius' vy poniali, chto takoe Termux i zachem on nuzhen

I require to update grads of an intermediate tensor variable using the register_hook method. Since the variable isn't a leaf-variable, I require to add the retain_grad() method to it after which, I can use the register_hook method to alter the grads.

Some HTTP parameter names are more commonly associated with one functionality than the others. For example, the parameter ?url= usually contains URLs as the value and hence often falls victim to file inclusion, open redirect and SSRF attacks. Parth can go through your burp history, a list of URLs or it's own disocovered URLs to find such parameter names and the risks commonly associated with them. Parth is designed to aid web security testing by helping in prioritization of components for testing.UsageImport targets from a fileThis option works for all 3 supported import types: Burp Suite history, newline delimited text file or a HTTP request text file.python3 parth.py -i example.historyFind URLs for a domainThis option will make use of CommonCrawl, Open Threat Exchange and Waybackmachine to find URLs of the target domain.python3 parth.py -t example.comIgnore duplicate parameter namesSame parameter names across all URLs are ignored.python3 parth.py -ut example.comSave parameter namesThis option will write all the parameter names found in a file with name params-{target}... #burpsuite #openredirect #parameter #parth #ssrf

Segodnia pogovorim o tom, kak rassprostraniat' virusy dlia telefona  Eto mogut byt' botnety, rat i drugaia shara (srazu dlia smelykh pred'iavliaiu git)  https://github.com/LimerBoy/ADB-Hunter Vsio uzhe znaiut, chto kak, poetomu:  Ustanovka na linux  | sudo apt install python3 python3-pip | sudo apt install android-tools-adb | android-tools-fastboot | git clone https://github.com/LimerBoy/ADB-Hunter.git | cd ADB-Hunter/ | sudo pip3 install -r requirements.txt | python3 grabber.py  [1]Scanner - skanirovanie uiazvimykh ustroistv na shodan.io https://www.shodan.io/  Shodan-eto poiskovaia sistema, kotoraia pozvoliaet pol'zovateliu nakhodit' opredelennye tipy komp'iuterov (veb-kamery, marshrutizatory, servery i t. d.) podkliuchaetsia k internetu s pomoshch'iu razlichnykh fil'trov. Nekotorye takzhe opisyvaiut ego kak poiskovuiu sistemu sluzhebnykh bannerov, kotorye predstavliaiut soboi metadannye, kotorye server otpravliaet obratno klientu. eto mozhet byt' informatsiia o programmnom obespechenii servera, kakie parametry podderzhivaet sluzhba, privetstvennoe soobshchenie ili chto-libo eshche, chto klient mozhet uznat' pered vzaimodeistviem s serverom  [2]Installer - Ustanovka virusa na uiazvimye ustroistva  Tut ukazyvaem put' k vashemu failu, kotoryi poiavilsia posle skanirovaniia.  Eto sobstvenno nashi logi uiazvimyi devaisov S pomoshch'iu nikh programma ponimaet komu zakidyvat' virus   Nu i vo vtorom punkte pishem put' k nashemu virusu.  Vsio!  Vash virus uspeshno zakinut' na uiazvimoe ustroistvo!

Ustraivaem DDoS ataku na sait so smartfona  DDoS - eto ataka na sait s tsel'iu vyvedeniia ego iz stroia pri pomoshchi znachitel'nogo kolichestva obmannykh zaprosov. Serveram prikhoditsia obrabatyvat' prevyshennyi ob'em zaprosov, s chem oni, kak pravilo, ne spravliaiutsia.   Nedavno my uzhe razobralis' s printsipom podobnoi ataki na Wi-Fi, nu a segodnia zhertvoi vystupit sait.     Davaite srazu vnesem iasnost'. Dannuiu ataku sleduet provodit' tol'ko na svoi resursy s tsel'iu vyiasnit', kak povedet sebia sait i ego zashchita!  Nastroika  Ustanavlivaem Termux   Propisyvaem komandy v konsol':  # pkg update # pkg install git python # cd # git clone https://github.com/Andrey-oss/ddoser # cd ddoser # pip3 install requests termcolor colorama # python3 ddos.py  Ispol'zovanie  Dalee prosto pishem adres saita. V strochke "threads" vvodim 9999999999999. Gotovo!  #khaking #DDoS
minsk, versiia 6.5 sobrana na novom Python3 i vse plaginy i skiny dolzhny ego podderzhivat', t.e. oni dolzhny byt' perepisany, no poka etogo net.

Refaktoring -- slozhnaia veshch'. U kazhdogo razrabotchika svoi kriterii khoroshego, plokhogo i krasivogo koda. Iz-za dvukh strok mozhno razvernut' kholivar na dve stranitsy kommentariev na Khabre. Pochemu by togda ne sdelat' <<Bitvu refaktoringa>>? My i sdelaem -- s 14 po 18 sentiabria na Russian Python Week 2020 zapuskaem takuiu bitvu. Na bitve kazhdyi mozhet uluchshit' ili <<razbombit'>> kod svoego kollegi v priamom efire. Chto eto za format i kak proidet, rasskazhem dal'she.

OBNOVA1.0.171) Dobavlen modul' email, kotoryi budet ispol'zovat'sia togda i tol'ko togda esli on otsutsvuet v sborke Python2 ispol'zuemogo imidzha2) Pofikseny bagi s sokhraneniem nastroek plagina v OpenATV 6.5 (Python 3) 3) Ustanovka binarnoi liby (arkhitekturozavisimoi) multiprocessing ubrana iz control ipk-paketa i perenesena v kod plagina ... Iz control nevozmozhno ustanovit' libu pod nuzhnuiu versiiu pitona. Dlia Sravneniia bez python3-multiprocessing ili python-multiprocessing, v zavisimosti ot versii Python, "razgrebanie" Edem + SharaClub  na VU+Ultimo4K so skachivaniem vsekh pikonov s nulia - 167 sek .... A s modulem multiprocessing - 27 sek . Tak chto kraine nuzhnaia liba ....

Kak oboiti zashchitu CloudFlare s pomoshch'iu Termux  CloudFlare - samyi populiarnyi servis dlia zashchity ot DDoS, no populiarnyi ne znachit samyi luchshii, ibo ikh zashchitu mozhno oboiti.  Skachivaem pakety $ apt update && apt upgrade -y && apt install python git -y Eshche skachivaem pakety $ pip install requests Kloniruem repozitorii $ git clone https://github.com/FDX100/cloud-killer.git Perekhodim v direktoriiu $ cd cloud-killer Zapuskaem skript $ python3 cloud_killer.py  Dalee, vvodim zhelaemyi domen i v otvete poluchaem real'nyi IP adres servera.   #termux

The goal of this project was to develop a passive Google dork script to collect potentially vulnerable web pages and  applications on the Internet.  There are 2 parts.  The first is ghdb_scraper.py that retrieves Google Dorks and the  second portion is pagodo.py that leverages the information gathered by ghdb_scraper.py.What are Google Dorks?The awesome folks at Offensive Security maintain the Google Hacking Database (GHDB) found here:  https://www.exploit-db.com/google-hacking-database.  It is a collection of Google searches, called dorks, that can be  used to find potentially vulnerable boxes or other juicy info that is picked up by Google's search bots.InstallationScripts are written for Python 3.6+.  Clone the git repository and install the requirements.git clone https://github.com/opsdisk/pagodo.gitcd pagodovirtualenv -p python3 .venv  # If using a virtual environment.source .venv/bin/activate  # If using a virtual environment.pip install -r requirements.txtGoogle is blocking me!If you start getting HTTP 503 errors, Google has rightfully detected you as a bot and will block your IP for a set  period of time... #ghdb #googledork #googledorks #googlehacking #googlehackingdatabase..

Soft Danderzone: preobrazovatel' potentsial'no opasnykh failov! Programma beret potentsial'no opasnye PDF-faily, ofisnye dokumenty ili izobrazheniia i konvertiruet ikh v bezopasnyi PDF-fail.    Dangerzone rabotaet sleduiushchim obrazom: vy daete emu dokument, v kotorom ne uverenny, mozhete li vy emu doveriat' (naprimer, vlozhenie elektronnoi pochty).    Vnutri pesochnitsy dangerzone preobrazuet dokument v PDF (esli on eshche ne sozdan), a zatem preobrazuet PDF v neobrabotannye piksel'nye dannye: spisok znachenii tsveta RGB dlia kazhdoi stranitsy.    Zatem v otdel'noi pesochnitse opasnaia zona beret eti dannye pikselei i preobrazuet ikh obratno v PDF.    Skachat' 0.1 dlia Mac    Skachat' 0.1 dlia Windows    Sm. Ustanovku v viki https://vk.cc/ayrXWt dlia repozitoriev Linux    Nekotorye osobennosti    Pesochnitsy ne imeiut dostupa k seti, poetomu, esli vredonosnyi dokument mozhet skomprometirovat' ee, on ne smozhet otzvonit' domoi    Optsional'no Dangerzone mozhet raspoznavat' sozdavaemye bezopasnye PDF-faily, poetomu v nem snova budet tekst.    Dangerzone szhimaet bezopasnyi PDF dlia umen'sheniia razmera faila    Posle konvertirovaniia soft pozvoliaet otkryvat' bezopasnyi PDF-fail v programme prosmotra PDF po vashemu vyboru, chto pozvoliaet otkryvat' PDF-faily i ofisnye dokumenty v dangerzone po umolchaniiu, chtoby vy sluchaino ne otkryli opasnyi dokument.    Dangerzone mozhet konvertirovat' eti tipy dokumentov v bezopasnye        PDF-faily:PDF ( .pdf)    Microsoft Word ( .docx, .doc)    Microsoft PowerPoint ( .pptx, .ppt)    ODF Text ( .odt)    ODF Spreadsheet ( .ods)    Prezentatsiia ODF ( .odp)    ODF Grafika ( .odg)    JPEG ( .jpg, .jpeg)    GIF ( .gif)    PNG ( .png)    TIFF ( .tif, .tiff)    Dangerzone byl vdokhnovlen PDF Qubes , no rabotaet v operatsionnykh sistemakh, otlichnykh ot Qubes.    On ispol'zuet konteinery kak pesochnitsy vmesto virtual'nykh mashin (ispol'zuia Docker dlia macOS, Windows i Debian / Ubuntu i podman dlia Fedora).    Ustanovka Debian / Ubuntu    Ustanovite zavisimosti:    sudo apt install -y python-all dh-python python3-stdeb docker.io python3 python3-pyqt5 python3-appdirs python3-click python3-xdg python3-requests    Zapustite iz source tree:    ./dev_script/dangerzone    Sozdaite .deb:    ./install/linux/build_deb.py    Ustanovka v drugikh sistemakh (nastroika antivirusa, kompiliatsiia exe):    firstlookmedia/dangerzone

Avtomatizirovannye fishing ataki  Fishing ataki perezhivaiut svoi pik populiarnosti. Ikh provedenie stalo proshche, a sposoby izshchrennee. Pri etom kolichestvo neopytnykh pol'zovatelei ne umen'shilos'. Srednestatisticheskii iuzer raspoznaiot lish' 6 iz 10 fishingovykh soobshchenii, soglasno issledovaniiu Intel Security.  Bolee togo, industriia fishinga sozdala ogromnoe kolichestvo instrumentov avtomatizatsii provedeniia atak. RevoltShing - odin iz nikh. On kopiruet absoliutno liuboi sait s razdelom avtorizatsii i imeet funktsiiu perenapravleniia posle vvoda dannykh.  Saity kopiruiutsia nastol'ko kachestvenno, chto aktivnymi ostaiutsia vse knopki, a vizual'nyi kontent v vide chasov, animatsii takzhe chastichno ostaetsia. Davaite vzglianem, kak eto rabotaet <<iznutri>>.  Ustanovka  Ustanavlivaem Kali Linux.  Skachivaem repozitorii s github komandoi  git clone https://github.com/AngelSecurityTeam/RevoltShing.git  Perekhodim v papku, daem prava, zapuskaem ustanovshchik  cd RevoltShing chmod +x install.sh bash install.sh  Dalee nuzhno zapustit' skonfigurirovannyi server i samu konsol' RevoltShing komandami  python Server.py python3 revoltshing.py  Ispol'zovanie  Pered vami poiavitsia konsol', gde sistema po standartu predlozhit klonirovat' sait Banka Ameriki.  Pomeniat' nastroiki mozhno komandoi  edit url https://<stranitsa avtorizatsii nuzhnogo resursa>  Perenapravlenie meniaetsia komandoi  edit url_destination https://<kuda napravit' pol'zovatelia posle vvoda dannykh>  Dlia starta prosto vpisyvaem  start  Gotovo. Vot tak prosto, bez znanii iazykov programmirovaniia vozmozhno sozdat' fishingovyi sait absoliutno liubogo resursa.  #khaking

pyOpenRPA tutorial. Upravlenie WEB prilozheniiami  Dolgozhdannyi tutorial po upravleniiu storonnimi WEB prilozheniiami s pomoshch'iu pyOpenRPA. Vo 2-i chasti my razberem printsipy robotizirovannogo vozdeistviia na HTML/JS. A takzhe svoimi rukami sdelaem nebol'shogo, no ochen' pokazatel'nogo robota. Etot robot budet polezen tem, dlia kogo aktual'na tema pokupki/prodazhi nedvizhimosti.pyOpenRPA -- eto open source RPA platforma, kotoraia v polnoi mere pozvoliaet zamenit' topovye kommercheskie RPA platformy.Podrobnee pro to, chem zhe ona polezna, mozhno pochitat' zdes'.Tutorial sverstan v vide serii statei, v kotorykh budut osveshchat'sia kliuchevye tekhnologii, neobkhodimye dlia RPA. Osvoiv eti tekhnologii, u vas poiavitsia vozmozhnost' uglubit'sia v spetsifiku toi zadachi, kotoraia postavlena pered vami.Perechen' statei-tutorialov (opublikovannye i planiruemye): A teper' pereidem k samomu tutorialu.[Iz vikipedii]Veb-prilozhenie -- klient-servernoe prilozhenie, v kotorom klient vzaimodeistvuet s veb-serverom pri pomoshchi brauzera. Logika veb-prilozheniia raspredelena mezhdu serverom i klientom, khranenie dannykh osushchestvliaetsia, preimushchestvenno, na servere, obmen informatsiei proiskhodit po seti. Odnim iz preimushchestv takogo podkhoda iavliaetsia tot fakt, chto klienty ne zavisiat ot konkretnoi operatsionnoi sistemy pol'zovatelia, poetomu veb-prilozheniia iavliaiutsia mezhplatformennymi sluzhbami.Veb prilozheniia stali shiroko ispol'zovat'sia v kontse 1990-kh -- nachale 2000-kh godov.Ssylka na istochnikOk, s vyderzhkoi iz viki vse #KrutoUmno, no ot etogo ne legche (dlia tekh, kto v etoi teme diletant). Prodemonstriruiu ustroistvo WEB prilozheniia na primere "Chto vidim my?"/"Chto vidit robot?". Dlia etogo otpravimsia na sait odnoi izvestnoi WEB ploshchadki po ob'iavleniiam po nedvizhimosti Chto vidim my?My vidim krasivo sverstannyi sait s intuitivno poniatnym interfeisom, na kotorom mozhno naiti interesnye ob'iavleniia o prodazhe/sdache v arendu nedvizhimosti.Chto vidit robot?Robot vidit ogromnuiu gipertekstovuiu razmetku HTML s primes'iu algoritmicheskogo koda JS i zavernutogo v kaskadnuiu tablitsu stilei CSS. Uvlekatel'no, pravda? :)InterpretatsiiaWEB prilozheniia -- eto odin iz samykh legko robotiziruemykh klassov prilozhenii. Obilie instrumentov + tekhnologii pozvoliaiut realizovyvat' prakticheski liubuiu postavlennuiu zadachu v kooperatsii s nimi.Upravliat' WEB stranitsei mozhno s pomoshch'iu raznykh tekhnologii adresatsii: CSS, XPath, id, class, attribute. My budem vzaimodeistvovat' so stranitsei s pomoshch'iu CSS selektorov. V etom tutoriale my budem zanimat'sia razrabotkoi robota, kotoryi operiruet na odnom iz samykh populiarnykh portalov po ob'iavleniiam po nedvizhimosti v RF (tema odna iz aktual'nykh dlia mnogikh).V kachestve primera postavim sebe sleduiushchuiu zadachu: Razrabotat' robota, kotoryi budet izvlekat' spisok vsekh ob'iavlenii po ranee prednastroennomu fil'tru. Vse izvlechennye ob'iavleniia sokhranit' kak dataset v fail .json so sleduiushchei strukturoi:{ "SearchKeyStr": "MSK_Tverskoi", # Kliuchevoe slovo poiska "SearchTitleStr": "Moskva, raion Tverskoi", # Zagolovok poiska "SearchURLStr": "https://www.cian.ru/cat.php?deal_type=sale&engine_version=2&in_polygon%5B1%5D=37.6166_55.7678%2C37.6147_55.7688%2C37.6114_55.7694%2C37.6085_55.7698%2C37.6057_55.77%2C37.6018_55.77%2C37.5987_55.77%2C37.5961_55.7688%2C37.5942_55.7677%2C37.5928_55.7663%2C37.5915_55.7647%2C37.5908_55.7631%2C37.5907_55.7616%2C37.5909_55.7595%2C37.5922_55.7577%2C37.5944_55.7563%2C37.5968_55.7555%2C37.6003_55.7547%2C37.603_55.7543%2C37.6055_55.7542%2C37.6087_55.7541%2C37.6113_55.7548%2C37.6135_55.756%2C37.6151_55.7574%2C37.6163_55.7589%2C37.6179_55.7606%2C37.6187_55.7621%2C37.619_55.7637%2C37.6194_55.7651%2C37.6193_55.7667%2C37.6178_55.7679%2C37.6153_55.7683%2C37.6166_55.7678&offer_type=flat&polygon_name%5B1%5D=%D0%9E%D0%B1%D0%BB%D0%B0%D1%81%D1%82%D1%8C+%D0%BF%D0%BE%D0%B8%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%B0&room1=1&room2=1", # URL of the CIAN search [str] "SearchDatetimeStr": "2020-08-01 09:33:00.838081", # Data, na kotoruiu byla sformirovana vygruzka "SearchItems": { # Perechen' izvlechennykh tsenovykh ob'iavlenii "https://www.cian.ru/sale/flat/219924574/:": { # URL ssylka na tsenovoe ob'iavlenie "TitleStr": "3-komn. kv., 31,4 m2, 5/8 etazh", # Zagolovok tsenovogo ob'iavleniia "PriceFloat": 10000000.0, # Stoimost' obshchaia "PriceSqmFloat": 133333.0, # Stoimost' na 1 kv. m. "SqMFloat": 31.4, # Kol-vo kv. m. "FloorCurrentInt": 5, # Etazh lota po ob'iavleniiu "FloorTotalInt": 8, # Etazhei v dome vsego "RoomCountInt": 3 # Kol-vo komnat } } }Shag 0. Podgotovim proekt dlia novogo robota (razvernem pyOpenRPA)V otlichii ot podavliaiushchego bol'shinstva RPA platform, v pyOpenRPA realizovan printsipial'no inoi podkhod po podkliucheniiu k proektu, a imenno: esli v nikh strukturu proekta opredeliaet sama RPA platforma, to v pyOpenRPA strukturu proekta opredeliaete Vy i tol'ko Vy. Eto daet bol'she gibkosti i vozmozhnosti po ispol'zovaniiu etoi RPA tekhnologii v drugikh napravleniiakh (ispol'zovat' pyOpenRPA kak obychnuiu biblioteku Python). Dostupno neskol'ko variantov zagruzki pyOpenRPA: Variant 1, prostoi. Skachat' prednastroennuiu portativnuiu versiiu s GitLab stranitsy proekta Variant 2, slozhnyi. Ustanovit' pyOpenRPA v svoiu versiiu interpretatora Python 3 (pip install pyOpenRPA) Ia rekomenduiu vospol'zovat'sia prostym variantom (variant 1). Prednastroennaia versiia ne trebuetsia kakikh-libo nastroek infrastruktury. Zdes' v luchshikh traditsiiakh pyOpenRPA realizovan printsip, kogda pol'zovatel' skachivaet repozitorii, i u nego uzhe vse nastroeno iz korobki -- pol'zovateliu ostaetsia lish' pisat' skript robota. #Enjoy :)Shag 1. Sozdat' proekt robotaDlia togo, chtoby nachat' proekt robota, neobkhodimo sozdat' papku proekta. V dal'neishem ia zatronu temu organizatsii papok proektov dlia promyshlennykh programmnykh robotov. No na tekushchii moment ne budu zaostriat' vnimanie na etom, chtoby skontsentrirovat'sia neposredstvenno na osnovnom -- na logike raboty s WEB stranitsami.Nizhe privedu zavisimosti proekta ot storonnikh komponentov: Selenium WebDriver Google Chrome ili Mozilla Firefox ili Internet Explorer Python 3 Esli vy poshli po variantu 1 (sm. shag 0), to u Vas vse eti komponenty uzhe budut razvernuty i nastroeny vnutri skachannogo repozitoriia pyOpenRPA (#Udobno). Repozitorii pyOpenRPA uzhe soderzhit vse neobkhodimye portable versii trebuemykh programm (Google Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Python3 32|64 i t.d.). Vy naverniaka zametili, chto v pyOpenRPA ispol'zuetsia Selenium. Etot komponent iavliaetsia odnim iz luchshikh otkazoustoichivykh komponentov po vnedreniiu v WEB. Imenno poetomu my ego i budem ispol'zovat' v pyOpenRPA.Sozdadim sleduiushchuiu strukturu proekta: Repozitorii pyOpenRPA > Wiki > RUS_Tutorial > WebGUI_Habr: Fail "3. MonitoringCIAN_Run_64.py" -- skript robota, kotoryi monitorit WEB ploshchadku Fail "3. MonitoringCIAN_Run_64.cmd" -- skript zapuska robota s 1-go klika po analogii s .exe failami  Nizhe privedu primer "3. MonitoringCIAN_Run_64.cmd" faila:cd %~dp0..\..\..\Sources ..\Resources\WPy64-3720\python-3.7.2.amd64\python.exe "..\Wiki\RUS_Tutorial\WebGUI_Habr\3. MonitoringCIAN_Run_64.py" pause >nulDlia initsializatsii Selenium WebDriver vospol'zuemsia sleduiushchei funktsiei:########################## # Init the Chrome web driver ########################### def WebDriverInit(inWebDriverFullPath, inChromeExeFullPath, inExtensionFullPathList): # Set full path to exe of the chrome lWebDriverChromeOptionsInstance = webdriver.ChromeOptions() lWebDriverChromeOptionsInstance.binary_location = inChromeExeFullPath # Add extensions for lExtensionItemFullPath in inExtensionFullPathList: lWebDriverChromeOptionsInstance.add_extension (lExtensionItemFullPath) # Run chrome instance lWebDriverInstance = None if inWebDriverFullPath: # Run with specified web driver path lWebDriverInstance = webdriver.Chrome(executable_path = inWebDriverFullPath, options=lWebDriverChromeOptionsInstance) else: lWebDriverInstance = webdriver.Chrome(options = lWebDriverChromeOptionsInstance) # Return the result return lWebDriverInstanceShag 2. Zapustit' WEB instrumenty razrabotchika i sformirovat' CSS selektoryV nashem sluchae WEB instrumenty razrabotchika my budem ispol'zovat' iz Google Chrome, kotoryi predustanovlen v repozitorii pyOpenRPA (variant 1 iz shaga 0).Otkroem Google Chrome i instrumenty razrabotchika (pyOpenRPA repo\Resources\GoogleChromePortable\App\Chrome-bin\chrome.exe, posle chego Ctrl + Shift + i)Otkroem v brauzere sait, kotoryi my budem analizirovat'. Sformiruem oblast' poiska i otobrazit' obnaruzhennye tsenovye predlozheniia v vide spiska.Primer poiskovogo zaprosaDlia togo, chtoby podobrat' CSS selektor nam pomogut instrumenty razrabotchika Google Chrome. Podrobnee uznat' pro ustroistvo CSS selektorov mozhno zdes' po ssylkeDlia proverki pravil'nosti CSS selektora ia budu delat' sleduiushchuiu proverku v instrumentakh razrabotchika na vkladke "Console". Na kartinke predstavlen primer togo, kak provoditsia proverki pravil'nosti CSS selektora dlia izvlecheniia spiska tsenovykh predlozhenii.Podberem CSS selektor dlia vyborki spiska tsenovykh predlozhenii na stranitse.Pri sostavlenii selektora vyiasnilos', chto v spisok ob'iavlenii vstroeny reklamnye bannery, kotorye ne soderzhat informatsiiu o tsenovom predlozhenii. I takikh vidov reklamnykh bannerov bylo obnaruzheno neskol'ko vidov: div[data-name="BannerServicePlaceInternal"]  div[data-name="getBannerMarkup"] div[data-name="AdFoxBannerTracker"] V sviazi s etim CSS selektor dolzhen byt' skorrektirovan takim obrazom, chtoby iskliuchit' iz vyborki takie vidy bannerov. Nizhe priveden gotovyi CSS selektor. CSS selektor, Spisok tsenovykh predlozhenii: div[data-name="Offers"] > div:not([data-name="BannerServicePlaceInternal"]):not([data-name="getBannerMarkup"]):not([data-name="AdFoxBannerTracker"]) Podberem CSS selektory po izvlecheniiu parametrov tsenovogo predlozheniia: Zagolovok, Stoimost' obshchaia, URL ssylka na kartochku. CSS selektor, Zagolovok: div[data-name="TopTitle"],div[data-name="Title"] CSS selektor, Stoimost' obshchaia: div[data-name="Price"] > div[class="header"],div[data-name="TopPrice"] > div[class="header"] CSS selektor, URL ssylka na kartochku: a[class*="--header--"] Podberem CSS selektor dlia izvlecheniia knopki na sleduiushchuiu stranitsu. CSS selektor, Ukazatel' na sleduiushchuiu stranitsu: div[data-name="Pagination"] li[class*="active"] + li a Shag 3. Obrabotat'/preobrazovat' poluchaemye dannyeNa predydushchem shage my uspeshno podobrali vse neobkhodimye CSS selektory. Teper' nam nuzhno gramotno izvlech' informatsiiu, a potom i obrabotat' ee.V rezul'tate obrabotki tsenovogo predlozheniia u nas budet sformirovana struktura sleduiushchego vida:lOfferItemInfo = { # Item URL with https "TitleStr": "3-komn. kv., 31,4 m2, 5/8 etazh", # Offer title [str] "PriceFloat": 10000000.0, # Price [float] "PriceSqmFloat": 133333.0, # CALCULATED Price per square meters [float] "SqMFloat": 31.4, # Square meters in flat [float] "FloorCurrentInt": 5, # Current floor [int] "FloorTotalInt": 8, # Current floor [int] "RoomCountInt": 3 # Room couint [int] }Dlia nachala poluchim spisok elementov tsenovykh predlozhenii.lOfferListCSSStr = 'div[data-name="Offers"] > div:not([data-name="BannerServicePlaceInternal"]):not([data-name="getBannerMarkup"]):not([data-name="AdFoxBannerTracker"])' lOfferList = inWebDriver.find_elements_by_css_selector(css_selector=lOfferListCSSStr)Dalee tsiklicheskaia obrabotka kazhdogo tsenovogo predlozheniia.for lOfferItem in lOfferList:Izvlechem parametry iz WEB stranitsy: Zagolovok, Stoimost' obshchaia, URL na kartochku.lTitleStr = lOfferItem.find_element_by_css_selector(css_selector='div[data-name="TopTitle"],div[data-name="Title"]').text # Extract title text lPriceStr = lOfferItem.find_element_by_css_selector(css_selector='div[data-name="Price"] > div[class*="header"],div[data-name="TopPrice"] > div[class*="header"]').text # Extract total price lURLStr = lOfferItem.find_element_by_css_selector(css_selector='a[class*="--header--"]').get_attribute("href") # Extract offer URL lOfferItemInfo["TitleStr"] = lTitleStr # set the title lPriceStr = lPriceStr.replace(" ","").replace("R","") # Remove some extra symbols lOfferItemInfo["PriceFloat"] = round(float(lPriceStr),2) # Convert price to the float typeIzvlechem nedostaiushchie parametry algoritmicheskim putem. Esli v zagolovke soderzhitsia slovo "Apartamenty"lREResult = re.search(r".*, (\d*,?\d*) m2, (\d*)/(\d*) eta.", lTitleStr) # run the re lOfferItemInfo["RoomCountInt"] = 1 # Room count lSqmStr = lREResult.group(1) lSqmStr= lSqmStr.replace(",",".") lOfferItemInfo["SqMFloat"] = round(float(lSqmStr),2) # sqm count lOfferItemInfo["FloorCurrentInt"] = int(lREResult.group(2)) # Floor current lOfferItemInfo["FloorTotalInt"] = int(lREResult.group(3)) # Floor total lOfferItemInfo["PriceSqmFloat"] = round(lOfferItemInfo["PriceFloat"] / lOfferItemInfo["SqMFloat"],2) # Sqm per M Esli v zagolovke ne soderzhitsia slovo "Apartamenty"lREResult = re.search(r".*(\d)-komn. .*, (\d*,?\d*) m2, (\d*)/(\d*) eta.", lTitleStr) # run the re lOfferItemInfo["RoomCountInt"] = int(lREResult.group(1)) # Room count lSqmStr = lREResult.group(2) lSqmStr= lSqmStr.replace(",",".") lOfferItemInfo["SqMFloat"] = round(float(lSqmStr),2) # sqm count lOfferItemInfo["FloorCurrentInt"] = int(lREResult.group(3)) # Floor current lOfferItemInfo["FloorTotalInt"] = int(lREResult.group(4)) # Floor total lOfferItemInfo["PriceSqmFloat"] = round(lOfferItemInfo["PriceFloat"] / lOfferItemInfo["SqMFloat"],2) # Sqm per M V primere vyshe primeniaetsia magiia reguliarnykh vyrazheniiDlia podbora pravil'nykh reguliarnykh vyrazhenii ia pol'zuius' online validatorami tipa takikhPo okonchaniiu obrabotki tsenovykh predlozhenii vypolnim proverku na nalichie ukazatelia na sleduiushchuiu stranitsu, i (esli takoi ukazatel' imeetsia) vypolnim perekhod na nee.Vyshe (na shage 2) my uzhe nakhodili CSS selektor ukazatelia na sleduiushchuiu stranitsu. Nam nuzhno vypolnit' deistvie klika .click() po etomu elementu.No pri testirovanii vyiasnilos', chto funktsiia .click ot Selenium otrabatyvaet nekorrektno dlia etoi stranitsy (ne proiskhodit perekliuchenie). V sviazi s etim u nas est' unikal'naia vozmozhnost' ispol'zovat' funktsional'nost' JavaScript na samoi stranitse cherez Selenium. A uzhe iz JavaScript vyiasnilos', chto funktsiia nazhatiia po ukazateliu stranitsy otrabatyvaet korrektno. Dlia etogo vypolnim sleduiushchuiu komandu: inWebDriver.execute_script("""document.querySelector('div[data-name="Pagination"] li[class*="active"] + li a').click()""")Posle togo kak byl otpravlen signal na perekliuchenie stranitsy, neobkhodimo dozhdat'sia ee zagruzki. Tol'ko posle poiavleniia novoi stranitsy my smozhem pereiti k obrabotke novykh tsenovykh predlozhenii.# wait while preloader is active lDoWaitBool = True while lDoWaitBool: lPreloaderCSS = inWebDriver.find_elements_by_css_selector(css_selector='div[class*="--preloadOverlay--"]') # So hard to catch the element :) if len(lPreloaderCSS)>0: time.sleep(0.5) # preloader is here - wait else: lDoWaitBool = False # Stop wait if preloader is dissappearItogovuiu strukturu sokhranim v .json fail. # Check dir - create if not exists if not os.path.exists(os.path.join('Datasets',lResult['SearchKeyStr'])): os.makedirs(os.path.join('Datasets',lResult['SearchKeyStr'])) # Save result in file lFile = open(f"{os.path.join('Datasets',lResult['SearchKeyStr'],lDatetimeNowStr.replace(' ','_').replace('-','_').replace(':','_').replace('.','_'))}.json","w",encoding="utf-8") lFile.write(json.dumps(lResult)) lFile.close()Shag 4. Obrabotka neshtatnykh situatsiiEtap testirovaniia -- eto odin iz samykh vazhnykh etapov, kotoryi pozvoliaet konvertirovat' vlozhennye usiliia v real'nyi effekt. Pri testirovanii koda na etom WEB prilozhenii vyiasnilos', chto mogut proiskhodit' nekotorye sboi. Nizhe privozhu te vidy sboev, kotorye vstretilis' u menia: Zavisaet polzunok zagruzki pri perekliuchenii na sl. stranitsu Pri perekliuchenii na sleduiushchuiu stranitsu otkryvaetsia sovsem ne sleduiushchaia stranitsa (inogda, no sluchalos' :) ) No roboty ne boiatsia takikh problem (na to oni i roboty :) ). Dlia kazhdogo vida sboia my predusmotrim stsenarii vosstanovleniia, kotoryi pozvolit roboty dodelat' svoiu rabotu do kontsa. Detect XSS vulnerability in  Web ApplicationsScreenshotsEasy InstallationAs simple as below, Just one line of code:curl -L -s https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Jewel591/CheckXSS/master/docs/install.sh|bashUsage Instructionspython3.6 checkxss.py -hSupport POST and GET request methods, support parameter injection detection in cookie, referer, useragent fields  For example, test the returnUrl parameter in POST data:python3.6 checkxss.py -u "https://example.com/login.do" --data="returnUrl=utest" -p returnUrlFeaturesSupport url encoding bypassSupport unicode encoding of HTML tag attribute value to bypassSupport HTML encoding to bypass the HTML tag attribute valueSupport for flexible replacement of () '"to bypassCase bypassContributingContributions, issues and feature requests are welcome!Feel to check issues pageMaintainers@Jewel591 #checkxss #penetrationtesting #python3 #xss #xssattacks #xssdetection #xssexploitation #xssscanner #xssvulnerability

USBKill - to chto nuzhno kogda v dver' uzhe postuchalis'  Privet, bandity, eta stat'ia pomozhet vam eshchio bol'she obezopasit' sebia. Ved' bezopasnosti ne byvaet slishkom mnogo. Kak by vy ne byli v sebe uvereny, vse ravno vsegda nuzhno byt' gotovym k liubomu variantu razvitiia sobytii, i ia poprobuiu vam v etom pomoch'. Mnogie schitaiut chto shifrovaniia diska dostatochno dlia togo chtoby maksimal'no sebia obezopasit'. Eto ne tak. Chasto siloviki deistvuiut nemnogo inache: zhdut momenta, chtoby ty ne uspel vykliuchit' PK do momenta zaderzhaniia. Lockscreen ne spaset, ved' pri zagruzhennoi OS kliuchi mozhno vytashchit'. Poetomu nuzhen budet USBkill   Kak eto rabotaet  Skript pozvolit vam ukazat' te USB-ustroistva, kotorye vy sami odobrite, vse ostal'nye kotorye budut vystavleny v PK, zapustiat protsess vykliucheniia, perezagruzki ili vovse perevedut PK v spiashchii rezhim. Eto pozvolit vam izbezhat' kriminalisticheskoi ekspertizy (konechno esli vy vsio-taki zashifrovali svoi khard). Rassmotrim primer. Esli ty  zashifroval svoi khard, a vo  vremia aresta bystro vytashchil fleshku (eto vyzovet vykliuchenie komp'iutera), to kopam pridetsia potratit' bol'she vremeni i usilii, dlia polucheniia dostupa k informatsii. Nu i ochevidno,chto esli disk ne zashifrovan, to tolku ot etogo vsego ne budet. Tak chto pridetsia tebe, moi iunyi drug, priviazat' fleshku veriovochkoi k ruke, togda tebe stanet proshche fleshku vydernut' (daa, takikh laifkhakov na Iutube ne uvidish'). Teper' eshche odin primer. Esli kto-to reshit chto on umnee  tebia v (no my to znaem chto eto ne tak). Takoi khatsker zakhochet zagruzit' chto to vredonosnoe na tvoi PK, no svoim instrumentom on ego prosto vyrubit i uidet ni s chem.  Eshchio est' takoi variant, nekotorye nosiat USB-fleshku na zapiast'e i podkliuchaiut ee  togda, kogda im neobkhodimo zapustit' usbkill. Flesh nakopitel' sygraet rol' knopki "samounichtozheniia". I ty snova pokazhesh' vsem to, chto ty umnee etikh idiotov.  Nu a dlia zapuska dostatochno vypolnit' komandu:  sudo python usbkill.py ili sudo python3 usbkill.py

"Testiruem router na uiazvimosti so smartfona"    Ustanoviv parol' na router, vy zashchishchaete svoiu set' lish' ot chestnykh liudei. Mnogie routery uzhe <<iz korobki>> imeiut riad uiazvimostei, kotorye mozhno otkliuchit' v nastroikakh. Naprimer, uiazvimost' udalennogo dostupa, standartnyi parol' v lokal'noi seti i t.d.    Chtoby proverit' router na razlichnye vidy uiazvimostei, mozhno vospol'zovat'sia utilitoi routersploit na termux.    Nastroika    Ustanavlivaem "Termux" i podkliuchaemsia k routeru.    Propisyvaem komandy v konsol':    #pkg upgrade  #pkg install git python  #git clone  #cd routersploit  #pip3 install -r requirements.txt  #python3 rsf.py    Ispol'zovanie    #use scanners/autopwn    Est' 2 vida shliuza. 192.168.0.1 i 192.168.1.1. Vybiraite vash i pishite:    #set target 192.168.0.1  #run    Dalee budet proizvedeno skanirovanie na uiazvimosti. Esli vy ikh obnaruzhite, to pishite nazvanie uiazvimosti v poiskovike Google i ishchite metody ikh ustraneniia.

Besplatnyi SMS-bomber pod Android na termux dya, vozmozhno baian, no vozmozhno kto to ne znal, pol'zuites' rebiata!   Esli by usluga "zaspamit' svoikh nepriiatelei SMS do goreniia zhop" ne pol'zovalas' populiarnost'iu - platnye servisy, etu uslugu predostavliaiushchie, ne protsvetala.    Dlia nachala ubedites', chto prilozhenie Termux ustanovleno.    Dalee po poriadku:    1. Proveriaem obnovlenie komandoi apt update -y && apt upgrade -y  2. Ustanavlivaem komandoi apt install git wget nano python python2 python3 perl clang libxslt zsh -y  3. Ustanavlivaem bombera komandoi git clone https://github.com/Denishnc/b0mb3r  4. Zakhodim v papku cd b0mb3r  5. Vstavliaem etu komandu dlia ustanovki python -m pip install -r requirements.txt  6. Zapuskaem, vvodia python main.py  7. Kopiruem ssylku v vide , kotoruiu vam vydast, i vstavliaem v brauzer. U menia ssylka http://192.168.100.3:8080/, u vas mozhet byt' drugaia.  8. Vvodim nomer v okoshke, kolichestvo povtorenii + stavim galochku "zvonki" (inogda ne rabotaet).  9. Nazhimaem knopku nachat' ataku    10. Pozdravliaiu! Vy - sms-troll' :3

Chashche vsego v rabote datasaentista mne prikhoditsia peregoniat' dannye iz odnogo predstavleniia v drugoe, agregirovat', privodit' k odinakovoi granuliarnosti i chistit' dannye, zagruzhat', vygruzhat', analizirovat', formatirovat' i prisylat' rezul'taty (kotorye v obshchem-to tozhe dannye v kakom-to vide). S dannymi vsegda chto-to ne tak i ikh nuzhno shustro goniat' tuda i obratno -- bol'she vsego v etom mne pomogaiut klassicheskie iuniksovye utility i nebol'shie, no gordye tulzy: vot o nikh-to my segodnia i pogovorim.

Dobrogo vremeni sutok, kollegi, segodnia khotelos' by pogovorit' s vami na temu togo, kak zhe rabotaet Handler Metaspolit'a, chto generiruet msfenom dlia python i pochemu eti payload'y detektiatsia.  Na napisanie dannoi stat'i menia podvigli ochen' chasto vstrechaiushchiesia kak i na forume, tak i v lichnykh soobshcheniiakh voprosy po tipu "kak zakriptovat' payload?", "pochemu antivirusnik rugaetsia na sgenerirovannyi fail" i vse v takom dukhe. Esli chestno do etogo momenta ia ne ochen'-to i pol'zovalsia avtomaticheski sgenerirovannymi payload'ami i poniatiia ne imeiu chto vnutri nikh proiskhodit, no davaite razbirat'sia vmeste.

Retsept sborki u-boot dlia zagruzki iadra 5.8.0 #uboot #580 #vazhno  FROM debian:10.4  RUN apt-get update  RUN apt-get upgrade -y  RUN apt-get install -y build-essential git gcc-arm-none-eabi device-tree-compiler bison flex swig python3 python3-distutils python3-dev  RUN git clone https://github.com/ARM-software/arm-trusted-firmware  WORKDIR /arm-trusted-firmware  RUN find . -name '*.bin' -exec rm -rf {} \;  RUN make PLAT=rk3328  WORKDIR /  ENV BL31=/arm-trusted-firmware/build/rk3328/release/bl31/bl31.elf  #This place is slow, using github mirror instead  #RUN git clone https://gitlab.denx.de/u-boot/u-boot.git/  RUN git clone https://github.com/u-boot/u-boot.git  WORKDIR /u-boot  RUN make rock64-rk3328_defconfig  RUN sed -i 's/CONFIG_IDENT_STRING=""/CONFIG_IDENT_STRING="Arch Linux ARM"/' .config  RUN make4

QR-kod seichas sovershenno obydennaia veshch' -- oni vstrechaiutsia povsiudu, ikh ispol'zuiut kak odin iz sposobov avtorizatsii krupnye servisy vrode WhatsApp, Iandeksa i AliExpress, vstrechaiutsia QR-kody dlia podkliucheniia k Wi-Fi. No naskol'ko nadezhna eta tekhnologiia? Mozhno li sozdat' takoi QR-kod, pri skanirovanii kotorogo vypolnitsia nagruzka na devaise zhertvy? Etot vopros my segodnia razberem podrobnee.QR-kod (angl. Quick Response Code -- kod bystrogo reagirovaniia) -- eto matrichnyi ili dvumernyi shtrikh-kod, kotoryi mozhet soderzhat' do 4296 simvolov ASCII. To est', proshche govoria, kartinka, v kotoroi zashifrovan tekst.Istoriia vektora atakiV mae 2013 goda spetsialisty kompanii po setevoi bezopasnosti Lookout Mobile razrabotali spetsial'nye QR-kody, kotorye smogli skomprometirovat' ochki Google Glass. Na tot moment ochki skanirovali vse fotografii, <<kotorye mogut byt' polezny ikh vladel'tsu>>, -- i predostavili vzlomshchikam polnyi udalennyi dostup k ustroistvu. Issledovateli soobshchili v Google o dannoi uiazvimosti, i ee zakryli bukval'no za neskol'ko nedel'. K schast'iu, ispravit' uspeli do togo, kak ee mozhno bylo ispol'zovat' vne laboratorii, ved' vzlom ochkov real'nogo pol'zovatelia mog privesti k bol'shim problemam.V 2014 godu programma Barcode Scanner dlia mobil'nykh ustroistv iz proekta ZXing prakticheski ne proveriala tip URI, peredavaemyi cherez QR-kod. V rezul'tate liuboi eksploit, kotoryi mog byt' ispolnen brauzerom (naprimer, napisannyi na javascript), mozhno bylo peredat' cherez QR.Skaner pytalsia otfil'trovat' opasnye vidy atak s pomoshch'iu reguliarnykh vyrazhenii, trebuia, chtoby URI imel period s posleduiushchim prodleniem kak minimum na dva simvola, transportnyi protokol dlinoi ne menee dvukh simvolov, za kotorym sleduet dvoetochie, i chtoby v URI ne bylo probelov.Esli soderzhimomu ne sootvetstvuet khotia by odnomu iz trebovanii, to ono opredeliaetsia kak obychnyi tekst, a ne URI.
