Obnovlenie CentOS 7 do CentOS 8  Centos 7 upgrade to Centos 8  CentOS -- distributiv Linux, osnovannyi na kommercheskom Red Hat Enterprise Linux kompanii Red Hat i sovmestimyi s nim. Soglasno zhiznennomu tsiklu Red Hat Enterprise Linux (RHEL), CentOS 5, 6 i 7 budut podderzhivat'sia <<do 10 let>>, poskol'ku oni osnovany na RHEL. Ranee versiia CentOS 4 podderzhivalas' sem' let.  Podgotovka  Dobavliaem repozitorii EPEL  $ sudo yum -y install epel-release  Ustanavlivaem utilitu yum-utils  $ sudo yum -y install yum-utils  Ustanavlivaem utilitu rpmconf  $ sudo yum -y install rpmconf  Vypolniaem proverku i sravnenie konfigov  $ sudo rpmconf -a  Posle vypolneniia komandy smotrim vyvod utility  i otvechaem na voprosy o tom, kakoi konfig nam nuzhen (tekushchii, defoltnyi iz paketa ...)  Smotrim, kakie u nas ustanovleny pakety ne iz repozitoriev, est' li v sisteme pakety, kotorye mozhno udalit'  $ sudo package-cleanup --leaves $ package-cleanup --orphans  Obnovlenie Centos do versii 8  Ustanovim menedzher paketov dnf, kotoryi ispol'zuetsia po umolchaniiu v CentOS 8  $ sudo yum -y install dnf  Udalim menedzher paketov yum (esli on v dal'neishem vam ne nuzhen)  $ sudo dnf -y remove yum yum-metadata-parser $ sudo rm -Rf /etc/yum  Obnovliaem Centos  $ sudo dnf -y upgrade  Ustanavlivaem neobkhodimye pakety dlia CentOS 8  $ sudo dnf -y install \    http://mirror.centos.org/centos/8/BaseOS/x86_64/os/Packages/centos-repos-8.2-2.2004.0.1.el8.x86_64.rpm \    http://mirror.centos.org/centos/8/BaseOS/x86_64/os/Packages/centos-release-8.2-2.2004.0.1.el8.x86_64.rpm \    http://mirror.centos.org/centos/8/BaseOS/x86_64/os/Packages/centos-gpg-keys-8.2-2.2004.0.1.el8.noarch.rpm  Obnovliaem repozitorii EPEL  $ sudo dnf -y upgrade https://dl.fedoraproject.org/pub/epel/epel-release-latest-8.noarch.rpm  Udaliaem vremennye faily  $ sudo dnf clean all  Udaliaem starye iadra ot Centos 7  $ sudo rpm -e `rpm -q kernel`  Udaliaem pakety, kotorye mogut konfliktovat'  $ sudo rpm -e --nodeps sysvinit-tools  Zapuskaem obnovlenie sistemy  $ sudo dnf -y --releasever=8 --allowerasing --setopt=deltarpm=false distro-sync  Na etom momente u menia voznikla oshibka zavisimostei  python3-rpmconf-1.0.21-1.el8.noarch conflicts with file from package python36-rpmconf-1.0.22-1.el7.noarch  Reshenie:  $ sudo dnf -y remove python36-rpmconf  Iadro dlia Centos 8  Ustanavlivaem novoe iadro dlia CentOS 8  $ sudo dnf -y install kernel-core  Ustanavlivaem minimal'nyi nabor paketov cherez gruppovoe upravlenie  $ sudo dnf -y groupupdate "Core" "Minimal Install"  Proveriaem, kakaia versiia centos ustanovilas'  $ cat /etc/*release CentOS Linux release 8.2.2004 (Core)  NAME="CentOS Linux" VERSION="8 (Core)" ID="centos" ID_LIKE="rhel fedora" VERSION_ID="8" PLATFORM_ID="platform:el8" PRETTY_NAME="CentOS Linux 8 (Core)" ANSI_COLOR="0;31" CPE_NAME="cpe:/o:centos:centos:8" HOME_URL="https://www.centos.org/" BUG_REPORT_URL="https://bugs.centos.org/"  CENTOS_MANTISBT_PROJECT="CentOS-8" CENTOS_MANTISBT_PROJECT_VERSION="8" REDHAT_SUPPORT_PRODUCT="centos" REDHAT_SUPPORT_PRODUCT_VERSION="8"  CentOS Linux release 8.2.2004 (Core)  CentOS Linux release 8.2.2004 (Core)   Udaliaem vremennye faily  $ sudo dnf clean all  Oshibka pri ustanovke YUM  Pri ustanovke voznikla oshibka  [...] Error: Transaction failed  Reshenie  $ cd /usr/bin $ sudo ln -s dnf-3 yum $ cd /etc/yum $ sudo rm -r * $ sudo dnf -y install yum  https://itdraft.ru/2020/08/04/obnovlenie-centos-7-do-centos-8/   #Centos, #Upgrade

Istochnik: Avtor originala: Alexey Ivanov, Oleg Guba   Podpisyvaemsia:    vk.com/scienceandlive    #nginx #envoy #dropbox #bazel #golang  Kak my v Dropbox pereshli s Nginx na Envoy  V etoi stat'e my budem govorit' o nashei staroi infrastrukture, osnovannoi na Nginx, ee boliachkakh, a takzhe vygode, kotoruiu my poluchili posle migratsii na Envoy. My sravnim Nginx i Envoy razlichnymi sposobami. Takzhe kratko kosnemsia protsessa migratsii, tekushchego sostoianiia, a takzhe problem, voznikshikh pri perekhode.            Kogda my perekliuchili bol'shuiu chast' trafika na Envoy -- u nas poluchilos' besshovno migrirovat' sistemu, obrabatyvaiushchuiu desiatki millionov otkrytykh soedinenii, milliony zaprosov v sekundu i terabity propusknoi sposobnosti. Po faktu my stali odnim iz krupneishikh pol'zovatelei Envoy v mire.      Otkaz ot otvetstvennosti: my pytaemsia ostavat'sia ob'ektivnymi, dostatochno mnogo sravnenii otnosiatsia tol'ko k Dropbox i nashim printsipam razrabotki PO: my stavim na Bazel, gRPC, S++ i Golang.      Prosim obratit' vnimanie, chto my rassmotrim versiiu Nginx s otkrytym iskhodnym kodom, a ne kommercheskuiu s dopolnitel'nymi funktsiiami.      Nasha staraia infrastruktura, osnovannaia na Nginx    Nashi nastroiki Nginx byli statichnymi, obnovlialis' s pomoshch'iu kombinatsii Python2, Jinja i YAML. Liuboe izmenenie trebovalo polnoi raskatki s nulia. Vse dinamicheskie chasti, k primeru upravlenie upstream i eksport statistiki, byli napisany na Lua. Liubaia dostatochno slozhnaia logika byla peremeshchena na sleduiushchii uroven' proksirovaniia, napisannyi na Go. Nasha stat'ia takzhe imeet razdel, posviashchennyi nashei staroi infrastrukture na Nginx.      Nginx sluzhil nam veroi i pravdoi uzhe poriadka desiati let. No on perestal ustraivat' nashi luchshie praktiki po razrabotke:      Nashi vnutrennie i (zakrytye) vneshnie API postepenno perekhodili s REST na gRPC, kotoryi trebuet kuchu razlichnykh perekodirovok ot proksi.  Protocol buffers stali standartom de facto dlia opredeleniia servisov i nastroek  Vse programmnoe obespechenie, nezavisimo ot iazyka programmirovaniia, sobiraetsia i testiruetsia s pomoshch'iu Bazel.  Bol'shaia vovlechennost' nashikh inzhenerov kliuchevykh infrastrukturnykh proektov v kachestve uchastnikov soobshchestv PO s otkrytym iskhodnym kodom.    Takzhe Nginx byl dostatochno slozhnym v plane obsluzhivaniia:      Sborka konfiguratsionnykh failov byla slishkom gibkoi i byla razbita mezhdu YAML, Jinja2 i Python.  Monitoring byl smes'iu Lua, analiza zhurnalov, i monitoringom sistemnogo urovnia  Povyshennaia zavisimost' ot storonnikh modulei vliiala na stabil'nost', proizvoditel'nost' i stoimost' posleduiushchikh obnovlenii.  Raskatka i upravlenie protsessom sil'no otlichalis' ot ostal'nykh servisov, poskol'ku oni dostatochno sil'no zaviseli ot nastroiki drugikh sistem: syslog, logrotate i prochikh, v otlichie ot togo, chtoby byt' nezavisimymi ot osnovnoi sistemy.    Pri etom my v pervyi raz nachali iskat' potentsial'nuiu zamenu Nginx.      Pochemu ne Bandaid?    My chasto govorim, chto vnutri infrastruktury my znachitel'no polagaemsia na Bandaid, proksi-server, napisannyi na Go. On prekrasno vnedren v infrastrukturu Dropbox, poskol'ku osnovan na obshirneishei ekosisteme vnutrennikh bibliotek Go: monitoring, obnaruzhenie servisov, ogranichenie skorosti i t.p. My rassmatrivali podobnyi perekhod s Nginx, odnako est' neskol'ko problem, meshaiushchikh nam eto sdelat':      PO na Golang trebuetsia bol'she resursov, chem PO na C++. Nizkoe potreblenie resursov osobenno vazhno dlia nashego Edge, poskol'ku my ne mozhem legko "avtomaticheski masshtabirovat'" tam nashi servisy.  dopolnitel'noe potreblenie protsessornogo vremeni v osnovnom sviazano s sborshchikom musora (GC), parserom HTTP i TLS, prichem poslednee menee optimizirovano, chem BoringSSL, ispol'zuemyi Nginx\Envoy.  Model' "goroutine-per-request" i izderzhki GC znachitel'no uvelichivaiut trebovaniia k operativnoi pamiati v servisakh s bol'shim chislom soedinenii, kak u nas.  Net podderzhki FIPS dlia Golang TLS  U Bandaid net podderzhki soobshchestvom vne Dropbox, chto oznachaet, chto my smozhem polagat'sia tol'ko na sebia pri razrabotke.    S uchetom vyshenapisannogo my reshili nachat' perenos nashei transportnoi infrastruktury na Envoy.      Nasha novaia infrastruktura, osnovannaia na Envoy    Davaite posmotrim na osnovnye kharakternye cherty razrabotki i soprovozhdeniia podrobnee, chtoby uvidet', pochemu my dumaem, chto Envoy luchshii vybor dlia nas, a takzhe chto my poluchim pri perekhode s Nginx na Envoy.      Proizvoditel'nost'    Arkhitektura Nginx iavliaetsia sobytiinoi i mnogoprotsessnoi. Ona podderzhivaet SO_REUSEPORT, EPOLLEXCLUSIVE, a takzhe priviazku obrabotchikov k protsessornym iadram. Odnako nesmotria na to, chto ona sobytiinaia, ona ne polnost'iu neblokiruiushchaia, chto oznachaet, chto nekotorye operatsii, naprimer otkrytie faila ili zhurnalirovanie, potentsial'no mozhet vyzvat' priostanovku obsluzhivaniia (dazhe s aio, aio_write, vkliuchennymi thread pools). Eto privedet k uvelicheniiu zaderzhek, kotorye mogut dostigat' neskol'kikh sekund na diskakh s shpindeliami.      u Envoy skhozhaia sobytiinaia arkhitektura, no vmesto protsessov ispol'zuiutsia potoki. Takzhe est' podderzhka SO_REUSEPORT (s podderzhkoi fil'tratsii BPF) i zavisimost' ot libevent dlia obrabotki tsikla sobytii (drugimi slovami -- netu krutykh fishek epoll(2), k primeru EPOLLEXCLUSIVE). V tsikle sobytii Envoy net kakikh-libo blokiruiushchikh operatsii vvoda-vyvoda. Dazhe zhurnalirovanie sdelano neblokiruiushchim, tak chto ono ne mozhet vyzvat' podvisanie.      Pokhozhe, chto teoreticheski po proizvoditel'nosti Nginx i Envoy budut blizki. Nadeiat'sia -- ne v nashikh pravilakh, poetomu v pervuiu ochered' my vypolnili nabor razlichnykh testov na analogichno nastroennykh Nginx i Envoy. Esli vy interesuetes' nastroikoi proizvoditel'nosti, my opisali nashi tipovye rukovodstva po nastroike zdes', nachinaia s podbora oborudovaniia i zakanchivaia optimizatsiei operatsionnoi sistemy, vyborom bibliotek i nastroikami vebservera.      Testy pokazali skhozhuiu proizvoditel'nost' na bol'shinstve testovykh nagruzok: vysokii RPS, vysokaia propusknaia sposobnost', i smeshannoe proksirovanie gRPC s nizkimi zaderzhkami i vysokoi propusknoi sposobnost'iu. Dostatochno slozhno sdelat' khoroshii test proizvoditel'nosti. U Nginx est' rukovodstva, no oni besporiadochnye. U Envoy takzhe est' rukovodstvo po nagruzochnomu testirovaniiu, a takzhe instrumenty v proekte envoy-perf, no oni, k sozhaleniiu, vygliadiat nepodderzhivaemymi. My stali ispol'zovat' nash vnutrennii instrument po imeni "hulk", potomu chto on "lomat'" nashi servisy.      Tem ne menee byli i zametnye razlichiia v rezul'tatakh:      Nginx pokazal bOl'shie zaderzhki na dolgozhivushchikh soedineniiakh. Po bol'shei chasti eto sviazano s podvisaniem tsikla obrabotki sobytii pri intensivnom vvode-vyvode, osobenno bylo zametno pri rabote s SO_REUSEPORT, poskol'ku v etom sluchae soedineniia mogut prinimat'sia ot zablokirovannogo v dannyi moment obrabotchika.  Proizvoditel'nost' Nginx bez sborshchika statistiki skhozha s takovoi dlia Envoy, aktivatsiia sborshchika na Lua zamedlila Nginx v teste s vysokim RPS v tri raza. Predskazuemo, s uchetom zavisimosti ot lua_shared_dict, kotoryi sinkhroniziruetsia mezhdu obrabotchikami s pomoshch'iu mutex. My ponimaem, naskol'ko neeffektivnym byl nash sbor statistiki. My poprobovali sdelat' chto-to podobnoe na counter(9) iz FreeBSD, no tol'ko v prostranstve pol'zovatelia: priviazka k protsessornomu iadru, a takzhe schetchiki bez blokirovki na kazhdyi obrabotchik vmeste s funktsiei sbora dannykh, kotoraia prokhodit po vsem obrabotchikam i vozvrashchaet ob'edinennuiu statistiku. No my otkazalis' ot etoi zatei, poskol'ku esli by my zaviazalis' na vnutrennosti Nginx (vkliuchaia obrabotku oshibok, naprimer), to nam prishlos' by podderzhivat' ogromennnyi patch, prevrashchaiushchii posleduiushchie obnovleniia v nastoiashchii ad.    U Envoy ne bylo ni odnoi iz etikh problem, a posle perekhoda na nego my by smogli osvobodit' do 60% serverov, ranee zaniatykh tol'ko pod Nginx.      Nabliudaemost'    Nabliudaemost' odna iz naibolee osnovnykh nuzhd pri soprovozhdenii liubogo produkta, a osobenno dlia takoi osnovnoi chasti infrastruktury, kak proksi. Eto eshche bolee vazhno v period perekhoda, chtoby liubaia problema byla obnaruzhena sistemoi monitoringa, a ne soobshchena razocharovannymi pol'zovateliami.      Nekommercheskii Nginx imeet modul' "stub status", v kotorom est' sem' kharakteristik:      Active connections: 291  server accepts handled requests   16630948 16630948 31070465  Reading: 6 Writing: 179 Waiting: 106    Etogo odnoznachno ne dostatochno dlia nas, tak chto my dobavili prostoi obrabotchik log_by_lua, kotoryi dobavliaet statistiku po kazhdomu zaprosu, osnovannomu na zagolovkakh i peremennykh, dostupnykh v Lua: kod statusa, razmery, popadanie v kesh i t.p. Zdes' primer prosteishei funktsii, kotoraia vydaet kharakteristiki:      function _M.cache_hit_stats(stat)   if _var.upstream_cache_status then   if _var.upstream_cache_status == "HIT" then   stat:add("upstream_cache_hit")   else   stat:add("upstream_cache_miss")   end   end  end    V dovesok k kharakteristikam, sobiraemym s kazhdogo zaprosa, my dobavili ochen' khrupkii analizator error.log, kotoryi otvechaet klassifikatsiiu oshibok upstream, http, Lua i TLS.      Poverkh vsego u nas rabotal otdel'nyi obrabotchik dlia sbora vnutrennego sostoianiia Nginx: vremia s momenta poslednei perezagruzki, chislo obrabotchikov, razmery RSS\VMS, sroki zhizni sertifikatov TLS i proch.      Tipovaia ustanovka Envoy predostavliaet nam tysiachi otdel'nykh metrik (v formate Prometheus), opisyvaia kak proksiruemyi trafik, tak i vnutrennee sostoianie servera:      $ curl -s http://localhost:3990/stats/prometheus | wc -l  14819    Tut vkliucheno mnozhestvo statistiki s razlichnoi agregatsiei:      Statistika po klasteru\po upstream\po virtual'nomu khostu, vkliuchaia informatsiiu o pule soedinenii i razlichnye vremennye riady.  Statistika dlia kazhdogo slushaiushchego soketa: TCP\HTTP\TLS  Razlichnaia vnutrenniaia statistika, nachinaia ot versii i vremeni raboty, i zakanchivaia statistikoi vydeleniia pamiati i ustarevshei funktsiei schetchikov ispol'zovaniia.    Osobyi privet interfeisu administratora Envoy. On ne tol'ko predostavliaet otdel'nuiu statistiku cherez /certs, /clusters i config_dump, no takzhe imeet vazhneishie dlia soprovozhdeniia osobennosti:      Sposobnost' meniat' na letu uroven' zhurnalirovaniia cherez /logging, chto pozvolilo nam reshat' dostatochno slozhnye problemy za schitannye minuty.  Tochki vkhoda /cpuprofiler, /heapprofiler, /contention, kotorye bezuslovno byli ves'ma nuzhnymi pri ustranenii problem s proizvoditel'nost'iu  /runtime_modify, s kotoroi mozhno izmeniat' parametry konfiguratsii bez primeneniia novoi konfiguratsii, chto mozhno ispol'zovat' pri podbore funktsii i t.p.    V dopolnenie k statistike Envoy takzhe podderzhivaet podkliuchaemye mekhanizmy otladki. Eto ispol'zuetsia ne tol'ko nashei komandoi, otvetstvennoi za trafik i rabotaiushchei s neskol'kimi urovniami balansirovki nagruzki, no i razrabotchikami prilozhenii, zhelaiushchimi proverit' skvoznye zaderzhki mezhdu Edge i serverami prilozhenii. Tekhnicheski u Nginx est' podderzhka otladki cherez storonniuiu programmu OpenTracing, odnako ona vialo razvivaetsia.      Vishenkoi na torte u Envoy idet sposobnost' otpravliat' zhurnaly po gRPC, chto pozvolilo nashei komande po trafiku ubrat' mosty syslog-to-hive (logichno, t.k. zhurnaly Envoy idut ne cherez syslog prim. perevodchika). Krome prochego na boevykh serverakh gorazdo udobnee (i bezopasnee!) dobavit' eshche odin obshchii servis gRPC, chem dobavliat' otdel'nyi slushaiushchii soket TCP\UDP.      Nastroika zhurnalirovaniia dostupa v Envoy, kak i prochie veshchi, proizvoditsia cherez servis upravleniia gRPS: Access Log Service (ALS). Servisy upravleniia iavliaiutsia standartnym sposobom integratsii Envoy data plane s razlichnymi servisami, chto podvodit nas k sleduiushchei teme.      Integratsiia    Sposobnost' Nginx k integratsii proshche vsego opisat' kak "iuniksovaia". Konfiguratsiia ochen' statichnaia. Est' sil'naia zavisimost' ot failov (sobstvenno konfiguratsionnyi fail, sertifikaty, belye\chernye spiski i t.p.) i shiroko izvestnykh proizvodstvennykh standartov (zhurnalirovanie v syslog, avtorizatsiia podzaprosov cherez HTTP). Prostota i obratnaia sovmestimost' khoroshaia shtuka dlia nebol'shikh ustanovok, potomu chto Nginx mozhet byt' dostatochno prosto avtomatizirovan paroi shell-skriptov. No po mere rosta masshtaba sistemy testiruemost' i standartizatsiia stanoviatsia bolee vazhnymi.      Envoy gorazdo bolee prodvinut v tom, kak data plane trafika dolzhen byt' integrirovan s control plane, a, sledovatel'no, i s ostal'noi infrastrukturoi. U nego est' podderzhka protobuf i gRPC, predostavliaemaia cherez stabil'nyi API, nazyvaemyi xDS. Envoy proizvodit obnaruzhenie svoikh dinamicheskikh resursov zaprashivaia svoi (odnu ili neskol'ko) sluzhby xDS. V nastoiashchee vremia eti interfeisy razvivaiutsia za predely Envoy, pered UDPA (universal data plane interface) razrabotchiki staviat ambitsioznuiu tsel': stat' standartom "de facto" v mire balansirovshchikov L4\L7. Iz nashego opyta -- eto rabotaet. My uzhe ispol'zuem ORCA (Open Request Cost Agregation) dlia vnutrennego testirovaniia nagruzki i rassmatrivaem vozmozhnosti UDPA dlia nashikh balansirovshchikov, ne sviazannykh s Envoy, naprimer na osnove Katran, balansirovshchika eBPF\XDP L4.      Eto ves'ma khorosho dlia Dropbox, poskol'ku vse servisy vzaimodeistvuiut mezhdu soboi cherez API na osnove gRPC. My vnedrili sobstvennuiu xDS control plane, kotoraia ob'ediniaet Envoy s nashei sistemoi upravleniia konfiguratsiei, obnaruzheniem servisov, upravleniem sekretami i informatsiei o marshrutakh. Esli khotite znat' bol'she o Dropbox RPC -- mozhete pochitat' zdes', my podrobno opisali integratsiiu obnaruzheniia servisov, upravlenie sekretami, statistiku, otladku i prochie veshchi s gRPC.      Opishem neskol'ko dostupnykh servisov xDS, ikh al'ternativy dlia Nginx, a takzhe primery togo, kak my ikh ispol'zuem:      Access Log Service (ALS), kak uzhe pisali vyshe, pozvoliaet nam dinamicheski nastraivat' tseli dlia zhurnalov dostupa, kodirovki i formaty. Poprobuite predstavit' sebe dinamicheskuiu versiiu log_format i access_log dlia Nginx  Endpoint discovery service (EDS), predostavliaet informatsiiu o chlenakh klastera. Eto analog dinamicheski obnovliaemogo spiska blokov upstream dlia sektsii server (naprimer dlia Lua eto budet balancer_by_lua_block) v konfiguratsionnom faile Nginx. V nashem sluchae my proksiruem eto na nash vnutrennii servis obnaruzheniia.  Secret discovery service (SDS), predostavliaet razlichnuiu informatsiiu o TLS, kotoraia v Nginx rabotaet po direktivam ssl_* (nu i ssl_*_by_lua_block sootvetstvenno). My vziali ego v kachestve nashego servisa raspostraneniia sekretov.  Runtime discovery service (RTDS), predostavliaet runtime flagi. Nasha realizatsiia etoi funktsii na Nginx byla dovol'no topornoi, osnovannoi na proverke sushchestvovaniia razlichnykh failov v Lua. S takim podkhodom servera bystro stali nesovmestimymi po nastroikam. V Envoy eto takzhe realizovano na failakh po-umolchaniiu, odnako my vmesto etogo podkliuchili servis s RTDS API k nashemu raspredelennomu khranilishchu konfiguratsii, tak chto my mozhem upravliat' tselymi klasterami (instrumentom, s interfeisom, pokhozhim na sysctl), a sluchainye nesootvestviia mezhdu razlichnymi serverami iskliucheny.  Route discovery service (RDS): vypolniaet sopostavlenie marshrutov s virtual'nymi khostami i pozvoliaet vypolniat' dopolnitel'nuiu nastroiku zagolovkov i fil'trov. V terminakh Nginx eto analog dinamicheskogo bloka location c set_header```proxy_set_header\proxy_pass```. Na nizhnikh urovniakh proksirovaniia my avtomaticheski sozdaem ikh iz nashikh konfiguraionnykh failov dlia opredeleniia servisov.    V kachestve primera integratsii Envoy v sushchestvuiushchei boevoi sisteme obychno privodiat etot. Est' takzhe i drugie realizatsii control plane dlia Envoy, naprimer Istio i menee slozhnaia go-control-plane. Nasha sobstvennaia platforma upravleniia Envoy realizuet vse bol'she interfeisov API xDS. Ona razvernuta kak obychnyi gRPC servis i vystupaet v kachestve promezhutochnogo zvena dlia nashikh infrastrukturnykh stroitel'nykh blokov. Vse eto delaetsia s pomoshch'iu obshchikh bibliotek Golang dlia obshcheniia s vnutrennimi servisami i ikh predostavleniia dlia Envoy cherez interfeisy API xDS. Sam protsess ne vkliuchaet vyzovy failovoi sistemy, podachu signalov, obrabotku cron\logrotate\syslog\parserov i t.p.      Nastroika    U Nginx est' neosporimoe preimushchestvo v vide prostoi i udobochitaemoi konfiguratsii. No eto vse stanovitsia nevazhnym, kak tol'ko konfiguratsionnyi fail stanovitsia slozhnym i nachinaet sozdavat'sia programmnymi sredstvami. Kak my uzhe pisali -- nasha konfiguratsiia sozdaetsia s pomoshch'iu Python2, Jinja2 i YAML. Nekotorye iz vas vozmozhno videli, ili dazhe pisali takoe dlia erb, pug, Text::Template ili dazhe m4 (A to! prim. perevodchika):      {% for server in servers %}  server {   {% for error_page in server.error_pages %}   error_page {{ error_page.statuses
